content: 联通6月3G新增用户重回高位每经记者胡玉慧中国联通(600050，收盘价5.33元)6月3G用户数据如期回升。数据显示，6月联通3G用户净增数达到185.5万户，结束了此前连续两个月环比下滑的状态，回到今年3月份创下的单月最高点。至此，联通今年上半年的营运成绩单已经明了。期间公司累计新增3G用户988.5万户，月平均增长164.75万户；3G用户总量累计达到2394.5万户，对自身总计1.81亿户移动电话用户的渗透率上升至13.2%。6月用户数据的改善得益于公司营销重心调整，千元智能机在上个月正式上柜销售。近日联通总经理陆益民表示，接下来将继续力推千元智能手机。不过业内指出，年初联通定下了今年新增2500万户3G用户的发展目标。如今2011年已过半，上半年仅完成40%。若要完成预定用户增长目标，接下来6个月，月均新增3G用户数需扩大至252万户。而在今年5月24日召开的年度股东大会上，中国联通董事长常小兵明确表示，“今年公司有信心完成3G新增用户达到2500万户的目标”，甚至“可能超越这一目标”。联通新推的千元智能机营销策略对中低端用户吸引力相当明显。此前联通宣布全额包销的100万台中兴V880，单日最高销量接近万台，整个6月份日均销量接近5000台；以此计算仅这一机型就为公司吸引到15万新用户。中信证券研究员宫俊涛就表示，随着更多千元级别智能终端在7月份推出，将给对用户增长带来积极推动。
person: 陆益民,常小兵,宫俊涛,胡玉慧
en: On June 3G, the new users of China Unicom returned to a high level. Hu Yuhui, a reporter from China Unicom (600050, closed at 5.33 yuan), rebounded as scheduled on June 3G. According to the data, the net increase of 3G users of China Unicom in June reached 1.855 million households, ending the previous two consecutive months of decline and returning to the highest point of a single month in March. Up to now, China Unicom's operating report card for the first half of this year has been clear. During this period, the company accumulated 9.885 million new 3G users, with an average monthly growth of 164.75 million; The total number of 3G users reached 23.945 million, and the penetration rate to its total number of 181 million mobile phone users rose to 13.2%. The improvement of user data in June benefited from the adjustment of the company's marketing focus. The thousand yuan smart mobile phone officially went on sale last month. Recently, Lu Yumin, the general manager of Unicom, said that he would continue to promote thousand yuan smartphones in the future. However, the industry pointed out that at the beginning of this year, China Unicom set the development goal of adding 25 million 3G users this year. Now that 2011 has passed half, only 40% has been completed in the first half of the year. If we want to complete the预定user growth target, the average number of new 3G users in the next 6 months needs to be expanded to 2520000. At the annual shareholders' meeting held on May 24 of this year, Chang Xiaobing, Chairman of China Unicom, made it clear that "this year, the company is confident of achieving the goal of 25 million new 3G users", and even "it may exceed this goal". The new marketing strategy of Unicom's thousand yuan smartphone is quite attractive to mid-low end users. Previously, China Unicom announced that 1000000 Zhongxing V880 was fully covered, with a single day's highest sales nearly ten thousand, and the average daily sales in the whole June was nearly 5000; According to this calculation, this model alone has attracted 150000 new users to the company. Gong Juntao, a researcher at Citic Securities, said that with more thousand yuan level intelligent terminals launched in July, it will have a positive promotion to user growth.

content: 另类丰胸新体验浴缸里的丰胸按摩导语：想体验一下另类丰胸的感觉吗？如果家里有个浴缸，就能轻松做到。在浴缸中进行胸部按摩，体验一下在水中按摩胸部的感觉。具体步骤如下：1、给浴缸里放水，保证水位刚好高过身体即可，把水的温度控制在40度左右，不要太烫，体温高一点点就可以了。2、躺在浴缸里边，用搓澡浴巾把全身擦洗干净，直到全身有发热的感觉。3、用手按摩乳房，按摩时间在5分钟左右即可。4、拿一把柔软的刷子，从乳房内侧划弧线，往外侧刷洗乳房。5、把水龙头开大，一边冲洗乳房一边刷。6、出浴，坐在浴缸边上，抹上滋润霜，双手按照顺时针的方向轻轻按摩乳房10分钟左右。7、用冷热毛巾交替擦拭乳房，进行冷热刺激，每5分钟换一次。8、如果乳房有些下垂，可以用淋浴喷头从乳房下方向上冲刷，并同时按摩乳房。在以上方法中需要注意的是乳房淋浴按摩，最好是在睡觉前或者起床后洗澡时进行。在按摩的时候不要使用精油或者其他刺激性药物，使用普通的淋浴乳或者香皂液就可以了。按摩前一定要把双手洗干净，如果指甲太长就剪短，否和伤了乳头或者皮肤就不得了了。当然，并不是只有利用盆浴才可以做胸部按摩的，淋浴同样可以进行以上动作，而且从某些方面来说，它要比盆浴更加有利于胸部的发育。如在淋浴时利用喷头用热水和冷水交替着从下往上冲洗来刺激乳房，非常有利于如乳房的丰满和坚挺。因为短时间内的低温刺激，能够有效的改善乳腺组织的机结构，可以提高其张力，进而出尽生长发育。洗完后，趁着身体微热时擦上滋润霜，做个胸部按摩将更加有利于乳房的发育，而且利于淋浴水流对胸部的冲击按摩，不但可以健美乳房，还可以让乳晕的颜色和乳房形状变的更加漂亮。
en: Alternative breast augmentation experience bathtub breast massage Introduction: Want to experience the alternative breast augmentation feeling? If there is a bathtub at home, it can be done easily. Have a chest massage in the bathtub to experience the feeling of chest massage in the water. Specific steps are as follows: 1. Fill the bathtub with water to ensure that the water level is just above the body. Control the water temperature at about 40 degrees. Don't make it too hot. The temperature is a little higher. 2. Lie in the bathtub, scrub the whole body clean with a bath towel until the whole body feels feverish. 3. Massage the breast with your hands for about 5 minutes. 4. Take a soft brush, draw an arc from the inside of the breast, and brush the breast to the outside. 5. Turn on the tap, rinse and brush the breasts at the same time. 6. Get out of the bath, sit on the edge of the bathtub, apply moisturizing cream, and gently massage the breast with both hands for about 10 minutes in a clockwise direction. 7. Wipe the breast with a cold and hot towel alternately for cold and hot stimulation, and change it every 5 minutes. 8. If the breasts are slightly drooping, you can use the shower nozzle to brush up from the bottom of the breasts and massage the breasts at the same time. In the above method, pay attention to breast shower massage, which is best performed when sleeping or getting up to have a bath. Do not use essential oils or other stimulating drugs when massaging. Use ordinary shower cream or soap liquid. Be sure to wash your hands clean before massage. If your nails are too long, cut them short. If you hurt your nipples or skin, it will be terrible. Of course, chest massage can not only be done by using basin bath, but also by shower, which is more beneficial to the development of chest in some ways. For example, when showering, use the shower head to alternate hot water and cold water to flush upward to stimulate the breasts, which is very helpful to the fullness and firmness of the breasts. Because the short-term low temperature stimulation can effectively improve the structure of mammary gland tissue, it can improve its tension and promote growth and development. After washing, take advantage of the slight heat of the body to apply moisturizing cream, and do chest massage will be more helpful to the development of breasts. It is also beneficial to the impact massage of the chest by the shower water flow, which can not only beautify the breasts, but also make the color of the areola and the shape of the breasts more beautiful.

content: 基金提前潜伏业绩暴增股216家公司中期预增翻番记者高丽霞2011年中报就将在本周拉开帷幕了。统计显示，今年中期的业绩预告中，喜多忧少。靓丽的中报业绩惹得市场蠢蠢欲动，也成为近期市场向上的主要动力。记者统计发现，在已经披露业绩预告的上市公司中，216家公司业绩翻番，而基金早于今年一季度就开始重仓布局就有146只。超六成公司业绩翻番Wind统计显示，截至昨日两市共有905家公司发布了今年中期的业绩预告，其中预增的个股多达714只，占比接近80%，业绩翻番的个股也多达216只。在这216只中期业绩暴增的个股中，基金于今年一季度重仓持有的就有146只。在沪深两市中报业绩增幅排行榜中，增长幅度在100倍以上的共有四家公司。上海新梅(600732)、恒逸石化(000703)、新华联(000620)、青海明胶(000606)分列前四位。不过这四只个股业绩的大幅增长均不是由于主营收入增长所带来的，要么是出售股权所获得的收益，要么是沾了重组的光。对于这种业绩变相暴增的公司，基金似乎兴趣不大，一季度这四只业绩增幅最大的个股均未获得基金的“光顾”。上海新梅同比业绩增幅105370%，位居两市之首。去年中期上海新梅仅实现净利润6.16万元。但今年中期公司预计2011年半年度归属于上市公司股东的净利润为5500万元—6500万元。业绩大幅增长主要是由于公司转让上海新兰房地产开发有限公司股权所产生的投资收益得以确认，且报告期内结转的营业收入增加。或许是由于业绩增长主要是来源于股权转让，而并非公司经营业绩的好转，上海新梅在二级市场上并无突出表现，此外一季度各大基金均没有光顾这只股票。排名第二是去年中小板新上市的恒逸石化，其预计今年中期将实现净利润11.24亿元—12.36亿元。不过，恒逸石化业绩的大幅增长，却是沾了重组的光。重组完成后的6月11日，恒逸石化即发布了业绩预盈公告，预计2011上半年实现净利润为11.24亿元-12.36亿元，半年的净利润已超过全年的业绩承诺。公司股价也从去年启动重组之初的10元左右，上涨至目前的44元附近，并曾经在今年4月中旬创下过54.50元的高点。新华联以19352%的业绩增幅暂居第三位。新华联的业绩增长也是来源于重组，公司借壳停牌了长达五年之久的S*ST圣方。新华联一复牌，在涨幅不受限制的复牌首日即恐怖大涨，从1.17元/股一口气狂涨到10.52元/股。此外，中期业绩增长在100倍以上的还有青海明胶，公司预计上半年实现净利润约3700万元，同比增长14478.41%。这一变化是由于公司转让四川禾正制药有限责任公司股权并确认相应收入而致。今年中期业绩增长幅度在10倍以上的公司还有冠福家用(002102)、ST张家界(000430)、美欣达(002034)、天伦置业(000711)、西安旅游(000610)等18只；业绩增长幅度在5至10倍的则有经纬纺机(000666)、维科精华(600152)、山东海化(000822)、美邦服饰(002269)、太极实业(600667)等22只。基金重仓提前布局在这216家一季度业绩增长至少一倍的个股中，基金于去年四季度重仓的就多达146只，占比高达68%。其中威孚高科(000581)赢得了众多的基金的青睐。截至一季度末，共有34只基金持有威孚高科，基金合计持股13013.51万股。不过与上期相比，基金还是减持了7246万股。华夏、易方达旗下均有四只基金持有威孚高科，分别合计持股2773.88万股、1409.57万股。南方基金旗下更是有5只基金持有该股，此外去年的冠军产品华商盛世成长也持有1109.73万股，其同门基金华商策略精选则持有897.17万股。一季度潜伏在金发科技(600143)的基金也多达32只，合计持有20542.04万股。兴业基金、信诚基金旗下各有四只产品均重仓持有该股，其中兴业基金持股最多，合计持股5037.56万股。东吴基金旗下更是有5只产品持有该股，合计持有1280.39万股。一季度末潜伏的基金数在20家以上的还有包钢稀土(600111)、中集集团(000039)、广汇股份(600256)、天山股份(000877)。获得10只-20只基金潜伏的则有中国北车(601299)、双鹭药业(002038)、金螳螂(002081)、山东黄金(600547)、辰州矿业(002155)、中恒集团(600252)、中环股份(002129)等21只个股。从行业分布来看，基金一季度末最青睐的行业是石油化学塑料塑胶，在这216只业绩翻番的公司中，石油化学塑料塑胶行业的就有31家，其次是机械设备仪表，基金一季度提前潜伏的有20家，第三位是金属、非金属行业，有19家。
en: The funds have been hiding in the performance of 216 companies for a long time. The mid-term forecast of 216 companies has doubled. Gao Lixia, a reporter in 2011, is going to be the beginning of this week. Statistics show that there are few worries in this year's mid-term performance forecast. The beautiful interim report results make the market restless, and they also become the main driving force for the recent market. The reporter's statistics found that among the listed companies that had disclosed earnings forecasts, 216 companies' earnings had doubled, and 146 of them had been overweighted by the fund since the first quarter of this year. Wind statistics shows that more than 60% of the companies' performance has doubled. As of yesterday, 905 companies in the two cities had released this year's mid-term performance forecast, of which 714 were forecast to increase, accounting for nearly 80%, and the number of shares with doubled performance also reached 216. Among the 216 mid-term performance growth stocks, 146 were heavily held by funds in the first quarter of this year. In the ranking list of performance growth of CSRC's semi annual report in Shanghai and Shenzhen, there are four companies with growth rate of more than 100 times. Shanghai Xinmei (600732), Hengyi Petrochemical (000703), Xinhualian (000620) and Qinghai Gelatine (000606) ranked first. However, the substantial growth of these four shares is not due to the growth of main business income, but either the income from the sale of equity or the benefit of restructuring. For this kind of company with disguised performance growth, the fund seems to have little interest. In the first quarter, the four shares with the largest performance growth did not get the "attention" of the fund. Shanghai Xingmei's performance grew by 105370% year on year, ranking first in the two cities. Shanghai Xinmei only realized a net profit of 61600 yuan in the middle of last year. However, in the middle of this year, the company expects that the net profit attributable to shareholders of the listed company in the first half of 2011 will be 55 million yuan - 65 million yuan. The main reason for the substantial growth of performance is that the investment income generated by the company's transfer of equity of Shanghai Xinlan Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. has been confirmed, and the operating income transferred during the reporting period has increased. Perhaps because the performance growth mainly comes from equity transfer, rather than the improvement of the company's operating performance, Shanghai Xingmei has no outstanding performance in the secondary market. In addition, the major funds did not visit this stock in the first quarter. The second largest was Hengyi Petrochemical, a new small and medium-sized board listed last year, which is expected to achieve a net profit of 11.24 billion yuan - 12.36 billion yuan in the middle of this year. However, the substantial growth of Hengyi Petrochemical's performance is due to the restructuring. On June 11, after the completion of the restructuring, Hengyi Petrochemical issued an announcement on the expected profit, expecting that the net profit in the first half of 2011 would be 11.24 billion yuan - 12.36 billion yuan, and the net profit for half a year has exceeded the annual performance commitment. The company's share price also rose from around 10 yuan at the beginning of last year's restructuring to the current 44 yuan, and hit a high of 54.50 yuan in mid April this year. Xinhualian ranked third with a performance growth of 19352%. Xinhualian's performance growth also comes from restructuring, and the company borrows a shell that has been suspended for five years * ST Sheng Fang. Xinhualian once terrorized a huge increase from 1.17 yuan/share to 10.52 yuan/share on the first day of its resume trading without restrictions on the increase. In addition, Qinghai Gelatine also has more than 100 times of medium-term performance growth. The company is expected to achieve a net profit of about 37 million yuan in the first half of the year, up 14478.41% year on year. This change is due to the fact that the company transferred the equity of Sichuan Hezheng Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. and confirmed the corresponding income. There are also 18 companies whose performance grew by more than 10 times in the first half of this year, such as Guanfu Home (002102), ST Zhangjiajie (000430), Meixin (002034), Tian Lun Real Estate (000711), Xi'an Tourism (000610) and so on; The performance growth rate is 5 to 10 times, including经纬纺机 (000666), Vicor Essence (600152), Shandong Haihua (000822), Metersbonwe (002269), Taiji Industry (600667) and 22 others. Funds heavily laid out in the first quarter of this year, among the 216 companies whose performance grew at least twice in the first quarter, there were as many as 146 funds in the fourth quarter of last year, accounting for as high as 68%. Among them, Weifu Gaoke (000581) has won the favor of many funds. At the end of the first quarter, 34 funds held Weifu Gaoke, with a combined shareholding of 13013.51 million shares. However, compared with the previous period, the fund still reduced its holdings by 72.46 million shares. Huaxia and Yifangda both had four funds holding Weifu Gaoke, with a combined shareholding of 2773.88 million shares and 1409.57 million shares respectively. Southern Fund also has five funds under its banner holding this stock, In addition, the champion product Huashang盛世growth also holds 11097300 shares, and its fellow fund Huashang Strategy Selection holds 8971700 shares. The fund hidden in Jinfare Technology (600143) in the first quarter also has 32 shares, with a combined holding of 20542.04 million shares. Xingye Fund and Citicent Fund each have four products under their banner, which are heavily invested in the stock, of which Xingye Fund holds the most shares, with a combined shareholding of 5037.56 million shares. Dongwu Fund even has 5 products under its banner holding this stock, with a combined holding of 1280.39 million shares. There are more than 20 funds hidden at the end of the first quarter, including Baogang Rare Earth (600111), China International Group (000039), Guanghui Shares (600256), Tianshan Shares (000877). There are 21 shares, including China North Vehicle (601299), Shuanglu Pharmaceutical (002038), Jin螳螂(002081), Shandong Gold (600547), Chenzhou Mining (002155), Zhongheng Group (600252), and Zhonghuan Shares (002129), which have been hidden by 10-20 funds. In terms of industry distribution, the industry that the fund favored most at the end of the first quarter was oil, chemical, plastic and plastic. There were 31 companies in the oil, chemical, plastic and plastic industries among the 216 companies with doubled performance, followed by machinery, equipment and instruments. The fund had 20 companies in the first quarter, and the third was the metal and non metal industry, with 19 companies

content: 驻日美军战斗飞行队可能迁至韩国部署训练中新网3月22日电据韩联社报道，因日本大地震和核电站泄漏影响，驻日美国空军第35战斗飞行团属下的F-16战斗机部队可能会选择在韩国等其他地区部署和进行训练。美国《星条旗报(StarsandStripes)》22日报道称，第35战斗飞行团长麦克·罗德斯坦因上校19日在基地表示，为了继续进行训练，有必要将第14战斗飞行队的驾驶员和维修人员派往韩国等其他地区，进行部署和训练。他还说，三?基地有可能会成为日本地震赈灾物资的枢纽基地，所以F-16战斗机需要另寻其他训练场地。报道称，罗德斯坦并没有具体指出对外部署的准确时间表，只表示对外部署的时间大约为两周到一个月。三?基地位于日本发生大地震的东北地区，离福岛核电站约300公里。有分析认为，第14战斗机飞行大队可能因核辐射在寻地避难。据悉，离福岛核电站约260公里的美国海军厚木基地曾于17至18日进行调遣，将1000多兵力和部分飞机迁往关岛的安德逊基地。
en: The battle flight team of the US troops stationed in Japan may be redeployed to South Korea for training. chinanews. com, March 22- The Associated Press reported that due to the impact of the Japanese earthquake and nuclear power plant leakage, the F-16 fighter detachment under the 35th Battle Flight Corps of the US Air Force stationed in Japan may choose to deploy and train in other areas such as South Korea. The Stars and Stripes (Stars and Stripes) reported on the 22nd that Colonel Michael Rodstein, commander of the 35th Combat Flight Regiment, said at the base on the 19th that it was necessary to send the pilots and maintenance personnel of the 14th Combat Flight Regiment to other areas such as South Korea for deployment and training in order to continue training. He also said that the? Base is likely to become the hub base of Japanese earthquake relief materials, so the F-16 fighter needs to look for other training venues. The report said that Rodstein did not specify the exact timetable for the deployment, only saying that the deployment time would be about two weeks to one month. The? The base is located in Northeast Japan, where a major earthquake occurred, about 300 kilometers away from the Fukushima nuclear power plant. Some analysts believe that the 14th Fighter Squadron may be seeking shelter from nuclear radiation. It is reported that the US Navy's Koku Base, about 260 kilometers away from the Fukushima nuclear power plant, was transferred on the 17th and 18th, and more than 1000 troops and some aircraft were transferred to Andersen Base in Guam.

content: 男子手持枪状打火机抢走6.2万本报讯(记者唐煜实习生李慧娟张博阳)25日晚11时05分左右，汉阳鹦鹉大道翠微路口一建行自助银行内，一对夫妻存款时，一男子持假枪抢走6.2万元现金逃跑。事发后，数十位警察连夜搜索，约10小时将这名劫匪抓获，并追回4.5万元。当时，董先生与妻子携带大量现金在该自助银行内汇款，当存入约1万元时，一名年约30岁、身高约1.75米的男子抢夺董先生的塑料袋，董先生及妻子奋起反抗，抢下该男子的武器，劫匪则拿走装有现金的塑料袋。董先生一边追赶一边呼救，妻子急忙报警。劫匪跑出数十米翻过银行铁栅门到银行营业厅后院，翻过院墙进入附近平田小区。董先生夫妇追赶不上，发现“手枪”原是枪状打火机。事发后，数十民警赶到现场，围住平田小区，并对可疑地方进行搜查。这名男子劫抢客户的过程，被银行录像拍下。经调查，这名男子租住在现场附近一居民区内，共抢走董先生夫妻俩6.2万元现金，并很快锁定山西人林某有重大嫌疑。昨日上午9时许，在案发约10小时后，林某在汉口民生路附近被警方抓获，并追回了4.5万元现金。据称，林某来汉没有找到工作，准备抢劫后离汉。昨日上午，记者在现场见到，自助银行的四台取款机已恢复正常营业，取款机前顾客在排队等候。欢迎发表评论我要评论
person: 李慧娟,张博阳,唐煜,林某,董先生
en: A man with a gun-shaped lighter robbed 620000 yuan, (reporter Tang Yu, intern Li Huijuan, Zhang Boyang) At around 11:05 p.m. on the 25th, in a self-service bank of CCB at Cuiwei Road, Hongyang Parrot Avenue, a man with a fake gun robbed 62000 yuan in cash and escaped when a couple deposited money. After the incident, dozens of police searched overnight, and it took about 10 hours to catch the robber and recover 45000 yuan. At that time, Mr. Dong and his wife carried a large amount of cash in the self service bank to remit money. When they deposited about 10000 yuan, a man who was about 30 years old and about 1.75 meters tall grabbed Mr. Dong's plastic bag. Mr. Dong and his wife fought back, grabbed the man's weapon, and the robber took away the plastic bag with cash. Mr. Dong called for help while chasing, and his wife called the police in a hurry. The robber ran out dozens of meters to flip over the bank's iron fence gate to the back yard of the bank's business hall, flipped over the courtyard wall and entered the nearby Pingtian community. Mr. Dong and his wife could not catch up, and found that the "pistol" was originally a gun-shaped lighter. After the incident, dozens of police officers arrived at the scene, surrounded the Pingtian community, and searched the suspicious places. The process of this man's robbery of customers was video recorded by the bank. After investigation, the man rented a house in a residential area near the scene, robbed Dong and his wife of 62000 yuan in cash, and quickly locked Lin, a Shanxi native, as a major suspect. At about 9:00 a.m. yesterday, about 10 hours after the case, Lin was arrested by the police near Minsheng Road, Hankou, and 45000 yuan in cash was recovered. It is reported that Lin came to Han without finding a job and was going to leave Han after robbing. Yesterday morning, the reporter saw at the scene that the four ATMs in the self-service bank had resumed normal operations, and customers were waiting in line in front of the ATM. Welcome to comment on my comment

content: 雨枫：九城不会因为失去魔兽而倒下新浪科技讯4月16日晚间消息，网络游戏业内人士雨枫今日与新浪科技连线时表示，虽然九城在失去魔兽世界代理权之后，短期内会亏损。但按照九城目前的条件，不会因为此事倒下。以下为对话实录：新浪科技：在这场风波中，九城是不是最大的输家？最大的赢家是网易还是暴雪？雨枫：我觉得输家只有九城一家，所以这里没有最大的输家。最大的赢家是暴雪，而不是网易。但九城的失败是失去了绝大多数收入，但是在过去的四年时间里面，九城靠运营魔兽世界这款产品实现了上市、拿到了巨额现金、也拿到了EA公司的产品代理权。如果我们斤斤从过去四年的这个结果来看，也只能说“不圆满”，而不是输了。为什么说网易不是最大的赢家呢？因为我们都知道九城当年签下这个产品的时候，代价已经很高了。今天暴雪把这个产品又交到网易手里，我想网易开出的条件应该不会比当年差。而九城在过去四年里面，利润一直不是很高。这里就有一个问题，网易运营魔兽世界会不会带来丰厚的利润？目前，我自己和一些业内的朋友的判断是，网易的收益未必会比九城的高。当初网易运营战网的时候，业内问的问题主要是对网易的财务有什么影响，因为战网模式在国内还是有很多现实的困难。现在网易花掉很高的代价将魔兽世界这个游戏拿下，那网易和暴雪会将这款游戏作为一个重要的收入来源。因为战网不一定能够带来大量收入，但是魔兽世界可以。问题是今天网易付出的代价会比九城当年付出的代价高，从九城过去四年的财报来看，魔兽世界的毛利不是很高，而且九城在很多方面受到暴雪的制约。实际上，暴雪抓住了九城的一个命门，九城没有别的收入来源，暴雪就可以任意地提价。这件事情要是放在网易和丁磊身上，就魔兽世界这个产品来讲，他讨价还价的能力未必比九城多多少。虽然网易可以说公司比较大，收入比较分散。但暴雪还是占据了一个相对主动的位置。新浪科技：现在已经确认的是，九城失去了魔兽世界这款游戏，对于他们来说，短期和长期有何影响？雨枫：从短期上来讲，这对九城来说是一件坏事。超过95%的收入来源没有了，这点没有什么疑问。从长期来讲，这对九城来说未必是一件坏事。对于九城来说，魔兽世界这款游戏是一个太大的存在。因为有了魔兽，它把九城所能拿出来的资源、能力和管理人员的精力完全吸引过去。这种状态下，九城想做一些别的事情是有难度的。在过去四年里，九城拿到了行业里大量被看好的产品，但是一直都没有成功。除了产品本身的问题之外，我们回过头来想，这里是不是存在一个九城“拆东墙补西墙”的情况。由于魔兽带来了95%的收入，就不得不先保证它的运营。这样一来，新产品的上线和运营就有一定的削弱。现在九城没有了魔兽，公司在短期是亏损了。但要看一下九城本身，他拥有3亿多的现金，他背后站着EA。那九城会因为这件事情倒下吗？或者退市吗？大不了重新开始。但现在这个时间点上，九城已经比四年前的条件好了不知多少呗，我认为九城不吃亏。新浪科技：为什么九城用了4年的时间，却仍然摆脱不了对魔兽的依赖？雨枫：从朱骏拿下魔兽在中国的代理权第一天开始，他就在考虑如何摆脱对这款游戏的依赖，这也是过去四年里面九城一直在做的事情。从财务的角度来看，他没有做成。原因让我来分析的话，有如下原因。第一，九城的运营能力。这里包括了市场推广和客户服务，也包括与政府部门的沟通能力。在过去这四年里，九城运营团队的能力并没有得到提高，这是非常失误的一点。另外一点，产品线选择的问题。九城选择的产品主要是大家都看好的大产品。但业界除了魔兽这样的大产品，也有一些不出名但很成功的小产品。九城把过多的精力放在了海外游戏的代理上，而没有将眼光投向国内，寻找那些更适合中国玩家习惯的产品。新浪科技：网易将如何实现产品的过渡？网易到底为什么要代理魔兽这款游戏？雨枫：刚才我们分析过，从财务上来讲，虽然魔兽这款游戏是有钱可赚，但丁磊没有像当年朱骏那样，他非得要拿下这个产品才能实现某种目的这个地步。没有魔兽，对于网易来讲无关痛痒。有了魔兽，对于网易来讲也就是10%到20%的成长机会。这个问题我至今也没有想清楚，我认为丁磊不是冲着利润去的。在过去的一两年，网易在产品开发上遇到了一定的挫折。像《大唐豪侠》和《天下2》这些产品都没有做起来，而且《天下2》是魔兽世界的正面竞争产品。但很明显，这个产品是失败的。虽然说网易这几年做《梦幻西游》和《大话》做得顺风顺水，但游戏之外的业务收入还是很少，门户业务和有道搜索的收入一直不稳定。其实代理魔兽这件事情是一个信号。网易成立了杭州研究院，核心是研发免费游戏。而现在他不仅做免费游戏，还在做代理游戏。这就是网易战略转型的信号，未来可能不再把自己局限为研发和运营游戏的运营商，他可能把自己放在一个更大的平台上。但暴雪的立场是很强硬的，如果依靠暴雪来转型，我相信这里有巨大的困难。新浪科技：在今年6月，九城的授权就会到期。能否预测一下用户资料将会怎么处理？雨枫：这件事情说法很多，有一种说法是这样：从合同角度来看，当初的合约规定所有的用户资料都在暴雪手中。因为当时包括盛大在内都在争夺这款游戏，但只有九城什么都没有，如果不能拿到这款游戏就无法生存下去。现在来看，这个条款是很亏本的。(于连)
en: Yufeng: The nine cities will not fall down because of the loss of Warcraft. Sina Technology News reported on the evening of April 16. Yufeng, a game industry insider, said today when he connected with Sina Technology that although the nine cities would suffer losses in the short term after losing the agency rights of World of Warcraft, they would not fall down because of this matter according to the current conditions of the nine cities. The following is a transcript of the dialogue: Sina Technology: In this crisis, is the Nine Cities the biggest loser? Yufeng: I think the loser is only the Nine Cities, so there is no biggest loser here. The biggest winner is Blizzard, not Netease. But the failure of the Nine Cities is to lose the majority of its income. In the past four years, the Nine Cities has relied on the operation of the World of Warcraft to achieve listing, obtain huge cash, and obtain the product agency rights of EA Company. If we only say "imperfect" rather than lose from the results of the past four years, I think the conditions offered by Netease today should not be worse than they were years ago. However, the profit of the Nine Cities has not been very high in the past four years. There is a question here: will Netease's operation of World of Warcraft bring huge profits? At present, my judgment and some friends in the industry is that Netease's earnings may not be higher than those of the Nine Cities. When Netease operated Battle net, the main question in the industry was what impact it would have on Netease's finance, because the Battle net mode still has many practical difficulties in China. Now Netease has spent a lot of money to get the game World of Warcraft, and Netease and Blizzard will take this game as an important source of income. Because Battle net may not bring in a lot of money, but World of Warcraft can. The problem is that the price Netease pays today will be higher than the price Nine Cities paid years ago. From the perspective of Nine Cities' financial reports in the past four years, the gross profit of World of Warcraft is not very high, and Nine Cities is constrained by Blizzard in many aspects. In fact, Blizzard caught a lifeline of Nine Cities. Since Nine Cities has no other sources of income, Blizzard can arbitrarily raise prices. If this matter is placed on Netease and Ding Lei, in terms of this product of World of Warcraft, his bargaining power may not be much more than that of Nine Cities. Although Netease can say that the company is large and the income is dispersed. But Blizzard still occupied a relatively active position. Sina Technology: It has been confirmed that the Nine Cities has lost the game of World of Warcraft. What is the short-term and long-term impact on them? Yufeng: In the short term, this is a bad thing for Nine Cities. There is no doubt that more than 95% of the sources of income have been lost. In the long run, this may not be a bad thing for Nine Cities. For the Nine Cities, the game World of Warcraft is a big deal. Because of Warcraft, it completely attracts the resources, capabilities and energy of managers that the Nine Cities can offer. In this case, it is difficult for Nine Cities to do something else. In the past four years, Nine Cities has won a lot of promising products in the industry, but it has never succeeded. In addition to the problem of the product itself, we can think back, there is a possibility that Nine Cities "tear down the east wall to make up for the west wall". Because Warcraft brings 95% of the income, it has to guarantee its operation first. As a result, the launch and operation of new products are somewhat weakened. Now the Nine Cities has lost the World of Warcraft, and the company has lost money in the short term. But look at Fucheng itself, he has more than 300 million cash, and EA is behind him. Will the Nine Cities fall down because of this matter? Or delisting? Start all over again. But at this time point, Nine Cities has been much better than four years ago. I think Nine Cities is not at a loss

content: 民生证券：资金面不低头A股难抬头□民生证券研究所策略团队上调存准率之后，加息预期再起，市场由此也出现了连续破位下跌的走势。本周二公开市场一年期央票利率继续走高10BP，由于已在市场预期之内，市场反应较为平淡，我们预计6月到7月央行还会再次加息。在资金面压力依然较大，而物价回落及政策转向信号并未出现之前，市场筑底的格局不会改变，投资者可逢低布局大消费、业绩确定的成长股和航空板块。经济增速温和走低5月经济数据进一步验证了我们对于未来经济的判断，即去库存周期下，经济增速进一步温和走低。5月工业增加值同比增长13.3%，在4月13.4%的基础上低位趋稳。5月消费和出口实际增速明显回落，但投资需求依然旺盛，实际增速继续上行，预计宏观经济将于三季度实现软着陆。从三驾马车的表现来看，投资需求旺盛，终端消费增速继续放缓。5月份，社会消费品零售总额同比增长16.9%，低于市场17.4%的同比增速预期，较4月回落0.2个百分点。扣除出口价格提高和人民币升值的影响，5月出口实际增长2.5%，比4月回落9.5个百分点。5月投资需求依然旺盛，剔除投资价格上涨因素，5月投资实际增长19.0%，比4月提高0.6个百分点。“提准”重挫资金面自5月中旬上调准备金率以来，银行体系的流动性持续偏紧。6月14日央行再次提高存款准备金率，从而令本已偏紧的资金面进一步趋紧。本次调准后货币市场资金利率再次大幅走高，并带动国债收益率上行。6月21日SHIBOR7天利率已经飙升至8.33%，创今年2月以来的新高，Shibor隔夜利率也上升至7.14%的高位。我们认为，6月底之前宏观资金面压力不会减轻，短期资金利率波动将加大。首先，由于6月份是银行半年度报表考核的关键时期，因此本身就是传统的资金需求旺季；其次，由于一季度末金融机构超储率为1.5%，预计本次提准后银行超储率将进一步降低，对资金面的边际影响会明显放大；再次，商业银行实施日均存贷比考核使得银行月末腾挪表外资产的策略失效；最后，由于上一次提准造成的流动性的紧张局面还未得以缓解，此次存准的上调无论是从资金存量还是心理预期方面，都将进一步放大短期资金利率的波动。物价拐点隐现紧缩政策趋于谨慎5月CPI同比上涨5.5%，创下34个月以来的新高。但从环比数据来看，物价走势出现了一些积极的变化，其中PPI环比上涨0.3%，较4月环比回落了0.2%，原材料购进价格也出现了0.5%的环比回落。在翘尾因素的影响下，CPI有可能在6、7月份再创本轮通胀的新高，但之后物价将缓慢回落，四季度有望明显回落，预计今年11月和12月CPI同比涨幅将回落至4%左右。从通胀走势来看，如果下半年通胀压力真能有效缓解，物价下行将是大概率事件。从经济下行风险来看，目前阶段实体经济已经出现了经济下行的迹象，且微观调研数据表明实体经济的需求也已呈现出下行迹象。从货币紧缩的程度来看，准备金率上调和预期内的一次加息对经济的调控作用将边际递增。故我们预计通胀环比下降将是政策拐点的催化剂，从时间上看，2011年7、8月份紧缩政策仍将继续谨慎。8月前筑底格局难改我们预计6月资金压力将维持高位，短期市场仍将延续筑底格局。受翘尾因素的影响，6月CPI存在继续上冲的风险，但食品价格将于下半年趋稳，同比涨幅回落，预计物价将于6-7月见顶、8月份回落。在通胀拐点可期、经济回落的背景下，下半年紧缩政策的进一步实施趋于谨慎。在通胀回落没有得到数据验证之前，市场对通胀的压力仍然难以释怀，短期市场继续筑底。不过，我们认为，8月以后市场有望迎来反转行情，全年将演绎“N”型走势。8月份以后，通胀回落趋于明朗，政策的核心将由控物价转向稳增长、促转型，宏观经济也将于三季度触底。届时，投资者预期向好，制约市场的力量将显著减轻，8月份以后市场有望迎来趋势性的反转行情。我们看好经济结构转型背景下的食品饮料、商贸、家电等大消费板块、以计算机信息服务为代表的新兴成长板块、受益于人民币加速升值，以及即将进入旺季的航空板块，建议积极布局。点击进入[上证指数吧]讨论
en: Minsheng Securities: The A-share market is hard to lift its head when the funding surface does not bow down. □ The strategy team of Minsheng Securities Research Institute adjusted the reserve requirement ratio, and then the expectation of interest rate hikes rose again, and the market also showed a trend of consecutive breaks and falls. On Tuesday of this week, the one year central bank ticket interest rate in the public market continued to rise by 10BP. As it was within market expectations, the market reaction was relatively calm. We expect the central bank will raise interest rates again in June and July. The market structure of bottom building will not change until the pressure on funds is still high, and the signal of price decline and policy shift has not appeared. Investors can make a low level layout of large consumer goods, performance growth stocks and the aviation sector. The moderate decline of economic growth in May further verified our judgment on future economic growth, that is, under the destocking cycle, the economic growth rate further declined moderately. In May, the added value of industries above designated size grew by 13.3% year on year, stabilizing at a low level on the basis of 13.4% in April. In May, the actual growth rate of consumption and exports declined significantly, but the investment demand was still strong, and the actual growth rate continued to rise, and it is expected that the macro economy will achieve a soft landing in the third quarter. Judging from the performance of the three驾horsemen, investment demand is strong, and the growth rate of terminal consumption continues to slow down. In May, the total retail sales of consumer goods in society grew by 16.9% year on year, lower than the market's expectation of 17.4% year on year, and down 0.2 percentage points from April. In May, the actual export growth was 2.5%, down 9.5 percentage points from April, excluding the impact of export price increases and RMB appreciation. In May, investment demand was still strong. Excluding the factor of investment price rise, investment actually grew by 19.0% in May, up 0.6 percentage points from April. Since the central bank raised the deposit reserve ratio in mid May, the liquidity of the banking system has been continuously tight. On June 14, the central bank once again raised the deposit reserve ratio, making the already tight funding surface further tighten. After this adjustment, the money market interest rate rose again, driving up the treasury yield. On June 21, the SHIBOR7 day interest rate had soared to 8.33%, a new high since February this year, and the Shibor overnight interest rate also rose to a high of 7.14%. We believe that the pressure on macro funds will not be eased before the end of June, and the fluctuation of short-term capital interest rates will increase. First of all, since June is the key period for banks' semi-annual report evaluation, it is a traditional peak season for capital demand in itself; Secondly, since the super storage rate of financial institutions at the end of the first quarter was 1.5%, it is expected that the super storage rate of banks will further decrease after this preparation is raised, and the marginal effect on the capital market will be significantly amplified; Thirdly, the implementation of the average daily loan to deposit ratio by commercial banks makes the strategy of banks to move off-balance sheet assets at the end of the month ineffective; Finally, since the liquidity tension caused by the last increase in the deposit reserve ratio has not been alleviated, the increase in the deposit reserve ratio this time will further amplify the fluctuation of short-term capital interest rates in terms of both capital stock and psychological expectations. The price turning point is hidden, and the tightening policy tends to be cautious. The CPI in May rose by 5.5% year on year, hitting a new high in 34 months. However, from the perspective of month on month data, the price trend has shown some positive changes, among which the PPI rose by 0.3% month on month, down 0.2% from April, and the price of raw materials also fell by 0.5% month on month. Under the influence of the tailing up factor, the CPI is likely to hit a new high in this round of inflation in June and July, but then prices will slowly fall back, and it is expected to fall back significantly in the fourth quarter. It is expected that the year-on-year increase of CPI in November and December this year will fall back to around 4%. From the perspective of inflation trend, if the inflation pressure in the second half of the year can be effectively alleviated, the decline in prices will be a probable event. From the perspective of economic downside risks, the real economy has shown signs of economic decline at this stage, and the micro survey data also shows that the demand of the real economy has shown a trend of decline. In terms of the degree of monetary tightening, the central bank's decision to raise the reserve requirement ratio and the expected interest rate hike will have a marginal effect on the economy. Therefore, we expect that the decline in inflation month on month will be a catalyst for the policy turning point. In terms of time, the tightening policy will still be cautious in July and August 2011. It is difficult to change the pattern of bottoming out before August. We expect that the funding pressure in June will remain high, and the market will still continue the pattern of bottoming out in the short term. Affected by the tailing factor, the CPI in June is at risk of continuing to rise. However, food prices will stabilize in the second half of the year, and the year-on-year growth rate will decline. It is expected that prices will peak in June and July and retreat in August. In the context of inflation inflection point and economic decline, the further implementation of tightening policies in the second half of the year tends to be cautious. The market is still under pressure from inflation before the decline of inflation is verified by data, and the market continues to bottom out in the short term. However, we believe that the market is expected to welcome a reversal in August and will show an "N" shape for the whole year. After August, the decline of inflation tends to be clear, and the core of the policy will shift from controlling prices to stabilizing growth and promoting transformation, and the macro economy will bottom out in the third quarter. At that time, investors' expectations will improve, and the power that restrains the market will be significantly reduced. After August, the market is expected to welcome a trend reversal. We are optimistic about the food and beverage, trade, home appliances and other large consumer sectors, the emerging growth sector represented by computer information services, and the aviation sector, which will benefit from the acceleration of RMB appreciation, and is expected to enter the peak season, and we suggest to actively layout. content: 传蒋介石曾孙为盛大文学Bambook命名【TechWeb消息】8月2日，在日前举办的Chinajoy游戏展上，盛大文学正式对外发布了自己的电子书阅读器Bambook，这款产品一经亮相便引来各方关注，而据消息人士透露，为Bambook命名的正是蒋介石曾孙，现为橙果设计公司董事长的蒋友柏先生。蒋友柏是蒋介石曾孙，19岁进军商界，现为台湾橙果设计公司老板。橙果设计公司由蒋友柏与其胞弟蒋友常共同组建于2003年，迄今橙果合作过的客户涵盖众多知名公司，包括雷诺(Renault)、福特(Ford)、微软(Microsoft)、捷安特(Giant)、摩托罗拉(Motorola)、索尼(Sony)、资生堂(Shiseido)等。据悉，除命名外，Bambook的外观也由蒋友柏倾力设计，精美大气，富含文化气息。除了不俗的外观之外，Bambook的各项性能也表现优异，据国家新闻出版总署数字传播科学重点实验室最新出炉的评测报告显示：Bambook各项评测数据均列同类产品榜首。Bamboo在英文里是“竹”的意思，将电子书阅读器产品命名为Bambook，源于竹的发展演变是中国文学史中一个很经典的元素，一个具有特殊意义的代表符号。从竹到纸，再到今日电子纸的演变发展，构成了中国文化发展的轨迹。
en: It is reported that Chiang Kai-shek's great grandson named the grand literature Bambook [TechWeb News] On August 2, at the Chinajoy game show held recently, the grand literature formally released its e-book reader Bambook to the public. Once it appeared, it attracted wide attention. According to informed sources, it was Chiang Kai-shek's great grandson, Mr. Jiang Youbo, who is now the chairman of Orange Fruit Design Company, who named Bambook. Jiang Youbo is the great grandson of Chiang Kai-shek. He entered the business world at the age of 19 and is now the boss of Taiwan Orange Fruit Design Company. Orange Fruit Design Company was jointly established by Jiang Youbo and his younger brother Jiang Youchang in 2003. Up to now, Orange Fruit has covered many well-known companies, including Renault, Ford, Microsoft, Giant, Motorola, Sony, Shiseido, and so on. It is reported that in addition to naming, the appearance of Bambook is also designed by Jiang Youbo, which is exquisite, atmospheric and rich in cultural atmosphere. In addition to the excellent appearance, Bambook's various performance also shows excellent results. According to the latest evaluation report issued by the Digital Communication Science Key Laboratory of the General Administration of Press and Publication: Bambook's evaluation data are all listed at the top of the list. Bamboo means "bamboo" in English. The e-book reader product is named Bambook, which is derived from the development and evolution of bamboo. It is a very classic element in the history of Chinese literature and a representative symbol with special significance. The evolution and development from bamboo to paper and then to today's electronic paper constitutes the trajectory of Chinese cultural development.

content: 小物件大乐趣实用家具装扮新年生活农历新年到了，各家各户都在忙碌地准备着新年的居家用品，很多消费者都会在年前选择一些小茶几、休闲椅、小玄关柜等小件家具来装扮爱家，这些小家具实用且养眼，很适合新年居家使用。小茶几增添几分温暖新年里，难免会有亲朋好久的聚会，两三人的小聚，一款用来摆放茶水、点心的小茶几就很有必要。浅淡木色茶几或原木茶几非常适合与现今流行的浅色系列沙发相配，其造型简单，但讲究精致，色调温和，没有繁杂的功能，和简洁明快的沙发相配，展现出居室的唯美。这些小茶几可根据使用需要灵活地挪动它们，生活中也多了一份方便和轻松，为改换客厅的样子提供了方便，家人、朋友在新年里也会得到新鲜的感受。新年里，三五好友围绕着小茶几喝茶聊天、打纸牌，那份节日的温暖自然流淌心底。小鞋柜点亮局部空间一般家庭，玄关的空间相对都很狭小，此时，镶上镜子的小鞋柜可以使空间显得敞亮，而且非常便于出门前整理衣冠，客人造访时也不显得局促。各种造型的镜面镶嵌在带有顶线的柜体中，显得大气、干净，适当加入一些白色的点缀还可以改变深木色的沉闷印象，为鞋柜增添一份舒适感。而镜子旁边设计的两排挂钩，不仅方便了使用，也使空间整洁而不凌乱。目前，人们一般在进门处摆放鞋柜，习惯于在此换鞋以卸外界之尘。市场上的鞋柜，有“屏风式”、“低柜式”、“转角式”等。选择时在色彩和造型上应与整个居室风格一致，如“屏风式”设计，鞋柜内的空间大，可分上下层，上部以储藏全家换季鞋子，以盒装存放，排列有序，下部可分几层，如上层是进家后所换拖鞋，下层为日常换鞋之用，使用时十分方便。“懒人”沙发带来假日享受如今，一种不注意“形象”的“懒人沙发”开始成为都市人家中的新宠。它让从办公室正襟危坐的白领们回家后能像一滩泥似的坐在上面，无拘无束甚至“得意忘形”。新年假期是一个休闲的好时机，一款“懒人沙发”让你的假期舒适而安逸。你可以当它是靠背椅、单人床、大沙发、肥座垫，只要你喜欢，随便折腾好了，这是一种感觉，完全放松的，带着些温软、简单和自由的呼吸，在新年的喧闹中，开启另一年的梦想。“懒人沙发”是指以耐磨抗拉布质或皮质为面料，以发泡聚苯乙烯小球填充的软家居，其设计理念是不断打破陈规，按科学的人体工程理论设计，满足“任何形体、任何地点、任何地表”的需要。同时采用可拆洗的外布料，尽可能维护简单舒适的生活方式。其魅力在于，只要它放在那里，你就忍不住想要去坐一坐，一旦你坐上去，就会被饱满的粒子热情拥抱，总之，它能在一刹那间最忠诚最完全地满足你的需要。“休闲椅”独享新年的乐趣椅子或许是家居产品中最富于变化的生力军之一，总是带给我们盛大的视觉体验。居室里的大部分家具，包括陈列柜、电视柜、沙发等不会轻易更换，时间长了难免缺乏新意，在新年的扮家计划里，多几把造型别致的休闲椅子，常常会神奇地成为目光的焦点。新年的美好时节里，独坐一把浪漫随性的休闲椅，安享唯美的生活情致，享受最惬意的居家生活。休闲椅在各个不同空间有不同的选择。客厅是公共区域，比较热闹，所以休闲椅一定要颜色跳跃醒目，风格独特，成为一大风景，同时也要让人坐起来舒适，与沙发搭配得当。卧室家具种类不多，在卧室中添置一把休闲椅是一个人调整心情的方法之一。卧室里的休闲椅要与卧室环境匹配，颜色和款式不要太过跳跃，以免“打扰”到安静的空间。书房的休闲椅则更要求功能性和舒适度的统一。
en: The small objects have great fun and practical furniture to decorate the New Year's life. The lunar New Year is coming, and every family is busy preparing new year's household goods. Many consumers will choose some small coffee tables, recliners, small foyers and other small pieces of furniture to decorate their homes at the end of the year. These small pieces of furniture are practical and beautiful, very suitable for New Year's home use. The small tea table adds a few warm New Year's festivals. It is inevitable that relatives and friends will have a long gathering. A small tea table for two or three people to place tea and snacks is very necessary. The light wood coffee table or the log coffee table is very suitable to match the light color series sofa that is popular nowadays. Its shape is simple but exquisite, the color is warm, and there is no complicated function. It is matched with the simple and lively sofa to show the beauty of the room. These small tea tables can be moved around flexibly according to the needs of use, and there is also a convenience and ease in life, which provides convenience for changing the appearance of the living room. Family members and friends will also get a new feeling in the New Year. In the New Year, a group of good friends gather around the tea table to drink tea, chat and play paper cards, and the warmth of the festival naturally flows to the bottom of my heart. Small shoe cabinets light up the local space. Generally speaking, the space of the porch of a family is relatively small. At this time, the small shoe cabinet inlaid with a mirror can make the space look bright, and it is very convenient to tidy up clothes and hats before going out. It is not cramped when visitors come. Various shapes of mirrors are inlaid in the cabinet with top lines, which looks atmospheric and clean. Appropriately adding some white decorations can also change the dull impression of dark wood, adding a sense of comfort to the shoe cabinet. The two rows of hooks designed beside the mirror are not only convenient to use, but also clean and tidy. At present, people usually place shoe cabinets at the door and get used to changing shoes here to unload dust from the outside world. The shoe cabinets on the market include "screen style", "low cabinet style", "corner style", etc. When choosing, the color and shape should be consistent with the style of the whole room, such as the "screen style" design. The space in the shoe cabinet is large, which can be divided into upper and lower layers. The upper part is used to store the family's seasonal shoes in boxes, arranged in order. The lower part can be divided into several layers, such as the slippers after entering the house in the upper layer and the daily shoes in the lower layer. They are very convenient to use. "Lazy" sofa brings holiday enjoyment Nowadays, a "lazy sofa" that does not pay attention to "image" has begun to become a new favorite in urban families. It lets the white-collar workers who sit in the office like a mud sit on it after they go home. They are free and even "forget their manners". New Year's holiday is a good time to relax. A "lazy sofa" makes your holiday comfortable and leisurely. You can treat it as a back chair, a single bed, a big sofa, or a fat seat cushion. Just mess around if you like. This is a feeling, completely relaxed, with some warmth, simplicity and freedom of breathing. In the noise of the New Year, we will open up another year's dream. "Lazy sofa" refers to a soft home furnishing filled with small foamed polystyrene balls, which is made of wear-resistant and tensile cloth or leather. Its design concept is to constantly break the rules and design according to the scientific theory of human engineering to meet the needs of "any shape, any location, any surface". At the same time, the detachable outer cloth is adopted to maintain a simple and comfortable lifestyle as far as possible. Its charm lies in the fact that once it is placed there, you can't help but want to sit on it. Once you sit on it, you will be warmly embraced by the full particles. In short, it can satisfy your needs most faithfully and completely in an instant. "Leisure chair" enjoys the fun of the New Year. The chair is perhaps one of the most dynamic and changeable home products, always bringing us a grand visual experience. Most of the furniture in the room, including display cabinets, TV cabinets, sofas, etc., will not be easily replaced. After a long time, they are inevitable to lack innovation. In the New Year's family dressing plan, several more exquisite leisure chairs will often magically become the focus of attention. In the beautiful season of the New Year, sitting alone on a romantic and casual chair, enjoying the beauty of life and the most comfortable home life. Leisure chairs have different choices in different spaces. The living room is a public area, very lively, so the leisure chair must be eye-catching with jumping colors and unique style, becoming a major landscape. At the same time, it should also make people sit comfortably and match the sofa properly. There are not many types of bedroom furniture. Adding a leisure chair in the bedroom is one of the ways for a person to adjust his mood. The leisure chair in the bedroom should match the bedroom environment. The color and style should not jump too much so as not to "disturb" the quiet space. The leisure chair in the study requires more functions and comfort.

content: 曾轶可首发《狮子座》裙装造型曝光网络(图)新浪娱乐讯近日，09快女中首个发片的曾轶可推出了其个人全新创作专辑中的首波单曲《狮子座》，而曾轶可的最新裙装造型也随之在各大网络曝光，清新而又别致的风格让人眼前一亮，令不少人对其新专辑更加充满了期待。据悉，接下来的几天内，曾轶可不仅将奔赴全国各地举办“试听曾轶可”歌友会，为新专辑预热，在12月19日的快女广州演唱会上，曾轶可将有望以新专辑中的全新裙装造型亮相，并再次演唱重新编排后的经典曲目《狮子座》。10月7日的快女巡演上海演唱会上，曾轶可在演唱争议歌曲《狮子座》的时候指天哭诉自己没有抄袭，并对歌迷说有可能是最后一次演唱这首歌曲了，因为版权的问题，还有可能不会收入到个人专辑中，令不少喜爱这首歌曲的乐迷深感遗憾。但近日在曝光新专辑曲目时，曾轶可首波主打的便是《狮子座》，与之前的版本不一样，新版狮子座随着一阵简单的口哨旋律轻洒而出，充满童心的设计，简单的旋律轻柔飘散在耳边，仍然得到了广大歌迷的力挺，看来经过重新编排的《狮子座》仍然将是曾轶可的代表性曲目。而近段时间曾轶可接受各大媒体采访时，均身着蓝色短裙出席，女孩味的装扮散发着属于曾轶可的孩子气息。曾轶可不仅对裙装表示出由衷的喜爱，还透露希望在25岁之后可以走性感路线，就如同《狮子座》中唱的，“短发女人也可以性感和可爱。”据演出方透露，12月19日的广州演唱会上，曾轶可将有望首次以裙装亮相舞台，并再次演唱《狮子座》，而江映蓉、李霄云、黄英等其他快女也将继续带来更多精彩的表演，敬请关注。
person: 李霄云,江映蓉,黄英,曾轶可
en: Recently, Can Yige, the first one in the fast women of 09, launched the first single "Leo" in his personal new creative album, and Can Yige's latest skirt style was also exposed on major networks, which was fresh and unique, making many people look bright and look forward to his new album. It is reported that in the coming days, Can Yige will not only travel across the country to hold "Can Yige Listening" concert, but also warm up for the new album. At the Guangzhou concert of Fast Women on December 19, Can Yige is expected to appear in the new skirt style in the new album, and once again sing the classic song "Leo" after being rearranged. At the Shanghai concert of the Fast Women's Tour on October 7, when Can Yige sang the controversial song "Leo", he pointed to the sky and complained that he had not plagiarized, and said to the fans that it might be the last time to sing the song, because of the copyright problem, it might not be included in the personal album, which made many music fans who like the song feel sorry. But recently, when exposing the tracks of the new album, Can Yige's first main single was "Leo". Unlike the previous version, the new version of Leo was sprinkled with a simple whistle melody, and the simple melody gently spread in the ear, which still won the support of many fans. It seems that the re arranged "Leo" will still be the representative track of Can Yige. When accepting interviews from major media in recent days, Cao Yige wore a blue skirt, and the girlish dress gave off the children's breath of Cao Yige. Cao Yige not only expressed his sincere love for skirts, but also revealed that he hoped to take the sexy route after 25 years old, just like "short-haired women can also be sexy and lovely" in Leo. According to the performance party, at the Guangzhou concert on December 19, Cao Yige is expected to appear on the stage for the first time in a skirt and once again sing "Leo", while other fast women, such as Jiang Yingrong, Li Xiaoyun, and Huang Ying, will continue to bring more wonderful performances. Please pay attention.

content: 天才会美丽再邀Sky做电竞特辑江苏卫视《天才会美丽》节目组不久前曾邀请中国电竞旗帜Sky参加节目录制，并在青少年群体中引起了很大凡响。根据Sky微博透露，该节目组有意以电竞明星为主题专门制作一期节目，并再次邀请Sky加盟。太平洋游戏网将会密切关注事件进展，为大家带来最新消息。
en: Genius will invite Sky to do an electronic sports special. Jiangsu TV's Genius will be beautiful program team recently invited Sky, a Chinese e-sports flag, to participate in the program recording, which caused a great response among young people. According to Sky's microblog, the program group intends to make a special program with e-sports stars as the theme, and invites Sky to join again. Pacific Games Network will pay close attention to the development of events and bring you the latest news.

content: 列车为救治孕妇破例停车2分钟本报讯（记者左洋通讯员李嘉全向治华刘振宇）为了救治一名孕妇，武昌—深圳西L355列车紧急停靠广州火车东站2分钟，让她下车接受治疗。2月3日，武汉客运段由武昌开往深圳西L355次列车途经韶关站时，一名旅客向列车长刘辉娟求助，他的爱人金海霞（湖北仙桃人）怀孕七个月，突然头晕，担心有什么意外。刘辉娟立即赶去查看，发现金海霞情况不妙。经请示广铁集团后，列车临时在广州东站停车两分钟，破例让120救护车开上站台。17时22分，列车离开广州东站，金海霞坐在轮椅上，向列车长挥手感谢。
person: 向治华,金海霞,刘辉娟,李嘉全,刘振宇,左洋
en: The train made an exception to stop for 2 minutes to treat a pregnant woman. (Left Yang, a reporter, and Li Jiaquan, a correspondent) In order to treat a pregnant woman, the Wuchang - Shenzhen West L355 train made an emergency stop at Guangzhou East Railway Station for 2 minutes to let her get off for treatment. On February 3, when the Wuhan passenger section from Wuchang to Shenzhen West L355 was passing through Shaoguan Station, a passenger asked Liu Huijuan, the train captain, for help. His lover Jin Haixia (from Xiantao, Hubei) was seven months pregnant and suddenly became dizzy, fearing something unexpected. Liu Huijuan immediately went to check and found that Jin Haixia was in bad condition. After consulting with Guangtie Group, the train made an exception to stop at Guangzhou East Station for two minutes, allowing the ambulance to drive to the platform. At 17:22, the train left Guangzhou East Station. Jin Haixia was sitting in a wheelchair, waving to the train captain to thank him.

content: 国信证券：银行挑梁关注中游证券通1.市场判断：加速上涨后的调整6月份市场在银行等权重板块推动下存在加速上涨可能，进而则可能引发真正的一轮调整，建议从补涨思路选择板块与个股，从而兼顾到策略性防御。2.行业配置：银行挑梁，关注中游本月最看好的三个行业依次为金融(银行、券商、保险)、钢铁、石油化工；前瞻性的看好钢铁、电解铝、化工、航运、造纸等中游行业中受益经济复苏、景气回升的行业。主要理由与逻辑：(1)息差拐点、估值洼地、流动性再泛滥、欧美经济与股市回升等利多因素将支撑金融尤其是银行板块上涨，进而推动指数繁荣。(2)前瞻性看好钢铁、电解铝、化工、航运、造纸等中游行业景气回升。因为这是实体经济真正复苏的重要判据。汽车地产两大先导性产业的复苏拉动经济走出谷底，2季度工业生产将持续回升，市场对于经济复苏的信心增强最终会引发资金增配钢铁等中游板块。(3)看好油价，谨慎对待煤炭、有色。欧美经济复苏态势基本确立，避险需求降低下的美元汇率走低推高商品市场，加上季节性因素，油价在3季度可相对乐观，有望推动化工等中游行业的产品价格。虽然我们对煤炭仍然看好，但在基金普遍超配和经历大幅上涨之后，新的机会需要等待到4季度，我们看好的大同煤业、平煤股份、盘江股份、中油化建则需要视资产注入事件的时点。有色板块业绩支撑较弱，不具备安全边际，建议逢高减持。(4)市场风格转换本质上是补涨行为，这也是提高投资组合防御性的一个重要因素，我们认为补涨的主要板块将集中在中游行业(钢铁、电解铝、化工、造纸、交通运输等)、消费品领域(食品饮料、商业)。3.个股选择策略与重点推荐组合自上而下，以及结合国信行业分析师自下而上的推荐，我们建议的6月份重点推荐组合为：建设银行、工商银行、招商银行、中国平安、辽宁成大、酒钢宏兴、鞍钢股份、中国联通、青岛海尔、华泰股份、辰州矿业、鑫科材料、云南城投、中天城投、山西三维、柳化股份、福耀玻璃、国阳新能、中国远洋、五粮液。
en: Guoxin Securities: The bank selects the main beam to focus on the midstream securities pass 1. Market judgment: After the acceleration in June, the market may rise under the promotion of the banking and other weighted sectors, which may trigger a real round of adjustment. It is suggested to choose the sector and individual stocks from the perspective of making up the rise, so as to take both strategic defense into account. 2. Industry configuration: The bank selects the main beam and focuses on the midstream. The three industries I like best this month are finance (banking, securities, insurance), steel and petrochemical industry; Steel, electrolytic aluminum, chemical industry, shipping, paper and other midstream industries that benefit from economic recovery and rising prosperity are promising. Main reasons and logic: (1) The inflection point of interest spread, valuation depression, liquidity flooding again, the recovery of the US and European economy and stock market and other favorable factors will support the rise of the financial sector, especially the banking sector, and then promote the prosperity of the index. (2) Steel, electrolytic aluminum, chemical industry, shipping, paper and other midstream industries are promising in terms of recovery. Because this is an important criterion for the real recovery of the real economy. The recovery of the two leading industries of automobile and real estate will pull the economy out of the bottom, and industrial production will continue to rise in the second quarter. The market's confidence in economic recovery will eventually trigger increased funds to be allocated to the midstream sector such as steel. (3) Be optimistic about oil prices and cautious about coal and nonferrous metals. The recovery trend of the US and European economies has been basically established. The dollar exchange rate fell under the background of reduced risk aversion, pushing up the commodity market. Together with seasonal factors, oil prices can be relatively optimistic in the third quarter, and it is expected to promote the product prices of the midstream industry such as chemical industry. Although we are still optimistic about coal, after the general over allocation of funds and the experience of a substantial increase, the new opportunity needs to wait until the fourth quarter. The asset injection time point of Datong Coal Industry, Pingmei Shares, Panjiang Shares and Sinopec needs to be considered. The performance support of the nonferrous metal sector is weak and there is no safety margin. It is suggested to reduce the position when it is high. (4) The conversion of market style is essentially a complementary rising behavior, which is also an important factor in improving the defense of the investment portfolio. We believe that the main sectors of complementary growth will focus on the midstream industry (steel, electrolytic aluminum, chemical industry, paper, transportation) and the consumer goods sector (food and beverages, commerce). 3. Stock selection strategy and key recommendation combination From top to bottom, and in combination with the bottom-up recommendation of Guoxin Industry analysts, the key recommended combination we suggest for June is: China Construction Bank, ICBC, China Merchants Bank, Ping An of China, Liaoning Chengda, Jiu Steel Hongxing, Ansteel, China Unicom, Qingdao Haier, Huatai Stock, Chenzhou Mining, Xinkes Material, Yunnan Chengtou, Zhongtian Chengtou, Shanxi Three Dimension, Liu Hua Stock, Fuyao Glass, Guoyang New Energy, China Ocean Shipping, Wuliangye.
