content: 欧元区救援基金主管：欧元不会崩溃新浪财经讯北京时间11月25日晚间消息，欧元区救援基金主管克劳斯-雷格林(KlausRegling)表示，即便葡萄牙等其他国家步希腊和爱尔兰的后尘、要求救援，也不存在债务危机导致欧元崩溃的可能性。雷格林周四在一份德国报纸上发表了上述评论，称尽管欧元可能出现贬值，外围弱国所遭遇的困境不会危及欧元区16国所共同使用的货币。他说：“完全不存在这种危险。没有任何国家会自愿放弃欧元，对于弱国而言这么做无异于经济自杀，对于强国而言同样如此。”不过他表示同意德国总理安格拉-默克尔(AngelaMerkel)的看法，就欧元而言，欧洲的确“形势十分严峻”。法国和德国外长均作出信心表态，称他们的国家有能力向爱尔兰提供快速援助，就像今年早些时候对希腊那样。他们表示，爱尔兰最近的紧缩政策将有助于提升大家对欧元的信心。与此同时，他们发出警告，欧盟需要作出政策改进以预防其他国家陷入危机螺旋，同时建立危机发生后实施干预的机制。(诚之)
person: 安格拉-默克尔,克劳斯-雷格林,雷格林,诚之
en: The head of the eurozone rescue fund: the euro will not collapse. Sina Finance News reported on the evening of November 25, Beijing time. Klaus Regling, the head of the eurozone rescue fund, said that the euro would not collapse due to the debt crisis, even if Portugal and other countries followed Greece and Ireland in seeking rescue. Regling made the above remarks in a German newspaper on Thursday, saying that although the euro may depreciate, the difficulties faced by the peripheral weak countries will not threaten the currency used by the 16 countries in the eurozone. He said: "There is no danger at all. No country will voluntarily give up the euro. It is equivalent to economic suicide for the weak countries and the strong countries." However, he agreed with German Chancellor Angela Merkel (Angela Merkel) that the situation in Europe was "very serious" in terms of the euro. The French and German foreign ministers both made confident statements, saying that their countries were able to provide rapid assistance to Ireland, as they did to Greece earlier this year. They said that Ireland's recent austerity policy will help enhance people's confidence in the euro. At the same time, they warned that the EU needs to make policy improvements to prevent other countries from falling into a crisis spiral, and to establish a mechanism for intervention after a crisis occurs. (Chengzhi)

content: 瑞星发布Q3网络钓鱼报告：网民损失超50亿元10月12日，瑞星发布《2010年第三季度网络钓鱼报告》，报告指出，现在每天出现1万余个新钓鱼网站，其中95%是由机器自动生成，传统反钓鱼技术很难识别。除了传统意义上的钓鱼网站之外，网络诈骗与客户端软件结合、甚至与传统电话诈骗结合，成为新型诈骗的显著特点，比如刷钻、刷信用等已经成为黑客赚钱常用的手法。瑞星安全专家指出，由于第三季度包括了暑假出游高峰及中秋假期，网民们通过网络订票、网络购物、上网游戏的交易量相对上升，所以造成其因钓鱼诈骗遭受的损失以及间接损失，比去年同期大幅上升，据估算可能高达50至70亿元。瑞星报告中也列举了一些案例，包括“QQ刷钻”、“淘宝刷信用”等新型钓鱼诈骗开始肆虐。但这些网站通常会直接骗取用户的手机话费和账户里的钱，因此危害性极大。而且这些活动本身就属于不合法的灰色地带，即使网民被骗，也往往会因为“干这个本来就不对”而忍气吞声。8月下旬，瑞星“云安全”系统的反钓鱼功能正式上线，并为“瑞星全功能安全软件2011测试版”提供智能反钓鱼的云端支持。自启用至今，共截获47万多个钓鱼网站(以URL计算)，比未启用前的拦截数量提高数十倍。从最新截获的钓鱼网站数据来看，约有20%的钓鱼网站寿命仅有一天，80%的钓鱼网站存活不超过一个星期。这就使得采用传统方式拦截钓鱼网站效果有限，有超过70%的钓鱼网站成为漏网之鱼。瑞星安全专家表示，即将推出的瑞星2011新版软件，将采用智能化的方式，根据钓鱼网站的颜色、布局、行为特征等进行判断，拦截有效率达90%以上。无论钓鱼网站怎么变化域名、怎么更改自己的特征，都逃不出瑞星的“慧眼”。“中奖骗局”等占钓鱼网站九成根据《瑞星报告》数据显示，本季度共截获55万个钓鱼网站(8月之前以传统方式截获8万余个)，且呈不断加速的趋势。其中，以“假中奖”及“假购物网站”等方式出现的钓鱼网站居多，占据总体数量的90%以上，而在涉及到具体事件时，某一类“李鬼”网站则会出现相应的“井喷”。比如，在新浪“微博一周年”活动期间冒出的大量“抽奖网站”，或者在暑运临近到来时，涌现的各种逼真的“航空公司官网”，这一类钓鱼网站制作精良，如果不仔细甄别地址，单从页面信息上很难分辨真伪。瑞星安全专家对每月新增的典型网站进行追踪监测发现，虽然钓鱼网站的数量及形式在不断增加，但网站的平均生存周期及点击次数却在逐步降低。目前，80%以上钓鱼网站存活不会超过一个星期，有的甚至只存活短短几个小时。这说明，随着“钓鱼手法”的持续曝光，人们的安全意识在不断提升，也促使钓鱼网站“与时俱进”地变换欺骗方式，以更加具有迷惑性的面貌出现。QQ刷钻是如何骗钱的著名的聊天软件QQ有多种会员级别，需要充值才可获得，有时候使用一定的技巧，可以在较短时间内升级为高级会员，享受更大的存储空间、QQ聊天记录在线存储等多种贴心服务。黑客利用网民急于升级为高级会员的心理，号称通过使用某种软件，可以利用腾讯系统的漏洞，在较短时间内少花钱甚至不花钱升级为高等级会员。在百度上搜索“QQ刷钻”，可以找到70万条结果，根据瑞星公司的监测，在搜索结果的第一页显著位置，就有所谓“QQ刷钻外挂”下载，这些软件有两种骗钱手法：第一种，直接在软件里捆绑木马，强制修改IE首页、弹出广告等，获取利益。这种手法在用户使用后很容易识破，现在不大常见。第二种手法则比较高明，用户运行“刷钻外挂”后，软件会提示“填入手机号即可升级到黄钻”等。实际上当你填入手机号后，会要求“开通某某套餐”，软件界面会狡辩说“套餐只是为了验证手机号真伪，不收取费用”，其实会收取名目繁多的各类套餐费用。
en: Rising released Q3 phishing report: netizens lost more than 5 billion yuan On October 12, Rising released the "2010 Third Quarter Phishing Report", which pointed out that now more than 10000 new phishing websites appear every day, 95% of which are automatically generated by machines, and traditional anti phishing technology is hard to identify. In addition to the traditional sense of phishing websites, online fraud combined with client software, and even combined with traditional telephone fraud, has become a significant feature of new fraud, such as brushing diamonds and brushing credits, which have become a common way for hackers to make money. Rising security experts pointed out that since the third quarter includes the peak summer travel and the Mid Autumn Festival holiday, the transaction volume of netizens through online ticket booking, online shopping and online games has risen relatively, causing their losses and indirect losses due to phishing fraud to rise sharply compared with the same period last year, and it is estimated that the loss may be as high as 5 billion to 7 billion yuan. The Rising Report also lists some cases, including the new type of phishing fraud such as "QQ Brushing Drill" and "Taobao Credit Brushing", which has begun to rage. But these websites usually directly defraud users' mobile phone bills and money in their accounts, so they are extremely harmful. Moreover, these activities themselves belong to the illegal gray area. Even if netizens are cheated, they will often hold their breath because "this is not right in the first place". In late August, the anti phishing function of the Rising "Cloud Security" system was officially launched, providing intelligent anti phishing cloud support for the "Rising Full Function Security Software 2011 Test Edition". Since its launch, a total of more than 470000 phishing websites (calculated by URL) have been seized, dozens of times more than the number of interceptions before its launch. From the latest data of the captured phishing websites, about 20% of the phishing websites only live for one day, and 80% of the phishing websites do not live more than a week. This makes it limited to intercept phishing websites in a traditional way, and more than 70% of the phishing websites become漏网之鱼. Rising security experts said that the new version of Rising 2011 to be launched will adopt an intelligent approach to judge the color, layout, behavior characteristics, etc. of the phishing website, with an interception success rate of more than 90%. No matter how the phishing website changes its domain name or how it changes its own characteristics, it can not escape the "smart eye" of Rising. According to the data of Rising Report, "lottery fraud" and other phishing websites account for 90% of the phishing websites. According to the data of Rising Report, a total of 550000 phishing websites (more than 80000 by traditional way before August) were captured this quarter, and the trend is accelerating continuously. Among them, the most common phishing websites are those that appear in the form of "fake lottery" and "fake shopping websites", accounting for more than 90% of the total number. When it comes to specific events, a certain kind of "Li Gui" website will have a corresponding "gush". For example, a large number of "lottery websites" that emerged during the "Sina Weibo One Year" event, or a variety of realistic "airline official websites" that emerged when the summer transport was coming near, this kind of phishing websites are well produced. If you don't carefully identify the address, it is difficult to distinguish the authenticity from the page information. Rising security experts found that although the number and form of phishing websites are increasing, the average survival cycle and click times of the websites are gradually decreasing by tracking and monitoring the typical websites added each month. At present, more than 80% of the phishing websites will not survive for more than a week, and some will only survive for a short time of hours. This shows that with the continuous exposure of "fishing skills", people's security awareness is constantly improving, which also promotes the phishing website to change its cheating method "in line with the times", so as to appear in a more confusing way. QQ Brushing Diamonds is a well-known chat software QQ, which has several member levels and requires recharge to obtain. Sometimes, using certain skills, you can upgrade to a senior member in a short time and enjoy a variety of considerate services, such as larger storage space and online storage of QQ chat records. Hackers take advantage of the fact that netizens are eager to upgrade to senior members, claiming that by using a certain software, they can use the vulnerability of Tencent's system to upgrade to a higher level member in a short time without spending money. By searching for "QQ Brushing Drill" on Baidu, you can find 700000 results. According to the monitoring of Rising Company, there is a so-called "QQ Brushing Drill" plug-in download in a prominent position on the first page of the search results. These software has two ways to make money: The first one is to directly bind the trojan in the software to force the modification of the IE home page, pop-up advertisements, etc. to make profits. This approach is easy for users to crack after use, and now it is less common. The second approach is more sophisticated. After the user runs the "Brushing Drill Plug-in", the software will prompt "Enter the mobile phone number to upgrade to the Yellow Diamond", etc. In fact, when you enter your mobile phone number, you will be asked to "open a certain package". The software interface will argue that "the package is only for verifying the authenticity of the mobile phone number, and no fees are charged", but it will actually charge various package expenses.

content: 吉林爱心助学基金20岁女生申请助学金帮爷爷奶奶减轻负担爱心助学热线：0431—960011限额25名，每名资助5000元由中国青少年发展基金会、加多宝集团共同举办的2011年爱心助学行动，本报作为吉林省内唯一合作媒体，将全程受理吉林省贫困高考(微博)生助学金的申报、核实、发放等工作。此次助学行动，我省限额25名，每人资助额度为5000元，本报助学热线：(0431)960011继续开通。昨日，本报爱心助学热线迎来了第一位报名考生，她就是来自长春市第五中学的20岁女生魏琳。“我母亲在我6岁时就去世了，我父亲从国企下岗后在外打工，根本没管过我，我一直和爷爷奶奶生活在一起。”魏琳说，爷爷奶奶是退休工人，每个月的退休金一共有2000多元，自己就得花费其中一半。“我准备利用高考后的两个月假期去打工赚点学费。”在每次高三模拟考试中，魏琳能在班级排前五名，在全校800多名高三学生中排前二三十名。她最希望考取中央财经大学的会计专业，但又不想让爷爷奶奶整日为学费一筹莫展，因此想申请助学金。(记者姜永鑫)
en: Jilin Love Scholarship Fund for 20 year old girls to apply for scholarships to help grandparents reduce their burden Love Scholarship Hotline: 0431-960011 Limited to 25 people, 5000 yuan will be provided for each person. The 2011 Love Scholarship Action, co sponsored by the China Youth Development Foundation and JDB Group, As the only cooperative media in Jilin Province, this newspaper will handle the application, verification and distribution of scholarships for poor college entrance examination students in Jilin Province. This scholarship program is limited to 25 people in our province, with a sponsorship amount of 5000 yuan per person. Our newspaper's scholarship hotline: (0431) 960011 continues to open. Yesterday, our newspaper's love scholarship hotline welcomed the first candidate, a 20 year old girl named Wei Lin from the Fifth Middle School of Changchun. "My mother died when I was 6 years old. My father worked outside after leaving the state-owned enterprise, and never took care of me. I have been living with my grandparents." Wei Lin said, Grandparents are retired workers, with a total of more than 2000 yuan for their retirement pay, and I have to spend half of it. "I am going to work for two months after the college entrance examination to earn some tuition fees." Wei Lin can rank in the top five in the class and in the top twenty or thirty among more than 800 senior high school students in the school in each senior high school simulation examination. She is most hopeful to pass the accounting major of the Central University of Finance and Economics, but she doesn't want her grandparents to be at a loss for tuition fees all day long, so she wants to apply for scholarships. (Reporter Jiang Yongxin)

content: 快钱联手银行共促网络营销商报讯(记者孟凡霞)“金九银十”期间，各大商户纷纷启动新一轮的优惠促销活动，知名购物网站与各大银行联手推出的商城积分换购、超值特惠等手段是促销季中的重头戏。而独立第三方支付平台的介入，则给网络营销提供了更为广阔的空间。快钱作为独立的第三方支付平台，与银行、商户三方联手举办了多项活动，既帮助商户拉动了销售额，也为消费者提供了更多实惠。活动期间，快钱、银行、商户共同整合优势资源，通过银行商城页面、海报、易拉宝、银行账单、EDM等多种形式丰富营销内容。以京东商城携手快钱、农行春天行动为例，活动期间交易笔数增长了三倍。
en: In the "Golden September and Silver October" period, major merchants launched a new round of discount promotion activities. The well-known shopping website and major banks jointly launched mall points exchange, super value special offers and other means, which is the highlight of the promotion season. However, the介入of independent third-party payment platforms provides more space for network marketing. As an independent third party payment platform, Kuaiqian joined hands with banks and merchants to hold a number of activities, which not only helped merchants promote sales, but also provided more benefits to consumers. During the event, Kuaiqian, banks and merchants integrated their advantages to enrich marketing content through various forms such as bank mall pages, posters, easy treasure, bank statements and EDM. Taking Jingdong Mall's joint quick money and Agricultural Bank's Spring Action as an example, the number of transactions increased three times during the event.

content: 比人更懂地球Sprint定制LG环保Remarq文/王彬人们每天都在呼吁环保，更准确的说，应该是科学家时刻都在努力唤醒人们的环保意识，但是又有多少人真的听得进去，并且从以身作则地有实际行动呢？如果被问到，你了解地球有多少？你是否真的了解低碳生活？如果一部手机可以计算人一天所产生的二氧化碳量，并且与植物排放入大气的比较，你是否会购买呢？如果答案是肯定的，这部Sprint定制的LG环保手机Remarq再合适不过了。除能够实现上述功能外，Remarq自身也是做到了彻头彻尾的环保。机身部分由可回收的塑料材质组成，整体可回收物料的利用率超过87%。甚至连机器的包装盒都是从废纸再利用做成，包装内没有纸质说明书，用户可在线查找相关资料。不过手机仍配备了滑盖式QWERTY键盘，并配有130万像素摄像头，以及QVGA屏幕。回到刚刚的问题，这样一部手机你会购买吗？为了环保，整机可以说是基本上都是回收废料再提炼而成，所以运营商也明智地将其定位在两年合约零消费的水平。真心希望可以唤醒人们丧失多年的环保概念，手机将在5月9日正式发布。
en: Sprint custom LG environmental Remarq Wen/Wang Bin People call for environmental protection every day, or more accurately, scientists are always trying to awaken people's environmental awareness. But how many people really listen and take concrete actions as an example? If you are asked, how much do you know about the earth? Do you really know the low carbon life? If a mobile phone can calculate the amount of carbon dioxide generated by a person in a day and compare it with the emission of plants into the atmosphere, will you buy it? If the answer is yes, this Sprint customized LG green mobile phone Remarq is just right. In addition to being able to achieve the above functions, Remarq itself has also achieved thorough environmental protection. The fuselage is made up of recyclable plastic materials, and the utilization rate of recyclable materials as a whole exceeds 87%. Even the machine's packing box is made from recycled waste paper, and there is no paper manual in the package. Users can search for relevant information online. However, the mobile phone is still equipped with a sliding QWERTY keyboard, a 1.3 million pixel camera, and a QVGA screen. Back to the question just now, will you buy such a mobile phone? In order to protect the environment, the whole machine can be basically recycled and refined, so the operator also wisely positioned it at the level of zero consumption in two years. I sincerely hope that people can be awakened from the lost environmental concept for many years, and the mobile phone will be officially released on May 9

content: 个性选手屡遭淘汰红歌会被质疑缺乏原创(图)新浪娱乐讯业内唯一一个国字头的选秀节目中国红歌会眼下已经结束了全国晋级赛第一部分的比拼，胜出的全国12强选手目前正在南昌进行周日(8月2日)红歌英雄汇第一场的准备。然而，眼下这个以重温经典为主的歌会却因淘汰个性选手而遭到缺乏原创性的质疑。个性选手纷纷败北经过了三年的举办，今年在这个被认为受中老年观众追捧的节目中出现了更多八零后九零后选手。在他们中，有主修声乐的科班生，也有不少走所谓“民族通俗”路线的酒吧歌手。尽管老评委们一再称自己很高兴看到年轻人唱红歌，然而这些给被观众称为“有想法”的歌手经过了几轮的淘汰之后却纷纷离开舞台。将《飞得更高》、《奔跑》等作品中融入新元素的叮当组合在第一轮比赛中就惨遭淘汰，而改编经典《小河淌水》为灵魂乐版本的梁凡在突围战第二场也败下阵来。老歌新唱遭反对红歌会被质疑缺乏原创流行红歌手纷纷败北遭到了不少年轻观众的不满，这些新红歌演唱者实力不俗又有想法，被淘汰实在不应该，可这些受年轻观众追捧的个性选手在老评委处却没有得到太高的评价。叮当组合等选手在海选时就曾被评委指出随意改编老歌是对原作者的不敬，梁凡在彩排时还曾被工作人员要求换歌。就此，评委蒋大为在沈阳赛区接受采访时曾表示，新红歌不是改编老的作品，而是写出真正反映这个时代的原创作品。事实上，认为红歌需要原创的不止评委蒋大为一人，最近就有业界人士指出红歌会鼓励选手演唱经典，没有原创作品产生，节目本身不具市场化。不过也有人认为，喜欢红歌的人大多是些思想正统生活态度积极的观众，重温经典的理念刚好迎合了他们的口味。据红歌会栏目组一位工作人员称，周日在江西电视台进行的红歌英雄会第一场中，大部分歌手还是会选择演唱经典老歌，但也不排除个别选手演唱原创作品的可能性。(大拇指)
en: The personality contestant is frequently eliminated. The Red Song Conference, the only Chinese word in the industry, has ended the first part of the national promotion competition. The top 12 winners in China are currently preparing for the first round of the Red Song Hero Conference in Nanchang on Sunday (August 2). However, the song festival, which is mainly about reviewing classics, has been questioned for lack of originality because of the elimination of personality contestants. After three years of holding, there were more post-80s and post-90s contestants in this program, which is considered to be popular among middle-aged and elderly viewers. Among them, there are music majors and many bar singers who follow the so-called "national popular" route. Although the old judges repeatedly said that they were happy to see young people sing red songs, these singers who were called "thoughtful" by the audience left the stage after several rounds of elimination. The Dangdang team, which integrates new elements into works such as "Flying Higher" and "Running", was unfortunately eliminated in the first round, and Liang Fan, who adapted the classic "Small River Water" into a soul music version, also lost in the second round of the breakout war. The old song was opposed. The popular red singers were defeated, which caused a lot of young viewers to complain. These new red song singers are very talented and have ideas. It is really unfair to eliminate them. However, these individual contestants favored by young viewers did not get too high evaluation from the old judges. Dangdang and other contestants were once pointed out by the judges to randomly改编old songs as a disrespect to the original author. Liang Fan was also asked by the staff to change songs during the rehearsal. In this regard, Judge Jiang Dawei said in an interview in Shenyang that the new red song is not to rewrite the old works, but to write the original works that truly reflect this era. In fact, Judge Jiang Dawei is not the only one who thinks that red songs need creation. Recently, industry insiders have pointed out that the Red Song Conference encourages contestants to sing classics without creating original works, and the program itself is not marketable. However, some people also believe that those who like red songs are mostly viewers with orthodox ideology and positive life attitude, and the concept of reviewing classics just caters to their taste. According to a staff member of the Red Song Conference column group, most singers will still choose to sing classic old songs in the first round of the Red Song Hero Conference held by Jiangxi TV on Sunday, but it is not ruled out that some contestants will sing original works. (Thumbs up)

content: 李天一打人未满18周岁尚不具备承担刑责条件本报记者叶涵在这起事件中，李双江(微博)之子李天一未满18周岁，但涉嫌寻衅滋事和故意伤害，且因没有取得驾照还涉嫌无照驾驶。而李双江梦鸽夫妇作为李天一的监护人，在这起事件中又需承担怎样的法律责任呢？网上就此议论纷纷，各种说法都有，昨天记者请教了浙联律师事务所主任戴和平律师。北京海淀警方昨日发给媒体的声明称，苏某、李某因涉嫌寻衅滋事罪已被海淀公安分局依法拘留，目前正在进一步审理中。戴和平律师介绍，寻衅滋事罪，是指在公共场所无事生非，起哄闹事，殴打伤害无辜，肆意挑衅，横行霸道，破坏公共秩序的行为。如被证实，可处5年以下有期徒刑、拘役或者管制。如是14周岁以上却未满18周岁的未成年人，则可以从轻或减轻处罚。但《刑法》同时规定，已满14周岁不满16周岁的人，只对犯故意杀人、故意伤害致人重伤或者死亡、强奸、抢劫、贩卖毒品、放火、爆炸、投毒罪的，负刑事责任，其他的不构成刑事责任。根据现有资料，李天一出生于1996年4月，到今年的9月刚好是15周岁多5个月，不满16周岁，因此假如其出生年月无误，则不用承担刑事责任。李双江夫妇可能被追究民事责任戴律师表示，在此案中，受害者可以向李天一的监护人即李双江及梦鸽追究民事责任，伤者可索取民事赔偿，包括医药费、误工费、营养费及精神损失费等。此外，李天一肇事时无证驾驶宝马车也成为焦点。一位知情者称，车先前是李双江妻子梦鸽的，是一辆白色宝马。今年5月份，他曾陪同李双江之子在“宝马亿佰欧改装俱乐部”进行改装，变成了以黑色为主体，橘色镶边的改装豪车，改装费用约27万元。根据法律规定，改变车身颜色、更换发动机、车身或者车架，未在变更后10日内向车辆管理所申请变更登记的，由公安机关交通管理部门处警告或者200元以下罚款；擅自改变机动车外形和已登记的有关技术数据的，由公安机关交通管理部门责令恢复原状，并处警告或者500元以下罚款。由于未成年人不得考取驾照，李天一属于无照驾驶，根据规定可由公安交通管理部门处200元以上2000元以下的罚款，可以并处15日以下拘留。
person: 叶涵,李天一,戴和平,李双江,苏某,梦鸽
en: In this case, Li Tianyi, the son of Li Shuangjiang (microblog), was under 18 years old, but he was suspected of寻衅滋事and intentional injury, and he was also suspected of driving without a license because he did not obtain a driver's license. Li Shuangjiang and Meng Ge, as Li Tianyi's guardian, what legal responsibility should they bear in this incident? There has been a lot of discussion on the Internet about this, and all kinds of opinions have been expressed. Yesterday, the reporter consulted Dai Heping, the director of Zhelian Law Firm. The statement sent by the Beijing Haidian police to the media yesterday said that Su and Li had been detained by the Haidian Public Security Branch on suspicion of the crime of寻衅滋事, and they are being further tried. Lawyer Dai Heping introduced that the crime of寻衅滋事refers to the act of causing trouble for no reason in public places, making a fuss, beating and injuring the innocent, wantonly provoking, bullying and disrupting public order. If verified, he can be sentenced to less than 5 years' imprisonment, criminal detention or public security. If a minor aged 14 years old but under 18 years old, he/she may be given a lighter or lesser punishment. However, the Criminal Law also stipulates that those who have reached the age of 14 but not yet 16 years old will only be held criminally responsible for intentional killing, intentional injury causing serious injury or death, rape, robbery, drug trafficking, arson, explosion and poisoning. According to the existing data, Li Tianyi was born in April 1996. It was exactly 15 years and 5 months old in September of this year, less than 16 years old. Therefore, if his birth date is correct, he will not be held criminally responsible. Lawyer Dai said that in this case, the victim could hold Li Tianyi's guardian, Li Shuangjiang and Mengge, civil liable, and the injured could claim civil compensation, including medical expenses, miswork expenses, nutrition expenses and mental damage expenses. In addition, Li Tianyi's driving of the BMW car without a license when he was at fault also became the focus. An informed person said that the car was Meng Ge, Li Shuangjiang's wife, and it was a white BMW. In May of this year, he accompanied Li Shuangjiang's son to modify the "BMW Yibai Europe改装Club", which became a modified luxury car with black as the main body and orange edging, with a modification cost of about 270000 yuan. According to the law, if the body color of the vehicle is changed, the engine, body or chassis is replaced, and the vehicle management department is not applied for change registration within 10 days after the change, the public security traffic management department shall give a warning or a fine of less than 200 yuan; If the外形of the motor vehicle is changed or the relevant technical data that have been registered is changed without authorization, the public security traffic management department shall order the restoration to the original status and give a warning or a fine of less than 500 yuan. Since minors are not allowed to take the driver's license examination, Li Tianyi is driving without a license. According to the regulations, the public security traffic management department can give a fine of more than 200 yuan and less than 2000 yuan, and may be detained for less than 15 days.

content: 销量最高15系列游戏马里奥毫无压力你一口气能说出多少你所熟悉的系列作品？你认为谁是最赚钱的游戏？估计不少玩家会说“使命召唤”，没错也许最赚钱的并不一定是销量最高的。今天让我们来一起看看，视频游戏中销量前15的题材系列游戏都有哪些。同时你会发现，EA仍是最大的游戏公司！15.TomClancy汤姆克兰西系列5500万份汤姆克兰西是育碧旗下的一个大的军事题材系列，而它下面就又包括了众多游戏系列。这里包括幽灵行动，彩虹六号，细胞分裂等系列游戏，总销量达5500万份，位列15。14.CallofDuty-使命召唤系列5500万份《使命召唤》全系列迄今为止在全球、全平台已经售出5500万份，总收入达30亿美元。13.GranTurismo-GT赛车系列5550万份GT赛车系列主要面向PS平台，但销量已达5550万份，可见其在赛车系列中的魅力！12.WinningEleven/ProEvolutionSoccer-实况足球系列5550万份之多实况足球系列闻名于欧洲和美国，总销量超过了5500万份，位列总销量之12。11.TheLegendofZelda-塞尔达传说系列5900万份任天堂的塞尔达传说系列从1987年的FC开始到今，总销量达5900万份，位列11。10.FIFA-FIFA足球系列6500万份EA的经典足球系列FIFA总销量达6500万份，位列足球系列第一，众游戏中第十。9.GrandTheftAuto-侠盗猎车手系列7000万份让RockStar闻名的动作大作GTA系列总销量达7000万，位列第九。8.SonictheHedgehog-刺猬索尼克系列7000万份刺猬索尼克题材有书籍、漫画还有游戏，而游戏自1997年以来创造了7000万份的销售记录。7.MaddenNFL-疯狂橄榄球系列7500万份虽然该游戏已经不再登陆PC，不过系列仍在继续。EA的疯狂橄榄球系列至今已经售出7500万份。6.FinalFantasy-最终幻想系列9600万份最终幻想系列总共超过了13个版本，它为SquareEnix公司带来了9600万的销量佳绩。5.NeedforSpeed-极品飞车系列1亿份排名第五的是开始突破亿关的EA极品飞车系列，不论它的最后几代遭到何种非议，它仍是竞速游戏行列中销量最高的系列，自然也是受众最广的赛车游戏，该系列销量至今达1亿份。4.Sims-模拟人生系列1.25亿份继续是EA的作品，模拟人生可谓是EA最成功的系列，总销量达1.25亿份，最重要的是它完全在PC平台下创造了这个奇迹的销量！3.Tetris-俄罗斯方块系列1.25亿份俄罗斯方块这个经典的元老级游戏已经延伸到了很多平台，至今销量超过了1.25亿份，不过它与任天堂游戏机捆绑的销量就占用了3500万。2.Pokémon-口袋妖怪系列2亿份销量亚军之口袋妖怪。该游戏在NDS平台非常受欢迎，至今已延伸出40多个产品，超过2亿的销量。1.Mario-马里奥系列2.22亿份销量冠军之马里奥！毋庸置疑，马里奥是站在游戏界顶峰的超人气多面角色。至今其游戏已创造了2.22亿的最佳销量。除了视频游戏，马里奥还继续出了漫画书、动漫、电影以及众多周边商品。位居视频游戏届销量之首。
en: The best-selling 15 series of Mario games has no pressure. How many series of works are you familiar with can you say in one breath? Who do you think is the most profitable game? It is estimated that many players will say "Call of Duty". Yes, the most profitable game is not necessarily the best-selling one. Today, let's take a look at the top 15 video game topics in the series. At the same time, you will find that EA is still the largest game company! 15. TomClancy Tom Clancy series 55 million copies Tom Clancy is a large military series under Ubisoft, and it includes many game series. This includes the Ghost Operation, Rainbow Six, Cell Division and other series games, with a total sales of 55 million copies, ranking 15th. 14. Call of Duty - Call of Duty series 55 million copies The Call of Duty series has sold 55 million copies worldwide and on all platforms up to now, with a total income of 3 billion dollars. 13. GranTurismo-GT Racing Series 55.5 million copies The GT Racing Series is mainly aimed at the PS platform, but its sales have reached 55.5 million copies, showing its charm in the racing series! 12. WinningEleven/ProEvolutionSoccer - Live Football Series55.5 million copies The Live Football Series is well-known in Europe and the United States, with a total sales of more than 55 million copies, ranking 12 in total sales. 11. The Legend of Zelda - Legend of Zelda series 59 million copies Nintendo's Legend of Zelda series, from the FC in 1987 to the present, has sold 59 million copies in total, ranking 11th. 10. FIFA-FIFA Football Series65 million copies EA's classic football series FIFA has sold 65 million copies in total, ranking first in the football series and tenth in the game industry. 9. GrandTheftAuto - Grand Theft Auto series 70 million copies The Grand Theft Auto series, an action blockbuster that made RockStar famous, has a total sales of 70 million, ranking ninth. 8. Sonic the Hedgehog - Sonic the Hedgehog series 70 million copies Sonic the Hedgehog has books, comics and games. Since 1997, the game has created a sales record of 70 million copies. 7. Madden NFL - Crazy Football Series 75 million copies Although the game is no longer available on PC, the series is still in progress. EA's Crazy Football series has sold 75 million copies so far. 6. FinalFantasy - Final Fantasy Series96 million copies The Final Fantasy series has exceeded 13 versions in total, and it has brought 96 million sales to SquareEnix Company. 5. NeedforSpeed - Need for Speed series 100 million copies The fifth place is the Need for Speed series of EA, which has started to break through the billion pass. No matter what criticism its last few generations have received, it is still the best-selling series in the racing game industry, and it is also the most popular racing game. The series has sold 100 million copies so far. 4. Sims - SimLife Series 125 million copies Continue to work on EA. SimLife can be regarded as the most successful series of EA, with a total sales of 1.25 billion copies. The most important thing is that it has created this miracle sales on the PC platform! 3. Tetris - Tetris Series 125 million copies The classic game of Tetris has been extended to many platforms, and its sales have exceeded 125 million copies so far. However, its sales捆绑with Nintendo's game console occupied 35 million. 2. Pokémon - Pokemon Series200 million copies The best-selling pocket monster in the world. The game is very popular on the NDS platform. So far, it has extended more than 40 products, with a sales volume of more than 200 million. 1. Mario - Mario Series222 million copies The best-selling Mario in the world! There is no doubt that Mario is a multi popular character standing at the peak of the game industry. Up to now, his game has created the best sales of 222 million. In addition to video games, Mario also continued to publish comic books, animations, movies and a large number of peripheral products, ranking first in the video game industry.

content: 田亮发微博寻找走失外婆感谢好友帮忙转发7月5日中午，前奥运冠军明星田亮通过新浪微博发出一则寻人启事，寻找年岁已高的外婆。短短两个小时，该微博被转发5万多次，田亮发布微博告知网友粉丝已找到外婆，并对转发寻人微博的网友朋友表示感谢。2011年7月5日11时40分，身处北京的田亮在自己的新浪微博上发出了求救信息：“我外婆因年岁已高，记忆严重丧失，于昨晚饭后散步，在老家重庆走失。走失时身穿白碎花短衫，黄碎花裤，手拄拐杖，她精神很好，语言也清晰，就是毫无记忆。恳请我的好朋友们帮忙转发、寻找。”截至5日15时左右，田亮“寻外婆”的微博在短短几个小时内被5万余名网友转发，其中还包括田亮妻子叶一茜，好友安以轩、姚晨、黄健翔等明星。在距离找外婆的微博发出后不到两个小时，即13点14分，田亮微博表示找到外婆，并且感谢了帮忙转发的朋友们。“好消息！外婆找到了，摔断了腿，被好心人发现，在重庆急救中心抢救，现在生命没有危险。感谢重庆的好心人，所有转发、关注的朋友，感谢好朋友。”据了解，田亮的外婆已经是84岁高龄，平时一直住在重庆老家。老人家很疼爱田亮，当初外孙结婚的时候，她也亲自来到婚宴现场表示祝贺，更是跟叶一茜说了不少悄悄话，一派和乐融融的景象。田亮跟外婆感情颇为深厚，虽然平时见面机会不多，但只要有空，他回家的时候都会抽空探望外婆。王文
person: 安以轩,叶一茜,王文,田亮,黄健翔,姚晨
en: Tian Liang sent a microblog to look for his lost grandmother and thanked his friends for forwarding it. At noon on July 5, the former Olympic champion Tian Liang sent a notice through Sina Weibo to look for his grandmother who is very old. In just two hours, the microblog was forwarded more than 50000 times. Tian Liang posted a microblog to tell netizens that he had found his grandmother and thanked his net-friends for forwarding the microblog. At 11:40 on July 5, 2011, Tian Liang, who was in Beijing, sent a distress signal on his Sina Weibo: "My grandmother lost her memory seriously because of her old age. After dinner last night, she lost her way in her hometown Chongqing. When she lost her way, she wore a short shirt with white and broken flowers, a trouser with yellow and broken flowers, and a cane in her hand. She was in good spirit and clear language, but she had no memory. I would like to ask my good friends for help to forward and find them." As of around 15:00 on the 5th, Tian Liang's microblog of "Looking for Grandma" was forwarded by more than 50000 netizens in just a few hours, including Tian Liang's wife Ye Yixi, good friends An Yixuan, Yao Chen, Huang Jianxiang and other stars. Less than two hours after the microblog of looking for grandma was sent, that is, at 13:14, Tian Liang's microblog said that grandma had been found, and thanked the friends who helped forward it. "Good news! Grandma found, broke her leg, found by a kind person, was rescued in Chongqing Emergency Center, now there is no danger to her life. Thank you, kind people in Chongqing, all friends who have forwarded and followed. Thank you, good friends." It is understood that Tian Liang's grandmother is already 84 years old and usually lives in Chongqing. The old man loved Tian Liang very much. When his grandson got married, she also came to the wedding scene to congratulate him. She said a lot of whispering words to Ye Yixi, which was a picture of joy and happiness. Tian Liang has a deep feeling for his grandmother. Although he has few opportunities to meet her, he will visit his grandmother whenever he has time when he goes home. Wang Wen

content: 美联储维持0-0.25%基准利率区间不变新浪财经讯北京时间1月28日凌晨3点15分，美联储在结束为期两天的利率会议后宣布，维持0-0.25%的基准利率区间不变。此举符合市场的普遍预期。联邦公开市场委员会(FOMC)在会后发表的政策声明指出，预计将在较长时间内维持超低利率政策，将在三月底终止采购抵押贷款支持证券项目。此外，与上一份声明相比，联储对经济前景的判断略微乐观一些。联储还称，将在三月结束针对银行的信贷拍卖项目。一些分析师评论道，在为期两天的闭门会议中，联储官员在利率和经济前景方面上有许多问题要谈论，但他们在公开场合不会发表太多言论。联储前董事劳伦斯-迈耶(LaurenceMeyer)称：“从联储将采取何种行动的角度看，这可能是一次平淡无奇的会议，但从其他角度看它又特别令人感兴趣。”巴克莱资本的经济学家迪安-马基(DeanMaki)表示，联储主席伯南克第二任期提名引发的争议只会让联储变得更低调。本周四参院将就是否批准伯南克连任进行表决。市场分析师普遍预期奥巴马总统对伯南克再任联储主席的提名将获得通过。另一个令人感兴趣的问题是美国经济的前景。联储官员早已表示，他们并不认为失业率在短期内会有太大改善。多数经济学家认为，在劳动力市场出现明显的改善迹象之后联储才可能启动紧缩政策。因此，分析人士普遍预期FOMC在会后声明中将再度强调联邦基金利率有必要在相当长一段时间内维持在历史超低水平。多数联储观察家认为，今天联储将重申多数特别流动性工具将于2月1日终止，此外联储可能声明采购1.25万亿美元抵押贷款支持证券的计划将按原计划于3月底结束。联储观察家还表示，在声明无重大变化的表象之下可能掩藏着联储官员对退出策略的激烈争论。FOMC在12月上一次会议的声明中曾指出，将在“未来的会议上讨论在较长期内推行货币政策的替代性措施”。观察家认为，这无异于公开了一个秘密：现在联储官员还不清楚最优的退出方案是什么。
person: 迪安-马基,马基,伯南克,奥巴马,DeanMaki,LaurenceMeyer,劳伦斯,迈耶,劳伦斯-迈耶,迪安
en: The Federal Reserve maintained the benchmark interest rate range of 0-0.25% Sina Finance News reported at 3:15 a.m. Beijing time on January 28. The Federal Reserve announced after the two-day interest rate meeting that it would maintain the benchmark interest rate range of 0-0.25%. This move is in line with the general expectation of the market. The Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) pointed out in its policy statement after the meeting that it is expected to maintain the ultra-low interest rate policy for a long time, and the mortgage-backed securities purchase project will end at the end of March. In addition, the Fed's judgment on the economic prospects is slightly more optimistic than the previous statement. The Fed also said that the credit auction project targeting banks will end in March. Some analysts commented that Fed officials had many issues to discuss on interest rates and economic prospects at the two-day closed-door meeting, but they would not say much in public. Laurence Meyer, a former Fed director, said: "This may be an uneventful meeting from the perspective of what the Fed will do, but it is particularly interesting from other perspectives." Dean Maki, an economist at Barclays Capital, said that the controversy caused by Bernanke's nomination for a second term as Fed chairman would only make the Fed more low-key. The Senate will vote on Thursday on whether to approve Bernanke's reappointment. Market analysts generally expect that President Obama's nomination of Bernanke for another term as Fed chairman will be approved. Another interesting issue is the prospect of the U.S. economy. Fed officials have long said that they do not think the unemployment rate will improve much in the short term. Most economists believe that the Federal Reserve will not start the tightening policy until there are obvious signs of improvement in the labor market. Therefore, analysts generally expect that the FOMC will again emphasize in its statement after the meeting that the federal funds rate needs to remain at a historically ultra-low level for a considerable period of time. Most Fed observers believe that the Fed will reiterate today that most special liquidity tools will end on February 1, and the Fed may also declare that the $1.25 trillion mortgage-backed securities purchase plan will end at the end of March as scheduled. Fed observers also said that there may be a fierce debate among Fed officials on the exit strategy under the appearance that there is no significant change in the statement. The FOMC pointed out in its statement at the last meeting in December that "alternative measures to implement monetary policy for a long time will be discussed at future meetings". Observers believe that this is no different from revealing a secret: Fed officials do not know what is the best exit plan at present.

content: 奥鹏教育携传媒大学打造传媒网络教育巨舰【赛迪网讯】近日，中国最大的网络教育内容服务运营机构奥鹏远程教育中心与国内传媒专业领域龙头院校中国传媒大学签署合作协议，双方将在新闻、广告、广电等传媒专业领域合作，为更多从事媒体工作，或对有意媒体方向的人群提供学历教育服务。据悉，奥鹏教育和中国传媒大学的合作早在2009年初即已进入商讨阶段。奥鹏远程教育中心马谦副主任介绍说：“中国传媒大学在传媒领域的实力不容置疑，奥鹏教育非常珍视这次合作，我们用了一年多的时间来商讨和策划合作模式、合作范围以及未来的发展方向等问题，这与中国传媒大学在网络教育方面的独特性是分不开的。之前中国传媒大学一直都依托广电系统开展网络教育，并且自主研发了教学管理平台，建设了完备的课程资源体系，这些教学和管理经验的积累都非常宝贵。”中国传媒大学远程与继续教育学院吴延熊院长在签约仪式后，道出了双方合作的深层原因，他表示：“近几年，中国传媒行业迅猛发展，实现社会化招生，已经是整个行业发展的要求。而奥鹏教育敏锐的市场感知力、教学支持服务能力、全面社会化的服务能力等一系列实力，正是我们传媒行业教育和人才培养工作所需要的。因此经过多方实地考察，最终我们选择了与奥鹏教育合作。相信这样的合作，将是一个共进双赢的合作。而‘培养传媒领域的精英人才’是我们此次合作的共同目标！”据业内专家分析，双方的正式签约合作，对奥鹏教育而言，进一步拓展了其覆盖的学生人群，同时对于其在职培训及学历教育的模式拓展方面也具有较大的意义。同时，中国传媒大学在实现网络教育全面社会化的教学服务方面迈出了一大步。另据了解，奥鹏教育自2001年成立以来，发展至今已与包括北京大学、浙江大学、中国传媒大学在内的43所国内重点高校开展远程教育合作，全部学员超过50万，1400多家学习中心的老师为学员提供24小时全程学业顾问服务。2009年，奥鹏教育创造了网络学历教育和职业教育的“兼容”模式，学员在拿到毕业证书的同时，也可获得相关的职业资格认证证书，这在一定程度上对专业人才素质的提高起到了推动作用。
en: Openg Education, together with Communication University, creates a giant media network education [CSDN News] Recently, Openg Remote Education Center, the largest online education content service operation organization in China, and Communication University of China, the leading university in the field of communication, signed a cooperation agreement. The two sides will cooperate in the field of communication majors such as news, advertising, radio and television, and provide educational services to more people who are engaged in media work or are interested in media. It is reported that the cooperation between Openg Education and China Media University has entered the discussion stage as early as the beginning of 2009. Ma Qian, deputy director of Openg Distance Education Center, introduced: "The strength of China Media University in the field of media is beyond doubt. Openg Education values this cooperation very much. We spent more than a year discussing and planning the cooperation model, cooperation scope and future development direction, which is inseparable from the particularity of China Media University in the field of network education. China Media University has always relied on the radio and television system to develop network education, and has independently developed a teaching management platform, and has built a complete curriculum resource system. These teaching and management experiences are very precious." After the signing ceremony, Wu Yanxiong, dean of the School of Distance and Continuing Education of China Media University, revealed the deep reason for the cooperation between the two sides, and said: "In recent years, the media industry in China has developed rapidly, and it is a requirement of the whole industry to realize social recruitment. And Openg Education's series of strengths, such as sharp market perception, teaching support service capabilities, and comprehensive social service capabilities, are exactly what our media industry education and talent cultivation work needs. Therefore, after multi-party field investigation, we finally chose to cooperate with Openg Education. I believe that such cooperation will be a win-win cooperation. And 'cultivating elite talents in the field of media' is our common goal for this cooperation!" According to industry experts, the official signing and cooperation of the two sides has further expanded the student population covered by Openg Education, and it is also significant for the expansion of its in-service training and educational model. At the same time, China Media University has taken a big step in achieving socialization of teaching services in network education. It is also reported that since its establishment in 2001, Openg Education has developed cooperation with 43 key universities in China, including Peking University, Zhejiang University and China Media University. More than 500000 students have received online education. Teachers in more than 1400 learning centers provide 24-hour full-time academic advisory services to students. In 2009, Openg Education created a "compatible" model of online education and vocational education. While students get graduation certificates, they can also obtain relevant vocational qualification certificates, which plays a role in promoting the improvement of professional personnel's quality to a certain extent.

content: 据称深圳反腐行动可能牵涉一大批开发商2005年至2009年，深圳房价暴涨的四年里，有几位民营地产商人格外引人注目，其中三人是星河地产集团董事长黄楚龙、卓越地产集团董事长李华、京基地产公司董事长陈华。他们可以以协议出让等非常规手段在深圳市中心地段拿地，在深圳房价暴涨过程中受益颇多，因此身处深圳地产的风暴眼中。中心区拿地高手黄楚龙本报记者张睿发自深圳深圳房地产界的大腕儿中，不得不提星河地产的董事长黄楚龙。这位习惯别人称他为“龙哥”，总自称“潮州佬”的地产商人，从1979年到深圳做工程创业至今，已经成为深圳中心城区数一数二的“大哥”。坊间传言，黄楚龙眼下已离开了深圳。时代周报记者多次寻访黄楚龙，6月12日上午，在星河地产公司，只见其办公室门开着，门口留有一双拖鞋。记者立即拨打其手机，但直至截稿时，黄楚龙的电话一直都被转至语音信箱，黄楚龙杳无音信。过江猛龙黄楚龙星河地产在深圳赫赫有名。深圳的出租车司机，说起星河的项目都如数家珍。“星河的房子都卖得很好，因为地段特别好。”21世纪不动产(21世纪不动产博客)的一位经纪人告诉时代周报记者，“黄老板实力很强，总能在中心城区拿到好地。”深圳地铁一号线CBD核心区的三个地铁站周边，聚集了星河地产开发的四个项目。同许多地产商的发展历程相似，黄楚龙也是从建筑工人起家的。1979年，他在深圳建特区伊始就前来创业，“泥水匠”的活儿做得风生水起，后来慢慢开始做起包工头，承接了深圳第一大道深南大道(上海宾馆至上步路)的建设工程。靠着做包工头淘得的第一桶金，1998年，黄楚龙成立了深圳怡和企业公司，即星河地产的前身。黄楚龙摇身一变，成为一个开发商。1994年4月，黄楚龙成立深圳市新怡和实业发展有限公司，先后开发了祥和花园、怡和楼、海悦华城等多个项目。1999年12月，新怡和更名为深圳市星河房地产开发有限公司。深圳著名房地产评论员“图腾镜”，在其博客上记录了万科集团董事长王石(王石博客)、星河地产董事长黄楚龙和世联地产(世联地产博客)顾问股份有限公司董事长陈劲松在一次饭桌上的“论道”。席间，陈劲松感叹，深圳民营房地产企业都没能走出去时，黄楚龙马上产生共鸣：“不错，我也走过很多城市。深有感触的是：人生地不熟，水土又不服。中午喝5斤白酒，晚上还要喝6斤，再喝下去，命都要陪进去了，故而不得不撤。”就是这位在其他城市“人生地不熟”的商人，却将其在深圳的地产事业经营得如鱼得水。“在深圳，万科、招商等上市公司往往拿不到中心区的地块，中心区的地块都被几个深圳的民营房企垄断了。”深圳某大型房地产企业的负责人向时代周报记者透露。黄楚龙的星河，就是这几家“中心区垄断大户”之一。2002年，位于福华三路和滨河大道之间的星河国际顺利开售，让黄楚龙真正在深圳中心区站稳了脚跟。到2005年，星河地产的项目全面开花。并赶上了2005-2007年，深圳房价飞涨的好时候。根据深圳地产咨询机构香地#zhPoint#半求工作室的统计分析，在深圳的CBD,每100平方米商品建筑中，就有12平方米是星河地产供应的。“官司门”抖落前生事同其他地产商相比，星河的土地储备不算多，却贵在“稀缺”。在藏龙卧虎的深圳地产界，这条过江猛龙能够击败众多对手，选地的眼光和拿地的能力自然不言而喻。2003年2月，黄楚龙在深圳首次进行的土地拍卖会上，以1.8亿元的总价、免息8年分期付款的方式，将如今的星河发展中心和丽思#zhPoint#卡尔顿项目一举拿下。2003年12月23日，黄楚龙又突然将目光放到关外，以2.5亿元的价格拍下龙岗区一幅17万平方米的地块。如今，地块所在的龙岗中心城，正在以规划中龙岗政治、经济、文化中心的身份大兴土木。黄楚龙拿地的能力不止于雄厚的资金实力。时代周报记者查阅深圳国土房管局的资料发现，黄楚龙在中心区大获成功的星河国际和星河世纪两个项目，权属来源均为“协议出让”。其中，星河国际项目的取得时间是1999年。而星河世纪大厦的受让日期是2004年9月13日，权属来源也是协议出让。2004年8月31日土地大限后，所有经营性用地都要通过招、拍、挂方式转让，星河是如何以协议出让的方式获得星河世纪大厦项目的用地呢？就在时代周报记者多方查证之时，6月16日，一宗以星河世纪大厦为标的物的案件，在福田区人民法院公开审理。黄楚龙获得星河世纪项目的相关情节，在这个案件中若隐若现。时代周报记者悉，星河世纪地块原属深圳市“还地于民”政策涉及的地块之一，使用权属于岗厦实业股份有限公司。2000年3月，由东永峰公司牵线搭桥，深圳岗厦与锦峰公司和东永峰公司签署了一份合作开发的协议，由岗厦公司提供商住用地，东永峰公司和锦峰公司提供建设资金，联合开发该地块。建成后岗厦公司分得物业11000平方米，其余物业归东永峰公司和锦峰公司所有。但在开发建设过程中，却陡生变数。按照原告方锦峰公司86名员工和股东的说法，2004年1月13日，锦峰公司的法定代表人同东永峰公司和岗厦公司签订协议，退出了该地块的开发。2004年1月12日，东永峰公司将这个项目转给了星河地产。原告方认为，锦峰公司法定代表人未召开董事会和股东会，未听取工会和职工意见就退出该项目的开发，且仅仅收回前期投资成本，让一个原本可以盈利的项目在开发中途拱手让人，造成了锦峰员工和股东的经济损失；且认为在项目操作中，包括锦峰公司的大股东深圳市福田投资发展公司、东永峰公司、锦峰公司法定代表人等几名被告有恶意串通的行为，遂将其悉数告上法庭；而福田区人民政府，也被原告认为支持并促成其他被告的侵权行为而成为又一被告。案情线索复杂、扑朔迷离。至今深圳市国土房管局的资料仍然显示星河世纪项目开发企业是深圳东永峰实业有限公司，而星河地产如何介入、通过协议出让方式获得星河世纪项目的细节，还是一个谜。星河地产总经理刘世成对时代周报记者表示：“他对此事并不清楚。”黄楚龙的江湖情结深圳地产界的人士说起这位“龙哥”，总免不了豪爽、重义气、朋友多、人脉广这些评价。黄楚龙的江湖情结，也奠定了他在圈子内的地位。深圳市工商局公开资料显示，黄楚龙最早成立的怡和企业公司，就有深圳市福田区沙头街道办事处以主管单位的身份作股东。黄楚龙的豪气，不仅体现在做地产项目上，关于其子2007年豪华婚礼的描述和图片在网上流传甚广。黄楚龙的一位老乡还爆料，黄楚龙邀请了村里大约500人去酒店大吃一顿，并且还给每人封了400元的红包，被网友们称为“史上最牛婚礼”。熟悉黄楚龙的人都发现，他的手腕和脖颈上都挂着佛珠。有知情人士透露：“黄老板一方面是会赚钱的商人，另一方面是礼佛散财的信徒。”黄楚龙经营企业的理念也时常为业内津津乐道。时代周报记者探访星河地产在星河发展中心17-24层的新总部时，发现贴在不同楼层的黄氏语录—“你好、我好、大家好，才是真的好”；“先做人，后做事，外圆而内方”。我要评论
person: 陈劲松,黄楚龙,王石,李华,刘世成,黄老板,张睿,陈华
en: It is reported that the anti-corruption campaign in Shenzhen may involve a large number of developers. From 2005 to 2009, when the housing prices in Shenzhen soared for four years, several private real estate businessmen were particularly eye-catching, including Huang Chulong, Chairman of Xinghe Real Estate Group, Li Hua, Chairman of Excellence Real Estate Group, and Chen Hua, Chairman of Beijing Base Real Estate Company. They can take unconventional means such as land acquisition by agreement to get land in the central area of Shenzhen, and benefit a lot from the process of sharp rise in housing prices in Shenzhen, so they are in the eye of the storm of real estate in Shenzhen. Zhang Rui, a reporter from Shenzhen, a land acquisition expert in the central area, has to mention Huang Chulong, the chairman of Xinghe Real Estate, a big shot in the real estate industry of Shenzhen. This real estate developer, who is used to be called "Brother Long" by others and always calls himself "Chaozhou Lad", has become the top ranking "big brother" in the central urban area of Shenzhen since he started his engineering career in Shenzhen in 1979. It is rumored that Huang Chulong has left Shenzhen. Reporters of Time Weekly have visited Huang Chulong many times. On the morning of June 12, at Xinghe Real Estate Company, his office door was open and a pair of slippers was left at the door. The reporter immediately dialed his mobile phone, but until the press release, Huang Chulong's phone was always transferred to the voice mailbox, and Huang Chulong was missing. Huang Chulong, a fierce dragon crossing the river, is well-known in Shenzhen. Taxi drivers in Shenzhen talk about Xinghe's projects as if they were treasures of their own family. "Xinghe's houses sell well because they are in a special location." A broker of 21st Century Real Estate (21st Century Real Estate Blog) told the reporter of Time Weekly that "Boss Huang is very powerful and can always get good land in the central city area." Around the three subway stations in the CBD core area of Shenzhen Metro Line 1, there are four projects developed by Xinghe Real Estate. Similar to the development experience of many real estate developers, Huang Chulong also started from a construction worker. In 1979, at the beginning of the construction of Shenzhen Special Zone, he came to start his business. The "mason's" job was very popular. Later, he slowly began to act as a contractor and undertook the construction project of Shenzhen's first大道深南路 (Shanghai Hotel to Shangbu Road). With the first pot of gold made as a contractor, in 1998, Huang Chulong founded Shenzhen Yihua Enterprise Company, the predecessor of Xinghe Real Estate. Huang Chulong transforms himself into a developer. In April 1994, Huang Chulong established Shenzhen Xinyue Industrial Development Co., Ltd., which has successively developed a number of projects such as Xianghe Garden, Yihua Building, and Haiyue Huacheng. In December 1999, Xinyuehe was renamed Shenzhen Xinghe Real Estate Development Co., Ltd. Shen Zhen, a well-known real estate commentator in Shenzhen, recorded on his blog that Wang Shi (Wang Shi Blog), chairman of Vanke Group, Huang Chulong, chairman of Xinghe Real Estate, and Chen Jinsong, chairman of Sino Union Real Estate (Sino Union Real Estate Blog) had a "discussion" at a dinner table. During the dinner, Chen Jinsong lamented that when Shenzhen's private real estate enterprises were unable to go out, Huang Chulong immediately resonated: "Yes, I have been to many cities. I'm not familiar with the land and water. I had five catties of white wine for lunch and another six catties in the evening. If I drink it again, I will have to give my life away, so I have to withdraw." It is this businessman who is "unfamiliar with life and death" in other cities, but his real estate career in Shenzhen is like a fish in water. "In Shenzhen, listed companies such as Vanke and China Merchants often can't get land in the central area, and the land in the central area is monopolized by several private real estate enterprises in Shenzhen." Shen Zhen, a leader of a large real estate enterprise in Shenzhen, revealed to the reporter of Time Weekly. Huang Chulong's Xinghe is one of the major land monopolizers in the central area. In February 2003, Huang Chulong, at the first land auction in Shenzhen, won the Xinghe Development Center and Ritz#zhPoint#Carlton projects at a total price of 180 million yuan and an interest free installment payment for 8 years. On December 23, 2003, Huang Chulong suddenly focused on the land outside the pass, and took a 170000 square meter land in Longgang District at the price of 250 million yuan. At present, Longgang Central City, where the land is located, is building a lot of land as the planned political, economic and cultural center of Longgang. Huang Chulong's ability to acquire land goes beyond his strong financial strength. The data from Shenzhen Land and Housing Administration Department found by the reporter of Time Weekly shows that the two projects of Huang Chulong, Xinghe International and Xinghe Century, which have been successfully developed in the central area, are "agreement transfer". Among them, the Xinghe International project was obtained in 1999. The acquisition date of Xinghe Century Building is September 13, 2004, and the source of rights is also an agreement to transfer. After the land deadline on August 31, 2004, all land for business purposes must be transferred through bidding, shooting and hanging. How did Xinghe obtain the land for the Xinghe Century Building project in the way of agreement transfer? When the reporter of Time Weekly was verifying from all sides, on June 16, a case with Xinghe Century Building as the subject was publicly heard in Futian District Court. Huang Chulong's relevant plot of winning the Xinghe Century project is looming in this case. The reporter of Time Weekly learned that the Xinghe Century plot was one of the plots involved in the "land return to the people" policy of Shenzhen, and the right to use was owned by Gangxia Industrial Stock Co., Ltd. In March 2000, at the invitation of Dongyongfeng Company, Shenzhen Gangxia signed a cooperation and development agreement with Jinfeng Company and Dongyongfeng Company, under which Gangxia Company provided commercial and residential land, and Dongyongfeng Company and Jinfeng Company provided construction funds to jointly develop the land. After completion, Gangxia Company gets 11000 square meters of property, and the rest of the property belongs to Dongyongfeng Company and Jinfeng Company. But there are many variables in the process of development and construction. According to the plaintiff, 86 employees and shareholders of Jinfeng Company, on January 13, 2004, the legal representative of Jinfeng Company signed an agreement with Dongyongfeng Company and Gangxia Company to withdraw from the development of the land. On January 12, 2004, Dongyongfeng transferred the project to Xinghe Real Estate. The plaintiff believes that the legal representative of Jinfeng Company withdrew from the development of the project without convening the board of directors and the shareholders' meeting, and without listening to the opinions of the trade union and employees, and only recovered the investment cost in the early stage, which handed over a project that could originally make a profit to others in the middle of development, causing economic losses to Jinfeng employees and shareholders; and it is believed that in the project operation, several defendants, including the major shareholder Shenzhen Futian Investment Development Company, Dongyongfeng Company, and the legal representative of Jinfeng Company, had malicious collusion, so they filed a lawsuit against them; Futian District People's Government, was also regarded as another defendant because it supported and promoted the infringement of other defendants. The case is complicated and confusing. Up to now, the data of Shenzhen Land and Housing Administration Department still shows that the development enterprise of Xinghe Century Project is Shenzhen Dongyongfeng Industrial Co., Ltd., and how Xinghe Real Estate became involved and obtained the details of Xinghe Century Project through the agreement transfer is still a mystery. Liu Shicheng, general manager of Xinghe Real Estate, said to the reporter of Time Weekly: "I don't know about this matter." Huang Chulong's江湖in the real estate industry of Shenzhen When people talk about this "Brother Long", they always praise him for being generous, righteous, having many friends and wide contacts. Huang Chulong's江湖in the real estate industry of Shenzhen also laid the foundation for his status in the circle. The public information of Shenzhen Industry and Commerce Bureau shows that the earliest Yihua Enterprise Company established by Huang Chulong has the Sha Tou Street Office of Futian District, Shenzhen as a shareholder in the capacity of the competent unit. Huang Chulong's generosity is not only reflected in real estate projects, but also in the description and pictures of his son's luxury wedding in 2007, which is widely circulated on the Internet. One of Huang Chulong's fellow villagers also revealed that Huang Chulong invited about 500 people in the village to have a big meal in the hotel, and gave each person a red envelope of

content: 司法干警参与贩毒一审被判死刑金黔在线讯警方在收费站设卡查缉毒品，从一辆客车上抓获一男一女，最后顺藤摸瓜，将其上线、上线的上线一一抓获。令人吃惊的是，其中一名毒贩竟是司法干警。日前，贵阳市中院审理了此案，并作出一审宣判。2007年11月24日14时左右，贵阳警方在贵阳金关收费站设卡查缉，在一辆从六盘水开往贵阳的大客车上，从一女子身上搜出毒品海洛因410克，与该女子同行的另一男子胡元杰(织金县人，现年57岁)也被抓获。胡元杰被抓获后表示愿意立功，协助公安机关抓获其上线云南人铁发翠、马玉合夫妇。11月29日上午10时许，在云南省昭通市鲁甸县保健路一家旅社内，正在进行毒品交易的铁发翠、马玉合夫妇被公安人员抓获，并当场收缴毒品468克。此后，警方根据胡元杰提供的线索，于12月2日下午14时许，在昆明市西山区某招待所将毒贩王德慧抓获，并缴获3050克毒品。王德慧被抓获后，主动交待其所贩卖的3050克海洛因是一个叫宁恭伟的男子交给其贩卖的，当时两人说好，由王德慧寻找买主，毒品贩卖后，王德慧付毒资75万元给宁恭伟，多余部分作为王德慧的好处费。宁恭伟要求王德慧将75万元毒资分别打入两张银行卡内，并用手机短信方式将两张银行卡的卡号告知王德慧。在王德慧的配合下，公安人员于2008年3月7日下午在云南省临沧市将宁恭伟抓获。经查，宁恭伟是云南省临沧市耿马县司法局司法干警。据宁恭伟交待，2007年11月份他就与王德慧商议贩卖毒品海洛因的事，这些海洛因是从一个缅甸人手里得的，之后他与王德慧联系，将这批毒品交给了王德慧。日前，贵阳市中院对此案作出一审判决，以贩卖毒品罪分别判处宁恭伟、铁发翠死刑，没收个人全部财产；马玉合判处无期徒刑，没收个人财产30000元。鉴于被告人王德慧、胡元杰有重大立功表现，遂以贩卖毒品罪判处王德慧死刑，缓期二年执行，没收个人全部财产；胡元杰有期徒刑十五年，没收个人财产1万元。金黔在线讯警方在收费站设卡查缉毒品，从一辆客车上抓获一男一女，最后顺藤摸瓜，将其上线、上线的上线一一抓获。令人吃惊的是，其中一名毒贩竟是司法干警。日前，贵阳市中院审理了此案，并作出一审宣判。2007年11月24日14时左右，贵阳警方在贵阳金关收费站设卡查缉，在一辆从六盘水开往贵阳的大客车上，从一女子身上搜出毒品海洛因410克，与该女子同行的另一男子胡元杰(织金县人，现年57岁)也被抓获。胡元杰被抓获后表示愿意立功，协助公安机关抓获其上线云南人铁发翠、马玉合夫妇。11月29日上午10时许，在云南省昭通市鲁甸县保健路一家旅社内，正在进行毒品交易的铁发翠、马玉合夫妇被公安人员抓获，并当场收缴毒品468克。此后，警方根据胡元杰提供的线索，于12月2日下午14时许，在昆明市西山区某招待所将毒贩王德慧抓获，并缴获3050克毒品。王德慧被抓获后，主动交待其所贩卖的3050克海洛因是一个叫宁恭伟的男子交给其贩卖的，当时两人说好，由王德慧寻找买主，毒品贩卖后，王德慧付毒资75万元给宁恭伟，多余部分作为王德慧的好处费。宁恭伟要求王德慧将75万元毒资分别打入两张银行卡内，并用手机短信方式将两张银行卡的卡号告知王德慧。在王德慧的配合下，公安人员于2008年3月7日下午在云南省临沧市将宁恭伟抓获。经查，宁恭伟是云南省临沧市耿马县司法局司法干警。据宁恭伟交待，2007年11月份他就与王德慧商议贩卖毒品海洛因的事，这些海洛因是从一个缅甸人手里得的，之后他与王德慧联系，将这批毒品交给了王德慧。日前，贵阳市中院对此案作出一审判决，以贩卖毒品罪分别判处宁恭伟、铁发翠死刑，没收个人全部财产；马玉合判处无期徒刑，没收个人财产30000元。鉴于被告人王德慧、胡元杰有重大立功表现，遂以贩卖毒品罪判处王德慧死刑，缓期二年执行，没收个人全部财产；胡元杰有期徒刑十五年，没收个人财产1万元。
person: 王德慧,宁恭伟,铁发翠,胡元杰,马玉合
en: The judicial police officers involved in drug trafficking were sentenced to death in the first instance. Gold Online News Police set up a card at the toll station to check for drugs. A man and a woman were caught on a passenger bus. Finally, they followed the藤to find their online and online lines. Surprisingly, one of the drug traffickers was a judicial police officer. Recently, the Intermediate Court of Guiyang City tried the case and made a first instance announcement. At around 14:00 on November 24, 2007, the police in Guiyang set up a card at the Guiyang Jinguan Toll Station to check and stop. On a coach from Liupanshui to Guiyang, 410 grams of heroin was found on a woman, and another man, Hu Yuanjie (a native of Zijin County, 57 years old), who was traveling with the woman, was also caught. After Hu Yuanjie was arrested, he said he was willing to take credit and help the public security organ catch his online Yunnan people Tie Fa Cui and Ma Yuhuo. At about 10:00 am on November 29, in a hotel on Baojian Road, Ludian County, Zhaotong City, Yunnan Province, Tie Fecui and Ma Yuhuo, who were engaged in drug trafficking, were arrested by the public security personnel, and 468 grams of drugs were seized on the spot. Later, the police, based on the clues provided by Hu Yuanjie, arrested the drug dealer Wang Dehui at a hotel in Xishan District, Kunming City at about 14:00 on December 2, and seized 3050 grams of drugs. After Wang Dehui was arrested, he voluntarily explained that the 3050 grams of heroin he sold was given to him by a man named Ning Gongwei for sale. At that time, it was agreed that Wang Dehui would look for buyers. After the drug was sold, Wang Dehui would pay 7.5 million yuan to Ning Gongwei as a benefit fee for Wang Dehui. Ning Gongwei asked Wang Dehui to put 750000 yuan of drug money into two bank cards respectively, and send the card numbers of the two bank cards to Wang Dehui by mobile phone text message. With the cooperation of Wang Dehui, the public security officers caught Ning Gongwei in Lincang City, Yunnan Province on the afternoon of March 7, 2008. After investigation, Ning Gongwei was a judicial police officer of the Judicial Bureau of Gengma County, Lincang City, Yunnan Province. According to Ning Gongwei, in November 2007, he discussed with Wang Dehui about the sale of heroin. The heroin was obtained from a Myanmar. Later, he contacted Wang Dehui and gave the batch of drugs to Wang Dehui. Recently, the Intermediate Court of Guiyang City made a first instance judgment on this case, sentencing Ning Gongwei and Tie Fecui to death for drug trafficking and confiscating all their personal property; Ma Yuhuo was sentenced to life imprisonment and his personal property of 30000 yuan was confiscated. In view of the fact that the defendant Wang Dehui and Hu Yuanjie have made significant contributions, Wang Dehui was sentenced to death for drug trafficking, suspended for two years, and his personal property was confiscated; Hu Yuanjie was sentenced to 15 years' imprisonment and his personal property of 10000 yuan was confiscated.

content: 专家：火箭腾空有三大隐患姚明不再受伤将是奇迹新浪体育讯　北京时间12月5日消息，star-telegram.com报道，综合现有信息，仔细地负责任地预测：休斯顿火箭将会以西部第五结束这个常规赛。火箭休赛期收获罗恩-阿泰斯特后，这种预测与那些膨胀的言论大相径庭，你知道，某些所谓专家看好这支球队能挺进总决赛。现在的火箭，看上去深受一个问题的困扰，那就是伤病。早在火箭的训练营期间，就有消息说经历过职业生涯首次手术后，麦蒂的膝盖仍然很疼。过去的四场比赛，麦蒂就因这个问题高挂免战牌。而且，据最新消息显示，这个7届全明星球员在接下来三周，都不会出现在球场上。过去三个赛季，麦蒂总共缺席了62场比赛。毋庸讳言，麦蒂是他这个年代最具才华的篮球运动员，但是在29岁这个年龄——或许，你会惊讶他竟然是如此年轻，经历过11个NBA赛季的敲打后，他已经伤病缠身。当麦蒂18岁以高中生身份进入这个联盟后，谁会想到11年之后的他会是今天这个样子。除了麦蒂的膝伤，火箭的另外两员主将姚明和阿泰斯特也各有麻烦，前者是脚，后者是头，其中任何一个“发作”，火箭的前景都不容乐观。过去三年，因为不同部位的伤病，姚明总共缺席了86场比赛。作为一个7尺6寸310磅的中锋，当姚明来回奔跑不断起跳时，他的身体承受着常人难以想象的压力。上赛季，姚明因为舟骨骨折错失了35场比赛，在火箭最需要他的时候赛季报销。手术后没过多长时间，姚明就超负荷运转，代表他的祖国参加了北京奥运会。所以，如果这个赛季姚明能全勤，那将是一个奇迹。再说说阿泰斯特。必须承认，阿泰斯特不缺乏天赋，他可以在攻防两端都打出统治级的表现，可在他的职业生涯里，他却时而弄出打架、虐待动物、为了宣传唱片而请假等麻烦事。麦蒂的膝、姚明的脚和阿泰斯特的头，这三个因素叠加，使得火箭成了联盟中最难以令人放心的球队。所有预测火箭有能力角逐总冠军的家伙都不会忘了加上一个前提——如果姚麦能保持健康，如果阿泰斯特不再惹是生非。当被问起球队的健康问题时，火箭主教练里克-阿德尔曼如是说：“我倒是想问你，‘明天我会拥有哪些球员(比赛和训练)？’至于球员的进出，这是一个永远没有头尾的话题。”毫无疑问，火箭的确很有竞争力，他们很长一段时间都是西南赛区的头名，在伤病满营的情况下，他们现在实际上做得还不错。因为那波22连胜，上赛季的火箭是最两人称奇的球队之一。而且，在后10场胜利中，球队中并没有姚明。除了1971-1972赛季湖人狂飙33连胜，火箭是历史上连胜场次最长的球队。但这些又代表了什么呢？
person: 麦蒂,姚明,阿泰斯特,里克-阿德尔曼
en: Experts: The rocket has three major security risks. It will be a miracle that Yao Ming is no longer injured. Sina Sports News reported on December 5, Beijing time. According to the existing information, it is carefully and responsibly predicted that the Houston Rockets will end this regular season as the fifth in the West. After the Rockets' offseason harvest Ron Artest, this forecast is quite different from those inflated remarks. You know, some so-called experts think this team can make it to the finals. The current rocket seems to be plagued by a problem, that is, injury. As early as during the training camp of the Rockets, it was reported that after experiencing the first operation of his career, McGrady's knee was still very painful. McGrady has been exempt from war for this problem in the past four games. Moreover, according to the latest news, this seven-time All Star player will not appear on the court in the next three weeks. In the past three seasons, McGrady has missed 62 games in total. There is no need to hide that McGrady is the most talented basketball player of his generation. However, at the age of 29 - perhaps, you will be surprised that he is so young. After 11 NBA seasons, he has been injured. When McGrady entered the league as a high school student at the age of 18, who would have thought that he would be what he is today in 11 years. In addition to McGrady's knee injury, Yao Ming and Artest, the other two main players of the Rockets, also have their own troubles. The former is his foot and the latter is his head. The prospects of the Rockets will not be optimistic if any one of them "attacks". In the past three years, Yao Ming has missed 86 games due to injuries in different parts. As a 7-foot 6-inch 310 pound center, Yao Ming's body is under unimaginable pressure from ordinary people when he runs back and forth and jumps constantly. Last season, Yao Ming missed 35 games due to a navicular fracture at the time when the Rockets needed him most, and his season was lost. Not long after the operation, Yao Ming was overloaded and played on behalf of his motherland in the Beijing Olympic Games. So, if Yao Ming can be full-time this season, it will be a miracle. Let's talk about Artest. It must be admitted that Artest is not short of talent. He can play a dominant role on both sides of the attack and defense. However, in his career, he sometimes gets into trouble such as fighting, animal abuse, and asking for leave for the sake of publicizing records. The combination of these three factors, namely McGrady's knee, Yao Ming's foot and Artest's head, makes the Rockets the most worrying team in the league. All the guys who predict that the Rockets have the ability to compete for the championship will not forget to add a precondition - if Yao Miao can keep healthy, if Artest stops causing trouble. When asked about the health of the team, Rick Adelman, the head coach of the Rockets, said: "I'd like to ask you, 'Which players will I have tomorrow (game and training)?' As for the flow of players, it is an endless topic." There is no doubt that the Rockets are indeed very competitive. For a long time, they were the top of the Southwest Division. At present, they are actually doing well in the case of a lot of injuries. Because of that 22-game winning streak, last season's Rockets was one of the most amazing teams. Moreover, Yao Ming was not in the team in the last 10 victories. In addition to the Lakers' 33 consecutive victories in the 1971-1972 season, the Rockets are the team with the longest consecutive victories in history. But what does that mean?

content: 两岁娃一脚将茶几踢出缺口消费者当众怒砸“纸”家具欢欢喜喜搬进新家，却不想买回的“实木茶几”竟被2岁半的孩子一脚就踢出一个缺口来。仔细一看，才发现茶几表层薄薄的木皮下面竟全是蜂窝纸板。昨日，家住恒大名都的李先生和向先生气愤地来到万家丽路上某知名家居卖场，向商家讨个说法。消费者几锤下去砸开“纸”家具李先生和向先生同住恒大名都小区，是邻居。今年3月，他们一起在这家家居卖场的左右布艺沙发系列门店花25700元买回了两套沙发、两个茶几和两台电视柜。向先生一次性就支付了全款。“我之所以一次性付款，看中的就是‘左右’这个品牌，还有当时专柜工作人员宣称茶几和电视柜都是全实木的。”向先生表示。不过，让人意想不到的是，10月9日，李先生2岁半的孩子在家里玩耍时，不慎一脚踢到茶几上将其踢出一个口子。李先生仔细检查这个缺口，才发现木皮下面是一些硬纸片。昨日下午4时许，气愤的李先生和向先生将茶几和电视柜搬到这家家居卖场前坪，当众砸开。几锤下去再用力一拉，家具就被分成几片。里面不是木头，而是塞满了蜂窝状的硬纸板。商家蜂窝纸是新工艺，从未承诺是实木随后，记者跟随芙蓉区东屯渡工商所工作人员和向先生、李先生一起来到左右布艺沙发系列门店。店内销售人员对“口头承诺是实木家具”一说给予了否认，门店负责人也表示，他们从未向消费者承诺卖出的是实木家具，他们也并不销售实木家具。记者在现场仔细查看发现，店内确实没有实木家具的宣传，商品价目表上也没有标注其产品用的什么材质。那么，即便不是实木家具，用纸板做家具又是符合规定的吗？门店负责人随后拿出一叠证明产品合格的材料，并声称向先生和李先生购买的沙发是左右品牌，但茶几和电视柜不是左右牌的，而是他们的合作伙伴“文化龙”家具，该家具在宣传图册上明确标示是实木皮与高密度板制作而成，是两位消费者没有注意。“用蜂窝纸制作家具是业内很多家具厂商都在使用的方式，蜂窝纸节能环保，也是符合国家有关标准的。”这位负责人同时表示。工商部门要在合同上注明家具材质在仔细查看被消费者砸坏的家具，并向买卖双方了解情况后，芙蓉区东屯渡工商所所长陈钦表示，还需要进一步调查了解蜂窝纸工艺是不是符合相关国家标准和质量要求，同时要详细了解商品生产的具体流程。“目前暂不能确定左右沙发是否存在欺诈消费者的行为，工商部门将对此事展开调查。”
en: A two-year-old child kicked a gap in the coffee table, and the consumer angrily smashed the "paper" furniture. He moved into a new house happily, but he didn't want the "solid wood coffee table" to be kicked into a gap by a two and a half year old child. Looking carefully, I found that there was a honeycomb cardboard under the thin wood skin of the coffee table. Yesterday, Mr. Li and Mr. Xiang, who live in Evergrande Mingdu, came angrily to a well-known home store on Wanjialilu Road to ask the merchant for an explanation. Consumers hammer and hammer to open the "paper" furniture. Mr. Li and Mr. Xiang live in the Evergrande Mingdu Community, and they are neighbors. In March this year, they spent 25700 yuan to buy two sets of sofas, two coffee tables and two TV cabinets in the store of Huoyou Bouyei Sofa Series in this home store. Mr. Xiang paid the full amount at one time. "The reason why I paid in one payment is that I like the 'Left and Right' brand, and the counter staff claimed that the coffee table and TV cabinet were all solid wood." Mr. Xiang said. However, unexpectedly, on October 9, Mr. Li's 2.5 year old child kicked a hole in the coffee table while playing at home. Mr. Li carefully examined the gap and found that there were some hard paper chips under the wooden skin. At about 4:00 pm yesterday, the angry Mr. Li and Mr. Xiang moved the coffee table and TV cabinet to the front of the home store and smashed them in public. With a few hammers and a hard pull, the furniture was divided into several pieces. It's not wood inside, but it's full of honeycomb cardboard. The merchant's honeycomb paper is a new technology, and it has never promised to be solid wood. Later, the reporter followed the staff of Dongtundu, Furong District, and Mr. Xiang and Mr. Li to the left and right cloth sofa series stores. The sales staff in the store denied that "oral commitment is solid wood furniture", and the store manager also said that they never promised consumers to sell solid wood furniture, and they do not sell solid wood furniture. The reporter found on the spot that there was no publicity of solid wood furniture in the store, and there was no indication of what material its products were used on the price list. Then, even if it is not solid wood furniture, is it legal to use cardboard for furniture? The store manager then took out a pile of materials to prove that the product was qualified, and claimed that the sofa purchased by Mr. Xiang and Mr. Li was the left and right brand, but the coffee table and TV cabinet were not the left and right brand, but their partner "Culture Dragon" furniture, which was clearly marked on the promotional brochure as being made of solid wood skin and high density board, but the two consumers did not notice. "The use of honeycomb paper to make furniture is a way used by many furniture manufacturers in the industry. Honeycomb paper is energy saving and environment friendly, and it also meets the relevant national standards." The responsible person also said. The industrial and commercial department shall indicate the furniture material in the contract. After carefully examining the furniture smashed by the consumer and learning about the situation from both buyers and sellers, Chen Qin, Director of Dongtundu Industrial and Commercial Office of Furong District, said that we need to further investigate whether the honeycomb paper process meets the relevant national standards and quality requirements, and at the same time, we need to learn about the specific process of commodity production in detail. "At present, it is not yet clear whether the left and right sofas have defrauded consumers. The industrial and commercial department will investigate this matter."

content: 完美组建新运营部门原媒体中心总经理负责DoNews9月19日消息(记者宋鹏展)据知情人士透露，完美时空公司日前新组建了游戏运营五部，并宣布由原媒体中心总经理王?担任总经理。此前，完美公司在北京共有4个运营部，目前有关新运营部门的职责等细节不详。(完)附：完美时空内部邮件通知大家好：根据工作需要，原平台本部媒体中心总经理王?调至游戏本部运营五部担任总经理职务。王?同学，2005年11月加入完美，历任媒介推广部总监、媒体中心总经理等职务，为媒体中心的发展做出了重要贡献。加入完美之前，曾任职于汉娃娃软件、中广亚、日月光华软件，历任媒介、品牌主管等职位。运营总部2010年9月17日
en: Perfect World News on September 19 (Reporter Song Pengzhan) According to informed sources, Perfect World recently set up a new game operation department, and announced that Wang?, the former general manager of the Media Center, would serve as the general manager. Previously, Perfect Company had a total of 4 operation departments in Beijing, and the details of the responsibilities of the new operation department were not specified. (end) Attached: Perfect Space Time Internal Mail Hello everyone: According to the needs of work, Wang?, the former General Manager of the Media Center of the Platform Headquarters, was transferred to the Game Department of the Headquarters to serve as the General Manager. Wang?, who joined Perfect in November 2005, served as the Director of the Media Promotion Department, the General Manager of the Media Center, and made important contributions to the development of the Media Center. Prior to joining Perfect, he worked in Han Wa Wa Software, China Guangya, and Guanghua Software, serving as media director, brand director and other positions. Headquarters of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology on September 17, 2010

content: 苹果MBP机皇领衔12月新品笔记本推荐本周五，又到了一年一度的圣诞节，同时我们也将迎来2010年元旦小长假。圣诞节送礼本来是西方国家的习俗，不过在全球化的今天，中国内地也流行起这个节日来——至少在编辑工作的这个网站就有圣诞节送礼的习惯。如果经济条件允许的话，圣诞节送礼越贵重越好，送个笔记本什么的也不稀罕。我们今天要介绍的就是在圣诞节前夕上市的新品笔记本，这其中最受关注的是一款17英寸、配置超高的苹果MacBookPro笔记本；当然，如果你的预算有限也可以选择其它品牌价廉物美的产品：推荐产品：联想IdeaPadY450A-TSI(NBA兄弟球星版)笔记本参考价格：5999元这款笔记本的顶盖上湖人队的三大球星：科比、阿泰斯特、加索尔各自拿着一个篮球作投篮、护球、运球状，湖人队的队标设计在右下方，背景是竖排状NBA的LOGO。球场需要个人英雄主义，更依仗团队精诚合作，兄弟齐心铸就辉煌战绩。编辑点评：兄弟球星版笔记本对于NBA球迷来说，绝对是不错的收藏品；作为美国流行文化的一种，全球各地的NBA球迷数量还是非常庞大的。当然，这款笔记本的配置、性能都是非常出色的，5999元的官方报价也不太高，实际在市场上购买应该还有不少优惠。联想IdeaPadY450A-TSI(NBA兄弟球星版)笔记本[参考价格]5999元[推荐商家]联想专卖店[报价查询]笔记本电脑产品报价lenovo（联想）产品报价推荐产品：戴尔Vostro成就V13(S521288CN)笔记本参考价格：5499元戴尔Vostro成就V13(S521288CN)笔记本采用铝合金机身、面板采用拉丝工艺，强化锌转轴可提供超强的耐用性；这款笔记本的厚度仅为16.5毫米，含电池的重量仅有1.6千克。拥有2个USB2.0接口，其中一个兼容E-SATA，RJ45接口、麦克风、耳机以及ExpressCard、5合1读卡器。促销信息：1年下一工作日上门服务、诺顿网络安全特警15个月编辑点评：新上市的戴尔Vostro成就V13(S521288CN)笔记本轻薄、便携，并且采用了金属材质的机身，给人的感觉十分高档。同时，这款的配置——迅驰2处理器技术、500GB硬盘、Windows7操作系统也足够满足商务人士使用。感兴趣的朋友可以拨打戴尔免费咨询电话：800-858-2339（座机）/400-884-9428（手机）。>>点击进入戴尔特价专区<<戴尔Vostro成就V13(S521288CN)笔记本[参考售价]5499元[网上订购]>>点击进入戴尔特价专区<<[联系电话]800-858-2339（座机）/400-884-9428（手机）[订购方法]点击进入查看推荐产品：神舟优雅HP540笔记本参考价格：3298元新品优雅HP540延续优雅系列膜内漾印外观，具有钢琴烤漆工艺般的镜面效果，衬托出纹理图案的栩栩如生。除了在视觉方面不俗表现以外，这种处理方式在抗磨抗划伤方面更加出色。这款采用最新高主频T4400处理器配合X4500集成显卡的笔记本报价为3298元，相比同价位的产品无论是外观还是配置都有一定的优势，适合入门级用户选购。欲享受更多超值优惠，请即刻拨打神舟电脑免费订购电话：800-999-6856/800-999-6859（固定电话）；400-886-2668/400-886-7668（手机用户）；更多信息，请点击神舟电脑网上商城http://shop.hasee.com，轻松享受网上支付、送货上门、定制升级等个性化服务！推荐产品：惠普ProBook4411s(VX246PA)笔记本参考价格：5249元在外观方面，惠普ProBook4411s(VX246PA)为红色外形设计，同时机身表面采用亮丽的钢琴烤漆工艺，时尚大方，屏幕方面采用了16:9的14英寸高清宽屏显示屏，分辨率为1366×768，色彩艳丽，显示效果出众，创新的宽大键盘设计，不仅使操作更加舒适，也便于清理，屏幕上方内置了200万像素高感光摄像头，方便商务办公需要，整机尺寸338×246.4×30.7mm，重约2.3公斤，便携性良好。促销信息：含税，送包，送鼠标，鼠标垫。编辑点评：惠普ProBook4411s（VX246PA）在外观方面相比以往惠普商务本有所突破，时尚俊朗的外观非常醒目。另外，配置方面，该机采用T6570双核处理器，搭配HD4330独显、320GB7200转硬盘，整机性能十分均衡。推荐产品：东芝SatelliteL536笔记本参考价格：4999元东芝SatelliteL536笔记本机身A面和C面都采用膜内转印技术，天籁黑色的面板上布满水漾纹，同时加强了笔记本表面的抗磨性；采用14英寸LED背光宽屏，分辨率为1366×768，屏幕上边框内置一枚支持人脸识别功能的摄像头；配备USB2.0/e-SATA、多媒体读卡器等接口。编辑点评：东芝SatelliteL536笔记本采用了高主频的奔腾双核T4400处理器以及ATIMobilityRadeonHD4570独立显卡，整机配置合理、性能均衡、足以满足大部分娱乐需求，4999元的价格也颇具性价比。推荐产品：三星Q318-DS0G笔记本参考价格：6988元三星Q318-DS0G笔记本采用黑色的钢琴烤漆机身、银色的LOGO、机身侧边采用了金属条装饰；银色的转轴，巧妙的将B面和C面连接起来；键盘方面采用银离子防菌技术小卵石键盘，触控板上的那圈银色边线，使整个机身的黑白两色遥相呼应。三星Q318-DS0G笔记本采用奔腾双核T4400处理器，英特尔PM45主板芯片组，蓝牙2.1模块、802.11b/g无线局域网模块；拥有2G内存、500GB硬盘、吸入式DVD刻录光驱；NVIDIAGeForceG105M独立显卡；13.4英寸LED背光屏，内置一枚130万像素摄像头；预装DOS操作系统。编辑点评：三星Q318-DS0G笔记本外观轻薄时尚，奔腾双核T4400、G105M独立显卡以及500GB硬盘的配置性能足够。不足之处是钢琴烤漆容易留下指纹，6988元的官方报价也偏贵。三星Q318-DS0G笔记本[参考价格]6988元[推荐商家]三星专卖店[报价查询]笔记本电脑产品报价Samsung（三星）产品报价推荐产品：索尼X116KC/B笔记本参考价格：7999元促销信息：另加88元送索尼原装包编辑点评：时尚典雅，薄如蝉翼是对索尼这款X116KC/B笔记本电脑最贴切的描述，同时高强度的碳纤维外壳也使得这款轻薄本的安全系数大幅提高，此外Win7的操作系统也会给您带来全新的操作体验。不过搭配的集成显卡也让您不会有太震撼的娱乐体验。推荐产品：苹果MacBookPro(MC226CH/A)笔记本参考价格：17860元苹果MacBookPro(MC226CH/A)笔记本采用精密的一体成型铝合金机身，外形出众且坚实耐用，是目前苹果旗下体积最大的笔记本：屏幕为17英寸，分辨率更是达到了1920×1200，超越了1080P高清的级别。编辑点评：这款高配的苹果MacBookPro(MC226CH/A)笔记本在处理器和硬盘方面有所提升，还配备了17英寸高分辨率的大屏幕，适合习惯用苹果本本作图的时尚设计师们，苹果的精湛工艺堪称现代艺术品。
en: Apple MBP's new notebook recommendation for the King of Machines in December. This Friday, it is also the New Year's Day holiday of 2010. Giving gifts on Christmas Day is a custom in Western countries. However, in today's globalized world, the Chinese mainland has also become popular with this festival - at least the website where the editor works has the habit of giving gifts on Christmas Day. If the economic conditions permit, the more expensive the Christmas gift is, the better. It is not uncommon to give a notebook. What we are going to introduce today is the new notebook launched on the eve of Christmas. The most popular one is a 17 inch Apple MacBookPro notebook with ultra high configuration; Of course, if your budget is limited, you can also choose other brands of high-quality and inexpensive products: Lenovo IdeaPadY450A-TSI (NBA Brothers Star Edition) notebook Reference Price: 5999 yuan. The top cover of this notebook has three Lakers' superstars: Kobe, Artest and Gasol, each with a basketball in their hands for shooting, protecting the ball and dribbling. The Lakers' logo is designed in the lower right corner, and the background is the NBA logo in vertical row. The basketball court requires personal heroism and relies more on team cooperation. Brothers can work together to create glorious achievements. Editor's comment: The NBA fans' brother star version notebook is definitely a good collection; As a kind of American popular culture, the number of NBA fans around the world is still very large. Of course, the configuration and performance of this notebook are very excellent, and the official price of 5999 yuan is not too high. There should be a lot of discounts in the market. It has two USB2.0 interfaces, one of which is compatible with E-SATA, RJ45 interface, microphone, headphones and ExpressCard, and a 5-in-1 card reader. At the same time, the configuration of this - Centrino 2 processor technology, 500GB hard disk and Windows7 operating system - is enough to meet the needs of business people.
