content: 摩托罗拉XOOM国内正式发布售价4999元新浪数码讯3月31日下午消息，摩托罗拉移动技术今天正式发布了平板电脑产品摩托罗拉XOOM——全球首款运行谷歌Android3.0Honeycomb操作系统的移动终端产品。摩托罗拉XOOM配置了1GHz的双核处理器、WLAN无线功能及10.1英寸宽屏幕高清显示屏。摩托罗拉XOOM将在2011年第二季度正式上市，售价4999元。摩托罗拉XOOM的WiFi版本MZ606将首先于2011年第二季度在全国各大摩托罗拉授权零售商店销售，售价4999元，WCDMA3G版本MZ601也将于不久后上市。“摩托罗拉XOOM不仅是我们所推出的首款平板电脑，更是第一款配备了专为平板电脑设计的Android3.0系统的移动终端。”摩托罗拉移动技术公司资深副总裁兼大中华区总裁孟?先生表示，“摩托罗拉XOOM在今年美国CES首次登场后只用了短短三个月的时间就能在中国市场推出，表明了摩托罗拉移动技术对未来中国市场发展的决心和信心。我们非常高兴能为中国消费者带来前所未有的真正平板电脑体验。”摩托罗拉XOOM附带闪光灯的500万像素后置摄像头可以录制高清视频，而10.1英寸的高清显示屏不仅将让用户可以随时查看和编辑照片或视频，更允许用户在优秀的扩展性支持下通过HDMI接口将设备内容显示在任何高清电视机之上；此外，200万像素的前置摄像头还可以让用户与朋友和家人进行视频通话或将自拍视频上传到网络之上；值得一提的是，摩托罗拉XOOM所配置的大容量电池能支持长达10小时的视频播放时间，而充电时间仅需同类产品的一半。Android3.0Honeycomb操作系统优化了许多Android受欢迎功能的用户体验，如桌面插件、多任务处理、网页浏览、通知和自定义功能等最新的创新移动功能。摩托罗拉XOOM作为首款运行Android3.0系统的移动终端，摩托罗拉正积极与MOTODEV生态系统的开发者合作，为摩托罗拉XOOM提供世界一流的用户体验。同时，摩托罗拉的智件园应用程序商店也将提供专为平板电脑设计的优化版本，让摩托罗拉XOOM用户可便捷地搜索、下载和体验免费及付费的应用程序。此外，摩托罗拉XOOM还可以使用及浏览数以百万计由AdobeTMFlashTM播放器所驱动的网络应用程序和网页，成为业内首款真正实现全页面浏览和完美Flash技术支持的平板电脑。主要功能和参数•高清(1280x800)10.1英寸宽屏(16:10)显示屏，非常适合以横屏模式观看高清视频，同时在纵向模式下让双手在屏幕上打字更为便捷。•体积最小的10.1英寸平板电脑，仍比同类产品多提供51%以上的视频选择。•独一无二的坞站设备可向电视实现高清内容输出，并可方便地连接鼠标和键盘等电脑配件。摩托罗拉智能配件为提升用户通过XOOM充分享受精彩的移动体验，摩托罗拉移动技术还提供如下平板电脑配件：•一个标准型坞站，可以在充电的时候，通过外部扬声器欣赏视频或听音乐；•一个高清扬声器坞站，可以通过HDMI连接线直接将高清内容传输到电视上，或通过两个内置扬声器聆听音乐-不需要外接扬声器；•一个带有Android专用快捷键的蓝牙键盘。
en: Motorola XOOM was officially released in China for 4999 yuan Sina Digital News on the afternoon of March 31. Motorola Mobility today officially released the Motorola XOOM tablet computer - the world's first mobile terminal product running Google Android3.0Honeycomb operating system. Motorola XOOM is equipped with a dual core processor of 1GHz, WLAN wireless function and a 10.1 inch wide screen HD display. Motorola XOOM will be officially launched in the second quarter of 2011, priced at 4999 yuan. The WiFi version MZ606 of Motorola XOOM will be first sold in major Motorola authorized retail stores across the country in the second quarter of 2011, at a price of 4999 yuan. The WCDMA3G version MZ601 will also be launched soon. "Motorola XOOM is not only the first tablet computer we launched, but also the first mobile terminal equipped with the Android3.0 system designed for tablet computers." Said Mr. Meng?, President of Motorola Mobility and President of Greater China. "Motorola XOOM can be launched in the Chinese market in just three months after its first appearance at CES in the United States this year, which shows Motorola's determination and confidence in the future development of the Chinese market. We are very pleased to bring Chinese consumers an unprecedented true tablet computer experience." The 5 million pixel rear camera of Motorola XOOM with flash can record HD video, while the 10.1 inch HD display screen will not only allow users to view and edit photos or videos at any time, but also allow users to display device content on any HD television via the HDMI interface under excellent scalability support; In addition, the 2 million pixel front camera can also allow users to make video calls with friends and family or upload self portrait videos to the Internet; It is worth mentioning that the large capacity battery configured by Motorola XOOM can support up to 10 hours of video playback, and the charging time is only half of the同类 product. The Android3.0Honeycomb operating system optimizes the user experience of many popular Android features, such as desktop widgets, multitasking, web browsing, notifications and the latest innovative mobile features such as customization. Motorola XOOM, as the first mobile terminal running the Android3.0 system, Motorola is actively cooperating with the developers of the MOTODEV ecosystem to provide a world-class user experience for Motorola XOOM. At the same time, Motorola's Smart Garden App Store will also provide an optimized version designed for tablet computers, allowing Motorola XOOM users to conveniently search, download and experience free and paid applications. In addition, Motorola XOOM can also use and browse millions of network applications and web pages driven by AdobeTMFlashTM player, becoming the first tablet computer in the industry that can truly achieve full page browsing and perfect Flash technology support. Main functions and parameters • HD (1280x800) 10.1 inch widescreen (16:10) display, very suitable for watching HD video in landscape mode, and more convenient for typing with both hands on the screen in portrait mode. • The smallest 10.1 inch tablet computer still provides more than 51% video options than similar products. • The unique dock device can output HD content to the TV and can be conveniently connected with computer accessories such as mouse and keyboard. Motorola Intelligent Accessories In order to enhance users' wonderful mobile experience through XOOM, Motorola Mobility also provides the following tablet accessories: · A standard dock, when charging, can enjoy videos or listen to music through external speakers; · An HD speaker docking station can transmit HD content directly to the TV via an HDMI cable, or listen to music via two built-in speakers - no external speakers are required; · A Bluetooth keyboard with Android dedicated shortcut keys.

content: 阿巴斯呼吁以色列对加沙地带军事行动不要升级新华网拉姆安拉12月22日电(记者赵悦杨媛媛)巴勒斯坦民族权力机构主席阿巴斯22日对以色列近来连续轰炸加沙地带的做法发出警告，呼吁以对加沙地带的军事行动不要升级。阿巴斯是在会见欧盟驻巴勒斯坦地区代表克里斯蒂安·贝尔热时作上述表示的。他说，以色列对加沙地带采取任何新的军事行动都会对和平进程造成严重影响，将导致国际社会为巴以和平所付出的努力遭受失败。阿巴斯向欧盟代表介绍了以色列拒绝在被占领土上停建犹太人定居点后巴以局势的最新发展，并呼吁欧盟在巴以和平进程中发挥更多作用。近日，以色列派遣战机及坦克轰炸加沙地带的军事行动增多，主要打击控制着加沙地带的巴勒斯坦伊斯兰抵抗运动(哈马斯)的军事据点等目标。在从20日深夜至21日晚不到24小时的时间内，以色列战机共对加沙地带发动10次轰炸，造成6名巴勒斯坦人受伤。以军方称，这是对加沙地带武装人员向以色列发射火箭弹的回应。近来，以军与加沙地带武装人员冲突频发。据以色列军方统计，今年双方已发生约100起冲突，包括双方交火、发射火箭弹和定点空袭等。2008年12月27日至2009年1月18日，以色列以阻止加沙地带武装人员向以发射火箭弹为由，对加沙地带发动了代号为“铸铅行动”的大规模军事打击，造成1400多名巴勒斯坦人丧生、5500多人受伤。
person: 赵悦,贝尔热,杨媛媛,阿巴斯
en: Abbas called on Israel not to upgrade the military operation in the Gaza Strip Xinhua News Agency, Ramallah, December 22 (Reporter Zhao Yue, Yang Yuan Yuan) Palestinian President Abbas warned on the 22nd that Israel's continuous bombing of the Gaza Strip recently, and called on Israel not to upgrade the military operation in the Gaza Strip. Abbas made the above remarks when he met Christian Berger, the representative of the EU in the Palestinian area. He said that any new military action of Israel in the Gaza Strip would have a serious impact on the peace process, which would lead to the failure of the efforts made by the international community for peace in Palestine and Israel. Abbas introduced the latest developments in the situation in Palestine and Israel to the EU representative after Israel refused to stop building Jewish settlements in the occupied territories, and called on the EU to play a greater role in the peace process between Palestine and Israel. In recent days, Israel has increased its military operations of sending fighters and tanks to bomb the Gaza Strip, mainly targeting military strongholds and other targets controlled by the Palestinian Islamic Resistance Movement (Hamas) in the Gaza Strip. In less than 24 hours from the night of the 20th to the night of the 21st, Israeli fighters launched 10 bombings on the Gaza Strip, injuring six Palestinians. The Israeli military said it was in response to the rocket launch by armed personnel in the Gaza Strip to Israel. In recent days, the conflict between the Israeli army and the armed personnel in the Gaza Strip has occurred frequently. According to the statistics of the Israeli military, the two sides have had about 100 conflicts this year, including firing, rocket launching and定点air raids. From December 27, 2008 to January 18, 2009, Israel launched a large-scale military strike codenamed "Cast Lead Operation" in the Gaza Strip in order to prevent the armed personnel in the Gaza Strip from launching rockets to Israel, causing more than 1400 Palestinian deaths and more than 5500 injuries.

content: 俄火灾增至454场10.7万多公顷土地被烧中新网5月23日电据俄塔社报道，至当地时间22日的短短一天内，俄罗斯火灾波及面积又新增了11500公顷。据俄罗斯紧急救援部22日消息称，雅库特(Yakutia)、阿穆尔地区(Amur)、克拉斯诺雅茨克(Krasnoyarsk)、和汉特-曼西自治区(Khanty-MansiAutonomousDistrict)火灾爆发频率最高。据称，迄今为止，俄罗斯一共发生了454场火灾，波及面积达10.7万多公顷，其中270场已被扑灭，但还有184处大火在8.7万多公顷的土地上燃烧着。火灾可能还将继续蔓延，危害到布里亚特(Buryatia)、哈巴罗菲斯克(Khabarovsk)等更多的地方。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: The Russian fire increased to 454, with more than 107000 hectares of land burned. chinanews. com, May 23- According to the report of R塔 snews Agency, in the short one day until the local time of the 22nd, the Russian fire spread area increased by another 11500 hectares. According to the news from the Russian Emergency Rescue Department on the 22nd, Yakutia (Yakutia), Amur (Amur), Krasnoyarsk (Krasnoyarsk), and Khanty Mansi Autonomous District (Khanty Mansi Autonomous District) have the highest frequency of fire outbreaks. It is reported that so far, a total of 454 fires have occurred in Russia, covering an area of more than 107000 hectares, including 270 fires that have been put out, but 184 fires are still burning on 87000 hectares of land. The fire may continue to spread, endangering more places such as Buryatia (Buryatia) and Khabarovsk (Khabarovsk). Welcome to make comments I want to comment

content: 《肉中刺》重庆热拍斯琴高娃宋春丽破不和传闻本报讯(记者刘咏戈)近日，由俞钟执导，孙逊、斯琴高娃、宋春丽等人主演的谍战戏《肉中刺》在重庆拍摄。昨日，记者驱车来到剧组拍摄地渝北龙兴古镇，斯琴高娃正在拍摄来渝后的第一场戏，正是与宋春丽的对手戏。之前传闻两人在拍摄电视剧《娘》后闹翻，甚至一度拒绝同台演出。但昨日面对记者，两人不仅分吃零食还亲密地探讨剧本，大秀姐妹情。斯琴高娃打封闭拍戏斯琴高娃在剧中饰演国民党一位高官的母亲，身份尊崇，因有亲共行为而遭到保密局特务的暗杀。而宋春丽则饰演斯琴高娃的好姐妹，身份是地下党的副书记。记者在现场看到，两人的戏份是边包饺子边闲话家常，有亲戚带人来看家里的古董。但就这一场戏反复拍了一下午，刚刚赶到重庆的斯琴高娃明显很疲惫，在拍摄间歇还拿出一个药箱，倒出好几种药服用，斯琴高娃苦笑着告诉记者，她是打着封闭坚持演戏的：“我腿脚不好是老毛病了，这几天还感冒了，嗓子也不好。来的时候刚打的封闭，针头直接打进肘部骨头了，否则根本不能坚持。”一旁的宋春丽则关切地拿出一袋话梅，“吃吃这个吧，提神还润喉。”于是两人一边同吃话梅一边聊起了各自身体状况。不是姐妹胜似姐妹之前《娘》剧热播荧屏的时候，曾有媒体披露两大主演宋春丽跟斯琴高娃严重不和，甚至在参加某档节目录制时拒绝同台。宋春丽曾对此作出过澄清，但斯琴高娃从未对此做出回应。昨日再次同场飚戏，斯琴高娃坦言很过瘾：“我不想回应那些无聊的报道，越说越错，你们也看到了，我们没有什么飙不飙戏，一切都很自然。在戏外，我们无话不谈，都这把年纪了，我们都很珍惜彼此的感情。要说我们不和的，请他来现场看看。”言罢，斯琴高娃拿着剧本与宋春丽探讨起来，期间有说有笑。
person: 刘咏戈,俞钟,斯琴高娃,孙逊,宋春丽
en: "The Thorn in the Flesh" is a hot shot in Chongqing. S琴 Gao and Song Chunli break the news that I (Reporter Liu Yongge) recently, the spy drama "The Thorn in the Flesh" directed by Yu Zhong and starring Sun Xun, S琴 Gao, Song Chunli and others is being shot in Chongqing. Yesterday, the reporter drove to Longxing Ancient Town in Yubei, where S琴 Gao was shooting his first play after coming to Chongqing, which was exactly the opposite of Song Chunli. Previously, it was rumored that the two broke up after shooting the TV drama "Mother", and even refused to perform on the same stage for a time. But yesterday,面对the reporter, the two not only shared snacks but also discussed the script intimately, showing sisterhood. S琴 Gao plays a closed play in which S琴 Gao plays the mother of a high-ranking Nationalist official in the play, who is respected because of her pro communal behavior and is assassinated by the special agents of the Confidential Bureau. Song Chunli plays the good sister of S琴 Gao, whose identity is the deputy secretary of the underground party. The reporter saw at the scene that their play was to have dumplings while chatting. Relatives brought people to see the antiques at home. But this play was shot for an afternoon. S琴 Gao, who had just arrived in Chongqing, was obviously very tired. During the shooting, he also took out a medicine box and took several medicines. S琴 Gao smiled bitterly at the reporter and said, "I have been playing a closed play because my legs and feet are not good. I have a cold these days and my throat is not good. When I came, I had just got a closed hand. The needle was directly injected into the elbow bone, otherwise I could not stick to it." Song Chunli, on the other side, took out a bag of loquat, "Eat this, it can refresh your mind and moisturize your throat." So the two talked about their physical condition while eating loquat. When the drama "Mother" was popular on the screen before, the media revealed that Song Chunli and S琴 Gao were seriously inharmonious, and even refused to share the stage when participating in the recording of a program. Song Chunli has made a clarification on this, but S琴 Gao has never responded. Yesterday, once again, S琴 Gao frankly said, "I don't want to respond to those boring reports. The more you say, the worse. You can see that we have nothing to do with the play. Everything is very natural. Outside the play, we have nothing to talk about. We are all at this age, and we all cherish each other's feelings. If you say we are not in harmony, please let him come to the scene." After that, S琴 Gao took the script to discuss with Song Chunli, and there was a lot of talk and laughter during the process.

content: 广角防抖卡片机佳能IXUS870仅2150元作者：陈亮【北京行情】佳能IXUS870IS(资料报价图片论坛)是一款拥有千万像素成像能力，4倍光学变焦带28mm广角防抖镜头的卡片式数码相机。今天笔者在市场上了解到，IXUS870IS的最新价格已经调整至2150元。佳能IXUS870IS机身采用曲线型设计，呈现更加轻薄的感觉，与上一代产品相比，机身最薄处厚度减小了2.9毫米，整体厚度减少了2.3毫米。相机表面镀有三重保护涂层，不易造成划痕。镜头环与机身色彩相互搭配，使其显得更加时尚和优雅。另外在细节设计上也充分为用户考虑，除增大了变焦杆和控制键外，机身背面还特别设计了一个拇指放置区，使握持照相机变得更加容易。佳能IXUS870IS有银色和金色两种颜色可供选择。在性能上IXUS870IS配备新升级的DIGIC4影像处理器，在图像数据处理的速度和精度上有了明显的提升。作为IXUS860IS的升级产品，IXUS870IS继续沿用了其广受好评的28毫米广角设计，非常适合拍摄风光和建筑。在此基础上，它拥有4倍IS光学变焦防抖镜头、1000万有效像素CCD和23万像素3.0英寸“晶炫II”LCD显示屏。产品性能和配置上的全面升级，将带给用户全新的感受。编辑点评：作为IXUS860IS的升级产品，IXUS870IS继续沿用了其广受好评的28毫米广角设计，非常适合拍摄风光和建筑。在机身外形和做工上，也要比IXUS860IS有了更好的改进佳能IXUS870IS[参考价格]2150元[商家地址]中关村E世界财富中心A座909，电话：010-82673440、82675463。
en: The Canon IXUS870 wide-angle anti-shake card camera is only 2150 yuan. Author: Chen Liang [Beijing market] Canon IXUS870IS (data quotation picture forum) is a card digital camera with 10 million pixel imaging capability and 4x optical zoom with 28mm wide-angle anti-shake lens. Today, the author learned on the market that the latest price of IXUS870IS has been adjusted to 2150 yuan. Canon IXUS870IS camera body adopts curved design, which presents a thinner feeling. Compared with the previous generation, the thickness of the thinnest part of the camera body is reduced by 2.9mm and the overall thickness is reduced by 2.3mm. The surface of the camera is plated with three protection coatings, which is not easy to cause scratches. The lens ring is matched with the body color, making it look more fashionable and elegant. In addition, full consideration is also given to users in detail design. In addition to increasing the zoom lever and control key, a special thumb placement area is designed on the back of the fuselage, which makes it easier to hold the camera. Canon IXUS870IS is available in two colors: silver and gold. In terms of performance, the IXUS870IS is equipped with the newly upgraded DIGIC4 image processor, which has significantly improved the speed and accuracy of image data processing. As an upgraded product of IXUS860IS, IXUS870IS continues to use its widely praised 28mm wide-angle design, which is very suitable for shooting scenery and buildings. On this basis, it has a 4x IS optical anti-shake lens, 10 million effective pixel CCD and a 3.0-inch "Crystal Xuan II" LCD display with 230000 pixels. The comprehensive upgrade of product performance and configuration will bring users a new experience. Editor's comment: As an upgraded product of IXUS860IS, IXUS870IS continues to use its 28mm wide-angle design, which is widely praised, and is very suitable for shooting scenery and buildings. In terms of body shape and workmanship, it is also better than IXUS860IS. Canon IXUS870IS [reference price] 2150 yuan [business address] Room 909, Building A, E World Wealth Center, Zhongguancun, Tel: 010-82673440, 82675463.

content: 网通固话用户半年流失149万本地通话费收入90.72亿元，同比降11.8%本报讯(记者赵谨)昨天，中国网通(00906.HK)在香港公布上半年业绩。财报显示，今年上半年网通总营收411.25亿元，其中包括初装费摊销收入5.05亿元，同比下降0.15%。同时，上半年网通净利润则达到58.77亿元，与2007年同期相比增长11.9%，网通表示这主要受到税率变化与非现金交易收益等因素的影响。2008年上半年网通的传统固话业务受到严峻挑战，尤其是本地固定电话用户持续流失，收入持续下滑。截至6月30日，网通的本地电话用户数为1.08亿户，比2007年年末减少231万户，其中，固定电话减少149万户，小灵通减少81.1万户。受此影响，网通上半年本地通话费收入90.72亿元，同比下跌11.8%；电话月租费收入51.32亿元，同比下跌23.4%；国内长途通话费收入39.45亿元，同比下跌11.8%；增值服务收入29.93亿元，略跌1.38%；网间结算收入39.51亿元，同比下跌6%。同时今年上半年，网通资本支出75.27亿元，同比下降10.7%，其中固话与小灵通投资比仅占4.4%，同比降13.2个百分点。在固网语音业务大幅萎缩之际，网通公告中称，大力拓展宽带为代表的创新型业务，宽带服务收入增38.8%至88.59亿元，占总收入的21.8%，较去年同期提高6.1个百分点。截至6月30日，网通宽带用户总数达到2336万户，高于上年同期的1712万户，截至7月底的宽带用户数量增至2398万户。网通CFO李福申表示，公司计划在2008年至2010年期间每年新增宽带用户800万户。-相关新闻联通中期净利润同比翻倍本报讯(记者赵谨)昨天，中国联通(00762.HK)公布2008年中期业绩，联通净利润为44.19亿元，比去年同期的21.77亿元增长1.03倍，每股盈利0.324元，营业额增长4%至351.35亿元。由于联通今年拟出售CDMA业务，因此将其列为终止经营业务，CDMA业务上半年盈利为6.5亿元。
en: The net loss of fixed-line telephone users of China Netcom for half a year was 14.9 million local telephone fee income was 9.072 billion yuan, down 11.8% from the same period. (Beijing News, reporter Zhao Jin) Yesterday, China Netcom (00906. HK) announced its performance for the first half of the year in Hong Kong. The financial report shows that the total revenue of China Unicom in the first half of this year was 41.125 billion yuan, including 505 million yuan of amortization income of the initial installation fee, down 0.15% year on year. At the same time, the net profit of China Netcom in the first half of the year reached 5.877 billion yuan, up 11.9% compared with the same period in 2007. China Netcom said that this was mainly due to the impact of factors such as tax rate changes and non cash transaction income. China Netcom's traditional fixed telephone business was severely challenged in the first half of 2008, especially the local fixed telephone users continued to lose and their income continued to decline. As of June 30, the number of local telephone users of China Netcom was 108 million, a decrease of 2.31 million from the end of 2007, including 1.49 million fixed telephones and 811000 Xiaolingtong. Affected by this, the local telephone fee income of China Netcom in the first half of this year was 9.072 billion yuan, down 11.8% year on year; The telephone monthly rent income was 5.132 billion yuan, down 23.4% year on year; Domestic long distance telephone fee income was 3.945 billion yuan, down 11.8% year on year; Value-added service revenue was 2.993 billion yuan, slightly down 1.38%; Interconnection settlement income was 3.951 billion yuan, down 6% year on year. At the same time, in the first half of this year, China Netcom's capital expenditure was 7.527 billion yuan, down 10.7% from the same period last year. The fixed telephone and Xiaolingtong investment ratio was only 4.4%, down 13.2 percentage points from the same period last year. At a time when the fixed network voice business has shrunk dramatically, China Unicom announced that it would vigorously expand the innovative business represented by broadband, and the broadband service revenue increased by 38.8% to 8.859 billion yuan, accounting for 21.8% of the total revenue, 6.1 percentage points higher than the same period last year. As of June 30, the total number of China Netcom broadband users reached 23.36 million, higher than 17.12 million in the same period of the previous year, and the number of broadband users increased to 23.98 million by the end of July. Li Fushen, CFO of China Netcom, said that the company plans to add 8 million broadband users every year from 2008 to 2010. - China News Network (China News, reporter Zhao Jin) Yesterday, China Unicom (00762. HK) announced its performance for the first half of 2008, with a net profit of 4.419 billion yuan, 1.03 times that of 21.77 billion yuan in the same period last year, earnings per share of 0.324 yuan, and revenue growth of 4% to 35.135 billion yuan. Since Unicom plans to sell CDMA business this year, it is listed as a discontinued operation. CDMA business made a profit of 650 million yuan in the first half of the year.

content: 逾九成交易型基金上涨沪深指数的上涨带动了两市基金指数的上扬。截至昨日收盘时，两市基指涨幅均逾1%，交易型基金中除2只封闭式基金外全线上涨。瑞福进取结束了近几个交易日的上涨态势，下跌了0.57%，而同庆B则领涨全部交易型基金。昨日，上证基指开盘于4364.89点，高开22.82点，收盘于4391.7点，上涨1.14%；深证基指开盘于4263.34点，高开22.13点，收盘于4293.48点，上涨1.23%。两市成交金额60.17亿元，较上一交易日有所放大。封闭式基金：开盘交易的32只基金中，瑞福进取结束了近几日的上涨态势，昨日全天下跌0.57%，跌幅居首。除瑞福进取外，基金汉兴也下跌了0.09%。另有2只封基收平，分别是富国天丰和同庆A。同庆B以2.94%的单日涨幅领涨。长城证券提醒投资者，虽然在操作策略上可谨慎看多，但是目前封基折价已经处于历史低位，也需防范行情如果出现转折的后果。当然对于中长期投资者，封基作为一类投资风格稳健的品种，在市场中长期向好的预期下，仍可继续持有。LOF基金：开盘交易的29只基金全线上涨。其中，鹏华动力的涨幅最大，上涨2.45%。此外，涨幅较为靠前的基金还有华夏蓝筹、景顺资源，涨幅分别为2.43%、2.19%。而除万家公用的涨幅低于1%以前，其余的LOF基金涨幅均在1%区间。ETF基金：5只ETF基金也全线飘红。其中，中小板ETF和深100ETF领涨ETF品种，上涨1.33%，报2.364元、3.893元；50ETF上涨1.28%，报2.46元；180ETF上涨1.24%，报0.737元；红利ETF上涨0.89%，报2.604元。(记者徐婧婧)已有_COUNT_条评论我要评论
en: More than 90% of trading funds rose, and the rise of Shanghai and Shenzhen indexes led to the rise of the fund indexes of the two cities. At the close of yesterday, the base index of the two cities had risen more than 1%, and all the trading funds rose except for two closed-end funds. Rui Fu Jijin ended the rising trend of nearly a few trading days, down 0.57%, while Tongqing B led the rise of all trading funds. Yesterday, the Shanghai Stock Exchange opened at 4364.89 points, opened 22.82 points higher, closed at 4391.70 points, up 1.14%; The Shenzhen Stock Exchange opened at 4263.34 points, opened 22.13 points higher, closed at 4293.48 points, up 1.23%. The trading volume of the two cities was 6.017 billion yuan, which was放大ed from the previous trading day. Closed-end funds: Among the 32 funds opened for trading, Rui Fu Jijin ended the rising trend in recent days, falling 0.57% yesterday, the largest decline. In addition to Rui Fu Jijin, Hanting also fell 0.09%. There were two closed funds, Fuguo Tianfeng and Tongqing A. Tongqing B led the rise with a single day increase of 2.94%. Great Wall Securities reminds investors that although they can be cautious about going long in terms of operation strategy, they also need to guard against the consequences if the market changes. Of course, for medium and long-term investors, as a kind of investment style of steady variety, the closed-end fund can still be held in the expectation of the market in the medium and long term. LOF Fund: 29 funds opened for trading rose across the board. Among them, Penghua Power had the largest increase, up 2.45%. In addition, the funds with the highest increase were Huaxia Blue Chip and Invesco Resources, up 2.43% and 2.19% respectively. However, except that the growth of Wan Jia Public Utilities was less than 1%, the growth of other LOF funds was in the range of 1%. ETF Fund: 5 ETF funds also rose all the way. Among them, the small and medium-sized board ETF and Shenzhen 100 ETF led the ETF series, up 1.33%, reporting 2.364 yuan and 3.893 yuan respectively; 50ETF rose 1.28%, reporting 2.46 yuan; 180ETF rose 1.24%, reporting 0.737 yuan; Dividend ETF rose 0.89%, reporting 2.604 yuan. (Reporter Xu Jiejing) has _COUNT_ comments I want to comment

content: 组图：王菲私房衣橱揭秘跟菲姐追时尚导语：天后王菲已经成为了娱乐圈的一个时尚效应，就是每当王菲最近穿了什么或者用了什么或者说了什么都会成为大众以及媒体追逐关注的焦点。大到旅游小到衣食住行等。想知道王菲都穿什么衣服背什么包吗？那就赶快跟编辑一起follow她吧。电影《将爱》首映王菲的现身可谓是整个发布会最大的亮点。一身黑白装束红鞋造型配上俏皮的红领巾实在是可爱十足。但最抢眼的莫过于菲姐在台湾演唱会上就已经开始炫耀的粉色水晶熊iPhone(手机上网)4手机套。这款水晶手机套虽然不知道是什么品牌，但因为王菲的厚爱已经在网上火爆起来。各种定做定制价钱都非常昂贵，但有王菲的魅力在还是前景大好啊。王菲身着红色小皮鞋黑色肥款灯笼裤配上白色宽松衫与黑色长款西装外套，简单的另类的装束配上清爽干净的妆容也只有王菲才能美的如此淡然与充满魅力。白色不规则下摆的宽松衫配上黑色的大灯笼腿裤与红色大头皮鞋十分有范儿，但太过简单的衣服我想换一个人绝对穿不出如此的魅力。近日王菲身着潮衣现身某地，虽然整体穿衣风格不够明亮但简单搭配之下却不失时尚感。灰色呢子大衣宽肩收腰的设计大气同时很显身段。一款蓝灰色的珑骧(Longchamp)手袋十分惹眼，这款手袋也该品牌的基本经典款，多年来一直备受追捧。大气的款型，实用的质地与经济的价格就连菲姐也对它颇为厚爱。
en: Group picture: Faye Wong's private wardrobe reveals that Faye Wong is chasing fashion. Introduction: Faye Wong, the queen of heaven, has become a fashion effect in the entertainment industry. That is, whenever Faye Wong wears something, uses something or says something, it will become the focus of the public and the media. From travel to food, clothing, housing and transportation. Want to know what clothes Faye Wong wears and what bags she carries? Then follow her with the editor in a hurry. Faye Wong's appearance at the premiere of the movie "Will Love" was the biggest highlight of the whole press conference. The black and white dress was really lovely with the naughty red scarf and red shoes. But the most eye-catching thing is the pink crystal bear iPhone (mobile phone online) 4 mobile phone case that Sister Fei has begun to show off at the concert in Taiwan. Although I don't know what brand this crystal mobile phone case is, it has been a hit on the Internet because of Wang Fei's love. All kinds of customized prices are very expensive, but there is still a promising future with the charm of Faye Wong. Faye Wong wears a pair of red leather shoes, black fat lantern trousers, a white loose shirt and a black long coat. The simple and unconventional dress is paired with a clean make-up, which is so calm and charming that only Faye Wong can be beautiful. The loose shirt with irregular white hem, black lantern trousers and red large head shoes are very stylish, but I think it will be impossible for another person to wear such charm in a simple way. Faye Wong recently appeared in a tide dress in a certain place. Although the overall dress style is not bright enough, it is simple but fashionable. The wide shoulder waist design of the gray tweed overcoat is both atmospheric and very prominent. A blue gray Longchamp handbag is very eye catching. This handbag is also the basic classic style of the brand, which has been sought after for many years. The大气'style, practical texture and economical price are also very kind to Sister Fei.

content: 专家支招：自考常见题型的答题方法四、几种常见题型的答题方法1、单项选择题：如果能很快地、准确地把正确答案找出来最好，如果没有把握，就应采用排除法，即应从排除最明显的错误备选项开始，把接近正确答案的备选项留下，再分析比较剩下的备选项，进一步逐一否定，最终选定正确答案。其实，许多单项选择题的4个备选项中，除1个正确外，其余3个并非完全错误，只是不符合此题目的要求而已，有的备选项是命题者从其他章节中移植过来作为干扰项。看一下题目顺序，再回忆对照教材的顺序，就能作出正确选择。2、多项选择题：许多多项选择题往往出自于某一基本问题，命题者把该问题的几个要点作为正确选项。干扰项当中，有的干扰项一看就知道是错误的，则立即排除，而有的干扰项是无法一下判定对错的，甚至其本身就没错，只是被放错了位置，同单项选择题一样，看命题和教材顺序选择，依然有效。另外，选中后，一定要按照字母A、B等备选项顺序书写。3、名词解释：答案要简练、概括、准确，只要理解了。用自己的话去解释也可以，不必拘泥于原文。如答不上，则顾名思义，根据题目去猜想、解释其义。4、简答题：要努力地搜索记忆中的答案要点，作答时，答案要有层次性，要突出要点并且工整地写在试卷上，语言要做到简洁明了。不管想出了几点，作答时一定要分段，切忌把几个要点写在一个自然段之中。5、论述题：列出答案要点，然后对要点逐一展开叙述，把自己的能力全部发挥出来，要在深度上和广度上努力，内容多多益善。必要时，可以先在草稿纸上列出答案要点，思考一下，看能阐述多少。如果时间紧张，那就直接把几个要点作答在试卷上（注意分段并留一定空白以备叙述），然后发挥形象思维能力，千万不要怕胡思乱想，尽可能地对要点进行展开叙述。坚决做到在答案要点的基础之上多些内容。五、弥补1、选择题的弥补。单项选择题当中如果还有几个怎么也做不出的话，干脆孤注一掷，统一选择一个备选项，即统一选择或A、或B、或C、或D.一般来讲，找回一分没问题，运气好的话，有时会找回更多分。多项选择题难度就大多了，实在想不出的话，ABCDE全部都选上，效果如何，就看运气了。2、非选择题的弥补。对每一道选择题的题目及答案（包括不正确的选项）和已经做好的其他非选择题的题目及答案进行反复阅读，有时会一下猛然醒悟而反应过来。如果还是不行，那就只有编写一些答案要点写上，但编写的东西必须是所考课程的内容，而不要张冠李戴，并从宏观角度出发（即下大包围）去阐述，尽量做到自圆其说。六、休息考完一科后，找地方去休息吧，千万不要参加考生之间的议论或互相对答案，也不要自己看书对答案。考过的已经过去，再想都无用，应抓紧时间清醒头脑，此时，越放松越好，这实际上是为考好下一科做的精神准备。七、小结以上技巧有五、六个大点及17、8个小点，考生朋友如果都运用得好，即每一点均能够“意外”地至少多得1分的话，合计起来就是20分左右，效果是不言而喻的。结语。千技巧万技巧，最根本的技巧还是努力地学习知识、掌握知识。综合笔者多年的自考经验，最有效的技巧是做到以下几点：1、熟悉大纲。《考试大纲》是学习和考核的依据，对课程的知识点、考核要求、难易程度、考试题型等作了规定。推荐——全国高等教育自学考试委员会颁布的《考试大纲》。2、钻研教材。教材是《考试大纲》所规定课程知识的具体化和系统阐述，考题均出自教材。推荐——全国高等教育自学考试委员会指定的教材。3、借助辅导用书。辅导用书是帮助消化、理解大纲和教材的老师。建议选用不仅能帮助顺利通过自考，还能够提高思维能力、记忆能力等综合能力的辅导用书。推荐——《自考专科公共课图表速记》和《自考本科公共课图表速记》（四川人民出版社出版）4、掌握学习方法。良好的学习方法能达到事半功倍的效果。推荐——《自考方法谈》（在www.zikao211.com搜索）。5、运用考试技巧。推荐——本文。考生朋友做好以上几点，一定能够做到一次过关。更多信息请访问：新浪自考频道自考论坛自考博客圈特别说明：由于各方面情况的不断调整与变化，新浪网所提供的所有考试信息仅供参考，敬请考生以权威部门公布的正式信息为准。
en: Experts' advice: four methods of answering common questions in self-examination, 1. Single choice questions: It is best to quickly and accurately find out the correct answer. If there is no guarantee, the elimination method should be used, that is, the most obvious wrong options should be eliminated first, leaving the options close to the correct answer, then analyze and compare the remaining options, further negate them one by one, and finally select the correct answer. In fact, in the four options of many single choice questions, in addition to 1 correct one, the other three are not completely wrong. They just do not meet the requirements of this question. Some options are transferred from other chapters by the proposer as interference items. Look at the order of the questions, then recall the order of the textbook, and you can make the right choice. 2. Multiple choice questions: Many multiple choice questions often come from a basic question, and the test question sets several key points of the question as the correct option. Among the interference items, some interference items can be immediately eliminated because they are obviously wrong, while others can not be judged right or wrong at once, or even there is nothing wrong with them, but they are in the wrong place. Like the single choice question, look at the proposition and the order of the textbook to choose, which is still effective. In addition, after selecting, be sure to write in the order of options A, B and so on. 3. Definition of terms: The answer should be concise, summary and accurate. Just understand it. You can also explain it in your own words, and you don't have to stick to the original text. If you can't answer, just take the name literally and guess and explain its meaning according to the question. 4. Simple questions: Try to search for the key points of the answer in your memory. When answering questions, the answer should be hierarchical, highlighting the key points and neatly written on the examination paper. The language should be concise and clear. No matter how many points you think of, you must divide them into paragraphs when answering questions. Never write several key points in a natural paragraph. 5. Discussion questions: List the key points of the answer, and then expand the key points one by one. Try your best to develop your abilities in depth and breadth. The more content, the better. If necessary, you can first list the key points of the answer on the draft paper, think about it, and see how much you can explain. If time is tight, just write several key points on the examination paper (pay attention to segmentation and leave some space for narration), and then give full play to your imaginal thinking ability. Never be afraid of wild thinking, and try to expand the key points. We must do our best to add more content on the basis of the key points of the answer. 5. Make up for 1. Make up for the choice questions. If there are still several single choice questions that you can't do, you might as well take a desperate move and choose one option, that is, choose A, B, C or D. In general, there is no problem in getting back one point. If you are lucky, you will get back more points at times. Multiple choice questions are much more difficult. If you really can't think of them, select ABCDE, and the effect depends on luck. 2. Make up for non-choice questions. Read repeatedly the title and answer of each choice question (including incorrect options) and the title and answer of other non-choice questions that have been completed. Sometimes, you will suddenly wake up and respond. If it still doesn't work, you can only write some key points of the answer, but what you write must be the content of the course you are going to take, not Zhang Guan Li Dai, and start from a macro perspective (that is, make a large encirclement) to elaborate, and try to make sense of it. 6. Have a rest. After passing one subject, go to have a rest. Do not participate in the discussion or answer questions among examinees, or read books to answer questions. The test is over. It's useless to think about it. You should seize the time to clear your head. At this time, the more relaxed you are, the better. This is actually a mental preparation for doing well in the next subject. 7. Summary The above skills have five or six major points and 17 or 8 small points. If examinees' friends can use them well, that is, each point can "unexpectedly" get at least 1 point more, the total score is about 20 points, and the effect is self-evident. Conclusion. Thousands of skills and thousands of skills, the most fundamental skill is still to study and master knowledge hard. Based on the author's years of self-examination experience, the most effective skill is to do the following: 1. Be familiar with the outline. The Examination Outline is the basis for learning and examination, which specifies the knowledge points, examination requirements, difficulty, examination questions and other courses. Recommendation - Examination Outline issued by the National Higher Education Self Examination Committee. 2. Study the textbook. The textbook is a specific and systematic exposition of the course knowledge specified by the Examination Outline. The test questions are all from the textbook. Recommendation - Textbook designated by the National Higher Education Self Examination Committee. 3. With the help of reference books. The reference book is the teacher who helps to digest and understand the outline and textbook. It is recommended to choose a reference book that can not only help you pass the self examination successfully, but also improve your comprehensive abilities such as thinking and memory. Recommendation - "Chart Memory of Public Courses for Self Examination in Specialties" and "Chart Memory of Public Courses for Self Examination in Undergraduate Programs" (published by Sichuan People's Publishing House) 4. Master the learning method. A good learning method can achieve twice the result with half the effort. Recommendation - "Self Examination Method Discussion" (search on www.zikao211.com). 5. Apply the examination skills. Recommendation - This paper. If the examinee's friends do the above well, they will be able to pass the examination at one time. For more information, please visit: Sina Self Examination Channel Self Examination Forum Self Examination Blog Circle Special Note: Due to the continuous adjustment and change of various circumstances, all examination information provided by Sina is for reference only. Please refer to the formal information published by the authority.

content: 沪指窄幅震荡逢低介入形态好的品种早盘两市高开低走，展开调整，中小盘股走势强于大盘，中小指数创出08年以来反弹新高。节前笔者提示大家，对于节后将开始的整固其目的是为了再起升势，因此投资者可以抓住近几天的调整，逢低建仓并持股待涨。就目前盘面来看，去年12月23日反弹以来到现在很多股票走出了明显的主升前的整理形态，显示出一旦大盘结束调整向上突破，该类个股将会大幅上攻，对于投资者来讲，目前需要重点关注并逢低介入的也就是这些形态较好的品种。已有_COUNT_条评论我要评论
en: The narrow range of Shanghai Stock Index volatility has a good variety of varieties. The morning market started low and adjusted. The trend of small and medium-sized stocks was stronger than that of the market, and the small and medium-sized indexes hit a new high since 08. Before the festival, the author reminded everyone that the purpose of the consolidation that will begin after the festival is to rise again, so investors can seize the adjustment of the past few days, take positions at a low level and wait for the rise. From the current market, since the rebound on December 23 last year, many stocks have shown a clear consolidation trend before the main rise, indicating that once the market ends its adjustment and breaks up, the shares of this kind will make a substantial attack. For investors, the focus now is also on these well-shaped varieties. I want to comment _COUNT_

content: 用友伟库网创新思维SaaS应用步入快车道7月8日，用友在线正式宣布激活伟库网(www.wecoo.com)，用作新的SaaS业务运营平台，以新平台、新技术、新模式、新应用为主要特点，专注于打造企业的贴心“好管家”。有评论认为，厚积薄发的用友SaaS一举树立了在业界的比较优势。10日在宁波，国内规模最大、最权威的第二届中国软件运营服务大会——“2008SaaS在中国”隆重举行，100多家软件提供商、互联网公司、电信和增值业务提供商，以及200多家企业用户参加了此次盛会。用友软件携伟库网独揽“中小企业类”产品创新大奖，并被评价为“最有潜力SaaS厂商”。“2008SaaS在中国”——第二届软件运营服务大会主题定位于“SaaS应用切入与创新”，这与用友一贯坚持的理念不谋而合。“获得中小企业类的创新奖，表明业界对用友的市场定位、客户需求理解及不断探索新产品的战略高度高度认可”。一位参会的专业人士对此表示。随着伟库网的正式运行，用友以“草根思维”创新SaaS理念，从中小企业切入，以不断创新的产品服务于企业管理与商务。“力做亚洲SaaS市场的领头羊”，用友软件高级副总裁兼在线事业部总经理杨祉雄信心满怀。“草根思维”创新SaaS服务理念2008年初，用友SaaS尚在研发阶段，就提出了“服务于中小型企业”的定位。和行业的竞争对手相比，在SaaS业务运作上，用友的起步似乎略显晚了一点。早在两年前，已有企业高调地宣称推出SaaS服务；市场方面，关于SaaS的相关话题及舆论炒作也相继而来。然而直到今天，目前国内尚没有任何一家公司在SaaS业务上获得切切实实、具有足够说服力的成绩。计世资讯的一位专家对这个新兴市场做了一番解读：有的产品只定位于电子商务，有的集中于财会，而对于有着4200万中小型企业市场的管理软件产品，却很缺乏。正是基于这点，用友在经过前期的充分市场调研，后期历时一年的研发，在“沉寂”了两年后提出了“草根思维”的客户定位策略。“用友SaaS锁定入门级用户，服务最为广泛的草根企业。”杨祉雄说：这些大多是50人以下，营业额在1000万元以下，业务经营相对单一，管理较为简单，大多是初创型公司。对于目标市场的清晰界定，这一创新理念体现了用友在SaaS领域独具慧眼。“创新不一定就是在业内第一个敢于尝试进军新的领域，提出更为先进、有效的理念或服务形式，更能体现其创新的核心价值所在。”计世咨讯的这位专家表示，从软件在线运营的产业视角来看，用友的积淀具有相当的竞争优势，这也让诸多专家纷纷看好用友SaaS。不难看出用友在SaaS业务运作上的深思熟虑。一方面，几乎所有的SaaS厂商都将目标用户锁定在中小企业，但是对于草根企业的关注并不多，用友恰恰在竞争激烈的SaaS市场找到了一片蓝海，而这个领域又如此之大，足以对用友的SaaS业务形成有力的支撑。受到服务成本、需求成熟度等因素的影响，50人以下的小型企业用户往往被传统管理软件厂商视为“非经济客户”、成为管理软件“市场中的长尾”。基于对企业管理特征和需求的把握，用友对不同规模的客户进行细分实现全生命周期的客户经营，并提出用SaaS模式满足初创型小企业的管理与商务需求，这样用友就实现了对不同规模、不同阶段用户的全面涵盖。只做概念对行业的发展未必有利，SaaS作为一种新模式被推出，必定要体现其技术架构上的先进性、服务理念上的创新、更加安全可靠的运维平台、以及更先进的应用和服务支持。业内一位人士对SaaS的发展提出了更深刻的思考。
en: On July 8, Yonyou Online officially announced the activation of Weiku Network (www.wecoo.com) as a new SaaS business operation platform, focusing on creating a considerate "good housekeeper" for enterprises, with the main characteristics of new platform, new technology, new model and new application. It is commented that Yonyou SaaS, which has accumulated thick and thin, has established a comparative advantage in the industry. On the 10th day in Ningbo, the second largest and most authoritative China Software Operation Service Conference in China - "SaaS in 2008" was grandly held, with more than 100 software providers, Internet companies, telecommunications and added value service providers, and more than 200 enterprise users attending the conference. Yonyou Software, together with Weiku Network, won the "Small and Medium Enterprises" product innovation award and was evaluated as "the most potential SaaS manufacturer". "SaaS in 2008" - the theme of the Second Software Operation Service Conference is positioned as "SaaS application cutting in and innovation", which coincides with the consistent adherence of Yonyou. "Winning the innovation award of small and medium-sized enterprises shows that the industry highly recognizes the market positioning, customer needs understanding and the strategy of constantly exploring new products of Yonyou". A professional participant said. With the official operation of Weiku Network, Yonyou innovated the SaaS concept with "grass root thinking", focusing on small and medium-sized enterprises, and served enterprise management and business with constantly innovative products. "Be the leader of the Asian SaaS market", Yang Zhixiong, Senior Vice President of Yonyou Software and General Manager of the Online Division, is full of confidence. "Grass root thinking" innovates the SaaS service concept. At the beginning of 2008, when Yonyou SaaS was still in the R&D stage, it proposed the positioning of "serving small and medium-sized enterprises". Compared with the industry competitors, Yonyou seems a little late in the operation of SaaS business. As early as two years ago, some enterprises had announced the launch of SaaS services in a high-profile manner; In the market, the relevant topics and public opinion speculation about SaaS have also come one after another. However, up to now, no company in China has achieved substantial and convincing results in the SaaS business. An expert of World News made an interpretation of this emerging market: some products are only positioned in e-commerce, some focus on accounting, and there is a lack of management software products for the 42 million small and medium-sized enterprise market. It is based on this point that Yonyou proposed the customer positioning strategy of "grass root thinking" after two years of "silence" following a full market research in the early stage and a year of research and development in the later stage. "Yonyou SaaS focuses on entry-level users and serves the most extensive grassroots enterprises." Yang Zhixiong said: These are mostly start-up companies with less than 50 people, less than 10 million yuan in business turnover, relatively single business operations and relatively simple management. The clear definition of the target market reflects Yonyou's unique vision in the SaaS field. "Innovation does not necessarily mean that it is the first in the industry to try to enter a new field, but it is more advanced and effective to propose concepts or service forms, which reflects its core value of innovation." said the expert of World News and Information, from the perspective of the industrial perspective of software online operation, Yonyou's accumulation has considerable competitive advantages, which also makes many experts optimistic about Yonyou SaaS. It is not difficult to see that Yonyou has given careful consideration to the operation of SaaS business. On the one hand, almost all SaaS manufacturers have targeted small and medium-sized enterprises, but there is not much attention to grass root enterprises. Yonyou has found a blue sea in the fierce SaaS market competition, and this field is so large that it can form a strong support for Yonyou's SaaS business. Influenced by factors such as service cost and demand maturity, small enterprise users with less than 50 people are often regarded as "non economic customers" by traditional management software manufacturers and become the "long tail" of management software in the "market". Based on the grasp of the characteristics and needs of enterprise management, Yonyou subdivides customers of different scales to achieve full life cycle customer management, and proposes to meet the management and business needs of small enterprises at the start-up stage with the SaaS mode, so that Yonyou realizes the comprehensive coverage of users of different scales and stages. Doing concepts is not necessarily beneficial to the development of the industry. As a new model, SaaS must reflect its advanced technology architecture, innovation of service concept, more secure and reliable operation and maintenance platform, and more advanced application and service support. An industry insider has put forward a deeper thinking on the development of SaaS

content: 《极速赛车手》专为儿童拍摄周日全面公映(图)本报讯8月10日，《极速赛车手》将在内地影院全面上映，这是奥运会期间首部上映的好莱坞大片。该片是继《黑客帝国()》系列后，沃卓斯基兄弟的首部导演作品，中国演员余男(blog)和韩国偶像Rain(听歌)参与。另外，IMAX巨幕版本也将同时上映。故事小学生都能看懂自2003年《黑客帝国》系列结束后，沃卓斯基兄弟休息了整整3年，这期间只监制了一部《V字仇杀队》。《极速赛车手》是专门拍给少年儿童看的电影，所以在这部电影中你看不到复杂的故事和哲学思考，只剩下如万花筒一般绚烂的色彩和小学生都能看懂的故事。为了表达两兄弟对日本动漫大师吉田龙夫原作的怀念，全片大量采用绿幕拍摄，背景甚至模拟成了二维动画。赛车“马赫5号”空中换胎《极速赛车手》中的赛车“马赫5号”尽显威力，在片中大玩超越、漂移、翻转、碰撞等动作，还具有空中换胎、发射子弹等功能。导演还借助近1000个电脑特效镜头，将“马赫5号”和它的竞争对手放到沙漠、雪山等地比赛。演员余男与Rain扮姐弟为迎合亚洲市场，出品方华纳兄弟邀请中国演员余男、韩国偶像Rain、日本明星真田广之参演，其中余男和Rain在片中扮演姐弟。
person: 沃卓斯基,余男,吉田龙夫,Rain
en: "Speed Racer", a film shot for children, was fully released on Sunday (picture) On August 10, "Speed Racer" will be fully released in mainland cinemas, the first Hollywood blockbuster during the Olympic Games. The film is the first director's work of the Wachowski brothers after the "Matrix ()" series, with Chinese actor Yu Nan (blog) and Korean idol Rain (listening music) participating. In addition, the IMAX giant screen version will also be released at the same time. The story has been understandable to primary school students since the end of the "Matrix" series in 2003. The Wachowski brothers took a full three years off. During this period, they only produced "V for Vendetta". "Speed Racer" is a film shot for children and teenagers, so in this film, you can't see complicated stories and philosophical thinking, but only the colorful colors like a kaleidoscope and the stories that primary school students can understand. In order to express the brothers' memory of Yoshitaka Yoshida, the original work of Japanese animation master, the whole film adopts a large number of green screen shooting, and even the background is simulated into two-dimensional animation. The racing car "Mach 5" changes tires in the air. The racing car "Mach 5" in "Speed Racer" shows its power. It plays a lot of actions such as overtaking, drifting, flipping and collision in the film, and has the functions of air tire change and bullet launching. The director also used nearly 1000 computer special effects cameras to put "Mach 5" and its competitors in the desert, snow mountain and other places for competition. Yu Nan and Rain, the actors who play as brothers and sisters, cater to the Asian market. Warner Bros., the producer, invited Chinese actor Yu Nan, South Korean idol Rain and Japanese star Hideaki Sanada to play as brothers and sisters in the film.

content: 大福证券建议增持国泰航空目标价18港元大福证券国泰于2008年蒙受巨大亏损86.96亿元，乃主要由于金融海啸及其后油价暴跌导致大额燃油对冲亏损所致，该公司于2009年转亏为盈，录得纯利46.94亿元(每股盈利：1.19元)。业绩强劲反弹，乃归因于业务逐步恢复、有效成本控制、因燃油价格反弹而显着拨回燃油对冲亏损，以及出售其于港机工程(0044.HK,$100.40)的部分股权所致。该公司宣派末期及年内唯一的股息每股0.10元，亦是2008年下半年因宏观环境艰难而暂停派息以来首次重新派息。若不计算非经常性项目，国泰的基础业绩则由2008年的亏损17.34亿元扭转为2009年的溢利8.52亿元。国泰于2009年的客运及货运收益分别按年下跌21%及30%，使该公司的收入按年下降23%至670亿元，反映行业衰退情况。由于头等及商务外游人数减少，以及经济客位价格受压，故乘客数量按年下降2%，而收益率则锐减20%，货运业务方面，货运量及收益率分别下降7%及27%。总营运成本按年下跌34%，其中燃油及非燃油成本分别按年减少63%及4%。由于燃油采购成本按年下跌49%，以及于2008年入帐的燃油对冲亏损80亿元中已拨回28亿元，故燃油仅占2009年总营运开支的28%，较去年骤减23个百分点。国泰维持其对冲未来12个月预计耗油量最少30%的目标。其未平仓燃油对冲合约的收支平衡水平为每桶80美元。于2009年为已届满的燃油对冲合约支付32亿元平仓后，国泰于2009年的债务净额仅按年上升4%至261亿元，相当于净负债比率62%，较去年下降7个百分点，但仍高于目标的50%水平。展望将来，我们预期对该公司业务的需求只会逐步复苏，因为需求下降部分属结构性而非纯粹周期性，同时，燃油价格回升的威胁亦是另一影响业务的因素。可幸的是，由于香港乃区内重要的空运中心，故国泰的形势仍较其全球同业优胜。我们继续建议增持该股，调整后的目标价为18.00元，相当于市净率1.7倍或预计企业价值对扣除利息、税项、折旧及摊销前盈利的比率9.7倍。分析员：曹福达
en: Dafu Securities suggested to increase the target price of Cathay Pacific to HK $18 per share. Cathay Pacific suffered a huge loss of 8.696 billion yuan in 2008, mainly due to the financial tsunami and the subsequent sharp drop in oil prices, which led to huge fuel hedging losses. The company turned from loss to profit in 2009, with a profit of 4.694 billion yuan (earnings per share: 1.19 yuan). The strong rebound of performance is due to the gradual recovery of business, effective cost control, significant reversal of fuel hedging losses due to the rebound of fuel prices, and the sale of some shares in Hongkong Machinery Engineering (0044. HK, $100.40). The company declared a final and only dividend of 0.10 yuan per share, which was also the first dividend since the suspension of dividend distribution in the second half of 2008 due to the tough macro environment. If non recurring items are not counted, Cathay Pacific's underlying performance will reverse from a loss of 1.74 billion yuan in 2008 to a profit of 852 million yuan in 2009. Cathay Pacific's passenger and freight revenue fell 21% and 30% respectively in 2009, which led the company's revenue to decline 23% year on year to 67 billion yuan, reflecting the industry's decline. Due to the reduction of first class and business trips and the pressure on the price of economy seats, the number of passengers decreased by 2% year on year, while the yield decreased sharply by 20%. In terms of freight business, freight volume and yield decreased by 7% and 27% respectively. Total operating costs fell 34% year on year, of which fuel and non fuel costs fell 63% and 4% respectively. Due to the fact that the fuel procurement cost fell 49% year on year, and 28 billion yuan of the 80 billion yuan fuel hedging losses recorded in 2008 had been written back, fuel only accounted for 28% of the total operating expenses in 2009, a sharp decrease of 23 percentage points from last year. Cathay Pacific maintains its goal of hedging at least 30% of the expected fuel consumption in the next 12 months. The break even level of its open fuel hedging contracts is $80 per barrel. After paying 3.2 billion yuan to close the expired fuel hedging contracts in 2009, Cathay Pacific's net debt for the year only rose 4% year on year to 26.1 billion yuan, equivalent to a net debt ratio of 62%, 7 percentage points lower than last year, but still higher than the target level of 50%. Looking ahead, we expect that the demand for the company's business will only gradually recover, because the decline in demand is partly structural rather than purely cyclical, and the threat of rising fuel prices is another factor affecting the business. Fortunately, as Hong Kong is an important air transport center in the region, Cathay Pacific still has an advantage over its global peers. We continue to recommend to increase the stock, and the adjusted target price is 18.00 yuan, which is equivalent to 1.7 times or 9.7 times of the expected earnings per share of the company's net price-earnings ratio. Analyst: Cao Fud

content: 东南区巡礼：榜眼秀力助闪电侠大将军拖奇才后腿魔术莫里斯·埃文斯的离队和白人前锋加里蒂的退役，让魔术队的2、3号位出现了危机。主教练大范甘迪引进了皮特鲁斯和新秀考特尼·李，同时将使用雷迪克和博甘斯两名旧将，共四人试验得分后卫位置，皮特鲁斯和雷迪克有望脱颖而出。皮特鲁斯是摇摆人，防守能力尚可，并能远投，这些都是魔术队亟需补强的。雷迪克有成为优秀投手的潜力，但如果他的表现仍不够稳定，只会再度沦为替补得分后卫。34岁的安东尼·约翰逊将会是控卫杰米尔·尼尔森的第一替补，约翰逊上赛季场均得5.6分3.8次助攻。奇才罗杰·梅森上赛季为奇才队场均贡献个人职业生涯最高的9.1分，他改投马刺是奇才替补席上的一大损失。奇才队今夏的主要任务是和两名主将阿里纳斯、贾米森续约，引援动作并不大，重点补强的位置是组织后卫。由于阿里纳斯受伤，丹尼尔斯将出任先发组织后卫，新引进的迪克森和迪·布朗则将出任第二和第三替补。迪克森上赛季远投命中率达到41.7%。新秀麦克基身高2.13米，将是球队在内线的重点培养对象，先发中锋海伍德曾吹捧他为全联盟运动能力排前三的中锋。老鹰老鹰队的阵容调整在上赛季就已完成，今夏并没有特别大的动作。丘尔吉斯的出走和萨利姆·斯塔德迈尔的离队，是后场的巨大损失，但新来的莫里斯·埃文斯并非等闲之辈，他能打得分后卫和小前锋两个位置，上赛季场均贡献个人职业生涯最高8.9分，他将是小前锋马文·威廉姆斯的第一替补，并有望成为球队的第六人。穆雷同样经验丰富，先后曾在骑士、活塞队等队效力，将作为得分后卫乔·约翰逊的首席替补。中锋莫里斯曾身披尼克斯队战袍，能增加内线实力，总体来说，老鹰队今夏实力变化不大。山猫山猫队没有对主力阵容进行任何调整。小个子博伊金斯今夏选择去了意大利博洛尼亚队。选中第9号新秀控卫奥格斯丁是山猫今夏最引人注目的引援动作。奥格斯丁是可塑之材，但他身高只有1.83米，必须认真当好费尔顿的替补。不过，奥格斯丁最终会在1号位置上得到更多上场时间，甚至有可能迫使费尔顿去改打得分后卫。新来的香侬·布朗将成为球队第三替补得分后卫，上赛季他在骑士队和公牛队场均进账5.4分。热火榜眼秀比斯利的加盟无疑是对韦德的最大帮助。比斯利身体素质出众，假以时日，他可以超越马里昂，成为热火队的二号人选。加拿大籍中锋马格洛尔曾是全明星球员，他将缓解布朗特在内线的压力。第34号新秀查尔默斯在新秀培训课程班上被查出携带大麻，并连累比斯利被罚5万美金，查尔默斯将出任先发控卫班克斯的替补。为防止“白巧克力”离队后控卫位置实力大降，热火队还引进了利文斯顿，不过利文斯顿的健康状况令人担忧，他自2007年2月以来就没有参加过正式比赛。
person: 大范甘迪,迪·布朗,迪克森,丘尔吉斯,博洛尼亚,雷迪克,丹尼尔斯,约翰逊,莫里斯·埃文斯,施耐德,杰米尔·尼尔森,贾米森,马里昂,安东尼·约翰逊,加里蒂,博甘斯,比卢普斯,莫里斯,查尔默斯,斯塔德迈尔,布鲁克斯,马格洛尔,班克斯,利文斯顿,白巧克力”,香侬·布朗,博伊金斯,埃文斯,考特尼·李,比斯利,韦德,麦克基,奇才,杰拉德·加里蒂,梅森,穆雷,阿联,马文·威廉姆斯,中锋莫里斯,奥格斯丁,罗杰·梅森,阿里扎,白巧克力,大将军,费尔顿,海耶斯,拉德马诺维奇,博洛尼亚队,马特·巴恩斯,雷阿伦,白人前锋加里蒂,皮特鲁斯,范甘迪,布朗特,海伍德,阿泰斯特,老鹰,阿里纳斯
en: Southeast Tour: The No. 2 show helps Flash General Drag Wizard Hawke Magic Morris Evans leave and the retirement of the white forward Garyti, which creates a crisis for the Magic's No. 2 and No. 3 positions. Head coach Da Fangan introduced Pietrus and rookie Courtney Lee, and will use two old generals, Reddick and Bogans. Four people will be tested in the shooting guard position, and Pietrus and Reddick are expected to stand out. Pietrus is a swingman with considerable defensive ability and can make a long shot, which is an urgent need for the Magic to strengthen. Reddick has the potential to become an excellent shooter, but if his performance is still unstable, he will only become a substitute shooting guard again. Anthony Johnson, 34, will be the first substitute for point guard Jamil Nelson. Johnson scored 5.6 points and 3.8 assists per game last season. Roger Mason of the Wizards contributed a personal career high of 9.1 points per game last season, and his transfer to the Spurs is a big loss on the Wizards' bench. The main task of the Wizards this summer is to renew the contracts with the two main players, Arenas and Jamison. There is not much reinforcement. The key position is point guard. Due to Arenas' injury, Daniels will serve as the starting point guard, and the newly introduced Dickson and DeBrown will serve as the second and third substitutes. Dickson's long shot hit rate last season reached 41.7%. The rookie McGee, 2.13 meters tall, will be the focus of the team's training in the interior. Haywood, the starting center, praised him as the center of the top three in the league in terms of athletic ability. The lineup adjustment of the Eagles has been completed last season and there is no special move this summer. The loss of Churgis and Salim Stadmai is a huge loss in the back court, but the new Maurice Evans is not an ordinary person. He can play in two positions, shooting guard and small forward. Last season, he contributed a personal career high of 8.9 points per game. He will be the first substitute for the small forward Marvin Williams and is expected to become the sixth man of the team. Murray is also experienced. He has served in the Cavaliers, Pistons and other teams, and will serve as the chief substitute for shooting guard Joe Johnson. Center Morris once wore the Knicks' uniform, which can increase the internal strength. In general, the Eagles' strength has not changed much this summer. The Bobcats did not make any adjustments to the main lineup. The little man Boykins chose to go to Bologna, Italy this summer. The selection of the ninth rookie point guard Augustine is the most notable move of the Bobcats this summer. Augustine is plastic, but he is only 1.83 meters tall and must take seriously as Felton's substitute. However, Augustine will eventually get more playing time at No. 1 position, and may even force Felton to change his job as a shooting guard. The new Shannon Brown will become the team's third substitute shooting guard. Last season, he averaged 5.4 points per game in the Cavaliers and the Bulls. The joining of Beasley, the No. 2 show in the Heat, is undoubtedly the greatest help to Wade. Beasley has excellent physical fitness. In time, he can surpass Marion and become the second choice of the Heat. Magloire, a Canadian center, was an All Star player, and he will ease Blunt's pressure in the interior. The 34th rookie Chalmers was found to carry marijuana in the rookie training course, and Beasley was fined 50000 dollars, and Chalmers will serve as the substitute for the starting point guard Banks. In order to prevent the power of the point guard from falling sharply after the "White Chocolate" team leaves, the Heat team also introduced Livingston, but his health is worrying, and he has not participated in any official games since February 2007.

content: 台北电脑展美女模特遭骚扰(图)本报讯据台湾媒体报道，台北计算机展4日进入最后一天，但连续多天来，网站上有关计算机展的讯息出现最多的却是展场模特的照片和短片，讨论哪个身材火辣，甚至谁又漏底走光。而在展场里，有模特的商摊前挤满人拿起相机猛拍，让不少前往观展的女性替穿着单薄的模特捏冷汗。“这样很低级，把我们搞得像是AV女优！”展会模特“雅雅”说，很多到计算机展的男性是醉翁之意不在酒，有些色色的男子，拿着相机对着她的身体的某部分猛拍，感觉“很变态”。另一名担任过展会模特的女子“小米”笑容甜美、身材修长，是“人气吸收机”。但她说，最怕“咸猪手”，因为常有男生趁着合照“手就搂过来，搂个肩，搂个腰，感觉很不舒服。”
en: The beautiful model of Taipei Computer Show was harassed (picture) The reporter of this newspaper reported that the Taipei Computer Show entered the last day on the 4th, but for many consecutive days, the most messages on the website about the Computer Show were the pictures and videos of the exhibition models, discussing which figure was hot, and even who lost the bottom. In the exhibition hall, there were crowds of people in front of the booths with models to pick up their cameras and take photos wildly, which made many women who went to the exhibition shiver for the models dressed in thin clothes. "This is very low level. It makes us look like AV actresses!" said Yaya, the exhibition model, many men who came to the computer exhibition were not interested in wine. Some sexy men took pictures of her body with a camera, which was "very abnormal". Another woman, "Xiaomi", who served as an exhibition model, smiled sweetly and was slim, and was a "popularity absorber". But she said that she was most afraid of "salty pig hands", because there were often boys taking advantage of the photo to "hug them, hug their shoulders, hug their waists, and feel very uncomfortable".

content: 英国电信前掌门韦华恩出任阿尔卡特朗讯CEO菲利普·加缪(PhilippeCamus)任阿尔卡特朗讯董事长韦华恩重出江湖，任阿尔卡特朗讯CEO新浪科技讯北京时间9月2日下午消息，阿尔卡特朗讯(下称“阿朗”)正式宣布，英国电信前任CEO本·韦华恩(BenVerwaayen)将出任阿尔卡特朗讯CEO一职；同时，欧洲航空防务与航天公司(EADS)前任联合CEO菲利普·加缪(PhilippeCamus)将担任阿朗董事长。韦华恩现年56岁，荷兰籍，今年5月31日他卸任英国电信CEO，并在6月30日从董事会离任。韦华恩在英国电信任职超过6年时间，期间他领导公司走出困境，成功进行了战略转型。韦华恩将在阿朗巴黎总部办公，他表示：“公司处于快速多变的市场环境中，不断变革。我很高兴能领导这家拥有巨大规模和顶尖人才的公司，同时也认识到将要面对的困难和未来的挑战。”加缪现年60岁，法国籍，是美国常驻居民。他现为国际媒体集团Lagardère合作任事股东，并是纽约一家投资及咨询公司EvercorePartners的合伙人。2006年12月，阿尔卡尔与朗讯正式合并，但新公司市值损失了一半以上。而且，来自亚洲厂商的威胁也越来越大。今年7月，阿朗宣布，CEO陆思博(PatRusso)和董事长瑟奇·谢瑞克(SergeTchuruk)将于今年晚些时候辞职。阿朗表示，股东对公司当前的业绩感到愤怒，几个月前就开始要求更换管理层。阿朗一度锁定的候选人包括法国前任财长、法国电信前主席兼CEO蒂埃里·布雷东(ThierryBreton)、源讯公司(AtosOrigin)CEO菲利浦·吉蒙德(PhilippeGermond)，及美国有线电视巨头Comcast的COO斯蒂芬·伯克(StephenB.Burke)。(银刀长乐）相关报道：阿尔卡特朗讯CEO黯然离职：合并阵痛未消前法国财务部长有望成阿朗新任CEO韦华恩卸任英国电信CEO(图)
person: 本·韦华恩,加缪,瑟奇·谢瑞克,布恩,菲利普,Ben,菲利普·加缪,Verwaayen,PhilippeCamus,Pat,StephenB.Burke,布雷东,银刀长乐,蒂埃里,陆思博,蒂埃里·布雷东,韦华恩,本,菲利浦·吉蒙德,长乐,斯蒂芬·伯克,PatRusso
en: The former head of BT, Ben Verwaayen, serves as the CEO of Alcatel Lucent. Philippe Camus, the chairman of Alcatel Lucent, serves as the CEO of Sina Technology News. On the afternoon of September 2, Beijing time, Alcatel Lucent (hereinafter referred to as "Alang") officially announced that Ben Verwaayen (Ben Verwaayen), the former CEO of BT, would serve as the CEO of Alcatel Lucent; At the same time, Philippe Camus (Philippe Camus), the former co CEO of European Aeronautic Defense and Space Company (EADS), will serve as Chairman of Alang. Verwaayen, 56, is a Dutch national. On May 31, he resigned as CEO of BT and left the board on June 30. Verwaayen has worked in BT for more than 6 years. During this period, he led the company out of difficulties and successfully implemented strategic transformation. Verwaayen will work in the Paris headquarters of Alang, and he said: "The company is in a rapidly changing market environment, and is constantly changing. I am very happy to lead this company with huge scale and top talents, and I also realize the difficulties and future challenges to be faced." Camus, 60, is a French national and a resident of the United States. He is now a co serving shareholder of Lagardère, an international media group, and a partner of Evercore Partners, an investment and consulting company in New York. In December 2006, Alcatel and Lucent officially merged, but the market value of the new company fell by more than half. Moreover, the threat from Asian manufacturers is growing. In July, Alang announced that CEO Pat Russo and Chairman Serge Tchuruk would resign later this year. Alang said that shareholders were angry with the company's current performance and began to demand a change of management several months ago. The candidates locked by Alang once included Thierry Breton, the former French Minister of Finance, and Thierry Breton, the former Chairman and CEO of France Telecom

content: NYMEX原油期货20日收盘走高[世华财讯]受空头回补的推动，NYMEX原油期货20日收盘走高。NYMEX6月轻质低硫原油期货合约结算价上涨1.1%，至每桶99.49美元。综合媒体5月20日报道，纽约商业交易所(NYMEX)原油期货20日收盘走高，因在消息称盖达组织2010年曾图谋劫持或击沉油轮后，油价获空头回补。NYMEX6月轻质低硫原油期货合约结算价上涨1.05美元，至每桶99.49美元，涨幅1.1%；该品种合约20日到期。美国官员援引从奥萨玛本拉登巴基斯坦驻地收集到的情报称，盖达组织的目的是要刺激油价大涨并触发西方经济危机。但官员补充称，没有迹象显示正在策划任何特定或很快有恐怖袭击。油价盘中走势振荡，最低曾跌至每桶95.99美元，因美元走强以及在6月合约收盘到期前的结清仓位，但午盘时走势逆转，最高触及每桶99.89美元。一些分析师表示，20日价格大幅波动可能是因6月合约流动性不足以及技术面压力。根据美国石油协会(API)的月度供需报告，美国4月原油及成品油总需求较上年同期跳升5.2%至每日1,988.6万桶。交易员们亦相信长期原油需求处于上升趋势，因美国进入夏季驾车出行季，且中国等新兴市场的燃料需求增加。Purvin&Gertz分析师表示，交易员们把19日油价的下滑看成是一个买进的机会，因为地缘政治风险目前暂时还得不到有效的解决办法，或将不会看到剧烈的下跌。NYMEX6月RBOB汽油期货结算价上涨0.98美分，至每加仑2.9358美元，涨幅0.3%；6月取暖油期货结算价上涨2.36美分，至每加仑2.9183美元，涨幅0.8%。ICE7月交割的北海布伦特原油期货价格上涨97美分，报收于每桶112.39美元，涨幅为0.9%。(师卫娟编辑)
en: The NYMEX crude oil futures closed higher on the 20th [Shihua Financial News] driven by short covering, the NYMEX crude oil futures closed higher on the 20th. The settlement price of NYMEX June light low sulfur crude oil futures contract rose 1.1% to 99.49 dollars per barrel. The comprehensive media reported on May 20 that the NYMEX crude oil futures closed higher on the 20th. After it was reported that Al Qaeda had tried to hijack or sink tankers in 2010, oil prices were covered by shorts. The settlement price of NYMEX June light low sulfur crude oil futures contract rose $1.05 to $99.49 per barrel, up 1.1%; The contract of this kind expires on the 20th. US officials, citing intelligence collected from Osama bin Laden's Pakistan mission, said that the purpose of Al Qaeda was to stimulate a sharp rise in oil prices and trigger a Western economic crisis. But the official added that there was no indication that any specific or imminent terrorist attack was being planned. Oil prices fluctuated during the trading day, hitting a low of $95.99 a barrel because of the strengthening of the US dollar and the closing of positions before the June contract closed, but the trend reversed at noon, hitting a high of $99.89 a barrel. Some analysts said that the sharp fluctuation of prices on the 20th may be due to the lack of liquidity of the June contract and technical pressure. According to the monthly supply and demand report of the American Petroleum Institute (API), the total demand for crude oil and petroleum products in the United States in April jumped 5.2% year on year to 19.886 million barrels per day. Traders also believe that long-term crude oil demand is on the rise because the United States has entered the summer driving season and fuel demand has increased in emerging markets such as China. Purvin & Gertz analysts said that traders regard the decline of oil prices on the 19th as an opportunity to buy, because the current geopolitical risks can not be effectively solved for the time being, or they will not see a sharp decline. The settlement price of NYMEX June RBOB gasoline futures rose 0.98 cents to $2.9358 per gallon, up 0.3%; The settlement price of June heating oil futures rose 2.36 cents to $2.9183 per gallon, up 0.8%. The price of ICE North Sea Brent crude oil futures for July delivery rose 97 cents to close at $112.39 a barrel, up 0.9%. (Editor Shi Wejuan)

content: 英国三名蒙面歹徒抢劫一家珠宝店中新社伦敦八月二十五日电(记者魏群)三名蒙面歹徒今天抢劫了英国牛津郡的一家珠宝店，抢走价值十五万英镑的名表。这是继本月伦敦相继发生四千万珠宝大劫案，及摩托车“飞贼”三十九秒内抢劫一家珠宝店后，英国发生的又一起珠宝劫案。经营珠宝店看来已经成为英国的“高危行业”。据当地警方透露，三名带着手枪和斧头的蒙面男人，今天下午闯入牛津郡班伯里商业街上一家名为“迈克尔·琼斯”的珠宝店，用随身携带的武器，威胁一男三女四名店员，抢走劳力士、卡地亚和百年灵等名贵手表。另一名开着奥迪车的同伙在店外等候，抢劫得手后他们驾车逃走。二十五分钟后，这辆汽车被发现遗弃在班伯里的一条公路上。店员告诉警方说，这几名蒙面劫匪看起来像亚洲人。负责调查此案的警官对《每日电讯报》记者说，好在没有人在抢劫中受伤，不过店员看起来受到极大惊吓。对于英国近期频发珠宝店抢劫案，一些民众对记者表示，歹徒连连得手，警方却无法破案，显示警方办案能力低下，更助长了歹徒仿效。也有人将劫案频发归咎于经济低迷，一些人为求一夜暴富而铤而走险。中新社伦敦八月二十五日电(记者魏群)三名蒙面歹徒今天抢劫了英国牛津郡的一家珠宝店，抢走价值十五万英镑的名表。这是继本月伦敦相继发生四千万珠宝大劫案，及摩托车“飞贼”三十九秒内抢劫一家珠宝店后，英国发生的又一起珠宝劫案。经营珠宝店看来已经成为英国的“高危行业”。据当地警方透露，三名带着手枪和斧头的蒙面男人，今天下午闯入牛津郡班伯里商业街上一家名为“迈克尔·琼斯”的珠宝店，用随身携带的武器，威胁一男三女四名店员，抢走劳力士、卡地亚和百年灵等名贵手表。另一名开着奥迪车的同伙在店外等候，抢劫得手后他们驾车逃走。二十五分钟后，这辆汽车被发现遗弃在班伯里的一条公路上。店员告诉警方说，这几名蒙面劫匪看起来像亚洲人。负责调查此案的警官对《每日电讯报》记者说，好在没有人在抢劫中受伤，不过店员看起来受到极大惊吓。对于英国近期频发珠宝店抢劫案，一些民众对记者表示，歹徒连连得手，警方却无法破案，显示警方办案能力低下，更助长了歹徒仿效。也有人将劫案频发归咎于经济低迷，一些人为求一夜暴富而铤而走险。
en: Three masked bandits robbed a jewelry store in Oxfordshire, England, today, stealing a famous watch worth 150000 pounds. This is another jewelry robbery in the United Kingdom after the London area successively suffered a jewelry robbery of 40 million and a jewelry store was robbed by a motorcycle "flying thief" in 39 seconds this month. It seems that running a jewelry store has become a "high-risk industry" in the United Kingdom. According to the local police, three masked men with pistols and hatchets broke into a jewelry store named "Michael Jones" on Banbury Business Street in Oxfordshire this afternoon. They threatened four shop assistants, one man and three women with the weapons they carried with them, and stole famous watches such as Rolex, Cartier and Breitling. Another partner in an Audi car was waiting outside the store, and they drove away after the robbery. Twenty five minutes later, the car was found abandoned on a road in Banbury. The shop assistant told the police that these masked robbers looked like Asians. The police officer in charge of investigating this case said to the reporter of the Daily Telegraph that fortunately, no one was injured in the robbery, but the shop assistant looked very frightened. Some people blame the frequent robbery cases on the economic depression, and some people take risks for the sake of overnight riches. Xinhua London, August 25 (Reporter Wei Qun) Three masked bandits robbed a jewelry store in Oxfordshire, England today and stole a famous watch worth 150000 pounds. This is another jewelry robbery in the United Kingdom after the London area successively suffered a jewelry robbery of 40 million and a jewelry store was robbed by a motorcycle "flying thief" in 39 seconds this month. It seems that running a jewelry store has become a "high-risk industry" in the United Kingdom. According to the local police, three masked men with pistols and hatchets broke into a jewelry store named "Michael Jones" on Banbury Business Street in Oxfordshire this afternoon. They threatened four shop assistants, one man and three women with the weapons they carried with them, and stole famous watches such as Rolex, Cartier and Breitling. Another partner in an Audi car was waiting outside the store, and they drove away after the robbery. Twenty five minutes later, the car was found abandoned on a road in Banbury. The shop assistant told the police that these masked robbers looked like Asians. The police officer in charge of investigating the case said to the reporter of the Daily Telegraph that fortunately, no one was injured in the robbery, but the shop assistants looked extremely frightened. Some people blame the frequent robberies on the economic depression, and some people take risks in order to become rich overnight.
