content: 华东理工大学领取2010年考研准考证的通知新浪教育讯2010年考研已进入最后的紧张冲刺阶段，各地准考证已陆续开始领取，新浪考研站特别整理了各地高校准考证领取相关信息以方便各位考生查阅，也提醒各位一定不要错过领取时间而错过机会！预祝各位考试顺利！以下为：报考华东理工大学2010年硕士研究生领取准考证的通知我校2010年硕士入学考试准考证于2009年12月10日后由各学院发出，于12月25日未收到准考证的考生请与报考学院联系。具体注意事项如下：1、请仔细核对准考证上的考试科目，如有疑问请即与我办联系。联系电话：021-64252453。2、在华东理工大学参加考试的考生可于1月7日左右在我校研究生院网上查询具体考试地点。3、2010年硕士生入学考试成绩将于2010年3月初公布。考生可于3月初拨打声询电话021-16862505查询考试成绩，也可于研究生院网上查询。如对考试成绩有疑问，考生可申请查分，具体查分程序及时间将于1月上旬在本网站公布。4、国家复试分数基本要求下达以前，请不要来电、来人、来函咨询有关分数线问题。国家复试分数线估计在4月初公布。5、我校复试时间将安排在2010年4月中旬，达到国家复试分数线的考生是否具备复试资格，请考生于4月初上网查询，为了节省时间，我校将不再发放书面复试通知给复试考生，请考生于4月初随时关注我校研究生院网上通知，按规定时间来我校复试。6、我校将在考生复试时再次审查考生的有关证件原件，请考生按报考条件准备好有关材料(必须为原件和复印件)。毕业证书等材料无原件的考生一律不予复试。7、请妥善保管好准考证，复试时必须出示准考证。8、我校研究生招生的有关信息将即时在网上公布，请考生经常浏览。
en: East China University of Science and Technology received the notice of the admission card for the 2010 postgraduate entrance examination. Sina Education News The 2010 postgraduate entrance examination has entered the final stage of tension. The admission cards have been issued in a continuous way. Sina Examination Station has specially organized the relevant information of the admission card for candidates in various universities to facilitate them to check, and also reminds them not to miss the opportunity! I wish you all a successful examination! The following is: The notification of the admission card for the candidates of East China University of Science and Technology for the 2010 master's postgraduate entrance examination. The admission card for the 2010 master's entrance examination of our school was issued by each college after December 10, 2009. Candidates who have not received the admission card by December 25 should contact the college where they are applying for the examination. Specific precautions are as follows: 1. Please carefully check the examination subjects on the admission ticket. If you have any questions, please contact our office immediately. Tel: 021-64252453. 2. Candidates who take the examination at East China University of Science and Technology can query the specific examination place on our school's graduate school website around January 7. 3. The results of the 2010 Master's Entrance Examination will be announced in early March 2010. Candidates can dial the voice query telephone 021-16862505 to check the examination results in early March, or they can check the results on the website of the Graduate School. If a candidate has any questions about the examination results, he/she can apply for a score check. The specific score checking procedure and time will be published on this website in early January. 4. Please do not call, come, or write to ask about the score line until the national复试score basic requirements are issued. The national复试score line is expected to be announced in early April. 5. Our school's复试time will be arranged in mid April 2010. Candidates who have reached the national复试score line should check whether they have the qualification for复试on the Internet in early April. In order to save time, our school will not issue a written复试notification to the复试candidates. Please pay attention to the notification on the Internet of our school's Graduate School at any time in early April, and come to our school for the prescribed time. 6. Our school will review the relevant certificates of the examinees again when the candidates are复试. Please prepare the relevant materials (must be the original and copy) according to the application conditions. Candidates without the original graduation certificate and other materials are not allowed to复试. 7. Please keep your admission card well and show it when you are复试. 8. The relevant information of postgraduate recruitment of our school will be published online immediately, so please often browse.

content: 快讯：力合股份创投股午后活跃力合领涨力合股份(000532)。公司在创投概念股中处于领军者行列，拥有子公司珠海清华科技园创业投资公司57.15%的股权，后者主要从事珠海清华科技园的建设和经营、风险投资和高技术企业孵化。午后该股逆势拉升，截止13：33分，涨幅5.74%，报收11.63元。该股拉升的同时，其他创投股如紫光股份、大众公用、龙头股份都出现较大拉升。
en: Flash: Liheshare Venture Capital shares were active in the afternoon, and Liheshare (000532) led the rise. The company is a leader in the venture capital concept stock, with 57.15% equity of its subsidiary Zhuhai Tsinghua Science Park Venture Capital Co., which is mainly engaged in the construction and operation of Zhuhai Tsinghua Science Park, venture capital and high-tech enterprise incubation. The stock went up against the trend in the afternoon. As of 13:33, it rose 5.74% and closed at 11.63 yuan. While the stock was rising, other venture capital shares such as Ziguang, Volkswagen Utilities and Longtou Shares also rose significantly.

content: 合俊盼出售存货后向工人发薪内地厂房倒闭后被指欠薪的合俊集团，其临时清盘人李约翰表示，现时正了解该公司的财务状况，希望将公司的存货出售后，可以向工人派发所欠工资。
en: He John, the provisional liquidator of He Jun Group, who was accused of owing wages after the inland factory closed down, said that he is now trying to understand the financial状况of the company, hoping that after the company's inventory is sold, the wages owed to the workers can be paid.

content: 武汉两政府网站今起开通现在网消息本报讯(记者汪志通讯员昕蕾)昨日，武汉市工商局、市个私协、市消协会联合举办“两网”开通仪式，“武汉民营经济网”、“武汉消费网”正式启动运行。今起，全市近60万个体私营企业和1100万消费者可通过登录www.whmyjj.org(武汉民营经济网)和www.whxf315.org(武汉消费网)访问。“武汉民营经济网”由武汉市个私协主办，设立创业导航、投融资服务、名企维权、网络交易等9类一级栏目，无偿为企业提供查询信息、区域合作招商引资和多项便民服务。它将成为具有政策信息、互动交流及信息发布等功能的信息网络和发布平台。“武汉消费网”由武汉市消费者协会主办，设立消费要闻、消费资讯、消费一点通等8类消费服务类栏目和商品和服务监督、权威发布、消费投诉等7类消费维权类栏目，全面打造消费者维权、商品监督和政府决策参考的综合平台。
en: The two government websites of Wuhan were opened today. The reporter of the reporter (reporter Wang Zhixun, correspondent Xinlei) yesterday, the Wuhan Municipal Administration for Industry and Commerce, the Individual Private Association, and the Consumer Association jointly held the opening ceremony of the "Two Networks", and the "Wuhan Private Economy Network" and "Wuhan Consumer Network" were officially launched. From now on, nearly 600000 individual private enterprises and 11 million consumers in the city can log on to www.whmyjj.org (Wuhan Private Economy Network) and www.whxf315.org (Wuhan Consumer Network) to access them. "Wuhan Private Economy Network" is sponsored by Wuhan Individual Private Association, and has set up nine first-level columns, such as venture navigation, investment and financing services, rights protection of famous enterprises, and online trading, providing free information query, regional cooperation investment promotion and many convenience services for enterprises. It will become an information network and release platform with the functions of policy information, interactive communication and information release. "Wuhan Consumer Network" is sponsored by Wuhan Consumers' Association, and has set up eight consumer service categories, such as consumer news, consumer information, and consumer information, and seven consumer rights protection categories, such as commodity and service supervision, authoritative release, and consumer complaints, to create a comprehensive platform for consumer rights protection, commodity supervision and government decision-making reference.

content: 标致雪铁龙宣布任命菲利普-瓦兰为新总裁(图)2009年3月29日标致雪铁龙集团监委会主席堤埃里·标致主持会议，宣布结束斯特雷夫的集团总裁任期，任命菲利普-瓦兰为集团新总裁，任期自2009年6月1日始。从4月15日开始，菲利普·瓦兰将开始全面了解集团领导部门以及经营业务。集团执委会成员罗兰·瓦尔达内加，将临时担任集团总裁，直到菲利普·瓦兰正式接任总裁职位。目前执委会成员包括罗兰·瓦尔达内加，高兰和奥利维埃。集团监委会主席堤埃里·标致指出：集团监委会成员一致认为目前汽车行业面临的前所未有的困难迫使集团改变高级管理层。我坚信在菲利普·瓦兰的领导下，标致雪铁龙集团及其各个领导部门将发挥出最大的潜能。菲利普－瓦兰简历已婚，四个孩子菲利普-瓦兰，56岁，曾在两大集团—普基和康力斯任职。毕业于法国综合科技高等学院和法国矿业学院，菲利普-瓦兰于1978年入职法国普基集团，出任集团内各个不同部门的负责人(研发，管理控制，战略，项目部)，1995年被任命为集团Rhenalu分部的总经理，随后又于1999年出任集团铝业部门的负责人及执委会成员。2003年4月赴伦敦，在危难之际出任康力斯英国—荷兰钢铁冶金集团总裁，在他的领导下，集团的产业及财政规划得以重振，集团也得以扭亏为盈。为了巩固钢铁冶金行业取得的成绩以及保持集团的持续发展，他于2007年成功地促成了康力斯集团和印度塔塔钢铁公司的接触。塔塔钢铁公司请求他出任集团总裁为期2年，以最终促成并购。
person: 堤埃里·标致,高兰,罗兰·瓦尔达内加,菲利普-瓦兰,奥利维埃,斯特雷夫
en: Peugeot Citroen announced the appointment of Philippe Valan as the new president (picture) On March 29, 2009, Thierry Peugeot, chairman of the Peugeot Citroen Group Supervisory Committee, presided over a meeting to announce the end of Streff's term as President of the Group, and appointed Philippe Valan as the new president of the Group from June 1, 2009. Beginning on April 15, Philippe Valan will begin to fully understand the group's leadership department and business operations. Roland Valdaneja, a member of the Group's Executive Committee, will serve as the interim President of the Group until Philippe Valan officially takes office as President. The current members of the Executive Committee include Roland Valdaneja, Golan and Olivier. Thierry Peugeot, chairman of the Group's Supervisory Committee, pointed out that the unprecedented difficulties facing the automobile industry at present forced the Group to change its senior management. I firmly believe that under the leadership of Philippe Valan, Peugeot Citroen Group and its leadership departments will achieve their maximum potential. Philip - Valan's resume has four children. Philip - Valan, 56, has worked in two major groups - Puke and Conley. Graduated from the French Institute of Comprehensive Science and Technology and the French Mining Institute, Philip Valan joined the French Puke Group in 1978 and served as the leader of various departments (R&D, management control, strategy, project department) within the Group. In 1995, he was appointed as the general manager of the Rhenalu Branch of the Group. In 1999, he served as the head of the Group's aluminum department and a member of the Executive Committee. In April 2003, he went to London and served as the president of Conley UK - Netherland Steel Metallurgical Group in a time of crisis. Under his leadership, the industrial and financial planning of the Group has been revitalized, and the Group has been able to turn losses into profits. In order to consolidate the achievements of the steel metallurgy industry and maintain the sustainable development of the Group, he successfully promoted the contact between Conley Group and Tata Steel of India in 2007. Tata Steel asked him to serve as the group president for 2 years in order to promote the merger and acquisition.

content: 科比自作孽毁四大里程碑一素质他差乔丹太远太远新浪体育讯　北京时间4月23日，洛杉矶湖人客场96-101不敌俄克拉荷马雷霆，两队总比分被扳成2-1。科比-布莱恩特得到24分8次助攻，但凯文-杜兰特更胜一筹砍下29分19个篮板，外加拉塞尔-威斯布鲁克送上的27分，雷霆迎来球队搬入俄克拉荷马城后的第一场季后赛胜利。而科比，只能独自品尝失利的苦滋味了。从湖人队史角度来说，这本是一个需要铭记的夜晚，因为科比晋升为NBA历史第五大季后赛得分手，同时紫金军队史季后赛得分王也正式易主，从杰里-韦斯特传递给了科比。但如此的里程碑时刻，却以一场窝囊的输球告终，这恐怕让飞侠不愿意去回忆。湖人领先了3节却被年轻没经验的雷霆末节翻盘，科比不仅没有扮演救世主，反而成为输球重要原因。第四节后半段湖人落后命悬一线，科比想要站出来拯救球队，却因为自己过于蛮干而让胜利溜走，毫不客气的说是科比自己搅黄了自己的队史季后赛得分王登基典礼。很有讽刺意义的一点在于，科比最近四大里程碑时刻，都以球队输球告终。成为史上最年轻的25000分先生，湖人输给骑士常规赛被对手横扫；成为湖人队史常规赛得分王，湖人93-95输给实力平平的灰熊；总得分超越雷吉-米勒，湖人输给小牛；今天成为队史季后赛得分王，湖人输给雷霆。或许是天妒英才，科比就像中了什么特殊的“魔咒”，在里程碑时刻总是不能赢球。再一再二再三出现这种情况，就能从中找到些原因了。25000分输给骑士，科比出手31次，其中下半场15中3；超越韦斯特一役，科比出手28次；超越米勒一战，科比投篮是这几场最少但也达到23次，而且第四节几乎是毫无作为；今天，科比出手29次，其中扔了11个三分。四大里程碑比赛，科比平均投篮接近28次。从这些数字上不难看出，科比在这几个里程碑意义的比赛中都偏向于单打独斗，出手次数都明显超出赛季平均值，这，也成为球队输球一个不可回避的因素。谁都知道，科比的斗志好胜心是联盟中少有，他永远力求完美的做派确实是一柄双刃剑，用不好就伤了球队。就像有些人评价的，有时候看科比的比赛，他经常是有“困难要上，没有困难制造困难也要上”，救世主情节在他心中占据了太大的份额，像今天第四节这种关键时刻往往就丢掉了冷静。不得不再次提到那个说“滥”的话题：科比和乔丹。两人有太多太多相似之处，而在联盟历史上也很难找到比飞侠更接近乔丹的人了。但最接近，并不代表科比真的已经超越或者比肩昔日飞人，湖人当家的篮球境界确实高，但其赛场心智却还难以跟乔丹相提并论，同样的胜利渴望程度，可乔丹在大部分时候的处理球能力都相比科比冷静合理的多，像这种季后赛中因为迷恋自我而葬送球队的情况在颠覆乔丹身上几乎找不到。如果科比真能把这一点也提高到当年乔丹的水准，才能真正具备跟乔丹对比的资格。(vincent)
person: 凯文-杜兰特,杰里-韦斯特,vincent,科比,雷吉-米勒,威斯布鲁克,科比-布莱恩特,乔丹,拉塞尔-威斯布鲁克,杜兰特
en: Kobe Bryant ruined four major milestones. One quality of him is far too far away from Jordan Sina Sports News On April 23, Beijing time, the Los Angeles Lakers lost 96-101 away from the Oklahoma Thunder, and the total score of the two teams was evened at 2-1. Kobe Bryant scored 24 points and 8 assists, but Kevin Durant scored 29 points and 19 rebounds, plus 27 points from Russell Westbrook. The Thunder welcomed the team's first playoff victory after moving to Oklahoma City. As for Kobe, he can only taste the bitterness of defeat alone. From the perspective of the Lakers' history, it should have been a memorable night, because Kobe became the fifth largest scorer in the history of the NBA's playoffs, and the Purple Gold Army's scoring champion in the history of the playoffs officially changed from Jerry West to Kobe. But such a milestone moment ended in a frustrating defeat, which I'm afraid the Flyer is not willing to remember. The Lakers led for three quarters but were overturned in the last quarter by the young and inexperienced Thunder. Kobe didn't play the role of savior, but became the main reason for the loss. The Lakers fell behind by a thread in the second half of the fourth quarter. Kobe wanted to stand up and save the team, but he let victory slip away because he was too rude. It's not exaggerating to say that Kobe has ruined his own ceremony of becoming the king of playoff scoring in his team history. It is ironic that Kobe's recent four major milestone moments have all ended with the team's defeat. When he became the youngest 25000 point winner in history, the Lakers lost to the Cavaliers in the regular season; When he became the top scorer in the history of the Lakers' regular season, the Lakers lost to the mediocre Grizzlies 93-95; When he scored more than Reggie Miller, the Lakers lost to the Mavericks; Today, when he became the top scorer in the history of the team's playoffs, the Lakers lost to the Thunder. Perhaps God is jealous of talents. Kobe is like a special "curse". He always loses when he reaches the milestone moment. When this situation occurs again and again, we can find some reasons. 25000 points lost to the Cavaliers, Kobe shot 31 times, 15-3 in the second half; In the battle of surpassing West, Kobe made 28 shots; In the battle of surpassing Miller, Kobe made the least shots in these games, but he also made 23 shots, and almost did nothing in the fourth quarter; Today, Kobe made 29 shots, including 11 three points. The four milestone games, Kobe averaged nearly 28 shots. It is not difficult to see from these figures that Kobe tends to play alone in these milestone games, and the number of shots is significantly higher than the season average, which is also an inescapable factor in the team's defeat. As we all know, Kobe's fighting will is rare in the league. His pursuit of perfection is really a double-edged sword. If he doesn't use it well, he will hurt the team. As some people commented, sometimes watching Kobe's game, he often "has difficulties and no difficulties to create difficulties", and the savior plot takes up too much share in his heart, and he often loses his composure at this critical moment like today's fourth quarter. I have to mention again the topic of "abuse": Kobe and Jordan. The two have too many similarities, and it is hard to find someone closer to Jordan than the Flying Man in the league history. But the closest does not mean that Kobe has really surpassed or equaled the former flying man. The basketball realm of the Lakers' boss is indeed high, but his court mentality is far from comparable to Jordan. The same degree of victory desire, but Jordan's ball handling ability is much more calm and reasonable than Kobe's at most times. It is almost impossible to find this situation in the playoffs that sacrifices the team because of self obsession in the subversive Jordan. If Kobe can really improve this point to the level of Jordan in those years, he will truly have the qualifications to compare with Jordan. (Vincent)

content: 墨西哥西北部集体墓地挖出104具尸体中新网4月28日电据外电报道，墨西哥警方27日在西北部杜兰戈州首府再次在集体墓地中挖出8具不明身份的尸体，使得该市一个月来挖出的尸体总数达到104具。杜兰戈州司法部长办公室发布声明称，警方在杜兰戈市一家汽车修理车间墓坑的挖掘工作已经结束。包括27日挖出的8具尸体在内，在这个墓地中共挖出87具尸体。4月中旬，在距离这个汽车修理车间不到1英里的一个农场，警方找到17具已经腐烂的尸体。杜兰戈发现集体墓地，是一个月以来墨西哥发生的第二起类似事件。警方在东北部毗邻美国的塔毛利帕斯州发现了40个集体墓地，迄今已挖出183具尸体。报道称，自从4年前墨西哥总统卡尔德隆派出数千名安保士兵打击毒品走私犯罪以来，与贩毒有关的暴力活动已经造成3.46万人死亡。在打击毒品犯罪的行动中，发现集体墓地成为越来越常见的现象。
en: A total of 104 bodies were dug out from a collective grave in northwest Mexico. chinanews. com, April 28- The Mexico News reported that on the 27th, the Mexican police once again dug out eight unidentified bodies in the collective grave in Durango, the capital of Northwest Durango, making the total number of bodies dug out in the city in a month reach 104. The office of the Attorney General of Durango issued a statement saying that the police had finished the excavation work of the tomb pit in a car repair workshop in Durango City. A total of 87 bodies were found in this cemetery, including 8 bodies excavated on the 27th. In mid April, the police found 17 rotten bodies on a farm less than one mile away from the car repair shop. Durango's discovery of collective graves is the second such incident in Mexico in a month. The police found 40 collective graves in the state of Tamaulipas in the northeast, bordering the United States, and had dug up 183 bodies so far. It is reported that since four years ago, Mexican President Calderon sent thousands of security soldiers to crack down on drug smuggling, 34600 people have died from drug-related violence. In the campaign against drug crimes, the discovery of collective graves is becoming a common phenomenon.

content: 恒指触及箱体底部反弹时富金融周四，恒指收报22609.83点，下跌51.8点，跌幅为0.23%；国企指数收报12472.59点，下跌108.96点，跌幅为0.87%；大市成交807.5亿港元。由于美国经济有放缓迹象，且美联储未表示推出QE3倾向，美股继续小幅下跌。港股早盘小幅低开后，恒指顺势跌破年线，之后一度扩大跌势。但尾盘在地产股带动下快速拉升，跌势显著收窄。银行股继续弱势。除民生银行(01988.HK)逆市上涨1.53%外，其它内银股全线下跌，交通银行、农业银行、重庆农村商业银行均跌逾2%。港银股表现稍好，渣打集团、恒生银行小幅收涨。国际原油期货价格上升，且发改委表示年内有望推出新的成品油定价机制，可能将定价权下放给三大石油公司，刺激石化板块上扬。中石化冠德上涨2.91%，海峡石油化工、中石化涨逾1%，中海油、中石油小幅收涨。而航空股则受压明显，中国南方航空重挫4.75%，中国东方航空、中国国航均跌逾2%。全球范围经济放缓预期，以及收紧流动性的担忧，左右了近日疲弱的大市。恒指今向下考验了中期箱体波动区间的下限22400附近，之后获得支撑反弹。尽管已是六连跌，但周四尾盘的强势拉升，显示多头反击力量有所加强。下周内地又将迎来一系列宏观经济数据，将对大市起到重要影响，多空可能趋向谨慎。港股有望暂时出现一个顺息时机。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: On Thursday, the恒index touched the bottom of the box and rebounded when Fufu Finance closed at 22609.83 points, down 51.8 points, or 0.23%; The state-owned enterprise index closed at 12472.59 points, down 108.96 points, or 0.87%; The market traded 80.75 billion Hong Kong dollars. Due to the fact that the US economy shows signs of slowing down and the Fed has not indicated a tendency to launch QE3, the U.S. stock market continues to fall slightly. After the Hong Kong stock market opened slightly lower in the morning, the恒index broke through the annual line and then expanded its decline. However, at the end of the day, led by real estate stocks, it rose rapidly, significantly narrowing the decline. Bank stocks continued to be weak. In addition to Minsheng Bank (01988. HK), which rose against the market by 1.53%, other domestic bank stocks all fell, including Bank of Communications, Agricultural Bank of China, and Chongqing Rural Commercial Bank, which fell more than 2%. Hong Kong and Silver shares performed slightly better, with Standard Chartered Group and HSBC closing slightly higher. International crude oil futures prices rose, and the NDRC said that it is hoped that a new oil product pricing mechanism will be launched within the year, which may devolve pricing power to the three major oil companies, stimulating the petrochemical sector to rise. Sinopec Guande rose 2.91%, Strait Petrochemical, Sinopec and other petrochemical companies rose more than 1%, CNOOC and PetroChina closed slightly higher. However, the aviation sector was significantly under pressure, with China Southern Airlines plummeting 4.75%, China Eastern Airlines and Air China both fell more than 2%. In view of the global expectation of economic slowdown and the fear of tightening liquidity, the recent weak market has been influenced. The恒index tested the lower limit of 22400 in the medium-term box fluctuation range today, and then received support to rebound. Although it has fallen for six consecutive days, the strong rise at the end of Thursday's trading shows that the counterattack force of the many has been strengthened. Next week, another series of macroeconomic data will come in inland China, which will have an important impact on the market, and the long short may tend to be cautious. Hong Kong shares are expected to temporarily present an opportunity for interest. Welcome to publish comments I want to comment

content: 交警让违章司机写检查及格者可放行(图)卷面干净和语言通顺10分定性自己的违法行为30分思路清晰的改正措施30分认识违法行为的后果30分“我认识到了自己的错误，今后一定改正。”别以为你看到的是某个学生的检讨，这可是违法司机的“检查”。交警采取这样的教育方式，还有专门的打分标准，及格了，就能免予被拘留的处罚。交警表示，此举更多的是教育意义。-商报记者邢军通讯员李东亚半小时内查到7辆违法车昨日上午10时许，郑州市交警三大队民警，在郑密路黄岗寺附近进行交通整治活动。这里连接着郑石高速的入口，大货车、长途客车经常聚集，客车上下人也引来了很多拉客的机动三轮车，导致原本就繁忙的郑密路通行更不畅。民警在路口一边疏导交通，一边查处违法车辆。半个小时后，民警就查扣了7名司机的车辆，他们中4人是无证驾驶，1人驾车没带驾驶证，1人驾车逆行，1人驾车拉货但没关后车门。随后，这7名司机都被带到交警三大队春晖路事故停车场接受处理。事故车前先上堂警示课据交警郑敏军讲，按照交通法的规定，无证驾驶要被处以15日以下拘留，1500元以下罚款。如果按照这种标准，有5人面临很严厉的处罚。但事实上，交警并没有对他们采用这种简单的罚款、拘留的方式，而是重点进行批评教育。在事故停车场内，民警郑敏军将7人带到了一辆已成废铁的事故轿车旁，告诉他们：11月21日，在郑密路上，一辆东风大货车在违法超车时，从右前侧撞上这辆比亚迪F3轿车，轿车被撕裂为两半，轿车司机当场死亡。而货车司机也为自己的行为付出了惨痛的代价。“很多事故都是由我们违法驾驶导致的，眼前就是一个很惨痛的教训。”郑敏军说。“及格”可免予拘留处罚之后，民警给每个人发了一张纸，让他们看事故写“故事”，分4个部分。而且，交警还给他们宣读了打分标准，及格线为60分，及格了可免予拘留处罚。评分标准是这样定的：第一部分是卷面干净，语言通顺，10分；第二部分是给自己的违法行为定性，要全面准确，30分；第三部分是对此行为的改正措施，要思路清晰，30分；第四部分是违法行为的后果，要认识到位，30分。“我叫华廷杰，4日上午被交警查了，我没有驾驶证，违反了法律，以后一定吸取这个教训，安全驾驶。”这是华廷杰所写的“故事”的一段，小学毕业的他写得很专心。“该咋说咋说，俺确实不对，以后一定改。”司机苏建国说。“其实打分只是一种形式，主要是看他们态度如何。作为交警的一种管理手段，可以对认错态度好的司机减轻或免予处罚。”交警郑敏军说，同时，这就相当于一份保证书，如果下次再被交警查到，就要按法律来处理了。
person: 华廷杰,郑敏军,苏建国,邢军,李东亚
en: Traffic police let the driver who violates the rules write a pass (picture) The paper is clean and the language is smooth. 10 points define his own illegal behavior. 30 points define the clear corrective measures. 30 points recognize the consequences of the illegal behavior. 30 points "I realized my mistake and will correct it in the future." Don't think that what you see is a student's self criticism. This is the "examination" of the illegal driver. The traffic police adopt such an educational approach, which has a special scoring standard. If you pass the exam, you will be exempt from detention. The traffic police said that this move is more educational. -邢Jun, a business reporter and a communication worker in East Asia, found seven illegal vehicles within half an hour. At about 10:00 yesterday morning, the police of Zhengzhou Traffic Police Detachment conducted a traffic rectification activity near Huang Gang Temple, Zhengmi Road. This is connected with the entrance of Zhengshi Expressway. Large trucks and long-distance buses often gather here, and many motorized tricycles that pull passengers also attract passengers, which makes the busy Zhengmi Road less passable. While the police were directing traffic at the intersection, they were also investigating and dealing with illegal vehicles. Half an hour later, the police checked and detained the vehicles of seven drivers, four of whom were driving without a license, one was driving without a driver's license, one was driving in the wrong direction, and one was driving with goods but did not close the back door. Later, the seven drivers were all taken to the Chunhui Road Accident Parking Lot of the Third Traffic Police Detachment for handling. According to Zheng Minjun, the traffic police, in front of the accident vehicle, we should first have a warning class. According to the provisions of the Traffic Law, driving without a license shall be detained for less than 15 days and fined less than 1500 yuan. If this standard is followed, five people will face severe punishment. But in fact, the traffic police did not adopt this simple way of fines and detention for them, but focused on criticism and education. In the accident parking lot, the police, Zheng Minjun, took the seven people to a scrapped accident car and told them: On November 21, on Zhengmi Road, a Dongfeng truck hit this BYD F3 car from the right front side when it was overtaking illegally, the car was torn in half, and the car driver died on the spot. The truck driver also paid a painful price for his behavior. "Many accidents are caused by our illegal driving, and this is a very painful lesson." said Zheng Minjun. After being "qualified", the police gave everyone a piece of paper and asked them to write "story" according to the accident, which was divided into four parts. Moreover, the traffic police also announced the scoring standards to them. The pass line is 60 points, and those who pass the examination can be exempt from detention. The scoring criteria are defined as follows: The first part is clean and fluent, 10 points; The second part is to define our own illegal acts, which should be comprehensive and accurate, 30 points; The third part is the corrective measures for this behavior, which should be clear, 30 points; The fourth part is the consequences of the illegal act, which should be recognized, 30 points. "My name is Huatingjie. On the morning of the 4th, the traffic police checked me. I had no driver's license. I violated the law. I will learn from this lesson and drive safely in the future." This is a paragraph of the "story" written by Huatingjie, who graduated from primary school and wrote very attentively. "Say what you want, I'm really wrong, I must change later." Said Su Jinping, the driver. "In fact, scoring is just a form, mainly to see their attitude. As a management tool of the traffic police, drivers with good attitude of admitting mistakes can be punished less or exempted from punishment." Zheng Minjun, the traffic police, said. At the same time, this is equivalent to a guarantee. If the driver is checked by the traffic police again next time, he will be dealt with according to the law.

content: 洪卓立不惧绯闻与诗雅汤怡三人行(图)新浪娱乐讯北京时间7月13日消息，据香港媒体报道，英皇歌手洪卓立(Ken)曾与汤怡和诗雅传绯闻，日前三人竟相约到香港铜锣湾逛街，“情敌”汤怡和诗雅不但没有不理不睬，还手挽手逛商场，毫无芥蒂。三人先到一家健康用品中心，Ken试坐按摩椅时，两女还为他调校按摩速度，十分细心。之后他们转战运动铺，当诗雅试球鞋时，汤怡就独占Ken，帮他选运动服，状甚亲昵。其后三人一起去吃雪糕，两女连一支甜筒都要两人吃，诗雅更喂汤怡吃，又帮对方抹嘴，反而将Ken冷落一旁。事后香港记者致电Ken，取笑他左右逢源，Ken就否认和她们拍拖：“她们好人又靓女，见我身体刚刚好，就想陪我跑步做运动。”传过绯闻不怕尴尬？“两个都是好朋友，绯闻没影响我们的感情。”(俐俐/文)
en: Hong Zhuo Li is not afraid of scandal with three people, including Shi Ya Tang Yi (picture) Sina Entertainment News On July 13, Beijing time, according to the Hong Kong media, Emperor singer Hong Zhuo Li (Ken) once had a scandal with Tang Yi and Shi Ya. Recently, the three people actually made an appointment to go shopping in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. "Rival" Tang Yi and Shi Ya not only ignored him, but also hand in hand to shop in the mall without any scruples. The three people first went to a health center. When Ken tried to sit on the massage chair, the two women also adjusted the massage speed for him, very carefully. Then they switched to sports. When Shuya tried on shoes, Tang Yi took Ken alone to help him choose sports clothes, which was very affectionate. Later, the three went to eat ice cream together. The two women even wanted two people to eat a cone, and Shi Ya fed Tang Yi to eat, and helped the other to wipe his mouth, leaving Ken out in the cold. After that, Hong Kong journalists called Ken and made fun of him. Ken denied that he was dating them: "They are good and beautiful. Seeing that I am just right, I want to accompany me to run and exercise." I'm not afraid of embarrassment when I spread scandal? "Both are good friends, and the scandal has not affected our feelings." (Li Li/Document)

content: 全国4月自考中国古代文学史(一)考试说明课程代码：00538为组织好高等教育自学考试《中国古代文学史(一)》课程的全国统一考试命题工作，根据全国统一命题课程的有关规定，特制定本说明。一、考试原则1、考试标准本课程考试参照全日制普通高校同专业、同层次、同课程的本科结业水平，并体现自学考试以培养应用型人才为主要目标的特点。在题量上能够使中等水平的考生在规定的考试时间内完成全部试题的作答，并有适当的时间检查作答情况。2、考试依据和范围本课程考试以全国高等教育自学考试指导委员会2000年10月颁布的《中国古代文学史(一)自学考试大纲》为依据；以《中国古代文学史(一)》教材(罗宗强、陈洪主编，华东师范大学出版社，2000年10月第1版)为考试范围。3、考试内容本课程考试内容覆盖到章。其中，重点章节为第一编中的第二、三、四章，第二编中的第二、三、四章，第三编中的第一、二、三、四、五、六章，第四编中的第二、三、四、五、六、七、十章，考核分数比例约为70%；次重点章节为第二编中的第一章，第三编中的第七、八、九章，第四编中的第一、八章，考核分数比例约为25%；一般章节为第一编中的第一章，第四编中的第九章，考核分数比例约为5%。二、考试形式与考试题型1、考试形式本课程考试采用闭卷笔试形式，考试时间150分钟，满分为100分，及格分数为60分。2、考试题型本课程考试采用的题型为：单项选择题、多项选择题、名词解释题、简答题、论述题等。三、有关本课程的特殊要求(包括考生可以携带的工具)无。
en: In order to organize the national unified examination proposition of the self-examination examination of Ancient Chinese Literature History (1) in April, in accordance with the relevant provisions of the national unified examination proposition course, this explanation is specially formulated. 1. Examination principles 1. Examination standards This course examination refers to the undergraduate graduation level of the same major, level and course of full-time general colleges and universities, and reflects the characteristics of the self-examination examination, which aims to cultivate applied talents. In terms of quantity, candidates of medium level can complete the whole examination questions within the prescribed examination time, and there is appropriate time to check the answers. 2. Examination basis and scope This course examination is based on the self-examination examination outline of Ancient Chinese Literature History (1) issued by the National Higher Education Self Examination Guidance Committee in October 2000; The textbook of "Ancient Chinese Literature History (1)" (Luo Zongqiang, Chen Hong, eds., East China Normal University Press, October 2000, 1st edition) is the scope of the examination. 3. Examination content The examination content of this course covers the chapter. Among them, the key chapters are the second, third and fourth chapters in the first compilation, the second, third and fourth chapters in the second compilation, the first, second, third, fourth, fifth and sixth chapters in the third compilation, and the second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth and seventh chapters in the fourth compilation. The examination score ratio is about 70%; The secondary key chapter is the first chapter in the second compilation, the seventh, eighth and ninth chapters in the third compilation, and the first and eighth chapters in the fourth compilation. The examination score ratio is about 25%; The first chapter in the first compilation and the ninth chapter in the fourth compilation are general chapters, with an examination score ratio of about 5%. 2. Examination form and examination question type 1. Examination form This course examination adopts the closed book written examination form, with an examination time of 150 minutes, a full score of 100 points and a pass score of 60 points. 2. Examination question type The question type adopted for this course examination is: single choice question, multiple choice question, term explanation question, short answer question, discussion question, etc. 3. Special requirements for this course (including tools that candidates can carry) None.

content: 西甲-塞维利亚争议球胜潜水艇阿圭罗进球马竞告捷新浪体育讯　北京时间12月15日00:00(西班牙当地时间14日17:00)，2008/09赛季西班牙足球甲级联赛第15轮展开8场争夺，塞维利亚主场1比0力克比利亚雷亚尔，马德里竞技主场2比0取胜贝蒂斯，桑坦德竞技客场1比1战平阿尔梅利亚，毕尔巴鄂竞技主场3比0完胜希洪竞技，赫塔菲主场4比1大胜马洛卡，马拉加主场2比0取胜努曼西亚，奥萨苏纳客场0比1不敌维尔瓦，巴拉多利德主场3比0完胜拉科鲁尼亚。塞维利亚主场1比0力克比利亚雷亚尔。比利亚雷亚尔西甲历史上7次做客对阵塞维利亚落败6场。塞维利亚半场补时打入争议入球，阿德里亚诺头球顶入禁区，卡努特停球，雷纳托6码处外脚背弹射破门。但回放显示卡努特触球时雷纳托稍稍越位。第53分钟，洛伦特累计两张黄牌被罚下。塞维利亚错失多次破门良机，但仍最终取胜。马德里竞技主场2比0取胜贝蒂斯。马竞此前4个联赛主场对阵贝蒂斯取得2平2负。第20分钟，马尼切直传，马克西-罗德里格斯禁区右侧射入近角。第81分钟，弗兰快速反击中助攻阿圭罗扩大比分。马竞取得主场4连胜。桑坦德竞技客场1比1战平阿尔梅利亚。桑坦德上赛季双杀阿尔梅利亚。第33分钟，穆尼蒂斯拨出任意球，阿根廷后卫加雷30码处远射入网。阿尔梅利亚第62分钟扳平比分，阿萨西蒂接角球在混战中破门。第63分钟，桑坦德后卫拉岑累计两张黄牌被罚下。阿尔梅利亚终结3连败。毕尔巴鄂竞技主场3比0完胜希洪竞技。希洪竞技上次客场取胜毕尔巴鄂还是17年前。第6分钟，伊万-赫尔南德斯禁区内对洛伦特犯规，后者亲自主罚点球命中。第23分钟，戴维-洛佩斯开出角球，洛伦特和瓦雷斯连续头球摆渡，伊劳拉近距离破门。第32分钟，耶斯特直传，戴维-洛佩斯禁区左侧半凌空射入远角。主场3连胜的毕尔巴鄂近14战希洪取得11胜3平保持不败。赫塔菲主场4比1大胜马洛卡。第14分钟，卢克斯禁区内对乌切犯规，孔特拉点球一蹴而就。第31分钟，波兰斯基直传，乌切禁区前挑射破门。马洛卡第33分钟扳回一城，苏亚雷斯在禁区右侧的射门被扑出后快速传球，前毕尔巴鄂前锋阿杜里斯补射入网。第72分钟，孔特拉禁区边缘射门被挡后偏转，马努补射上角入网。第85分钟，格雷隆禁区右侧的射门打中近角立柱，加维兰-马丁内斯补射入网。7轮不胜的马洛卡遭遇3连败。马拉加主场2比0取胜努曼西亚。第86分钟，贝利维斯禁区内对埃利塞乌犯规，阿波诺点球一蹴而就。第90分钟，埃利塞乌直传，巴哈射入左上角锁定胜局。奥萨苏纳客场0比1不敌维尔瓦。第84分钟，格雷罗直传，科伦加禁区左侧射入远角。维尔瓦西甲联赛上7战奥萨苏纳取得5胜2平保持不败。客场迄今未胜的奥萨苏纳遭遇客场5连败。巴拉多利德主场3比0完胜拉科鲁尼亚。拉科此前6场联赛对阵巴拉多利德取得3胜3平保持不败。第15分钟，莱昂右路摆脱菲利佩后传中偏转，塞斯马-冈萨雷斯抢在洛波之前近距离破门。第25分钟，后卫佩德罗-洛佩斯40码处远射破门。第56分钟，多拉多传球，佩德罗-莱昂右路远射入网。巴拉多利德主场4连胜，拉科3连胜被终结。
person: 卢克斯,马努,巴哈,马克西-罗德里格斯,加维兰-马丁内斯,雷纳托,佩德罗-洛佩斯,伊万-赫尔南德斯,阿波诺,穆尼蒂斯,阿圭罗,埃利塞乌,苏亚雷斯,多拉多,格雷罗,耶斯特,孔特拉,佩德罗-莱昂,卡努特,弗兰,伊劳拉,戴维-洛佩斯,加雷,洛伦特,阿杜里斯,乌切,马尼切,马里,洛波,阿德里亚诺
en: La Liga - Seville controversial ball wins submarine Aguero goal Atletico Madrid Sina Sports News Beijing time December 15, 00:00 (17:00 on December 14, local time in Spain), the 15th round of the 2008/09 Spanish Football League opened eight competitions. Seville beat Villarreal 1-0 at home, Atletico Madrid beat Betis 2-0 at home, Santander beat Almeria 1-1 away, Athletic Bilbao beat Sporting Gijon 3-0 at home, Getafe beat Mallorca 4-1 at home, Malaga beat Numancia 2-0 at home, Osasuna lost 0-1 away to Villarreal, and Valladolid beat Deportivo La Coruna 3-0 at home. Sevilla beat Villarreal 1-0 at home. Villarreal lost six times in his seven visits to Seville in the history of La Liga. Sevilla scored a controversial goal in the first half. Adriano headed the ball into the restricted area. Kanut stopped the ball. Renato scored a goal from the outside of the 6 yard area. But the replay shows that Renato was slightly offside when Kanut touched the ball. In the 53rd minute, Lorento received a red card for two yellow cards. Seville missed many chances to score but still won in the end. Atletico Madrid beat Betis 2-0 at home. Atletico Madrid had two draws and two losses in the previous four league home games against Betis. In the 20th minute, Maniche passed the ball directly, and Maxi Rodriguez shot into the near corner on the right side of the restricted area. In the 81st minute, Fran quickly counter attacked to help Aguero to increase the score. Atletico Madrid achieved a four consecutive home victories. Santander drew 1-1 away from Almeria. Santander killed Almeria last season. In the 33rd minute, Munitis dialed a free kick, and Argentine defender Garay shot and scored from 30 yards away. Almeria equalized in the 62nd minute. Assaciti took a corner kick and scored in the chaos. In the 63rd minute, Santander's defender Lacen received two yellow cards and was sent off. Almeria ended the three consecutive defeats. Athletic Bilbao beat Sporting Gijon 3-0 at home. It was 17 years ago that Sporting Gijon last won a victory away from Bilbao. In the 6th minute, Ivan Hernandez fouled Lorente in the restricted area, and the latter scored a penalty kick. In the 23rd minute, David Lopez opened the corner, Lorente and Varas continued to head the ball, and Iraola scored a goal at close range. In the 32nd minute, Yeste passed directly, and David Lopez shot into the far corner from the left side of the restricted area. Bilbao, who won three consecutive home games, has achieved 11 wins and 3 draws in the past 14 battles with Xihong, and has remained unbeaten. Getafe beat Mallorca 4-1 at home. In the 14th minute, Lukas fouled Uche in the restricted area, and Contrar scored a penalty shot in one go. In the 31st minute, Polish skiing passed the ball straight, and Uche shot and scored in front of the restricted area. Mallorca equalized in the 33rd minute. Suárez's shot in the right side of the restricted area was saved and then quickly passed the ball. Adueris, the former Bilbao forward, made up the shot and scored. In the 72nd minute, Contrar shot from the edge of the restricted area and turned it away. Ma Nu made up the shot in the upper corner of the goal and scored. In the 85th minute, Grellon's shot from the right side of the restricted area hit the near corner post, and Garvan Martin made up the shot and scored. Mallorca, which has not won in seven rounds, suffered three consecutive defeats. Malaga beat Numancia 2-0 at home. In the 86th minute, Belvis fouled Eliseu in the restricted area, and Apoeno scored a penalty shot in one go. In the 90th minute, Eliseu passed the ball straight and Bahar shot into the upper left corner to lock the victory. Osasuna lost 0-1 away from Villarreal. In the 84th minute, Guerrero passed the ball directly, and Colonja shot into the far corner from the left side of the restricted area. Villarreal's 7-0 victory over Osasuna in the La Liga match remained unbeaten. Osasuna, who has not won away from home so far, has suffered five consecutive defeats away from home. Valladolid beat Deportivo La Coruna 3-0 at home. Deportivo La Coruna had played 6-0 against Valladolid in the previous six league matches, with 3-3-0 victories. In the 15th minute, León broke away from Felipe on the right and passed it to Sesma Gonzales, who scored a close goal before Lobo. In the 25th minute, the defender Pedro Lopez scored a long shot from 40 yards away. In the 56th minute, Dorado passed the ball and Pedro León shot and scored from the right side. Valladolid won four consecutive home games, and Deo's three consecutive victories ended.

content: 瀚民看盘：资金有选择地进场上周冲高遇阻之后，为什么调整很难大幅展开？答：今年上半年的时候，市场呈现下跌盘整再下跌的态势，大家都盼着有反弹，但盘整就是反弹；7月初行情出现转机之后，盘整是不是就可以代替大幅回调，这是值得关注的。一般来说，在一个以老股民为主的市场氛围中，横盘等于就是调整。所以，目前的市场恐怕不会出现过于剧烈的调整。周一上午盘面似乎又有新的买盘进场，是否可以看着又有增量资金介入了呢？答：能够推动指数上扬，肯定是由资金介入造成的。不过，同两个星期以前相比，现在市场资金是有选择地进场，这跟前一段时间的情况是完全不同的。场外资金选择怎样的股票进入的呢？答：从最近两周的情况来看，农林牧渔以及食品饮料是资金注入比较明显的地方。除此之外，周一上海重组股又风起云涌，这说明重组题材也是近期资金介入的一条主线。总的来看，一是通胀，二是重组，这恐怕在未来一段时间都是我们关注的重点。中期市场的趋势怎样？答：7月初行情出现了拐点，经过短暂的逼空拉升之后，近期进行修复整理。由于短期市场迅速积累起了大量的获利筹码，估计这种消化整理的过程会比较长，不大可能再次出现逼空的态势。如果是这样的话，在保持对市场趋势坚定信心的同时，从操作层面上说，应当保持克制。看中的股票要坚持低吸进场的原则。郭勇斌(瀚民)已有_COUNT_条评论我要评论
en: Hanmin's view on the market: After the funds chose to enter the market last week, they encountered resistance. Why is it hard to make substantial adjustments? Answer: In the first half of this year, the market showed a trend of falling and consolidating again, and everyone was hoping for a rebound, but consolidation was the rebound; After the market changed in early July, it is worth paying attention to whether consolidation can replace a substantial pullback. Generally speaking, in a market atmosphere dominated by old stock traders, horizontal trading is equal to adjustment. Therefore, the current market is unlikely to experience too drastic adjustments. On Monday morning, there seems to be a new buying order coming in. Can we see that there is incremental funds coming in? Answer: The intervention of funds must push the index up. However, compared with two weeks ago, the market funds now choose to enter the market, which is completely different from the situation in the previous period. What kind of stocks do the off-site funds choose to enter? Answer: From the situation in the past two weeks, agriculture, forestry, animal husbandry and fishery, as well as food and beverage, are the places where funds are injected more obviously. In addition, on Monday, the restructuring stocks in Shanghai were back on the rise, which shows that the theme of restructuring is also the main line of recent fund intervention. In general, inflation and restructuring are probably the focus of our attention for some time in the future. What is the trend of the medium-term market? Answer: The market turned at the beginning of July. After a short forced emptying and lifting, it has recently been repaired and sorted out. Since the short-term market has quickly accumulated a large number of profitable chips, it is estimated that the process of digestion and consolidation will be long, and it is unlikely that there will be another forced emptying trend. In this case, while maintaining firm confidence in the market trend, we should be restrained in terms of operation. The principle of insisting on low suction when entering the market should be followed for the targeted stocks. Guo Yongbin (Hanmin) has _COUNT_ comments I want to comment

content: 货币基金将被实时监控杜绝片面追求收益和规模⊙本报记者徐婧婧昨日，中国证监会与中央国债登记结算有限责任公司签署合作监管备忘录，再次加强对货币市场基金的监管。据悉，在双方签署备忘录后，中债登将向中国证监会提供货币市场基金的交易数据，以便证监会能够实时监控货币市场基金在操作上的异常情况，从而及时监管。事实上，2008年下半年以来，货币市场基金规模出现迅猛扩张，为此，证监会曾于11月17日做出风险提示，严禁基金公司采用“长券短做”“藏券”等违规操作，杜绝片面追求收益率和基金规模的做法。天相数据统计显示，2008年末，货币市场基金占全部基金净值的比例从3.39%上升到20.63%。相较于股票市场的价格主要通过公开竞价，货币市场交易产品价格受到人为因素影响的可能性较大，此次证监会与中债登合作推出的监控系统或将解决上述难题。根据新系统，如果双方交易价格严重偏离由长期收益率曲线决定的价格区间，将被纳入预警范围，该交易产品的交易双方、转移路径都会被监测。一旦发现违反规则的操作行为，证监会将对其进行不同程度的惩罚。
en: The monetary fund will be monitored in real time to avoid the pursuit of returns and scale. ⊙ Reporter Xu Jiejie Yesterday, the China Securities Regulatory Commission and the Central Bond Registration and Settlement Co., Ltd. signed a cooperation supervision memorandum to further strengthen the supervision of money market funds. It is reported that after the two sides signed the memorandum, China Bond will provide the China Securities Regulatory Commission with the trading data of money market funds, so that the CSRC can monitor the abnormalities of money market funds in operations in real time, and then supervise them in time. In fact, since the second half of 2008, the scale of money market funds has expanded rapidly. For this reason, the CSRC made a risk warning on November 17, prohibiting fund companies from adopting illegal operations such as "long term short term" and "hidden coupons", and avoiding the practice of片面pursuing yield and fund scale. Tianxiang data statistics show that at the end of 2008, the proportion of money market funds in the net value of all funds rose from 3.39% to 20.63%. Unlike the stock market, the price of which is mainly determined by open bidding, the price of money market trading products is more likely to be affected by human factors. The monitoring system launched by the CSRC in cooperation with Zhongzhai may solve the above problems. Under the new system, if the transaction price of both sides deviates seriously from the price range determined by the long-term yield curve, it will be included in the early warning range, and both sides of the transaction products and the transfer path will be monitored. Once a violation of the rules is found, the CSRC will punish it to different degrees.

content: 安全专家称苹果iPad存在安全问题【赛迪网讯】1月29日消息，据国外媒体报道，一位移动安全专家星期四说，苹果新的iPad平板电脑可能存在影响iPhone(手机上网)手机的同样的加密薄弱的安全问题。移动安全公司SMobileSystem的首席技术官DanielHoffman说，如果iPad使用iPhone手机相同的加密方式，包括手机号码和电子邮件地址在内的敏感的个人数据就会被人窃取和查看。Hoffman说，iPhone安全加密问题基本上是没有任何价值的。这个加密措施很容易绕过去。第二，如果iPad用户从苹果应用程序商店获得自己的应用程序，他们就有偶尔得到恶意软件的风险。他指出，苹果应用程序商店一直存在恶意软件。Hoffman说，此外，iPad还会像其它使用不安全的WiFi网络的设备一样遭到中间人攻击。SMobile正在开发一个防御这种攻击的工具。在这种攻击中，攻击者能够拦截移动设备通过WiFi网络发送的互联网通讯，同时假冒通讯中的合法的一方注入新的信息。他说，iPad还存在管理能力问题，如选择使用PIN或者口令代码、一旦丢失或者被窃之后远程锁死和删除功能等。iPhone提供帮助查找丢失的手机和远程删除数据的功能，但是，这项服务非常昂贵，每年收费100美元。苹果发言人没有对这个消息发表评论。作者：天虹
en: Security experts say that Apple's iPad has security problems. (Saidnews) On January 29, according to foreign media reports, a mobile security expert said on Thursday that Apple's new iPad tablet computer may have the same encryption weakness and security problems as the iPhone (mobile Internet) mobile phone. Daniel Hoffman, chief technology officer of SMobileSystem, a mobile security company, said that if the iPad uses the same encryption as the iPhone, sensitive personal data including mobile phone numbers and email addresses will be stolen and viewed. Hoffman said that the iPhone security encryption problem is basically worthless. This encryption measure is very easy to bypass. Secondly, if iPad users get their own applications from the Apple App Store, they are at risk of occasionally getting malware. He pointed out that there has always been malicious software in the Apple App Store. Hoffman said that in addition, the iPad will be subject to a man-in-the-middle attack like other devices that use insecure WiFi networks. SMobile is developing a tool to defend against this attack. In this attack, the attacker can intercept the Internet communications sent by the mobile device via the WiFi network and inject new information by pretending to be a legitimate party in the communication. He said that the iPad also has management problems, such as choosing to use PIN or password code, locking and deleting functions once it is lost or stolen. The iPhone provides a function to help find a lost mobile phone and delete data remotely, but this service is very expensive, with an annual fee of $100. An Apple spokesman declined to comment on the news. Author: Tian Hong

content: 金融街西单广场即将带来商务办公新体验在投资界有这么一句话“80年代看珠三角，90年代看长三角，21世纪看环渤海经济圈”。毋庸置疑，环渤海经济圈作为中国经济的第三增长极，在吸取了珠三角和长三角的经验和教训之后，城市群和经济圈的理念业已成熟，成为了中国发展最快速、最规范、最国际化的经济发展核心。在“环渤海经济圈”波澜壮阔的发展进程中，随着京津城际高速铁路的开通，规划多年的“京津一体化”已成为现实，使得北京、天津两地的各种产业得到迅速发展，吸引了世界各国顶级资源云集于此，成为中国最具发展潜力的核心所在。而“新京津”的诞生，亦促使众多嗅觉灵敏的地产大鳄纷纷北上，在“新京津”区域范围内“走马圈地”，一场轰轰烈烈的房地产开发大战在此隆重上演。古人云：善弈者，谋势，不善弈者，谋子。金融街控股集团无疑是善于“运筹帷幄”的实力房企，因为当其他房企在京津两地采取传统的“买地盖房”开发策略之际，作为国内最具城市运营理念和商业地产开发经验的金融街控股集团，却凭借将北京金融街打造成为“中国的华尔街”的深厚商业地产开发经验，以打造京津商务新地标为己任，于天津中心城区海河沿岸铸造了“华北第一高楼”津塔，在北京最具商务氛围的西单商圈缔造了金融街西单广场(论坛相册户型样板间点评地图搜索)两大地标性商务旗舰项目，成就了“双星闪耀”环渤海经济圈的非凡气势，由此上演一幕气势恢宏的商业地产开发“双城记”。作为“华北第一高楼”的津塔写字楼，高达336.9米，已于2010年1月14日正式封顶，在世界已建成的摩天大楼中排名第25位。津塔写字楼内外兼修，无论是建筑结构体系设计还是设施设备应用，都采用了国际领先技术。虽然津塔2011年才能建成入驻，但目前其已经吸引了逾50家世界500强企业前来洽谈，准备选址于此。继津塔取得令人艳羡的市场成就之后，金融街控股集团剑指北京西单商圈，在此精心打造了又一商务地标性建筑——金融街西单广场，续写全新的商务发展传奇。无可比拟的优越地理属性，是金融街西单广场领袖京城商务地产市场核心价值所在，其南接“神州第一街”长安街，东临国家政治中心中南海，西咫尺紧邻京城金融核心所在地金融街，汇集全北京各大优秀资源于一体，坐享世界级繁华成熟配套，奠定了首屈一指的商务办公氛围。同时，金融街西单广场周边聚集了长安街、西二环等城市交通主干道，并紧邻地铁一号线以及地铁4号线灵境胡同站，由此形成了快捷通达的立体交通网络系统，可迅速连接京城各大核心商圈，有利于商务活动的顺利开展。此外，对于建筑品质的精益求精，亦是金融街西单广场在竞争激烈的京城商务市场脱颖而出的又一大制胜利器。金融街西单广场特别设置了10米挑高独立大堂、独立出入口，为入驻企业营造了往来于西单繁华万象之中，静享独立办公之纯粹商务氛围。同时，其还以世界级标准，在写字楼内营造了空中生态景观休闲空间，开启绿色生态办公新潮流。而面积阔达7700平方米的标准层，则以方正规划布局、空间灵活实用、超高使用率的产品特色，满足实力企业不同的办公需求，成就顶级商务办公新体验。此外，金融街西单广场自身还配备了近5万平方米的商业设施，将以奢华购物中心、会议中心为业态规划方向，为入驻企业提供了繁华便利的商务配套。金融街西单广场的非凡品质，使其和“华北第一高楼”津塔一样，尚在建设之中却已名声在外。目前，已经有数十家实力企业意欲购买金融街西单广场作为办公所在地，其火爆的市场前景由此可见一斑。我要评论房产导航：
en: The Financial Street Xidan Square in the Financial Street is going to bring a new experience of office work. There is a saying in the investment industry that "in the 1980s, we looked at the Pearl River Delta, in the 1990s, we looked at the Yangtze River Delta, and in the 21st century, we looked at the Bohai Rim Economic Circle". There is no doubt that as the third growth pole of China's economy, the Bohai Rim Economic Circle has matured the concept of urban agglomerations and economic circles after learning from the experience and lessons of the Pearl River Delta and the Yangtze River Delta, and has become the core of China's most rapid, standardized and international economic development. In the grand development process of the "Bohai Rim Economic Circle", with the opening of the Tianjin Beijing Intercity High Speed Railway, the planned "Beijing Tianjin Integration" has become a reality, which has made various industries in Beijing and Tianjin develop rapidly, attracted top resources from all over the world to gather here, and become the core of China's most potential development. The birth of "New Beijing Tianjin" also prompted many real estate tycoons with keen sense of smell to go north, "circle land" in the "New Beijing Tianjin" area, and an ambitious real estate development war was staged here. As the old saying goes: Good chess players, strategists, and bad chess players, strategists. Financial Street Investment Holding Group is undoubtedly a powerful real estate enterprise that is good at "maneuvering and commanding", because when other real estate enterprises adopt the traditional "land purchase and housing construction" development strategy in Beijing and Tianjin, as the financial street investment holding group with the most urban operation concept and commercial real estate development experience in China, it has relied on the deep commercial real estate development experience of building Beijing Financial Street into "China's Wall Street", and has made it its mission to create a new landmark for business in Beijing and Tianjin. It has cast the "North China's First Skyscraper" Jin Tower in the central urban area of Tianjin along the Haihe River, and has created two landmark business flagship projects of Financial Street Xidan Square (picture album model room review map search) in Xidan business district, the most business atmosphere in Beijing, which has achieved the extraordinary momentum of "Bingang Economic Circle" with "Doubles Star Shining", and has launched a grand commercial real estate development "Tales of Two Cities". As the "first tallest building in North China", the Jin Tower office building, 336.9 meters high, officially topped out on January 14, 2010, ranking 25th among the world's skyscrapers that have been built. The Jin Tower office building is well equipped with both internal and external structures. Both the architectural structure system design and the facility equipment application adopt international leading technologies. Although Jin Tower can only be completed and moved in 2011, it has attracted more than 50 world top 500 enterprises to come here for negotiation. After Jin Tower achieved enviable market success, Financial Street Investment Holding Group pointed to Xidan Business District in Beijing and carefully created another landmark business building - Financial Street Xidan Square, which continued to write a new business development legend. The incomparable geographical superiority is the core value of the Financial Street Xidan Square in the business real estate market of the capital city. Its south connects the "China's First Street" Chang'an Street, the east is close to the national political center Zhongnanhai, and the west is close to the financial street, the core of the capital's financial sector, which integrates all major excellent resources in Beijing, enjoys world-class prosperous and mature supporting facilities, and lays the foundation for the first-class business office atmosphere. At the same time, the Financial Street Xidan Square is surrounded by the main urban traffic arteries such as Chang'an Street and West Second Ring Road, and is close to the Lingjing Hutong Station of Metro Line 1 and Metro Line 4, forming a quick and accessible three-dimensional transportation network system, which can quickly connect major core business districts in the capital, and is conducive to the smooth development of business activities. In addition, the continuous improvement of building quality is another major victory for the Financial Street Xidan Square to stand out in the fierce business market of the capital. Financial Street Xidan Square has set up a 10 meter high independent lobby and an independent entrance and exit, creating a pure business atmosphere of independent office in the midst of the prosperity of Xidan. At the same time, it also created an ecological landscape leisure space in the office building to open up a new trend of green ecological office. The standard floor with an area of up to 7700 square meters meets the different office needs of enterprises with the product characteristics of square planning layout, flexible and practical space and ultra-high utilization rate, achieving a new experience of top business office. In addition, the Financial Street Xidan Square itself is also equipped with nearly 50000 square meters of commercial facilities, which will provide the enterprises with a prosperous and convenient business supporting facilities with the business planning orientation of luxury shopping centers and conference centers. The extraordinary quality of Financial Street Xidan Square, like the "North China's First Skyscraper" Jin Tower, has made it famous even though it is still under construction. At present, dozens of powerful enterprises have intended to purchase the Financial Street Xidan Square as their office location, which shows that its火爆market prospects. I want to comment on the real estate navigation:

content: 传香港警方调查中信泰富每经记者胡俊华发自上海市场昨日传出消息称，香港警方正在调查中信泰富(00267，HK)是否在炒汇交易中涉及犯罪行为。对此，中信泰富公关负责人昨日对《每日经济新闻》记者表示，截至目前，香港警方还没有与公司进行接触。此外，中信泰富并没有进一步的消息可供披露。昨日有香港媒体援引消息人士称，香港警方商业犯罪调查科正在调查中信泰富澳元外汇合约，希望查清该公司推迟6个星期后才披露炒汇巨亏155亿港元这一消息的原因。但报道指出，截至目前，这一调查仍在初步阶段，并未锁定任何可疑人物或目标。此前，香港证监会已经对此事展开调查，但尚未披露调查结果。而中信泰富在10月份爆发炒汇巨亏丑闻以来，已辞退两名负责财务的高层，此后该公司股价大跌，在母公司中信集团出手救援之后，中信泰富的股价方才企稳。
en: It is reported that the Hong Kong police are investigating whether CITIC Pacific (00267, HK) is involved in criminal acts in foreign exchange trading. In this regard, the public relations director of CITIC Pacific told the reporter of Nandian Daily yesterday that up to now, the Hong Kong police have not contacted the company. In addition, CITIC Pacific has no further information to disclose. Yesterday, some Hong Kong media quoted sources as saying that the Hong Kong police's Commercial Crime Investigation Department is investigating CITIC Pacific's Australian dollar foreign exchange contract, hoping to find out the reason why the company delayed disclosing the huge foreign exchange loss of 1.55 billion Hong Kong dollars for six weeks. However, the report pointed out that up to now, the investigation is still in the preliminary stage and no suspicious persons or targets have been identified. Previously, the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission has launched an investigation on this matter, but has not disclosed the investigation results. Since CITIC Pacific's huge foreign exchange loss scandal broke out in October, two senior executives in charge of finance have been dismissed. Since then, the company's stock price has plummeted. After CITIC Group, the parent company, came to rescue, the stock price of CITIC Pacific has stabilized.

content: 组图：怀恩豪斯搭上黑人保镖夜店调情卿卿我我新浪娱乐讯北京时间8月10日消息，据国外媒体报道，英国当地时间8月9日晚上，歌手艾米-怀恩豪斯在伦敦一夜店现身，与其保镖团队其中的一名黑人约会调情，卿卿我我毫不避人。虽然刚刚离婚的怀恩豪斯一再宣称自己不想再找男朋友，但是被偷拍的照片却显示她很享受与新欢度过的浪漫时光。(Sally)
en: Group picture: Amy Winehouse takes a black bodyguard to flirt with each other in a night club. Sina Entertainment News reported on August 10, Beijing time. According to foreign media reports, on the evening of August 9, local time in the UK, singer Amy Winehouse appeared in a nightclub in London and flirted with a black bodyguard on her bodyguard team. She was not afraid to show her love. Although Winehouse, who has just divorced, repeatedly said that she did not want to find a boyfriend again, the photos that were secretly shot showed that she enjoyed the romantic time with her new love. (Sally)

content: FIA发布修正版2011参赛名单汉密尔顿与巴顿车号对调新浪体育讯　国际汽联11月2日发布了修正版的2011年世界一级方程式锦标赛参赛名单。在迈凯轮车队的请求下，路易斯-汉密尔顿和简森-巴顿的车号被对调；威廉姆斯车队新签车手马尔多纳多被及时录入。但是奔驰车队的两位车手的编号，仍然没有按照积分进行排序，迈-舒马赫依旧为7号。详情请见下表：红牛(REDBULLRACING)1维泰尔2韦伯迈凯轮(VODAFONEMCLARENMERCEDES)3汉密尔顿4巴顿法拉利(SCUDERIAFERRARIMARLBORO)5阿隆索6马萨奔驰(MERCEDESGPPETRONASF1TEAM)7舒马赫8罗斯伯格雷诺(RENAULTF1TEAM)9库比卡10待定威廉姆斯(AT&TWILLIAMS)11巴里切罗12马尔多纳多(PastorMALDONADO)印度力量(FORCEINDIAF1TEAM)14待定15待定索伯F1车队(SAUBERF1TEAM)16小林可梦伟17佩雷兹红牛二队(SCUDERIATOROROSSO)18待定19待定莲花车队(TEAMLOTUS)20特鲁利21科瓦莱宁HRT车队(HRTF1TEAM)22待定23待定玛鲁西亚-维珍(MarussiaVirginRacing)24待定25待定(行云)

en: FIA released a revised list of 2011 entries. Hamilton and Button changed their car numbers. Sina Sports News FIA released a revised list of 2011 F1 World Championship entries on November 2. At the request of McLaren team, Lewis Hamilton and Jenson Button's car numbers were changed; Williams team's new driver Maldonado was timely recorded. However, the numbers of the two drivers of the Mercedes team were still not ranked according to the score. Michael Schumacher is still No. 7. For details, please see the following table: Red Bull (REDBULLRACING) 1 Vettel 2 Webber McLaren (VODAFONEMCLARENMERCEDES) 3 Hamilton 4 Button Ferrari (SCUDERIAFERRARIMARLBORO) 5 Alonso 6 Massa Mercedes (MERCEDESGPPETRONASF1TEAM) 7 Schumacher 8 Rosberg Renault (RENAULTF1TEAM) 9 Kubica 10 To be determined Williams (AT&T WILLIAMS) 11 Barrichello 12 Maldonado (PastorMALDONADO) India Force (FORCEINDIAF1TEAM) 14 To be determined 15 To be determined Sauber F1 Team (SAUBERF1TEAM) 16 Kobowei 17 Perez Red Bull II (SCUDERIATOROROSSO) 18 To be determined 19 To be determined Lotus (TEAMLOTUS) 20 Trulli 21 Kovalainen HRT (HRTF1TEAM) 22 To be determined 23 To be determined Marrusia - Virgin (MarussiaVirginRacing) 24 To be determined 25 To be determined (Xingyun)

content: 下降趋势中短线反弹宜清空经过连续的下跌之后，沪指60分钟K线指标已经处于超跌状态，这种情况下预计今日有望展开盘中反弹。因沪指短线阻力位依然在2678一线，距离较为遥远，因此预计此次反弹的空间将较为有限，另外，农行破发也势必对市场做多人气造成较大的打击，鉴于这种判断，短线投资者宜乘反弹清空筹码，等待上升趋势确立或中线触底之后再恢复入市。点击进入：股市直播室-专家坐堂进行中欢迎发表评论我要评论
