In addition, the agricultural bank's breach of the ban will inevitably cause a great blow to the market's popularity. In view of this judgment, short-term investors are welcome to click on: Stock Market Live Room - Experts' live room is in progress. I'd like to comment

content: 3700万福彩大奖得主戴假发口罩领奖(组图)2009年5月26日，安徽省福彩中心，全副武装，戴着假发、墨镜、口罩的福彩3700万大奖得主前来领奖。大奖得主现场捐赠了一百万元爱心款。合肥一彩民在5月20日2009057期福彩东方6+1开奖中，一人独中8注头奖，掏空了该玩法的全部奖池，每注奖金高达4668731元，总奖金高达37349848元。这一中奖刷新了安徽彩票史上大盘玩法一人中出头奖注数纪录，同时也刷新了安徽省双色球单人中得的2500万元巨奖纪录。据安徽省福彩中心人士介绍，福彩东方6+1从2008年3月15日在华东联销上市，上市以来，安徽省从没中得过一等奖，但没想到这一中就是8注，而且还打破了安徽省由双色球保持的单人最高中奖2500万元的纪录。王从启/人民图片声明：人民图片网供北京新浪互联信息服务有限公司专稿，任何网站、报刊、电视台未经人民图片网许可，不得部分或全部转载，违者必究！
en: On May 26, 2009, the Anhui Provincial Lottery Center was fully armed with a wig, sunglasses and a mask, and the winner of the 37 million lottery came to collect the prize. The winner donated a million yuan of love on the spot. On May 20, 2009057, a lottery player in Hefei won the first prize of 8 million yuan in the 6+1 lottery of Dongfang, emptying the entire prize pool of the game. Each prize was as high as 4668731 yuan, with a total prize of 37349848 yuan. This lottery has refreshed the record of the number of people in the history of lottery in Anhui Province who have won the first prize in the large disk game, and has also refreshed the record of 25 million yuan, the highest prize for a single person in Anhui Province who has won the double color ball. According to the staff of the Anhui Provincial Lottery Center, the 6+1 lottery in the East has been listed in East China since March 15, 2008. Since its listing, Anhui Province has never won the first prize, but it is unexpected that this is 8 lotteries, and it has also broken the record of 25 million yuan, the highest single person in Anhui Province, which is maintained by Fuball. Wang Congqi/People's Pictures Statement: People's Pictures Network is a special draft for Sina Interconnection Information Service Co., Ltd. in Beijing. No website, newspaper or television station may reprint in part or in whole without the permission of People's Pictures Network, and the violator will be investigated!

content: 中国田径最古老纪录由谁刷新17岁新星引爆冲击潮新浪体育讯　09室外赛季刚刚拉开序幕，国内田径界就传出喜讯，在广西玉林举行的全运会田径男子预选赛暨全国田径锦标赛，来自河北的17岁小将曹硕跳出17米13的惊人成绩，打破了该年龄段的世界纪录。曹硕的横空出世，使国内田径界冲击宿将邹振先保持了28岁之久的“胡子纪录”增添一丝信心。翻开中国田径全国纪录表可以发现，邹振先保持的17米34的男子三级跳远全国纪录是所有纪录中时间最长的。1981年世界杯田径赛上，邹振先以17米34的佳绩夺得一枚宝贵的银牌，这一成绩仅比金牌得主巴西名将奥利维拉少3厘米，在当年排名榜中高居第二位。其实，那次比赛邹振先跳出的实际远度不止17米34，而是17米50上下，可惜由于他穿了宽裤腿的尼龙短裤，身子还未落地，裤腿却轻轻擦着了沙坑，使成绩下降了10多厘米。邹振先的短裤为何不合身？原来世界杯田径赛不是以国家名义参赛的，而是以各大洲为参赛单位，邹振先当时身披的亚洲队战袍，并不是由国内提供的，因此衣裤尺寸出现了偏差。1981年堪称邹振先的鼎峰时期，那一年他先后以17米32、17米34两次打破亚洲纪录，前一次佳绩使他夺得世界大学生运动会冠军。随着年龄的增大，此后几年邹振先很少跳过17米大关。他自己肯定也没想到，“17米34”在全国纪录表沉睡时间超过了1/4世纪。上世纪八十年代末，陈燕平、邹四新两位新秀的涌现，使中国男子三级跳远到达了又一个高峰期。1990年在北京举行的第11届亚运会，陈燕平、邹四新两人共同演绎了亚洲三级跳远有史以来最精彩的一场角逐，邹四新跳出17米31的近九年亚洲最好成绩，距离邹振先纪录只有三厘米差距。不过，这一成绩仍没有使他登上冠军宝座，因为陈燕平跳出了惊人的17米51。可惜陈燕平完成那一跳时风速超过2米/秒的国际标准，这一成绩虽让他尝到亚运会金牌的滋味，却无法在亚洲纪录表中占据一席之地。此后几年后，随着陈燕平、邹四新走过鼎峰期，国内三级跳远整体水平明显下降，上世纪九十年代间只有曾立志跳出接近邹振先纪录的成绩——17米30。看到自己的成绩在全国纪录表岿然不动，邹振先难免心急。1997年，“邹振先三级跳远纪录挑战赛”应运而生，这项比赛目前已举办了九届。虽然号称挑战，但前七届比赛冠军成绩都没有17米大关。近两年情况明显好转，2007年举行的第八届挑战赛，年仅20岁的山东小将钟敏维以17米27的夺冠，创造了近12年来国内最好成绩。另外亚军得主湖南选手吴波也突破17米大关。去年举行的第9届比赛，吴波以17米02的成绩夺冠。其实，近几年国内涌现出的好手远不止钟敏维、吴波两人。2001年九运会，河北队选手吴冀以17.04米的成绩夺冠，这是中国选手时隔多年之后闯过17米大关。2004年起，国内涌现出一批20岁左右的小将，他们相继突破17米大关：2004年5月，河北选手李延熙在全国锦标赛暨奥运会选拔赛上，以17米09的佳绩，使自己成为国内第一位跨进17米大关的80后选手。四个月后，四川新秀顾俊杰在全国冠军赛上跳出17米23米的成绩；05赛季，李延熙将个人最好成绩提高至17米15；2006年，李延熙虽然没有创造个人最好成绩，但全年三次跃过17米大关，显示出不俗实力。这一年，“17米俱乐部”多了一位成员——浙江选手朱书靖，其成绩为17米03；07赛季是一个令人振奋的年度，该年有四人突破17米大关，分别是钟敏维、顾俊杰、吴波和朱书靖，其中钟敏维17米27的成绩在世界众选手中居第15位，相当于雅典奥运会第5名，这是中国男子三级跳远选手近10多来相当难得的战绩。目前，国内有5名现役选手最好成绩超过了17米大关，这一现象前所未有。然而，中国选手普遍存在着水平波动大的弱点，这一软肋在一定程度上制约着他们技术水平的正常发挥。如，顾俊杰04年跳出17米23的成绩，05赛季他的最好成绩仅有16米44，相差近80厘米。北京奥运会顾俊杰的表现令人大失所望，成绩仅有15米94；再如，07年令人惊喜的小将钟敏维，已有近两年时间未攻克17米大关，北京奥运会他的最好成绩仅15米59；众将中，李延熙以技术见长，成绩也最为稳定，04年至08年他有四个赛季跳过17米门槛。即便是这位技术型选手，在北京奥运会也显露出技术稳定方面的欠缺。预赛时，李延熙跳出17米30的佳绩，这一成绩是1990年后国内最好成绩之一，在奥运会预赛阶段排在众选手第三位。两天后的决赛，李延熙的表现明显不及预赛阶段，第一跳成绩仅有15米93，后两跳虽有好转，但状态出得明显偏晚，16米77的三跳最好成绩使他距离前八名仅有10厘米这米，痛失前八名的角逐。如果李延熙能达到预赛时的水平，将取得第五名的佳绩，这也是邹振先在1984年洛杉矶奥运会上取得的名次。曹硕的涌现，使挑战“邹振先纪录军团”增添一位生力军。值得一提的是，目前国内众好手均处于运动生涯的黄金时期，年龄最大的李延熙、吴波也只有25岁，国人有理由相信他们完全具备冲破三级跳远的“胡子纪录”的能力。当然，在超越“邹振先纪录”的同时，众好手还要在技术稳定性方面多下功夫，要像邹振先那样在国内外比赛持续表现出高水平比赛能力，这样中国三级跳远才会迎来一个真正的第二春。附：近五年国内“17米俱乐部”成员一览表2004年：顾俊杰(19岁，四川)17米23李延熙(20岁，河北)17米092005年：李延熙17米152006年：李延熙17米12朱书靖(21岁，浙江)17米032007年：钟敏维(20岁，山东)17米27顾俊杰17米11吴波(23岁，湖南)17米03朱书靖17米012008年：李延熙17米30吴波17米102009年：曹硕(17岁，河北)17米13(暂居今年世界排名第13位，仅有5人超越他)吴波17米06(王全立)
person: 邹振先,奥利维拉,吴波,曹硕,朱书靖,吴冀,陈燕平,顾俊杰,李延熙,钟敏维
en: Who is the oldest record of Chinese athletics? The 17 year old new star引爆冲击新浪Sports News The 09 outdoor season has just opened, and there is good news in the domestic athletics industry. At the men's pre selection event of the National Games and the National Athletics Championships held in Yulin, Guangxi, Cao Shuo, a 17 year old young man from Hebei Province, jumped out of the amazing result of 17m13, breaking the world record of the age group. Cao Shuo's sudden rise has added a bit of confidence to the domestic athletics industry's impact on the old guard Belo Horizonte, which has maintained the "beard record" for 28 years. Looking at the table of national records in Chinese athletics, we can find that the national record of 17m34 men's triple jump kept by Belo Horizonte is the longest of all records. At the 1981 World Cup Athletics Championships, Belo Horizonte won a valuable silver medal with a good score of 17m34. This score was only 3cm less than Oliveira, a famous Brazilian gold medal winner, and ranked second in the ranking list of that year. In fact, Belo Horizonte jumped far more than 17m34 in that game, but it was around 17m50. Unfortunately, his trouser legs were gently rubbing against the sand pit before he landed, because he wore nylon shorts with wide trouser legs, which reduced his score by more than 10cm. Why are Belo Horizonte's shorts not fit? Originally, the World Cup Athletics Championships did not compete in the name of the country, but in the name of continents as the participating unit, the Asian team cloak worn by Belo Horizonte at that time was not provided by the domestic side, so the size of clothes and trousers deviated. 1981 can be regarded as the peak period of Belo Horizonte. In that year, he broke the Asian record twice with 17 meters 32 and 17 meters 34 respectively. The first good result made him win the championship of the World University Games. With the increase of age, Belo Horizonte rarely jumped over the 17 meter mark in the following years. I'm sure he didn't expect that "17m34" had slept for more than a quarter of a century in the national record table. At the end of the 1980s, the emergence of two promising young people, Chen Yanping and Zou Sixin, made China's men's triple jump reach another peak. The 11th Asian Games held in Beijing in 1990 saw Chen Yanping and Zou Sixin jointly demonstrate the most exciting game in the history of Asian triple jump. Zou Sixin jumped 17m31, nearly nine years' best result in Asia, only three centimeters away from Zou Zhenxian's record. However, this achievement did not make him ascend to the championship throne, because Chen Yanping jumped an amazing 17m51. Unfortunately, when Chen Yanping completed that jump, the wind speed exceeded the international standard of 2m/s. Although this achievement let him taste the gold medal of the Asian Games, he could not occupy a seat in the Asian record table. In the following few years, with Chen Yanping and Zou Sixin going through their peak period, the overall level of domestic triple jump dropped significantly. In the 1990s, only Zeng Lizhi jumped close to the record of Zou Zhenxian - 17 m 30. Seeing that his achievements remained unchanged in the national record table, Belo Horizonte could not help worrying. In 1997, the "Belo Horizonte Triple Jump Record Challenge" came into being, and this competition has been held for nine sessions. Although it is called a challenge, the champions of the first seven competitions did not have the 17 meter pass. The situation has improved significantly in the past two years. The eighth challenge held in 2007, Zhong Minwei, a 20 year old young man from Shandong Province, won the championship with a score of 17m27, creating the best result in the country in nearly 12 years. The runner up, Hunan athlete Wu Bo, also broke the 17 meter mark. At the 9th competition held last year, Wu Bo won the championship with a score of 17m02. In fact, the number of good players who have emerged in recent years is far more than Zhong Minwei and Wu Bo. At the 2001 Ninth National Games, Hebei team player Wu Jijun won the championship with a score of 17.04m, which was the first time that Chinese athletes had broken the 17 meter mark for many years. Since 2004, a group of young players around 20 years old have emerged at home, and they have successively broken through the 17 meter mark: in May 2004, Li Yanzhixi, a Hebei player, jumped 17m09 at the National Championships and the Olympic selection competition, making him the first 80s player in China to cross the 17 meter mark. Four months later, Gu Junjie, a new star in Sichuan, jumped 17m23 at the National Championships; In the 05 season, Li Yanzhixi improved his personal best to 17m15; In 2006, although Li Yanzhixi did not create his personal best, he jumped over the 17 meter mark three times throughout the year, showing his excellent strength. This year, the "17 meter club" has another member - Zhu Shujing, a Zhejiang player, with a score of 17m03; The 07 season is an exciting year. Four people broke through the 17 meter mark this year, namely Zhong Minwei, Gu Junjie, Wu Bo and Zhu Shujing, among whom Zhong Minwei's score of 17m27 ranked 15th among the world's top players, equivalent to the fifth place in the Athens Olympic Games, which is a rare achievement for Chinese male triple jump players in the past decade. At present, there are five serving players in China whose best results have exceeded the 17 meter mark, which is unprecedented. However, Chinese athletes generally have the weakness of big level fluctuations, which restricts their normal technical performance to a certain extent. For example, Gu Junjie jumped 17m23 in 04 and his best score was only 16m44 in the 05 season, nearly 80cm apart. Gu Junjie's performance at the Beijing Olympic Games was very disappointing, with a score of only 15m94; For example, the surprising young player Zhong Minwei, who has not been able to break through the 17 meter mark for nearly two years, achieved the best score of 15m59 in the Beijing Olympic Games; Among the generals, Li Yanzhixi is good at technology and the most stable in performance. From 04 to 08, he jumped over the 17 meter threshold for four seasons. Even this technical player also showed a lack of technical stability in the Beijing Olympic Games. In the preliminary competition, Li Yanzhixi jumped an excellent result of 17m30, which was one of the best results in China after 1990, and ranked third among the participants in the Olympic preliminary competition. Two days later in the final, Li Yanzhixi's performance was significantly worse than that in the preliminary stage. The first jump was only 15m93. Although the latter two jumps improved, they showed up late. His best score of 16m77 for three jumps was only 10 centimeters from the top eight, and he lost the competition for the top eight. If Li Yanzhixi can reach the level of the preliminary competition, he will achieve the fifth place, which is the ranking of Zou Zhenxu at the 1984 Los Angeles Olympic Games. The emergence of Cao Shuo has added a new force to the challenge of "Belo Horizonte Record Corps". It is worth mentioning that at present, all the promising young people at home are in the golden period of their sports career. The oldest Li Yanzhixi and Wu Bo are only 25 years old. The Chinese people have reason to believe that they are fully capable of breaking the "beard record" of the triple jump. Of course, while surpassing the "Belo Horizonte record", the public must also do more in terms of technical stability, and continue to show high-level competition ability at home and abroad like Belo Horizonte. Only then will China's triple jump usher in a real second spring. Attached: A list of members of the national "17 meter club" in the past five years 2004: Gu Junjie (19 years old, Sichuan) 17m23 Li Yanzhixi (20 years old, Hebei) 17m09 2005: Li Yanzhixi 17m15 2006: Li Yanzhixi 17m12 Zhu Shujing (21 years old, Zhejiang) 17m03 2007: Zhong Minwei (20 years old, Shandong) 17m27 Gu Junjie 17m11 Wu Bo (23 years old, Hunan) 17m03 Zhu Shujing 17m01 2008: Li Yanzhixi 17m30 Wu Bo 17m10 2009: Cao Shuo (17 years old, Hebei) 17m13 (provisionally ranking 13th in the world this year, only 5 people have exceeded him) Wu Bo 17m06 (Wang Quanli)

content: 邓丽欣默认恋情疑好事将近不抗拒与方力申绯闻新浪娱乐讯北京时间6月10日消息，据香港媒体报道，邓丽欣与方力申的绯闻传足几年，近日更有传二人好事将近，就连唱片监制雷颂德也催他们早日结婚，更指他们结婚生的宝宝肯定会好漂亮，邓丽欣闻言没有抗拒，更带笑多谢雷颂德，像是默认恋情。昨天邓丽欣联同一班本地球星包括陈肇麒、陈伟豪及郭建邦等，到旺角为一个在商场举行的世界杯活动主持开幕礼，他们又分别穿上巨型卡通版战靴试玩“冲力射球”，但“娇滴滴”的邓丽欣有姿势却没实际，只是花架子。邓丽欣表示从小已看世界杯，但就没试过在现场欣赏赛事，一直都是捧阿根廷。问到其绯闻男友方力申可喜欢看球？她说：“肯定喜欢啦，男孩子都喜欢看。”对于突然传出婚讯，邓丽欣笑指有朋友看到报道后马上打电话去酒店查问，得知该酒店只可摆十多桌酒席后，就肯定报道不可信，因十多桌是不够的。问她打算摆多少围？她笑道：“没想过，太远的事没有计划。”方力申不久前自曝被母亲催生小孩，反而结婚与否还是其次，邓丽欣却不急于结婚，还说：“如果真的结婚也想快些生小孩，不过卅多岁才生也不迟，还有几年时间，自己一点都不心急，家人也没有催婚，但小方家人就好像有催他。”(苗菲)
person: 陈肇麒,郭建邦,陈伟豪,邓丽欣,雷颂德,苗菲,方力申
en: Deng Lixin's default love affair is suspected to be good and close, and he is not resistant to the scandal with Fang Lishen. Sina Entertainment News reported on June 10, Beijing time. According to the Hong Kong media, the scandal between Deng Lixin and Fang Lishen has been going on for several years. Recently, it was reported that they were going to have a good time. Even Leung Songde, the record producer, urged them to get married as soon as possible, and said that the baby they were going to have would definitely be very beautiful. Deng Lixin did not resist, but thanked Leung Songde with a smile, as if he had agreed to the love affair by default. Yesterday, Deng Lixin, together with a group of local football stars including Chen Zhaoqi, Chen Weihao and Guo Jianbang, went to Mong Kok to host the opening ceremony of a World Cup event held in a shopping mall. They also wore giant cartoon battle boots to try out "thrush shooting", but the "coquettish" Deng Lixin had a pose but no reality, and it was just a facade. Deng Lixin said that she has been watching the World Cup since childhood, but she has never tried to enjoy the game on the spot. She has always been holding Argentina. When asked if her rumored boyfriend Fang Lishen likes to watch football, she said: "Sure, boys like to watch football." As for the sudden news of marriage, Deng Lixin smiled and pointed out that after seeing the report, a friend immediately called the hotel to ask, and after learning that the hotel could only serve more than a dozen banquets, he was sure that the report was not reliable, because a dozen tables were not enough. Ask her how many rounds she is going to have? She laughed and said: "I haven't thought about it. I haven't planned for things that are too far away." Fang Lishen recently exposed that he was under pressure from his mother to have children. Instead, Deng Lixin was not in a hurry to get married, and said: "If he really gets married, he also wants to have children quickly. However, it is not too late to have children in his thirties. He still has several years, and he is not in a hurry at all. His family members did not urge him to get married, but Xiao Fang's family seemed to urge him." (Miaofei)

content: 恒大穆里奇：足协的处罚很不公平但我接受与服从新浪体育讯　8月16日，中国足协对广州恒大(微博)球员穆里奇(微博)做出停赛5场的处罚，这也让本赛季表现一直非常出色的这位巴西外援遭受到了非常大的打击。自从得知自己被足协处罚的消息之后，穆里奇的心情非常不好，巴西人现在非常后悔自己给球队造成的影响。对于自己受到的处罚，穆里奇说：我认为足协的处罚很不公平，但我还是能够接受与服从。在16日这一天，穆里奇分别受到了广州恒大俱乐部与中国足协的处罚，这让平时性格开朗的巴西人立刻陷入了苦恼之中，特别是得知自己被禁赛5场比赛之后，穆里奇的心情相当不好，一直把自己关在房间里，好在有妻子别在他的身边一直开导他，所以直到处罚过去了近20个小时之后，穆里奇才走出房门，在17日中午才吃了20个小时之中的第一顿饭。新浪体育也通过恒大队的翻译与穆里奇取得了联系，穆里奇说到：自己现在很想感谢妻子，在自己遇到困难的时候，是他一直陪在身边，自己也很感谢俱乐部，他们也一直安慰自己。谈到这次受到的处罚，穆里奇说到：我觉得足协对我的处罚并不公平，我并没有去暴力伤害谁，但现在既然已经处罚了，不管公平不公平我接受。我想说的是，我很感谢俱乐部，虽然俱乐部也处罚了，但我首先接受俱乐部的处罚，我觉得俱乐部对我的处罚是为了帮助我。既然我能够接受俱乐部的处罚，所以也要接受与服从足协的处罚。对于自己停赛给球队造成的影响，这才是让穆里奇感到最难过的地方：俱乐部一直对我非常好，在各个方面都给我非常很大帮助，我一直很渴望用好的表现回报俱乐部与球队，但现在我不能参加比赛，我感到很难过，我希望我的队友通过在我停赛的期间帮助球队取得好成绩。(新浪体育于静(微博))
en: Hengda Murichi: The punishment of the Football Association is very unfair, but I accept Sina Sports News On August 16, the Chinese Football Association gave Murichi, a player of Guangzhou Hengda (microblog), a five game suspension, which also caused a great blow to the Brazilian player who has been very outstanding this season. Since he knew that he had been punished by the Football Association, Murich has been in a very bad mood, and the Brazilian is now very regretful for the impact he has caused to the team. Speaking of the punishment he received, Murich said: I think the punishment of the Football Association is very unfair, but I can still accept and obey it. On the 16th, Murich was punished by Guangzhou Evergrande Club and the Chinese Football Association respectively, which immediately plunged the usually cheerful Brazilian into distress. In particular, after learning that he was banned for five games, Murich was in a very bad mood. He always locked himself in his room. Fortunately, his wife always stayed with him to guide him. It was nearly 20 hours after the punishment that Murich walked out of the door. He had his first meal in 20 hours at noon on the 17th. Sina Sports also contacted Murichi through the translator of Hengda Team. Murichi said: I want to thank my wife now. When I encounter difficulties, she is always with me, and I also thank the club, they always comfort me. Speaking of the punishment this time, Murich said: I think the punishment of the Football Association is unfair to me. I didn't go to hurt anyone violently, but now that I have been punished, I will accept it whether it is fair or not. What I want to say is that I am very grateful to the club. Although the club has also been punished, I will first accept the punishment of the club. I think the punishment of the club is to help me. Since I can accept the punishment of the club, I also accept and obey the punishment of the Football Association. With regard to the impact of his suspension on the team, this is the most sad thing for Murichi: The club has always been very nice to me, giving me a lot of help in all aspects. I have always been eager to reward the club and the team with good performance, but now I can't play, I feel very sad, and I hope my teammates can help the team achieve good results while I am serving my suspension. (Sina Sports Yu Jing (microblog))

content: 八旬老太靠卖菜过活走红30年仅见国外儿子一面本报讯(记者郑磊)本该是安享晚年的年龄，85岁的周瑞英老奶奶却独自在马甸桥地下通道内卖菜。近日，这位在网络上走红的“果蔬奶奶”受到了不少关注，很多居民在下班时都会刻意路过给她捧个场。果蔬奶奶不再孤单昨天下午5点半，海淀区马甸桥东南角的地下通道外，一位头发花白、拎着布包和塑料袋的老人出现了。“这不是‘果蔬奶奶’么！”一位小伙子叫出声来。看着将要走下楼梯的老人，这位小伙子快步上前，“周奶奶，我帮您拿吧！”之后，小伙子从脸上布满微笑的周瑞英老人手里接过了蔬菜。之后，又有3位年轻人认出了老人，主动帮助她搬运蔬菜。几位年轻人放妥了蔬菜准备离去时，周奶奶弯下不太利索的身体，拿起一小袋香瓜对着几位年轻人说，“孩子，这些水果你们拿着吃吧，天热，吃点儿败火”。“我们改天买您的东西。”几位年轻人笑着离开。30年只见儿子一面还不到6点，由于还没到下班高峰，周奶奶垫了张报纸，坐在自己的摊边与记者聊起了自己的家人。老人听力不好，据她说，是年轻时候得了一场病所致，跟人说话时，老人会把左耳贴到别人嘴边。周奶奶说，身为徐州人的她年轻时跟随军官丈夫来到北京。之后，儿子还考取了清华大学，在大学毕业后，儿子前往美国攻读研究生。之后，周奶奶的儿子在国外娶妻生子，“30多年了我只见过他一回，就是他爸去世的那年”，老人低着头不断念叨着，老伴在3年前因为肺癌去世了。谈起为什么不叫儿子回来陪她，老人摆摆手说：“回来一趟太贵了，我自己能活。”在对话中，每次谈到儿子，老人的语气和神态明显低落很多。老人还补充说自己年轻时还生过一个女儿，但很快就送人了。市民捧场老人繁忙晚上6点，过往的行人渐渐增多，周奶奶的地摊也红火起来。除了不断前来买菜的市民外，十几位年轻人来到周奶奶的摊位前，“果蔬奶奶，我们来买点儿水果”。“你们都是下班路过的吗？”面对突然增多的年轻人，周奶奶有些不适应。“我们是路过的。”对方答道。“这个豇豆可以煮着吃，也可以焯一下蘸酱吃。”卖每种果蔬时老人都会多嘱咐几句。记者随后了解到，这群年轻人是北京的一些网友，他们相约前来为周奶奶捧场特意组织的队伍。在场的每个人都或多或少买了一些果蔬，不少人把最后的零头都留给了老人，称这也算是一种救济。只想平平淡淡卖菜据了解，老人有三个愿望。一是配一副眼镜，能更多地看清大家的面孔；二是买一个助听器，能听清楚顾客们说的话；三是想镶几颗牙齿，能把饭菜更好地嚼烂，吃得更香一些。周瑞英老人说，这几天，她发现来买果蔬的人比以前多了，很多人还会叫她“果蔬奶奶”，经询问才得知这是网友给她起的名字。“这是我这辈子第一个外号。”对于这个名字，老人笑着说。老人同时表示，虽然有媒体前来采访，但她并不在乎，她只是希望给下班晚买不上蔬菜水果的人们提供一个便宜、方便的场所。“平平淡淡地经营挺好。”她说。■对话·首发微博者庆幸自己帮到老人京华时报：当初是怎么想到发这条微博的？程小撑：当天我是碰巧路过，看到老人的第一眼很震撼，感觉跟自己的姥姥很像，觉得有必要帮她一下。京华时报：现在已经有不少网友关注并前来为老奶奶捧场，你怎么想？程小撑：当初只是想着能让住在周围的人关注一下，没想到反响这么大，我觉得我的目的达到了，挺开心的。京华时报：现在老人的菜摊，有时会突然出现一批人来买老人的菜，有没有想过太多人可能会影响老人的生活？程小撑：这个真没想过，一条微博转发万次以上并不少见，可是引起这么大的效应出乎我的意料。希望大家不会太影响老人吧。
person: 程小撑,周奶奶,小伙子,郑磊,周瑞英,周奶奶的儿子
en: An 85 year old grandmother, who should have been enjoying her twilight years, has been selling vegetables alone in the underground channel of Maddian Bridge for 30 years. She has only seen her son abroad. (Zheng Lei, reporter) Recently, the popular "fruit and vegetable grandma" on the Internet has received a lot of attention, and many residents will deliberately pass by to give her a job when they get off work. Grandma Fruits and Vegetables is no longer alone. At 5:30 yesterday afternoon, outside the underground channel at the southeast corner of Maddian Bridge, Haidian District, an old man with white hair and a cloth bag and a plastic bag appeared. "This is Grandma Fruits and Vegetables!" A young man cried out. Looking at the old man who was going to walk down the stairs, the young man walked quickly forward and said, "Grandma Zhou, I'll help you!" After that, the young man took the vegetables from Grandma Zhou Ruiying, who was smiling on his face. Later, three young people recognized the old man and offered to help her carry vegetables. When several young people put away the vegetables and were ready to leave, Grandma Zhou bent down her body that was not very neat, picked up a small bag of melons and said to the young people, "Children, you can take these fruits to eat. It's hot, eat some fire." "We'll buy your things another day." Several young people leave with a smile. I only saw my son for 30 years. It was less than 6 o'clock. Because it was not yet the peak of work, Grandma Zhou put a newspaper on her stall and talked with the reporter about her family members. The old man's hearing was poor. According to her, it was caused by a disease when he was young. When talking to people, the old man would stick his left ear to others' mouths. Grandma Zhou said that when she was young, she came to Beijing with her army husband as a Xuzhou citizen. Later, his son also passed the examination of Tsinghua University. After graduation from university, his son went to America to study for a postgraduate degree. Later, Grandma Zhou's son got married and had children abroad. "I have only seen him once in more than 30 years, the year his father died," the old man said, bowing his head and chanting. The old partner died of lung cancer three years ago. Talking about why not to call her son back to accompany her, the old woman waved her hand and said: "It's too expensive to come back, and I can live on my own." In the conversation, every time he talked about his son, the old man's tone and manner obviously declined a lot. The old man also added that he had a daughter when he was young, but he gave her away soon. The public holds an evening rush hour for the busy old people at 6:00 p.m., and the number of passers-by gradually increases, and Grandma Zhou's stall also becomes popular. In addition to the citizens who keep coming to buy vegetables, a dozen young people come to Grandma Zhou's stall and say, "Grandma Fruits and Vegetables, we will buy some fruit". "Are you all passing by on your way home from work?" Faced with the sudden increase of young people, Grandma Zhou is somewhat uncomfortable. "We are passing by." The other side answered. "This cowpea can be cooked and dipped in sauce." When selling each kind of fruit and vegetables, the old man will give more instructions. Later, the reporter learned that these young people were some netizens in Beijing. They made an appointment to come here to organize a team for Grandma Zhou. Everyone present bought some fruits and vegetables or left the last change to the old people, saying that it was also a relief. I just want to sell vegetables in a simple way. It is understood that the old man has three wishes. One is to get a pair of glasses to see everyone's faces more clearly; The second is to buy a hearing aid to hear what customers say clearly; The third is to want to inlay some teeth, so that the food can be chewed better and taste better. Grandma Zhou Ruiying said that in recent days, she had found that more people came to buy fruits and vegetables than before, and many people called her "Fruit and Vegetable Grandma", and only after asking did she know that this was the name given by netizens. "This is my first nickname in my life." The old man said with a smile. The old man also said that although the media came to interview her, she didn't care. She just hoped to provide a cheap and convenient place for people who could not afford vegetables and fruits after work. "It's good to run in a plain and plain way." She said. ■ Dialogue · The microblogger who made his debut is lucky to help the old people Beijing Huaxia Times: How did you think of sending this microblog at the beginning? Cheng Xiaocheng: I happened to pass by that day. When I saw the old man for the first time, I was shocked. I felt like my grandmother. I thought it was necessary to help her. Beijing Huaxia Times: Now that many netizens have paid attention to and come to give Grandma a lot of attention, what do you think? Cheng Xiaocheng: At first, I just thought that people who live around could pay attention. I didn't expect such a big response. I think my goal has been achieved, and I'm quite happy. Beijing Huaxia Times: Now, there is sometimes a sudden appearance of a group of people to buy the old man's vegetables at the old man's vegetable stall. Have you ever thought that too many people may affect the old man's life? Cheng Xiaocheng: I really didn't think about this. It is not uncommon for a microblog to be forwarded more than 10000 times, but it is unexpected that it will cause such a big effect. I hope everyone will not affect the old people too much.

content: 央广广播电视网络台获准成立中广网北京8月30日消息(记者赵明明)中央人民广播电台日前正式获得国家广电总局批准建立“央广广播电视网络台”(Chinanationalbroadcastingnetwork，缩称CNBN)，这是继中国网络电视台CNTV之后，又一个获准建立的中央级网络广播电视台。央广广播电视网络台作为以网络视听节目传播及互动服务为核心的跨网络、跨终端、全媒体的新媒体播出机构，将依托重点新闻网站中国广播网、你好台湾网、中国民族广播网、中国广播联盟和全球华语广播联盟成员台等全球顶级传媒机构的优势资源共同打造，开办互联网广播电视、手机广播电视、车载信息娱乐门户等业务，为受众提供定制化内容服务的全方位解决方案。央广广播电视网络台的正式成立，标志着具有70年历史的中央人民广播电台全媒体战略加速推进。此前，央广作为全球拥有最大听众群体且唯一覆盖全国的广播电台，在引领广播传媒发展的同时，也全面进军电视和新媒体领域。三网融合背景下，网络广播电视台的获批将加快央广打造国家级综合网络视听传播平台步伐，成为中央人民广播电台构建一流的全媒体现代国家传媒机构的重要支撑。
en: The central radio and television network of China National Broadcasting Network was approved to establish in Beijing on August 30 (Reporter Zhao Mingming) The other day, the central radio and television network of China National Broadcasting Network (CNBN for short) was officially approved by the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television. This is another central level network radio and television station approved to be established after China Network Television (CNTV). The central radio and television network is a new media broadcasting organization that crosses networks, terminals and all media, focusing on the dissemination and interactive service of online video programs. It will rely on the advantages of top global media organizations such as China Broadcasting Network, Hello Taiwan Network, China National Broadcasting Network, China Broadcasting Alliance and Global Chinese Broadcasting Alliance to create a platform for global top media organizations, open up Internet radio and television, mobile radio and television, car information and entertainment portal and other businesses, and provide a full set of solutions for customized content services to the audience. The formal establishment of the Central Radio and Television Network marks the acceleration of the Central People's Broadcasting Radio's all media strategy, which has a history of 70 years. Previously, as the only radio station in the world with the largest audience and covering the whole country, the Central Broadcasting Commission, while leading the development of radio and television media, also fully entered the field of television and new media. In the context of the integration of the three networks, the approval of the network radio and television station will accelerate the pace of the Central Radio and Television Station to build a national integrated network audio and video communication platform, and become an important support for the Central People's Broadcasting Radio Station to build a first-class all media modern national media organization.

content: 阿桑奇强奸等罪若确认将被引渡到瑞典判刑当地时间12月7日，维基解密创始人兼主编朱利安·阿桑奇被伦敦警方逮捕。维基解密立即对此表示抗议，并强调会采取应对行动。早些时候，瑞典警方以涉嫌强奸和性骚扰等罪名，向整个欧洲乃至全球发出了针对阿桑奇的通缉令。律师否认阿桑奇自首12月7日，英国伦敦警方对媒体公布了一份声明，称维基解密创始人兼主编阿桑奇在当天9时30分左右被捕。该声明强调，逮捕是基于瑞典发出的欧洲通用通缉令作出的。本月2日，瑞典向欧洲和全球发出了通缉令，指控阿桑奇涉嫌强奸和性骚扰。当时，阿桑奇已经来到英国伦敦。英方随后约见阿桑奇的律师，向其表达了将会逮捕阿桑奇的立场。阿桑奇的律师强烈谴责逮捕行为，并否认媒体盛传的阿桑奇可能自首的消息。现年39岁的澳大利亚人阿桑奇被瑞典警方指控，在今年8月犯下强奸罪以及对两位女士实施性骚扰。不过，阿桑奇对此一直予以否认，并谴责瑞典警方的指控带有政治目的。引渡可能经历数月依据媒体透露的消息，阿桑奇在当地时间7日晚些时候将在伦敦威斯敏斯特法庭出庭受审。报道称，如果法庭最终认为阿桑奇犯罪事实证据确凿，他将被引渡到瑞典判刑。在法官作出引渡判决之前，阿桑奇将被羁押在英国，同时也存在被保释的可能。从定罪到引渡的整个过程可能将持续数月之久。自上周以来，维基解密麻烦不断，包括该机构的瑞士银行账号被注销、信用卡付款平台被封、网站被攻击等。美国政府甚至发起了针对维基解密以及阿桑奇本人的犯罪调查，指控其威胁到美国的国家安全和全球的外交行动。尽管阿桑奇被捕，然而维基解密发言人克里斯丁·哈拉夫森评论说，维基解密强烈谴责逮捕阿桑奇的行为，并表示会坚持既有的公布秘密文件的行动。(张乐)英媒体爆料维基解密创始人同时与两名女性有染维基解密创始人成长历程揭秘：幼时颠沛流离
person: 张乐,阿桑奇,克里斯丁·哈拉夫森
en: If Assange's rape and other crimes are confirmed, he will be extradited to Sweden for sentencing. On December 7, local time, Julian Assange, the founder and editor in chief of WikiLeaks, was arrested by the London police. WikiLeaks immediately protested and stressed that it would take action. Earlier, the Swedish police issued an arrest warrant for Assange throughout Europe and even the world on the grounds of rape, sexual harassment and other crimes. The lawyer denied that Assange surrendered. On December 7, the London police of the United Kingdom issued a statement to the media, saying that Julian Assange, the founder and editor in chief of WikiLeaks, was arrested at about 9:30 on the same day. The statement stressed that the arrest was based on the European general arrest warrant issued by Sweden. On the 2nd of this month, Sweden issued a warrant to Europe and the world, accusing Assange of rape and sexual harassment. At that time, Assange had come to London, Britain. The British side then met with Assange's lawyer and expressed its position that Assange would be arrested. Assange's lawyer strongly condemned the arrest and denied the media's widely reported news that Assange might surrender. The 39-year old Australian Assange was charged by the Swedish police with rape and sexual harassment of two women in August this year. However, Assange has always denied it and condemned the Swedish police's accusation of political aims. According to the news revealed by the media, Assange will appear in the Westminster Court in London for trial later on the evening of the 7th local time. It is reported that if the court finally finds that Assange's criminal facts are conclusive, he will be extradited to Sweden for sentencing. Assange will be detained in the UK until the judge makes an extradition ruling, and it is also possible to be released on bail. The whole process from conviction to extradition may last for several months. Since last week, WikiLeaks has been in constant trouble, including the cancellation of the agency's Swiss bank account, the blocking of the credit card payment platform, and the attack on the website. The US government has even launched a criminal investigation against WikiLeaks and Assange, accusing them of threatening the national security of the United States and the global diplomatic actions. Although Assange was arrested, WikiLeaks spokesman Christian Harafson commented that WikiLeaks strongly condemned the arrest of Assange and said that it would stick to the action of publishing secret documents. (Zhang Le) The British media revealed that the founder of WikiLeaks was involved with two women at the same time. The growth process of the founder of WikiLeaks was revealed: he was homeless when he was young

content: 叶尚志：回调幅度已接近安全边际■港股手记⊙第一上海证券叶尚志○编辑杨晓坤11月10日，港股继续整固调整的态势，连跌了第二个交易日。从盘面上来看，市况还不至于全面向淡。事实上，我们相信港股正处于强势调整当中，建议可以把握低买的机会。内地将在今天公布一系列经济数据，最引人注目的肯定是10月份消费物价指数(CPI)，市场普遍预期会进一步上升至4%。另一方面，二十国集团G20高峰会也会在今天召开，这个对于美元走势以及资金流向，都会构成关键影响。恒生指数昨日呈现反复调整，下压到了24400点关口水平后打横，在填补了最近一个跳升缺口24550至24733点区间的背景下，我们估计港股的承接力会有逐步增强的机会。恒生指数收盘报24501点，下跌210点，主板成交量有1092亿多元。技术上，恒生指数目前水平的安全边际已经提高了，在调整了两天之后，股指跟平均线组合的偏离幅度已出现了改善。另一方面，在美联局落实推出二度量化宽松之后，恒生指数的爆发起点是在24145点，也就是上周三的收盘价。倘若市场对于二度量宽的信心未有变化，恒生指数应该不会跌回到24145点以下。中国人民银行宣布调高存款准备金率0.5个百分点，本月16日正式生效。消息对于实体经济的影响应该较大，相信是属于调控过度泛滥流动性为主，并不是打压举动。而内银股经过了近期的回整后，调整幅度平均已有5%，相信股价的支撑力有逐步增强的机会。值得关注的是，内地保险股出现了逆市走高的行程，内地进入加息周期，对于保险股的利息收入会有提升空间。中国平安(2318)涨了3.6%，中国财险(2328)涨了0.17%，中国太保(2601)涨了3.13%。
en: Ye Shangzhi: the callback has approached the safety margin ▲ Hong Kong Stock Handbook ⊙Ye Shangzhi of the First Shanghai Securities○Editor Yang Xiaokun On November 10, Hong Kong shares continued to consolidate and adjust, falling for the second trading day. From the market, the situation is not yet pessimistic as a whole. In fact, we believe that Hong Kong shares are in a strong adjustment, and we suggest that we can grasp the opportunity of low buying. The mainland will release a series of economic data today, the most notable of which is the consumer price index (CPI) in October, which is generally expected to rise further to 4%. On the other hand, the G20 summit of the Group of Twenty will also be held today, which will have a key impact on the trend of the US dollar and the flow of funds. The Hang Seng Index showed repeated adjustments yesterday, and then went sideways after being pressed down to the level of 24400 o'clock. On the background of filling in the recent jump gap of 24550 to 24733 points, we estimate that Hong Kong shares will have an opportunity of gradual enhancement of承接力. The Hang Seng Index closed at 24501, down 210 points, and the main board's trading volume was more than 109.2 billion yuan. Technically, the safety margin of the current level of the Hang Seng Index has been increased. After two days of adjustment, the deviation of the stock index from the average line combination has improved. On the other hand, after the Federal Bureau implemented the second round of quantitative easing, the starting point of the Hang Seng Index's outbreak was 24145 points, that is, the closing price last Wednesday. If the market's confidence in the two quantitative easing measures remains unchanged, the Hang Seng Index should not fall below 24145 points. The People's Bank of China announced to raise the deposit reserve ratio by 0.5 percentage points, which will take effect officially on the 16th of this month. The news should have a greater impact on the real economy, and it is believed that the main focus is on controlling the excessive flooding of liquidity, rather than suppressing it. After the recent adjustment of domestic bank stocks, the average adjustment range has reached 5%, and it is believed that the stock price has a chance of gradual enhancement of support. It is worth noting that the domestic insurance shares have risen against the market, and the mainland has entered the interest rate hike cycle, which will increase the interest income of insurance shares. Ping An of China (2318) rose 3.6%, China Finance (2328) rose 0.17%, and China Pacific Insurance (2601) rose 3.13%.

content: 价格太高中国连续两周未进口美国大豆卢进高企的美国大豆价格正在令买家望而却步。在截至6月4日的两周内，全球最大的大豆进口国——中国已经没有出现在美国大豆买家的列表当中，不仅如此，在过去的两周内，中国还将此前确定的进口量削减了十多万吨。昨日，美国农业部(USDA)公布了截至6月4日的一周出口销售报告，当周美国2008/2009年度(2008年9月1日起)大豆净出口销售量为-6.1万吨，远远低于此前分析师预计的20万~30万吨水平。在这一周内，中国削减进口量5.5万吨。而在截至5月28日的一周内，美国大豆出口量同样也为负值。当周，大豆净出口量为-2.4万吨，中国削减进口11.26万吨。今年以来，由于美国大豆价格相对便宜，阿根廷大豆产量因干旱原因大幅减少，包括中国在内的大豆进口国对美国大豆的需求高涨。据USDA统计，截至5月28日，美国2008/2009年度大豆累计出口销售量为3373.63万吨，去年同期为3001.43万吨。中国累计购买美豆1846.91万吨，去年同期为1342.67万吨。美国大豆的“疯狂”出口使得该国大豆库存快速下降，USDA周三的月度报告预计，2008/2009年度，美国大豆期末库存仅1.1亿蒲式耳(约合300万吨)，这将是1973年以来的最低库存量。在库存吃紧的情况下，美国大豆在过去三个月内快速上涨，截至昨日北京时间22点，芝加哥商品交易所(CBOT)大豆7月合约期价报1260美分/蒲式耳，较3月中旬上涨了近45%。此前便宜的美国大豆，现在变得非常昂贵。据黑龙江天琪期货估算，如果按照目前的大豆期货价格点价进口，美国大豆到达中国港口的成本价将高达4300元/吨，这远远高于3600~3800元/吨的国产大豆价格。在高企的大豆价格面前，中国只好对美国大豆“退避三舍”。
en: The high price of soybeans in the United States has made buyers hesitate. China, the world's largest soybean importer, has not appeared on the list of American soybean buyers in the two weeks ending June 4. Moreover, in the past two weeks, China has cut the previously determined import volume by more than 100000 tons. Yesterday, the US Department of Agriculture (USDA) published the export sales report for the week ending June 4. The net export sales volume of soybeans in the United States in the 2008/2009 season (starting from September 1, 2008) was -61000 tons, far lower than the level of 200000-300000 tons expected by analysts earlier. In this week, China reduced its imports by 55000 tons. In the week ending May 28, the United States also had negative soybean exports. In that week, the net export volume of soybeans was -24000 tons, and China cut imports by 112600 tons. Since this year, due to the fact that the price of soybeans in the United States is relatively cheap and the soybean production in Argentina has decreased significantly due to drought, soybean importing countries including China have had a high demand for soybeans in the United States. According to the USDA statistics, as of May 28, the cumulative export sales volume of soybeans in the United States in 2008/2009 was 33.7363 million tons, compared with 30.0143 million tons in the same period last year. China has cumulatively purchased 18.4691 million tons of soybeans in the United States, compared with 13.4267 million tons in the same period last year. The "crazy" export of soybeans in the United States has led to a rapid decline in soybean stocks in the country. The monthly report of the USDA on Wednesday is expected to be 1.1 billion bushels (about 3 million tons) of soybean stocks in the United States at the end of 2008/2009, the lowest level since 1973. In the case of tight inventory, the price of soybeans in the United States has risen rapidly in the past three months. By 22:00 Beijing time yesterday, the July soybean contract price of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CBOT) was reported at 1260 cents/bushel, up nearly 45% from mid March. The previously cheap soybeans in the United States are now very expensive. According to the estimation of Heilongjiang Tianqi Futures, if soybean futures prices are imported according to the current soybean futures prices, the cost price of American soybeans arriving at Chinese ports will reach 4300 yuan/ton, far higher than the domestic soybean price of 3600 ~ 3800 yuan/ton. In the face of high soybean prices, China has to "retreat three miles" from American soybeans.

content: 期指新老空军司令分歧加大□晨报记者张佳?昨日A股在权重股带领下小幅微调，沪深300指数下跌15点，跌幅为0.43%，最终报收于3466.08点。而期指合约表现大体与现货相若。近期合约方面，IF1011合约下跌23点，跌幅为0.64%，报收3558.20点，期现货价差跌破100点报收92.12点，全日共成交235559张，未平仓合约数为29142张，较上一交易日减少1384张；IF1012合约则下跌21.40点，跌幅0.59%，报收3591.60点，期现货价差为125.52点，全日共成交13614张，未平仓合约数为7798张，较上一交易日增加247张。远期合约方面，IF1103合约下跌20.20点，跌幅0.55%，报收3655点，期现货价差为188.92点，全日共成交1377张，未平仓合约数为2198张，较上一交易日增加283张；IF1106合约则下跌13.8点，跌幅为0.37%，报收3710.4点，期现货价差为244.32点，全日共成交251张，未平仓合约数为456张，较上一交易日增加48张。从昨日主力合约IF1011合约的期现货价差日内走势来看，高企不下的期现货价差值终于因为昨日下午的一波小幅跳水而有所缩窄。昨天上午，期现货价差大多数时间是在105点至135点之间盘整，但到下午跳水后，一度最低不过85点左右，虽然此后由于沪深300指数并未继续跳水期现货价差有所回升，但是也不过是在95点至105点之间盘整。虽然期现货价差收窄，但是对套利者而言依然有2.66%的套利空间，考虑到这是不足一个月的套利收益，还是极为可观的。中金所披露的持仓数据显示，昨日老牌“空军司令”国泰君安持有的多单为2264张，较上一交易日减少70张；持有的空单为5232张，较上一交易日减少260张，净空单数减少190张至2968张。至于新锐“空军司令”中证期货，持有的多单为1843张，较上一交易日锐减464张，持有的空单为5643张，较上一交易日增加71张，净空单数增加535张至3800张。对于后市，新老“空军司令”出现了分歧，国泰君安虽然并没有积极做多，但至少在减少总头寸的同时略微偏多，而中证期货却是在大举减持空单的同时轻微增持空单，看空的意味要明显强于国泰君安。
en: The divergence between the new and old air force commanders of the futures index was increasing□晨 Zhang Jia? Yesterday's A-shares made a slight adjustment under the leadership of weighted stocks. The Shanghai and Shenzhen 300 Index fell 15 points, or 0.43%, and finally closed at 3466.08 points. The futures index contract performed largely like the spot. In terms of recent contracts, the IF1011 contract fell 23 points, or 0.64%, and closed at 3558.20 points. The spot price spread of futures and spot broke through 100 points and closed at 92.12 points. A total of 235559 tickets were traded in the whole day, with 29142 open interest contracts, 1384 less than the previous trading day; The IF1012 contract fell 21.40 points, or 0.59%, and closed at 3591.60 points. The spot price spread of futures and spot was 125.52 points. A total of 13614 tickets were traded in the whole day, with 7798 open interest contracts, 247 more than the previous trading day. In terms of forward contracts, the IF1103 contract fell 20.20 points, or 0.55%, and closed at 3655 points. The spot price spread of futures and spot was 188.92 points. A total of 1377 tickets were traded in the whole day, with 2198 open interest contracts, 283 more than the previous trading day; The IF1106 contract fell 13.8 points, or 0.37%, and closed at 3710.4. The spot price spread of futures and spot was 244.32 points. A total of 251 tickets were traded in the whole day, with 456 open interest contracts, 48 more than the previous trading day. From the intra-day trend of the spot price spread of the main contract IF1011 futures contract yesterday, the high spot price spread finally narrowed because of a slight dive in the afternoon. Yesterday morning, the spot price spread was mostly between 105 and 135 o'clock, but after the afternoon dive, it was once as low as 85 o'clock. Later, due to the fact that the CSI 300 Index did not continue to dive, the spot price spread recovered, but it was just consolidating between 95 and 105 o'clock. Although the spot price spread of futures and spot narrowed, it still has an arbitrage space of 2.66% for arbitrageurs. Considering that this is less than a month's arbitrage income, it is still very considerable. The position data disclosed by CICC shows that Guotai Junan, the old "Air Force Commander", held 2264 long orders yesterday, 70 less than the previous trading day; Short orders held were 5232, 260 less than the previous trading day, and the number of short orders decreased by 190 to 2968. As for the new "Air Force Commander", CSFC Futures held 1843 long orders, a sharp decrease of 464 from the previous trading day, and 5643 short orders, an increase of 71 from the previous trading day, with the number of short orders increasing by 535 to 3800. As for the future market, the new and old "air force commanders" have diverged. Guotai Junan did not actively do more, but at least it slightly prefers to reduce the total position, while CSFC Futures is slightly increasing short orders while aggressively reducing short orders, and the bearish meaning is obviously stronger than Guotai Junan.

content: Gateway连发三款AMDAPU笔记本宏?旗下“奶牛”Gateway今天发布了三款NV系列笔记本，全部采纳了AMDBrazosAPU融合平台。这三款新本都是15.6寸机型，型号分别为NV51B08u、NV51B05u、NV51B02u，LED背光液晶屏分辨率为1366×768，整体采用深紫色调，A面外壳还装饰了波浪条纹，整体尺寸381×253×31-34.14毫米，重量约2.6公斤。NV51B08u采用了一颗双核心的C-501.0GHz，集成显卡RadeonHD6250，搭配A50M单芯片组、3GBDDR3内存、320GB5400转硬盘。NV51B05u、NV51B02u则都使用了双核心的E-3501.6GHz，集成显卡RadeonHD6310，前者搭配3GBDDR3内存、500GB5400转硬盘，后者搭配2GB内存、320GB5400转硬盘。其他通用配置还有：千兆以太网卡、Wi-Fi802.11b/g/n无线网卡、HDAudio声卡、8xDVD刻录机、全尺寸键盘、多点触摸板、130万像素摄像头、MMC/SD二合一读卡器、VGA/HDMI输出接口、三个USB2.0接口、六芯4400毫安锂离子电池(续航时间最长4.7小时)、Windows764位家庭高级版操作系统。E-350NV51B05u现在可以通过官方网站购买，标价469.99美元。另外两款NV51B08u、NV51B02u暂时无货，价格也没有具体标明，据说前者要399美元，后者则应介于二者之间。
en: Gateway launched three AMDAPU notebooks Hong? The "cow" Gateway under its banner today released three NV series notebooks, all of which adopted the AMDBrazosAPU integration platform. These three new notebooks are all 15.6 inch models, namely NV51B08u, NV51B05u and NV51B02u. The LED backlight LCD screen resolution is 1366×768, and the whole adopts dark purple. The shell of side A is also decorated with wave stripes. The overall size is 381×253×31-34.14mm, and the weight is about 2.6kg. NV51B08u adopted a dual-core C-501.0GHz, integrated graphics card RadeonHD6250, with A50M single chip set, 3GBDDR3 memory, 320GB5400 hard disk. NV51B05u and NV51B02u both use dual-core E-3501.6GHz, integrated graphics card RadeonHD6310, the former with 3GBDDR3 memory, 500GB5400 hard disk, and the latter with 2GB memory, 320GB5400 hard disk. Other general configurations include: Gigabit Ethernet card, Wi-Fi802.11b/g/n wireless network card, HDAudio sound card, 8x DVD recorder, full-size keyboard, multi-point touchpad, 1.3 million pixel camera, MMC/SD dual-mode card reader, VGA/HDMI output interface, three USB2.0 interfaces, and six-cell 4400 mAh lithium-ion battery (maximum endurance time is 4.7 hours), Windows764 bit home advanced version operating system. E-350NV51B05u is now available for purchase via the official website, priced at $469.99. The other two NV51B08u and NV51B02u are out of stock for the time being, and the price is not specified. It is said that the former is $399 and the latter should be between the two.

content: 中国电信SP管理具行业示范效应-本报记者余祖江信息产业部通报显示，今年第二季度，涉及SP收费争议方面的用户申诉共计1421件，比上季度下降7.85%，继续呈稳步下降趋势。其中，相关基础电信企业负责为SP企业提供接入服务和收费的，涉及中国电信58件，比上季度下降29.27%。在四大运营商中，中国电信SP被投诉最少。对于SP的管理，基础电信企业责无旁贷。随着增值业务的日趋繁荣，SP市场规范化运行的重要性凸显。未来的竞争是产业链之间的竞争，信息服务的提供需要共同做大产业链。针对SP监管得力虽然申诉总体下降明显，但是相对比较集中。数据显示，涉及中国移动789件，比上季度下降2.11%；涉及中国联通516件，比上季度下降13.71%；涉及中国网通58件，比上季度上升3.57%。目前，根据“谁接入谁负责”的原则，主要是由基础电信企业负责管理相关SP。对涉及中国电信的SP投诉较少，在一定程度上表明中国电信对于SP的监管取得了成效。2007年，信息产业部确立了“三谁原则”，即“谁主管谁负责”，“谁经营谁负责”，“谁接入谁负责”，旨在明确各环节责任，消除责任死角，规范电信信息服务管理。为此，中国电信针对互联网、声讯、小灵通短信等各类合作业务，建立了一系列规章制度，对SP的网络接入、内容审核、代收费管理、经营考核等各方面实行严格把关，以确保合作伙伴提供合法、健康的内容。比如，中国电信建立所接入SP的信誉积分管理制度，将合作SP违规行为纳入企业间合作管理范围。固网增值业务待挖潜根据信息产业部电信研究院的统计和估算，截至2006年12月底，我国增值电信业务市场总规模超过1560亿元，预计2007年将超过1600亿元。无疑，增值业务市场是一座“金矿”。与移动增值业务相比，固网增值业务的市场规模较小。我国现有的增值业务，按照收入排名，依次为信息服务、ISP、IDC与呼叫中心等，而在信息服务收入中，移动信息服务占了75%的份额，互联网信息服务为23%，电话信息服务则为2%。显然，移动网对于SP更具吸引力，但是，固网同样有吸引并留住SP的理由。固网增值业务仍有很大的增长空间。包括IPTV、固话手机一号通、宽带、其他SP提供的增值业务等，这就是未来的新价值空间。移动信息服务是趋势移动增值业务发展迅速，已成为电信运营商业务收入增长的主要拉动力量。财报显示，今年上半年，中移动的增值业务收入较去年同期上升35.5%至419.15亿元，占总营运收入比例达25.5%。作为移动增值业务产业价值链中的重要参与者，SP群体迅速壮大。据介绍，在2004年，获得经营许可证的SP企业只有693个，现在，从事增值业务的企业猛增到了近2万家，申请移动增值业务的企业也越来越多。移动增值业务的发展前景广阔。一方面，中国的移动通信用户数已经超过了5亿，而所有这些用户都是移动增值业务的潜在用户；另一方面，移动增值业务的渗透率仅在30%左右，有着巨大的发展空间。北京邮电大学曾剑秋教授表示，随着我国3G的上马，窄带向宽带的升级，传统的语音业务时代将转变成增值业务时代。因此，增值业务的发展离不开3G的支持。我国电信增值业务市场变化速度在加快，行业发展趋于理性。基础电信运营商应与更多的企业进行合作，不断创新运营模式，提高产业链竞争力。
en: China Telecom SP management has industry demonstration effect - Yu Zujiang, a reporter of this newspaper, showed that the Ministry of Information Industry reported that in the second quarter of this year, there were a total of 1421 complaints from users involving SP charging disputes, down 7.85% from the previous quarter, and continued to decline steadily. Among them, the basic telecommunications enterprises are responsible for providing access services and charging for SP enterprises, involving 58 complaints of China Telecom, down 29.27% from the previous quarter. Among the four major operators, China Telecom SP was complained the least. The basic telecom enterprises are indispensable for SP management. With the increasing prosperity of value-added services, the importance of the standardized operation of the SP market has become prominent. The future competition is between industrial chains, and the provision of information services requires the industrial chain to be expanded together. In terms of SP supervision, although complaints have declined significantly as a whole, they are relatively concentrated. The data shows that 789 cases involving China Mobile, down 2.11% from the previous quarter; 516 cases involving China Unicom, down 13.71% from the previous quarter; 58 cases involving China Netcom, up 3.57% from the previous quarter. At present, according to the principle of "whoever connects is responsible", the basic telecommunications enterprises are mainly responsible for managing the relevant SP. The fact that there are fewer complaints about SP involving China Telecom indicates to a certain extent that China Telecom's supervision of SP has achieved results. In 2007, the Ministry of Information Industry established the "three who principles", namely, "who is in charge is responsible", "who operates is responsible", and "who connects is responsible", aiming to clarify responsibilities at all links, eliminate responsibility dead corners, and standardize the management of telecommunications information services. For this reason, China Telecom has established a series of rules and regulations for various cooperative services such as the Internet, voice communication, and Petitcom short messages, and has implemented strict control over various aspects such as network access, content review, agency charge management, and operation evaluation of SP, in order to ensure that partners provide legal and healthy content. For example, China Telecom established a credit scoring management system for the SPs it connects, which includes the violation of cooperative SPs in the scope of inter enterprise cooperation management. According to the statistics and estimation of the Telecommunications Research Institute of the Ministry of Information Industry, by the end of December 2006, the total scale of the value-added telecommunications market in China had exceeded 156 billion yuan, and it is expected to exceed 160 billion yuan in 2007. Undoubtedly, the value-added business market is a "gold mine". Compared with mobile value-added services, the scale of fixed network value-added services is small. The existing value-added services in China, ranked by income, are information services, ISPs, IDC and call centers, and in the income of information services, mobile information services account for 75% of the share, Internet information services are 23%, and telephone information services are 2%. Obviously, the mobile network is more attractive to SP, but the fixed network also has reasons to attract and retain SP. There is still a lot of room for growth in the value-added business of fixed networks. Including IPTV, one number pass for fixed telephone mobile phone, broadband, value-added services provided by other SP, etc., this is the new value space in the future. Mobile information service is a trend. Mobile value-added services are developing rapidly and have become the main driving force for the growth of telecom operators' business revenue. The financial report shows that in the first half of this year, the value-added service revenue of China Mobile rose 35.5% from the same period last year to 41.915 billion yuan, accounting for 25.5% of the total operating revenue. As an important participant in the mobile value-added business industry value chain, the SP group is growing rapidly. According to reports, in 2004, there were only 693 SP enterprises with business licenses, now, the number of enterprises engaged in value-added businesses has soared to nearly 20000, and the number of enterprises applying for mobile value-added businesses is also increasing. The development prospects of mobile value-added services are broad. On the one hand, the number of mobile communication users in China has exceeded 500 million, and all these users are potential users of mobile value-added services; On the other hand, the penetration rate of mobile value-added services is only about 30%, which has a huge development space. Professor Zeng Jiaoqiu of Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications said that with the launch of 3G in China and the upgrading of narrowband to broadband, the traditional voice service era will change to the value-added service era. Therefore, the development of value-added services is inseparable from the support of 3G. The change speed of China's telecom value-added service market is accelerating, and the industry development is becoming more rational. Basic telecom operators should cooperate with more enterprises, continuously innovate operation modes, and improve the competitiveness of the industrial chain.

content: 春风欧赔解析：米兰双雄齐获胜塞维利客场取三分01乌迪内VS那不勒推介：3099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.403.062.94那不勒斯本赛季实力的状态远高于乌迪内斯，但乌迪内主场成绩还不错，赔率略看淡客队。交战史那不勒斯占优，赔率异常建议双选两头。02博洛尼VSAC米兰推介：099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：4.563.291.79AC米兰经过前两轮的挫折，本场比赛急需一场胜利来稳住第2的位置，客场成绩5胜3平2负。博洛尼亚实力很一般，虽然AC米兰时客场作战，但看好AC米兰有这个实力客场获胜。03亚特兰VS巴里推介：3199家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.293.083.13亚特兰本赛季发挥不佳排名联赛第19位，主场成绩2胜3平5负。巴里排名联赛第9位，客场成绩1胜5平5负。交战记录上亚特兰大占优，但实力上巴里更佳，赔率更看好主队，双选主队不败。04拉齐奥VS卡塔尼推介：399家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：1.903.214.12本场比赛可考虑用拉齐奥做博胆，拉齐奥排名联赛第15位，主场成绩3胜4平4负，成绩一般。卡塔尼排名第18位，客场成绩1胜4平8负。拉齐奥占有明显优势，小单直接博单3。05国米VS卡利亚推介：399家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：1.364.348.56没有悬念的比赛，国米赢得了难得的喘息机会，本场比赛又是主场作战，爆冷几率基本为0。卡利亚排名联赛第8位，客场成绩4胜2平4负。主流博彩公司一致看好主队大胜，直接用国米获胜做胆。06热那亚VS切沃推介：3099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：1.883.234.16热那亚排名联赛第10位，主场成绩7胜3平1负，主场成绩很好。切沃排名联赛第12位，客场成绩4胜2平5负。两队交锋史热那亚处于劣势，防冷要防大冷0。07锡耶纳VS桑普多推介：3099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.603.052.70锡耶纳全联盟垫底，每一场比赛都是保级大战。桑普多排名联赛第7位，客场成绩3胜1平7负，不是很好，虽然桑普多实力强于对手，但考虑到锡耶纳是主场作战，3一定要选，其次选择0。08佛罗伦VS罗马推介：1099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.453.102.85两支老牌强队的对抗因为佛罗伦萨本赛季的状况不佳而减少了很多关注度，佛罗伦排名联赛第11位，罗马排名联赛第3位。罗马最近状态奇佳，交锋史罗马有非常大的优势，建议双选客队不败。09萨拉戈VS塞维利推介：099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：3.373.262.08塞维利亚拥有实力上的绝对优势，萨拉戈排名联赛第18位，主场成绩3胜3平3负。塞维利排名联赛第4位，客场成绩5胜0平4负。在主场战胜瓦伦西亚状态后，塞维利亚恢复到最近状态，本场比赛大胜可期。10阿尔梅VS希洪推介：399家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.133.203.30阿尔梅排名联赛第16位，主场成绩3胜4平2负。希洪排名联赛第11位，客场成绩1胜3平5负。本场比赛的关键是交锋史阿尔梅6场全胜，阿尔梅就是希洪的克星，本场比赛有望继续延续这一规律。11奥萨苏VS特内里推介：399家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：1.793.374.42本场比赛可以用来做博胆，奥萨苏排名联赛第10位，主场成绩3胜3平3负。特内里排名联赛第19位，客场成绩0胜2平7负。特内里客场成绩是在太差，用奥萨苏做胆。12马洛卡VS维拉利推介：3099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.303.212.95维拉利实力已经基本恢复到上赛季的水平，虽然马洛卡本赛季联赛主场全胜，但维拉利尔并客场作战非没有胜机，赔率也对主队获胜持保留意见，建议防冷0。13桑坦德VS马竞技推介：3099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.463.192.76马竞周中国王杯主场4-0大胜桑坦德，本场比赛是两队连续碰撞，桑坦德拥有主场优势，有希望在主场复仇，不过交战史客队占优，建议双选两头。14马拉加VS拉科鲁推介：1099家公司即时欧洲平均赔率：2.343.202.91拉科鲁拥有绝对实力优势，虽然是客场作战依然有很大的取胜希望，两队交锋史旗鼓相当，赔率看好主队更多的是诱盘行为，建议双选客队不败。更多推荐关注春风的新浪博客

The mainstream betting companies are optimistic that the home team will win a big victory, and use Inter Milan's victory as a challenge

content: 考研网站出现假文凭广告引网友热议-新快报记者邓毅富《研究生招生网与作弊答案和假学历同行》，10月31日，猫扑网站一个名为“今天你干了CLY”的网友加了这样一个帖子。“今天你干了CLY”说的网站，是指“中国研究生招生信息网”，据截图显示，网站网页点开帖子以后，在右边一栏中，出现谷歌网站的随机广告，广告的内容是贩卖假文凭和考试答案。此事引起了网友们的热议，有人认为，这跟网站无关，因为是谷歌广告附带随机生成的；也有人认为，网站有拒绝不恰当广告的责任。考研网站出现“一条龙服务”引网友热议页面内容很“雷”人“今天闲来无聊，浏览了一下‘中国研究生招生信息网’，在里面看到一些信息，用现在流行的话来说，就是‘很雷’——该网的招生信息和作弊答案、假学历广告竟出现在同一页面上”。10月31日，网友“今天你干了CLY”在猫扑网上加了这样一个帖子，并提供了截图。截图的页面显示：在打开一条《研究生网报31日结束11月10日至14日现场确认》的帖子之后，页面右边有一栏广告。这个广告称：“速取本科、研究生(真实学历)”，并附带了联系电话；另一条广告称：“研究生考试答案QQ×××××××××”，该广告还细分为“09考研过关”和“考研过关”两项，并都附带上QQ号码。记者找到了“中国研究生招生信息网”，按图索骥,发现情况果然如网友“今天你干了CLY”所说。“中国研究生招生信息网”的主管单位是“教育部高校学生司”、主办单位是“全国高等学校学生信息咨询与就业指导中心”、承办单位是“学信咨询服务有限公司”。从网站内容看，它内容丰富，除了教育部和各地的招生考试信息外，还有网上报名考研的功能，人气相当热。而网友“今天你干了CLY”披露的考试作弊广告就出现在与“考研动态”的各篇文章的同一网页的右边栏广告位置上，并有“Google提供的广告”等字样。网站广告谁负责任？对于作弊广告究竟是不是“中国研究生招生信息网”的责任，网友们展开了热议。网友“半导体”认为：“页面旁边是谷歌的广告栏，这事要找谷歌，广告投放内容是由谷歌决定的。谷歌的广告是根据网站的内容自动匹配相关的广告的。”而一位自称是做网络广告的网友“理更深的蓝”则指出：“这是谷歌的网络广告，网站是有权利是否投放广告产生盈利，但没有权利屏蔽内容。只要广告主肯付钱。出现这样的情况首先一点是谷歌没有做好内容屏蔽；二是网站为了盈利投放广告。双方都负有责任。”网友“山夫”则认为这个广告只是“骗钱”：“说白了骗傻瓜和求捷径人的钱，钱汇出去了，就没有回音。”网友“红风车”则称：“一切皆有可能嘛，中国是块神奇的土壤。”网友“路过红尘”说：“我老婆在东北某知名大学读研，惊奇地发现自己是寝室唯一一个不买答案考上的……”网友“laijiaxing2002”则调侃说：“谷歌的广告是很公正的，这则广告绝对是与该网页内容相关程度最高的产品，很真实，很好地反映了社会的和谐、自然的和谐、万物相生相克。”网友“路了卿”则爆料：“中国社会资源和保障部，就是国家公务员考试网上还有卖答案的，真令人崩溃了……”网友“良民良言”由此表达了自己对考研的不信任：“我已经发狂了，现在我看到称自己是研究生的人我也不把当他研究生了。”但网友“茶煲”则认为这只是极个别的现象：“一般说来，重点院校的研究生录取还是很公平的，即使是本校的学生考取本校的研究生也是十分辛苦的。”而大部分网友也表示了深深的忧虑:“这样子只会给想不劳而获的人提供了捷径，而一个号称正规教育的官方网站，竟然对这样的广告不管不问，以后谁会相信文凭跟学历的纯洁？”
en: The appearance of fake diploma advertisements on the postgraduate examination website has caused a heated discussion among netizens - Xinkuai News reporter Deng Yifeng and his colleagues from the Graduate Recruitment Network and Cheating Answers and Fake Degrees. On October 31, a netizen named "Today, you have done CLY" on Mopu website added such a post. "Today, you have done CLY" refers to the "China Graduate Admission Information Network". According to the screenshot, after the website page clicks on the post, a random advertisement from the Google website appears in the right column, and the content of the advertisement is to sell fake diplomas and examination answers. This incident has caused a heated discussion among netizens. Some people think that it has nothing to do with the website because it is a random generation of Google advertising; Others believe that the website has the responsibility to reject inappropriate advertisements. The postgraduate examination website appears "one-stop service", which causes a heated discussion among netizens. The page content is very "lei". "Today, I was bored, so I browsed the 'China Graduate Admission Information Network', and saw some information in it. In the popular words now, it is 'very thunderous' - the recruitment information and cheating answers of the website and the fake diploma advertisement actually appear on the same page". On October 31, netizens "Today, you have done CLY" added such a post on Mopu.com and provided screenshots. The screenshot page shows: After opening a post entitled "The postgraduate network newspaper ends on the 31st, and the on-site confirmation is from November 10 to 14", there is a column of advertisements on the right side of the page. The advertisement says: "Quick Bachelor's Degree, Graduate Degree (Real Degree)", and is attached with a telephone number; Another advertisement says: "Postgraduate examination answers QQ × × × × × × × × ×", and the advertisement is further divided into "09 pass the postgraduate examination" and "pass the postgraduate examination", with QQ numbers attached. The reporter found the "China Graduate Admission Information Network" and found that the situation was indeed as the netizen "Today, you have done CLY" said. The competent authority of "China Graduate Admission Information Network" is "Ministry of Education, Department of University Students", the sponsor is "National Center for Students' Information Consulting and Employment Guidance of Colleges and Universities", and the sponsor is "Xuexin Consulting Service Co., Ltd.". From the website content, it is rich. In addition to the admission and examination information of the Ministry of Education and各地, it also has the function of online registration for postgraduate examination, which is quite popular. The cheating advertisement disclosed by netizen "Today, you have done CLY" appears on the right column advertisement of the same web page as the "Postgraduate Dynamics" article, with the words "Advertisement Provided by Google" and so on. Who is responsible for the website advertisement? The netizens had a heated discussion about whether or not the cheating advertisement was the responsibility of the "China Graduate Admission Information Network". The netizen "Semiconductor" believes: "The advertisement bar beside the page is Google. This matter should be left to Google, and the advertising content is determined by Google. Google's advertising is automatically matched with relevant advertising according to the content of the website." However, a netizen who claims to be doing online advertising, "Li Shenguang Lan", pointed out: "This is Google's online advertising. The website has the right to generate profits by whether or not to place advertising, but it has no right to shield content. As long as the advertiser is willing to pay. The first point of such a situation is that Google has not done a good job of content shielding; Second, the website advertises for profit. Both sides are responsible." The netizen "Shan Fu" thought this advertisement was just "cheating money": "In short, it is money for fools and people who seek shortcuts. The money is sent out, and there is no response." The netizen "Hongfengche" said: "Anything is possible, China is a magic soil." The netizen "Passing by the Red World" said: "My wife is studying for a postgraduate degree at a well-known university in Northeast China, and she is surprised to find that she is the only one in the dormitory who has passed the exam without buying answers..." The netizen "laijiaxing2002" joked: "Google's advertising is very fair. This advertisement is absolutely the product with the highest relevance to the webpage content, very realistic, and it reflects the harmony, natural harmony and interaction of all things in society very well." The netizen "Lu Le Qing" then revealed: "The Ministry of Social Resources and Security of China, that is, the national civil service examination website, still sells answers, which is really collapse..." The netizen "Good People and Good Words" thus expressed his distrust of postgraduate studies: "I have gone crazy. Now, when I see someone who calls himself a postgraduate, I don't think he is a postgraduate." However, the netizen "Teapot" thought that this was only an extremely individual phenomenon: "Generally speaking, the postgraduate recruitment of key universities is still very fair, and it is very hard for students of the school to pass the postgraduate examination of the school." Most netizens also expressed deep concern: "This will only provide a shortcut for those who want to gain without effort, and an official website that claims to be a formal education actually ignores such advertising. Who will believe in the purity of diplomas and degrees in the future?"

content: 富士康大量招临时工疑为内迁作准备作者/陈小瑛身陷涨薪和内迁疑云的富士康又有新状况。《华夏时报》记者近日在富士康观澜厂区采访发现，数千名从外地学校来的暑期工蜂拥而来，参加培训。为此，富士康还出面高价包下了厂区周边的民宅，用作临时员工宿舍。记者调查后得知，此次批量来富士康接受培训的大学生暑期工，身份上显然和之前从社会上吸纳的人有明显区别；另外，暑期工全部都来自河南。要知道，最近一段时间，关于富士康内迁目的地的传闻最盛的就是河南。富士康是不是在为内迁作准备？在郭台铭出面动员内迁传闻之际，来自富士康的关于内迁的声音少之又少，其迁移方向更是讳莫如深。对此，本报记者多方采访了解到，富士康在这样的时间点的种种做法，很可能是故意在吊胃口，以便造成内地争抢的局面。为内迁作准备？7月5日，富士康观澜厂区北门，一个叫润园小区的农民房小区大楼门口贴出了催促客户搬迁的通知，“因特殊原因，住户必须在7月15日之前搬走。”富士康员工王小庆告诉记者，他住在厂区北门的润园小区共四栋楼，最近富士康来了很多暑期工没地方住，富士康便高价把小区全包下来了。房租暴涨就是缘于富士康突然大量招聘的数千名暑期工，但对数千突如其来的暑期工，富士康并未做足准备。“刚来的很多没法安排住宿，有的就在富士康大门口打地铺睡了4天。”王小庆对记者说。本报记者在富士康观澜厂区了解到，此次前来实习的暑期工全部来自河南，在实习两个月或者三个月后，考察合格并愿意留在富士康的工人将被派往各处工厂。富士康所招实习生也同样享受与工人同等工资待遇，即底薪1200元，加班工资另算。“富士康在郑州大街小巷都贴满了招聘公告，但我看到公告上写的工作地点没有在郑州的，而是淮安、烟台等地。”河南郑州当地人士告诉记者，郑州厂区现在还没开建。在富士康观澜厂区生产苹果电脑的小卢宿舍搬来好几个实习生，都是来自河南，其中，一个学校一起就来了一千多人，所签合同也都是短期的，他们培训两个月后没毕业的将先回学校，毕业的具体去向连他们自己也不知道。记者在富士康观澜厂区南门看到还有前来找工作的人，但富士康缺人，只统一从学校招聘，不对社会公开招聘，这点颇让人看不懂。“这是集团统一策略，根据自身发展需求做出的决定，具体原因我们也不知道，但针对某个特定人群招聘并没有问题。”富士康人力资源部人士对《华夏时报》记者如是说。“最近苹果的三个产品都进入量产，需要大量员工。”观澜区A1栋某员工告诉记者，可能只是因为订单突然增多，暂时缺人，所以招聘暑期工。富士康龙华CNSBG事业群某线长对本报记者否认是为内迁作准备：“如果只是培训，完全可以直接去内地已建好的厂培训，没必要花更大成本专门跑深圳来，流水线工作培训是件很简单的事，一看就会，一般一个星期就可以上岗操作。”富士康打什么算盘？疑云密布，富士康到底在想什么？“搞不懂富士康要干吗，观澜厂区A区苹果电脑生产线马上将搬往龙华厂区，最近晚上经常在运走机器，现在又要不断招人来，走一批，换一批。”富士康观澜厂区某办公室行政人员对记者说。“先安心工作，到搬的时候就搬。”龙华厂区G区某栋办公室员工告诉记者，因为之前他们对外传递了搬迁的去向，公司高层在内部发文彻查谁泄露了机密，表示要严惩，现在有什么动向，富士康也不再向员工透露。而公司第二波加薪潮考核日期从6月6日算起，考核三个月合格者，将底薪提高至2000元，但现在已经过去一个月，具体考核标准尚未出台，员工们对二次涨薪持怀疑态度，可能符合要求的没几个。富士康工会联合会人士告诉记者，目前正在制定详细考核标准，“富士康公布过会涨薪，就肯定会对合格的人兑现，不是信口开河。”富士康一边应付涨薪，一边忙招人来深圳，一边还要忙搬离深圳，种种动作着实看不懂。深圳大学产经研究中心主任魏达志对记者直言，“富士康现在就像一个小商贩在吆喝顾客，我要搬迁，你们快来抢吧。”这样形成一种热销的竞争效应，也让富士康有更多选择的筹码。魏达志认为，在工业化竞争中，沿海和内地发展阶段不同，深圳不需要富士康，内地有的城市如人口大省河南还是欢迎富士康这样能解决大量劳动力的企业。“但富士康的选择，主要是出于自身成本考虑，如果如外界所说，在河南给出的工资跟深圳一样，那富士康完全没有必要搬迁，媒体一窝蜂地宣传，刚好中了富士康下怀，这从河南先后传递出不同的虚假信息就知道。这是一个常识问题，很多人却想不清楚。”魏达志对记者说。
en: Foxconn, a large number of temporary workers in preparation for the relocation of the author/Chen Xiaoying, is trapped in the dilemma of salary increase and relocation. Recently, the reporter of Huaxia Times found in the Foxconn Guanlan plant that thousands of summer workers from schools in other places were flocking to participate in training. For this reason, Foxconn also took the initiative to pay a high price for the surrounding civilian houses of the factory, which were used as temporary employee dormitories. After investigation, the reporter learned that the college students who came to Foxconn in batches for training this time were obviously different from the people who were previously absorbed from society; In addition, all summer workers come from Henan Province. It is worth noting that Henan Province is the most popular destination for Foxconn's internal migration in recent days. Is Foxconn preparing for the relocation? At the moment when Guo Taiying came out to mobilize rumors of internal migration, there were few voices from Foxconn about internal migration, and its migration direction was more mysterious. In this regard, the reporter of this newspaper learned from many interviews that the various practices of Foxconn at this time point may be deliberately intended to create a situation of competition in inland areas in order to prepare for the relocation? On July 5, at the North Gate of the Guanlan Factory of Foxconn, a notice was posted at the gate of a farmer's building in a community called Runyuan, urging customers to move out because of special reasons, and residents must move out before July 15. Wang Xiaoqing, a Foxconn employee, told the reporter that he lived in Runyuan Community, a total of four buildings at the north gate of the factory. Recently, Foxconn has received many summer workers with no place to live, so Foxconn has taken the lead in providing them with a lot of expensive food and accommodation. The sudden sharp increase in rent is due to the sudden large number of summer workers recruited by Foxconn, but Foxconn has not made full preparations for the thousands of sudden summer workers. "Many people who have just arrived can't arrange accommodation. Some people have slept on the ground for four days at the gate of Foxconn." Wang Xiaoqing said to the reporter. The reporter learned from the Foxconn Guanlan Factory that all the summer workers who came here for internship were from Henan Province. After two or three months of internship, the workers who passed the examination and were willing to stay in Foxconn will be sent to factories in various places. The interns recruited by Foxconn also enjoy the same salary待遇as the workers, that is, the basic salary is 1200 yuan, and the overtime pay is calculated separately. "Foxconn has posted job advertisements in streets and alleys in Zhengzhou, but I saw that the job location on the advertisement was not in Zhengzhou, but in Huai'an, Yantai and other places." Local people in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, told the reporter that the Zhengzhou factory is not yet under construction. Several interns from He Nan came to Xiao Lu's dormitory to move to the production area of Apple's computer in the Guanlan factory of Foxconn. More than 1000 people came together from a school, and the contracts they signed were also short-term. After two months of training, those who have not graduated will go back to school first, and they don't know the specific destination. The reporter saw that there were still people coming to look for jobs at the South Gate of Foxconn Guanlan Factory, but Foxconn was short of people. It only recruited people from schools in a unified way and did not recruit people from the public in a unified way, which was quite incomprehensible. "This is a unified strategy of the group, which is a decision made according to its own development needs. We don't know the specific reasons, but there is no problem in targeting a specific group of people for recruitment." The human resources department of Foxconn said to the reporter of Huaxia Times. "Recently, three products of Apple have entered mass production, which requires a large number of employees." An employee of Building A1, Guanlan District, told the reporter that it was possible that the orders suddenly increased and there was a temporary shortage of people, so we should recruit summer workers. The line leader of the CNSBG business group of Foxconn Longhua denied that it was in preparation for the relocation: "If it is just training, it is completely possible to go directly to the factory that has been built in the mainland for training. There is no need to go to Shenzhen at a higher cost. The training of assembly line workers is a very simple task. Once you see it, you can do it in a week." What is Foxconn's intention? The clouds are thick. What is Foxconn thinking about? "I don't understand what Foxconn is going to do. The Apple computer production line in Area A of Guanlan Factory is going to move to Longhua Factory soon. Recently, the machines are often moved away at night. Now, we need to keep recruiting people, and then change them." An administrative staff of an office in the Guanlan factory of Foxconn said to the reporter. "Work with peace of mind first, and move when it is moving." An employee of an office building in Area G of Longhua Factory told the reporter that because they had previously communicated the direction of relocation to the public, the company's top management thoroughly investigated who leaked the secrets, indicating that they would be severely punished. Now, Foxconn no longer discloses any moves to the employees. The company's second wave of salary increase evaluation date starts from June 6. Those who pass the three month evaluation will increase their basic salary to 2000 yuan. However, it has been one month since now, and the specific evaluation criteria have not been issued, so the employees are skeptical about the salary increase for the second time, and there may be few people who meet the requirements. The Federation of Foxconn Trade Unions told the reporter that it is currently formulating a detailed evaluation criteria. "Foxconn has announced that it will give a salary increase, and it will definitely give it to qualified people. It is not a big talk." Foxconn is dealing with salary increase while busy recruiting people to come to Shenzhen, and it is also busy moving away from Shenzhen. It is really incomprehensible. Wei Dazhi, director of the Center for Production and Economic Research of Shenzhen University, frankly told the reporter, "Foxconn is like a small vendor shouting at customers now. I want to move, so come on." This also creates a competitive effect of best-selling, allowing Foxconn to have more choices. Wei Dazhi believes that the coastal areas and inland areas are in different development stages in the industrial competition. Shenzhen does not need Foxconn, and some inland cities, such as the populous province of Henan, still welcome enterprises like Foxconn that can solve a large number of labor. "But the choice of Foxconn is mainly based on its own cost considerations. If, as the outside world said, the wages given in Henan Province are the same as those in Shenzhen, Foxconn has no need to relocate. The media are just in line with the wishes of Foxconn, which is just a coincidence from the different false information conveyed by Henan Province later. This is a common sense problem, but many people can't figure it out." Wei Dazhi said to the reporter.

content: 王挺《断箭》转型“八指老大”不惧《上海滩》新浪娱乐讯由海润影视出品的年代黑帮大戏《断箭》已于昨日在北京影视频道黄金档与观众见面，本剧由于融合了兄弟情、儿女情与家国情，再加上火爆的动作场面，使得一开播便广受关注。硬汉王挺在剧中饰演一个放荡不羁的上海滩黑帮老大“达文秀’，下足功夫的他不怕观众拿他跟荧屏经典《上海滩》中的角色比较。王挺演艺十年历程，《断箭》是转折从初为人知的《重案六组》丁箭，到激情燃烧的《战士》郑虎臣、再到广受好评的《兴国兴国》谢勋东，这些硬汉角色见证了王挺的成长。在这十余年间，他从一个演技稍显稚嫩的小伙子，逐渐成长为《断箭》中收放自如的黑帮老大达文秀，观众的认可背后，他付出了无数的努力和伤痛。在拍完《断箭》之后，王挺感慨说这是自己拍的最累的一部戏，因为剧中打斗、爆破的戏份太多。却也是自己人生中的一个转折点，因为这是他首次改变形象，扮演一个放荡不羁的黑帮老大，“当时所有的精力都放在了这个角色上，哪怕休息的时候我们都在讨论剧本，很少有闲聊的时候。”下足了功夫的王挺对这部戏充满信心，也希望能受到观众们的欢迎，看到他不同以往的一面。“八指老大”王挺不惧与“丁力”比拼提起上海滩的黑帮老大，最先想到的还是《上海滩》中的“丁力”，他桀骜不驯，亦正亦邪，是荧屏上的经典形象。而王挺此次在《断箭》中饰演的亦是一个黑帮老大，达文秀放荡不羁、带些痞气却为人仗义，凭借过人的胆量和出色的身手成长为上海滩第一帮派“龙帮”的灵魂人物。他从小混迹在动荡的旧上海滩，深知百姓疾苦，因此在看到日本人的残暴屠杀后，忍辱负重，“潜伏”进日本人的阵营中，暗地里却推动了上海滩抗日的浪潮，最后不幸被日本人剁掉了两根手指，成为了“八指老大”。与丁力相比，达文秀少了一丝精明，多了一份宽厚大度，他忧国忧民，不为外界诱惑所打动，甘愿默默承受所有人的误解，这种独特的人格魅力也吸引了众多美女的好感，名伶陆小青(陈德容(微博))，青梅竹马的龙美君(张定涵)都为他倾倒。相信达文秀这个八指老大，在经典面前也丝毫不会逊色。
person: 王挺,陆小青,达文秀,丁力,谢勋东,陈德,陈德容
en: Wang Ting "Eight Finger Boss" transforms from "Broken Arrow" and is not afraid of "Shanghai Beach". Sina Entertainment News, the age gangster drama "Broken Arrow" produced by Hairun Film and Television has met the audience in the gold file of Beijing Film and Television Channel yesterday. This play has been widely concerned since its broadcast because it combines brotherhood, children's love and family love with the火爆action scene. Wang Ting plays a dissolute Shanghai gang boss "Dawenxiu" in the play. He is not afraid that the audience will compare him with the role in the classic film "Shanghai Beach". Wang Ting's ten year acting career, "Broken Arrow" is a turning point from the first known heavy case group Ding Arrow to the passionate "Warrior" Zheng Hu Chen and then to the well received "Xingguo Xingguo" Xie Xun Dong. These tough guys roles have witnessed the growth of Wang Ting. In these more than ten years, he has grown from a young man who is slightly naive in acting to a free and easy gang boss Dawenxiu in "Broken Arrow". Behind the audience's recognition, he has made countless efforts and pains. After finishing the movie "Broken Arrow", Wang Ting said that this was the most tiring movie he had ever shot, because there were too many fighting and bombing scenes in the movie. But it was also a turning point in his life, because it was the first time for him to change his image and play a dissolute gang boss. "At that time, all the energy was focused on this role. Even when we were resting, we were discussing the script. There was rarely any idleness." Wang Ting, who has made enough efforts, is full of confidence in this play, and hopes to win the welcome of the audience and see his different side. "Eight Finger Boss" Wang Ting is not afraid to compete with "Ding Li" to mention the boss of the gangsters in Shanghai Beach. The first thing that comes to mind is still "Ding Li" in Shanghai Beach. He is so arrogant and unscrupulous that he is a classic image on the screen. However, Wang Ting also plays a gang boss in "Broken Arrow", and Dawenxiu is dissolute and has some痞but righteous spirit. With his courage and excellent skills, he grows into the soul figure of the first gang "Dragon Gang" in Shanghai Beach. He grew up in the turbulent old Shanghai Beach, knowing that the people were suffering. Therefore, after seeing the brutal massacre of the Japanese, he endured humiliation and "hid" into the Japanese army, but secretly promoted the anti Japanese tide in Shanghai Beach. Unfortunately, he was chopped off two fingers by the Japanese and became the "Eight Finger Boss". Compared with Ding Li, Da Wenxiu has less smartness and more generosity. He is worried about the country and the people. He is not moved by the temptation of the outside world. He is willing to silently bear everyone's misunderstanding. This unique personal charm has also attracted the goodwill of many beauties. Lu Xiaoqing (Chen Derong (microblog)), a famous actress, and Long Meijun (Zhang Dinghan), a childhood sweetheart, have all fallen for him. I believe that Dawenxiu, the eight finger leader, will not be inferior in the face of classics.

content: 世锦赛-陈一冰吊环15.800分强势卫冕荣膺4冠王新浪体育讯　北京时间10月15日下午15点10分，在日本东京举行的2011年世界体操锦标赛结束了单项男子吊环决赛的争夺，中国选手陈一冰(微博)以15.800分获得男子吊环冠军，这是他第四次获得世界锦标赛男子吊环冠军。巴西选手纳巴雷特以15.600分获得亚军，日本选手山室光史以15.500分获得第三名。内村航平第一个出场，他的难度不算高，正常发挥应该能顺利完成，但看来他的体力消耗实在巨大，在做最后一个水平十字时失败，差点掉下器械，最后他得到14.633分。陈一冰第二位出场，上来就是直角十字、水平十字、倒十字，三个十字稳稳到位！充分展示力量感的压上成十字，压上成倒十字，后摆上成水平十字，吊环王陈一冰给出教科书般的完美展示，最后720旋下纹丝不动，15.800，E分打到9.000！第三位出场的是巴西人纳巴雷特-扎内，预赛仅仅排在陈一冰之后，他的力量运用得很惊人，几个十字做得都很非常标准，静止时间也没问题，但在做分腿水平支撑不到位，他得到了15.600分。接着出场的美国选手霍顿，水平显然不是夺牌热门行列的，而且今年不太好的状态延续到了本场比赛上，难度不高的动作都没到位，他得到了14.300分。解禁复出的荷兰名将范格尔德第五位出场，他难度同样很高，开场的几个非常消耗体力的十字做得很到位，但越到后面越显得不那么自如，后摆上成水平就有些勉强，下法前屈两周下可惜坐在地上，他得到了14.666分。意大利老将莫兰迪接着出场，他和范格尔德一样，前面有力量感的十字都很出色，但到后半段体力有点跟不住，终于在最后下法前没有做到静止，尽管直体旋站住，他也只得到了15.200分。委内瑞拉选手卡尔莫纳难度不算大，但完成的总不那么到位，下法更是前冲趴在地上，他得到了14.266分。山室光史最后出场，他的表现还是不错，水平十字、直角十字和倒十字也很到位前屈两周成水平十字静止时间也足够，直体旋下往后退了一小步，这套难度分比陈一冰要低一些，他得到了15.500分，陈一冰毫无悬念的收获金牌！(威猛)
person: 山室光史,内村航平,莫兰迪,霍顿,纳巴雷特,卡尔莫纳,陈一冰,范格尔德
en: World Championships-S Chen Yibing defends his title as the king of four championships with a score of 15.800 in the men's rings. Sina Sports News At 15:10 on October 15, Beijing time, the 2011 World Gymnastics Championships held in Tokyo, Japan ended the competition for the men's rings finals. Chen Yibing (microblog) of China won the men's rings championship with a score of 15.800. This is his fourth time to win the men's rings championship of the World Championships. The Brazilian player Nabarette scored 15.600 points to win the runner-up, and the Japanese player Shanshi Guangshi scored 15.500 points to win the third place. Nai Cunhangping was the first to play. His difficulty was not high. He should be able to complete it if he played normally. But it seems that his physical energy consumption is really huge. He failed to do the last horizontal cross and almost fell down. Finally, he got 14.633 points. Chen Yibing came out second, with a straight cross, a horizontal cross and an inverted cross. Three crosses are steady! Pressing into a cross to fully demonstrate the sense of power, pressing into an inverted cross, and then swinging into a horizontal cross, Chen Yibing, the king of the rings, gave a textbook perfect demonstration. At last, the 720 spin went down without moving, 15.800, E score hit 9.000! The third player was Nabarette Zane of Brazil, who only ranked second to Chen Yibing in the preliminary round. His power was amazing. Several crosses were very standard, and there was no problem with the static time, but the leg separation level support was not in place, and he scored 15.600 points. Horton, the next American player, is obviously not a favorite in the medal race, and this year's bad status has continued to this game. The action with low difficulty is not in place. He scored 14.300. The fifth Dutch star Van Geld, who was released from the ban, also played. His difficulty was equally high, and the very tiring cross at the beginning was well done. But the less free he was, the less comfortable he became. It was a pity that he sat on the ground. He got 14.666 points. Morandi, the Italian veteran, played next. Like Van Geld, he had excellent crosses with a sense of power in the front, but his physical strength didn't follow in the second half. Finally, he didn't do well before the last move. Although he stood in a straight body, he only got 15.200 points. The Venezuelan player Carmona is not very difficult, but he never gets it right. He rushes forward and falls to the ground. He gets 14.266 points. Shanshi Guangshi was the last to play, and his performance was still good. The horizontal cross, the right angle cross and the inverted cross were also in place. The forward flexing for two weeks was also enough. The straight body spin took a small step back. This set of difficulty scores was lower than Chen Yibing, and he got 15.500 points. Chen Yibing won the gold medal without surprise! (Weimeng)

content: 昌平金隅万科城12月底推90平3居全款95折(图)金隅万科城项目位于北京市昌平城区内，原北京第二毛纺厂位置。项目所处区域包括的市政道路有八达岭高速、永安路、创新路、南环路、振兴路等。从北京市区通往项目的公交车有345、345快、919快、919支3、925区、919支1、919区等，345快每隔1分钟发车一班，高速直达。昌平城区内有491、492、21、376路等直达本项目，21路从城铁龙泽站直达本项目。金隅万科城项目处于昌平城区内的繁华地块，紧邻商业中心，区域发展成熟、配套非常完善。项目遵循新都市主义原则设计，倡导社区与自然的融合渗透，营造充满阳光和绿色的现代社区。在规划上充分利用场地的限高要求，通过现代的规划理念和手法来构建高规格的理想化人居空间，将成为地标性的建筑综合体，树立起昌平的城市新形象。以上信息仅供参考，最终以开发商公布为准。点击查看更多楼盘开盘信息
en: Changping Jinyu Vanke City launched 90 Ping 3 living quarters at the end of December with a full payment of 95% (picture) Jinyu Vanke City project is located in Changping District, Beijing, the original location of Beijing Second Woolen Textile Factory. The municipal roads in the project area include Badaling Expressway, Yong'an Road, Innovation Road, South Ring Road, Zhenxing Road, etc. The buses from Beijing to the project include 345, 345 express, 919 express, 919 branch 3, 925 area, 919 branch 1, 919 area, etc. The 345 express bus departs every 1 minute and arrives directly at the express bus. There are 491, 492, 21, 376 and other roads in Changping District that can reach this project, and the No. 21 road can reach this project directly from the Longze Station of the urban railway. Jinyu Vanke City project is located in the prosperous land of Changping District, close to the commercial center, and the regional development is mature and well equipped.
