The project is designed in accordance with the principles of new urbanism, advocates the integration and infiltration of community and nature, and creates a modern community full of sunshine and green. In planning, full use is made of the site's height limit requirements, and modern planning concepts and techniques are used to build a high specification ideal living space, which will become a landmark building complex and establish a new image of Changping City. The above information is for reference only and is subject to the developer's announcement. Click to view more opening information of buildings

content: 副县长面对镜头爆粗口摔门续：8人已被立案调查红网4月1日讯(记者刘灿)“吉林扶余县副县长发飙摔门视频引发网友热议”曝光后，持续引起网友热议，网友将“发飙、粗口、摔门”、“爱怎么地怎么地”的副县长高勇冠以“摔门哥”、“最不淡定副县长”的称号，并对“相关官员是不是受到了法纪的处分”表现出了极大的关注。4月1日，红网记者电话连线了吉林省纪委、软环境办等多个单位。据悉，松原市已对涉及此事的副县长高勇等人进行了立案调查，正式处理结果将会第一时间公布。吉林省软环境办：已有8人被立案调查吉林省软环境办证实，因吉林德卡公司在扶余县投资期间，县政府不讲诚信，办事效率低，影响了企业的项目建设，造成较大损失，省软环境办已责成松原市纪委查处。松原市对涉及此事的副县长高勇等8人进行立案调查，分别给予党内严重警告、行政记过和撤职等处分。同时，松原市纪委监察局经济发展软环境投诉中心工作人员证实，松原市纪委已经根据吉林省纪委和吉林省软环境办的要求，确实对高勇等人进行了立案调查，目前已将拟处理结果上报给吉林省纪委和吉林省软环境办。至于具体有哪8人被立案调查，将受到怎样的处分，该工作人员称“纪委的调查没公布前暂时属于保密，待正式处理结果出来后会第一时间公布。”。他同时称，对德卡集团和扶余县政府土地纠纷一事，松原市纪委已介入进行了多次协调，目前扶余县政府仍在和德卡集团商谈。县委书记徐杰已升任市人大常委会副主任据吉林《新文化报》报道，被吉林电视台2010年11月曝光、“才来三年多”并被网友称为“不管事”的扶余县委书记徐杰，已于2011年1月14日当选为松原市人大常委会副主任。扶余县政府网站一条信息也显示，徐杰现任职务为“松原市人大常委会副主任、扶余县委书记”。在扶余县政府网站3月22日的一条《我县召开新农村建设工作会议》的资讯中，那位“满身酒气”的扶余县委常委、县委办主任刘树林仍以原职的身份在主持“新农村建设工作会议”。至于“发飙、粗口、摔门”的副县长高勇，政府网站显示其仍在县领导之列，职责是“协助县长分管交通局、建设局、城市开发建设管理办公室、城市综合执法办公室、人口和计划生育局、广播电视管理局、广电网络公司”。随后，为了解德卡集团和扶余县政府土地纠纷一事的处理进展情况，记者拨打扶余县“县长公开电话(0438-5862345)”，试图联系到相关负责人，但是电话一直没人接听。【又讯】扶余县副县长高勇等人处理结果公布4人被撤职红网4月1日讯(记者刘灿)4月1日19点35分，红网记者再次连线吉林省纪委、省软环境办。吉林省纪委一领导向记者证实，针对扶余县政府副县长等人行政不作为一事，经松原市纪委常委会研究决定，给予扶余县副县长高勇党内严重警告、行政记过处分；给予县住建局局长刘长文撤销党内职务、行政撤职处分；给予县卫生局局长李纯辉撤销党内职务、行政撤职处分；给予县国土局局长鞠殿印行政记大过处分；给予原县委常委秘书、现任松原市农业高新技术开发区管委会新城局园区主任周广新党内警告处分；给予县住建局规划处主任周忠友行政撤职处分；给予县国土局耕保科科长王柏文行政撤职处分。他还透露，在3月30日当天召开的吉林省整治和建设经济发展软环境工作视频会议上，已将此案对全省进行了通报，今天属正式向媒体发布消息。他说，“吉林省纪委和网友的心情是一样的，希望严厉处置这一类行为。今后，纪委将进一步加大查处力度。”对于网友追问的“扶余县委常委、县委办主任刘树林工作时间饮酒”一事，这位官员称已由扶余县当地进行了相应处理。
person: 刘树林,鞠殿印,高勇,王柏文,徐杰,刘灿,周忠友,周广新,刘长文,李纯辉
en: The vice county magistrate faced the camera to swear and continue: Eight people have been investigated by the Hongwang News on April 1 (Reporter Liu Can) After the "video of the vice county magistrate of Fuyu County, Jilin, raging and slamming the door triggered a heated discussion among netizens", it continued to cause a heated discussion among netizens. The netizens named the vice county magistrate Gao Yong, who was "raging, rude and slamming the door", as "Brother Door Slamming" and "The Most Unstable Vice County Magistrate", and showed great concern about whether the relevant officials had been disciplined. On April 1, Hongwang reporters dialed a number of units, including the Discipline Inspection Commission of Jilin Province and the Soft Environment Office. It is reported that Songyuan City has filed a case against Vice County Magistrate Gao Yong and others involved in this matter, and the official results will be announced at the first time. Jilin Provincial Soft Environment Office: 8 people have been investigated. The Soft Environment Office of Jilin Province confirmed that because the county government was not honest and inefficient during the investment of Jilin Dekka Company in Fuyu County, it affected the project construction of the enterprise and caused considerable losses. The Soft Environment Office of the province has ordered the Discipline Inspection Commission of Songyuan City to investigate and deal with it. Songyuan City has filed a case against Vice County Magistrate Gao Yong and other 8 people involved in this matter, and has given them serious warnings, administrative demerits and demerits respectively. At the same time, the staff of the complaint center of the Discipline Inspection Commission and Supervision Bureau of Songyuan City's economic development soft environment confirmed that the Discipline Inspection Commission of Songyuan City has indeed filed a case against Gao Yong and others according to the requirements of the Discipline Inspection Commission and the Soft Environment Office of Jilin Province, and has reported the proposed results to the Discipline Inspection Commission and the Soft Environment Office of Jilin Province. As for the specific 8 people who have been investigated and will be punished, the staff said "The investigation of the disciplinary committee has not been published yet, it is temporarily confidential. It will be published at the first time after the formal processing results come out.". He also said that the municipal Discipline Inspection Commission of Songyuan City had intervened in the land dispute between De Card Group and Fuyu County Government for many times. At present, Fuyu County Government is still negotiating with De Card Group. According to the report of Jilin New Culture News, Xu Jie, the party secretary of Fuyu County, who was exposed by Jilin Television in November 2010, "has only come for more than three years" and was called "regardless of affairs" by netizens. He has been elected as the deputy director of Songyuan Municipal People's Congress on January 14, 2011. A message on the website of Fuyu County Government also shows that Xu Jie's current job is "Deputy Director of Songyuan Municipal People's Congress and Secretary of Fuyu County Party Committee". In the news of "My County's New Rural Construction Work Conference" on March 22 on the website of Fuyu County Government, Liu Shulin, a member of the standing committee of the county party committee and director of the office of the county party committee, who was "full of alcohol", still hosted the "new rural construction work conference" in his original position. As for the vice county magistrate Gao Yong, who "raged, swore and slammed the door", the government website shows that he is still among the county leaders, and his duty is "to assist the county mayor in charge of the Transport Bureau, the Construction Bureau, the Urban Development and Construction Management Office, the Urban Comprehensive Law Enforcement Office, the Population and Family Planning Bureau, the Radio, Television and Administration Bureau, and the Radio and Television Network Company". Later, in order to understand the progress of the land dispute between Dekka Group and Fuyu County Government, the reporter dialed the "County Mayor's Public Telephone (0438-5862345)" in Fuyu County to try to contact the relevant responsible person, but no one answered the phone. 【Another news】 The treatment results of Vice County Magistrate Gao Yong and other people in Fuyu County were announced, and 4 people were dismissed. Hongwang News on April 1 (Reporter Liu Can) At 19:35 on April 1, Hongwang reporters once again connected with the Discipline Inspection Commission of Jilin Province and the Provincial Soft Environment Office. A leader of the Discipline Inspection Commission of Jilin Province confirmed to the reporter that in view of the inaction of the deputy county magistrate of Fuyu County and other people, the Standing Committee of the Discipline Inspection Commission of Songyuan City has decided to give Gao Yong, the deputy county magistrate of Fuyu County, a serious warning and an administrative demerit; Liu Changwen, the director of the Housing and Construction Bureau of the County, was given a disciplinary demerit and an administrative demerit; Li Chunhui, the director of the Health Bureau of the County, was given a disciplinary demerit and an administrative demerit; Ju Dianying, the director of the Land Bureau of the County, was given a major disciplinary demerit; Zhou Guangxin, the former secretary of the Standing Committee of the County Party Committee and the current Director of the Xincheng Bureau of Songyuan City Agricultural Hi tech Development Zone Administration Committee, was given a disciplinary warning; Zhou Zhongyou, the director of the Planning Department of the Housing and Construction Bureau of the County, was given an administrative demerit; Wang Baowen, the director of the Cultivation and Protection Department of the Land Bureau of the County, was given an administrative demerit. He also revealed that at the provincial video conference on the rectification and construction of economic development soft environment held on March 30, the case had been reported to the whole province, and today it was officially released to the media. He said, "The Jilin Provincial Discipline Inspection Commission and netizens have the same feelings, hoping to deal with this kind of behavior severely. In the future, the disciplinary committee will further increase the intensity of investigation and punishment." With regard to the question of netizens about Liu Shulin, a member of the Standing Committee of the Fuyu County Committee and Director of the Office of the County Committee, drinking during working hours, the official said that the local authorities of Fuyu County had made corresponding arrangements.

content: 陈志朋吴辰君牵手亮相俊男美女新作受期待(图)新浪娱乐讯日前，首届北京国际电影季开幕式在国家大剧院隆重举行，当晚“星光大道”上流光溢彩、众星云集，而陈志朋、吴辰君两位影人的牵手亮相，俊男美女一度成为了红毯上的焦点，更是引来各家媒体的争相追逐。同签约于博纳的陈志朋、吴辰君，近年来一直活跃在大银幕之上，2010年陈志朋在《大笑江湖》、《我知女人心》中都有不俗的表现，而他主演的新概念电影《堵车》也不日将与广大影迷朋友见面。一出道首部电影就与成龙合作《简单任务》的吴辰君，近期作品以都市、时尚类型的电影居多，吴辰君向记者坦言：希望能够有机会参与自己未曾尝试过的人物角色和题材电影。当晚，陈志朋西装革履，帅气惹人眼；吴辰君则一身蓝色鱼尾裙，端庄大气，二人在红毯上的出现着实引人瞩目，而他们各自的最新电影作品《堵车》和《激浪青春》，更是让人充满了期待。据悉，北京国际电影季由国家广播电影电视总局、北京市人民政府主办，共有二十一位国际电影节主席到场，国内外众多知名电影人参与其中，活动期间将放映多部优秀影片。
en: Chen Zhipeng and Wu Chenjun, a handsome man and a beauty, join hands in a new work, which is expected (picture) Sina Entertainment News Recently, the opening ceremony of the first Beijing International Film Festival was grandly held in the National Grand Theatre. On that night, the "Starlight Avenue" was full of light and stars. Chen Zhipeng and Wu Chenjun, two film stars, joined hands in a new work. The handsome man and the beauty once became the focus on the red carpet, which attracted the media to compete for them. Chen Zhipeng and Wu Chenjun, who are signed with Bona, have been active on the big screen in recent years. In 2010, Chen Zhipeng had an excellent performance in "Laughing at the江湖" and "I Know Women's Hearts", and the new concept film "Traffic Jam" starring him will soon meet with many film fans. Wu Chenjun, who made his first film with Jackie Chan's Simple Mission, recently has mostly urban and fashion movies. Wu Chenjun frankly told the reporter that he hoped to have the opportunity to participate in the character roles and theme movies that he had never tried. On that night, Chen Zhipeng was very handsome in a leather suit; Wu Chenjun was in a blue fish tail skirt, dignified and大气. Their appearance on the red carpet was really eye catching, and their latest film works, Traffic Jam and Jilang Youth, were even more promising. It is reported that the Beijing International Film Festival is sponsored by the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television and the Beijing Municipal People's Government. Twenty one international film festival chairmen were present, and many well-known film people at home and abroad participated in the event, and a number of excellent films will be screened during the event.

content: 阿里巴巴去年净利润14.7亿3月17日，阿里巴巴(1688.HK)发布2010年第四季度和全年财报，2010年公司全年营收55.58亿元，同比增长43.4%，净利润14.695亿元，同比增长45.1%。其中，第四季度营收15.2亿元，同比增长37.5%，净利润4.11亿元，同比增长46.2%。财报显示，公司的会员数和增值服务一并增长。截至2010年12月31日，阿里巴巴的国际交易市场及中国交易市场共拥有约81万名付费会员，同比上升31.6%，如包括中国万网在内，阿里巴巴共拥有超过100万名付费会员。此外，非会员费收入占总收入的比重由2007年的21%增加至2010年的33%。目前，公司的全球速卖通已发展成为全球流量最高的B2B国际网上交易平台，而去年收购的两家卖家电子商务解决方案供货商Vendio及Auctiva也为阿里巴巴带来了超过25万家网上零售商。阿里巴巴表示，2011年中国国内消费将继续增长。此外，针对2月份暴露出的欺诈事件，阿里巴巴表示，公司内部调查仍在进行中，并将采取更多预防和补救措施。(王荣)欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: On March 17, Alibaba (1688. HK) announced its fourth quarter and annual financial results for 2010. In 2010, the company's annual revenue was 5.558 billion yuan, up 43.4% year on year, and its net profit was 1.4695 billion yuan, up 45.1% year on year. In the fourth quarter, the revenue was 1.52 billion yuan, up 37.5% year on year, and the net profit was 410 million yuan, up 46.2% year on year. The financial report shows that the number of members and value-added services of the company have also grown. As of December 31, 2010, Alibaba's international trading market and China's trading market had about 810000 paid members, up 31.6% year on year. If China Wanwang is included, Alibaba has more than 1 million paid members. In addition, the proportion of non member fee income to total income increased from 21% in 2007 to 33% in 2010. At present, the company's global速sell Tong has developed into the world's largest B2B international online trading platform, while Vendio and Auctiva, two seller e-commerce solution suppliers acquired last year, also brought more than 250000 online retailers to Alibaba. Alibaba said that domestic consumption in China will continue to grow in 2011. In addition, in view of the fraud revealed in February, Alibaba said that the internal investigation of the company is still in progress, and more preventive and remedial measures will be taken. (Wang Rong) Welcome to comment I want to comment

content: 奥巴马同父异母弟弟涉嫌持有大麻被捕中新网1月31日电美国媒体报导，肯尼亚警方今天表示，美国总统奥巴马(BarackObama)的同父异母弟弟乔治•奥巴马(GeorgeObama)，遭肯尼亚警方逮捕，罪名是持有大麻。“中央社”引述CNN消息称，巡官穆特姆贝是负责本案的警官。穆特姆贝说，乔治因涉嫌持有大麻被捕，且当时曾拒捕，预定2月2日出庭。报导指出，乔治目前被拘押在肯尼亚首都奈洛比(Nairobi)的胡鲁马(Huruma)警局。CNN记者前往牢房与他交谈，乔治否认这类指控。他说：“他们把我从家里带走。我不知道他们为何要起诉我。”虽然乔治与奥巴马曾见过面，但彼此几乎不认识对方。在奥巴马的近亲当中，只有极少数未参加上周在华盛顿举行的总统就职典礼，乔治就是其中之一。报导指出，奥巴马在回忆录“奥巴马的梦想之路——以父之名”(DreamsfromMyFather)中描述说，认识乔治是件“痛苦的事”。奥巴马的肯尼亚之行，是为了会晤从未谋面的亲人。报导说，乔治与奥巴马两人同父异母。奥巴马在回忆录写道，他力求修补与父亲的关系。奥巴马的父亲在他童年时期就离开他与母亲。奥巴马的父亲在车祸中丧生，当年乔治才6个月大。乔治和奥巴马一样，对父亲几乎一无所知。
en: Barack Obama's half brother Obama was arrested on suspicion of possession of marijuana, chinanews. com, January 31. The US media reported that the Kenyan police said today that Barack Obama's half brother George Obama was arrested by the Kenyan police on the charge of possession of marijuana. CNA quoted CNN as saying that Mutumbe, the patrol officer in charge of this case, said that George was arrested on suspicion of possession of marijuana and had refused to arrest him. He was scheduled to appear in court on February 2. The report pointed out that George is currently detained in Huruma police station, the capital of Kenya, Nairobi. CNN reporters went to the prison to talk with him, and George denied such accusations. He said: "They took me away from home. I don't know why they want to prosecute me." Although George and Obama have met, they hardly know each other. Among Obama's close relatives, only a few people did not attend the presidential inauguration held in Washington last week, and George was one of them. The report pointed out that Obama described in his memoir "Obama's Dream Road - In the Name of Father" that it was "painful" to know George. Obama's trip to Kenya was to meet his relatives for the first time. The report said that George and Obama were half brothers. Obama wrote in his memoirs that he tried to repair his relationship with his father. Obama's father left him and his mother in his childhood. Obama's father died in a car accident when George was only 6 months old. Like Obama, George knew almost nothing about his father.

content: 美的精英赛斯科特65杆领先高杰刘俊峰落后两杆新浪体育讯　北京时间10月15日，澳大利亚大炮克雷格-斯科特(CraigScott)第一天打顺德君兰国际高尔夫俱乐部，便打出65杆，低于标准杆6杆，取得了美的中国精英赛首轮领先。中国选手高杰与刘俊峰表现也不错，分别打出67杆，低于标准杆4杆，位于并列第四位。克雷格-斯科特由于护照出了问题，直到星期三下午5点才来到顺德。他开了一个球车在球场上转了一圈，就相当于练习了。星期四在完全盲打的情况下，澳大利亚人抓到5只小鸟，射下1头老鹰，虽然在第五洞四杆洞吞下了柏忌，最终就力压爱尔兰选手艾迪-巴尔(EddieBarr)和澳大利亚选手布拉德-麦克因托什(BradMcIntosh)取得了领先。后边这两位选手在第一轮交出66杆，低于标准杆5杆。2003年美国公开赛亚军斯特芬-林尼(StephenLeaney)今天的开局和收尾很不错，前三个洞打出低于标准杆4杆，而最后两个洞连抓两只小鸟结束。可是他中间出现了一个双柏忌和一个柏忌，最终交出67杆，与中国选手高杰、刘俊峰、韩国选手成始雨(SeaWooSung)一起位于并列第四位。“或许不看球场还好一些。”在加拿大巡回赛上征战四年的克雷格-斯科特半开玩笑地说，“你不看球场，不知道危险在哪里。”其实克雷格-斯科特在君兰打得好的真正原因是他的长杆发挥不错。在澳大利亚巡回赛上，他是发球距离排名前三位的球手。星期四，球场虽然不怎么滚动，他的发球距离也有290到295码。当然这些球能停在球道上也是关键。克雷格-斯科特今天只有一次发球没有上球道。另外，他还有一个颇有运气的球。在第15洞三杆洞，他开球开到果岭后方，距离旗杆大约有10码。他一切进洞便抓到了小鸟。开球距离长在君兰国际高尔夫俱乐部总是会有优势的。克雷格-斯科特的同胞布拉德-麦克因托什一早打出66杆之后也表达了相似的意思。该选手今天抓到9只小鸟，但是也吞下了4个柏忌。曾经在澳大利亚赢得两场比赛的布拉德-麦克因托什说：“这一轮蛮起伏的，有许多小鸟，也有许多柏忌，但不是发球过猛的原因。柏忌主要是因为短杆不好，出现了一些三推。”开球的强项也让刘俊峰处于前列。作为中巡赛唯一一个拿下双鹰的选手，刘俊峰今天抓到了6只小鸟，吞下2个柏忌。河南洛阳选手高杰也是这种观点，他甚至觉得这个球场比较短。29岁选手今年在珠海金湾的职业考试中刚刚获得职业资格，他说：“这个成绩很好，可我还有几个小鸟没有拿下，要不然会更好。”张连伟71杆，平标准杆，吴阿顺70杆，低于标准杆1杆，而梁文冲打出69杆，低于标准杆2杆。“今天我的铁杆小左曲，而木杆又是小右曲。这让我无法靠近旗杆，这是我小鸟球机会不太多的原因。”梁文冲说，“另外，练习果岭与实际的果岭速度不一样，所以在短推的力道上也没有掌握好。可是总体来说，我现在的状态不错。”梁文冲刚刚从日巡赛归来。他在亚巡赛和日巡赛联合举办的亚太公开赛上获得了亚军，而上一周的佳能公开赛，要不是第一轮打出74杆的话，他完全能获得一个前十名。那场因为恶劣天气而削减为三轮的比赛，他最终获得了并列第17名。点击浏览详细成绩>>(小风)
person: 斯特芬-林尼,布拉德-麦克因托什,梁文冲,成始雨,刘进峰,刘俊峰,艾迪-巴尔,克雷格-斯科特,斯科特,张连伟,小风,高杰,吴阿顺
en: At the US Open in 2003, the runner up, Stephen Leaney (Stephen Leaney), had a very good start and ending today. He played three holes under par, and ended with two consecutive birdies in the last two holes. However, he had a double bogey and a bogey in the middle, and finally handed in 67 strokes, together with Chinese players Gao Jie, Liu Junfeng and South Korean player Cheng Siyu (Sea Woo Sung), tied for fourth place. "Maybe it's better not to see the golf course." Craig Scott, who has played in the Canadian Tour for four years, said jokingly. "If you don't see the golf course, you don't know where the danger is." In fact, the real reason why Craig Scott played well in Junlan is that his long shot is good. On the Australian Tour, he is one of the top three players in terms of serving distance. On Thursday, although the court did not roll much, his serving distance was 290 to 295 yards. Of course, the key is that these balls can stop on the fairway. Craig Scott only served once today without going up the fairway. In addition, he had another ball of luck. At the 15th hole, the three rod hole, he hit the ball to the back of the green, about 10 yards from the flagstick. He made a birdie by hitting a hole in one. The long serving distance always has advantages in Junlan International Golf Club. Craig Scott's compatriot Brad McIntosh also expressed a similar meaning after he made 66 shots early this morning. The player caught nine birds today, but also swallowed four bogies. Brad McIntosh, who has won two games in Australia, said: "This round is very ups and downs, with many small birds and many bogies, but it is not the reason why the serve is too fierce. Bogey mainly results from poor short shots, and there are some three pushes." Liu Junfeng, who is also a strong point in serving, is also in the lead. As the only player in the China Tour who has won a double eagle, Liu Junfeng caught 6 birds and swallowed 2 bogeys today. Gao Jie, a contestant from Luoyang, Henan Province, also shares this view, and he even thinks that the golf course is short. The 29 year old player just obtained the professional qualification in the professional examination in Zhuhai Jinwan this year, and said: "The result is good, but I still have some birds that I haven't won, otherwise it will be better." Zhang Lianwei scored 71 points, level par, and Wu Aishun scored 70 points, one par lower than the par. Liang Wenchong made 69 shots, 2 shots lower than the par. "Today, my iron is small to the left, and my wood is small to the right. This makes me unable to get close to the flagstick, which is the reason why I have few opportunities for birdie balls." Said Liang Wenchong, "In addition, the speed of the practice green is different from that of the actual green, so I didn't get the strength right on the short push. But in general, I am in good condition now." Liang Wenchong has just returned from the Japanese Tour. He won the runner up in the Asia Pacific Open co sponsored by the Asian Tour and the Japanese Tour, and in the Canon Open last week, if he had not made 74 shots in the first round, he would have been able to get a top ten. The game was cut to three rounds because of the bad weather, and he eventually finished tied for 17th place. Click to view detailed results>> (Breeze)

content: 小偷盗手机被抓当街割腕求饶本报讯（记者聂丽）以买电脑为由与老板攀谈，趁老板不注意将桌上的手机偷走。事情败露后，老板打算将小偷送到派出所，没有想到小偷竟当街割腕，以死要挟求饶。在电脑城经营组装电脑生意的陈老板说，昨日中午2时左右，一学生模样的男生走进该店，称要组装一台游戏型的电脑，谈了十几分钟后以价格太高为由离开。“那个人走后，我就习惯性地看了看桌面，发现手机不见了。”陈老板迅速跑出去追到那名男子，该男子矢口否认，陈老板无奈叫来广场保安。保安介入后引来众人围观，人群中有人指证此人是小偷。经营耗材的业务员小刘称，前几天，此人来过一次走后他的手机就丢了。随着围观的人越来越多，竟然先后有6个人指证此人偷手机。在众人指责声中，小偷承认了偷窃行为，交出了陈老板的手机。慌乱中从其身上还掉出偷窃的另外两部手机。众人一致要求将小偷交给警方处理，没有想到小偷竟掏出小刀割腕，以死要挟，哭着向众人求情。据了解，警方接到报案后，将小偷带走。
en: The thief was caught cutting his wrist in the street to beg for mercy. (Reporter Nie Li) On the grounds of buying a computer, he chatted with the boss and stole the mobile phone on the table when the boss was not paying attention. After the defeat, the boss intended to send the thief to the police station, but he never expected that the thief would cut his wrist in the street and beg for mercy to die. Chen, the boss who runs the computer assembly business in the computer city, said that at about 2:00 pm yesterday, a male student came into the store and said that he wanted to assemble a game computer. After talking for more than ten minutes, he left on the ground that the price was too high. "After that person left, I was used to looking at the desktop and found that my mobile phone was missing." Chen Bo quickly ran out to catch the man. The man denied it. Chen Bo had no choice but to call in the square security guard. After the security guard intervened, the crowd surrounded and someone in the crowd accused the person of being a thief. Xiao Liu, a salesman who runs consumables, said that this person lost his mobile phone after he came once a few days ago. As more and more people surrounded, six people successively accused this person of stealing mobile phones. In the face of everyone's accusations, the thief admitted the theft and handed over Chen Bo's mobile phone. In panic, another two stolen mobile phones fell out from his body. Everyone unanimously asked the police to deal with the thief, but he didn't expect that the thief would actually take out a knife to cut his wrist, threaten to die, and cry to everyone for mercy. It is understood that after receiving the report, the police took away the thief.

content: 港股盘中走高能源股金融股上扬港股早盘盘中拉升，恒指跌幅大幅收窄，部分蓝筹股转为上涨。截至10：27，恒指报22493.89点，跌14.19点，跌幅0.06%。盘面上看，蓝筹股涨跌互现。部分能源股有所走高，中煤能源涨近2%，中国神华亦涨逾1%；金融股方面，中银香港涨逾1%，东亚银行涨近1%，中国平安、中国银行均小幅上扬。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: The Hong Kong stock market rose during the trading day, with energy and financial stocks rising. The Hong Kong stock market rose during the morning trading, and the Hang Seng Index narrowed sharply. Some blue chip stocks turned to rise. As of 10:27, the Hang Seng Index reported 22493.89 points, down 14.19 points, or 0.06%. On the whole, blue chip stocks rose and fell. Some energy stocks rose, with China Coal Energy up nearly 2%, and China Shenhua also up more than 1%; In terms of financial stocks, Bank of China Hong Kong rose more than 1%, Bank of East Asia rose nearly 1%, Ping An of China and Bank of China both rose slightly. Welcome to comment I want to comment

content: 皇马相中西班牙国脚价值3600万世界杯他比托雷斯管用新浪体育讯　据西班牙马卡电台记者埃斯特拉达披露，皇马对现效力于毕尔巴鄂竞技的西班牙国脚前锋洛伦特非常感兴趣。埃斯特拉达在其专栏中透露：自从穆里尼奥来到皇家马德里之后，他的重点引进目标之一就一直是一名前锋。尽管皇马队内已经拥有像伊瓜因和克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多这样的攻击球员，但穆里尼奥想要的是一名风格不同的射手，他希望皇马高层能引进一名善于在禁区内打破僵局的强力中锋。此前已有媒体猜测皇马对拜仁慕尼黑的马里奥·戈麦斯和尤文图斯的阿毛里感兴趣，但穆里尼奥真正提到名字的人却是效力于毕尔巴鄂竞技的费尔南多·略伦特。略伦特拥有了穆里尼奥要求的一切条件：他头球好，双脚技术出色，跑动意识好，善于牵扯对方中卫的防守。此外，略伦特还拥有丰富的大赛经验，西班牙队夺得南非世界杯冠军，其中也有他的功劳。穆里尼奥希望略伦特尽快加盟，以便彻底完善皇马的球员结构。随着中场赫迪拉的到来以及皇马在边后卫位置上的操作，略伦特很可能是最终使球队完整的意外引进。不过，交易能否达成还必须要看略伦特本人以及毕尔巴鄂竞技方面的立场。略伦特的违约金在3600万欧元左右，很多球队都已经打听过他的情况。(KKGonzalez)
person: 穆里尼奥,埃斯特拉达,克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多,托雷斯,洛伦特,阿毛里,略伦特,伊瓜因,马里奥,KKGonzalez,赫迪拉,戈麦斯
en: Real Madrid has targeted the 36 million Spanish international World Cup, which is more useful than Torres Sina Sports News According to Estrada, a reporter from Real Madrid's Marca Radio in Spain, Real Madrid is very interested in Fernando Llorente, a Spanish international forward who is now playing for Athletic Bilbao. Estrada revealed in his column that since Mourinho came to Real Madrid, one of his key introduction targets has always been a forward. Although Real Madrid has attack players such as Higuain and Cristiano Ronaldo, Mourinho wants a different style of shooter, and he hopes that the senior management of Real Madrid can introduce a powerful center who is good at breaking the deadlock in the restricted area. Previously, the media speculated that Real Madrid was interested in Mario Gomez of Bayern Munich and Amouri of Juventus, but the person Mourinho really mentioned was Fernando Llorente, who played for Athletic Bilbao. Llorente has everything Mourinho requires: he has a good header, good feet skills, good running sense, and is good at pulling the other side's central defender's defense. In addition, Llorente also has rich experience in major events. The Spanish team won the South Africa World Cup championship, which also contributed to him. Mourinho hopes that Llorente can join as soon as possible in order to improve the player structure of Real Madrid completely. With the arrival of Khedira in the midfield and the operation of Real Madrid in the position of wing back, Llorente may be the unexpected introduction that eventually makes the team complete. However, whether the deal can be reached still depends on Llorente himself and the position of Athletic Bilbao. Llorente's breach of contract is around 36 million euros, and many teams have asked about his situation. (KKGonzalez)

content: 泰国两座政府机关大楼再遭爆炸袭击中新网3月25日电据外电报道，泰国副总理25日称，两座政府机关大楼24日再次遭到爆炸袭击，政府将升级安保措施。他说，“红衫军”可能图谋制造混乱，但是泰国政府完全有掌控局势的能力。泰国警方称，首都曼谷北部郊区的一座省政府办公大楼，与首都西部的一座政府大楼24日分别遭到爆炸袭击。负责安保工作的副总理素贴对记者说：“我们必须要调整(安保)行动以防范攻击。”他说已经命令有关官员提升安保措施。素贴说：“情报显示，他们(红衫军)图谋制造混乱，以显示政府无法控制局势，但是我要向泰国人民保证，政府完全有掌控局势的能力。”这两次爆炸没有造成人员伤亡，只导致一些轻微损失。自3月14日以来，已发生过8次爆炸。大部分爆炸事件为手榴弹袭击，但是警方调查称，这次曼谷北部省政府大楼爆炸，他们认为是TNT爆炸装置引起的。
en: Two government office buildings in Thailand were hit by another bomb attack on March 25. China News Network (Beijing, March 25) According to foreign media reports, the Thai Vice Premier said on the 25th that two government office buildings were hit by another bomb attack on the 24th, and the government would upgrade security measures. He said that the "red shirt army" may try to create chaos, but the Thai government has the ability to control the situation completely. The Thai police said that a provincial government office building in the northern suburbs of the capital Bangkok and a government building in the west of the capital were hit by bomb attacks on the 24th. Suthep, the vice premier in charge of security, said to the reporters, "We must adjust the (security) operation to guard against attacks." He said that he had ordered relevant officials to upgrade security measures. Suthep said: "Intelligence shows that they (the Red Army) are plotting to create chaos to show that the government is out of control, but I want to assure the Thai people that the government has the ability to control the situation completely." The two explosions caused no casualties, only some slight losses. Since March 14, there have been eight explosions. Most of the explosions were grenade attacks, but the police investigation said that the explosion of the provincial government building in northern Bangkok this time, they believed, was caused by a TNT explosive device.

content: 意大利锋线边缘人渴望征服里皮回击批评表示永不放弃新浪体育讯　意大利球星夸利亚雷拉相信他可以征服国家队主帅里皮，为自己在意大利的世界杯阵容中争得一个位置。尽管在为俱乐部出战的33场比赛中打入了11个球，这位那不勒斯射手还是受到了广泛的质疑。意大利国家队将在罗马进行世界杯前的集训，夸利亚雷拉则在一片质疑声中被里皮招入训练营。评论家们认为卡萨诺、米科利和巴洛特利等人比他更应该去南非参加世界杯。但是，夸利亚雷拉确信他可以在意大利的攻击线上赢得自己的一席之地而参加今夏的南非世界杯。“我将会尽最大的努力在赛季结束之前证明给里皮看，”夸利亚雷拉告诉媒体，“里皮知道我的一切，我也会尽自己最大的努力，因为我不想留下任何遗憾。”“我是一个永不放弃的人，”夸利亚雷拉坚定的说。夸利亚雷拉在去年夏天加盟了那不勒斯，那也是他儿时就心仪的球队。本赛季他虽然只收获了11个进球，但他认为那不是失败而是成就。“我打入了那些进球，帮助那不勒斯取得了下赛季的欧战资格。”他补充说，“我不认为11个进球很少。十多年来，一直没有球员在意甲联赛帮助那不勒斯打入这么多球。批评我的人也许应该保持沉默。”(威尔曼)
person: 卡萨诺,里皮,威尔曼,米科利,巴洛特利,夸利亚雷拉
en: The marginal people on the Italian front line are eager to conquer Lippi to fight back criticism, saying they will never give up Sina Sports News. Italian star Quaglia Rella believes that he can conquer the national team coach Lippi and win a place in the Italian World Cup team. Although the Napoli striker has scored 11 goals in 33 games for the club, he has been widely questioned. The Italian national team will have a pre World Cup training camp in Rome, and Quaglia Rella was invited to the training camp by Lippi in the face of a wide range of doubts. Critics believe that Cassano, Miccoli, Balotelli and other people are more qualified to go to South Africa for the World Cup. However, Quaglia Rella is convinced that he can win his place in Italy's attack line to participate in the South Africa World Cup this summer. "I will do my best to prove to Lippi before the end of the season," Quaglia Rella told the media, "Lippi knows everything about me, and I will do my best, because I don't want to leave any regrets." "I am a man who never gives up," said Quaglia Rella firmly. Quaglia Rella joined Naples last summer, which was also his favorite team in his childhood. Although he only scored 11 goals this season, he thought it was not a failure but an achievement. "I scored those goals to help Naples get the qualification for the next season's European War," he added. "I don't think 11 goals are few. For more than a decade, there has been no player in the Italian League to help Naples score so many goals. Those who criticize me should keep silent." (Willman)

content: 黄培昭：巴以滥施武力事与愿违作者：黄培昭在经历了为期半年的相对平静之后，巴以重新爆发冲突。27日，以色列出动战斗机和武装直升机空袭加沙，目前已有包括巴勒斯坦伊斯兰抵抗运动(哈马斯)高级军事官员在内的1000多人死伤。以色列何以对哈马斯大打出手？中东媒体分析认为，以色列主要出于三方面的考虑。一是报复哈马斯的火箭袭击。今年6月，以哈马斯为主的加沙巴勒斯坦派别与以色列达成为期半年的停火协议，协议至12月中旬到期。由此，巴以间的冲突开始升温。以色列军方说，自18日以来，哈马斯已向以色列境内发射了数百枚火箭。为此，以色列必须进行还击，以打击“恐怖主义”的“嚣张气焰”。二是出于国内政治的需要。明年初，以色列将举行大选。现在竞争态势激烈。利库德集团主席内塔尼亚胡等一直指责政府“软弱”，前进党党内不少人也认为奥尔默特“无能”，奥尔默特面临极大的压力。以当局大举空袭加沙，是各方压力的结果，只有这样，奥尔默特才能战败利库德集团等其它党派的竞争而赢得大选，否则就会像民调显示的那样，在明年初的选举中失利。三是以色列利用了美国政坛权力交接的真空。现在，总统布什卸任在即，当选总统奥巴马还没上任，以色列认为这一特殊时期是对哈马斯发动攻击的最佳时机。24日，以色列内阁开会，批准以国防军对哈马斯的军、政目标实施打击。以色列这一次采取了惯用的“闪电战”战术，各机种几乎在同一时间内协同作战，向加沙的近50处目标进行狂轰滥炸，造成重大伤亡。不过，从实际效果看，以色列要达到消灭哈马斯的目标很难实现。首先，如此大的伤亡必然引起国际社会的强烈不满和谴责，一些阿拉伯国家也要求召开紧急首脑会议讨论形势，报道称，阿拉伯国家联盟将在两天内举行紧急会议研究对策。其次，在伤亡面前，哈马斯会空前团结，并赢得更多的人心和支持者，这样，就与以色列的初衷事与愿违。事后，哈马斯发表声明，呼吁其手下军事人员及支持者以各种手段对以色列发起最猛烈的报复行动，哈马斯成员群情激昂，纷纷发誓要对以色列“以牙还牙”，让以色列变成“血的地狱”。连主流的巴民族解放运动(法塔赫)也站在哈马斯一边，对哈马斯受袭击并遭到沉重打击进行声援。巴临时政府宣布为期3天的“哀悼日”，悼念在以军空袭中丧生的巴勒斯坦人。当然，更严重的是，如果恶化局势，甚至失控，巴以将重新坠入暴力循环的怪圈，彻底断送中东和平进程。巴以冲突已经成为中东局势的“沉疴痼疾”，眼下，冲突的势头再度凸显，事态的发展令人担忧。实践证明，武力绝不是化解矛盾的办法，只有通过谈判实现和平，才是解决一切问题的真正出路。
person: 奥巴马,奥尔默特,布什,黄培昭,内塔尼亚胡
en: Huang Peizhao: The authors of the Israeli Palestinian conflict, who have experienced a relatively peaceful period of six months, have resumed their conflict. On the 27th, Israel sent fighters and armed helicopters to launch an air raid on Gaza, and more than 1000 people, including Hamas military officials of the Palestinian Islamic Resistance Movement, were killed or wounded. Why did Israel attack Hamas? The media in the Middle East analyzed that Israel mainly considered three aspects. One is to retaliate against Hamas' rocket attacks. In June this year, the Palestinian factions in Gaza, mainly Hamas, reached a six-month ceasefire agreement with Israel, which expired in mid December. As a result, the conflict between Palestine and Israel began to escalate. The Israeli military said that since the 18th, Hamas had launched hundreds of rockets into Israel. As a result, Israel must retaliate to fight the "arrogant spirit" of "terrorism". Second, it is necessary for domestic politics. Early next year, Israel will hold general elections. Now the competition situation is fierce. Netanyahu, chairman of the Likud Group, and many other people in the forward party have been accusing the government of "weakness", and Olmert is under great pressure. The large-scale air raid on Gaza by the Israeli authorities is the result of pressure from all parties, and only in this way can Olmert defeat the competition of other parties such as the Likud Group and win the election, otherwise, as the public opinion polls show, he will lose the election in the early January. Third, Israel has taken advantage of the vacuum of power transition in the US political arena. Now, President Bush is going to retire and President Obama has not yet taken office. Israel believes that this special period is the best time to attack Hamas. On the 24th, the Israeli cabinet held a meeting to approve the Israeli Defense Forces to attack Hamas' military and political goals. This time, Israel adopted the usual "lightning war" tactic. All aircraft almost fought in coordination at the same time, and launched a massive bombing of nearly 50 targets in Gaza, causing heavy casualties. However, in terms of actual results, it is difficult for Israel to achieve the goal of eliminating Hamas. First of all, such casualties will inevitably cause strong dissatisfaction and condemnation from the international community, and some Arab countries also require an emergency summit to discuss the situation. It is reported that the Arab League will hold an emergency meeting within two days to study countermeasures. Secondly, in the face of casualties, Hamas will be unprecedentedly united, winning more hearts and supporters, which will go against the wishes of Israel. Later, Hamas issued a statement, calling on its military personnel and supporters to launch the most fierce retaliatory actions against Israel in various ways. Hamas members were so enthusiastic that they vowed to "pay back their teeth" to Israel and make it a "hell of blood". Even the mainstream Palestinian National Liberation Movement (Fatah) also stands on the side of Hamas to support Hamas in its attack and heavy blow. The Palestinian interim government announced a three-day "day of mourning" to mourn the Palestinians who died in the Israeli air raid. Of course, more seriously, if the situation worsens or even loses control, Palestine and Israel will fall back into the vicious circle of violence, completely sacrificing the peace process in the Middle East. The Israeli Palestinian conflict has become a "chronic disease" in the Middle East. At present, the conflict is once again highlighted, and the development of events is worrying. Practice has proved that force is never a way to resolve contradictions. Only by achieving peace through negotiation is the real way out for all problems.

content: 张柏芝新公司发声明：只要抚养权欲告查小欣成都商报讯(记者陈玲莉)继刘若英(微博)发布结婚声明，范冰冰发布“被怀孕”声明后，新近签约新东家AEG新亚洲娱乐联盟集团的张柏芝昨日也凑热闹，委托新东家发了一份声明，声明中称近日对其离婚事件进行报道的香港《明报周刊》和《东方新地》存在失实报道，要追究法律责任。这位新东家的老总余毓兴还很牛气地表示，公司也将同时追究香港主持人查小欣爆料离婚事件的法律责任，还张柏芝一个清白。8月6日见报的《明报周刊》这篇被称为失实的报道中称，“知情人透露，张柏芝并非甘愿一毛不拿，她不仅要两个儿子的抚养权，更详列谢霆锋22亿元台币的家产清单，逐项平分。”对于这一说法，余毓兴表示存在失实之处，人在剧组拍摄的张柏芝委托公司对外表明态度，“只想要两个儿子的抚养权，并不想拿走谢霆锋一分一毛钱，自己有足够的经济能力养好两个儿子。”而香港英皇旗下的《东方新地》近日则刊登了一张Lucas哭喊的图片，称“Lucas不要和张柏芝一起住要和谢霆锋回家”，这篇报道也遭到新亚洲娱乐的斥责，余毓兴表示，经过张柏芝的授权，公司将向《东方新地》发出律师函。
person: 张柏芝,余毓兴,查小欣,陈玲莉,Lucas,刘若英,谢霆锋
en: Zhang's new company issued a statement: He wanted to sue Xiaoxin Chengdu Commercial News (Chen Lingli) After Liu Rong (microblog) issued a marriage statement and Fan Bingbing issued a "pregnant" statement, Zhang Ziyi, who recently signed a contract with the new owner AEG Asia Entertainment Alliance Group, also joined in the fun yesterday, entrusting the new owner to issue a statement, which said that the Hong Kong "Ming Bao Weekly" and "Oriental New Land", which recently reported on his divorce, were false, and he wanted to pursue legal responsibility. Yu Yuxing, the boss of the new owner, also said domineeringly that the company will also pursue the legal responsibility of Hong Kong host Xiaoxin for exposing the divorce, and restore Zhang's innocence. The false report of the Ming Bao Weekly, which was published on August 6 and was called false, said, "The informed source revealed that Cecilia Cheung was not willing to give up a single hair. She wanted not only the custody of her two children, but also listed Xiao Feng's family property list of 2.2 billion Taiwan dollars, and shared it item by item." For this statement, Yu Yuxing said that there were false statements. Cecilia Cheung, who was shooting in the crew, asked the company to show her attitude to the outside world, "I just want the custody of my two children, and I don't want to take a penny away from Xiao Feng. I have enough economic ability to raise my two children well." However, the Oriental New Land under Hong Kong Emperor recently published a picture of Lucas crying, saying "Lucas doesn't want to live with Cecilia Cheung but to go home with Xiao Feng", which was also criticized by the new Asian entertainment. Yu Yuxing said that after being authorized by Cecilia Cheung, the company would send a lawyer's letter to the Oriental New Land.

content: 今年IPO募资下降近八成王锦据统计，包括上海电气不筹资IPO在内，今年以来共有77家公司通过IPO亮相沪深两市。除上海电气外的76家公司共募集资金约1034亿元，平均发行市盈率27倍。由于股市深幅调整，今年IPO发行同比大幅缩水，IPO家数与2007年的123家相比减少38%，募集资金总额与2007年的4770亿元相比减少78%。除发行节奏大幅放缓外，今年以来大盘股IPO寥寥无几，仅5家公司发行数量在5亿股以上，占IPO总家数的6%，而去年该比例为17%。不过，大盘股仍扮演了主要融资角色。这5家公司共募集资金733亿元，占今年IPO募资总额的70%。今年IPO公司中，中煤能源募资金额最高，达256亿元；中国南车发行股份数量最大，为30亿股。尽管12月份尚余13个交易日，但业内人士估计，年内重启IPO的可能性非常小。民族证券策略分析师表示，目前市场融资功能完全取决于市场好坏。如果有跨年度行情，明年1月份或一季度可能会有一些中小板IPO试探性出来。不过，日信证券首席策略分析师徐海洋表示，目前市场环境不具备重启IPO的条件，至少3个月内看不到IPO开闸的希望。国金证券策略研究员徐炜也表示，重启IPO最早可能要到明年一季度末二季度初，管理层会更多考虑市场情况。上海QDII募集规模比上季下降近7成□记者钱妤晚报讯相对于信托类和债券以及货币市场工具类理财产品的继续稳健增长，上海市场的结构性理财产品和QDII业务募集规模下降，分别比上季下降33.61%和64.58%。尤其是中小型银行，上述两类业务的募集金额下降最为显著。上海银监局昨日发布的《2008年第三季度个人理财业务分析报告》显示，截至2008年9月末，上海市场个人理财产品余额为1342.26亿元，比上季末增长25.47%，比去年同期增长64.62%；共募集资金1356.20亿元，比上季增长5.14%，比去年同期增长74.35%。三季度，上海市场商业银行个人理财业务以人民币理财业务为主导的市场格局特点更加显著。三季度共募集人民币理财产品1271.57亿元，占到理财产品募集总量的91.7%。人民币理财业务集中于信托理财和债券及货币市场工具类的理财产品，两类理财产品募集资金总量分别为604.66亿元和573.56亿元，占比分别达到44.58%和42.29%。
en: The statistics of Wang Jin, including the non fund raising IPO of Shanghai Electric, showed that a total of 77 companies had appeared in Shanghai and Shenzhen through IPO since this year. 76 companies other than Shanghai Electric raised a total of 103.4 billion yuan, with an average issuance price earnings ratio of 27 times. Due to the deep adjustment of the stock market, this year's IPO issuance shrank significantly compared with the same period last year, the number of IPOs decreased by 38% compared with 123 in 2007, and the total funds raised decreased by 78% compared with 477 billion yuan in 2007. In addition to the sharp slowdown in the issuance pace, there were few large-cap IPOs in Shanghai since this year. Only 5 companies issued more than 500 million shares, accounting for 6% of the total number of IPOs, while the proportion last year was 17%. However, large-cap stocks still play a major role in financing. These five companies raised a total of 73.3 billion yuan, accounting for 70% of the total IPO funds raised this year. Among the IPO companies this year, China Coal Energy raised the highest amount of money, up to 25.6 billion yuan; China South Locomotive issued the largest number of shares, 3 billion shares. Although there are still 13 trading days in December, industry insiders estimate that the possibility of restarting IPO within the year is very small. The national securities strategy analyst said that the current market financing function is entirely dependent on the market. If there is a year-end market, there may be some small and medium-sized board IPOs coming out for a test in January or the first quarter of next year. However, Xu Haiping, chief strategy analyst of Rixin Securities, said that the current market environment is not suitable for restarting IPO, and there is no hope of reopening IPO for at least 3 months. Xu Wei, a strategy researcher of Guojin Securities, also said that the earliest restart of IPO may be at the end of the first quarter and the beginning of the second quarter of next year, and the management will take more consideration of the market situation. Shanghai QDII's fundraising scale fell nearly 70% from the previous quarter. □ Reporter Qian Yu Evening News reported that the structural wealth management products and QDII business in the Shanghai market fell in the scale of fundraising, down 33.61% and 64.58% from the previous quarter respectively. In particular, small and medium-sized banks have the most significant decline in the amount of funds raised for the above two types of businesses. The Personal Wealth Management Business Analysis Report released by Shanghai Banking Supervision Bureau yesterday shows that as of the end of September 2008, the balance of personal wealth management products in Shanghai market was 134.226 billion yuan, up 25.47% from the end of the last quarter and 64.62% from the same period last year; A total of 135.62 billion yuan was raised, up 5.14% from the last quarter and 74.35% from the same period last year. In the third quarter, the market pattern of commercial banks' personal wealth management business in Shanghai was more significant, mainly focusing on RMB wealth management. In the third quarter, a total of 127.157 billion yuan of RMB wealth management products were raised, accounting for 91.7% of the total amount of wealth management products. Renminbi wealth management business focuses on trust wealth management and bond and money market instrument wealth management products. The total amount of funds raised by the two types of wealth management products was 60.466 billion yuan and 57.356 billion yuan respectively, accounting for 44.58% and 42.29% respectively.

content: 10岁女盲童举办个人音乐会(图)从出生时，因为吸氧过量，她就永远失去了光明。明晚，一个专为刚过10岁生日的王怡文举办的音乐会，就要在郑州大学逸夫楼演播厅上演了。音乐会的主题，就是青年钢琴家郎朗送给她的这句话：“心中有音乐，眼前就有光明。”晚报记者裴蕾/文马健/图彩排现场，小怡文对电子琴产生了极大的兴趣。怡文的独白：用歌声为大家带来快乐我在音乐的陪伴下长大，精彩奇妙的故事充满了我快乐的童年。4岁时，我就跨进了快乐英语乐园，6岁时我和钢琴做了朋友，8岁我跟随刘鹤老师学习声乐。现在，我10岁了，我愿意用我的歌声为大家带来快乐。怡文的心愿：能看见这个世界和妈妈昨天上午，河南电视台内一个演播大厅，怡文在妈妈的陪伴下，为一档电视栏目做彩排。弹钢琴，唱歌曲，台上的怡文表现得十分抢眼。而她的妈妈王菲，在台下站立着，面带微笑，默默注视着女儿。掌声响起，主持人问怡文，她的梦想是什么？怡文想都没有想大声说：“我希望自己的眼睛能够看到，我想看到我年轻的妈妈。”王菲的眼睛湿润了。郎朗的鼓励：“心中有音乐，眼前就有光明”颇有天赋的怡文，在成长道路上，得到了来自各方的帮助。2008年，一个很好的机遇和她擦肩而过。郎朗郑州音乐会向怡文发出邀请，然而，因为种种原因，这场演奏会最终取消了。郎朗内地经纪人李宁专程从美国打来越洋电话，将郎朗对小怡文的鼓励转达给她：“心中有音乐，眼前就有光明。”“我觉得这次的经历，对怡文的鼓励真的挺大的，从此之后，怡文练琴更加认真刻苦了。”王菲说。“我要唱10多首歌曲，歌词都记熟了。”怡文说，对于即将到来的演唱会，她一点也不紧张，她要在那天晚上，弹出最美丽的琴声、唱出自己心中最想唱的歌曲。
person: 裴蕾,郎朗,王菲,刘鹤,怡文,小怡文,李宁,王怡文,马健
en: A 10 year old blind girl held a personal concert (picture) Because of oxygen overdose at birth, she lost her light forever. Tomorrow evening, a concert held in the Yifu Building of Zhengzhou University for Wang Yiwen, who has just turned 10 years old, will be staged. The theme of the concert is the sentence that Lang Lang, a young pianist, gave to her: "There is music in my heart and light in my eyes." At the rehearsal site, Xiao Yiwun was very interested in the electronic organ. Yiwun's monologue: Bring happiness to everyone with songs. I grew up with music, and wonderful stories filled my happy childhood. At the age of 4, I entered the Happy English Paradise. At the age of 6, I made friends with the piano. At the age of 8, I studied vocal music with Liu He as my teacher. Now, I'm 10 years old, and I'm willing to bring happiness to everyone with my songs. Yiwun's wish: Seeing the world and my mother yesterday morning, in a broadcasting hall of Henan TV Station, Yiwun, accompanied by her mother, rehearsed for a television column. Play the piano, sing songs, Yiwun on the stage is very eye catching. Her mother, Faye Wong, stood under the stage with a smile on her face, silently watching her daughter. Applause broke out. The host asked Yiwun what her dream was? Without thinking, Yiwun said loudly, "I hope my eyes can see, and I want to see my young mother." Faye Wong's eyes were wet. Lang Lang's encouragement: "There is music in my heart and light in my eyes" Yiwun, who is very talented, has received help from all sides on the road of growth. In 2008, a good opportunity passed her by. Lang Lang's concert in Zhengzhou invited Yiwun, but for various reasons, the concert was cancelled in the end. Li Ning, Lang Lang's inland agent, made a transoceanic phone call from the United States to convey Lang Lang's encouragement to Xiao Yiwun: "There is music in my heart and light in my eyes." "I think this experience is really very encouraging to Yiwun. After that, Yiwun practices the piano more seriously." said Faye Wong. "I'm going to sing more than a dozen songs, and I've learned the lyrics by heart." Yiwun said that she was not nervous at all about the coming concert, and on that evening, she would play the most beautiful music and sing the songs she wanted to sing most in her heart.

content: 图文：胡静婚礼现场设计图舞台设计图2新浪娱乐讯即将于27日晚在吉隆坡上演的胡静(听歌blog)和当地首富朱兆祥的半空婚礼的设计图今日凌晨被揭晓，从整个设计图和造价上来看这场婚礼已经超越了之前媒体预计的3000万，有大马媒体更是猜测这将会封顶大马有史以来的婚宴记录。图为胡静婚礼现场设计图
en: Pictures: Hu Jing's wedding design drawing stage design drawing 2 Sina Entertainment News The design drawing of Hu Jing (listening to music blog) and the semi-air wedding of Zhu Zhaoxiang, the local richest man, which will be held in Kuala Lumpur on the evening of the 27th, was unveiled in the early morning of today. From the perspective of the whole design drawing and cost, the wedding has exceeded the 30 million previously estimated by the media. The Malaysian media even speculated that this would top the Malaysian record of weddings in history. Hu Jing's wedding site design drawing is shown in the picture

content: 意名记：罢工扇了百万球迷巴掌触到历史最可笑的一点《米兰体育报》安德雷阿·蒙蒂恭喜，给你们打分：3分。献给所有主席、球员和行政机构，你们秉承一贯风格，在一场超现实的比赛后给出了大家习以为常的结果：全是输家，没赢家。这个周末，在空荡荡的看台上，足球幽灵在徘徊游荡，或许庆祝着整个意大利这记漂亮的大乌龙。这次罢工、或封锁、或推迟——你们想怎么叫都可以——是扇在数百万足球爱好者脸上的巴掌。足球界的绅士们富豪们，请别做梦了，球迷软弱，但不是傻子，想挽回失去的民心、挽回你们已经失去还在下落的信用，想修复乌龙造成的损伤，那可不是一两天能实现的。你们搬石头砸自己脚，将来的苦果有你们好受。任何企图剖析问题实质在于集体合同这一条、那一条的人，省省力气吧，现实是我们触到历史最低点最可笑的一点，意大利足球体制的危机即政治、经济危机才是根本，看，没一个人能控制局面，没人能改变乌龙的轨迹，这说明涉事所有人罪过同等。人民将怨气发在球员身上，对，他们确是被惯坏的偶像，整天以摇滚明星自居，只要自己稍不如意被分在另一组训练，就觉得天大冤情，自述为失业者。是啊，他们是地球上最富有的下岗工人。但也得看到，多数球员是职业、敬业的，没有挑三拣四。尽管托马西无能，可还是在避免破裂。最终摇头的是老板们，我们足球的核心人物。他们很荒诞，空前的团结又空前的内部分歧。如果球员被宠坏，是他们宠的；如果一个球队有50个球员，那也是他们买的；财政赤字，他们搞的。如果说贝雷塔像个跳梁小丑，过错不是某条法律，而是老板们的权力太大，无边际不受制约。可球员支付额外税赋、和所有公民义务一样这么简单的事都搞不定，他们的权力似乎对上不对下了。德拉瓦莱的足球证监会建议，有人赞成有人反对，我觉得这条路对了。足球投资者需尽快找到一个专业人士或团队，享有独立权力和思考空间来制定新的足球规则，将其推广，与其他领域主体沟通。更重要的，是要制定出整体推广意甲产品、将价值最大化的全面市场方案，学习英超、西甲的团结和境外扩张模式。别再抱怨球星出逃，别再指责意甲观赏性战斗力下降，再不切正要害流于皮毛之说，我们真的要沦为欧洲乡村了。里诺·邦菲(电影《足球教练》主人公)说过：“没买成苏格拉底，我们就买亚里士多德。反正所有动作，都要遵从哲学逻辑。”
person: 里诺·邦菲,亚里士多德,苏格拉底,托马西,贝雷塔,德拉瓦莱,安德雷阿·蒙蒂
en: Yi Mingji: The strike fanned a slap in the face of millions of fans and touched the most ridiculous point in history. Congratulations from Milan Sports Daily Andrea Monti. Score for you: 3. Dedicated to all presidents, players and administrative institutions, you follow the consistent style and give the usual results after a surreal game: all losers, no winners. This weekend, football ghosts were wandering around on the empty stands, perhaps celebrating this beautiful big own goal in the whole of Italy. This strike, or blockade, or delay - you can call it what you want - is a slap in the face of millions of football fans. Gentlemen and rich people in the football world, please don't dream. Fans are weak, but they are not fools. If you want to win back the lost people's hearts, credit that has lost and is declining, and repair the damage caused by the own goal, it is not something that can be achieved in one or two days. You move stones to hit your feet, and you will suffer the bitter fruit in the future. Anyone who attempts to analyze the essence of the problem in terms of collective contracts, this one or that one, save your strength. The reality is that we have touched the most ridiculous point of the lowest point in history. The crisis of the Italian football system, that is, the political and economic crisis, is fundamental. Look, no one can control the situation, no one can change the trajectory of the own goal, which shows that all the people involved are equally guilty. The people vent their anger on the players. Yes, they are spoiled idols. They are self proclaimed rock stars all day long. If they are divided into another group for training, they will feel a great injustice and describe themselves as unemployed. Yes, they are the richest laid-off workers on earth. But it should also be seen that most players are professional and dedicated, and they don't pick and choose. Although Tomasi is incompetent, he is still avoiding a breakdown. In the end, the bosses, the core of our football, shook their heads. They are very absurd, unprecedentedly united and unprecedentedly divided. If the player is spoiled, they are the one who spoiled him; If a team has 50 players, they also bought them; If there is a financial deficit, they will do it. If Beretta is like a clown, the fault is not a law, but the power of the boss is too great and unlimited. But the players can't even do such a simple thing as to pay extra taxes and obligations like all citizens, and their power seems to be against the public rather than the public. Delaval's Football Securities and Futures Commission suggested that someone should agree and someone should disagree. I think this way is right. Football investors need to find a professional or team as soon as possible to enjoy independent power and space to think to formulate new football rules, publicize them and communicate with the main bodies of other fields. More importantly, we need to formulate a comprehensive market strategy to promote Serie A products and maximize their value, and learn from the unity and overseas expansion model of the Premier League and La Liga. Stop complaining about the escape of stars, stop blaming Serie A for its decreased combat effectiveness, and we will really become the countryside of Europe if we do not cut to the key and flow to the skin. Rino Bonnefe (the main character of the movie "Football Coach") once said: "We didn't buy Socrates, so we bought Aristotle. Anyway, all actions should follow the logic of philosophy."

content: 北京全年政策房土地供应提前超额完成本报讯(记者刘宇鑫)记者昨天从市国土资源局了解到，截至7月底，本市1000亿元政府土地储备投资任务已完成过半，全年850万平方米政策性住房的土地供应任务已提前超额完成。为了保持政策性住房供应的延续性，下半年，本市还将新增300万平方米限价房的建设用地供应，其中200万平方米为定向安置房，其余房源将向社会配售。市国土局有关负责人介绍，从北京上半年供地的情况看，经营性用地达730公顷，同比增长400%，其中住宅用地同比增长300%。截至7月10日，经营性用地成交534公顷，成交额318亿元，土地交易价格基本稳定。在政策性住房供地方面，截至目前，北京全年850万平方米政策性住房的土地供应任务已超额完成，其中通过以土地交易市场为主的方式供地53处，规划建筑面积约660万平方米，廉租房和经济适用房用地的规划建筑面积388万平方米。据了解，朝阳区是今年新建住宅开工面积和商品房销售面积最大的区。市国土局朝阳分局负责人表示，目前，朝阳区纳入政府土地储备项目包括崔各庄乡大望京村环境整治土地储备项目、金盏金融园区、豆各庄乡土地储备项目、三间房乡D区土地储备项目、东坝边缘集团南区土地储备项目、孙河乡土地储备项目、朝阳区亮马J、K收储项目等，预计总投资约880亿元，目前已经到账400亿元。他说，大望京环境整治土地储备项目有望成为本市首个“当年储备、当年供地”的项目。我要评论
en: Beijing's annual policy housing land supply was completed ahead of schedule (reporter Liu Yuxin) The reporter learned from the Municipal Land and Resources Bureau yesterday that as of the end of July, more than half of the municipal government's land reserve investment task of 100 billion yuan had been completed, and the annual land supply task of 8.5 million square meters of policy housing had been completed ahead of schedule. In order to maintain the continuity of policy housing supply, in the second half of the year, the city will also increase the supply of 3 million square meters of land for limited price houses, including 2 million square meters for定向安置houses, and the rest will be allocated to the society. The relevant responsible person of the Municipal Land and Resources Bureau introduced that from the land supply situation in the first half of Beijing, the operating land reached 730 hectares, up 400% year on year, including 300% year on year for residential land. As of July 10, the transaction volume of land for operation was 534 hectares, with a transaction value of 31.8 billion yuan, and the land trading price was basically stable. In terms of land supply for policy housing, up to now, the land supply task of 8.5 million square meters of policy housing in Beijing has been超额completed, including 5.3 million square meters of planned floor area through land trading market as the main way of land supply, and 3.88 million square meters of planned floor area for low rent housing and affordable housing. It is understood that Chaoyang District is the largest area in terms of new residential construction area and commodity housing sales area this year. The person in charge of Chaoyang Branch of the Municipal Land and Resources Bureau said that at present, the government land reserve projects included in Chaoyang District include Dazhangjing Village, Cuigezhuang Township, Chaoyang District, Jinzhuan Financial Park, Dougezhuang Township, Land Reserve Project, Sanjianfang Township, D District, Land Reserve Project, Nanzhai, Dongba Edge Group, Land Reserve Project, Sunhe Township, Land Reserve Project, and LiuMa J, K, Chaoyang District, with a total investment of about 88 billion yuan, and 40 billion yuan has been received at present. He said that the Dazhangjing environmental rehabilitation land reserve project is expected to become the first "land reserve and land supply in the same year" project in the city. I'd like to comment

content: 基金投资策略渐入窄门偏股基金连续数月雷同本报记者周宏如果把过去2个月中，基金发布的股票投资策略做个统计的话，结果可能是惊人的相似。以震荡市为主要判断，以消费、新能源等行业为投资主题，偏股基金的投资策略，连续数月雷同已是不争的事实。如同一个生命一样，基金的投资策略应该也有其发端、发展、成熟乃至逐步修正的过程。但在A股市场行情迅速演绎的这两个月，基金的投资策略却两个月未变。是什么造就了基金策略们的“尴尬”？结构性策略依旧不知道什么时候，“捕捉机构性机会”成为基金行业里对于下阶段投资策略的“唯一主题词”。以上周公布的一家合资基金的投资观点为例，“鉴于宏观政策的不确定性，预计大盘将继续维持震荡格局，中小盘题材股长期活跃后累积了丰厚的获利盘，有调整空间，但权重股下行空间不大。板块方面，我们看好具有较强抗风险能力、稳定增长的行业。”而早在几个月前，类似的推论已经在行业内铺天盖地。基金半年报中，包括广发、华安等大型基金管理公司旗下基金均众口一词的关注“新兴产业”、“大消费”的组合。而包括新能源、电动汽车、稀土等上游原材料组成的战略新兴产业，以及食品饮料、医药、农业、家电、零售等大消费产业，早在那时已经成为基金经理们口边的热门行业。及至目前，这种状况仍未有太多改变。宏观政策两难那么其中的原因又在哪里呢？不少基金经理认为，原由来自于目前的宏观经济环境。博时基金一位基金经理就认为，经济转型不会一蹴而就，特别是在当前经济增速下滑的情况下，增长速度让位于经济结构调整将是长期趋势，尤其未来几年中预计资源、劳动力等生产要素使用成本逐步提高，人民币渐进升值；在保证投资和出口稳定增长情况下，社会保障力度逐步提高，而这个过程中，消费服务和科技创新将会获得更多的政策支持。还有基金认为，CPI同比3.5%的数据再次引发了市场对于加息的猜测。但考虑到未来物价涨幅有望平稳回落、经济运行仍存在不确定性，利率不大可能大幅上调，年内仍以保持稳定为主。如果物价涨幅继续走高，也不排除央行小幅提高基准利率的可能，以改善负的实际利率状况，管理通胀预期。在这样辗转的宏观经济下，投资要理清头绪确实有不小的压力。行业配置“惯性思维”同样可能影响基金经理的还包括惯性的投资思维。而这种思维，往往成为各类行业极端性表现的代表。业内一位颇有影响力的投资总监，此前就表示，避险情绪正在主导整个机构群体，不断把非周期类股的估值推向极致。“这是个情绪化的看法，非周期类公司的风险就真的没有？周期类公司真的业绩一直不理想？”他反问道。而业内或许已经出现了另一种判断，上投摩根的基金经理王振州表示，从经济周期的角度看，今年四季度和明年一季度，GDP预计将会在8以上，实体经济的情况好于先前的预期，因此大盘向下的空间已经不大。另外，由于和整个经济状况的相关性较高，一直以来低PE的蓝筹股的机会也将显现。当然，目前，这个观点在业内仍是少数。
en: The investment strategy of the fund gradually enters the narrow gate. The partial equity fund is similar to the reporter Zhou Hong for several consecutive months. If the stock investment strategy released by the fund in the past two months is counted, the result may be surprisingly similar. Focusing on the volatile market as the main judgment and consumption, new energy and other industries as the investment theme, the investment strategy of the partial equity fund has been the same for several consecutive months, which is an undeniable fact. Like a life, the investment strategy of the fund should also have its beginning, development, maturity and gradual modification. However, in these two months when the A-share market is rapidly evolving, the investment strategy of the fund has not changed for two months. What has caused the "embarrassment" of fund strategists? Structural strategies still do not know when "capturing institutional opportunities" has become the "only theme word" of the fund industry for the next stage of investment strategy. Taking the investment view of a joint stock fund announced last week as an example, "In view of the uncertainty of macro policy, it is expected that the market will continue to maintain a volatile pattern. The small and medium-sized board themed stocks have accumulated a substantial profit making plate after a long period of activity, and there is room for adjustment, but the weight loss space is small. In terms of sectors, we are optimistic about the industry with strong anti risk ability and stable growth." As early as several months ago, similar inferences have been widespread in the industry. In the fund's semi annual report, including GF and Huaxin and other large fund management companies, the funds under its jurisdiction all focus on the combination of "emerging industries" and "big consumption". At that time, the strategic emerging industries composed of upstream raw materials such as new energy, electric vehicles and rare earth, as well as the large consumer industries such as food and beverage, medicine, agriculture, household appliances and retail, had already become the popular industries on the tip of fund managers' tongue. Up to now, this situation has not changed much. Macroeconomic policy dilemma Then what is the reason for this? Many fund managers believe that it comes from the current macroeconomic environment. A fund manager of Boshi Fund believes that economic transformation will not be achieved overnight, especially at present, when the economic growth rate is declining, the growth rate will give way to the economic structural adjustment in the long run. In particular, it is expected that the use cost of production factors such as resources and labor will gradually increase in the coming years, and the renminbi will gradually appreciate; Under the premise of ensuring the stable growth of investment and exports, the social security will gradually increase, and in this process, consumer services and scientific and technological innovation will receive more policy support. Another fund believes that the year-on-year data of 3.5% of CPI has once again triggered the market's speculation on interest rate hikes. However, considering that the future price increase is expected to decline steadily and the economic operation is still uncertain, the interest rate is unlikely to rise significantly, and it will still focus on maintaining stability within the year. If the price rise continues to rise, it is also possible that the central bank will slightly increase the benchmark interest rate to improve the negative real interest rate situation and manage inflation expectations. Under this tortuous macro economy, there is really a lot of pressure to clear the investment
