When the market faces the important resistance level of 2100 points, it only takes half a trading day to complete the adjustment and make a volume breaking move, and the short-term strength of the market is fully exposed. Since there is no bad data in the short-term domestic macro economy, it is in a short-term bad data vacuum period; While the policy side and the funding side will continue to push the market higher in a relatively relaxed environment. We believe that the market will encounter the upper track of the 2250 line in the upward channel this week and then adjust, and the market focus will still focus on the supplementary growth of policy beneficiary stocks and first and second tier blue chip stocks. In the short term, we can still continue to hold long positions, but we should actively reduce our positions at the important resistance position near 2250 to prevent a sharp and rapid adjustment in the short term. It is necessary to emphasize that the current rebound in the bear market is still the main factor restricting the market from rising in the medium term, because the macroeconomic fundamentals are difficult to improve in the short term. Although the policy support has significantly improved the market expectations, it is difficult to fundamentally reverse the decline of the economy in the short term. Therefore, we adopt a cautious and optimistic attitude towards the evolution of the future market. We believe that the resistance near 2250 in the short term is difficult to break effectively, and investors should be ready to make profits at any time. After the SASAC launched the revitalization plan for 10 major industries, the revitalization plans for the adjustment of the automobile, steel, textile and equipment manufacturing industries have been launched one after another, and the revitalization plan for the electronic information industry has also been submitted to the National Development and Reform Commission for discussion and has been initially approved, and it will become the third batch of industry revitalization plans to be approved. The central government's No. 1 document launched in the New Year once again included agriculture in the list of actively supported industries. In addition to home appliances, mobile phones and countryside, automobiles and agricultural machinery are also being promoted, and investors have high expectations for the launch of the rural market. In addition, the central bank is also gradually implementing a moderately loose monetary policy to increase the support of finance for the economy. Not only is there a possibility of continued interest rate cuts in the future, but M2, the money supply growth rate, has also shown a significant rebound: the growth rate in December increased by 3 percentage points from 14.8% in November to 17.8%. The rebound of M2, the leading indicator of the market, and the abundance of market funds have provided good external conditions for the market to improve. Although the fundamental data of the overseas market continues to deteriorate, the market has received good support at the bottom in the earlier period, and the short-term stability has formed a good external atmosphere for A-shares. Therefore, in view of the impact of the basic economic and policy factors and the peripheral market, we believe that the market will continue to hit a new high in the short term, and this week is expected to challenge the 2250 point pass. In view of the increasing probability of retreating after hitting a new high, it is suggested that investors should maintain necessary prudence, reduce their positions appropriately at a high level, and avoid the risk of adjustment. From a purely technical perspective, the market has made a trading volume breaking move when facing important technical pressure points, indicating that the future market will still develop in depth. From the perspective of moving average shape, all moving average indicators are in a multi headed arrangement, and both Shanghai and Shenzhen stock indexes have stabilized the 120-day half year line, and the medium-term technical indicators of the market are turning to strength. From the perspective of wave shape, the lower rail of the current market's rising channel has climbed to the 2020 line, which will become an important support point for the market to retreat after a short-term surge. The upper track of the rising channel has reached the 2250 line. Since this area is the primary area of huge trapped chips, the market will encounter considerable selling pressure at this point, and the probability of a short-term surge and retreat is increasing. The RSI and KDJ of medium short term have climbed to a high level again, and they have not reached a new high with the stock index at the same time, which shows that the market's multi power is declining, and the technical pressure of adjustment is increasing. In view of the technical analysis, we believe that this week is expected to hit the 2250 pass, but considering the factors of the basic economic situation, we still stick to the operation strategy of reducing the position to stop the profit when it is high, and guard against the risk of over adjusting in the short term.

content: 亚奥润泽庄园300平现房别墅12月18日排号(图)新浪房产讯(实习编辑刘玉凤)亚奥现房联排别墅润泽庄园(论坛相册户型样板间地图搜索)预计2009年12月18日排号，其后的一周开盘选房，价格4万元/平方米，总价1200-1500万元/套。户型有290-360平方米的联排别墅。现房，毛坯物业费是4.5元/平方米/月。润泽庄园位于亚奥区域和国际机场之间，八百亩丛林三面环绕，发源于香山的清河从其北边绕身而过，400余席美式、英式、法式、西班牙式等多元建筑风情的大面宽双拼，联排、叠拼住宅，共同形成弥足珍贵的新城市别墅区。以上信息仅供参考，最终以开发商公布内容为准。点击查看更多打折优惠楼盘信息
en: Yao Runze Manor, a 300 square meter existing villa, ranked on December 18 (picture) Sina Real Estate News (intern Liu Yufeng) Yao Runze Manor (forum photo album model room map search), a row villa, is expected to rank on December 18, 2009. The following week, the opening was held to select houses, with the price of 40000 yuan/square meter and the total price of 12000000-15000000 yuan/set. There are 290-360 square meter row villas. The existing house is 4.5 yuan/square meter/month for bare property management fees. Runze Manor is located between Yaao area and the international airport. Eight hundred mu of jungle is surrounded on three sides, and the Qinghe River originating from Xiangshan passes around its north side. More than 400 seats of American, British, French, Spanish and other diversified architectural styles, wide double row, row and superposition houses, together form a precious new urban villa area. The above information is for reference only, and the developer's published content shall prevail. Click to view more discount real estate information

content: 国企指数半日再升526点承接外围的井喷外围全线井喷，国企好友大受鼓舞，承接上日锐不可当的势头，今早进一步以裂口的形式回补了10月8日的裂口，以8619点大幅高开，盘中虽一度受短线获利盘，及内地A股差强人意的表现影响，失去不少升幅，但短线有效消化，更利于好友展开新一轮的升势，国指中午近乎至开盘的点数持平，收至8609点，升526点，或6.51%，短短两日累积了两成的撩人升幅。反弹的势头能否延续，仍需视乎外围经济形势的进展，稍乐观的是，市场普遍预期，金融危机最坏的时刻已过去，信心有机会逐渐恢复。即月期指升540点至8535点，高水46点，一直维持领先于现货。红筹指数也大升191点，至3377点，成交额56.41亿港元。成份股续普涨，公用类股份今日补涨，浙江沪杭甬(0576-HK)涨17.59%，大唐发电(0991-HK)和中国神华(1088-HK)升17.13%及16.97%；兖煤(1171-HK)和中煤能源(1898-HK)均升愈14%。航运股未理会波罗的海指数大跌，中海发展(1138-HK)随大市升15%；中国远洋(1919-HK)和中海集运(2866-HK)升13.73%及9.73%。招行(3968-HK)续支撑市场人气，再升14%，两日累积飙升愈三成；交行(3328-HK)和中信银行(0998-HK)升8.47%及6.77%，大型银行股则表现落后，建行(0939-HK)和工行(1398-HK)仅升4.52%及4.44%；中行(3988-HK)升3.85%；保险股也稍作休整，平保(2318-HK)升0.32%，敬陪末座；中人寿(2628-HK)升4.42%。东风(0489-HK)获花旗维持买入评级，股价升11%。红筹成份股也普遍走高，中海油(0883-HK)升15.4%；中移动(0941-HK)和联通(0762-HK)升4.55%及9.16%。骏威汽车(0203-HK)突“踩油门”，急涨17.44%，表现最劲。
en: The state-owned enterprise index rose another 526 points in the morning to承接the peripheral jet, and the state-owned enterprise good friend was greatly encouraged. Following the irresistible momentum of the day, this morning, it further made up for the gap on October 8 in the form of a crack, and opened sharply at 8619 points. Although it lost a lot of room for rising一度due to the impact of short-term profit making and the poor performance of A-shares in China, it was beneficial for good friends to launch a new round of rising trend in the short term. The state-owned enterprise index was almost equal to the opening price at lunchtime, closing at 8609 points, up 526 points, or 6.51%, and accumulated a fascinating increase of 20% in just two days. Whether the momentum of rebound can continue or not still depends on the development of the peripheral economic situation. The good news is that the market generally expects that the worst time of the financial crisis has passed, and confidence has a chance to gradually recover. The spot price of the monthly futures contract rose 540 points to 8535 points, with a high water level of 46 points, always maintaining the lead over the spot. The Hong Kong Red Chip Index also rose 191 points to 3377 points, with a turnover of 5.641 billion Hong Kong dollars. The constituent stocks continued to rise generally. The public utility shares made up for the rise today. Zhejiang Shanghai Hangzhou (0576-HK) rose 17.59%, Datang Power Generation (0991-HK) and China Shenhua (1088-HK) rose 17.13% and 16.97%; Yulin Coal (1171-HK) and China Coal Energy (1898-HK) both rose more than 14%. Shipping stocks ignored the sharp decline of the Baltic Index. China Ocean Development (1138-HK) rose 15% with the market; China Ocean Shipping (1919-HK) and China Ocean Shipping (2866-HK) rose 13.73% and 9.73%. CMB (3968-HK) continued to support the market sentiment, rising another 14% in two days, accumulating a surge of more than 30%; CMB (3328-HK) and CITIC Bank (0998-HK) rose 8.47% and 6.77%, respectively. Large bank stocks fell behind. China Construction Bank (0939-HK) and ICBC (1398-HK) rose only 4.52% and 4.44%; Bank of China (3988-HK) rose 3.85%; Insurance stocks also took a short break. Ping An (2318-HK) rose 0.32%, and Jingpei was the last; China Life Insurance (2628-HK) rose 4.42%. Dongfeng (0489-HK) won Citi's maintenance of its buy rating, and its stock price rose 11%. Hong Kong Red Chip Constituent Stocks also generally rose, CNOOC (0883-HK) rose 15.4%; China Mobile (0941-HK) and China Unicom (0762-HK) rose 4.55% and 9.16%. Junwei Auto (0203-HK) suddenly "steps on the accelerator", surges 17.44%, and performs the most vigorously.

content: 国米收获本该加盟曼城之人意大利杯将实现蓝黑首演？记者彭雷报道本周一18点50，距冬季转会市场结束只剩10分钟，国际米兰技术经理布兰卡终于把帕尔马球员马里加的合同注册到了职业联盟，23岁的肯尼亚中场成为国际米兰这个冬天的最后收购。这是笔意外的收获。事实上，马里加周一的合同本该注册到曼城那里，而国际米兰本想注册的是拉齐奥的莱德斯马或巴勒莫的辛普利西奥的合同，但一个白天发生了很多事。几天来，拉齐奥一直在与国际米兰就莱德斯马的出售问题讨价还价。周一早上的消息是，洛蒂托坚持要1000万欧元或800万欧元加一些年轻球员的租借、所有权等，但国际米兰只希望用800万现金搞定。其实差距不大，但国际米兰并没有等到洛蒂托的电话，因此开始将目标锁定在巴勒莫的巴西中场辛普利西奥身上，布兰卡也开始与赞帕里尼交涉，方式为租借。但巴勒莫希望租借国际米兰的两名年轻球员，进入一队的克尔欣以及青年队的佛萨蒂。周一中午左右，辛普里利奥已经飞到米兰，似乎签约就在眼前。国际米兰此时在询问两名年轻人的意见，但他们都不想离开。于是辛普利西奥加盟国际米兰的道路关闭了，而国际米兰在也洛蒂托依然没有回音的情况下，将目标锁定在马里加身上。几乎确定去曼城投靠曼奇尼的马里加周一上午得到了“无法办下劳工证”的消息，肯尼亚第90名的FIFA排名以及英超的一些官僚程序使马里加去曼城未果。事实上，两年前，朴茨茅斯也因为相关规定没有收购到肯尼亚人，结果被帕尔马150万欧元引入。于是，帕尔马与国际米兰走到了一起，达成了转会协议：250万欧元现金外加价值250万欧元的比亚比亚尼(去年夏天就被租借到帕尔马的前锋)的一半所有权，一起交换马里加的一半所有权。辛普利西奥略带遗憾地留在巴勒莫继续效力，而国际米兰的第一选择莱德斯马则一肚子气，其经纪人迪波利托在转会失败后大吐苦水，“现在彻底完了，一切都晚了。洛蒂托是下午16点才再去联系国际米兰的，可惜人家已经有了新目标。我之前就一直提醒洛蒂托，快没时间了，他出于所谓的自尊、骄傲，就是不给莫拉蒂主席打电话。其实从周六下午国际米兰提出最后的报价后，洛蒂托就基本同意了，他就是想等到最后时刻。结果现在他发现自己犯了错，损失了1000万欧元。现在他正试图将球员卖给曼城或热那亚，但克里斯蒂安(莱德斯马)就是想去国际米兰，所以都拒绝了。继续为拉齐奥踢球？我们再看吧，现在克里斯蒂安的心情差极了，他非常失望。”国际米兰并没有过于失望，老板莫拉蒂表示，“马里加是个惊喜？是吧，他是个年轻人，是个有意思的球员，是未来的希望，我很满意。没有买到莱德斯马？这个世界如果能节省点钱也不是坏事，我只是为球员感到遗憾，但这不是世界末日。”但也有不好的声音，在位于莱科省的莫拉蒂的一处别墅外的栅栏上，有人用油漆写上了“黑人够了！”的种族标语，除了巴洛特利，更是指刚刚收购的这位非洲中场。马里加已被穆里尼奥招入对佛罗伦萨的意大利杯大名单，穆里尼奥表示，“马里加我看到了，他刚刚伤愈，但训练很不错，所以我招他入名单。我是否满意这个收购？是的，我需要一名中场，而且马里加并不是已经成型的球员，他还年轻还在成长，我喜欢这样的球员。”
person: 穆里尼奥,莱德斯马,拉齐奥,彭雷,马里加,佛萨蒂,辛普利西奥,克尔欣,布兰卡,辛普里利奥,曼奇尼,肯尼亚,巴洛特利,莫拉蒂,洛蒂托,克里斯蒂安,迪波利托,比亚比亚尼
en: Inter Milan harvests the man who should have joined Manchester City, and the Italian Cup will achieve the debut of the black and blue? Journalist Peng Lei reported that at 18:50 on Monday, only 10 minutes away from the end of the winter transfer market, Inter Milan's technical manager Blanca finally registered the contract of Parma player Mariga with the Professional League, and the 23 year old Kenyan midfielder became Inter Milan's last acquisition this winter. This is an unexpected harvest. In fact, Mariga's contract on Monday should have been registered with Manchester City, and Inter Milan wanted to register the contract of Ledesma of Lazio or Simplício of Palermo, but a lot of things happened in one day. For several days, Lazio has been bargaining with Inter Milan on the sale of Ledesma. The news on Monday morning was that Lotito insisted on 10 million euros or 8 million euros plus the lease, ownership and so on of some young players, but Inter Milan only hoped to fix it with 8 million cash. In fact, the gap is not big, but Inter Milan did not wait for Lotito's call, so it began to focus on Simplício, the Brazilian midfielder of Palermo, and Blanca also began to negotiate with Zamparini, who was on loan. But Palermo wants to lease two young players of Inter Milan, Kexin, who has entered the team, and Fosatti, who is in the youth team. Around noon on Monday, Simplício had flown to Milan, and it seemed that the signing was at hand. At this time, Inter Milan was asking for the opinions of the two young people, but they didn't want to leave. As a result, the road for Simplício to join Inter Milan was closed, and Inter Milan still didn't get any reply from Lotito, so he focused on Mariga. Mariga, who was almost sure to go to Manchester City to join Mancini, received the news that "he could not get a labor certificate" on Monday morning. The 90th rank of Kenya in FIFA and some bureaucratic procedures of the Premier League made Mariga fail to go to Manchester City. In fact, two years ago, Portsmouth also failed to acquire Kenyans due to relevant regulations, and was introduced by Parma for 1.5 million euros. As a result, Parma and Inter Milan came together and reached a transfer agreement: a cash of 2.5 million euros plus half ownership of Biabani (a forward who was loaned to Parma last summer) worth 2.5 million euros in exchange for half ownership of Mariga. Simplício stayed in Palermo to continue playing with a slight regret, while Ledesma, the first choice of Inter Milan, was full of anger. His agent Di Polito complained bitterly after the transfer failed. "Now it's completely over, everything is too late. Lotito didn't contact Inter Milan again until 16:00 p.m., unfortunately, they already had a new target. I have been reminding Lotito that there is no time left, and he did not call Moratti, the chairman, out of so-called self respect and pride. In fact, after Inter Milan made the final offer on Saturday afternoon, Lotito basically agreed, and he just wanted to wait until the last moment. Now he finds that he has made a mistake and lost 10 million euros. Now he is trying to sell the player to Manchester City or Genoa, but Christian (Ledesma) wants to go to Inter Milan, so he rejected it. Continue to play for Lazio? Let's see, now Christian is in a very bad mood, he is very disappointed." Inter Milan is not too disappointed. The boss Moratti said, "Mariga is a surprise? Yes, he is a young and interesting player, the hope of the future, I am very satisfied. I didn't buy Ledesma? If the world can save some money, it's not a bad thing. I just feel sorry for the players, but it's not the end of the world." But there are also bad voices. On the fence outside a villa of Moratti in Lecco Province, someone wrote the racial slogan of "enough black people!" In addition to Balotelli, it also refers to the African midfielder who has just been acquired. Mariga has been invited by Mourinho to the big list of the Italian Cup against Florence, and Mourinho said, "I have seen Mariga. He has just recovered from injury, but he has trained very well, so I invite him to the list. Do I like this acquisition? Yes, I need a midfielder, and Mariga is not a mature player. He is still young and growing. I like this kind of player."

content: 大四学生精通魔术每月可挣3000元工资本报讯（通讯员吴珊李翌记者翁晓波）一副普通的扑克牌，随意打乱、重洗之后，4张A竟可以被精确地挑出来。湖北大学大四学生邵明轩的魔术表演不仅让他在同学中有“小刘谦“之称，更让他每月可挣3000多元工资。邵明轩爱上魔术是在7年前的2003年，某卫视播出一档魔术节目——《魔星高照》，该节目由刘谦主持。“我开始痴迷于这种神秘的游戏。”他不仅反复练习节目里教的小魔术，还开始总结不同魔术之间相同的技巧。中考结束后，他常把自己关在屋子里，连续几个小时地琢磨这种神秘的游戏。儿子的执着魔术梦感动了父母，他们找到职业魔术师，让儿子学习专业的魔术技能。于是，从大一开始，每个周末便成为邵明轩的“魔术充电期”，他在师傅的帮助下，学习“门子”（即魔术的秘诀），学做魔术道具，从玩牌，变玫瑰，变鸽子……每逢同学间有聚会，院系有活动，“邵明轩魔术表演”便成为不可或缺的一个环节。2008年，邵明轩开始利用闲暇时间跟着师傅外出赶场演出。“我把钱拿回家，拿给爸妈，让他们知道我可以在魔术的道路上走下去。“邵明轩说。如今，仍是大四学生的他已成为师傅手下的职业魔术师，每月可以拿到2000—3000元的工资，维持自己的生活。
person: 刘谦,吴珊,邵明轩,李翌,翁晓波
en: A senior student who is proficient in magic can earn 3000 yuan a month. (Wu Shan, Li Yijun) A set of ordinary poker cards can be randomly shuffled and reshuffled, and four A's can be precisely picked out. The magic show of Xiao Mingxuan, a senior student at Hubei University, not only gives him the title of "Xiao Liuqian" among his classmates, but also earns him more than 3000 yuan a month. Xiao Mingxuan fell in love with magic in 2003, seven years ago, when a magic program - "Magic Star Shine" - hosted by Liu Qian was broadcast by a satellite TV station. "I became obsessed with this mysterious game." Not only did he practice the little magic taught in the program repeatedly, but he also began to summarize the same skills between different magic. After the middle school examination, he often locked himself in the house for several hours to think about this mysterious game. The son's persistent magic dream moved his parents, so they found a professional magician to let their son learn professional magic skills. As a result, since the beginning of his freshman year, every weekend has become Xiao Mingxuan's "magic charging period". With the help of his teacher, he learned "children" (that is, the secret of magic), learned to make magic props, played cards, changed roses, changed pigeons... Whenever there is a gathering between students and departments, "Xiao Mingxuan Magic Show" becomes an essential part. In 2008, Xiao Mingxuan began to follow his teacher to perform outside when he was free. "I took the money home and gave it to my parents to let them know that I can go down the road of magic." Xiao Mingxuan said. Today, he is still a senior student and has become a professional magician under his teacher. He can earn 2000-3000 yuan a month to support his life.

content: 里昂下调资源股目标价新浪财经讯10月6日消息，里昂下调资源股目标价，称行业首选神华<01088.HK>，紧随为中煤能源<01898.HK>。里昂表示，中资矿业股股价本年下跌逾半，正提供低价收集良机，料短期宏观不利因素仍将持续，防守力强的股份将受支持，首选神华<01088.HK>，紧随为中煤能源<01898.HK>。该行预料三个月内宏观环境将明朗化，投资者亦可留意江西铜<00358.HK>及首钢资源<00639.HK>，并建议投资者继续避免高成本或高负债比率企业，如中铝<02600.HK>及恒鼎<01393.HK>。该行将2012及2013年金属价格预测平均下调12%及6%，原材料价格预测亦降4%-8%，中资焦煤煤企2011-2012年盈测下调5%-23%，目标价相应调低13%-52%。该行将中煤目标价自12.5元下调至10.2元；南戈壁<01878.HK>目标价自100元降至85元；江西铜目标价自27元降至19元，评级均由“跑赢大市”升至“买入”。兖州煤<01171.HK>自“跑输大市”升级至“跑赢大市”，目标价自28元降至19.2元；俄铝<00486.HK>自“买入”降级至“跑赢大市”，目标价自11.3元降至8.2元。首钢目标价自5.6元降至4元，维持“买入”评级；神华目标价则自43.6元降至38元，维持“跑赢大市”；恒鼎目标价自4.8元降至2.3元，维持“跑输大市”；中铝<02600.HK>目标价自5元降至3.8元，维持“沽售”评级。
en: On October 6, Sina Finance reported that Lyon downgraded the target price of resource shares, saying that the industry's first choice was Shenhua < 01088. HK >, followed by China Coal Energy < 01898. HK >. Lyon said that the share prices of Chinese mining stocks had fallen by more than half this year, providing an opportunity to collect at a low price. It is expected that the short-term macro negative factors will continue, and the shares with strong defense will be supported. The first choice is Shenhua < 01088. HK >, followed by China Coal Energy < 01898. HK >. The bank expects that the macro environment will be clarified in three months, and investors can also pay attention to Jiangxi Copper < 00358. HK > and Shougang Resources < 00639. HK >, and it is suggested that investors should continue to avoid high cost or high debt ratio enterprises, such as Chinalco < 02600. HK > and Hengding < 01393. HK >. The bank cut its average metal price forecast for 2012 and 2013 by 12% and 6%, respectively, and its raw material price forecast also fell by 4% - 8%. The profit forecast for Chinese coking coal enterprises in 2011-2012 was cut by 5% - 23%, and the target price was相应cut by 13% - 52%. The bank cut the target price of China Coal from 12.5 yuan to 10.2 yuan; The target price of South Gobi < 01878. HK > was reduced from 100 yuan to 85 yuan; Jiangxi Copper's target price fell from 27 yuan to 19 yuan, and the rating rose from "outperforming the market" to "buy". Yanzhou Coal < 01171. HK > was upgraded from "losing the market" to "outperforming the market", and the target price fell from 28 yuan to 19.2 yuan; Rusal < 00486. HK > was downgraded from "buy" to "outperform the market", and the target price fell from 11.3 yuan to 8.2 yuan. The target price of Shougang fell from 5.6 yuan to 4 yuan, maintaining the "buy" rating; The target price of Shenhua fell from 43.6 yuan to 38 yuan, maintaining "outperforming the market"; The target price of Hengding fell from 4.8 yuan to 2.3 yuan, maintaining "losing the market"; The target price of Chinalco < 02600. HK > fell from 5 yuan to 3.8 yuan, maintaining the "sell" rating.

content: 诺基亚S60侧滑新机Surge6790开箱图赏最近的诺基亚上市了包括N97在内的多款侧滑盖手机，这样的势头并没有减缓，近日，诺基亚正式与北美电信运营商AT&T达成合作协议，诺基亚将向后者提供基于S60平台的侧滑盖新机——诺基亚Surge6790。诺基亚Surge6790包装以白色和橙色为主，包装盒印有明显的AT&T标志，打开箱子非对称的诺基亚Surge就展现在面前了。诺基亚Surge6790机身大小为96x54x15毫米，外观给人一种厚实的感觉。Surge6790采用颇受争议的非对称设计，在屏幕左下角有一小块弧形突出的部位用来安放三个常用的按钮，分别是AT&T的快捷键、菜单键和邮件按钮。诺基亚Surge正是这样的设计使得手机闭合的时候键盘部位和屏幕并不对齐，加上厚重的机身，个人觉得外形不能称得上美观。诺基亚Surge装有2.4英寸QVGA(240×320像素)分辨率1600万色TFT屏幕，内置的200万像素摄像头，4倍数码变焦，支持四频段GSM/GPRS/EDGE以及双频的UMTS与HSDPA3.6Mbps网络数据传输。诺基亚Surge内置GPS芯片、配有蓝牙2.0，支持FM收音调频功能。诺基亚Surge6790采用S60V3版平台，可扩展性较强。据悉，该款手机将配备1500毫安大容量电池，将可以为手机带来更长的导航时间。诺基亚Surge6790除了拥有传统手机所具备的短信、图片、视频等功能外，还可以轻松的通过手机更新博客或是交友聊天，通过该手机，消费者还可以接入AT&T自有的一些增值服务。可享受服务：AT&T公司导航：AT&T公司提供导航，监测交通，并提醒用户交通意外和路况信息。AT&T的移动音乐：客户可以收听和下载自己喜爱的音乐，收听广播和了解天气状况等等。AT&T的视频分享：允许用户共享视频直播，收看移动电视。AT&T移动银行：手机支付和在线购买。
en: Nokia's new S60 slide phone Surge6790 has recently launched a number of slide cover phones including N97. The trend has not slowed down. Recently, Nokia has officially reached a cooperation agreement with AT&T, a North American telecoms operator. Nokia will provide the latter with the new S60 platform based slide cover phone - Nokia Surge6790. Nokia Surge6790 is mainly packaged in white and orange, and the box is printed with an obvious AT&T logo. The asymmetric Nokia Surge is presented in front of you when you open the box. Nokia Surge6790 is 96x54x15mm in size, and it gives people a thick feeling in appearance. Surge6790 adopts the controversial asymmetric design, with a small arc protruding part in the lower left corner of the screen to place three commonly used buttons, namely AT&T's shortcut key, menu key and mail button. The design of Nokia Surge makes the keyboard part and the screen are not aligned when the mobile phone is closed, coupled with the thick fuselage, I don't think the appearance can be called beautiful. Nokia Surge is equipped with a 2.4 inch QVGA (240×320 pixels) TFT screen with 16 million colors, a built-in 2 million pixel camera, 4x digital zoom, and supports four-band GSM/GPRS/EDGE and dual-band UMTS and HSDPA3.6Mbps network data transmission. Nokia Surge has built-in GPS chip, Bluetooth 2.0, and supports FM radio tuning function. Nokia Surge6790 adopts S60V3 platform, which is highly expandable. It is reported that the mobile phone will be equipped with a large capacity battery of 1500 mAh, which will bring longer navigation time to the mobile phone. In addition to the functions of short messages, pictures, video and so on which are possessed by traditional mobile phones, Nokia Surge6790 can also easily update blogs or make friends and chat through mobile phones. Through the mobile phone, consumers can also access some value-added services of AT&T. Enjoyable service: AT&T Navigation: AT&T provides navigation, monitors traffic, and alerts users to traffic accidents and road conditions. AT&T's mobile music: customers can listen to and download their favorite music, listen to radio and learn about the weather. AT&T's video sharing: allows users to share live video and watch mobile TV. AT&T Mobile Banking: mobile payment and online shopping.

content: 瑞士再保险：香港与内地对保险业态度大相径庭舒时瑞士再保险公司昨天(6月15日)披露了《瑞士再保险2009年亚太区风险取向调查》，结果显示，香港与内地的消费者对保险的取向态度各异。其中香港人更偏爱冒险，而内地消费者则更为保守。瑞士再保险的这份报告针对的是亚太区年龄介乎20至40岁的成年人。其风险取向的结果显示，即使在全球性经济低迷的情况下，大部分香港中小企仍愿意积极借贷以争取业务增长。而且，香港消费者是亚太区内最不愿使用专业财务策划服务的一群；不过，面对甲型H1N1流感的威胁，很多香港受访者表示会检讨他们的保单。为了便于比较不同市场的数据及追踪长远变化，调查结果综合为两个指数，即瑞士再保险亚太区消费者风险取向指数(CAFRI)和中小企风险取向指数(BAFRI)。两个指数越高，均代表越偏好风险。香港人不喜欢用财务策划从消费者风险态度来看，香港消费者的风险取向在亚太区排名第二。调查发现，20至40岁的香港人CAFRI值高达47.8，在受访的八个亚太区市场中风险取向排名第二高，仅次于澳大利亚人。瑞士再保险经济研究及咨询部亚太区主管黄硕辉认为，香港人排名较高的原因在于他们对就业和健康的风险取向较高，在亚太区中排名第二。至于财务和生活方式，香港人较抗拒冒险，在亚太区排在中间位置。此外，调查结果确认，20至30岁的香港男士较愿意冒险。从报告来看，内地的受访者则比较保守，CAFRI值为43.4，排名第六。这部分显示，内地在就业和健康方面仍然处于劣势，并导致消费者在这方面行动较为保守。从财务规划来看，尽管76%的香港受访者非常关注如何保障未来的财务状况，只有54%的受访者表示有具体落实的计划。“香港消费者愿意使用专业财务策划服务的程度在亚太区是最低的，只有17%的受访者认为有必要使用这些服务。”黄硕辉说，“(保险)业界需要付出更多努力，以提高公众对尽早策划财务重要性的意识，并使他们明白合资格的专业理财顾问能助其作出更完善的财务规划。专业理财顾问亦需维持并提升专业水平，以提高公众对他们的信心。金融产品的销售应以顾客的需求为本。”事实上，从雷曼迷你债券和近期曝光的摩根士丹利精明债券事件都表明，香港人对自己的投资决策过于自信。相比之下，有超过20%的内地消费者认可专业财务策划的作用。内地企业家更愿承担风险或许最值得关注的是，这次调查显示，缺乏融资手段的内地企业更愿意承担融资风险。在八个市场的企业调查中，香港中小企对商业风险取向相对较低，BAFRI值只有32.1，在亚太区八个市场中排名第六，仅高于马来西亚和印度。而内地受访者的BAFRI值为35.4，显示出他们更愿意承担商业风险，在亚太区中小企风险取向中名列第二。黄硕辉表示，逾半数以上的内地中小企受访者视目前的金融危机为发展业务的机遇，乐观程度高于香港地区和印度的受访者。相比之下，68%的香港受访者希望透过内部增长而非收购来实现业务扩张，而70%的受访者不愿拓展新产品或业务。不过，异常多的香港(71%)和内地(74%)的中小企受访者表示，如果能有助业务迅速增长，他们非常愿意增加借贷。黄硕辉认为，即使在目前严峻的金融危机压力下，面对业务发展变量增加，作为香港经济增长动力的中小企仍然没有完全放弃业务发展的机会或意愿，这在某程度上反映了政府政策上的支持，能够获取信贷将鼓励中小企提高其财务杠杆水平。黄硕辉没有解释为什么内地企业家的风险承受程度如此之高，但有一点可以肯定，这些企业家并没有像香港中小企业那些获得足够的信贷支持，他们的愿望或许更多反映出内地企业家的融资困难。
en: Swiss Reinsurance: Hong Kong and the mainland have quite different attitudes towards the insurance industry. Swiss Reinsurance yesterday (June 15) disclosed the "Swiss Reinsurance 2009 Asia Pacific Risk Orientation Survey", which shows that consumers in Hong Kong and the mainland have different attitudes towards insurance. Hong Kong people prefer to take risks, while consumers in the mainland are more conservative. The report of Swiss Reinsurance targets adults aged 20 to 40 in the Asia Pacific region. Its risk orientation results show that even in the case of global economic depression, most small and medium enterprises in Hong Kong are willing to actively borrow to strive for business growth. Moreover, Hong Kong consumers are the group least willing to use professional financial planning services in the Asia Pacific region; However, in the face of the threat of influenza A (H1N1), many Hong Kong respondents said they would review their policies. In order to facilitate the comparison of data in different markets and track long-term changes, the survey results are combined into two indicators, namely Swiss Re Asia Pacific Consumer Risk Orientation Index (CAFRI) and SME Risk Orientation Index (BAFRI). The higher the two indexes, the more risk they prefer. Hong Kong people don't like to use financial planning. From the perspective of consumer risk attitude, Hong Kong consumers' risk orientation ranks second in the Asia Pacific region. The survey found that the CAFRI value of Hong Kong people aged 20 to 40 was as high as 47.8, ranking second highest in terms of risk orientation among the eight Asia Pacific markets interviewed, second only to Australians. Huang Shuohui, head of the Department of Economic Research and Consulting of Swiss Re in the Asia Pacific region, believes that the reason why Hong Kong people rank higher is that their employment and health risks rank second in the Asia Pacific region. As for finance and lifestyle, Hong Kong people are less willing to take risks, ranking in the middle of the Asia Pacific region. In addition, the survey results confirm that Hong Kong men aged 20 to 30 are more willing to take risks. According to the report, the respondents in the mainland are more conservative, with a CAFRI value of 43.4, ranking sixth. This shows that the mainland is still at a disadvantage in employment and health, which leads consumers to be more conservative in this aspect. In terms of financial planning, although 76% of the surveyed people in Hong Kong are very concerned about how to protect their future financial status, only 54% of the respondents said that they have specific implementation plans. "Hong Kong consumers are the least willing to use professional financial planning services in the Asia Pacific region, and only 17% of the respondents think it is necessary to use these services." Huang Shuohui said, "(Insurance) industry needs to make more efforts to enhance the public's awareness of the importance of financial planning as early as possible, and make them understand that qualified professional financial planners can help them make better financial planning. Professional financial planners also need to maintain and improve their professional level to enhance the public's confidence in them. The sale of financial products should be based on the needs of customers." In fact, both Lehman's minibonds and the recently publicized Morgan Stanley's smart bond incident show that Hong Kong people are too confident in their investment decisions. By contrast, more than 20% of consumers in the mainland recognize the role of professional financial planning. Chinese entrepreneurs are more willing to take risks. Perhaps the most noteworthy thing is that this survey shows that the land enterprises, which lack financing means, are more willing to take financing risks. In the enterprise survey of eight markets, the small and medium enterprises in Hong Kong have a relatively low risk orientation of 32.1, ranking sixth in the eight markets in the Asia Pacific region, just higher than Malaysia and India. The BAFRI value of the respondents in the mainland was 35.4, which shows that they are more willing to take business risks, ranking second in the SME risk orientation in the Asia Pacific region. Huang Shuohui said that more than half of the SMEs in China saw the current financial crisis as an opportunity for business development, more optimistic than the respondents in Hong Kong and India. By contrast, 68% of the respondents in Hong Kong hope to achieve business expansion through internal growth rather than acquisitions, and 70% of the respondents are not willing to expand new products or businesses. However, an abnormally large number of small and medium enterprise respondents in Hong Kong (71%) and the mainland (74%) said that they were very willing to increase borrowing if it could help their business grow rapidly. Huang Shuohui believes that even under the current severe pressure of the financial crisis, the small and medium enterprises in Hong Kong, as the growth driver of the Hong Kong economy, have not completely abandoned the opportunity or willingness to develop their business. To a certain extent, this reflects the support of government policies. The access to credit will encourage small and medium enterprises to increase their financial leverage. Huang Shuohui did not explain why the risk tolerance of entrepreneurs in China was so high, but one thing is for sure, these entrepreneurs did not get enough credit support like Hong Kong small and medium enterprises, and their wishes may reflect more financing difficulties of entrepreneurs in China.

content: 图文：印度央行宣布加息25个基点据印度《经济时报》16日报道，印度中央银行当天宣布将基准利率和反向回购利率均上调25个基点，分别达到7.5和6.5个百分点，以遏制印度经济当前面临的通胀压力。这是印度中央银行16个月以来第十次加息。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: Graphics: The Central Bank of India announced that it would raise the benchmark interest rate and the reverse repo rate by 25 basis points on the 16th, according to the Economic Times of India. The benchmark interest rate and the reverse repo rate reached 7.5% and 6.5% respectively in order to curb the inflation pressure facing the current Indian economy. This is the tenth interest rate hike by the Central Bank of India in 16 months. Welcome to make comments I want to comment

content: 单核双核一个价十款超高性价比手机推荐文/隋洪亮手机作为一种日常的通讯工具，已经渐渐融入了人们的生活中，人们都希望能拥有一款适合自己的手机。就选购手机来说，有人图的是个实惠，有人则是追求高端的享受。例如像目前HTCsensation、SamsungGALAXYSII等多数高端手机的价格都在三四千元以上，此类机型就比较适合经济充足，追求高端享受的人群，但对于那些想要体验高端而预算又比较吃紧的朋友而言，等待这些机型降价确实是个漫长的过程。不过好在市场中有那么一批被挤下旗舰宝座的机型，虽然沦为中高端手机，但其性能却丝毫不差，而且价格也比较合理。就像LGP990手机，该机带有双核处理器，而售价却和单核手机HTCDesireS(参数报价图片论坛软件)相差无几。那么今天小编就为大家带来几款性价比较高的手机，希望会对近期购机的朋友提供一些帮助。HTCDesireHD(参数报价图片论坛软件)　　Android旗舰机在2010年下半年扎堆上市，其中HTC公司所推出的DesireHD凭其优越的性能轻松的在消费者心中占据了重要的位置，该机内置Android智能操作系统，同时搭配海量的内存组合，拥有1GHz主频，即使是运行繁重的任务也能够轻松应付。HTCDesireHD采用了直板触控设计，经典的机身造型颇具时尚气息。其带有一块4.3英寸分辨率为480×800像素的电容触控屏幕，显示效果细腻柔和。该机三围是123×68×11.8mm，重量为164g，拿在手中质感十足。HTCDesireHD搭载了AndroidOSv2.2的智能操作系统，具备HTCSense用户界面。同时内置一枚1024MHz的CPU，即使在操作多重任务时运行速度依然流畅十足。拍照方面，该机带有一颗800万像素摄像头，并带有LED闪光灯，为您外出游玩聚会带来不少乐趣。HTCDesireHD整体性能非常强大，不但带有强悍的硬件配置，在外形方面其采用铝合金一体成型设计，也为该机增分不少，频频走低的价格也使该机性价比直线上升，喜欢的朋友可以关注一下。
en: Mononuclear dual-core is a price for ten mobile phones with ultra-high cost performance. Hong Liang Mobile phone, as a daily communication tool, has gradually integrated into people's life, and people all hope to have a mobile phone suitable for them. When it comes to buying mobile phones, some people want a bargain, while others追求high-end enjoyment. For example, the prices of most high-end mobile phones such as HTCsensation and Samsung GALAXYSII are more than 3400 yuan. This kind of model is suitable for people who have sufficient economy and pursue high-end enjoyment. However, for those friends who want to experience high-end but have a tight budget, waiting for these models to reduce prices is really a long process. Fortunately, there is a batch of models in the market that have been squeezed off the flagship throne. Although they have become mid-high-end mobile phones, their performance is no less than that, and the price is also reasonable. Just like LGP990 mobile phone, it has a dual-core processor, but the price is almost the same as HTCDesireS (parameter quotation picture forum software). Today, I'd like to bring you several mobile phones with high cost performance, hoping to provide some help to friends who are going to buy a computer in the near future. HTCDesireHD (parameter quotation picture forum software) In the second half of 2010, Android flagship computers were launched in a crowded market. The DesireHD launched by HTC has easily occupied an important place in the hearts of consumers with its excellent performance. The built-in Android intelligent operating system and the huge memory combination have a main frequency of 1GHz, which can easily handle even heavy tasks. HTCDesireHD adopts a straight touch design. The classic body shape is very fashionable. It has a 4.3 inch capacitive touch screen with a resolution of 480 × 800 pixels, which has a delicate and soft display effect. The three surrounding areas of the machine are 123 × 68 × 11.8mm, the weight is 164g, and it feels full in your hand. HTCDesireHD is equipped with AndroidOSv2.2 intelligent operating system, with HTC Sense user interface. At the same time, it is equipped with a 1024MHz CPU, which still runs smoothly even when operating multiple tasks. In terms of photography, the machine has an 8 million pixel camera with LED flash, which brings a lot of fun to your outings and parties. HTCDesireHD has a very powerful overall performance. It not only has a powerful hardware configuration, but also adopts an integrated aluminum alloy design in terms of shape, which also adds a lot to the machine. The frequently declining price also makes the cost performance of the machine rise straight, and friends who like it can pay attention to it.

content: 2011年成考15日举行海口部分考点位置有变记者13日从省教育厅获悉，2011年全国成人高等学校招生考试将于10月15日一16日进行，届时我省将有2.5万名考生参加考试。考生可在考试前三天到报名点领取准考证。考生要提前到场接受安检今年的全国成人高考共有3个层次，即高中起点升专科、高中起点升本科和专科起点升本科。其中，专升本分为8个科类，即中文中医类、艺术类、理工类、经管类、法学类、教育学类和医学类；专升本的统考科目为政治、英语和专业基础课3科。高中升本科的考试科目为4科，即语文、数学、(文、理)、外语、史地或理化；高中升专科的考试科目为4科，即语文、数学(文、理)、外语和公民道德与法律基础。省教育厅要求各市县考点严抓考纪。考点和考场实施封闭管理。考试期间，任何与考试无关的人员不得进入考点和考场。考生入场时监考员必须严格进行“二查三对照”，即检查身份证、准考证，核对考生本人相貌与身份证、准考证、座位表上的照片是否一致，严防替考现象发生。为防范和封堵考试期间“夹带”及“利用无线通讯工具作弊”等行为，今年各市、县都要采取考生入场进行安检，由监考员使用“手柄式金属探测器”对考生入场进行清身检查。省教育厅要求，各市、县必须对考生入场安检进行培训和演练，考试期间，各考点须在教学楼入口处和考场门口设置检查岗，严格按照操作流程对考生进行入场清身检查，严防考生将违禁物品带入考场。要认真做好监考员监考科次轮换工作。轮换工作由省派巡视员随机安排，并于开考前60分钟宣布，监考员不得以任何理由拒绝执行。“校安工程”使个别考点位置有新变化海口考区共设8个考点380个考场。海口市考试中心提醒，由于部分学校实施校安工程，与往年相比较个别考点的位置有新变化，提醒考生在考前一定要到考点进行确认踩点。8个考点分别为：1、海南侨中高中部(海秀大道59号)，专升本的经管类和法学类在此考试；2、海口实验中学高中部(白龙北路1号原海口旅职校旧址)，高升专文史类在此考试；3、海口实验中学初中部(海甸五西路)，高升专理工类在此考试；4、海口四中高中部(美苑路美兰公安分局旁)，专升本的中文中医类、教育学类、农学类和医学类在此考试；5、海口二中(海甸一东路18号)，高升本的文史类、理工类和艺术文类在此考试；6、海口九中(海秀东路26号)，高升专的理工类和体育类在此考试；7、海口十中(和平南路12号)，专升本的艺术类和理工类在此考试；8、府城中学(府城中山南路10号)，高升专的文史类和艺术文类在此考试。海口今年共有11162人参加考试，其中专升本4456人，高升本1516人，高升专5145人。
en: On October 15, 2011, the location of some test centers in Haikou will change. The reporter learned from the Provincial Department of Education on the 13th that the national adult colleges and universities招生exam will be held on October 15-16, 2011, and then 25000 candidates in our province will take the exam. Candidates can get their admission cards at the registration point three days before the exam. Candidates should arrive early for security check. This year's national adult college entrance examination has three levels, namely, high school starting to upgrade to special, high school starting to upgrade to undergraduate and special starting to upgrade to undergraduate. Among them, the undergraduate program is divided into eight categories, namely, Chinese medicine, art, science and engineering, economics and management, law, pedagogy and medicine; the unified examination subjects for the undergraduate program are three subjects: politics, English and professional foundation courses. The examination subjects for high school promotion to undergraduate are four subjects, namely, Chinese, mathematics, (liberal arts, science) and foreign language, history, geography or physics and chemistry; The examination subjects for high school students to upgrade to college are four subjects, namely, Chinese, mathematics (liberal arts, science), foreign language and civic morality and legal basis. The Provincial Department of Education requires that the examination纪律of the examination centers in the cities and counties should be strictly grasped. Examination centers and examination rooms shall be under closed management. During the examination, no personnel irrelevant to the examination shall enter the examination center and the examination room. When candidates enter the examination center, invigilators must strictly conduct "two checks and three comparisons", that is, checking their ID card and admission ticket, and checking whether their appearance is consistent with the photos on their ID card, admission ticket and seat table to prevent the phenomenon of substitute examination. In order to prevent and block the behavior of "carrying" and "cheating by using wireless communication tools" during the examination, this year, candidates in all cities and counties must have a security check when they enter the examination. Invigilators must use "handle type metal detectors" to clear the body of candidates when they enter the examination. The Provincial Department of Education requires that the municipalities and counties must train and drill candidates to enter the examination center for security check. During the examination, the examination centers must set up check posts at the entrance of the teaching building and the entrance of the examination room, and strictly follow the operation process to examine the candidates to prevent them from bringing prohibited items into the examination room. We should do a good job in the rotation of invigilators. The rotation is randomly arranged by the provincial dispatchers and announced 60 minutes before the examination. The invigilators shall not refuse to execute for any reason. "School Safety Project" has made new changes in the location of individual test centers. There are 8 test centers and 380 examination rooms in Haikou Examination Area. Haikou Examination Center reminds that due to the implementation of School Safety Project in some schools, the location of individual test centers has changed compared with previous years, and candidates must go to the test center for confirmation before the examination. There are eight test centers: 1. The high school department of Hainan Qiaozhong (No. 59, Haixiu Avenue) is the examination for the management and law of the undergraduate program; 2. The high school department of Haikou Experimental Middle School (No. 1, North Bai Long Road, the former site of Haikou Tourism Vocational School) is the examination for the literature and history of the high school special program; 3. The junior high school department of Haikou Experimental Middle School (Haidian West Road) is the examination for the science and engineering of the high school special program; 4. The high school department of Haikou No. 4 Middle School (Meiyuan Road, Meilan Public Security Branch) is the examination for the Chinese medicine, pedagogy, agriculture and medicine of the undergraduate program; 5. Haikou No. 2 Middle School (No. 18, Haidean East Road) is the examination for the literature and history, science and engineering and art literature of the undergraduate program; 6. Haikou No. 9 Middle School (No. 26, Haixiu East Road) is the examination for the science and engineering and sports of the high school special program; 7. Haikou No. 10 Middle School (No. 12, South Heping Road) is the examination for the art and science and engineering of the undergraduate program; 8. Fucheng Middle School (No. 10, South Zhongshan Road, Fucheng) is the examination for the literature and history and art literature of the high school special program. A total of 11162 people took the examination in Haikou this year, including 4456 for the undergraduate program, 1516 for the undergraduate program and 5145 for the special program.

content: 高考评论：考生大幅“跳水”是个好现象今日关键词考生锐减这种现象是好事，它使“千军万马争过独木桥”现象得到缓解的同时，向全国高校发布了一个明确信息：今后，依靠垄断生源这一优势过优哉游哉的好日子，越来越不可靠了。□本报评论员岳建国今年，河南高考报名总人数85.5万人，比去年95.2万人锐减近10万人，是有史以来“跳水”幅度最大的一次。对此，省招办新闻发言人陈大琪表示，这是因为今年新课改后高考第一年，复读生比往年少了，其次是职业教育分流和人口出生的自然增减，这意味着河南考生上大学将更容易。另据业内人士分析，部分高校将因生源逐渐枯竭面临严峻生存挑战。高考报名人数出现有史以来最大幅度的“跳水”，其原因并不止上述几个，只要回顾一下我们周围的高中生的去向，就会发现还应加上“高中生直接就业和出国留学者增多”这两个因素，虽然我们没有权威的统计资料作支持。总的来说，这种现象是好事，除了考生上大学更容易外，它还使曾令我们震惊、心焦和无奈的“千军万马争过独木桥”的现象得到明显缓解，同时向全国各高校发布了一个明确的信息：今后高校必须越来越依赖教学质量、就业率和成才率而生存，依靠垄断生源这一优势耍大牌、优哉游哉的好日子，越来越不可靠了。1999年以来的高招形势是，高校盲目扩招，人口出生却自然增减，导致录取比例大幅提高，许多省份的录取率高达80%。与这个“招生大跃进”相对应的是，大批从农村进入高校的大学生“毕业即失业”，他们既不想辜负家乡父老“跳出农门”的期望，又因学无所长和没有“好”父母而无法找到满意的工作，于是便成了“蜗居”在大中城市城乡接合部的庞大“蚁族”。这种现象产生了很大的效应——导致越来越多的高中生决定另辟蹊径。比如家庭稍微好一些的高中生干脆出国留学，接受更好的教育；有的高中生尤其是农村的，干脆跟随亲朋好友到城市打工，自食其力；有的走进职业学校，将来做一个体面的技术工人。于是，全国范围的“高考报名人数逐年锐减甚至‘跳水’”的现象出现了。但这并不是坏事，是开放的环境和市场经济为考生们提供了更多的选择。想想看，普通家庭节衣缩食攒钱把孩子送到外国留学，让祖国的接班人眼界更开阔、能力更强，这不是再好不过的事情吗？过去我们一直说发达国家都很重视职业教育，美国的大学录取率才达到70%左右，我们不也是朝着这条路走吗？目前，全国各地的民营企业几乎都面临着招工难现象，高中生就业不是可以解燃眉之急吗？但是，这一现象肯定会让许多高校感到不安甚至产生压力。许多年来，他们有的大建新校区，有的大扩老校区，以便增加专业，增加班级。可他们没有想到的是，自己的招生规模刚刚扩大，突然生源就减少了，看着空荡荡的偌大校区，心里能不着急吗？但从如何提高高校教学质量这方面看，这是好事，这能让他们感觉到，无论是出国的还是到民企就业的，都是嫌他们教学质量差，都是对他们的失望和抛弃，都在逼他们猛醒、改革，向一流高校看齐，促使高校之间出现有效的竞争，最终导致中国高校教学质量的整体提高。
en: Today's key word is that the sharp reduction of examinees is a good phenomenon, which alleviates the phenomenon of "thousands of troops competing for a single wooden bridge", and sends a clear message to colleges and universities across the country: in the future, it is less and less reliable to rely on the advantage of monopolizing students. □ Y岳建国, commentator of this newspaper, this year, the total number of students in Henan Province who registered for the高考was 855000, nearly 100000 less than 952000 last year, the largest "diving" in history. Chen Daqi, spokesman of the provincial recruitment office, said that this was because this year was the first year after the new curriculum reform, and the number of repeaters was less than in previous years. The second was the natural increase and decrease of vocational education and population birth, which meant that it would be easier for students in Henan Province to go to college. According to industry insiders, some universities will face severe survival challenges due to the gradual depletion of students. The "diving" of the largest number of students registered for the高考in history is not just the above reasons. If we look back at the destination of the high school students around us, we will find that we should add two factors: "high school students can get more direct employment and go abroad for further study", although we do not have authoritative statistical data to support them. In general, this phenomenon is a good thing. In addition to the fact that it is easier for students to go to college, it has also significantly alleviated the phenomenon of "thousands of troops competing for a single wooden bridge" that shocked, worried and helpless us, and at the same time, it has sent a clear message to colleges and universities across the country: in the future, universities must rely more and more on teaching quality, employment rate and success rate to survive. The good days of relying on the advantage of monopolizing students to play big cards and have a good time are less and less reliable. Since 1999, the situation of high recruitment has been that colleges and universities blindly expand enrollment, while the population is naturally increasing and decreasing, resulting in a substantial increase in the admission ratio, and the admission rate in many provinces is as high as 80%. Corresponding to this "big leap forward in recruitment", a large number of college students who have entered universities from rural areas "graduate and become unemployed". They do not want to live up to the expectation of their hometown's parents to "jump out of the farmer's door", and they cannot find a satisfactory job because they have no special skills and no "good" parents, so they become a huge "ant tribe" " living in the junction of urban and rural areas of large and medium cities. This phenomenon has a great effect - it leads to more and more high school students to decide to open up new ways. For example, high school students with slightly better families simply go abroad for further study to receive better education; Some high school students, especially those in rural areas, simply follow their relatives and friends to work in cities and rely on their own abilities; Some people go to vocational schools to be a decent technical worker in the future. As a result, the phenomenon of "year on year sharp reduction or even 'diving'" of college entrance examination applicants across the country has emerged. But this is not a bad thing. It is the open environment and the market economy that provide more choices for candidates. Think about it. It's great that ordinary families save money to send their children to study abroad in order to make the successors of the motherland have a broader vision and stronger abilities. In the past, we always said that developed countries attach great importance to vocational education, and the university admission rate in the United States has reached about 70%. Are we not going in this way? At present, private enterprises almost all over the country are facing the problem of recruitment. Is it not possible for high school students to find jobs? However, this phenomenon will definitely make many colleges and universities feel uneasy or under pressure. For many years, some of them have built new campuses and some have expanded old campuses in order to increase majors and classes. But they didn't expect that their招生scale had just expanded, and suddenly the students decreased. Looking at the huge empty campus, can they not be in a hurry? But from the perspective of how to improve the teaching quality of colleges and universities, this is a good thing, which can make them feel that those who go abroad or go to private enterprises for employment blame them for their poor teaching quality, and they are disappointed and abandoned, forcing them to wake up and reform, align with first-class universities, and promote effective competition between universities, ultimately leading to the overall improvement of teaching quality of Chinese universities.

content: QDII队伍壮大上半年有望达到40只证券时报记者余子君今年合格境内机构投资者(QDII)发行提速，截至昨日，已经成立了10只QDII，算上正在发行和即将发行的QDII，上半年QDII有望冲击40只大关。天相投顾数据显示，截至昨日，今年已经成立的QDII达到37只，华安大中华升级基金也于4月18日开始募集，按一个月的募集期限计算，该基金将于近期结束募集。除此之外，日前获批的广发标普全球农业指数基金也将于近期发行。而富国基金于去年11月15日上报了全球顶级消费品股票型基金，按照6个月的审批流程计算，如果该基金获批后立即投入发行，上半年，QDII基金只数将达到40只。事实上，从证监会公布的基金募集申请核准进度公示表来看，除了广发标普全球农业指数基金和富国全球顶级消费品股票型基金之外，还有7只QDII已经递交了申请材料，正在等待获批。2009年底QDII审批重启之后，基金公司发行热情高涨，今年发行更加火爆。截至昨日，今年以来已经成立了10只QDII产品，还有1只正在发行，1只即将发行，8只QDII已经递交募集申请，等待获批。而去年全年共计成立了18只QDII，其中上半年成立7只，下半年成立11只。从基金公司角度来看，目前已经拥有QDII产品的基金公司达到27家，占比近半。其中，博时、南方、易方达和嘉实等大型基金公司已经拥有2只QDII产品。如果算上即将发行和已经递交了募集申请材料的基金公司，那么嘉实和南方2家基金公司即将迎来旗下第3只QDII产品，诺安、广发、汇添富、富国、国泰4家基金公司也将拥有2只QDII产品，而景顺长城和国海富兰克林基金公司也将迎来旗下首只QDII产品。从产品特点来看，与首批出海的QDII相比，近两年，基金公司更注重产品创新。如专注黄金投资的诺安黄金以及易方达黄金基金、专注全球债券市场的富国全球债券基金、专注指数化投资的国泰纳斯达克100指数基金、嘉实恒生H股、大成标普500、长信标普100、广发标普全球农业指数基金等。除此之外，诺安基金今年还上报了国内首只油气能源基金。基金业内人士指出，2008年下半年QDII审批一度被暂停，2009年底审批放开后，基金公司为了完善产品线，发行QDII产品热情大增，目前大型基金公司基本拥有2只QDII产品，少数仅拥有1只QDII产品的大型基金公司也在加紧筹备第2只产品。上海一家基金公司人士表示，虽然QDII发行如火如荼，但是，由于QDII业务运作成本比较高，目前不少基金公司都是亏本运作，对于中小型基金公司来说，如果不是为了完善产品线，发行动力并不足。已经拥有2只QDII产品基金公司一览基金公司名称一季度末含联接基金资产管理规模(亿元)公司成立时间博时基金1135.771998－7－13工银瑞信554.632005－6－21海富通基金416.762003－4－18华宝兴业基金423.402003－3－7嘉实基金1506.301999－3－25南方基金1171.361998－3－6上投摩根基金556.262004－5－12易方达基金1589.132001－4－17银华基金786.442001－5－28招商基金390.402002－12－27数据来源：天相投顾余子君／制表
en: The QDII team is expected to reach 40 securities in the first half of the year. Yu Zijun, a journalist from Securities Times, reported that the issuance of Qualified Domestic Institutional Investors (QDII) has accelerated this year. As of yesterday, 10 QDIIs had been established, and the number of QDIIs is expected to hit the 40 mark in the first half of the year, including those being issued and to be issued. Tian Xiang's investment advisory data shows that as of yesterday, the QDIIs established this year have reached 37. Hua An Dat Zhonghua Upgrade Fund also began to raise funds on April 18. According to the one-month fundraising deadline, the fundraising of the Fund will end soon. In addition, the recently approved GF S&P Global Agriculture Index Fund will also be issued soon. Fuguo Fund also reported the global top consumer goods stock fund to the top on November 15 last year. According to the six-month approval process, if the fund is immediately put into circulation after approval, the number of QDII funds will reach 40 in the first half of the year. In fact, according to the fund raising application approval progress display form published by the CSRC, in addition to the GF S&P Global Agricultural Index Fund and Fuguo Global Top Consumer Goods Stock Fund, 7 QDIIs have submitted application materials and are waiting for approval. Since the restart of QDII approval at the end of 2009, fund companies have been enthusiastic about issuance, and this year's issuance has been more popular. As of yesterday, 10 QDII products have been established this year, one is being issued, one is going to be issued, and 8 QDIIs have submitted fundraising applications and are waiting for approval. Last year, a total of 18 QDII were established, including 7 in the first half of the year and 11 in the second half of the year. From the perspective of fund companies, there are 27 fund companies that currently have QDII products, accounting for nearly half. Among them, large fund companies such as Boshi, NSSF, E Fund and Jiaxin have two QDII products. If we include the fund companies that are going to be issued and have submitted application materials, Jiaxin and NSSF will welcome their third QDII product under their jurisdiction, and four fund companies, including Nuoan, GF, Huitianfu, Fuguo, and Guotai, will also have two QDII products, and Jingzhao Changcheng and Guohai Franklin Fund will also welcome their first QDII product under their jurisdiction. From the perspective of product characteristics, compared with the first batch of QDIIs going to sea, fund companies have paid more attention to product innovation in recent two years. Such as Nuoan Gold, which focuses on gold investment, Yifangda Gold Fund, Fuguo Global Bond Fund, which focuses on the global bond market, Guotai Nasdaq 100 Index Fund, which focuses on index investment, Jiazhong H-shares, Dacheng S & P 500, Changxin S & P 100, GF S & P Global Agricultural Index Fund, etc. In addition, Nuoan Fund also reported the first oil and gas energy fund in China this year. Fund industry insiders pointed out that the approval of QDII was once suspended in the second half of 2008. After the approval was released at the end of 2009, fund companies were very enthusiastic about issuing QDII products in order to improve the product line. At present, large fund companies basically have two QDII products, and some large fund companies with only one QDII product are also stepping up the preparation of the second product. A person from a fund company in Shanghai said that although QDII issuance was in full swing, since the operation cost of QDII business was relatively high, at present, many fund companies were operating at a loss. For small and medium-sized fund companies, if they did not want to improve the product line, they did not have enough motivation to issue.

content: 功能超全六款大品牌中高端手机挨个看时至今日，手机已经成为人们工作和生活中不可缺少的一部分，各大手机厂商也纷纷推出高性能的旗舰产品来不断提升自己的品牌价值。当然在手机性能不断提升的同时手机的价格也一路飙升，高性能的手机对每个人都拥有十足的诱惑力，但是它的价格往往让人望而却步。对于消费者来说，在买任何东西时都希望所买的产品能物超所值，当然这对于购买手机的消费者来说也不例外。物美价廉的东西总是备受大家欢迎，而最能体现性价比的机型往往都处于2000元左右的价格区域，以下便是小编为各位朋友介绍的六款热门手机。诺基亚N79(参数报价图片论坛)无论是在性能以及造型方面，N79都有很好的遗传到了诺基亚之前优秀手机的因素在其中，特别是在速度反应方面，N79采用了更高频率的中央处理器，完全解决了这方面的影响。目前该机的价格为1990元，很是热销。外观上，诺基亚N79采用直板造型，简洁却不失时尚，机身三围和重量为110×49×15mm/97g，还算轻巧。手机配备了一块2.4英寸QVGA分辨率1600万色TFT显示屏，显示效果非常细腻。诺基亚N79同样拥有目前主流的500万像素的卡尔.蔡司镜头，也配备了双LED补光灯以及镜头保护盖。影像表现能力与N85不分上下。系统配置上，诺基亚N79搭载了Symbian9.3操作系统及S60V3.2平台，支持GSM/GPRS/EDGE/WCDMA/HSDPA网络和WLAN无线局域网功能的诺基亚N79，内建GPS移动导航、位置查询及照片地理位置标记等功能。对于N85所拥有的N-Gage游戏平台、FM发射功能、3.5mm耳机接口、TV-out接口、立体声蓝牙、以及microUSB连接功能，机身内置50MB的存储空间，还将能支持最大8GB容量的microSD存储卡扩展。诺基亚N79最大的卖点是强化了对N-Gage游戏功能的支持，预装了包括Asphalt3、HookedOn、Worldsseriesofpoker等在内的15款游戏，其中还会有一款游戏完全免费使用，绝对给你一种全新的体验。参考价：2450元上市时间：2008年09月主屏幕：1600万色TFT显示屏，2.4英寸外形尺寸：110×49×15mm，80cm3照相功能：500万像素CMOS传感器系统：Symbian9.3，S60第三版FP2平台已有_COUNT_位用户评论点击查看评论推荐想买观望
en: As of today, when you look at six major brand name high-end mobile phones one by one, mobile phones have become an indispensable part of people's work and life. Major mobile phone manufacturers have also launched high performance flagship products to continuously improve their brand value. Of course, while the performance of mobile phones is constantly improving, the price of mobile phones is also soaring. High performance mobile phones have great temptation to everyone, but their prices often make people stop. For consumers, when buying anything, they hope that the products they buy are worth more than their price, which is no exception for consumers who buy mobile phones. Things that are both beautiful and cheap are always welcome to everyone, and the models that best reflect the cost performance are often in the price range of around 2000 yuan. The following are six popular mobile phones introduced by the editor for everyone. Nokia N79 (parameter quotation picture forum) In terms of performance and shape, N79 has a good inheritance of the factors of Nokia's previous excellent mobile phones, especially in terms of speed response, N79 adopts a higher frequency central processor, which completely solves the impact in this regard. At present, the price of the machine is 1990 yuan, which is quite popular. In appearance, Nokia N79 adopts a straight plate shape, simple but not lost fashion. The three dimensions and weight of the fuselage are 110 × 49 × 15mm/97g, which is still light. The mobile phone is equipped with a 2.4 inch QVGA resolution 16 million color TFT display, which has a very delicate display effect. Nokia N79 also has a 5 million pixel Carl. Zeiss lens, as well as a dual LED fill light and a lens protective cover. The image performance is equal to that of N85. In terms of system configuration, Nokia N79 is equipped with Symbian 9.3 operating system and S60V3.2 platform. Nokia N79 supports GSM/GPRS/EDGE/WCDMA/HSDPA network and WLAN wireless local area network function, built-in GPS navigation, location query, photo geolocation and other functions. The Nokia N79 has 50MB of storage space built into the body, and it can also support the expansion of microSD memory cards with a maximum capacity of 8GB. The biggest selling point of Nokia N79 is to strengthen the support for N-Gage game function, and preinstall 15 games, including Asphalt3, HookedOn, Worldsseriesofpoker, etc. One of them will be completely free to use, which will definitely give you a new experience. Reference price: 2450 yuan Release date: September 2008 Main screen: 16 million color TFT display, 2.4 inch Geometric dimension: 110 × 49 × 15mm, 80cm3 Photography function: 5 million pixel CMOS sensor system: Symbian 9.3, S60 Third Edition FP2 platform

content: 学大教育IPO首日盘中报12.85美元涨35.26%新浪科技讯北京时间11月3日凌晨消息，学大教育集团(以下简称学大教育)通过IPO(首次公开募股)方式在纽交所挂牌交易，首日开盘价为14.30美元，比发行价高出4.8美元，上涨50.5%。截止北京时间1:57，学大教育报12.85美元，上涨35.26%。学大教育今日登陆纽交所，上市代码“XUE”，IPO出售1343万份ADS，募集资金1.276亿美元，承销商为高盛(亚洲)GoldmanSachs(Asia)L.L.C、RobertWBaird&Co以及WilliamBlair&Co，承销商在30天内有201万股ADS的超额认购权。学大教育成立于2001年，目前在中国44个城市设有157个教学中心，2010年上半年共计辅导了5.4万名中小学生，较去年上升了78%。近期亦有多家中国教育培训机构赴美上市，8月5日，安博教育集团在纽交所上市；10月8日，环球雅思在纳斯达克上市，此后，学大教育的最主要竞争对手学而思也提交上市申请，学而思已于10月20日登陆纽交所。
en: Xueda Education's IPO opened at $14.30 on the first day, 4.8 dollars higher than the offering price, up 50.5%. Sina Technology News reported at 1:57 Beijing time on the morning of November 3, Beijing time. Xueda Education reported $12.85, up 35.26%. Xueda Education landed on the New York Stock Exchange today, with the listing code "XUE", 13.43 million ADSs sold in the IPO, and 127.6 million dollars raised. The underwriters were Goldman Sachs (Asia) GoldmanSachs (Asia) L.L.C., RobertWBaird&Co and WilliamBlair&Co, and the underwriters had the right to over subscribe 2.01 million ADSs within 30 days. Xueda Education was founded in 2001. At present, it has set up 157 teaching centers in 44 cities in China. In the first half of 2010, it tutored 54000 primary and secondary school students, up 78% from last year. In recent days, a number of Chinese education and training institutions have also listed in the United States. On August 5, Ambow Education Group was listed on the New York Stock Exchange; On October 8, Global雅思was listed on NASDAQ. Since then, Xueda Education's main competitor, Xueersi, has also submitted an application for listing. Xueersi has landed on the New York Stock Exchange on October 20.

content: 粤21万人周末赶自考14门课程禁用计算器本报讯　(见习记者/张胜波　通讯员/廖翊华)省教育考试院介绍,全国统一高等教育自学考试将于10月25日、26日举行。本次自学考试共开考128个专业(本科专业66个,专科专业62个),开考课程396门,共有218930名考生报考本次考试。考生参加考试时务必带齐2B铅笔、黑色字迹的钢笔或签字笔、橡皮擦等文具。本次考试使用计算机辅助评卷课程将由原来的5门增加至14门,参加这些考试的考生需要使用铅笔填涂答案。更多信息请访问：新浪自考频道自考论坛自考博客圈特别说明：由于各方面情况的不断调整与变化，新浪网所提供的所有考试信息仅供参考，敬请考生以权威部门公布的正式信息为准。
en: More than 210000 people in Guangdong hurried to take 14 courses in the self examination at the weekend, and calculators were prohibited. (Peng Yuhua, correspondent/ Zhang Shengbo) The provincial Institute of Education Examination introduced that the national unified higher education self examination will be held on October 25 and 26. A total of 128 majors (66 undergraduate majors and 62 undergraduate majors) were opened for this self examination, with 396 subjects opened, and a total of 218930 candidates applied for this examination. Candidates must bring 2B pencils, pens or signing pens with black handwriting, erasers and other stationery when taking the examination. The computer assisted scoring course used in this examination will be increased from 5 to 14. Candidates taking these examinations need to use pencils to fill in the answers. For more information, please visit: Sina self examination channel self examination forum self examination blog circle Special Note: Due to the continuous adjustment and change of all aspects, all examination information provided by Sina is for reference only. Please take the officially announced information of the authority as the standard.

content: 新大洲：被严重忽视的新能源电池概念方正证券赵玉涛继新能源电池板块中一线品种杉杉股份、西藏矿业、科力远等连续飙升、富贵逼人之后，今日该板块中的二三线品种中金瑞科技、佛塑股份等品种强势涨停，再度将市场人气充分激活！受其刺激，中信国安、中国宝安、福田汽车等相关新能源电池产业链受益品种亦以长阳报收。回顾近期盘面，新能源电池板块中诸如西藏矿业、杉杉股份、中信国安、中国宝安等品种无不演绎新能源电池的造福神话。可以说，一时间新能源电池风起云涌、黑马奔腾！独无有偶，此前针对奥巴马胜选的期望，让美国能源巨头FirstSolarInc.(FSLR)股价大涨。显然，一股新能源电池热正在全球股市掀起，其背后推动力正是美国新总统奥巴马推出未来十年1500亿美元新能源计划。因此，可以说新能源电池的市场前景超出想象，相关上市公司无疑将面临重大的投资机遇。此外，新能源电池板块经过一轮狂飙，整体估值得以全线大幅提升，给新能源电池相关品种带来极大的投资机会，尤其是一些未被市场所发掘的二三线品种，像今天强势涨停的金瑞科技和佛塑股份，就是最典型的例证！因此，我们认为，一直未有表现的同类品种新大洲(000571)值得投资者重点关注！资料显示，新大洲(000571)参股的大连新源动力是中国燃料电池领域规模最大的企业，在国内率先实现了燃料电池实验室科研成果向现实生产力的转化，由新源动力等单位提供动力系统的帕萨特领驭氢燃料电池轿车已经作为公务用车在奥运中心区进行了示范运营；同时，新大洲(000571)旗下的上海新大洲电动车有限公司专业进行电动自行车的研发、制造和销售。那么，在新能源电池板块中一线品种全线大幅飙升、二三线品种黑马奔腾的大背景下，新能源动力领域题材非常正宗和丰富的新大洲(000571)无疑被市场严重忽视，相信该股必将复制前述同类品种所连续涨停的神话！奥巴马发力新能源突破口在燃料电池事实上，自参选之日起，奥巴马就显示出对新能源产业的极大关注。产业政策中对新能源做出了极大倾斜，未来十年将投入1500亿美元资助替代能源的研究，并为相关公司提供税务优惠；发展清洁能源，大幅减少对中东和委内瑞拉石油的依赖；计划到2012年，美国发电量的10%将来自可再生能源等。其中，奥巴马对新能源汽车的青睐尤为引人注目，目前盛传将采用混合动力凯迪拉克作为白宫座驾。奥巴马在竞选时承诺，计划以7000美元的抵税额度鼓励消费者购买节能型汽车；动用40亿美元的联邦政府资金支持汽车公司推进新能源车的销售，到2015年使美国的混合动力汽车销量达到100万辆。显然，奥巴马未来能源计划中的核心焦点，就集中在新能源动力汽车。资料显示，燃料电池是举世公认的高效、便捷及有益于环境的绿色能源装置。它利用氢和氧生成水的过程来产生电力的一种装置。所依据的原理，是中学课程中“水的电解”反应的逆反应。因为是将燃料通过化学反应释放出能量变为电能输出，所以被称为“燃料电池”。目前广泛研发的燃料电池有质子交换膜燃料电池(PEMFC)、直接甲醇燃料电池(DMFC)、碱性燃料电池(AFC)等。其中，质子交换膜燃料电池(PEMFC)因其不经过燃烧直接以电化学反应连续地把燃料和氧化剂中的化学能直接转换成电能，具有能量转换效率高(一般都在40%～50%，而内燃机仅为18%～24%)、无污染、启动快、电池寿命长、比功率、比能量高等优点，成为应用最广的一类燃料电池。该技术已被美国、加拿大等发达国家认定为21世纪首选的清洁能源系统。
en: New Continent: The seriously ignored new energy battery concept Fang Zheng Securities Zhao Yutao continued to soar after the first line of new energy battery sector, such as Fuxi Mining, Shanxin Shares, and Keliyuan, and then the second and third line varieties in the sector, such as Zhongjinrui Technology and Fosu Shares, were once again fully activated by a strong market! Stimulated by it, CITIC Guoan, China Baoan, Foton Motor and other related new energy battery industry chain benefited varieties also reported on Changyang. Looking back on the recent trading day, varieties such as Tibet Mining, Shanxin Shares, CITIC Guoan, China Baoan and so on in the new energy battery sector have all demonstrated the myth of benefiting new energy batteries. It can be said that for a time, new energy batteries are surging and dark horses are galloping! In a unique way, the previous expectation of Obama's victory let the American energy giant FirstSolarInc. (FSLR) soar. Obviously, a new energy battery heat wave is sweeping the global stock market, and the driving force behind it is the new US President Obama's launch of a $150 billion new energy plan for the next decade. Therefore, it can be said that the market prospects of new energy batteries exceed imagination, and the relevant listed companies will undoubtedly face significant investment opportunities. In addition, after a round of crazy spree of new energy battery板块, the overall valuation has been significantly improved, which has brought great investment opportunities to new energy battery related varieties, especially some second and third tier varieties that have not been discovered by the market, such as Jinrui Technology and Fosu Shares, which were strongly rising today, are the most typical examples! Therefore, we believe that the new continent (000571) of the same kind of varieties that has not been performing deserves the attention of investors! Data shows that Dalian New Source Power, a subsidiary of Xindazhou (000571), is the largest enterprise in the field of fuel cells in China. It has realized the transformation of laboratory scientific research achievements of fuel cells into realistic productivity for the first time in China. The Passat Lingyu hydrogen fuel cell car, which is provided with power systems by New Source Power and other units, has been demonstrated and operated as a public service vehicle in the Olympic Center; At the same time, Shanghai Xindazhou Electric Vehicle Co., Ltd., a subsidiary of Xindazhou (000571), specializes in the research, development, manufacturing and sales of electric bicycles. Then, in the context of the whole line of first-line varieties in the new energy battery sector surging and the second and third line varieties of dark horses galloping, the new and very authentic and rich Continent (000571) in the field of new energy power is undoubtedly seriously ignored by the market. It is believed that the stock will surely replicate the myth of continuous price limit of the aforementioned similar varieties! Obama focuses on the breakthrough of new energy in fuel cells. In fact, since the election, Obama has shown great concern for the new energy industry. The industrial policy makes a great tilt to new energy. In the future decade, 150 billion dollars will be invested to sponsor the research of alternative energy and provide tax benefits to relevant companies; Develop clean energy and drastically reduce dependence on Middle Eastern and Venezuelan oil; By 2012, 10% of the power generation in the United States will come from renewable energy. In particular, Obama's favor for new energy vehicles is particularly eye-catching. At present, it is widely rumored that a hybrid Cadillac will be used as the White House limousine. Obama promised during his campaign that he would encourage consumers to buy energy-saving cars with a tax credit of $7000; Mobilize 4 billion dollars of federal government funds to support automobile companies in promoting the sales of new energy vehicles, so that the sales of hybrid electric vehicles in the United States will reach 1 million by 2015. Obviously, the core focus of Obama's future energy plan is focused on new energy power vehicles. Data show that fuel cells are widely recognized as efficient, convenient and beneficial green energy devices. It is a device that uses hydrogen and oxygen to generate water to generate electricity. The principle is the reverse reaction of the "electrolysis of water" reaction in the middle school curriculum. Because it is called "fuel cell" because it converts the energy released by fuel through chemical reaction into electric energy output. At present, the widely developed fuel cells include proton exchange membrane fuel cell (PEMFC), direct methanol fuel cell (DMFC), alkaline fuel cell (AFC), etc. Among them, proton exchange membrane fuel cells (PEMFC) are the most widely used fuel cells because they directly convert the chemical energy of fuel and oxidant into electric energy through electrochemical reactions without combustion, with high energy conversion efficiency (generally more than 40% ~ 50%, while internal combustion engines are only 18% ~ 24%), no pollution, fast start-up, long battery life, high specific power, and high specific energy. This technology has been recognized as the first choice of clean energy system in the 21st century by developed countries such as the United States and Canada.

content: 经验交流：司法考试是一个斗智斗勇的过程我是第一年参加司法考试，今年考了434分。我觉得司法考试是一个斗智斗勇的过程，现在我把我的一些体会分三个阶段与大家一起分享！我是从三月中旬开始准备的，因为是第一次考，心理没有底，所以准备比较早。那时也是摸着石头过河，脑海里对考试的内容都没有一个系统的体系，有点觉得胡子眉毛一把抓，也许是以前的功底还不错，有时觉得有些意想不到的效果，就这么样混混沌沌的一个半月过去了。这时朋友建议我去报个班，可能对我有帮助，我报了一个周末和晚上上课的班，可以自由安排时间，哪天学累了可以自主决定休息，就这么样我跟着老师的进度学习。在老师的引导下，学习效率大大提高，有些不懂的地方也迎刃而解，学得如鱼得水！今年的卷三得了122分。第二阶段是7月到8月了，这段时间离考试不到三个月了，马上就要开奥运会了，前一段时间去找自习室，折腾了几个星期，挪来挪去，学习计划一度被打乱，最远的还去过海淀图书馆，可离住的地方实在太远，花在坐车的时间来回也得4个小时，太不划算了，大热天，心里更加烦躁，想来想去，只有回家看书了，在老家呆在自己的房间里，虽然安静，可没有人与我交流，我只有每天发短信或者上网与司考同路人交流，这么样就可以知道他们的进度，看看自己有没有落后，哪个知识点掌握的不好，每天只规定自己看六个小时，但必须要有效率，剩下的时间奖励自己看奥运比赛，基本比较重要的比赛我都没有落过。第三阶段就到就9月了，回到北京我就开始把从03到07真题认认真真地做了一遍，把做错的地方找找相关的知识再看看。剩下的时间把论述稍微看了一下，我是觉得第四卷没有必要下工夫，因为如果把前三卷的基本功打好了，第四卷基本上没有太大的问题，只要做到卷面干净，字迹清楚就可以了！俗话说：台下十年工，台上一分钟。临场发挥也很重要，这个时候比的是心理素质了。我还是比较紧张的，卷二刚刚发下来，就听见老师说有人卷一没有用A4铅笔填准考证号，我猛然发现自己就没有填，心理老想着会不会卷一作废，所以考卷二时心里有杂念，怪自己的粗心大意，结果卷二考得有点失常，刑诉错得有点离谱，考完后结果是虚惊一场，监考老师说就是没有填准考证号他们也帮填了，晚上一直懊悔卷二考砸了，但想也没有用了，只有在下面的考试中挽回局面，提起精神把第二天的要考的好好看看一下，结果第二天很快就调整过来了，写得很顺手！今年在司法考试上算是圆满结局了，但往后的法律路还很漫长，得不断学习！不断进取！路漫漫其修远兮，吾将上下而求索！更多信息请访问：新浪司法频道司法考试论坛司法考试博客圈特别说明：由于各方面情况的不断调整与变化，新浪网所提供的所有考试信息仅供参考，敬请考生以权威部门公布的正式信息为准。
en: Experience sharing: The judicial examination is a process of wisdom and courage. I am a first year student who took the judicial examination. This year, I scored 434. I think the judicial examination is a process of wisdom and courage. Now I would like to share some of my experiences with you in three stages! I started preparing in mid March, because it was the first time for me to take the exam, I had no bottom in my heart, so I prepared early. At that time, I was also crossing the river by feeling the stones. There was no systematic system in my mind about the content of the examination. I felt like a beard and eyebrows. I grabbed them. Maybe the previous foundation was good. Sometimes I felt some unexpected effects. In this way, a chaotic one and a half months passed. At this time, my friends suggested me to go to a class, which may be helpful to me. I applied for a class on weekends and evenings, which can be arranged freely. I can decide to have a rest on the day when I am tired of learning. In this way, I followed the teacher's progress. Under the guidance of the teacher, the learning efficiency has been greatly improved, and some problems that I don't understand have been solved, and I have learned like fish in water! The third volume scored 122 this year. The second stage is from July to August. There is less than three months before the examination. The Olympic Games will open soon. In the past few weeks, I went to look for a self study room, moved around, and the study plan was once disrupted. The farthest one went to Haidian Library, but it was too far away from the living place. It was not worth four hours to spend on driving back and forth. In the hot summer, I was more annoyed. After thinking about it, I had to go home and read. Staying in my own room in my hometown was quiet, but no one could communicate with me. I had to send text messages or surf the Internet every day to communicate with people on the same road as the judicial examination, so that I could know their progress, see if I was left behind, and which knowledge point was not well mastered. I only allowed myself to read for six hours a day, but it must be efficient. The remaining time was rewarded to watch the Olympic Games. I basically didn't miss the most important events. The third stage is in September. When I returned to Beijing, I began to carefully do the true questions from 03 to 07, and then look for the relevant knowledge where I made mistakes. The remaining time was spent on skimming the discussion. I think there is no need to make efforts in the fourth volume, because if the basic skills of the first three volumes are well prepared, there is no big problem in the fourth volume. Just make sure that the test paper is clean and the handwriting is clear! As the saying goes: ten years of work off the stage, one minute on the stage. It is also important to play on the spot. At this time, it is a matter of psychological quality. I was still very nervous. When the second volume was just issued, I heard the teacher say that someone didn't use A4 pencil to fill in the examination number. I suddenly found that I didn't fill it in. I always thought that the first volume might be invalid, so when I took the second volume, I had杂thoughts in my mind and blamed myself for being careless. As a result, the second volume was a bit abnormal, and the criminal complaint was a bit outrageous. After the examination, it was a false alarm. The invigilator said that they also filled in the examination number without filling it in. I regretted that the second volume failed until the evening, but it was useless. I had to make up in the following examinations. I had to pick up my spirits and have a good look at what I will take the next day. As a result, the next day was quickly adjusted, and it was very easy to write! This year's judicial examination was considered a happy ending, but the future legal road is still long, and we must keep learning! Keep making progress! The road is long and far, I will try my best! For more information, please visit: Sina Legal Channel Judicial Examination Forum Judicial Examination Blog Circle Special Note: Due to the continuous adjustment and change of various circumstances, all examination information provided by Sina is for reference only. Please take the officially announced formal information as the candidate.

content: 电信系广电系内部融合加速电信系广电系内部融合加速统一监管或成三网融合制度基础■本报记者沈加军2月6日，中国电信的“家庭信息第四屏——魔屏mTouch”在上海国美徐汇店上柜露面，“魔屏mTouch”采用八英寸显示屏，集合了手机、电视以及电脑三屏优势，。也是在上周，据中国有线电视网络有限公司透露，有线电视网省内整合已彻底完成的省份达到13个，同时有10个省份正在推进此项工作。单独看两方面各自的融合速度，不可谓不大，但是，整个中国的三网融合进程缺只能用缓慢来标注。难题仍然是原来的难题，行业老专家舒华英一语道破，实现三网融合首先要探讨统一监管问题。统一监管机构是三网融合的制度基础从过来的三网融合经验可看出，设立融合管制机构，对网络实行统一监管都是三网融合实现突破的基础，典型国家包括英国、美国、加拿大、日本等。2003年英国依据《2003年通信法》设立了融合性的监管机构OFCOM?英国通信管理局，彻底打破了原来信息领域中存在的各种壁垒，使技术和业务得到进一步融合。而美国监管机构FCC?联邦通信委员会本来就是一个融合性监管机构，其监管范围包括公共电信、专用电信、广播电视等。日本在总务省下面设立了信息通信政策局和综合通信基础局，同时监管电信和广播业。但在国内，由于面临利益和政策上的障碍，迟迟无法取得突破。舒华英教授表示，由于广电与电信分属于两个不同的部门管理，因此三网融合中的部门利益协调依然是一个大难题，广电和电信之间壁垒森严的难题未解决的直接后果就是已经争论了十几年的三网融合问题将被无限期搁浅。因此，要真正实现三网融合，信息服务业、通信、广播以及借助网络的新兴媒体等需要更高层面的监管机构来行使监管职权。应该建立国家信息监管委员会，利用这一监管平台进行单纯监管，实现政企分离。相互准入实现市场化运营是前提在三网融合的实践上来看，目前多数国家直接允许相互进入。英国立法明确规定准许传统广电和电信双向进入，同时对电信业采取竞争开放的监管办法，对广电业的准入相对严格一些。德国和印度两国的电信企业在提供融合性服务上已经不存在法律障碍。三网融合的发展要充分发挥市场机制的作用，市场机制是推进三网融合的前提。从国内实际来看，三网融合确实改变了广电与电信相互隔离的外部关系，但双方各自独立的内在特性依然存在。但是三网融合发展趋势不可逆转，尤其在当前金融危机的背景下，三网融合需求显得更为迫切。虽然广电一直在推进改革，但是不时也传出广电“既做运动员，又做裁判员”等不符合市场经济规律的事件，黄石广电叫停IPTV、莆田广电强推数字电视等可见一斑。广电方面应加快市场化改革的步伐，广电本身实现“制播分离”，即内容和传输分离是比较可行的办法，三网融合也就水到渠成了。三网融合超越一切利益之争目前全球经济的复苏主要得益于各国经济刺激方案的短期作用。国家的一系列内政措施，都与拉动内需、创造新经济增长点有关。发放3G牌照、加速三网融合，都是按这方向走棋，是超越集团利益之上的决策。站在这个立场上，就不难理解国家所订下的紧迫的融合时间表。三网融合对广播电视网来说极其艰难，广播电视网目前是全国四级(省地市县)各自独立为政格局，网络统一首先必须体制改革，从行政事业部门分离出来，建立企业管理模式。亦即脱离广电局成立独立的网络集团，组成“第四网络运营商”，参与网络产业竞争。对电信业来说，当前内容瓶颈仍然是制约通信业进一步发展的关键，尤其是没有“播放”和“播控”的权力。而在制作内容上，电信业其实也是门外汉。对于电信业而言，最贴切的一句话就是“强化全IP化网络改造，完善全业务运营能力，整合个人、家庭、企业和垂直领域的业务提供能力。”但是这些都不足以阻挡中国三网融合的必然趋势，现在看来，市场化机制的形成并非一日之功，国家意志层面的统一监管需要首先成行。
en: The internal integration of the telecommunications and radio and television system accelerated the internal integration of the telecommunications and radio and television system to unify supervision or became the basis of the three network integration system. □ Shen Jiajun, a reporter of this newspaper, On February 6, China Telecom's "Magic Screen mTouch - the fourth screen of family information" was launched in Xuhui Store, Shanghai Guomei. "Magic Screen mTouch" adopts an 8-inch display screen, which combines the advantages of three screens of mobile phones, televisions and computers. It was also last week that China Cable Television Network Co., Ltd. revealed that the provincial integration of cable television networks had been completely completed in 13 provinces, and 10 provinces were promoting this work. Looking at the integration speed of the two aspects separately, it is not big, but the whole process of three network integration in China can only be described as slow. The problem is still the original problem. Shu Huaying, an industry expert, broke the deadlock. The first thing to achieve the integration of the three networks is to discuss the unified supervision problem. The unified supervision institution is the institutional basis of the three network integration. From the experience of the past three network integration, it can be seen that the establishment of the integrated regulatory institution and the unified supervision of the network are the basis for the breakthrough of the three network integration, including the United Kingdom, the United States, Canada, Japan and other typical countries. In 2003, the United Kingdom set up the integrated regulatory body OFCOM? British Communications Authority , which completely broke down all kinds of barriers that existed in the original information field, further integrating technology and business. The US regulatory authority FCC? Federal Communications Committee  is originally an integrated regulatory body, including public telecommunications, dedicated telecommunications, radio and television, etc. Japan has set up the Information and Communication Policy Bureau and the Comprehensive Communication Infrastructure Bureau under the Ministry of Land, Labor and Transport to supervise telecommunications and broadcasting industries at the same time. However, in China, it has been difficult to make a breakthrough due to the obstacles of interests and policies. Professor Shu Huaying said that since radio and television and telecommunications are managed by two different departments, the coordination of departmental interests in the integration of the three networks is still a big problem. The direct consequence of the unsolved problem of the strict barriers between radio and television and telecommunications is that the decades long debate on the integration of the three networks will be indefinitely stranded. Therefore, in order to truly realize the integration of the three networks, the information service industry, communication, broadcasting and the emerging media through the network need higher level regulatory authorities to exercise regulatory powers. The National Information Supervision Committee should be established to carry out simple supervision and achieve the separation of government and enterprises through this supervision platform. Mutual access to achieve market operation is the prerequisite. In terms of the practice of three network integration, most countries currently allow mutual access directly. The British legislation clearly stipulates that the traditional radio and television and telecommunications are allowed to enter each other, and at the same time, the telecommunications industry adopts a competitive open regulatory approach, and the access to the radio and television industry is relatively strict. German and Indian telecom enterprises have no legal obstacles in providing integrated services. The development of three network integration should give full play to the role of market mechanism, which is the prerequisite for promoting the integration of three networks. From the perspective of domestic reality, the integration of three networks has indeed changed the external relationship of isolation between radio and television and telecommunications, but the independent internal characteristics of both sides still exist. However, the trend of three network integration is irreversible, especially in the context of the current financial crisis, the demand for the integration of three networks is more urgent. Although radio and television have been promoting reform, there are also events that do not conform to the law of the market economy, such as "being both athletes and referees", which can be seen from the fact that Huangshi Radio and Television stopped IPTV and Putian Radio and Television promoted digital television. The radio and television industry should accelerate the pace of market-oriented reform. It is feasible for the radio and television industry itself to achieve "separation of production and broadcasting", that is, separation of content and transmission, and the integration of three networks will come naturally. The current global economic recovery is mainly due to the short-term effect of the economic stimulus package of various countries. A series of domestic policy measures of the country are related to stimulating domestic demand and creating new economic growth points. Issuing 3G licenses and accelerating the integration of three networks are all chess moves in this direction, which exceed the decision of group interests.
