In addition, Hannibal is also the only Belgian player in the current professional billiards industry, and his world ranking reached the highest of 53 in the 03/04 season. After two seasons away from the professional tour, Hannibal returned to the professional tour in the 09/10 season with the fourth place in the Pontins Series in the 08/09 season. In the 09/10 season, Hannibal not only passed the qualification round of the China Open, but also scored a single shot of 138 points in the qualification round of the World Championships, updating his personal career's highest single shot score. In fact, this is not the first time that Hannibal has come to China. In the 2000 China Open, Hannibal lost in the first round with a score of 3-5 to Hendley. This time, Hannibal did not come alone. As a father, he not only brought Daisy, his "child's mother", to Beijing, but also brought the baby with a pacifier. Daisy, who has been a mother, is still well preserved. The black low chest dress shows her hot figure, I don't know how many reporters' cameras were killed. It seems that this time, Hannibal planned to take his family for a tour of the capital in early spring. I just hope that Beijing next week will not have a sandstorm like the one in the past few days. It's a good weather for spring outing with a breeze and warm sun! However, Hannibal, sitting in the player's seat, did not seem to attract much attention from the media. Everyone's attention was still focused on the superstars such as Higgins, Ding Junhui and Hendry, which also made Hannibal not the only player who received such a "cold encounter". Although Maiklaud is the best snooker player among the black people today, Watana and Suooper are Thailand's top figures in the past and now respectively, their actions are much freer. Maiklaud is free to come and go in the hotel, listening to music and wandering around, but no one asks him to sign autographs among fans. Watana and Suooper went out to look for food with the accompaniment of a Thai fan. (TOP147. Xi Liang)

content: 专辑《15》引两极评论方大同：我不要那么暴力早前在台湾宣传新碟时，方大同被颁发“小巨肺”。在新碟中，他作出不少新尝试。●时隔3年，方大同推出全新创作专辑《15》，包办全碟作曲与编曲，还写了超过一般的歌词。如此投入与卖力，却引发争议。●本报鉴定：音乐人真不易做，不变，会被指责“固步自封”；一旦改变不大，则容易被说“浅尝辄止”。其实对于大部分乐迷来说，能被几首歌打动，让耳朵获得数十分钟享受，就够了吧。南都讯记者朱燕霞实习生黄丹婷戴黑框眼镜、穿格子衬衫，唱着骚灵和R&B的音乐，这是一贯的方大同。不温不火，这是外界给予他个人及其音乐风格最多的评价。但这一次，新专辑《15》似乎有了变化：评论两极化，一贯的喜爱与直接的抗拒——有人喜见他的新突破，他融合蓝调、Rock、骚灵、R&B多种音乐类型的尝试；也有人大失所望，对他的唱腔演绎、浅白歌词、主题概念等都一一诟病。“这张专辑无论在音乐上及我想与大家分享的故事或思考的内容，对我是一项挑战，同时对听众亦会是个挑战”，方大同在专辑中这么写，对于听众可能出现的反应，他似乎早已预见。本月初，方大同带着个人第五张创作大碟《15》到内地多个城市巡回宣传，前天下午，他与南都记者在广州见面，聊起《15》引发的很不客气的争议之声，最后还聊起了他“烂gag王”。方大同说：“这张专辑的制作是最好的，新的变化、新的标准是更好的，但我做的是黑人音乐。”争议1新花样浅尝辄止回应：这就是我想做的摇滚新专辑共收录了11首歌，由方大同、EdwardChan、CharlesLee负责监制，方大同包办了全碟的作曲与编曲，还填写了超过一半的歌词。专辑大体上延续其以往积极正面的歌曲态度及清新的感觉，连劝诫年轻人勿吸食毒品的《无菇朋友》，旋律照样清新雅致。尽管如此，方大同对音乐的求变态度，在该专辑中也能体现。比如在演绎上不再是“一人骚”，而是拉上陈兆基、李一丁两位新拍档组成的乐队；在编曲上，复古吉他音效和长号组、solo段落、老式灵歌的唱腔等对乐迷而言都相当有新鲜感。对于这种变化，有人觉得欣喜，但也有人认为一切变化都只是“浅尝辄止”，在Bandsound之中，方大同的唱腔没有很好表现，摇滚做得“不够彻底”。面对这些质疑，方大同回应：“虽然都是黑人音乐，R&B就比较温和轻唱，蓝调的唱腔就会多一点态度，多一点点玩声音的部分。(演唱部分)要盖过乐队是很容易做出来的，只要我混音时候调大(就可以)。有人觉得摇滚就一定要让人声盖过所有的乐器，但我觉得没必要，我觉得不只要让乐迷听到人的声音，也要听编曲上的东西。”方大同说，他所喜欢的摇滚是如JimiHendrix(吉米·亨德里克斯)、TheWhiteStripes(白色条纹乐队)那一类城市骚灵风格的音乐，“有的人觉得做了摇滚，可能又觉得我做的摇滚不够彻底的，但他懂的摇滚只是一部分。”争议2歌词简单内容单薄回应：我不需要那么直白一直以来坚持做创作的方大同，这次在词作上比以往投入了更多的精力，11首歌中有8首词作都有他的参与，但质量却受到诸多诟病。有乐评人认为，这次“少了周耀辉的加持，方大同的音乐就像缺了一条伏线”，不少乐迷也认为歌词过于简单而令内容过于单薄，削弱了歌曲的意境。甚至有歌迷误解了歌词的意思，其中清新文雅的《无菇朋友》原来是“反毒”题材就让不少人愣了愣。南都记者将这个问题抛给方大同，他哈哈笑了几声，说：“我不需要那么直白，那么暴力。我看某些英文歌词也不太明白，要慢慢研究。有的歌写出来，除非他(指词作者)坐下跟你谈，你才可能完全明白他的意思。比如《无菇朋友》里，的‘我走过红地毯’，看过(引发我灵感的新闻)报道就知道，这句话的意思是警察到了，地毯全都是血，而且有人死在沙发上……”方大同解释，“我一向有写词，这次写多了是因为很多曲子不适合之前帮我写过词的人。这次风格是蓝调摇滚，句子的结构、所配合的唱腔，其实不是太适合一般中文的作词方式。”专辑名解析15，是方大同开始学吉他的年龄专辑命名为“15”，这个数字是方大同开始学吉他的年龄，也意味着他这次要回归与吉他相关的内容。音乐风格方面，他在骚灵及R&B的基础上，用蓝调和Rock进行点缀，做一张“UrbanBlues/Rock”(注：城市布鲁斯/摇滚乐)。他介绍，此番尝试是受到JohnMayer(约翰。梅尔)《Contin-uum》的启发，以及蓝调吉他手EricClapton(埃里克·帕特里克·克莱普顿)、JimiHendrix(吉米·亨德里克斯)、B.B.King等的人影响。加上他在生活中有了更多的观察体验，而在歌中触及环保、反毒、爱情婚姻等内容。题外话听方大同讲烂Gag方大同总是让人感觉“温和正经”：他习惯去同一家餐厅，点固定几个菜；他说话声音不会太大，语速也不会太快，温文有礼；他绯闻不多，常常歌唱爱情但感情空窗期已有六年。专辑《15》不例外地有多首爱情歌曲，如受电影《叶问2》启发写下《张永成》描述叶问渴望回家看妻儿，《情胜策略》批判时下年轻人将爱情当游戏，《二人游》讲一个男生第三者说不……谈到爱情话题，方大同说自己心仪的对象仍未出现，但希望35岁前结婚。方大同说自己是个慢热的人，“我喜欢观察，喜欢听，但在朋友中也算是比较多话。”记者顺水推舟请方大同讲个冷笑话，他说：“讲完怕你对我印象不好”，随后还是贡献了两个小段子：“别人问我，为什么自己没有打算结婚没有交女朋友，我说看缘分嘛，工作太忙，录音制作的。他不相信，我说你看我微博，因为我要混音，所以没有婚姻。”“我有个发型师叫做Carl，别人问我他在哪，我说在停车场。”(Carl与car——汽车——发音相近)
person: EdwardChan,方大同,朱燕霞,周耀辉,李一丁,陈兆基,吉米·亨德里克斯,埃里克·帕特里克·克莱普顿,黄丹婷,CharlesLee,约翰。梅尔
en: The album "15" causes two polarized reviews. Fong Datong: I don't want so much violence. When he promoted his new album in Taiwan earlier, Fong Datong was awarded "Little Giant Lung". In the new album, he made a lot of new attempts. ● Three years later, Fong Datong launched a new creative album "15", which includes music composition and arrangement for the whole album, and wrote more than the usual lyrics. Such devotion and effort, however, triggered controversy. ● Our newspaper identified that it is really hard to do music. If it is unchangeable, it will be criticized as "standing still"; If there is not much change, it is easy to say "stop and go". In fact, for most music fans, it is enough to be moved by several songs and let their ears enjoy for tens of minutes. Nandu News reporter Zhu Yanxia, intern Huang Danting, wearing black rimmed glasses and checkered shirts, sings the music of Saoling and R&B, which is always the same as Fong Datong. Not cold or hot, this is the most common evaluation given by the outside world to his personal and music style. But this time, the new album "15" seems to have changed: the comments are polarized, and the consistent love and direct rejection - some people are happy to see his new breakthrough, and he combines blues, Rock, Saoling and R&B in many ways; Some people were very disappointed with his singing style, simple lyrics, theme concept and so on. "This album is a challenge to me in terms of music and the stories or thoughts I want to share with you, and it will also be a challenge to listeners," Fong writes in the album, as if he has foreseen the possible reaction of listeners. Earlier this month, Fong Datong brought his fifth personal creation album "15" to a number of cities in the mainland for publicity. Yesterday afternoon, he met with Nandu journalists in Guangzhou to talk about the very rude controversy caused by "15", and finally talked about his "bad gag king". Fong Datong said: "This album is the best in production, new changes and new standards are better, but I do black music." Controversy 1 New patterns stop responding: This is what I want to do. The new album includes 11 songs, which are produced by Fong Datong, Edward Chan and Charles Lee. Fong Datong is responsible for the music composition and arrangement of the whole album, and he also fills in more than half of the lyrics. The album basically continues his positive and positive song attitude and fresh feeling in the past. Even the song of "Friends without Fung" to dissuade young people from taking drugs is still fresh and elegant. Nevertheless, Fong Datong's attitude of changing music can also be reflected in this album. For example, instead of "one person's骚”, he pulled on the band composed of two new partners, Chen Zhaoji and Li Yiding; In terms of arrangement, the retro guitar sound effect, trombone group, solo paragraph, and the singing style of old spirit are quite fresh to music fans. For this change, some people feel happy, but others think that all changes are just "tasteless", and Fang Datong's singing style is not well expressed in Bandsound, and the rock music is "not thorough enough". In the face of these doubts, Fong Datong responded: "Although they are all black music, R&B is more gentle and light singing, and the singing style of blues will have more attitude and more space to play sound. (Singing part) It's easy to cover the band. Just mix it up (you can). Some people think that rock must let the voice cover all the instruments, but I don't think it's necessary. I think it's necessary to let music fans hear the sound of people, and also to listen to the music arrangement." Fong Datong said that the rock he likes is the urban spirit style of music such as Jimi Hendrix (Jimi Hendrix) and The White Stripes (White Stripe Band), "Some people think that doing rock may make them think that my rock is not thorough enough, but they only know a part of rock." Controversy 2 Simple lyrics and thin content Response: I don't need to be so straightforward. Fong Datong, who has always been committed to creation, has invested more energy in this word than before. He participated in eight of the eleven songs, but the quality has been criticized. Some music critics believe that this "less Zhou Yaohui's support, Fong Datong's music is like a missing伏line", and many music fans also think that the lyrics are too simple to make the content too thin, which weakens the artistic conception of the song. Even some fans misunderstood the meaning of the lyrics. The fresh and elegant "No Fung Friends" was originally an anti drug theme, which made many people stunned. Nandu reporters threw this question to Fong Datong, who laughed and said: "I don't need to be so straightforward or violent. I don't understand some English lyrics very well. I have to study slowly. Some songs are written. Unless he (referring to the lyricist) sits down and talks with you, you may fully understand his meaning. For example, 'I walked on the red carpet' in "No Fung Friends", I know that the meaning of this sentence is that the police have arrived, the carpet is full of blood, and someone has died on the sofa..." Fong Datong explained

content: 收评：期市多头全线爆发油脂类集体冲高新浪财经讯周四，国内期市大宗商品全线上涨，油脂类品种集体走强，豆油、棕榈油、菜油盘中均创下一年新高，橡胶、棉花、有色金属也有不错涨幅，化工品，农产品大多小幅上涨。油脂类今日09连豆油持仓量增加，阻力位在10800、11000，近期或延续震荡上行态势，建议多单须持。美豆布林线有向上扩口的迹象，本周后半段美豆或试探14美元。昨日美国经济数据利好，导致美元大幅反弹，商品集体上涨，美豆也反弹至13.9美元。阿根廷本周末天气将恢复干旱，为美豆走势提供支撑。今晚美国农业部将公布出口销售报告，如销售数据利好，则美豆将继续看涨。因美豆与美其他作物比价关系仍处于均值以下，后市看涨，多单须持。同时，美所有农产品中油籽需求增长最快，且种植最为困难，支撑美豆价格。马棕榈油产量减少导致的库存下降将令豆类油脂受到较强支撑。今日国内油脂受美豆反弹影响创出新高，持仓量增加，后市将继续震荡走高，但短期或有震荡风险，建议投资者做多思路不变，逢低勇敢加仓。美国农业部1月12号将公布美作物供需报告，该报告或令豆类油脂上涨加速。[全文]橡胶技术来看，沪胶1105合约周四高开于前期高点实体之上，日内下探上一交易日收盘价格受到支撑回升，形态来看，均线呈多头排列，上涨趋势良好。指标来看，均线，MACD,KDJ均呈现金叉，出现较好入场点。但是目前沪胶处于前期高位，面临压力较大，追高需谨慎。整体而言，沪胶基本面依旧提供支撑，技术方面，均线呈现多头排列，上涨趋势线完好，后市沪胶突破前高指日可待。操作上建议前期多单继续持有。[全文]沪铜今日沪铜高位振荡，价格高开冲高后振荡回落，收盘仍上涨。受外盘探底回升提振，主力合约Cu1104以72010跳空高开，盘中一度72490，不过受国内股市疲软影响，铜价振荡回落，收盘于72020元，比上日收盘价涨740元。今日成交萎缩，成交19.1万手左右，总持仓减少8414手至338696手。今日铜价止跌反弹，价格重新站上5日均线之上，令短线调整暂时中止，不过，今日价格的反弹明显缺乏量和仓的配合，市场仍存在一定的畏高情绪，以逢高减仓为主。目前国内现货铜消费受到高价格抑制，未表现出节前备库的消费需求旺季，现货贴水保持在200-350元间，一定程度上压制了市场的做多人气，铜价将继续保持外强内弱格局，将被动跟随外盘涨势，预计近日沪铜将高位振荡为主，谨慎持有多单。[全文]玉米今日国内玉米市场冲高回落，尽管豆类市场大幅上涨，仍未能有效带动玉米期价，玉米现货供应平稳情况下，大部分资金转战其它波幅较大的品种。目前大连港内玉米平舱价2060-2070元/吨，水分14%，黑龙江新玉米到港价在2020元/吨上下，锦州港玉米平舱价在2070元/吨上下，市场成交依然偏淡。广东港内质量较好的新玉米报价在2160-2180元/吨，陈玉米报价2180-2200元/吨，港口质量较好的玉米走货速度较快，港口玉米库存23万吨左右。近期国内淀粉以及玉米油价格连续走低，下游需求不旺暂不支撑玉米价格上涨，深加工企业在利润下滑的情况下，收购价格有小幅回调的可能。另外，春节马上临近，农民在年前一般会有一个售粮高峰期，玉米的供应数量将会有所增加。不过前期玉米市场收购的主要力量是深加工以及中字头企业，普通贸易商一直没有竞争力，在深加工利润下滑及中字头企业受限的情况下，贸易商可能会抓紧这一售粮时机进行补库，这将限制玉米的下行空间。综合看，玉米市场仍将维持区间整理的走势，震荡区间2310-2360，投资者可进行波段操作，以区间两端为止损。[全文]燃料油周三公布的美国12月民间就业数据意外强于预期，提振市场人气。人力资源服务公司AutomaticDataProcessingInc。(ADP)与咨询机构MacroeconomicAdvisers公布的全美就业报告显示，12月份美国私营部门就业人数增加297,000人。经济学家此前预计，ADP将宣布12月份就业人数增加100,000人。美国能源资料协会(EIA)周三公布的周度库存报告显示，截至12月31日当周，美国原油库存减少416万桶至3.3527亿桶，预估为减少180万桶。周三，美国公布的私营部门就业人数好于预期，同时EIA公布的原油库存的下滑幅度也超出了市场预估，以上基本面因素对冲美元上涨的不利影响，提振原油价格走高，收复90美元关口；沪油方面，由于近期需求不振，价格一直在低位震荡，但4900附近有一定支撑，此处建立的多单可继续持有。[全文]早稻从近期现货市场的表现来看，北方以及华北地区粳稻收购价在稳步抬升，江南地区晚稻收购价相对平稳略有上调，目前早稻市场正处于清淡期，市场中贸易量不足。伴随春节消费高峰期的到来，市场稻米价格有望进一步出现上升。目前国际农产品市场整体上涨格局完好，谷物市场再度寻觅到新的题材支撑，料将使得CBOT农产品期价进一步上涨。国内谷物市场同样受到带动，早稻碍于政策压力，当前上涨势头依然较为缓慢。不过整体上仍将延续震荡走高形势。盘中表现可以看到，近期早稻市场需要周边氛围配合，在缺乏有效支撑的情况下，资金关注度相对不足，因此操作上建议多看少动，或者逢低少量布局阶段性多单。[全文]黄金隔夜美国公布的ISM非制造业指数及ADP就业人数好于预期，提振美元指数大涨，本周五即将公布美国12月非农就业报告，这可能对会黄金形成进一步的指引。回想上次12月3日公布美国11月的失业率高达9.8%远差于预期时，黄金当日应声大涨28美元，但近期的一系列数据均显示美国经济出现了一些回暖迹象，因此，明日公布的非农就业报告至关重要。短期来看，黄金可能会有大跌后技术上的一些反弹，但受制于美元指数的强势，预计反弹力度有限，上方压力位1390美元，下方支撑位1365美元。[全文]
en: Close evaluation: The multi-head market of the futures market fully broke out, and the集体of oil and fat collectively rushed to Sina Finance to report on Thursday. The domestic futures market commodities rose across the board. The oil and fat varieties collectively strengthened. Soybean oil, palm oil and rape oil all hit a new high in a year. Rubber, cotton and nonferrous metals also rose well. Chemical products and agricultural products mostly rose slightly. Today, 09 Lian Soybean Oil of the oil and fat sector has increased its position, with resistance at 10800 and 11000. In the near future, it may continue to fluctuate upward. It is suggested that the long order must be held. The US soybean Bollinger Line has a tendency to expand upward. In the second half of this week, the US soybean may attempt $14. Yesterday's US economic data was good, leading to a substantial rebound of the US dollar, a collective rise of commodities and a rebound of the US soybean to $13.9. The weather in Argentina will return to drought this weekend, providing support for the trend of soybeans in the United States. Tonight, the US Department of Agriculture will release the export sales report. If the sales data is good, the US soybeans will continue to rise. Because the ratio of US soybeans and other US crops is still below the mean, the future market is bullish, and the long list must be held. At the same time, the oilseed demand growth in all US agricultural products is the fastest and the most difficult to plant, supporting the price of soybeans in the United States. The decline in Malaysian palm oil production will lead to a strong support for bean oil. Today, the domestic oil and fat market hit a new high due to the rebound of soybeans in the United States. The position increased and the market will continue to fluctuate and rise in the future. However, there may be a risk of short-term volatility. It is suggested that investors should remain unchanged in their willingness to make more investments and be brave in adding positions when they are low. The US Department of Agriculture will release the supply and demand report of US crops on January 12, which may accelerate the rise of bean oil. [Full text] Rubber Technically speaking, the Shanghai Rubber 1105 contract opened high on Thursday above the previous high, and the price of the previous trading day rebounded and recovered under the support of the closing price. In terms of shape, the moving average is in a multi headed arrangement, and the upward trend is good. In terms of indicators, the moving average, MACD, KDJ are all gold forks, and there are good entry points. However, at present, Shanghai rubber is at a high level in the earlier period, facing great pressure, and it is necessary to be cautious when chasing high. In general, the Shanghai Rubber fundamentals still provide support. In terms of technology, the moving average shows a multi headed arrangement, and the rising trend line is intact. It is expected that the Shanghai Rubber will break the previous high in the future. It is suggested to continue to hold the long list in the earlier period. [Full text] Copper in Shanghai Today, copper in Shanghai is in a high position, and the price is high, opening and retreating. The closing price still rises. Boosted by the rebound of foreign plates from bottom to top, the main contract Cu1104 jumped to 72010, and once hit 72490 in the market. However, due to the weakness of the domestic stock market, the copper price retreated and closed at 72020 yuan, 740 yuan higher than the closing price of the previous day. The transaction today shrank, with a turnover of about 191000 hands, and the total position decreased by 8414 hands to 338696 hands. Today, copper prices stopped falling and rebounded, and prices once again stood above the 5 day moving average, temporarily stopping short-term adjustments. However, today's price rebound obviously lacks the cooperation of volume and warehouse, and the market still has a certain fear of heights, mainly in order to reduce positions at a high level. At present, the consumption of spot copper in China is restrained by high prices, and the consumer demand season before the festival has not been shown. The spot discount is maintained between 200-350 yuan, which suppresses the market's popularity to make more people. The price of copper will continue to maintain the pattern of strong outside and weak inside, and will passively follow the trend of foreign plates. It is expected that Shanghai copper will mainly be in a high position in the near future, and be cautious in holding long positions. [Full text] Corn Today, the domestic corn market fell back after hitting a new high. Although the soybean market rose sharply, it still failed to effectively bring up the corn futures price. When the corn spot supply was stable, most funds turned to other varieties with larger volatility. At present, the corn price in Dalian Port is 2060-2070 yuan / ton, with a moisture of 14%. The price of new corn in Heilongjiang Province arriving at the port is around 2020 yuan / ton, and the price of corn in Jinzhou Port is around 2070 yuan / ton. The market is still light. The price of new corn in Guangdong Port of good quality is 2160-2180 yuan / ton, and the price of old corn is 2180-2200 yuan / ton. The port corn of good quality in the port has a fast delivery speed, and the port corn inventory is about 230000 tons. In recent days, the prices of starch and corn oil in China have continued to decline, and the downstream demand is not booming, which does not support the rise of corn prices. Deep processing enterprises may have a small adjustment in the acquisition price under the pressure of profit decline. In addition, the Spring Festival is coming soon. Farmers generally have a peak grain selling period at the beginning of the year, and the supply of corn will increase. However, the main force of the earlier corn market acquisition was deep processing and China's top enterprises. The general trade has not been competitive. In the case of declining deep processing profits and China's top enterprises being restricted, traders may seize this grain selling opportunity to replenish the warehouse, which will limit the downside space of corn. In general, the corn market will still maintain the trend of range consolidation, and the range of fluctuations is 2310-2360. Investors can carry out band operations, with the two ends of the range as stop loss. [Full text] Fuel oil The US December private employment data released on Wednesday was unexpectedly stronger than expected, boosting market sentiment. AutomaticDataProcessingInc. (ADP), a human resources service company, and the consulting firm MacroeconomicAdvisers's national employment report showed that the number of private sector employees in the United States increased by 297000 in December. Economists had previously expected that ADP would announce an increase of 100000 people in December. The weekly inventory report published by the US Energy Data Association (EIA) on Wednesday showed that the US crude oil inventory decreased by 4.16 million barrels to 335.27 million barrels in the week ending December 31, with an estimated decrease of 1.8 million barrels. On Wednesday, the private sector employment figures released in the United States were better than expected, and the decline of crude oil inventories announced by the EIA also exceeded market expectations. The above fundamental factors hedged the adverse impact of the rise of the US dollar, boosting crude oil prices to rise and recovering the US$90 pass; In terms of Shanghai oil, due to the recent low demand, the price has been fluctuating at a low level, but there is some support near 4900, and the established long list can continue to be held. [Full text] Early rice From the recent performance of the spot market, the粳rice purchase price in the North and North China regions is steadily rising, and the late rice purchase price in the Jiangnan region is relatively stable with a slight increase. At present, the early rice market is in a light period, and the trade volume in the market is insufficient. With the arrival of the peak consumption period of the Spring Festival, the market rice price is expected to further rise. At present, the overall rising trend of the international agricultural product market is intact, and the grain market has found a new theme to support, which is expected to make CBOT agricultural product futures prices further rise. The domestic grain market is also driven. Early rice is under policy pressure, and the current upward trend is still relatively slow. However, it will still continue to fluctuate and rise. From the performance in the market, we can see that the recent early rice market needs the cooperation of the surrounding atmosphere. In the absence of effective support, the fund's attention is relatively insufficient. Therefore, it is suggested to operate less and less, or to lay a small number of phased long orders at a low level. [Full text] Gold The ISM non manufacturing index and ADP employment figures released overnight in the United States were better than expected, boosting the dollar index to rise sharply. The US non agricultural employment report for December will be released on Friday, which may further guide gold. Looking back, when the unemployment rate in the United States in November was as high as 9.8% far worse than expected on December 3, gold rose by 28 dollars on the same day, but a series of recent data shows that the US economy has warmed up, so the non agricultural employment report to be published tomorrow is critical. In the short term, gold may have some rebound after a big fall, but it is restricted by the strength of the US dollar index. It is expected that the rebound will be limited, with a pressure of US $1390 above and a support of US $1365 below. [Full text]

content: 我国网络低俗之风整改情况良好刘菊花冯晓芳新华社讯中国互联网协会互联网违法和不良信息举报中心副主任奚伟17日表示，自全国整治互联网低俗之风专项行动开展以来，举报中心已分3批曝光了50个网站，目前大部分被曝光网站清理整顿情况良好。奚伟表示，目前全社会已形成清理整顿网络低俗之风的热潮，强大的舆论压力使网站的自律意识加强。个别网站因被曝光栏目、频道的不良、违法信息乃数年之所积一时难以彻底清理干净，影响了整治力度和速度，但其态度也都非常积极，对举报中心的问责电话都很配合。有些未被曝光的网站主动联系举报中心，询问自己的网站有无问题，哪些方面有问题，还有些网站则主动把容易出现问题的栏目关闭，待自行清理干净后再打开，并及时和举报中心沟通，听取举报中心的意见和建议。
en: The rectification of the vulgarity of the Internet in our country is Liu Juhua Feng Xiaofang Xinhua News Liu Juhua, deputy director of the China Internet Association Internet Illegal Information Reporting Center, said on the 17th that since the special action of rectifying the vulgarity of the Internet in the country was launched, the reporting center had exposed 50 websites in three batches, and most of the exposed websites had been well cleaned up and rectified. Xi Wei said that at present, the whole society has formed a热潮of clearing up the vulgarity of the Internet, and the strong public opinion pressure has strengthened the self-discipline awareness of the website. Some websites have been exposed for years because of the bad and illegal information of columns and channels, which is hard to clean up thoroughly, affecting the strength and speed of rectification. However, their attitudes are very positive, and they are very cooperative with the accountability telephone of the Complaints Center. Some websites that have not been exposed take the initiative to contact the Complaints Center to ask whether their websites have problems and where they have problems. Some websites take the initiative to close the columns that are easy to have problems, wait until they clean them up by themselves, and then open them, and communicate with the Complaints Center in time to listen to the opinions and suggestions of the Complaints Center.

content: 昌利控股配售2.5亿股于创业板上市新浪财经讯3月1日消息，昌利控股(08098)发布公告称，以股份配售方式于创业板上市，配售股份数目2.5亿股，每股最高配售价0.495元。股份预期于三月八日（星期二）上午九时正起开始于创业板买卖，股份每手5,000股。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: Changli Holdings allocated 250 million shares to be listed on the Growth Enterprise Market. Sina Finance News reported on March 1 that Changli Holdings (08098) announced that it would be listed on the Growth Enterprise Market by way of share allocation, with 250 million shares allocated and the highest allocation price of 0.495 yuan per share. It is expected that the shares will begin trading on the Growth Enterprise Market at 9:00 am on March 8 (Tuesday), with 5,000 shares in each hand. Welcome to make comments

content: 燕西台西山果岭名门专家品鉴会(组图)(2)图为中国房地产及住宅研究会副会长顾云昌发言【范越】：首先感谢蔡总组织这个活动，燕西台我已经先来过两次，也看过这里的环境，对这片很熟悉，原来爬香山，去颐和园都是春游的时候小学的时候学校组织的，感觉也是独特的。我打高尔夫也是做了18年了，现在北京市打球的接近8万人，打球的人口，我和陈总也是好朋友，打球人口的增长和我们刚才顾总说的房地产的发展，我认为中国的经济不断的发展，确实给人们的生活水平提高带来了很快的机会。【范越】：就这块来说，在北京来说应该是独一无二的，虽然现在是9个洞的高尔夫球场，但是已经和社区形成了地产、别墅、高尔夫的结合，这个结合实际上刚才顾老已经说了，在国际上也就是这个硬件了，但是从软件上，高尔夫的文化来说，别墅、社区，包括生活的环境来讲，刚才我们聊天，陈总也说了，很多人喜欢爬山，我也认识很多的老同志喜欢爬山，大家认为剧烈的运动是好的运动，实际上高尔夫运动在三十岁、四十岁甚至更高的年龄可以推荐的运动，你可以从五岁运动到九十五岁，这个跨度非常大。【范越】：这么好的别墅两口人住应该还是很浪费的，一个好的社区应该是老人、孩子，最好是三代享受别墅的生活，实际上高尔夫为什么在中国理解不是很多，在国外很成熟的非常好的体育产业，特别是这个年代有老虎伍兹这么好的球员带动了这个产业。我去国外最大的体会是刷完油漆就可以去打球，普通的工人都可以去打球，这种社区如果一家生活在这里，孩子，甚至爷爷和孙子都可以享受这个生活，一起打球，这个在国外是很常见的，一家三口，我在美国打球的时候就遇到一个父亲和女儿、女婿，我和他们聊，他说我们家就在这里，出口就可以打球，这个社区球场还有一个好的东西，我们也提一个建议，像陈总这样的，就把物业费融进去了，打球就不花钱了。【范越】：我在洛杉矶考察了一个老年社区，这个还是高品质的球场，他们的球场比这个短，大概五千码，像年龄大的，短杆很短，像这样的社区在北京是没有的，因为抬头可以看到山，想爬山就可以爬山，想打球就可以打球，这个文化高尔夫渗透，因为高尔夫享受生活的概念在哪？最大的概念是调整自己的心态享受生活，而不是完全靠竞争，对抗，因为很多人在每天大量的脑力劳动以后需要放松，高尔夫最好的放松就是把自己的身体和心里做一个调整，年龄跨度，现在退下来很多的领导都开始享受高尔夫的快乐。【范越】：上个月我在日本体会到，现在有六七十个老年人打球然后晚上一起吃饭，享受这个生活，在中国还看不到这个场面，但是我觉得像陈总和我，再过二十年就是享受高尔夫的生活，享受这个优秀的社区、房产和高尔夫的结合，我觉得这是一个潮流，这是一个趋势，但是这个位置在北京已经没有了，如果说这个位置放在上海，就不得了了，因为北京还是和上海的房子便宜很多，我们从国际化来说，我也支持蔡总，我们去年就搞过这些论坛，特别是房山、西部这块，我们看到生活水平不可能下降，只是短期的时候遇到一些危机，就像人遇到一些身体上的不适等等，但是无论如何社区是往前走的，生活的水平不断的提高，这种前瞻性和预见性，作为投资者、房地产商也好，还是要站在一个高度去看房地产的发展。【范越】：我为什么讲高尔夫文化，我们在非典的时候也出过效果，在广东后一组的人打到前面的人前面了，结果很多人要打起来的，如果我想陈总和蔡总是邻居，一句话就不会造成更多的笑话，高尔夫在中国，因为有了好的社区的平台，大家在楼房里面互相都不认识，也是一种很尴尬的生活状态，在国外非常的友好，非常的友善，因为高尔夫的规格，礼节礼貌大家都知道，更高的境界是要为他人着想，所以我想从文化和精神上来讲，高尔夫还有很多的推广的东西，打球的孩子不容易学坏，打高尔夫有一个境界和追求的目标，很多精力放在打球上，老虎伍兹也免费给美国办了一个高尔夫学院，包括中国有NBA的篮球姚明，更多人喜欢NBA一样，燕西台虽然低调，但是也慢慢的看到了果岭名门，也是挺有特色的，所以我希望我们的社区越做越好，给北京的高尔夫文化和住宅文化提供好的平台和交流的机会。【主持人】：谢谢范总，刚才也是给你们提了一个意见，太低调也不好，我要是早一点知道这个项目，我在房子的时候就会考虑，以前还真是不知道，今天我也是第一次上项目现场来，您打球，知道球场的信息比我们快，我们还是想象从房产，要是两年前动的时候，两年前我们想，是什么价格，但是有球场的信息，当时就不是不知道这个信息的情况，就会失去一些置业者的机会。【主持人】：刚才您说的关于国外的发展趋势，像欧美的发达国家，他们的今天就是我们的未来，我们几年之后，甚至我们现在很多的方面都超越他们的，我前天中午跟一个做金融的，原来在政府部门工作的朋友谈一个事儿，我们整个过程当中就听他讲了，他现在鼓动身边的人一定要去找到好的，比如说教育、球场、医院这样好地段的房子去买，因为现在从整个大的经济形势来看，现在还是通缩，但是从全球的经济形势来看，所有的西方国家，包括我们国家的政府救市采取的举措来看，下半年肯定要进入通胀期，整个的物价指数，什么最保险，房产的投资从现在的市场，我们已经看出来了，大量的投资客已经开始进入到市场里面了，我们私下聊天他说一定要找好资源的物业拿着，未来一两年，通胀他预测今年年底会达到两位数，我觉得政府也是要综合考虑的。从改革开放到现在来说，经常是走两端的形势上的问题，以前毕竟我们缺乏很多的经验和手段，特别是房地产市场发展，我们和陈秘书长聊的时候，也一直担心，要救市，但是也不能过头，导致房价暴涨，这是政府担心的，但是整体的形势就在这里，不是中国在救市，欧美都在救市，美国大量的印钞票，对政府的消费刺激和带动作用还是有很高的影响，很多人预期在明年下半年一定会有很明显的显现，在这个时候，我想可能对于老百姓置业投资角度来说，理财都是需要密切关注的。图为北京房地产协会副秘书长陈志【主持人】：陈秘书长，您对北京的市场也很了解了，也请您谈谈对这个方面的看法。【陈志】：随便说说，因为顾老师在这里了，是高尔夫的前辈，我没有打过高尔夫，我踢足球，现在很多的朋友都被拉到高尔夫里面来了，足球是年轻人的运动。今天很高兴来到燕西台这个项目，一看环境非常好。刚才顾老师也说了，蔡总也说了房地产的一些情况，实际上说到一个信贷的问题。我昨天下午跟北京市银行协会交流，我们也聊到有关信贷方面的问题，从全国来说，一季度4.58万亿的信贷规模，觉得挺吓人的，全年的指标是5万亿，这才一季度，我们感觉到为了救市，一季度信贷的迅速膨胀，刚才像蔡总说的就有一个担心，这么大的资金下去了之后，会不会迅速的造成了大规模的通胀，甚至是不可控制的，我在跟银行协会的同志聊的时候得到一个信息，现在60%以上的规模还是在票据间，没有进入到实体经济当中，但是这么大量的钱，撰起来以后，怎么样把真正缺钱的，把资金用在实体经济当中，我们也在想，在今年的下半年，为银行企业，为我们的金融机构推出一个真正能够客观、评价我们房地产企业的信用的体系出来，这个我们昨天跟银行协会，谈的非常的愉快，也初步达成了一个意向，这个是我们下半年要做的一项事情，就是能够真正的把房地产企业和银行企业通过一种评价，让银行企业更多的认识到我们企业的价值。【陈志】：说到投资，刚才顾老师说了一个基本的概念，就是房子过五十年，六十年，他的生命周期就结束了，但是他的经济周期还没有结束，土地在不断的增值，作为投资角度来说，我想更多的是看到稀缺资源，特别稀缺地段的资源带来的投资，北京我们讲国际大都市的地位，政治、经济、文化的中心，特别是北京这样一个总部经济的汇聚的城市，这是一个非常特殊的，而且具有非常明显的窗口效应和示范效应，这个是我们全中国其他城市不可替代的资源，在这样的城市当中，我们还有这么好的一个项目，占有了这么大的稀缺资源，像我们讲的地铁上盖的，城市干线上的房产，只要地铁一通，价格就涨起来，从这个角度来看我们燕西台这个项目，从投资来说，我个人认为是没有问题的，应该是随着经济的发展，随着国际化、城市化的推进，这种资源会越来越少，作为稀缺资源，刚才范秘书长说了，包括教育、对人的性格的陶冶等等都有很多的作用，对经济也是一种拉动，所以我想这样的项目，不可能太多，因为他稀缺，不可能太多，我觉得应该是值得珍藏的产品。
person: 顾老师,范越,顾云昌,主持人,陈志,陈总,蔡总
en: Yanxitai Xishan Golf Green Famous Experts Tasting Seminar (picture group) (2) Figure Vice President Gu Yunchang of China Real Estate and Housing Research Association [Fan Yue]: First of all, I would like to thank President Cai for organizing this activity. I have been to Yanxitai twice, and I have also seen the environment here. I am very familiar with this place. Originally, climbing Xiangshan and going to the Summer Palace were organized by the school during spring outing when I was in elementary school, and I also feel unique. I have also played golf for 18 years. Now there are nearly 80000 people in Beijing who play golf. I am also good friends with President Chen. I think the growth of people who play golf and the real estate development just mentioned by President Gu are the two things. I think China's economy is developing continuously, which really brings people a lot of opportunities to improve their living standards. 【 Fan Yue 】: As far as this piece is concerned, it should be unique in Beijing. Although it is a nine hole golf course now, it has formed a combination of real estate, villas and golf with the community. In fact, the combination has already been mentioned by the old man Gu. Internationally, it is also this hardware. However, in terms of software, golf culture, villas, communities, and even the living environment, just now, we chatted, President Chen also said that many people like mountain climbing. I also know many old comrades who like mountain climbing. Everyone thinks that intense exercise is good exercise. In fact, golf can be recommended as an exercise at the age of 30, 40 or even higher. You can exercise from 5 years old to 95 years old, which is a very large span. 【 Fan Yue 】: It is still a waste for two people to live in such a good villa. A good community should be old people, children, and the best three generations to enjoy the villa life. In fact, the reason why golf is not well understood in China is that it is a very mature and excellent sports industry abroad, especially in this era, there are so many good players as Tiger Woods to promote this industry. My biggest experience in going abroad is that I can go to play golf after painting. Ordinary workers can go to play golf. If a family lives in this community, children, and even grandfathers and grandsons can enjoy this life and play together. This is very common abroad. A family of three, when I played golf in the United States, I met a father, a daughter and a son-in-law. I chatted with them. He said that our family is here. We can play golf at the exit. This community golf course also has a good thing. We also made a suggestion. Like President Chen, we should integrate the property management fee, and then we don't have to spend money to play golf. 【 Fan Yue 】: I examined an old community in Los Angeles. This is still a high-quality golf course. Their golf course is shorter than this one. It is about 5000 yards long. If you are old, the short stick is very short. There is no such community in Beijing, because you can see the mountain when you look up, climb the mountain if you want, and play golf if you want. Golf culture permeates. Where is the concept of enjoying life with golf? The biggest concept is to adjust our mentality to enjoy life, rather than rely entirely on competition and confrontation, because many people need to relax after a lot of mental labor every day. The best way to relax in golf is to adjust our body and mind. The span of age is very large. Now that many leaders have retired, they have begun to enjoy the happiness of golf. 【 Fan Yue 】: Last month, I experienced in Japan that there are sixty or seventy elderly people playing golf and then having dinner together to enjoy this life. We can't see this scene in China, but I think that in twenty years, President Chen and I will enjoy the life of golf, enjoy the combination of this excellent community, real estate and golf. I think this is a trend, but this position is no longer available in Beijing. If this position is in Shanghai, it will be amazing, because Beijing is still much cheaper than Shanghai in terms of houses. In terms of internationalization, I also support President Cai. We have conducted these forums since last year, especially in Foshan and the western part. We saw that the living standard is impossible to decline. It is just that we encounter some crises in the short term, such as physical discomfort and so on. However, in any case, the community is moving forward and the living standard is constantly improving. This forward-looking and predictive nature, as an investor or a real estate developer, should also stand at a height to look at the development of real estate. 【 Fan Yue 】: Why do I talk about golf culture? We also made some achievements during the non popular period. The second group of people in Guangdong played ahead of the first group. As a result, many people want to fight. If I think President Chen and President Cai are neighbors, one sentence will not cause more jokes. Golf in China, because of the good community platform, everyone in the building do not know each other, is also an embarrassing living state. Abroad, it is very friendly and friendly, because everyone knows the specifications, etiquette and politeness of golf. The higher level is to think for others. So I think, in terms of culture and spirit, golf has a lot to promote. It is not easy for children to play golf to learn bad. Playing golf has a realm and goal to pursue. A lot of energy is spent on playing golf. Tiger Woods also gave the United States a free golf college, including Yao Ming, a basketball player in China's NBA, like more people who like the NBA. Although Yanxitai is low-key, it has slowly seen the green gate, which is also very distinctive. I hope our community will get better and better, and provide a good platform and opportunity for exchanges for Beijing's golf culture and residential culture. 【 Host 】: Thank you, President Fan. Just now, I also gave you a suggestion that being too low-key is not good. If I had known this project earlier, I would consider it when I was in a house. I really didn't know it before. Today, I also came to the project site for the first time. You play golf and know the information of the golf course faster than we do. We still imagine that from the real estate, if we moved two years ago, we thought about the price two years ago. However, with the information of the golf course, we did not know the information at that time, and we will lose some opportunities for real estate investment. 【 Host 】: What you just said about the development trend abroad, such as developed countries in Europe and America, their today is our future. In a few years, or even now, many aspects of our country have exceeded them. I had lunch with a friend who works in the government yesterday中午. We just listened to him talk about it throughout the process. He is now encouraging people around him to find good houses, such as education, golf courses, hospitals and other good locations to buy, because now, from the perspective of the whole macroeconomic situation, it is still deflationary. But looking at the global economic situation, all Western countries, including the government's rescue measures in our country, will definitely enter the inflation period in the second half of the year, and the overall price index. What is the most secure? From the current market, we have seen that a large number of investors have begun to enter the market. When we chat in private, he said that we must find a good property resource to hold it. In the future, one or two years, the inflation he predicts will reach double digits by the end of this year, I think the government also needs to take a comprehensive consideration. From the reform and opening up to now, there are often problems at the end of the situation. After all, we lack many experiences and means, especially the development of the real estate market. When we chat with Secretary Chen, we are always worried that we want to save the market, but we can't go too far, which will lead to a sharp rise in house prices. This is what the government is worried about. However, the overall situation is here, not in China, but in Europe and the United States, which are also saving the market. The United States has printed a large number of banknotes, which has a high impact on the government's consumption stimulation and promotion. Many people expect that there will be a significant manifestation in the second half of next year. At this time, I think it may be necessary for ordinary people to pay close attention to investment in real estate from the perspective of investment in real estate. Chen Zhizhi, Deputy Secretary General of Beijing Real Estate Association 【 Host 】: Secretary General Chen, you are also very familiar with the Beijing market, and I would like to invite you to talk about your views on this aspect. 【 Chen Zhizhi 】: Just talk about it. Because Professor Gu is here, he is a veteran of golf. I have never played golf. I play football. Now many friends are being pulled into golf. Football is a sport for young people. Today, I am very happy to come to the Yansi Platform project. When I look at the environment, it is very good. Just now, Professor Cai and President Cai also talked about some situations of real estate, and in fact, they talked about a credit problem. Yesterday afternoon, I exchanged views with the Bankers Association of Beijing, and we also talked about the credit problem. From a national perspective, the credit scale of 4.58 trillion in the first quarter was scary. The annual index was 5 trillion, and it

content: 威廉姆斯学雷锋让出先发主帅：他是一个善良的人新浪体育讯　北京时间10月23日消息，据nj.com报道，周二篮网尼克斯赛前教练劳伦斯-弗兰克征询希恩-威廉姆斯意见，为他要不要先发，结果威廉姆斯居然严词拒绝了弗兰克的好意。当然弗兰克也没有就因此惊诧莫名用看外星人或者傻瓜一样的眼神去鄙视威廉姆斯，质疑他的进取心。篮网教练只是耸耸肩一笑而过，因为他太了解威廉姆斯。“他是非常非常真诚的让出了主力位置，”弗兰克说，“我不觉得这很诡异，他就是这样的人。希恩是一个团队至上的球员，他不是一个自私的家伙，他心地很善良的，他就是由衷的感到应该给布鲁克一个先发的机会。”不过弗兰克的辩解还是没法掩盖实质问题，威廉姆斯到底有没有心思去争夺主力中锋的位置？如果有，他为什么在这种需要更多出场时间刷更好数据证明自己的时候退缩？篮网主力中锋之争威廉姆斯已然落在洛佩斯和约什-布恩之后，此时还不奋起却学人做雷锋，到底是什么心态？威廉姆斯不是号称训练营头两周篮网No.1吗？“哥们，我知道自己能做什么，”威廉姆斯说，“球队的每个人也都知道我的能力，现在是训练营时间，教练只是去做他必须做的事情好让所有人都为新赛季做好准备。我能做的就是每天刻苦训练为新赛季机会的到来做好准备，懂了吗？”5场季前赛威廉姆斯只打了89分钟，而洛佩斯出场时间是139分钟，事实上威廉姆斯也没有充分展示自己的能力，他依然活力十足，但这却没能转化成实实在在的数据或者对比赛的影响力。“Ah，我确实有点在倒退，”威廉姆斯说，“我只是努力想回到正轨，在场上的时候尽量跑到正确的位置，去做正确的事情，进一步提高自己。我对自己的能力非常有信心，这只是季前赛而已，这些比赛不算数的，我只是想充分享受打球的乐趣，找到团队合作的感觉。全队都在努力变得更好，现在队里有不少伤兵，又有很多新球员加盟，现在只是培养团队默契的阶段，明白我的意思吗？”威廉姆斯的新赛季前景看上去愈发不够明朗，他没有得到多少打大前锋的机会，这影响了他的出场时间。而且威廉姆斯进攻一般、低位有待打磨。不过弗兰克担心的倒不是威廉姆斯的数据，而是他的表现还不够稳定。“希恩必须要做那种改变局势的人，活力四射的球员，在场上积极奔跑寻找轻松得分的机会，冲抢前场篮板保护禁区，”教练说道，“这些东西现在必须要成为他在联盟的标志、特征。”(加缪)
person: 洛佩斯,加缪,布鲁克,布恩,希恩,雷锋,劳伦斯-弗兰克,弗兰克,威廉姆斯
en: Williams learned from Lei Feng to give up the head coach: He is a kind person Sina Sports News On October 23, Beijing time, according to nj.com, Lawrence Frank, the coach before the Nets Knicks game on Tuesday, asked Sean Williams for advice on whether he should start or not. As a result, Williams actually refused Frank's kindness in a severe way. Of course, Frank didn't despise Williams with the eyes of aliens or fools because of this inexplicable shock, and questioned his ambition. The Nets coach just shrugged his shoulders and smiled, because he knew Williams too well. "He gave up his main position very, very sincerely," said Frank. "I don't think it's weird. He's just like that. Sean is a team first player. He is not a selfish guy. He is very kind. He sincerely feels that Brook should be given a chance to start first." However, Frank's defense still failed to cover up the substantive problem. Did Williams have any intention to compete for the position of the main center? If so, why did he retreat at this time when he needed more playing time to brush better data to prove himself? Williams has fallen behind Lopez and Josh Boone in the battle for the Nets' main center. At this time, he is learning to be a model of Lei Feng. What is the mentality? Is Williams the No. 1 of the Nets in the first two weeks of the training camp? "Dude, I know what I can do," said Williams. "Everyone in the team also knows my ability. Now is the time of training camp. The coach just did what he had to do to get everyone ready for the new season. What I can do is to prepare for the coming opportunity of the new season by training hard every day. Understand?" Williams only played 89 minutes in five preseason games, while Lopez played 139 minutes. In fact, Williams did not fully demonstrate his ability. He was still energetic, but it did not translate into concrete data or influence on the game. "Ah, I was really retrogressing," said Williams. "I just tried to get back on track, try to run to the right position and do the right thing when I was on the court, and further improve myself. I have great confidence in my ability. This is just a preseason game, and these games don't count. I just want to enjoy the fun of playing and find the feeling of team cooperation. The whole team is trying to get better. Now there are many wounded soldiers in the team and many new players have joined. Now is just the stage of cultivating team cooperation. Do you understand my meaning?" Williams' prospects for the new season seem increasingly unclear, and he has not got much chance to play power forwards, which has affected his playing time. Moreover, Williams' offense is generally low and needs to be polished. However, what Frank is worried about is not Williams' data, but his performance is not stable enough. "Sean must be the kind of person who can change the situation, the energetic player, run actively on the court to look for easy scoring opportunities, rush for rebounds, protect the restricted area," said the coach. "These things must now become his trademarks and characteristics in the league." (Camus)

content: 上海机场：解决1+11怪病<imgsrc=http://image.sinajs.cn/newchart/daily/n/sh600009.gifborder=0alt=上海机场：解决1+1新浪提示：本文属于研究报告栏目，仅为分析人士对一只股票的个人观点和看法，并非正式的新闻报道，新浪不保证其真实性和客观性，一切有关该股的有效信息，以沪深交易所的公告为准，敬请投资者注意风险。上海机场是否会赶在虹桥机场扩建完工之前将其注入，从而整体上市呢？离尘埃落定为时不远理财周报实习记者彭杨/文1+1<1这种情况在什么时候会发生？在上海会经常发生。最典型的莫过于，2000年上海浦东机场投入使用，从此让上海有了与韩国首尔的仁川和金浦机场、日本东京的成田和羽田机场相似的“一市两场”模式，但9年来，结果是两家机场在长三角的市场占有率反而从78%下降到70%。而且，如果备受关注的虹桥机场扩建工程有望在2009年年底前完工，并在2010年3月试营业，上海机场上市资产浦东机场羸弱的吸引力将雪上加霜。那么，趁着上海重组大潮汹涌，上海机场（600009.SH）是否会赶在虹桥机场扩建完工之前将其注入，从而整体上市呢？业内认为，离尘埃落定为时不远。“资产注入催化剂临近”近期市场传闻日炽。而券商们开始密集地撰写推荐上海机场的报告，如申万所述：“上海机场进入快速增长期、长期枢纽地位加强，虹桥二期将于明年3月投产，同时即将面临的业务分流和同业竞争，资产注入催化剂临近，上调至买入评级”。而瑞银证券分析师卫强则认为，“虹桥机场资产很有可能在2010年3月前注入上海机场。”早在6月26日上海机场的股东大会上，上海机场董事长俞吾炎即紧急表态，“浦东机场与虹桥机场的整合是必然的，但目前还没有确切的时间表”。记者就此事致电上海机场的办公室工作人员，得到的答复是，“公司目前正在研究具体的整合方案，并且没有具体的时间表。”“两机场的内部整合基本上已无大碍，目前关键是等政府拍案决定了。”据一位接近上海机场的券商分析人士透露，“其实早在2003年，两机场达成资产置换协议时，就为上海机场集团的整体上市做好了准备工作。”早在2007年虹桥机场扩建计划获批后，上海机场集团总经理贾锐军就表示了上述分析师的逻辑。看来，其管理层推进上海机场整体上市的动机较为强烈。虹桥二期的扩建工程目前已经完成航站楼结构封顶，并将于2010年3月投入使用。上述券商分析人士认为，“在明年3月虹桥二期完工之前，虹桥机场资产是很有可能注入上海机场的，不会违背当初资产注入和股改时的承诺。”申万最新研报称上海机场可能通过两种方式接管虹桥二期：一是与虹桥一期等成熟资产同时注入上市公司；二是上市公司租赁使用虹桥二期的资产，未来通过融资向集团收购。“增加2009年业绩25%”国内旅客量进入快速增长期、国际旅客将恢复正增长，东航上航的重组成功以及世博的逼近，都无疑给上海机场的整合计划注入了一剂催化剂。上海机场2008年两场的国际和地区航线旅客达到1648万人次，这一数据明显高于首都机场和广州的白云机场。另外，2010年的世博会将会为上海两场带来620万的新增旅客吞吐量，带来12%的新增旅客吞吐量增速。目前上海机场的收入主要来源于航空性收入，包括航班起降费、旅客过港服务费、地面服务费收入等，而非航性收入只占30%，非航空开发并不充分。而随着浦东机场商业发展计划的实施，在非航收入领域中未来具有很大的发展空间。二据申万测算，虹桥一期和货站等成熟资产的注入将增加2009年业绩25%，2010年业绩10%-15%。资本支出150亿的虹桥二期可能通过一次性注入或者租赁使用的方式运营，这将使上海机场短期业绩出现负面影响。对此，上述瑞银分析师认为“上海两大机场的管理层进行的理性协调将有益于小股东”。
person: 俞吾炎,贾锐军,彭杨,卫强
en: Shanghai Airport: Solving the 1+11 monster disease <imgsrc=http://image.sinajs.cn/newchart/daily/n/sh600009.gifborder=0alt=Shanghai Airport: Solving the 1+1 Sina Prompt: This article belongs to the research report column, which is only the personal opinion and view of an analyst on a stock, not a formal news report. Sina does not guarantee its truthfulness and objectivity. All effective information about the stock is subject to the announcement of Shanghai Stock Exchange and Shenzhen Stock Exchange. Please pay attention to the risk. Will Shanghai Airport inject it into the overall listing before the expansion of Hongqiao Airport is completed? Peng Yang, an intern reporter of the Financial Weekly, wrote that 1+1<1. When will this situation occur? It often happens in Shanghai. The most typical case is that since the Shanghai Pudong Airport was put into use in 2000, Shanghai has had a similar "one city and two venues" model with Incheon and Gimpo airports in Seoul, South Korea, and Narita and Haneda airports in Tokyo, Japan, but in 9 years, the result is that the market share of the two airports in the Yangtze River Delta has dropped from 78% to 70%. Moreover, if the much concerned Hongqiao Airport expansion project is expected to be completed by the end of 2009 and试operation in March 2010, the weak attraction of Shanghai Airport's listed assets, Pudong Airport, will be worse. Then, taking advantage of the surging tide of Shanghai's restructuring, will Shanghai Airport (600009. SH) inject it into the overall listing before the expansion of Hongqiao Airport is completed? The industry believes that it is not far from the end of the settlement. "The catalyst for asset injection is approaching" The recent market rumors are getting more and more serious. However, securities companies have begun to write reports recommending Shanghai Airport密集, such as Shenwan said: "Shanghai Airport has entered the rapid growth period, and its long-term hub position has been strengthened. Hongqiao Phase II will be put into operation in March next year, and the catalyst for asset injection is coming, and it will be upgraded to buy rating". Wei Qiang, an analyst of UBS Securities, believes that "the assets of Hongqiao Airport are likely to be injected into Shanghai Airport before March 2010". As early as the shareholders' meeting of Shanghai Airport on June 26, Yu Wuyan, Chairman of Shanghai Airport, made an emergency statement that "the integration of Pudong Airport and Hongqiao Airport is inevitable, but there is no specific timetable at present". The reporter called the staff of the office of Shanghai Airport for this matter, and the reply was that "the company is currently studying the specific integration plan, and there is no specific timetable". "The internal integration of the two airports has basically no problems. At present, the key is to wait for the government to make a decision." According to an securities analyst close to Shanghai Airport, "In fact, as early as 2003, when the two airports reached an asset exchange agreement, they had prepared for the overall listing of Shanghai Airport Group." As early as after the approval of the expansion plan of Hongqiao Airport in 2007, Jia Ruijun, the general manager of Shanghai Airport Group, expressed the logic of the above analysts. It seems that the management has a strong motivation to promote the overall listing of Shanghai Airport. The expansion project of Hongqiao Phase II has been completed, and the terminal building structure has been closed. It will be put into use in March 2010. The above-mentioned securities analysts believe that "It is likely that the assets of Hongqiao Airport will be injected into Shanghai Airport before the completion of Hongqiao Phase II in March next year, which will not violate the commitment made at the beginning of asset injection and share reform". Shenwan's latest research report said that Shanghai Airport may take over Hongqiao Phase II in two ways: one is to inject mature assets such as Hongqiao Phase I into the listed company at the same time; The second is that the listed company leases and uses the assets of Hongqiao Phase II, and then acquires them from the group through financing in the future. "Increase 2009 performance by 25%" The rapid growth period of domestic passenger traffic, the recovery of international passenger traffic, the successful restructuring of Dongfang Airlines and Shanghang, and the proximity of the Expo have undoubtedly injected a catalyst into the integration plan of Shanghai Airport. In 2008, the international and regional航线passengers of the two airports in Shanghai reached 16.48 million, which was significantly higher than the Capital International Airport and the Baiyun Airport in Guangzhou. In addition, the 2010 Expo will bring 6.2 million new passengers to Shanghai, with a growth rate of 12% in new passenger throughput. At present, the main source of income of Shanghai Airport is aviation income, including flight take-off and landing fees, passenger port service fees, ground service fees, etc., while non aviation income only accounts for 30%, and non aviation development is not sufficient. However, with the implementation of the commercial development plan of Pudong Airport, there will be a lot of room for future development in the field of non navigation revenue. According to Shenwan's calculation, the injection of mature assets such as Hongqiao Phase I and cargo stations will increase the performance by 25% in 2009 and 10% - 15% in 2010. The capital expenditure of 15 billion yuan for the second phase of Hongqiao may be operated in a one-time injection or lease, which will have a negative impact on the short-term performance of Shanghai Airport. In this regard, the above-mentioned UBS analyst believes that "the rational coordination of the management of the two major airports in Shanghai will benefit minority shareholders".

content: 全国首个3G手机电视集成播控平台落户华数通讯员沈晓敏昨天下午，华数在北京举办“全国首家3G手机电视集成播控平台成功验收”新闻发布会，宣布华数承建的3G手机电视集成播控平台已经正式获得国家广电总局的测试和验收，并成为全国首家通过国家广电总局验收的手机电视集成播控平台。该平台全称为“华夏手机电视播控平台”，目前至少可承载500家的手机电视内容服务商，并可实现运营商平台的无缝平滑接入。“强大的统一内容生产管理功能，完善的播出监控系统，能确保内容的安全播出。”华数数字电视传媒集团有限公司副总裁赵志峰介绍说。华夏手机电视播控平台秉承开放性、公平性、中立性的原则为运营商和合作伙伴提供专业的服务，目前已与300多家版权内容公司、30多家知名的电视台和互联网公司建立了长期战略合作，推出新闻、娱乐、影视、赛场、时尚等十大特色栏目专区。华数还依托手机电视集成播控平台的丰富内容和强大功能，为三大运营商提供综合门户及各种品牌个性化专区构建和运营服务。早在10年前，华数就开始了三网融合全业务的探索之路。经过十年的发展和积累，华数创新地将“数字电视网、互联网、通信网”进行了融合，开创了融“电视媒体、网络媒体、平面媒体”于一体的“全媒体”。目前华数已建成全国最大的数字节目内容库，储备了数百万小时的精彩视频内容，拥有海量的正版视频内容，这将为华数在三网融合新业务应用的发展提供强有力的支撑。华数目前同时拥有手机电视集成播控平台牌照、IPTV牌照、互联网电视牌照，使得华数具备了在数字电视网、通信网和互联网上开展跨网跨屏融合新业务的资质条件。可以说，目前华数已基本完成了三网融合基础条件的所有积累。作为开放性的平台，华数欢迎持有国家广电总局核发的手机视听节目内容服务牌照的机构加入合作，在平台上建立品牌手机电视专区，为用户提供更为丰富精彩的手机视音频综合应用。未来，3G手机电视将带来视听娱乐的全新生活方式。
en: The first 3G mobile TV integrated broadcasting and control platform in China was stationed in Huashu. Shen Xiaomin, a correspondent, yesterday afternoon, Huashu hosted a news conference in Beijing to announce that the 3G mobile TV integrated broadcasting and control platform built by Huashu had officially passed the test and acceptance of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, and became the first mobile TV integrated broadcasting and control platform in China that had passed the acceptance of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television. The platform, named "China Mobile TV Broadcasting and Control Platform", can currently support at least 500 mobile TV content service providers, and can achieve seamless smooth access of the operator platform. "The powerful unified content production and management function and the complete broadcast monitoring system can ensure the safe broadcast of content." said Zhao Zhifeng, vice president of Huashu Digital Television Media Group Co., Ltd. The China Mobile TV Broadcasting and Control Platform adheres to the principles of openness, fairness and neutrality, and provides professional services to operators and partners. At present, it has established a long-term strategic partnership with more than 300 copyright content companies, dozens of well-known television stations and Internet companies, and launched ten special column areas, including news, entertainment, film and television, sports, and fashion. Huashu also relies on the rich content and powerful functions of the mobile TV integrated broadcasting and control platform to provide comprehensive portal and various brand personalized zone construction and operation services for the three major operators. As early as 10 years ago, China began to explore the road of full service integration of the three networks. After ten years of development and accumulation, Huashu has innovatively integrated "digital television network, Internet, communication network", creating an "all media" integrating "television media, network media, print media". At present, Huashu has built the largest digital program content library in China, with millions of hours of exciting video content and a huge amount of legal video content, which will provide strong support for the development of Huashu in the development of new business applications in the integration of the three networks. At present, Huashu also has the mobile TV integrated broadcasting and control platform license, IPTV license and Internet TV license, which makes Huashu qualified to carry out cross network and cross screen integration of new businesses on the digital television network, communication network and Internet. It can be said that Huashu has basically completed all the accumulation of basic conditions for the integration of the three networks at present. As an open platform, Huashu welcomes the institutions with the mobile audio and video content service license issued by the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television to join the cooperation, establish the brand mobile TV special zone on the platform, and provide users with more rich and wonderful mobile audio and video composite applications. In the future, 3G mobile TV will bring a new lifestyle of audio-visual entertainment.

content: 经纪人确认中国前锋近期签葡超伤病令他彻底无缘备战新浪体育讯　如果没有随国奥队参加夏季的一系列热身赛事，效力于葡超升班马贝拉马尔的前锋王刚本来可以在家中度过一个愉快的暑假，而现在，他也应该早已回到葡萄牙，随队在外地进行一系列的备战以及比赛。然而一心穿上国字号球衣的王刚却在夏天的比赛中遭遇了伤病的意外，这次伤病不仅让他基本无缘贝拉马尔赛季前的备战训练营，甚至葡萄牙媒体称，这将有可能影响到他最终与贝拉马尔签订新赛季的工作合同。尽管在接受了核磁共振的检查后王刚的伤势并无大碍，但在回到葡萄牙的前几天，心情不太好的王刚仍然选择了独处。20日，是之前王刚说要回到葡萄牙阿威罗的日子。但根据他的经纪人透露，他并未直接与贝拉马尔汇合，而是将在阿威罗独自进行恢复，这也意味着，王刚很可能将错过葡超赛季前的整个备战期。不过经纪人稍后给出了一个让人欣慰一些的消息，那就是王刚的伤情没有葡萄牙媒体说的这么严重，并且不会影响到他新赛季征战葡超。他透露，在贝拉马尔结束夏训营返回阿威罗后，王刚将与球队正式签订新赛季的工作合同。另外针对于记者所关心的“王刚11月是否会回国参加亚运会”的问题，经纪人也给出了解释：“现在王刚的身体情况还没法最后的确定，还要看他伤势恢复的情况，但如果一切顺利的话，他仍然将参加在广州举行的亚运会足球赛。”(孟晓雨)
en: The agent confirmed that the recent signing of the Portuguese Super Injury by the Chinese forward made him completely unprepared for the Sina Sports News. If he had not joined the national Olympic team to participate in a series of warm-up events in summer, Wang Gang, the forward who played for the Portuguese Super提拔horse Belamar, would have spent a pleasant summer holiday at home, and now, he should have returned to Portugal to prepare and play with the team. However, Wang Gang, who was determined to wear the national team's jersey, suffered an unexpected injury in the summer game. This injury not only made him almost无缘to the pre season training camp of Belamar, but the Portuguese media even said that it could affect his signing of the new season's work contract with Belamar. Although Wang Gang's injury was not serious after he received a magnetic resonance examination, he still chose to be alone a few days before he returned to Portugal. On the 20th, it was the day when Wang Gang said he would return to Aveiro, Portugal. But according to his agent, he did not directly join Belamar, but he will recover alone in Aviero, which means that Wang Gang is likely to miss the whole preparation period before the Portuguese Super Season. However, the agent later gave a piece of good news, that is, Wang Gang's injury was not as serious as the Portuguese media said, and it would not affect his new season's campaign in the Portuguese Super League. He revealed that after Belamar ended the summer training camp and returned to Aweiluo, Wang Gang would officially sign a new season's work contract with the team. In addition, the agent also gave an explanation to the journalist's concern about whether Wang Gang will return to China to participate in the Asian Games in November: "Now Wang Gang's physical condition has not been finally determined, and it depends on the recovery of his injury, but if everything goes well, he will still participate in the Asian Games football tournament held in Guangzhou." (Meng Xiaoyu)

content: 上海证券：11月份PPI数据点评证券通PPI涨幅迅速回落超出市场预期11月份，工业品出厂价格指数同比增幅仅为2.0%，大大超出市场预期。生产资料出厂价格指数同比增幅继续快速回落，而生活资料出厂价格回落速度继续小于生产资料价格。CPI的回落幅度会继续小于PPI的回落幅度。原材料价格涨幅伴随国际大宗商品价格回落国内原材料、燃料、动力价格与国际大宗商品价格走势具有较强的趋同性，由于“订单效应”的滞后影响，国内的价格一般要滞后国际价格2-3个月。在国际市场大宗商品价格未现回暖迹象的情况下，后期国内的原材料价格指数还会延续下降的态势。关注PPI关注工业企业收入对于工业企业来讲，原材料价格涨幅回落应该是好消息，因为企业的生产成本会逐渐下降。但与此同时，作为收入来源的工业品出厂价格涨幅的快速下滑则导致工业企业的经营状况前景堪忧。PPI是工业企业收入的Granger原因，即工业品出厂价格的变化是工业企业收入变化的原因。在关注原材料下降的同时，我们更要关注PPI下降带给工业企业的不利影响。下一交易日大盘走势判断您目前的仓位
en: Shanghai Stock Exchange: In November, the PPI data commented that the securities通PPI rose rapidly, which fell back beyond market expectations. In November, the year-on-year growth rate of the factory price index of industrial products was only 2.0%, far exceeding market expectations. The year-on-year growth rate of production data factory price index continued to decline rapidly, while the factory price of living goods continued to decline less than that of production data price. The decline of CPI will continue to be less than that of PPI. The increase of raw material prices accompanied by the decline of international commodity prices, the domestic raw material, fuel and power prices have strong convergence with the international commodity prices. Due to the lag effect of "order effect", the domestic prices generally lag behind the international prices by 2-3 months. In the case of no sign of warming in the international market of commodity prices, the later raw material price index in China will continue to decline. Pay attention to PPI and pay attention to the income of industrial enterprises. For industrial enterprises, the retreat of raw material price increases should be good news, because the production costs of enterprises will gradually decrease. However, at the same time, the rapid decline of the increase in the factory price of industrial products, which is the source of income, leads to worrying prospects for the operation of industrial enterprises. PPI is the Granger cause of the income of industrial enterprises, that is, the change of the factory price of industrial products is the cause of the change of the income of industrial enterprises. While paying attention to the decline of raw materials, we should pay more attention to the adverse effects of the decline of PPI on industrial enterprises. Judgment on the trend of the market in the next trading day, your current position

content: SNB强悍商务本ThinkPadT420报价9200元ThinkPadT系列几乎囊括了Thinkpad中几乎所有的最新商务计算机技术。今天为大家推荐按的ThinkPadT420(参数图片文章论坛)4180J4C，已经升级到了英特尔SNB平台，搭载了酷睿i5-2410M处理器，采用全新NVIDIAQuadroNVS4200M独立显卡。现在该本的报价为9200元，关注的朋友不妨考虑一下。ThinkPadT4204180J4C笔记本整体还是采用了那个让人熟悉的“黑色方盒子”造型，不断的传承也让它成为了经典。顶盖的磨砂喷漆工艺不仅拥有很好的触感，而且也让整机显得十分大气沉稳；lenovo和ThinkPadlogo分别占据了顶盖的两个角落，一黑一白，错落有致。这款产品坚持使用传统的合页转轴，不锈钢的材质让它对屏幕有稳定的支撑，在使用的时候亦不会轻易晃动。配置上，联想ThinkPadT4204180J4C笔记本搭载了英特尔酷睿i5-2410M处理器，英特尔QM67主板芯片，NVIDIAQuadroNVS4200M独立显卡，支持双显卡切换技术；标配3GB内存、500GB高速硬盘，内置DVD刻录光驱；集成1000Mbps以太网卡、蓝牙模块、ExpressCard插槽、4合1读卡器；配备6芯锂电池，预装Windows7HomeBasic(家庭普通版)操作系统。ThinkPadT420/T系列采用2GBDDR3独立显存的英伟达TM(NVIDIA(R))高端专业Quadro独立显卡，大幅提升性能指数。ThinkPadT420所采用的英伟达TM(NVIDIA(R))优驰TM(OptimusTM)技术更是一项开拓性的新创举，该技术支持智能无缝双显卡切换，将独显的超强性能和集显超长电池续航时间融合于一身。这项技术不但赋予ThinkPad笔记本更强劲的图形处理能力，包括3D性能、物理计算以及强大的CUDA并行处理能力，更可以助力用户在日常工作中实现完全无需人工干预而进行智能切换，使得工作效率大幅度提高。搭载英伟达TM(NVIDIA(R))优驰TM(OptimusTM)技术的全新ThinkPadT420/T系列商用笔记本，更将电池续航时间延长高达33%以上。这意味着每次充满电之后，拥有Optimus技术的ThinkPad就能将续航时间提升一小时，加上ThinkPad支持WLAN、WWAN、蓝牙等多重网络无线通信解决方案，让您的极致思考随时随地呈现！ThinkPadT4204180J4C笔记本定位于高端商务，是ThinkPad最新的旗舰机型，因此它在配置、做工、使用舒适度等方面都十分出色，足以满足商务人士对于笔记本的严苛要求。目前其不足万元的售价也不是很高，在高端商务市场还是相当有竞争力的。[联系方式](010-62682102)
en: SNB's powerful business ThinkPadT420 is quoted at 9200 yuan. The ThinkPadT series covers almost all the latest business computer technologies in Thinkpad. Today, I would like to recommend ThinkPadT420 (parameter picture article forum) 4180J4C, which has been upgraded to Intel SNB platform and is equipped with Core i5-2410M processor and a new NVIDIAQuadroNVS4200M independent graphics card. Now the quotation of this notebook is 9200 yuan, so you may consider it. ThinkPadT4204180J4C notebook still adopts the familiar "black box" shape, and the continuous inheritance has also made it a classic. The frosted spraying process of the top cover not only has a good feel, but also makes the whole machine very atmospheric and stable; Lenovo and ThinkPad logos occupy two corners of the top cover respectively, one black and one white, in a well-spaced way. This product is committed to using the traditional hinge shaft, and the stainless steel material gives it a stable support for the screen, which will not shake easily when in use. In terms of configuration, Lenovo ThinkPadT4204180J4C notebook is equipped with Intel Core i5-2410M processor, Intel QM67 motherboard chip, NVIDIAQuadroNVS4200M independent graphics card, and supports dual graphics card switching technology; Standard 3GB memory, 500GB high-speed hard disk, built-in DVD recording drive; Integrated 1000Mbps Ethernet card, Bluetooth module, ExpressCard slot, 4-in-1 card reader; Equipped with 6-cell lithium battery, preinstalled with Windows7HomeBasic (Home General Edition) operating system. ThinkPadT420/T series adopts NVIDIA TM (NVIDIA(R)) high-end professional Quadro independent graphics card with 2GB DDR3 independent video memory, which greatly improves the performance index. The NVIDIA TM (NVIDIA(R)) OptimalCheng TM (OptimusTM) technology adopted by ThinkPadT420 is another pioneering innovation. This technology supports intelligent seamless dual graphics card switching, integrating the super performance of the independent graphics card and the ultra-long battery life of the integrated graphics card into one. This technology not only gives ThinkPad notebook更强onger graphic processing ability, including 3D performance, physical computing and powerful CUDA parallel processing ability, but also can help users realize intelligent switching without manual intervention in their daily work, which greatly improves the working efficiency. The new ThinkPadT420/T series commercial notebook equipped with NVIDIA TM (NVIDIA(R)) OptimalCheng TM (OptimusTM) technology has extended the battery life by more than 33%. This means that every time after charging, the ThinkPad with Optimus technology can increase the battery life by one hour. With ThinkPad supporting WLAN, WWAN, Bluetooth and other multi-network wireless communication solutions, your extreme thinking can be presented anytime and anywhere! ThinkPadT4204180J4C notebook is positioned at high-end business. It is the latest flagship model of ThinkPad, so it is excellent in terms of configuration, workmanship and comfort, which is enough to meet the strict requirements of business people for notebooks. At present, its price of less than 10000 yuan is not very high, and it is still quite competitive in the high-end business market. [Contact] (010-62682102)

content: 62平时尚家扩容狭小空间(组图)这是一个仅有62平米的小公寓，但是“麻雀虽小、五脏俱全”。它有独立的餐厅、厨房、卫浴、客厅空间，还开辟出两个卧室，其中一个有两个床位，这是为双胞胎儿子而设计的。更为神奇的是，它不仅功能齐全，“红+白”的色彩搭配，让小户型完全逃脱“乌云蔽日”的暗淡，时尚气息十足。让我们去看看，它是如何做到的吧！
en: 62 Ping Fashion Home expands small space (photo) This is a small apartment of only 62 Ping, but "sparrow is small and has all five internal organs". It has an independent dining room, kitchen, bathroom, living room space, and two bedrooms, one of which has two beds, which is designed for twin sons. More magically, it is not only functional, but the color matching of "red + white" makes the small apartment completely escape the dimness of "clouds遮sun", with a lot of fashion. Let's see how it did it!

content: 中兴两个月完成印GSM网800站点商用【通信产业网讯】(通文)两个月内完成800个站点的商用，平均每月快速建设400个站，AircelGSM网络项目一系列的超常规成绩，正是中兴通讯积极响应、深入客户、深入基层等各种有效措施的结果，得以对实践中遇到的困难迎刃而解。与中国毗邻的印度位于南亚次大陆，面积约298万平方公里，人口11.66亿。印度经济以传统耕种、现代农业、手工业、现代工业以及其他支撑产业为主。在印度，通信市场潜力巨大，同时，市场的开放性也吸引了众多运营商参与其中，竞争日益激烈。Aircel是东南亚地区新兴移动运营商Maxis集团在印度的控股子公司，其74%的股份由Maxis所有。目前，Aircel在印度共拥有1960万用户，作为印度领先的移动网络服务商，Aircel提供的服务已经覆盖印度10个邦，目前正计划覆盖全印度，Aircel将宏伟目标的起步首先定位于提升GSM网络质量、扩容GSM网络规模。2个月商用800个站2008年10月10日，跨国运营商Maxis与中兴通讯签订GSM网络承建合同，中兴通讯将为Maxis在印度的控股子公司Aircel建设GSM网络。AircelGSM项目是综合全TurnkeyGSM网络建设，中兴通讯将提供MSCserver、MGW、iBSC、5000多个站点，以及配套的微波、电源和站点基建部分，并负责所有站点规划、网络优化以及为期三年的网络运维。让Aircel意想不到的是本次GSM网络建设超常规的高效率，中兴通讯在两个月内即完成了800个站点的商用，其中包括300个全TK站点。2009年10月31日，网络建设已实现3203个站点完成安装，开通3163个站点，验收1611个站点。印度Aircel全TurnkeyGSM项目，平均每月快速建设400个站，包括35%的Turnkey站点的快速交付，一系列突出业绩来自于中兴通讯对中方和本地人力资源的良好管理、区域优势的有效发挥、充分的跨文化沟通和交流，以及对外包合作伙伴的技能培训和技术转移。
en: ZTE completed the printing of 800 sites in two months【 Communication Industry News】(Communication Wen)Completed 800 sites in two months for commercial use, averaging 400 stations per month, a series of unconventional achievements of the AircelGSM network project, which was exactly the result of ZTE's positive response, in-depth customers, in-depth grassroots and other effective measures, to solve the difficulties encountered in practice. India, which borders on China, is located in the South Asian subcontinent, with an area of about 2.98 million square kilometers and a population of 1.166 billion. The Indian economy is mainly based on traditional farming, modern agriculture, handicrafts, modern industry and other supporting industries. In India, the communication market has huge potential. At the same time, the openness of the market has also attracted many operators to participate in it, and the competition is becoming increasingly fierce. Aircel is a holding subsidiary of Maxis Group, a new mobile operator in Southeast Asia, in India, 74% of which is owned by Maxis. At present, Aircel has a total of 19.6 million users in India. As a leading mobile network service provider in India, the service provided by Aircel has covered 10 states in India. At present, it is planned to cover all India. Aircel will first focus on improving the quality of GSM network and expanding the scale of GSM network to start the ambitious goal. On October 10, 2008, the multinational operator Maxis signed a GSM network construction contract with ZTE, and ZTE will build a GSM network for Aircel, a holding subsidiary of Maxis in India. AircelGSM project is a comprehensive turnkey GSM network construction. ZTE will provide MSCserver, MGW, iBSC, more than 5000 sites, as well as microwave, power supply and site infrastructure, and is responsible for site planning, network optimization and three-year network operation and maintenance. Unexpectedly, Aircel did not expect the unconventional high efficiency of this GSM network construction. ZTE completed the commercial use of 800 stations in two months, including 300 full TK stations. On October 31, 2009, the network construction had achieved 3203 installed sites, 3163 opened sites and 1611 accepted sites. The full turnkeyGSM project of Aircel in India is to build 400 stations rapidly on average every month, including 35% of the turnkey stations for rapid delivery. A series of outstanding achievements come from ZTE's good management of Chinese and local human resources, effective play of regional advantages, sufficient cross-cultural communication and exchange, and skill training and technology transfer for outsourcing partners.

content: 国米名将质疑里皮弃召米兰锋霸意大利一漏洞恐难挽回新浪体育讯　意大利成为了世界杯32强当中倒数第三个公布名单的国家，国家队23人名单公布，最终，西里古、科苏、卡萨尼、博列洛、G-罗西成为了最后的落选者。虽然此前的格罗索的落选引起了不小的震动，但起码争议并不是很大，但这次的五个落选者，却引来了不少的质疑。被质疑最多的是博列洛的落选，尽管名宿巴齐解释说：“里皮是想要一个和吉拉迪诺特点类似的替补，因此选择了帕奇尼，放弃了博列洛。”但前国际米兰球星贝卡罗西还是感到可惜：“我知道里皮倾向于吉拉迪诺，但我还是觉得，博列洛拥有一个优秀的赛季。”其实问题倒不是在于里皮的选择究竟是帕奇尼还是博列洛，而是博列洛和朱塞佩-罗西的确是两位有实力的球员，而他俩都落选之后，首先，意大利失去了一种强力中锋的打法，其次，迪纳塔莱唯一的替补没了。在前锋线上，意大利只有吉拉迪诺、帕奇尼、亚昆塔、迪纳塔莱、夸利亚雷拉五个人，的确有些过于单薄。而这其中，意大利媒体此前都预测锋线的落选者肯定会有夸利亚雷拉，而罗西和博列洛将“竞争”一个名额，结果里皮的选择令所有人感到意外。从里皮的选择来看，他还是希望以4-3-3主打，相比于罗西，夸利亚雷拉是一个真正的边锋，但里皮的首选一定还是亚昆塔和迪纳塔莱，一旦两人当中有一人出现伤停，里皮真的敢用状态平平的夸利亚雷拉么？如果这样，即便里皮人为排除了卡萨诺，但为何不选入巴洛特利呢？科苏的落选早在媒体的预料之中，但还是一件令人纠结的事情，一旦意大利需要变阵添一个前腰，目前唯一的人选就只剩下了卡莫拉内西，但相比于赛季助攻12球，并有一脚远射绝活的科苏，已经长起了小肚腩的卡莫拉内西的确是状态太差了，在经验和状态之间选择了前者，不知道里皮做出的是否是正确的选择。在后卫线上，卡萨尼的落选同样有一些疑问。目前，里皮仅拥有7名后卫，其中包括卡纳瓦罗、基耶利尼、博努奇、博凯蒂四名中后卫，马乔、克里西托、赞布罗塔三名边后卫，但三名边后卫中，马乔和克里西托在俱乐部分别打的是3-5-2和3-4-3阵型中的边卫，与4-4-2当中的边卫大相径庭，赞布罗塔的定位还是替补，就算里皮将基耶利尼移到了左路，但基耶利尼在俱乐部打左后卫时还是在卡佩罗执教尤文时代，而他打左后卫的水平比起其后来打中后卫差距很大，这样做，既削弱了基耶利尼，又削弱了意大利的中卫位置。而缺少一个真正的边后卫的问题，很可能将成为意大利在世界杯上一个无可挽回的漏洞。(沈飞)
person: 卡佩罗,迪纳塔莱,马乔,巴洛特利,巴齐,亚昆塔,G-罗西,博凯蒂,贝卡罗西,夸利亚雷拉,朱塞佩-罗西,吉拉迪诺,卡萨诺,科苏,卡纳瓦罗,克里西托,基耶利尼,里皮,沈飞,博列洛,罗西,帕奇尼,卡莫拉内西,赞布罗塔,博努奇,西里古
en: The Inter Milan veteran questioned that Marcelo Lippi had abandoned the Milan sharpshooters, and Italy had a loophole that was hard to挽回Sina Sports News. Italy was the third country in the world to announce the list of 32 strongest teams. The list of 23 national team members was announced. Finally, Siliu, Cossu, Casani, Bolletto, G-Rossi became the last losers. Although the defeat of the previous Grosso caused considerable shock, the controversy was not very great. However, the five losers this time have caused a lot of doubts. The most questioned one is Bollelo's defeat. Although the veteran Bazi explained that "Lippi wanted a substitute with the same characteristics as Gilardino, so he chose Pachini and abandoned Bollelo." But the former Inter Milan star, Becarossi, still felt sorry: "I know Lippi is in favor of Gilardino, but I still think Bollelo has an excellent season." In fact, the problem is not that Lippi's choice is either Pachini or Bollelo, but Bollelo and Giuseppe Rossi are indeed two powerful players. After their two defeats, first of all, Italy lost a powerful center forward, and secondly, Di Natala's only substitute was gone. On the forward line, Italy only has five people, Giardino, Pachini, Aquafina, Di Natale and Quagliarella, which is really too thin. Among them, the Italian media previously predicted that the loser of the front line must be Quagliarella, and Rossi and Bollello will "compete" for a place. The result of Lippi's choice surprised everyone. From Lippi's choice, he still wants to play 4-3-3 as the main game. Compared with Rossi, Quagliarella is a real winger, but Lippi's first choice must still be Aquafina and Di Natale. Once one of them is injured, does Lippi really dare to use the mediocre Quagliarella? If so, even if Lippi excludes Cassano, why not choose Balotelli? Cossu's defeat has been expected by the media, but it is still a dilemma. Once Italy needs to change its formation to add a midfielder, there is only one candidate left, Camoranesi. However, compared with Cossu, who has 12 assists in the season and a long shot, Camoranesi, who has grown a small belly, is really in poor condition. I don't know if it is the right choice for Lippi to choose the former between experience and state. There are also some questions about the defeat of Cassani in the defensive line. At present, Lippi only has seven defenders, including four central defenders, Cannavaro, Chiellini, Bonucci, and Bochetti, and three full backs, Majue, Critto, and Zambrotta. However, among the three full backs, Majue and Critto play as full backs in the 3-5-2 and 3-4-3 formation of the club, which is quite different from the full back in the 4-4-2, and Zambrotta is still a substitute. Even if Lippi moves Chiellini to the left, Chiellini still plays as a left back in the club when Capello is coaching Juventus. However, his level of playing as a left back is far less than that of his later playing as a central defender. This will weaken Chiellini and Italy's central defender position. The lack of a real full back is likely to become an irretrievable loophole for Italy in the World Cup. (Shen Fei)

content: 50%唐正东究竟什么状态？每两分钟就能进1球抢1板新浪体育讯　北京时间10月29日消息，中国男篮在宁波北仑迎战亚运前的另一个热身对手美国明星队，最终中国队以92比64战胜了对手，取得了本次系列热身赛的首场胜利。唐正东本场比赛发挥出色，在出场13分钟的时间里就拿下了7分7个篮板。第三节比赛还有5分钟，朱芳雨在上线吸引防守之后交给了唐正东。此时，唐正东的身边并没有防守人，他犹豫了一下并没有马上进攻，美国明星队的防守球员很快合围过来，形成了三人包夹之势，唐正东转身强攻造成了对手的犯规。这样的一次进攻充分展现了唐正东现在的状态，在因伤离开赛场了一段时间之后，唐正东在场上的感觉还没有达到最佳状态，他在比赛中的攻防选择中还有一些犹豫，速度还有些慢。不过在这支美国明星队面前，唐正东的身高和体重仍然占据着绝对的优势，即使是三人合围，对手也只能用犯规来阻挡他的进攻。身高和体重上的优势，唐正东还会延续到亚洲赛场，只不过他需要赶快找到比赛场上的感觉，把脚步移动的速度提上来才行。虽然唐正东的状态并没有达到最佳，但有一点是可以肯定的，现在的大唐很努力。第三节还有3分42秒，唐正东在一次和对方争抢篮板当中倒地救球，要知道，这已经是他在本场比赛的第二次倒地救球了，这样的场面，即使是在唐正东状态稳稳的时候也没有看到，更何况现在他的膝伤还没有完全痊愈。至少从这点可以看出唐正东的努力态度。持球背身进攻，抢到前场篮板之后的二次进攻，妙传对手的助攻，尽管出场时间并不算太多，但唐正东已经在这场比赛中充分展现出了他在内线的威慑力。如果拿现在的表现和巅峰时的唐正东相比，只能说他刚刚恢复了50%，就算这样，他的效率平均下来也是不到两分钟就能拿下1分1个篮板了。央视的著名评论员苏群谈到唐正东的表现时说到：“在离开了赛场这么久之后，唐正东有99%的可能都会去打亚运会，特别是在苏伟因伤不能打的时候，这对他来说是个非常不错的表现机会。”唐正东上一次穿着国家队的战袍征战在国际赛场上，还要追溯到2006年的多哈亚运会。可那次经历对于唐正东来说却是不堪回首的。当时国家队的主帅还是脾气有些固执的尤纳斯，他只给了唐正东一场的表现机会，便彻底将大唐按在了板凳上。从那开始，唐正东就彻底跌入了低谷，他在联赛中不断遭遇伤病的困扰，国家队的集训更总是与他擦肩而过。现在，从伤病中走出来的唐正东终于有机会在亚运赛场上证明自己了，姚明和易建联因为征战NBA不能出战，苏伟又因伤不能打。对于唐正东来说，这也许是他职业生涯中最重要的一个转折点了。(乳娃娃)
person: 朱芳雨,唐正东,尤纳斯,姚明,苏群,易建联,苏伟
en: What is the status of 50% Dong Tang? Sina Sports News On October 29, Beijing time, the Chinese men's basketball team played against another warm-up opponent, the American All-Star Team, before the Asian Games. Finally, the Chinese team defeated the opponent 92-64, winning the first victory of this series of warm-up matches. Dong Tang played well in this game, scoring 7 points and 7 rebounds in 13 minutes. With 5 minutes left in the third quarter, Zhu Fangyu gave it to Dong Tang after coming online to attract defense. At this time, there was no defender around Dong Tang, and he hesitated to attack immediately. The defensive players of the American All-Star Team quickly surrounded him to form a three man siege. Dong Tang turned to attack and caused the opponent to foul. This attack fully demonstrates the current status of Dong Tang. After leaving the court for some time due to injury, Dong Tang's feeling on the court has not reached the best state. He still has some hesitation in his choice of attack and defense in the game, and his speed is still slow. However, in front of this American All-Star Team, Dong Tang's height and weight still occupy an absolute advantage. Even if three people surround him, the opponent can only use fouls to stop his attack. Dong Tang's height and weight advantages will continue to extend to the Asian arena. He just needs to find the feeling on the court as soon as possible and speed up his foot movement. Although Dong Tang's status has not reached the best, one thing is for sure, the Datang now is very hard. With 3:42 seconds left in the third quarter, Dong Tang fell down to save the ball in a contest with the other side for rebounds. It should be noted that this was his second fall in this game to save the ball. Such a scene was not seen even when Dong Tang was in stable condition, let alone that his knee injury has not fully recovered now. At least from this point, we can see the efforts of Dong Tang. Holding the ball back to attack, the second attack after getting the front court rebound, and the wonderful pass to assist the opponent, although the playing time is not too much, Dong Tang has fully demonstrated his threat in the interior in this game. If the current performance is compared with the peak of Dong Tang, it can only be said that he has just recovered 50%. Even so, his average efficiency is less than two minutes to get 1 point and 1 rebound. Su Qun, a famous commentator of CCTV, talked about the performance of Dong Tang, saying: "After leaving the court for so long, Dong Tang has a 99% chance of going to the Asian Games, especially when Su Wei can't play due to injury. This is a very good opportunity for him to perform." Dong Tang last wore the national team's battle uniform to fight on the international stage, which can be traced back to the 2006 Doha Asian Games. But that experience was unbearable for Dong Tang. At that time, the head coach of the national team was Yonas, who was a bit stubborn. He only gave Dong Tang a chance to perform, and completely pressed Datang on the bench. From then on, Dong Tang completely fell into a low谷. He was constantly troubled by injuries in the league, and the national team's training always passed him by. Now, Dong Tang, who has come out from the injury, finally has the opportunity to prove himself in the Asian Games. Yao Ming and Yi Jianlian can not play because of the fight in the NBA, and Su Wei can not play because of injury. For Dong Tang, this may be the most important turning point in his career. (Baby)

content: 唯美设计索爱810万像素新机即将上市索尼爱立信的这款拍照新机，外形相当养眼，功能配置格外惊人。预计在今年1月29日就会由运营商KDDI/au定制发售，相当令人眼馋呀。索尼爱立信S001整体设计有C905的影子，尤其是在机身摄像头的镜头盖的处理上更是异曲同工。索尼爱立信为这款手机提供了橄榄绿、粉红色、黑色三种颜色可选。机身正面配备了3.3英寸FWVGA级别480×854像素超高分辨率26万色AMOLED屏幕。同时更配备了810万相似的摄像头，不但支持自动对焦，防抖、BestPic、SmartContrast、脸部识别功能以外，还将具备微笑快门功能，更配备了Xenon闪光灯和自拍镜。支持microSD存储卡扩展等等。
en: The new 8.1 million pixel唯美design Soai is going to be launched. This new camera of Sony Ericsson is very beautiful in appearance and amazing in function configuration. It is expected that the operator KDDI/au will customize and release it on January 29, which is quite greedy. Sony Ericsson S001's overall design has the shadow of C905, especially the processing of the lens cover of the camera is quite different. Sony Ericsson provides three colors for this mobile phone, namely olive green, pink and black. The front of the fuselage is equipped with a 3.3 inch FWVGA level 480x854 pixel super high resolution 260000 color AMOLED screen. It is also equipped with an 8.1 million similar camera, which not only supports autofocus, anti-shake, BestPic, SmartContrast, face recognition, but also has a smile shutter function, and is equipped with Xenon flash and self portrait mirror. Support microSD storage card expansion and so on.

content: 国奥惨败后集体拒绝采访教练组紧锁房门未进晚餐新浪体育讯　0-3，这是国奥队与韩国队比赛之前没有人想到的结果。就在三天之前，这支韩国球队还以1-4的大比分负于中国香港队。面对这样的结局，中国国奥队在赛后集体失声，晚餐时分教练组更是没有一个人下楼用餐。本场比赛吸引了很多国内的记者前来采访，因为大家都是冲着中国足球能够打破20年逢韩不胜的纪录来的。可是，最终大家又一次见证了中国足球的耻辱。比赛结束之后，主教练刘春明在发布会耐心地接受大家的采访。由于提问的记者很多，发布会结束之后，当记者们匆匆赶到混合采访区的时候，发现这里空无一人。正以为国奥已经走光的时候，志愿者告诉大家，国奥队还没有出来。直到发布会结束将近10分钟之后，国奥队的一行人才默默从休息室的通道内走出来。打头阵的是于洋等一些没有上场的替补，随着当主力队员走出来之后，面对等候在混采的记者们，大家都脚步匆匆地离开，即使偶尔有一两个人被拉住，也是面露难色地近乎用哀求的声音说到：哥，别采了，没啥好说的，而且也不让说。到底是谁不让说，还是借口。随后等候在混区的记者又拉住了两个队员，得到的回答一致的：队里真不让说。事实上就在比赛之前的踩场训练之时，国奥队就已经拒绝了一次媒体采访。即使是面对中央电视台的镜头，国奥队也以代表团有统一规定，只能在新闻发布会与混合采访区接受采访为由拒绝了赛前采访。可是，赛后在混合区，竟然冒出了“不让接受采访”的声音，队员们撇下这一句话之后，就匆匆跑上了大巴车，最后从休息室走出来的是领队李晓光，当记者们询问是不是不让接受采访之时，李晓光一脸疑惑：不能啊，没有啊。随后，有4家媒体再次来到了国奥队下榻的酒店。国奥队吃饭的时候是晚上10点30分，到了用餐的时候，队员们依旧一副失落的表情走进了餐厅。即使面对相熟的记者，也只是偶尔站住低声聊上几句。无奈之下，记者们只能来到楼上向询问个究竟。领队李晓光在了解了整个经过之后进行了解释：“之前代表团确实有规定，只能在发布会和混合采访区接受采访，所以赛前按照规定没有接受采访。但今天绝对没有说不让队员说话，应该是队员们心情不好。毕竟输了球，又是大比分，孩子们都很难过，这是可以理解的。但下一场保证会安排球员配合采访，即使是再输球、即使是队员们心情不好，自己也会把他们从大巴车上叫下来。”队员们没有心情接受采访，教练组则连吃饭的心情都没有了。直到队员们用过晚餐之后，几位教练也都没有走出房门，看来这个夜晚对于国奥来说，注定又是一个苦涩的难眠之夜。(宋词发自香港)
person: 宋词,于洋,刘春明,李晓光
en: After the national Olympic team's defeat, the whole team refused to interview the coaching staff, locked the door and did not have dinner Sina Sports News 0-3, which was an unexpected result before the national Olympic team and the South Korean team. Just three days ago, this South Korean team lost to the Chinese Hong Kong team by a big score of 1-4. Faced with such an outcome, the Chinese Olympic team collectively lost their voice after the game, and no one in the coaching staff came downstairs for dinner at dinner time. This game has attracted many domestic journalists to interview, because everyone is aiming at China's football team to break the record of not winning in 20 years. However, once again, everyone witnessed the shame of Chinese football. After the game, the head coach Liu Chunming patiently accepted everyone's interview at the press conference. Because there were many journalists who asked questions, after the press conference, when the journalists hurried to the mixed interview area, they found that there was no one here. Just when I thought the National Olympic Team had lost all its money, the volunteers told everyone that the National Olympic Team had not come out. Nearly 10 minutes after the press conference ended, a group of people from the National Olympic Team quietly came out from the channel of the rest room. Yu Yang and some substitutes who did not play the leading role. When the main players come out, they all leave in a hurry when they face the waiting reporters in the mixed interview.
