大师大势解读：马竞顾杯赛恐失联赛国米主胜作胆1、博洛尼VS那不勒推荐10欧洲平均赔率：2.82-3.06-2.49。依据博洛尼亚的实力，打出最近不错的战绩，说明了球队的状态值得称赞，上轮客场4:3逆转热那亚后，球队已经脱离了降级区，但球队会状态不易保持。那不勒斯上轮即使主场2:2战平罗马，但球队最近的攻击乏力依然很明显，加之防守上始终不令人放心，如本轮能有效解决，客胜不是没有可能。亚盘开出的受让平/半盘，首选1，次选0。2、锡耶纳VS帕尔玛推荐31欧洲平均赔率：2.20-3.11-3.25。锡耶纳此前3轮2胜1平，保级的希望不是没有，从最近几轮主场的表现来看，他们还具备一定的战斗力。反观帕尔玛上轮一球拿下桑普后，结束联赛9轮不胜，即便如此，也不能掩盖后防不稳的毛病。亚盘开出的平/半盘中低水，水位有上升的趋势，映照出本轮平局的可能性很大，首选1，次选3。3、巴里VS切沃推荐31欧洲平均赔率：2.00-3.18-3.71。巴里经历赛季初的凶猛，最近几轮渐渐归于平淡，上轮更是4球负于卡塔尼亚，本轮主场对阵切沃，不容有失。切沃上轮2:1战胜卡利亚里后，球队取得两连胜，状态保持得不错，但受困于整体实力等因素，很难在巴里的主场有所作为。亚盘由初盘的半球高水到即时受注后的平/半盘低水，巴里有望迎来反弹。4、巴勒莫VS利沃诺推荐3欧洲平均赔率：1.50-3.75-6.79。上轮客场掀翻尤文后，巴勒莫目前位居联赛第四，本赛季的主场还未有失手加上边路进攻的体系日益成熟，让远道而来的利沃诺难有取胜的机会。利沃诺后卫莫罗、里瓦斯本轮停赛，后防残缺不全，加之客场作战，亚盘开出的一球盘中水，胜负没有悬念。5、亚特兰VS乌迪内推荐30欧洲平均赔率：2.29-3.10-3.09。老鹰的锋线在3:0大胜拉齐奥后，就陷入了沉寂，加之后防不稳，直接导致最近几轮成绩下滑，本轮面对最为直接的保级对手，不敢掉以轻心。乌鸡本赛季通过防反战术并取得一定的成效，但迪纳塔莱缺阵给本轮客场之旅蒙上了一层阴影。亚盘开出的平/半盘中高水，看好两队分出胜负。6、卡利亚VS卡塔尼推荐31欧洲平均赔率：1.98-3.18-3.81。上轮客场被切沃逆转，卡利亚里经历了两连败，球队排名有些下滑，但主场的卡利亚里此前10轮7胜3平的战绩堪称魔鬼，本轮迎战一向在客场打反击的卡塔尼亚，只要立足于防守，客队取胜的希望渺茫。亚盘开出的半球盘中高水，首选1，次选3。7、国米VS热那亚推荐3欧洲平均赔率：1.40-4.18-7.88。国米上轮3:2有惊无险拿下主场战绩不错的乌鸡后，与排名第二的米兰仅有4分之差，本轮坐拥主场，不会放过任何一个主场拿分的机会来巩固榜首位置。热那亚上轮主场被博洛尼亚逆转后，士气受到一定的影响，加之客场作战、排名稳居中游等因素给本轮作战的战意提出了疑问。亚盘由初盘的一球/球半盘中高水到即时受注后的一球盘低水，降盘降水，国米取胜不是什么问题。8、桑普多VS拉齐奥推荐3欧洲平均赔率：2.07-3.14-3.55。桑普上轮一球小负帕尔玛后，球队结束6轮不败，本轮迎战蓝鹰，桑普迫切需要3分来冲击前四位置，本轮前锋帕奇尼、波济回归球队，将大大增强球队的攻击实力。反观拉齐奥，上轮在行将完场让紫百合将比分扳平，到手的3分变成1分，现在球队已经在为保级而战。此番交手，亚盘开出的平/半盘中低水，认为桑普取胜无疑。9、毕尔巴VS瓦拉多推荐30欧洲平均赔率：1.73-3.46-4.66。毕尔巴鄂竞技的主场向来强悍，此前打出过4连胜的小高潮，这样的主场对苦于保级的瓦拉多利德来说，难以逾越。亚盘开出的半球盘低水，对主队甚是看好，但须防瓦拉多利德的触底反弹。10、马洛卡VS希洪推荐3欧洲平均赔率：1.73-3.44-4.64。马洛卡最近的状态起起伏伏，上轮艰难拿下瓦拉多利德后，勉强跻身联赛第五，本轮坐拥联赛战绩不错的主场(7轮6胜1负)迎战希洪，亚盘开出的半球盘超低水，看好马洛卡的主场优势。希洪上轮3:2拿下奥萨苏纳后，球队取得3轮不败，已经远离降级区，本轮客战，放弃的可能性比较大。11、马拉加VS萨雷斯推荐31欧洲平均赔率：1.61-3.57-5.51。马拉加近8轮联赛仅输给皇马、巴萨。可见球队在对阵弱队时的优势。萨雷斯本赛季降级的趋势明显，本赛季联赛客场无一胜绩的记录相信不会再马拉加身上打破。亚盘开出的半/一盘低水，不看好萨雷斯。12、萨拉戈VS马竞技推荐30欧洲平均赔率：2.54-3.23-2.62。萨拉戈萨重攻轻守，本轮后卫普利多停赛，无疑给本就不稳的后防雪上加霜，目前球队仅高出降级区4分，本轮对阵有欧战分心的马竞，亚盘开出的平手盘中低水，胜利的天平已向主队倾斜。马竞自弗洛雷斯上任后，球队表现出来的斗志与韧性，有目共睹，但联赛上半程欠债太多，联赛无望的他们已经将目标锁定在杯赛上，在成功淘汰加拉塔萨雷后，就更强化了这一目标，同时也给本轮的战意提出了疑问。13、奥萨苏VS赫塔菲推荐31欧洲平均赔率：2.15-3.22-3.26。奥萨苏纳上轮客场败走希洪后，球队已3轮不胜，联赛排名下滑得很厉害，整体状态不是很好。赫塔菲与奥萨苏纳有点难兄难弟的味道，同样联赛排名中游、都已有几轮不胜，此番交手亚盘开出的平/半盘中水，平局的可能性很大，首选1；如果临盘时稳定，次选3。14、西班牙人VS维拉利推荐10欧洲平均赔率：2.38-3.19-2.86。西班牙人凭借着主场最近5轮(4胜1平)的拿分，目前已经脱离降级区。维拉利尔在欧洲联赛出局后，将重心转向了联赛，上轮1球拿下拉科后，球队追求比较实用的打法来争取下赛季的欧战资格，本轮客战必然全力以赴，首选0，次选1。胜负彩第10020期：10-31-31-3-30-31-3-3-30-3-31-30-31-10(1024注)
person: 里瓦斯,莫罗,迪纳塔莱,帕奇尼,普利多,弗洛雷斯,波济

content: 男子捡到警察手机发诈骗短信被抓获晨报讯捡到他人手机后，竟然动起了歪脑筋，企图通过短信诈骗对方亲友7万多元。然而，朱某怎么也没想到，自己捡到的手机竟原本属于嘉定一名刑警。当他将30条诈骗短信发给“电话簿”上的联系人时，大部分短信实际上传给了嘉定公安的民警。昨天，记者从嘉定警方获悉，朱某诈骗一分未得，便被抓获。“我是许林（化名），我现在外地出了点事，请速汇2000元至农行95599×××××（账号），开户人姓名杨武军。”今年春节期间，嘉定公安局刑侦支队民警许林的同事陆续收到一个陌生号码发来的相同短信。“许林当天还在单位加班，怎么一下子到了外地？”同事感觉事有蹊跷，纷纷打电话询问许林，最终证实许林并未发过这则短信。然而，令许林纳闷的是，发短信的人为什么会知道他的真实姓名，并会有那么多同事的联系方式？经过仔细回忆，许林想起去年6月乘坐出租车时，自己曾遗失过一部手机，他马上办理了手机补卡手续，而这次收到短信的30名亲友均为原来手机“电话簿”上的联系人。“这很可能是一起短信诈骗案！”出于职业敏感，许林立即电话通知所有可能收到短信的亲友同事不要上当，同时投入到案件侦查工作中。经调查，许林发现银行开户人杨武军的身份是虚构的。与此同时，民警通过银行监控系统发现，有一名男子每天都要到嘉定塔城路一银行ATM机上查询账户信息。2月6日下午，经过跟踪守候，许林和同事最终在塔城路一家医院门口将这名男子抓获，当场缴获了许林曾经丢失的手机。经审讯，犯罪嫌疑人朱某交代了自己利用许林遗失的手机，企图通过短信诈骗7万多元的犯罪事实。目前，朱某已被刑事拘留。（记者倪冬实习生孔文）
person: 许林,杨武军,孔文,倪冬,朱某
en: A man who picked up a police mobile phone and sent a fraudulent text message was caught by the Morning News. When he found someone else's mobile phone, he had a crooked idea and tried to defraud his relatives and friends of more than 70000 yuan through a text message. However, Zhu never expected that the mobile phone he found actually belonged to a criminal police officer in Jiading. When he sent 30 fraudulent text messages to the contacts on the "address book", most of the messages were actually sent to the police officers of Jiading Public Security. Yesterday, the reporter learned from the Jiading police that Zhu had not received any money from the fraud and was caught. "I am Xu Lin (pseudonym). I have something wrong in another place now. Please remit 2000 yuan to Agricultural Bank 95599 × × × × × (account), and the name of the account holder is Yang Wujun." During this year's Spring Festival, Xu Lin's colleagues from the Criminal Investigation Detachment of Jiading Public Security Bureau received the same text message from an unfamiliar number one after another. "Xu Lin is still working overtime at the unit today. How can he suddenly go to another place?" The colleagues felt that there was something wrong, so they called Xu Lin to ask, and finally confirmed that Xu Lin did not send the text message. However, what puzzled Xu Lin was why the person who sent the text message knew his real name and had so many colleagues' contact information? After careful回忆, Xu Lin remembered that when he took a taxi in June last year, he lost his mobile phone. He immediately handled the mobile phone replenishment card procedure, and the 30 relatives and friends who received the text message this time were the contacts on the "address book" of the original mobile phone. "This is likely to be a case of SMS fraud!" Due to professional sensitivity, Xu Lin immediately telephoned all the relatives and colleagues who may receive the text message not to be cheated, and at the same time, he devoted himself to the investigation of the case. After investigation, Xu Lin found that the identity of Yang Wujun, the bank account holder, was fictitious. At the same time, the police found through the bank monitoring system that a man had to go to an ATM on塔城Road, Jiading, to check his account information every day. On the afternoon of February 6, after tracking and waiting, Xu Lin and his colleagues finally caught the man at the gate of a hospital on Taccheng Road and seized the mobile phone that Xu Lin had lost. After interrogation, the criminal suspect Zhu Jiajia confessed that he had lost Xu Lin's mobile phone and attempted to commit a crime of more than 70000 yuan through a text message. At present, Zhu has been criminally detained. (Reporter Ni Dong, intern Kong Wen)

content: 民警赤手抓捕持刀狂徒被刺身亡(组图)20日晚8时许，涪陵区人民西路，一名歹徒当街连刺4人后逃跑，被敦仁派出所户籍民警周鑫撞见。周鑫徒手实施抓捕，被歹徒刺伤后捂住胸口紧追歹徒44米，倒地牺牲。英雄简历周鑫，1979年1月6日出生，1999年8月参加公安工作，2002年入党，大学本科学历，一级警司。■受害人：歹徒当街一连刺伤4人20日晚8时，涪陵区人民西路46号彩票投注站老板况龄松正关门回家，一名男青年从梯坎跳下，按住他肩膀。况感觉左大腿被扎了一下，没等他反应过来，男子已逃跑。况脱下外裤，发现左腿部有1.5厘米长的刀伤。“快报警！这崽儿已经刺杀了2人。”群众向况大喊。救治3名受害者的人民西路16号一家诊所称，第一个受害人文先生40岁左右，在涪陵区人民医院二门诊旁被刺伤；第二个受害人曾先生，在人民西路一家烟草专卖店前被刺伤；文、曾受伤的部位都是大腿，伤口均长1.5厘米，深约1.5厘米。记者了解到，3受害人遇刺间隔不到5分钟。经过清创、包扎处理，3人已无大碍。市公安局昨日通报，此前，歹徒还当街刺伤另一行人。■目击者：负伤民警紧追歹徒44米目击者钟女士介绍，歹徒刺伤况龄松后，挥舞刀子，顺着人民西路往南门山方向逃跑，群众大喊：“杀人了，抓住他。”歹徒跑到敦仁派出所附近时，一穿便衣的瘦弱青年大吼一声：“站住！我是警察！”徒手去抓歹徒。歹徒挣脱，举刀向瘦弱青年一阵乱刺。搏斗持续10多秒后，瘦弱青年捂住胸腹部，一边紧追歹徒，一边高喊“抓住他”。钟女士说，追出44米后，瘦弱青年倒在地上，再也没有站起来。穿制服的民警赶来，扶起瘦弱青年，大叫：“快叫救护车，他是我们敦仁所的干警周鑫。”钟这才知道，瘦弱男子就是敦仁派出所的户籍警周鑫。当晚8时许，一直在加班的周鑫走出派出所吃东西，正遇到群众在喊抓歹徒。民警和群众将周鑫送医院救治，由于伤势过重，流血过多，周鑫抢救无效英勇牺牲。参与抢救的涪陵区急救中心医生表示，周鑫负伤后如果不继续追击，或许失血不会这么多，抢救希望会大一些。■追捕：40分钟后捕获嫌疑人案发生后，涪陵警方迅速调集力量拉网布控。当晚8时40分，民警在松翠路石油公司宿舍嫌疑人邵骜杰的家中，将他抓获。警方从邵骜杰家搜出刀具一把，经监控对比，初步证实该刀正是刺杀民警等5人的凶器。据查，邵骜杰18岁，无业，是名吸毒者，曾两次被警方查处，此次作案动机有待进一步审理。周鑫抓歹徒牺牲的消息，很快传遍涪陵城。昨上午9时到昨晚7时许，陆续有上千市民自发前往涪陵区殡仪馆吊唁。英雄追记一等功还将申报烈士和一级英模昨日凌晨，受市公安局党委书记王立军的委托，市公安局领导王华刚、杨增渝、王廷彦连夜赶往涪陵区，看望和慰问周鑫的亲属。昨下午3时许，王立军搭乘直升机前往涪陵，看望慰问了周鑫的亲属。王立军对善后工作明确指示：“不能让英雄流血又流泪。”昨下午4时许，市公安局向媒体通报称，为周鑫追记一等功。涪陵区政府表示，正积极准备材料，为周鑫申报革命烈士。市公安局还表示，还将为周鑫向公安部申授一级英模。据了解，此前，单位已为周鑫向平安保险公司投保工伤意外险。昨上午，该保险公司涪陵中心总经理钟建表示，20万元工伤意外伤害保额将在后天转到周鑫的受益人账户上。疑犯外婆：初二缀学混迹社会曾经多次刺伤他人昨上午，记者找到邵骜杰的外婆张婆婆。她说，尚不知道外孙吸毒。邵骜杰的爸妈离婚后，就疏于照顾他。邵从读初二开始混迹社会。前日下午，邵骜杰从松翠路的住处来找她。离开时，她把邵送到楼下，看着他上了车。张婆婆解释，之所以这么做，是因为邵骜杰有臆想症，平时在街头看到谁长时间打电话或者高声叫喊，他便认为是在骂他，他就会去伤害人家。邵骜杰有暴力倾向是从去年开始的。张婆婆说，之前先后被他用小刀刺伤的人就有四五个，去年曾伤了一邓姓居民，赔款至今没还清。因邵骜杰的父母一直联系不上，其爷爷奶奶也搬离原来住所。截至昨下午6时，记者未能找到邵骜杰的其他亲人。追忆英雄父母：“为你自豪为你骄傲”哀乐声中，灵柩前，周鑫的爸爸强忍着泪水招呼客人。他说，儿子选择当人民警察，就要随时做好牺牲的准备。周爸爸在清溪镇派出所工作，妈妈在焦石开诊所，长期两地分居，周鑫小时候没得到很好的照顾。现在眼看自己要退休了，儿子却走了……儿子的离去，周妈妈同样选择了坚强。她说：“儿子，我不哭，我要为你自豪，为你骄傲，不能哭。”但是周妈妈还是哭了，而且哭肿了双眼。同事：“对得起这身警服”周鑫的同事冯文波说，辖区居民吴婆婆是个孤寡老人，已经90多岁了，沟通起来很吃力，但是周鑫每周都去吴婆婆家看看，聊聊天，吴婆婆见人就夸“周户籍”。冯文波说，周鑫在所里话不多，但在接待群众问询或求助时话特多，甚至不厌其烦。现在回忆起来，他在践行他曾说过的一句话——“做事要对得起这身警服。”爱妻：“我还等着你吃晚饭”英雄的爱妻蹇政敏已经吐词不清，她向记者哭着说了和丈夫相识相爱、共同经历的过程。她说，去年8月，两人的爱情结晶女儿降临，一家开始了甜蜜的三口生活。“你让我怎么跟幺儿交代啊？你不是说要教她唱爸爸好么？”蹇政敏再次呜咽起来。事发当天早上，周鑫7点多钟就离家了，说是派出所里当天有很多事要做。当晚7点多，他还和蹇政敏通了电话，说资料还没整理完，晚点回来吃饭，让她不等了。她还说：“周末了，多等会吧！早点回来。”不料这一等，等来的是护士的电话。蹇政敏飞奔到医院，爱人已是双眼紧闭。“我还等着你吃晚饭……”蹇政敏再次放声痛哭。本版稿件由记者夏祥洲采写
person: 杨增渝,钟建,冯文波,曾先生,王立军,周爸爸,况龄松,王廷彦,邵骜杰,周鑫,周妈妈,王华刚,蹇政敏,文先生
en: The police officer was killed by a knife wielding madman with his bare hands (picture) At about 8:00 pm on the 20th, on the West People's Road of Fuling District, a gangster stabbed four people in the street and then escaped. He was met by Zhou Xin, a household police officer of Dunren Police Station. Zhou Xin caught the criminal with his bare hands. After being stabbed by the criminal, he covered his chest and chased the criminal for 44 meters before he fell down and sacrificed. Hero's resume Zhou Xin, born on January 6, 1979, participated in public security work in August 1999, joined the Party in 2002, and has a bachelor's degree and a first-level police officer. ■ Victims: The gangster stabbed four people in the street. At 8:00 pm on the 20th, Kuang Ling Song, the boss of the No. 46 lottery betting station on West People's Road, Fuling District, was just closing his home. A young man jumped down from the stairs and pressed his shoulder. Kuang felt a stab in his left thigh. Before he could react, the man had escaped. Kuang took off his trousers and found a 1.5cm long knife wound on his left leg. "Call the police quickly! This child has killed two people." The crowd shouted to Kuang. The clinic at No. 16, West People's Road, which treats three victims, said that the first victim, Mr. Wen, who is about 40 years old, was stabbed beside the Second Clinic of Fuling District People's Hospital; The second victim, Mr. Zeng, was wounded in front of a tobacco specialty store on West People's Road; The injured parts of Wen and Zeng were all thighs, with wounds 1.5cm long and 1.5cm deep. The reporter learned that the three victims were stabbed in less than 5 minutes. After debridement and bandaging, three people were not seriously injured. The Public Security Bureau announced yesterday that the criminal had also stabbed another pedestrian on the street. ■ Witness: The wounded police officer chased the criminal for 44 meters. Ms. Zhong, a witness, introduced that after the criminal stabbed Kuang Ling Song, he waved his knife and escaped south along West People's Road. The crowd shouted: "Murder, catch him." When the criminal ran to the vicinity of Dunren Police Station, a thin young man in plain clothes shouted: "Stop! I'm a policeman!" He tried to catch the criminal with his bare hands. The criminal broke away and held the knife to stab the thin youth randomly. After more than 10 seconds of fighting, the thin young man covered his chest and abdomen, shouting "catch him" while closely following the criminal. Ms. Zhong said that after 44 meters of chasing, the thin young man fell to the ground and never got up again. The police in uniform came to help the thin young man and shouted: "Call an ambulance quickly. He is Zhou Xin, a police officer of our Dunren Office." Zhong then learned that the thin man was Zhou Xin, a household police officer of Dunren Police Station. At about 8:00 p.m., when Zhou Xin was working overtime, he went out of the police station to eat, just when the crowd was shouting to catch the criminal. The police and the crowd sent Zhou Xin to the hospital for treatment. Due to serious injuries and excessive bleeding, Zhou Xin died heroically but ineffectively. The doctors of Fuling District Emergency Rescue Center who participated in the rescue said that if Zhou Xin did not continue to pursue after being injured, he might not lose so much blood, and there would be more hope of rescue. ■ Pursuit and capture: The suspect was captured 40 minutes later. After the case, the Fuling police quickly mobilized their forces to set up a network. At 8:40 p. m. that night, the police caught him at the home of the suspect Shaofanjie in the oil company's dormitory on Song Cui Road. The police searched a knife from Shaofanjie's home. Through monitoring comparison, it was preliminarily confirmed that the knife was the weapon that killed five people, including the police. According to the investigation, Shaofanjie, 18 years old, jobless, is a drug abuser. He has been investigated by the police twice, and the motive for this crime remains to be further examined. The news that Zhou Xin died when he caught the criminal soon spread throughout Fuling City. From 9:00 a.m. yesterday to 7:00 p.m., more than 1000 citizens spontaneously went to Fuling Funeral Home to mourn. The hero's first class merit will also apply for martyrs and first class hero models. In the early morning of yesterday, on behalf of Wang Lijun, the party secretary of the Municipal Public Security Bureau, Wang Huagang, Yang Zengyu and Wang Tingyan, leaders of the Public Security Bureau, rushed to Fuling District to visit and comfort Zhou Xin's relatives. At about 3:00 p. m. yesterday, Wang Lijun flew to Fuling to visit and comfort Zhou Xin's relatives. Wang Lijun gave clear instructions on the rehabilitation work: "We must not let the heroes bleed and cry." At about 4:00 p. m. yesterday, the Public Security Bureau reported to the media that it would posthumously award Zhou Xin the first prize. The Fuling District Government said that it was actively preparing materials for Zhou Xin to apply for revolutionary martyrs. The Public Security Bureau also said that it would apply to the Ministry of Public Security for Zhou Xin to be a first-class model. It is understood that the unit has insured Zhou Xin with Ping An Insurance Company for work-related accident insurance. Yesterday morning, Zhong Jian, the general manager of Fuling Center of the insurance company, said that the 200000 yuan work-related accident insurance will be transferred to the beneficiary's account of Zhou Xin in two days. The grandmother of the suspect: dropout on the second day of junior high school and混迹society have injured others many times. Yesterday morning, the reporter found Grandma Zhang, the grandmother of Shao Jie. She said that she did not know her grandson was taking drugs. After Shao Jie's parents divorced, they neglected to take care of him. Shao started to mix in society since junior high school. Yesterday afternoon, Shao Jie came to her house from his residence on Song Cui Road. When leaving, she took Shao to the楼下and watched him get in the car. Grandma Zhang explained that this was because Shao Jie had an illusion. When he saw someone talking on the phone for a long time or shouting loudly on the street, he thought it was scolding him, and he would hurt others. Shao Jie has had a tendency of violence since last year. Grandma Zhang said that more than four or five people who had been stabbed with a small knife by him earlier had not yet been paid for their damages to a surnamed Deng last year. Because Shao Jie's parents could not contact him, his grandparents also moved away from their original residence. As of 6:00 p. m. yesterday, the reporter could not find other relatives of Shao Jie. In memory of the parents of the hero: "I'm proud of you and proud of you" In the sound of funeral music, in front of the coffin, Zhou Xin's father held back his tears to greet the guests. He said that his son chose to be a people's policeman and must always be prepared to sacrifice. Zhou's father works in Qingxi Town Police Station, and his mother works in Jiaoshi Clinic. They have lived in two places for a long time, and Zhou Xin did not get good care when he was a child. Now that I'm going to retire, my son is gone... Zhou's mother also chose to be strong when her son left. She said: "Son, I will not cry, I will be proud of you and proud of you, I can't cry." But Mother Zhou cried again, and her eyes swelled. Colleagues: "Live up to the police uniform" Feng Wenbo, Zhou Xin's colleague, said that Grandma Wu, a resident in the jurisdiction, was a widow who was more than 90 years old. It was very difficult to communicate with her, but Zhou Xin went to Grandma Wu's home every week to have a chat. Grandma Wu praised "Zhou's household registration" when she saw people. Feng Wenbo said that Zhou Xin didn't talk much in the office, but he was very talkative when receiving public inquiries or assistance, and even he was tireless. Now recalling, he was practicing a sentence he had said - "Doing things must live up to the police uniform." Wife: "I'm still waiting for you to have dinner" The wife of the hero, Jia Zhengmin, has mumbled. She cried to the reporter about how she knew and loved her husband and the process they experienced together. She said that last August, the crystallization of their love, their daughter, came, and the family began a sweet life of three mouths. "How can I explain to the children? Didn't you say you want to teach her to sing Dad well?" Jia Zhengmin sobbed again. On the morning of the incident, Zhou Xin left home at more than 7:00, saying that there were many things to do in the police station that day. At more than 7:00 p. m., he also talked with Jia Zhengmin on the phone, saying that the data had not been sorted out yet, and let her wait until later when she came back for dinner. She also said: "It's weekend, wait a while! Come back early." But this wait was a call from the nurse. Jia Zhengmin flew to the hospital, and her lover had his eyes closed. "I'm still waiting for you to have dinner..." Jia Zhengmin cried again. This edition of the newspaper was written by Xia Xiangzhou, a reporter

content: 调查-谁助新疆艰难扳回一城广东究竟是否尽力了新浪体育讯　北京时间4月23日晚，09-10CBA总决赛第四场，凭借艾伦最后22.4秒时打成的关键2+1，新疆队在主场97比94战胜广东扳回一城，总比分1比3暂时落后。本场比赛，新疆队5人得分上双，查尔斯31分5篮板，艾伦15分5助攻，西热力江11分6篮板，徐国?12分，巴特尔10分9篮板6助攻。广东队4人得分上双，朱芳雨全队最高22分6抢断，帕克20分8篮板5助攻，王仕鹏15分，杜锋14分，哈里森表现不佳，仅得到7分2篮板，另有6犯。
person: 朱芳雨,徐国?,西热力江,哈里森,艾伦,帕克,杜锋,王仕鹏,巴特尔,查尔斯
en: Survey - Who helped Xinjiang to win a hard battle back to Guangdong? Sina Sports News On the evening of April 23, Beijing time, in the fourth game of the 09-10CBA Finals, Xinjiang team beat Guangdong 97-94 at home with the key 2+1 scored by Allen in the last 22.4 seconds, and temporarily fell behind by 1-3 in the total score. In this game, five people in Xinjiang scored double figures. Charles scored 31 points and 5 rebounds. Allen scored 15 points and 5 assists. Xirelijiang scored 11 points and 6 rebounds. Xu Guo scored 12 points. Battelle scored 10 points, 9 rebounds and 6 assists. Four people in the Guangdong team scored in double figures. Zhu Fangyu had the highest score of 22 points and 6 steals in the team. Parker had 20 points, 8 rebounds and 5 assists. Wang Shipeng had 15 points and Du Feng had 14 points. Harrison performed poorly, scoring only 7 points and 2 rebounds, and another 6 fouls.

content: 智富能源折让八成配股股价疯狂炒高逾两成新浪财经讯智富能源(1051)昨日宣布配股集资46亿港元，承诺参与配股的投资者，包括周大福集团的郑裕彤、黑石基金(BlackRock)、摩根大通及富兰克林等机构。虽然配股价较前日收市价折让达八成，但智富股价昨日仍被疯狂炒高逾两成。智富能源昨日公布，计划透过摩根士丹利配售超过130亿股新股，配股价为0.35元较智富前日收市价折让79%。并已获得上述投资者的承诺，将作为基础投资者认购全部新股，涉资约46亿元。而且此次配股无禁售限制，只要在两周后的股东大会上配股建议获得通过，各大巨头所持股价已可实时账面获利达6倍。智富昨日在大涨两成后，收市报2元。据《明报》报道，智富能源主席刘梦熊表示：“我们只找最顶级的投资伙伴，拍档一齐打天下。”他还事先张扬称，在本月22日的特别股东大会之前，仍会继续寻找本地财团以及国际金融机构入股，以求“有钱大家赚。”智富能源之所以引得各大巨头加入，皆因早前高调宣布，成功收购了一个印度尼西亚金矿。刘梦熊昨日形容，这个本由澳洲矿业大王OZMinerals拥有的金矿占地达1600平方公里，现时仅勘探了其中的30平方公里，即已探明大量黄金矿藏，故此当OZ放售时，多路财团亦争相抢购，但是最终落到智富的手上，“这个矿可是世界知名，周大福是大金商，他们入股亦是深知这个矿是好的。”将收购老挝柬埔寨金矿刘梦熊还透露，这次透过配股集资的约6亿美元中，其中2.2亿美元将用作收购有关金矿的代价，同时亦会投入约2亿美元作基本建设，“本来OZ已投资了7500万美元，加上我们这笔投入，预期明年年底左右就可以投产了。”至于余下的约1.8亿美元资金，刘梦熊亦有打算，“趁OZ要钱，我们将陆续收购他在老挝、柬埔寨等地的金矿。”
en: Wisdom Energy discounts 80% of the shares for crazy trading up more than 20% Sina Finance News Wisdom Energy (1051) announced yesterday that it would raise HK $4.6 billion through a share offering, including Zheng Yutong of Chow Tai Fook Group, BlackRock, JPMorgan Chase, Franklin and other institutions, which have promised to participate in the share offering. Although the share price was discounted by 80% from the closing price of the day before yesterday, the share price of Zhifu was still crazy yesterday, more than 20%. Wisdom Energy announced yesterday that it plans to sell more than 1.3 billion new shares through Morgan Stanley, with a share price of 0.35 yuan, which is 79% lower than the closing price of Wisdom on the day before yesterday. And has obtained the commitment of the above investors to subscribe all new shares as basic investors, involving funds of about 4.6 billion yuan. Moreover, this share offering is not subject to any prohibition on sale. If the share offering proposal is approved at the shareholders' meeting in two weeks, the share prices held by the giants can be realized at a profit of up to 6 times. After rising by 20% yesterday, Wisdom closed at 2 yuan. According to the Ming newspaper, Liu Mengxiong, chairman of Wisdom Energy, said: "We only look for the best investment partners and partners to fight the world together." He also publicized in advance that he would continue to look for local consortia and international financial institutions to join the stock until the special shareholders' meeting on the 22nd of this month, in order to "make money for everyone." The reason why Wisdom Energy has attracted major giants to join is that it has earlier announced that it has successfully acquired an Indonesian gold mine. Liu Mengxiong described yesterday that the gold mine, originally owned by the Australian mining giant OZMinerals, covers an area of 1600 square kilometers. At present, only 30 square kilometers has been explored, that is, a large number of gold deposits have been found. Therefore, when OZ put it on the market, many financial consortia also competed to purchase it. However, it finally fell into the hands of Wisdom. "This mine is world famous. Chow Tai Fook is a major gold merchant. They also know that this mine is good when they invest in it." Liu Mengxiong also revealed that he would acquire the gold mines of Laos and Cambodia. Liu Mengxiong also revealed that this acquisition will be used for the acquisition of the gold mine through the share offering of about US $600 million, in which US $220 million will be used as the price of the gold mine, and US $200 million will also be invested in infrastructure construction. "OZ has already invested US $75 million, and our investment is expected to start production around the end of next year." As for the remaining US $1.8 billion, Liu Mengxiong also has plans, "Take advantage of the fact that OZ wants money, we will continue to acquire his gold mines in Laos, Cambodia and other places."

content: 世界杯滑水赛临沂站：天才小将夺冠陈莉莉摘铜新浪体育讯　北京时间9月25日消息，2011世界杯滑水赛中国-临沂站的比赛在山东省临沂市沂河水域落下帷幕，世界级高手在尾波和跳跃四个项目的高水平较量让现场观众大呼过瘾，中国选手陈莉莉在女子尾波项目中夺得铜牌。女子尾波项目是惟一一项有中国选手进入的项目，陈莉莉在比赛中第二位出场，她在前半程的动作完成非常流畅、难度也有相当水准，无奈后半程最后一个难度动作落水的失误，让她仅获得55.34的成绩，摘得本次比赛的铜牌。另外一名参赛的中国小将段振坤在比赛中两次落水，发挥不够理想，仅以43.01分的成绩在六名参加决赛的选手中垫底。澳大利亚选手安博尔-温和美国选手莱米-梅里特分获金牌和银牌。男子尾波项目半决赛以92.77的超高得分昂首晋级的澳大利亚18岁天才小将哈利-克利福德在比赛前半程的表现堪称完美，动作难度、起跳高度和动作完成质量如同教科书般标准，可惜在后半程最后一个难度动作落水，好在落水时机在3/4浮标之前，他仍获得了加赛的机会，在加赛中挑战一个超高难度时不幸再度落水，但是他仍然以88.57分的成绩夺得冠军。美国选手安德鲁-阿德金森虽然动作完成分高于哈利，但是在动作难度方面的差距，还是让他以不到3分的劣势屈居亚军，另外一名来自美国的选手丹尼尔-鲍威尔与两人差距很大，以70.12分的成绩获得铜牌。女子跳跃项目成绩不错，半决赛暂列第一、来自白俄罗斯的纳塔利亚-伯德尼科娃以52.1米的成绩无可争议地获得冠军，澳大利亚“兔子”卡罗尔-杰辛塔也突破50米大关，以50.6米得成绩获得亚军，希腊选手玛丽-维姆普特瑞特索娃也站上季军的领奖台，丹麦人曼-伦德获得第四名。男子跳跃项目的争夺非常激烈，美国选手表现出强劲的实力包揽全部奖牌，20岁的小将扎克-沃尔登本赛季第二次战胜世锦赛冠军、世界纪录保持着弗雷迪-克鲁格获得冠军，夺冠成绩为66米，而老将弗雷迪-克鲁格以0.1米的劣势遗憾的收获银牌，两人的美国同胞埃利斯-斯科特以63.5米的成绩夺得铜牌，英国选手托马斯仅获得第四名。(吕敏发自临沂)
person: 安德鲁-阿德金森,莱米-梅里特,弗雷迪-克鲁格,卡罗尔-杰辛塔,陈莉莉,段振坤,吕敏,埃利斯-斯科特,玛丽-维姆普特瑞特索娃,哈利-克利福德,曼-伦德,安博尔-温,丹尼尔-鲍威尔,扎克-沃尔登,纳塔利亚-伯德尼科娃
en: The World Cup Waterskiing Linyi Station: The genius young player won Chen Lily Lily to win the Sina Sports News Beijing time on September 25. The 2011 World Cup Waterskiing China - Linyi Station ended in Yiheshui, Linyi City, Shandong Province. The world-class experts' high-level competition in the tail wave and jumping four events made the audience shout for fun. Chen Lily won the bronze medal in the women's tail wave event. The women's tail wave event was the only event in which Chinese players entered. Chen Li Li was the second to play in the game. Her action in the first half was very smooth and the difficulty was also quite high. Unfortunately, the mistake of the last difficult action in the second half fell into the water, which made her only get 55.34 points and win the bronze medal of the event. Duan Zhenkun, another young Chinese player who participated in the competition, fell into the water twice in the competition, and did not play well enough. He only scored 43.01 points, ranking at the bottom of the six players who participated in the final. Amber温和of Australia and Rami-Meritt of the United States won the gold and silver medals respectively. Harry Clifford, an 18 year old Australian genius who was promoted to the semi final of the men's tail wave project with an ultra high score of 92.77, performed perfectly in the first half of the competition. His action difficulty, take-off height and action completion quality were like textbook standards. Unfortunately, he fell in the last difficult action in the second half. Fortunately, the timing of his falling in the water was before the 3/4 buoy, so he still had the opportunity to play in the extra game. When he challenged an ultra high difficulty in the extra game, he unfortunately fell into the water again, but he still won the championship with a score of 88.57. Although the American player Andrew Adkins scored higher than Harry in the action completion, the gap in the difficulty of the action still made him lose the runner-up by less than 3 points. Daniel Powell, another player from the United States, had a big gap with the two people, and won the bronze medal with 70.12 points. The women's jumping event achieved good results. Natalia Bordnikova, who was ranked first in the semi final and came from Belarus, won the championship with an uncontroversial score of 52.1 meters. Carol Jessinta, the "rabbit" of Australia, also broke through the 50 meter mark and won the runner-up with a score of 50.6 meters. Maria Vimputreiso, a Greek player, also stood on the podium of the third place, and Maan Lunde, a Danish player, won the fourth place. The competition for the men's jumping event was very fierce. The American players showed strong strength and won all the medals. The 20 year old player Zach Walden won the championship for the second time this season, defeating the world champion and world record holder Freddy Krueger. The championship score was 66 meters, while the veteran Freddy Krueger regretfully won the silver medal with a disadvantage of 0.1 meters. Their American compatriot Ellis Scott won the bronze medal with a score of 63.5 meters, and the British player Thomas only ranked fourth. (Lv Min sent from Linyi)

content: 山寨网站骗术多双节出行如何防骗打假随着双节的临近，机票的预订日趋火爆，特价机票销售更是一票难求。随着人们对互联网的运用越来越多，利用特价机票来吸引顾客眼球的虚假网站也越来越多。由于互联网进入门槛较低，模仿成本也很低，导致目前机票预订市场上山寨横行，甚至一些虚假网站直接利用特价机票进行诈骗行为。中国消费者协会依据中文在线旅行网站“去哪儿网”(Qunar.com)今年6-8月全网(调查对象包含所有参与过在线旅行预订的消费者，调查方式包含：网络调查问卷、电话访问、拦访等)2400多个预订消费者样本量分析，80%的投诉针对于黑代理、无资质代理、山寨网站、钓鱼网站、假冒网站。如此强大的网站易容术眼下，随着在线旅游知名网站的崛起，许多网站都深受山寨网站等这类的虚假网站的困扰，例如去哪儿网(Qunar.com)、南方航空官方网站(csair.com)以及携程网(ctrip.com)。这些山寨网站为骗取消费者信任，其模仿手段之高明，令人惊叹。此类网站由于缺乏对代理商的资质认证能力，常使消费者利益受到损害。不过，山寨毕竟是山寨，消费者只要仔细观察，细心留意，还是能够看出其中的明显差别。假400电话害人不浅400电话作为一种企业为消费者提供的便捷服务，一直受到广大消费者的欢迎。但是，目前骗子利用手段，在百度一类的通用搜索网站频繁打出广告，广告中提供一个400电话。当消费者拨通该电话时，骗子往往以各种理由让消费者向某个人银行卡中进行汇款。之后，该400电话变成无法接通状态，消费者往往在投诉时才发现上当。去哪儿网机票服务无400电话据记者了解到，全球最大的中文在线旅行网站去哪儿网(Qunar.com)的机票服务是没有400电话的，专线是：01058752660。去哪儿网机票产品部高级总监杨威表示，设定投诉专线能够方便用户识别，防止上当。所以，提供400电话的机票搜索的“去哪儿网”都是冒牌货。此外，杨威提醒消费者在拨打百度搜索到的相关旅游网站400电话时，应该进行反向查询，将400电话放回百度搜索，如出现同一号码提供多家知名旅游网站服务时，则可判定该号码为诈骗电话。山寨如此强大，如何才能辨别真假呢？杨威提示广大消费者可以从以下几个方法去辨别真假网站：第一：看ICP备案，每个正规的网站下方都会有ICP备案的信息，证明其网站的经营合法性。第二：合法的代理商都会有CATA(民航运输协会)的认证资质，与去哪儿网合作的代理商，全部都得通过CATA认证，用户在其他网站上消费的时候，也要仔细辨认是否有CATA认证。第三、正规的代理商都会采用第三方在线支付平台或银行进行交易，比如去哪儿网站会要求代理商必须有这个能力才给予合作，如果有让用户通过汇款的方式交易的，都是骗子网站。所以防止上当受骗最直接的办法就是拒绝直接汇款。“金牌机票服务系统”帮助消费者找到优质代理商值得一提的是，去哪儿网站最近推出的“金牌机票服务系统”可以帮助消费者去伪存真，找到优质放心的代理商。据了解，该系统提供了四个系统平台，从资质、服务、投诉处理、用户监督四个方面提供机票保障服务。包括：1、去哪儿网验证代理人资质的100%的CATA认证代理商体系；2、规范机票代理商管理的代理商投诉管理系统；3、查询去哪儿网搜索的所有机票代理商的详细信息的代理商信息查询系统4、以及将用户评价因素加入搜索排序结果中，以促进代理商改进自身服务的消费者评价排序体系，选择有正规资质的服务商，掌握山寨们的诈骗手段：不直接汇款，不在没有安全保障的支付平台提供账户密码等，双节出行预订机票才能更有保障。
en: There are many tricks on the fake website. How to prevent them from being fake during the double festival travel. As the Double Festival approaches, the booking of air tickets is becoming more and more popular, and the special price air tickets are hard to find. With the increasing use of the Internet by people, there are more and more false websites that use special price air tickets to attract customers' attention. Due to the low threshold of the Internet and the low cost of imitation, the current air ticket booking market is flooded with non mainstream products, and some fake websites even directly use special price tickets for fraud. According to the analysis of 2400 booking consumer samples of the China Consumers Association based on the online travel website "Qunar.com" in June - August this year (the survey includes all consumers who have participated in online travel booking, and the survey includes: online questionnaires, telephone interviews, and so on), 80% of the complaints are targeted at black agents, unqualified agents, non mainstream websites, fishing websites, and fake websites. At present, with the rise of well-known online tourism websites, many websites are plagued by fake websites such as non mainstream websites, such as Qunar.com, the official website of China Southern Airlines (csair.com) and Ctrip.com. In order to defraud consumers' trust, their imitation skills are amazing. Because this kind of website lacks the ability to certify the qualifications of agents, it often damages the interests of consumers. However, the non mainstream is still the non mainstream. As long as consumers carefully observe and pay attention, they can still see the obvious difference. The fake 400 telephone is very harmful. The 400 telephone, as a convenient service provided by enterprises to consumers, has always been welcomed by consumers. However, at present, the cheater uses means to frequently advertise on general search websites such as Baidu, which provides a 400 telephone. When consumers dial this telephone, the cheater often asks consumers to make a remittance to someone's bank card for various reasons. After that, the 400 telephone becomes incommunicable, and consumers often find that they have fallen in when complaining. Qunar.com's air ticket service has no 400 telephone. According to the reporter, the world's largest Chinese online travel website, Qunar.com, does not have a 400 telephone for its air ticket service, and the dedicated line is: 01058752660. Yang Wei, senior director of Qunar.com's air ticket products department, said that setting up a complaint hotline can help users identify and prevent them from being cheated. Therefore, the "Qunar.com" of the air ticket search providing 400 telephone is a fake. In addition, Yang Wei reminds consumers that when dialing the 400 telephone of the relevant tourism website searched by Baidu, they should conduct a reverse query and put the 400 telephone back to Baidu for search. If the same number provides services for many well-known tourism websites, it can be determined that the number is a fraud telephone. How can we distinguish the true from the false when the non mainstream is so powerful? Yang Wei suggests that consumers can distinguish true and false websites from the following methods: First: Look at ICP filing. Each formal website will have ICP filing information at the bottom to prove its legal operation. Second: Legal agents must have the certification qualifications of CATA (Civil Aviation Transport Association), and the agents cooperating with Qunar.com must all pass the CATA certification. Users also need to carefully identify whether they have CATA certification when consuming on other websites. Third, the formal agents will adopt a third-party online payment platform or bank for transactions. For example, Qunar website will require the agents to have the ability to cooperate. If the users are asked to make transactions through remittances, they are all cheater websites. Therefore, the most direct way to prevent being cheated is to refuse to make direct remittances. "Gold medal air ticket service system" helps consumers find high-quality agents. It is worth mentioning that the recently launched "Gold Medal Air Ticket Service System" of Qunar website can help consumers distinguish the true from the false and find high-quality and reliable agents. It is understood that the system provides four system platforms, providing air ticket guarantee services from four aspects: qualifications, services, complaint handling and user supervision. Including: 1. 100% CATA certification agent system of Qunar.com to verify the qualification of agents; 2. Agent complaint management system to regulate the management of air ticket agents; 3. Agent information query system to query the detailed information of all air ticket agents searched by Qunar.com4. The consumer evaluation ranking system, which includes the user evaluation factors into the search ranking results to promote the agents to improve their services, chooses the service providers with formal qualifications, and grasps the fraud means of the non mainstream: no direct remittances, no account passwords on the payment platform without security guarantee, and the booking of air tickets during the two festivals can be more guaranteed.

content: 25倍光变高清DV索尼CX150E单机3820元作为一款闪存式高清摄像机，索尼CX150E拥有118万的有效像素，再配合拥有良好光学素质的变焦镜头，相信会有非常不错的表现，比较适合家庭用户购买。
en: The Sony CX150E single machine, a 25x optical HD DV with 1.18 million effective pixels, together with a zoom lens with good optical quality, is believed to have a very good performance, which is suitable for family users to purchase.

content: 烧钱时代的团购仍缺行业标准随着拉手网、大众点评网的相继融资，团购市场已进入烧钱时代。不过，服务质量的落后以及行业标准的缺失，在未来一段时间内，团购网站仍将在摸爬滚打中前行。据国内知名互联网研究机构CNZZ日前发布的数据显示，今年一季度，全国电子商务行业网站数达到2.17万家，同比增长31.16%。其中，团购网站的增长是电子商务行业网站整体增长的主要构成部分。不过，快速的增长势头并不能掩盖市场存在的不足。自2010年3月至今，我国团购网站数量已超过4000家，并且正以每日接近10家的速度在增长。在团购网站发展只有短短一年多的时间里，因为具有建设门槛低、能直接带来现金流、更依赖线下资源等特点，使得一大批中小型网站迅速进入或转型到团购领域。多领域的进入，并没有让团购网站得到较好发展，反而出现了欺诈、质量不达标和服务不到位的问题，让团购网站行业的前景扑朔迷离。对此，嘀嗒团副总裁朱敏告诉记者，目前，中国的团购网站尚处于起步阶段，就像正在学习走路的孩子一般，成长的过程中难免会有磕绊，需要在其间对问题不断地发现以及改善，并形成强有力的服务流程保障体系，以使团购网站未来的道路走得更加顺利。据了解，嘀嗒团联手一茶一坐餐厅推出第二期无限畅吃团购服务，除了一茶一坐“原价品质、预约透明、菜品齐全”的保障，嘀嗒团更是祭出了“全国门店品质服务承诺，嘀嗒团全程提供退款服务”的承诺，将三大服务全面升级。此次嘀嗒团与一茶一坐推出的三大措施在全面提升团购服务体验中，包括了一茶一坐服务升级，其全体门店全力准备迎高峰客流；同时，嘀嗒团服务投诉热线全程待命，“400”热线将在使用期内全程直通一茶一坐客服，统筹全国服务；此外，嘀嗒团全程支持退款，在团购完成后，消费者对网评不满意，嘀嗒团随时提供退款通道为消费者全额退还此次团购的费用。此前，第一期嘀嗒团一茶一坐的团购，虽然受到了消费者的热捧，但是由于各方面准备不足，出现了预约困难、门店准备不足、服务质量问题、网络投诉反馈不及时等缺陷。针对此状况，嘀嗒团积极收集消费者的体验信息，内部进行了多次讨论，并且与一茶一坐进行了深入沟通，再次与一茶一坐联手推出“无限量任你吃”的团购套餐，不仅菜单升级，而且大力提升了服务水平。商报记者李铎
en: The group buying in the money-burning era is still short of industry standards. With the successive financing of Lashou.com and Dianping.com, the group buying market has entered the money-burning era. However, the lagging behind of service quality and the lack of industry standards will make the group buying website move forward in the next period of time. According to the data released recently by CNZZ, a well-known domestic Internet research institution, the number of e-commerce industry websites in China reached 21700 in the first quarter of this year, up 31.16% year on year. Among them, the growth of group buying websites is the main part of the overall growth of e-commerce industry websites. However, the rapid growth momentum cannot cover up the shortcomings of the market. Since March 2010, the number of group buying websites in China has exceeded 4000, and it is growing at a rate of nearly 10 per day. In the short period of more than one year since the development of group buying websites, a large number of small and medium-sized websites have quickly entered or transformed into the group buying field because of their low construction threshold, ability to bring about cash flow directly and dependence on offline resources. The entry of multiple fields has not made the group buying website get better development, but there are problems such as fraud, quality not up to standard and service not in place, which makes the prospects of the group buying website industry complicated. In this regard, Zhu Min, vice president of Didi Group, told reporters that at present, the group buying website in China is still in its infancy, like a child who is learning to walk. It is inevitable that there will be bumps in the process of growth, and it is necessary to constantly find and improve problems and form a strong service process guarantee system in the process, so that the future road of the group buying website will be more smooth. It is understood that Didi Group, together with Yichayi Restaurant, launched the second phase of unlimited group buying service. In addition to the guarantee of "original price quality, reservation transparency, and complete dishes" of Yichayi, Didi Group has also made a commitment of "national store quality service commitment, Didi Group provides refund service throughout the process", upgrading the three services comprehensively. The three major measures launched by Didi Group and Yichayi in this period, which aim to comprehensively upgrade the group buying service experience, include the upgrading of Yichayi services. All its stores are fully prepared to welcome peak passenger flow; At the same time, Didi Group's service complaint hotline is on standby throughout the process. The "400" hotline will be directly connected to Yichayi customer service throughout the use period to coordinate services nationwide; In addition, Didi Group fully supports refund. After the group purchase is completed, if consumers are dissatisfied with the online review, Didi Group will always provide a refund channel for consumers to refund the full cost of this group purchase. Previously, the first phase of Didi Group's group buying of Yichayi was welcomed by consumers, but due to insufficient preparation in all aspects, there were defects such as reservation difficulties, store preparation, service quality problems, and untimely online complaint feedback. In view of this situation, Didi Group actively collects consumers' experience information, has many discussions internally, and has in-depth communication with Yichayi. Once again, it launches the "unlimited eating" group purchasing package with Yichayi, which not only upgrades the menu, but also greatly improves the service level. Li Duo, business reporter

content: 中国为08年全球经济增长贡献22%09年贡献更大联合国日前在京发布的《2009年世界经济形势与展望》分析指出，中国仍然是东亚以及全球经济的增长动力，但与欧美的贸易衰减将会使以中国为首的大部分亚洲经济体发展减缓，因此中国需要新的经济战略来维持增长。报告指出，中国为2008年全球经济增长贡献了大约22%，而且在2009年很可能贡献更大，因为大多数发达国家经济都陷入了衰退。不过，中国的增长速度也在放缓，国内生产总值增长从2007年的11.9%下降到2008年的9.1%，但仍算比较高，而预计2009年会降到8%。报告预测熏如果不是因为国内最终需求的持续强劲发展熏下降可能更大。在过去几年全球高速发展的情况下熏中国经济发展在很大程度上受到美国庞大的消费者需求的推动熏而后者又是由信贷条件放宽的刺激和急速上升的房价支撑。中国、日本等国日益增加的贸易盈余积累了大量的外汇储备熏并且愿意购买美元资产熏从而为美国在此阶段的增长提供了资金。然而，这种全球发展模式并不能持续长久。中国和其他发展中国家的出口增长如今已直接和间接地受到美国经济衰退的影响。联合国报告指出熏中国拥有1.9万亿美元外汇储备和平衡的政府预算熏有充足的政策空间可以采用更多必要的扩展型财务政策来刺激国内需求熏从而弥补疲软的出口下滑。中国已开始利用这一政策空间制定大规模的财政刺激计划熏这一举措很可能会恢复全球需求。中国已宣布在2009年和2010年期间实施5860亿美元(或中国国内生产总值的15%)的财政刺激方案。刺激方案旨在加强内需熏重点放在基本设施投资和消费两方面。目标包括低收入住宅、农村基础设施、水、电、运输、环境、技术创新和几个灾区的重建，尤其是5月12日的地震区。该方案还通过各种措施来提高贫困人群的收入，包括更高的补助金和2009年政府对粮食的更高收购价。
en: China contributed 22% to global economic growth in 08 and even more in 09. The World Economic Situation and Outlook 2009 released by the United Nations in Beijing recently pointed out that China is still the growth engine of East Asia and the global economy, but the trade decline with Europe and the United States will slow down the development of most Asian economies led by China, so China needs a new economic strategy to maintain growth. The report pointed out that China contributed about 22% to the world's economic growth in 2008, and it is likely to contribute more in 2009, because most developed economies have fallen into recession. However, China's growth rate is also slowing down. The GDP growth rate fell from 11.9% in 2007 to 9.1% in 2008, but it is still relatively high, and it is expected to fall to 8% in 2009. The report forecasts that if it were not for the sustained strong development of domestic final demand, the decline would be greater. In the case of rapid global development in the past few years, China's economic development has been largely driven by the huge consumer demand of the United States, which in turn is supported by the easing of credit conditions and the rapid rise of housing prices. China, Japan and other countries' growing trade surplus has accumulated a large amount of foreign exchange reserves, and they are willing to buy dollar assets, thus providing funds for the growth of the United States at this stage. However, this global development model cannot last long. Now, export growth in China and other developing countries has been directly and indirectly affected by the recession in the United States. The United Nations report pointed out that China has US $1.9 trillion of foreign exchange reserves and a balanced government budget, and has sufficient policy space to adopt more necessary expansionary financial policies to stimulate domestic demand, so as to make up for the decline of weak exports. China has begun to use this policy space to formulate a large-scale fiscal stimulus package, a move that is likely to restore global demand. China has announced a fiscal stimulus package of 586 billion US dollars (or 15% of China's GDP) in 2009 and 2010. The purpose of the stimulus package is to strengthen domestic demand, focusing on two aspects: investment in basic facilities and consumption. The objectives include low-income housing, rural infrastructure, water, electricity, transport, environment, technological innovation and reconstruction of several disaster areas, especially the earthquake area on May 12. The program also aims to increase the income of the poor through various measures, including higher grants and higher food purchase prices by the government in 2009.

content: 海通证券：关注中高仓位成长风格基金□海通证券(微博)单开佳倪韵婷近期，不少正面的因素提升了投资者的热情：政策实质性微调引发了投资者很多的憧憬；通胀下行以及房产价格的回落有助于政策有改善的空间；流动性目前相对略显宽松；海外不确定性因素暂时有所缓解。但是，未来市场仍需要一个“经济触底”的现实数据，或者看见一个“新周期的启动”，方可作为右侧启动的信号，因此A股市场可能更多的是震荡反弹走势。目前经济依然处于下滑过程中，可能会导致上市公司盈利能力的下滑，投资者可以更多地关注有产业政策扶持的相关行业，这些行业可能具有攻守兼备的特征，同时一些超跌低估的板块可能也会有反弹的机会，这些机会可能更多的集中在成长板块、部分消费板块。在这样的市场环境中，投资者可以继续买入股票混合型基金，选股能力突出的、仓位中高的主动型基金可能会有一定的超额收益。当然，投资者也可以利用股票型分级基金高风险份额参与反弹。在基金的大类配置上，股票混合型开放式基金建议风格略偏成长，在市场的反弹过程中政策驱动以及估值修复可能具有较好的投资机会。政策驱动包括文化产业、环保、水利、农业补贴、战略新兴产业等；估值修复包含了前期一些超跌板块；业绩稳定性可以关注部分消费类个股。分析这些板块，更多的可能集中在一些偏成长风格的股票中，因此，建议投资者在做基金组合时可以在均衡配置的基础上略偏成长。从交易型基金来看，依据历年走势，通常11月开始是封闭式基金分红行情预演的时点，对应传统封基的折价将会有显著收窄。但今年以来由于市场整体震荡走低，可分配利润少了，多数基金单位可分配利润都在0.1元以下，显著低于历年。不过我们认为四季度市场可能处于一个震荡的过程中，在市场反复的过程中，如果踏准节奏，基金可分配收益或会有一定幅度的增加，加之当前折价回归收益处于今年以来的高位，建议投资者关注选股能力较优、波段把握能力较优且三季度末可分配利润相对较高的基金，这类基金的分红潜力可能更大。对于分级基金而言，在市场震荡反复的格局下，股票型高风险份额可能将有较多波段性的机会，但由于右侧经济和盈利的拐点未现，市场的反弹仍需谨慎，因而高风险份额的收益需要及时兑现。对于债券分级基金高风险份额可能仍有正收益，但是行情相比前期那波反弹或较弱。目前市场上所有低风险份额的折价有显著的回归，折价率虽然可能仍有收窄空间，但空间或小于前期，但随着到期折算期限的临近，即将折算的低风险份额折价进一步扩大的动力不大，投资者可继续持有。从指数基金以及ETF而言，市场左侧大底部明朗，因而长线仍可布局，同时来回震荡行情中投资者可采用交投简便的ETF博取波段。11月债券市场略偏利好，在历经了较长时间债券熊市之后，债券基金的配置价值重新回归。而随着央行公开市场操作，短期市场资金面可能略微宽松，因而我们认为货币基金下月的收益或略有下降。不过对于现金流动性要求较高的投资者而言，货币基金仍是目前最有效的现金管理工具。在构建基金组合上，我们对积极型、稳健型以及保守型三类不同风险承受能力的投资者给予资产配置比例的建议。我们给予这三类投资者在权益类基金(包含股票、混合型基金以及交易型基金)一个配置比例区间，分别为积极型配置区间60-100%；稳健型30-80%，保守型10-40%，均衡配置比例分别为80%、55%和25%。当我们判断市场上涨概率较大时，我们会在权益类基金上配置较高的比例，反之则降低比例。本期建议积极型投资者可以配置75%的主动型股票混合型基金，15%的交易型基金(含指数型基金)，10%的偏债型基金；稳健型投资者可以配置55%的主动型股票混合型基金、10%的交易型基金(含指数型基金)、20%的偏债型基金、15%的货币市场基金；保守型投资者可以配置35%的主动型股票混合型基金、20%的偏债型基金、45%的货币市场基金。
en: Haikot Securities: Pay attention to the growth style fund of China and high position□ Haikot Securities (microblog) Shen Kaijia Ni Yunting recently, many positive factors have enhanced investors' enthusiasm: the substantive micro adjustment of policies has triggered a lot of expectations of investors; The decline of inflation and housing prices will help to improve the policy space; At present, liquidity is slightly loose; Overseas uncertainties have temporarily eased. However, the future market still needs a "real data of economic bottoming out", or a "launch of a new cycle", as a signal of right launch. Therefore, the A-share market may be more volatile. At present, the economy is still in the process of decline, which may lead to a decline in the profitability of listed companies. Investors can pay more attention to the relevant industries supported by industrial policies. These industries may have the characteristics of both attack and defense. At the same time, some overestimated sectors may also have the opportunity to rebound. These opportunities may focus more on the growth sector and some consumer sectors. In such a market environment, investors can continue to buy stock hybrid funds, and the active fund with outstanding stock selection ability and moderate high position may have some excess returns. Of course, investors can also use the high-risk shares of stock分级funds to participate in rebound. In terms of the major allocation of funds, the style of stock hybrid open-end funds is slightly biased towards growth, and the policy drive and valuation repair may have a good investment opportunity in the process of market rebound. Policy-driven includes cultural industry, environmental protection, water conservancy, agricultural subsidies, strategic emerging industries, etc.; Valuation restoration includes some over sold sectors in the earlier period; Performance stability can focus on some consumer stocks. By analyzing these sectors, it is more likely to focus on some stocks with a growth style, so it is suggested that investors should pay more attention to growth when making fund combinations on the basis of balanced allocation. From the perspective of trading funds, according to the trend over the years, November is usually the starting point for the preplay of the dividend distribution of closed-end funds, and the discount of the corresponding tradit

content: 关小刀火线解盘：拉齐奥值得力捧桑坦德持续低迷新浪体育讯　1、巡游者VS维拉推荐：31维拉前边的比赛平局过多，因此虽然迄今不败，但成绩却不太理想；巡游者迄今已有两场胜利，可惜主场不但没有积分，甚至连进球都没有取得过，这个多少令QPR的球迷多少有些失望。由于两队联赛的轨迹久未交集，近年只在联赛杯中有过两次交锋，各有一场胜利。平均赔率2.303.203.01实际上是暗挺巡游者，主流公司的赔率调整中，多家公司的主胜赔率在周中之后均有明显下调。在客队保持不败的情况下，巡游者能够让出平半高水，还是可以看高一线。2、科隆VS霍芬海姆推荐：30本季科隆的表现总是出人意料，仅有的两次胜利均来自客场，而且还都是打入对手4球的大胜，但主场却一胜难求，3场联赛进球也只有两粒，看起来防守反击才是科隆安身立命的看家法宝；近两场打入7球的霍芬海姆同样进球如麻，而且主客场的表现更加均衡。两队在德甲中共有6次交锋，霍芬海姆在前三次连胜之后，最近三次遇到科隆均没有占到便宜。由于科隆的表现欠缺稳定，所以平均赔率2.843.312.31仍然是看好客场作战的霍芬海姆，两队近期力火都比较猛，本场打出大比分的可能性较大。3、不来梅VS赫塔推荐：31柏林赫塔的上一个客场把卫冕冠军多特拉下马，不过挑战不来梅却没有往绩优势，近4次做客都输掉了比赛。本季不来梅的开局相当不错，似乎在完成球员的新陈代谢之后，沙夫教练将率领不来梅步又一个黄金时期，目前不来梅的成绩、状态和数据都相当出色，因此主场迎战赫塔亦可看高。只是目前的平均赔率1.813.484.04给得有些蛊惑，即使赫塔前3个客场1胜2平保持不败，但毕竟是一支刚刚回到德甲的升班马，而且在夏季转会中并没有大肆买人提升实力，因此排名第2的不来梅仅仅让出半球低水，盘赔均不太合理，本场冷门不得不防。4、锡耶纳VS莱切推荐：32002年以来在甲乙两级和杯赛的交锋中，锡耶纳对莱切1胜6平4负处于完全下风。新季开打之后，两队的成绩都不出意料排名下游，上个客场莱切战胜博洛尼亚表现得较为出色，但主场输给亚特兰大显示这支球队的表现还不足以信任。平均赔率1.953.163.84却是对迄今不胜的锡耶纳更为看好，周中联赛结束之后，多数主流公司放均明显降低了主胜赔率，多家公司均将主胜从2.05以上降到2.00以下，亚洲初盘半球中水，锡耶纳值得一博。5、亚特兰大VS诺瓦拉推荐：31两支升班马均表现不错，亚特兰大3轮拿7分排名前列，诺瓦拉则上轮力克国米拿到意甲首胜——当然，战胜国米有对手将帅不和的因素，诺瓦拉的胜利也直接导致加斯佩里尼最终下课。两队上季在意乙有过两次交锋，亚特兰大1平1负处于下风。两队虽然目前的积分是亚特兰大领先，但实际上由于夏季转会中都没有引入能够明显提升球队的球星，因此两队实力应当还是在同一档次，亚特兰大的成绩有很大偶然性，平均赔率1.783.264.55对亚特兰大更为看好，亚洲初盘多开到半一超高水，主队也并非稳操胜券。6、卡利亚里VS乌迪内推荐：31三轮过后，两队分别有6分和7分入账，表现相当出色。2000年以来两队在意甲共交锋16次，乌迪内9胜3平4负占据明显的上风，其中近5次相遇从未被卡利亚里击败过。平均赔率2.463.112.78与上季乌迪内前来挑战相比，客胜赔率有比较明显的提升，这也说明在经历过夏季转会的运筹之后，乌迪内的实力还是有所下降到的，主流公司中BWIN和Centrebet等在周中之后有压低主胜的调整趋势，本场可以谨慎看好主队不败。7、卡塔尼亚VS尤文推荐：10对博洛尼亚的比赛中武西尼奇功过各半，尤文也因此结束了连胜势头，不过对于上赛季连欧战资格都没捞到的尤文来说，现在的开局表现的确能够明显提升球队的自信。《都灵体育报》预测尤文的阵容将会做出一些调整，埃里亚取代停赛的武西尼奇，马特里作为单箭头，尤文可能会摆出一个4141的阵形，这应当也是为下轮迎战AC米兰(微博)作战术准备。平均赔率3.833.161.96很正路地看好尤文客让半球中水，双选尤文客场不败比较稳妥。8、帕尔马VS罗马推荐：30关于罗马的焦点在于，如果罗马继续不胜，恩里克会不会步加斯佩里尼的后尘？除了因伤缺阵的斯特克伦博格，罗马其他主力均能出场，恩里克如何选择阵容因此也更加引人注目。两队的交锋中罗马占据绝对优势，2001年以来在联赛和杯赛中对帕尔马15胜3平2负，其中客场也是连续6次交锋保持不败。帕尔马是目前意甲失球最多的球队之一，面对罗马的前锋防线告破的可能性较大，不过随着乔温科的复出，帕尔马坐镇主场也有进球机会。由于恩里克指挥罗马在本赛季的正式比赛中还未胜过，平均赔率2.883.082.39因此对客队的信心也不是很强，本场两队打出大比分的可能性较大，看好两队分胜负。9、拉齐奥VS巴勒莫推荐：3一度以请辞来激将的雷贾终于率领拉齐奥获得赛季首胜，预计本场将延续上轮的首发阵容；巴勒莫在力克卡利亚里之后取得主场两连胜，不过第一个客场输给亚特兰大的表现还是相对弱了一些。两队历史交锋中势均力敌，各胜6场之外只有3场平局。尽管积分上巴勒莫尚处领先地位，但平均赔率1.813.314.27还是认为夏天走了多名核心之后，巴勒莫还将遇到更多的考验，亚洲初盘半球低水，可以考虑拉齐奥主胜做胆。10、莱万特VS西班牙人推荐：31两队交锋中莱万特1胜3平4负处于明显下风，不过本季莱万特的表现令人刮目相看，上周末爆冷战胜皇马(微博)之后，莱万特士气上扬，再接再厉客场又拿下瓦列卡诺，目前竟然排名前列；西班牙人仍然保持着主场出色的特点，目前的6分全部来自主场，客场却先后输给马洛卡和萨拉戈萨，遭到两连败。平均赔率2.073.223.43正路看好成绩出人意料的莱万特，主流公司的主胜赔率多数是从2.30以上下调到2.00－2.05之间，亚洲初盘给到平半低水，可以小敲主队不败。11、格兰纳达VS奥萨苏纳推荐：10格兰纳达上一个主场战胜维拉利尔取得首胜，从实力上来看，这支1976年降级之后首次重返西甲的球队无疑是本季降级的大热门，而且阵中缺少拥有丰富西甲经验的球员，这对于格兰纳达的保级相当不利；从比赛过程和数据上来看，格兰纳达战胜维拉利尔有很大的偶然性，其他3场联赛一球未进还是很说明问题的。平均赔率2.223.173.13略为倾向主场作战的格兰纳达，不过从主流公司的赔率体系来看，本场客胜的几率似乎更高一些。12、希洪VS桑坦德推荐：32001年以来两队在甲乙两级交锋中，希洪1胜2平5负处于完全下风，唯一的胜利是上季西甲倒数第2轮，希洪在战胜桑坦德之后才算是彻底保级成功。本季两队的开局都不好，希洪4连败积分垫底，桑坦德也是迄今不胜，排名倒数第4。平均赔率2.053.223.49仍然是略为倾向主场作战的希洪，主流公司的主胜基本分布在2.00－2.05区间，亚洲初盘给主队半球高水，本场上盘值得一博。13、萨拉戈萨VS马拉加推荐：30马拉加取得三连胜，3场比赛的得失球为6:0，智利工程师执教的功夫逐渐显露出来，除了佩莱格里尼之外，还有谁能在短期之内将众多新人捏合成为一支防守如此出色的球队！萨拉戈萨的主帅阿吉雷(JavierAguirre)亦是业内名帅，曾执教奥萨苏纳、马竞以及墨西哥国家队。平均赔率3.193.302.14及其调整还是看好客场作战的马拉加，不过近两场比赛萨拉戈萨的进攻打得很猛，马拉加并无必胜把握。14、雷恩VS圣埃蒂安推荐：3两队近期交锋中，雷恩在法甲和杯赛中5胜2平优势明显。本赛季的开局阶段，雷恩也表现得十分出色，目前是排名积分榜的第2位，而且是法甲进球最多的球队。值得注意的是，雷恩迄今的17粒入球是由9名球员打入的，这说明雷恩的进攻并未完全依赖进攻核心蒙塔诺(VictorMontano，哥伦比亚前锋)，球队的进攻点多，得分手法多样，令对手不太好防。圣埃蒂安开局两连胜之后突然陷入低迷，近5轮法甲只拿到2分，过多的伤病显然对球队的影响较大。平均赔率1.783.284.47与往季比较变化不大，主场作战的雷恩胜望颇浓。临场推荐和任九实战请关注关小刀(微博)的博客(关小刀)
person: 阿吉雷,沙夫,埃里亚,马特里,蒙塔诺,武西尼奇,雷贾,加斯佩里尼,斯特克伦博格,恩里克,关小刀,乔温科

In the confrontation between the two teams, Rome has an absolute advantage.
