content: 《全城戒备》郭富城受访现实生活不怕被女人骗晨报记者彭骥陈木胜作品《全城戒备》即将于8月6日上映。昨日，《全城戒备》导演陈木胜携主演郭富城、邹兆龙、张静初、吴京等沪上宣传，女主角舒淇因忙于《非诚勿扰2》的拍摄缺席。现场，主创们大玩“末日怎么办”的游戏，问及爱情时，郭富城表示，自己不介意生活中被女人利用。昨日的发布会上，主持人对陈木胜、郭富城、邹兆龙、张静初、吴京等来了个“末日来临选谁一起”、“末日前一天选谁一起”的拷问。前一个问题，邹兆龙人气最旺，其他三人都选他一起，张静初表示，“末日之城”坏人多，和邹兆龙一起可以“以坏制坏”。后一个问题，张静初最受宠，郭富城、邹兆龙、吴京等都选了这位美女，郭富城笑言：“当然，最后一天啦，不和张静初一起没机会了。”接受媒体采访时，郭富城被问到，片中被舒淇利用，生活中被女人利用怎么办？郭富城表示，自己现实生活中不怕被女人利用。“以前小孩子的时候，会很在意别人骗我，对我感情不真。现在，40岁了，不是小孩子了，跟外面所有的人，也希望摆脱做偶像的包袱，都会打开心门沟通，不会设范。不会想是不是在利用我，这样交不到朋友。”就舒淇和张静初两位配戏女演员而言，哪种类型更合心意呢？郭富城没有正面回答：“现在不会光看外表，更在意对方的思想。”
person: 陈木胜,吴京,邹兆龙,张静初,舒淇,郭富城,彭骥
en: "Everyone on guard" Guo Fucheng was interviewed in real life. He was not afraid of being cheated by women. Chen Mugeng, a reporter from Chen Mugeng, is going to be released on August 6. Yesterday, Chen Mugeng, the director of "Everyone on Guard", brought the main actors Guo Fucheng, Zou Shaolong, Zhang Jingchu, Wu Jing and other Shanghai publicists. The heroine Shu Qi was absent because she was busy shooting "If You Don't Disturb 2". At the scene, the game of "what to do at the end of the world" was played. When asked about love, Guo Fucheng said that he didn't mind being used by women in his life. At yesterday's press conference, the host asked Chen Mugeng, Guo Fucheng, Zou Shaolong, Zhang Jingchu, Wu Jing and others a question of "who to choose when the end is coming" and "who to choose the day before the end". For the first question, Zou Shaolong is the most popular. The other three all choose him. Zhang Jingchu said that there are many bad people in "City of Doom", and it can "control bad with bad" with Zou Shaolong. For the second question, Zhang Jingchu was the most popular. Guo Fucheng, Zou Shaolong, Wu Jing and other beauties were selected. Guo Fucheng joked: "Of course, there is no chance to be with Zhang Jingchu on the last day." When interviewed by the media, Guo Fucheng was asked what to do if he was used by women in his life? Guo Fucheng said that he was not afraid of being used by women in his real life. "When I was a child, I would care about others cheating me and being untrue to me. Now, at 40, I'm not a child. I hope to get rid of the burden of being an idol with all the people outside, and I will open my heart to communicate. I will not set a model. I will not consider whether to use me or not, so I can't make friends." As for the two supporting actresses, Shu Qi and Zhang Jingchu, which type is more desirable? Guo Fucheng did not give a positive answer: "Now, I will not just look at the appearance, but pay more attention to the other's thoughts."

content: 《国王的演讲》夺韩票房冠军尹恩惠新片排第三新浪娱乐讯好莱坞影片《国王的演讲》在韩国上映两周后，终于在上周末首次夺得了周末票房榜冠军。好莱坞科幻片《洛杉矶之战》创下了16万8636名观众，排在了票房榜第二位，同时总观影人数突破100万大关，达到了116万2474名；尹恩惠等女星主演的韩国国产影片《我的黑色小礼服》在上周末动员13万9980名观众，排在了票房榜第三位。据韩国电影振兴委员会最新发布票房统计数据显示，3月17日在韩国上映的《国王的演讲》上周末三天时间里动员了17万3231名观众，在韩国周末票房榜名列第一位，同时该片在韩国的总观影人数已经达到了51万5160名。《国王的演讲》讲述了英国国王乔治六世克服口吃的毛病，成为受国民尊敬的国王的故事，该片在今年的奥斯卡颁奖礼行获得12个奖项提名，并最终获得四项大奖，因此该片在韩国上映后吸引了众多影迷们的关注。姜善爱/文版权所有Mydaily禁止转载
person: 姜善爱,乔治六世,尹恩惠
en: The King's Speech wins the top spot in South Korea's box office. Yoon Eun-hye's new film ranks third. Sina Entertainment News Hollywood film The King's Speech finally won the top spot in the weekend box office last weekend after two weeks of its release in South Korea. Hollywood's sci-fi film "Battle of Los Angeles" broke the record of 1608636 viewers, ranking second in the box office list, while the total number of viewers exceeded the million mark, reaching 1162474; The South Korean domestic film My Black Little Black Dress, starring Yoon Eun-hui and other actresses, mobilized 139980 viewers last weekend, ranking third in the box office list. According to the latest box office statistics released by the South Korean Film Promotion Committee, the King's Speech, which was released in South Korea on March 17, mobilized 173231 viewers in three days last weekend, ranking first in the South Korean weekend box office list, and the total number of viewers in South Korea has reached 515160. The King's Speech tells the story of King George VI of the United Kingdom overcoming stuttering and becoming a king respected by the people. The film has won 12 nominations at this year's Oscar Awards and finally won four awards, so it has attracted the attention of many film fans after its release in South Korea. Jiang Shuanai/Wen Copyright Mydaily is forbidden to reprint

content: 赶集网多名高管因公关风波离职日前，赶集网多名高管突然集体离职，舆论掀起对赶集网被愚弄的猜测：由姚晨代言的赶集网花了2亿元做广告，但因为广告中的驴子太过“招摇”，被赶驴网钻了空子。有网友甚至大呼，赶集网上了敌人当了！与此同时，赶集网的关注度和搜索量急剧上升。赶集网真的上当了吗？凭一篇公关稿蹿红的赶驴网真能把赶集网“公关”下去?赶驴网凭公关稿蹿红“赶集啦！我有一只小毛驴，我从来也不骑。”这句广告词对于经常出行的人来说恐怕不会陌生。从2月初开始，由姚晨代言的15秒钟赶集网广告片同时在中央电视台、地铁和公交移动电视等媒体上循环播放，开展“地毯式”的营销轰炸。令人没想到的是，赶集网的竞争对手百姓网注册了一个“山寨”的赶驴网，借了一把赶集网的风。赶驴网不仅做了一个类似于赶集网的网站标识，还提出类似于赶集网“赶集网，啥都有”的口号——“赶驴网，啥没有？”，“山寨”度相当惊人。此外，诸如《2亿广告费炒红赶驴网》等文章一夜之间在网上广为传播，内容大多称百姓网成功地四两拨千斤，仅花费200元注册了赶驴网的域名“ganlvwang”，就坐享赶集网数亿元广告效果，流量大幅攀升。在业内人士看来，这不过是一场华丽的炒作。赶集网的广告在2月初开始播出，网民对赶驴网的搜索量一直不多。直至当月19日网上出现关于赶驴网的文章时，搜索量才有了较大的提升。赶集网用公关反击舆论似乎并不同情被“山寨”的赶集网。相反，网上出现“赶集网就知道砸钱”和“广告创意存在缺陷”等质疑声。对此，赶集网迅速发起公关反击。名人的议论无疑对本次“驴子事件”起到了扩大效应。创新工场李开复在微博上出了一道题：“考考大家：赶集网首页下方有个‘赶驴网’的友情链接，但点开后才发现是链接到赶集网，又回到原页。为什么？”其实，这不过是赶集网为了防止赶驴网分走流量而作的反击。此外，赶集网还迅速购买了“赶驴”的关键字搜索。3月15日，广告创意人叶茂中在微博中表示：“因为赶集网广告片‘小毛驴篇’大获成功，赶集网投资人今日资本总裁徐新今天送我一台最新款‘苹果’庆贺。”业内人士称，这一做法有明显的危机公关痕迹。赶集网CEO杨浩涌说：“‘赶驴网’占整个搜索流量的千分之一不到。作为企业，更应该关注产品的用户体验和公司长期发展战略，而不是一些小技巧。小技巧带来了几百个用户，但伤害了品牌。说得再过一些，即使抢注了开心网的域名，那又能怎样？过了几年，有谁还记得这个赶驴网？”高管离职原因存疑最近两天，随着赶驴网的关注度下降，赶集网的关注度趋稳。正当外界认为此事将告一段落时，赶集网主管市场与公关的副总裁邓漫、主管SEO（SEO指利用搜索引擎的搜索规则来提高网站在搜索引擎内的排名）的副总裁吕英建以及SEO总监郭彦景离职。杨浩涌向记者证实了这一消息。杨浩涌并未透露这些高管的离职原因。他否认是因为“驴子事件”炒了这些人鱿鱼。他表示：“离职是在广告投放前的1月份。广告效果很好，我们会继续加大投放。”然而，郭彦景的微博显示，郭在2月的最后一天才离职。对此，一位网友疾呼：“赶驴广告即便弄巧成拙，也很容易反拙为巧，何错之有？自毁长城，上敌人的当了！”业内人士指出，因为一个广告就导致公司高管引咎辞职，这不免有些荒唐。就专业角度而言，赶集网的广告没有致命伤，其立体轰炸+经典歌谣+名人代言的效果显而易见。一场华丽的炒作从赶驴网的冒出，到赶集网的反击，再到赶集网高管的离职，赶集网关注度也保持了直线上升，刚注册的赶驴网也获得了相当的关注度。这场争斗中，究竟谁赢了？谁被公关了？首先，赶驴网利用网络公关稿制造舆论，购买关键词，高调“山寨”，迅速招致媒体和网民的关注。其后，赶集网的广告受到舆论质疑，赶集网、投资人和广告人纷纷加入危机公关。待事件即将平息时，赶集网高管离职，将舆论推向另一个小高潮。“如果没有赶驴网的‘毛驴’横插一腿，赶集网的百度关注指数将保持高位，直至3月初。然后随着广告影响力的下降，关注指数下降。”一位业内人士分析说，“赶驴网的‘山寨’让更多的人知道赶集网，将其品牌进行了二次放大。”在这次事件中，赶驴网的公关偷袭和赶集网的反攻都没有出现殊死搏斗的场景。就赶驴网而言，“这算是一次不错的公关炒作。”网络公关专家赵勇评论说，“赶集网的广告投放后，立刻引起了百姓网的关注。百姓网没有足够的资金展开正面竞争，便想出了赶驴网的策略，并在网上发布软文进行公关。”据记者了解，许多网民确实是看了网上的公关稿后才知道赶驴网，并不是从赶集网的广告直接联想到“赶驴”二字。(孙雨)
person: 叶茂中,吕英建,徐新,李开复,郭彦景,姚晨,杨浩涌,赵勇,邓漫
en: A number of executives of Ganji.com left their jobs due to a public relations crisis. Recently, a number of executives of Ganji.com suddenly left their jobs collectively, public opinion has speculated that Ganji.com has been fooled: Yao Chen, the spokesman of Ganji.com, spent 200 million yuan on advertising, but the donkey in the advertisement is too "showy", which has been taken advantage of by Ganji.com. Some netizens even shouted that the enemy was on the gathering network! At the same time, the attention and search volume of Ganji.com have risen sharply. Did the gathering network really fall for it? Can the donkey net, which has become popular with a public relations document, really "public relations" the gathering network down? The donkey net became popular with a public relations document, "Come on! I have a little donkey, I never ride." This advertisement is probably not unfamiliar to people who often travel. Since the beginning of February, the 15 second Ganji advertisement endorsed by Yao Chen has been循环played on media such as CCTV, subway and bus mobile TV, and a "carpet style" marketing bombardment has been carried out. Unexpectedly, Ganji.com's competitor, People's Network, registered a "pirated" donkey network, borrowing a lot of money from the gathering network. The donkey network not only made a website logo similar to the gathering network, but also put forward a slogan similar to the gathering network - "the donkey network, nothing?", which is quite surprising. In addition, articles such as "200 million advertising expenses to stir up the donkey network" spread widely on the Internet overnight, mostly saying that the people's network has successfully spent two thousand dollars, only 200 yuan to register the donkey network's domain name "ganlvwang", and enjoys the advertising effect of billions of yuan from the gathering network, and the traffic has risen sharply. In the view of industry insiders, this is just a gorgeous炒作. Ganji's advertisement began to air in early February, and netizens have not searched for much about Ganji. Not until the 19th of this month did the online article about Donkey Net appear, and the search volume increased significantly. Ganji.com used public relations to counter public opinion, which seems to have no sympathy for the "pirated" Ganji.com. On the contrary, the Internet has come up with questions such as "Ganji just wants to throw money" and "there are defects in advertising creativity". In this regard, Ganji Network quickly launched a public relations counterattack. The discussion of celebrities undoubtedly had an amplification effect on this "donkey event". Li Kaifu of Innovation Factory asked a question on microblog: "Examine everyone: There is a 'Donkey Net' friendship link below the home page of Ganji. However, when you click on it, you find that it is linked to Ganji, and then return to the original page. Why?" In fact, this is just a counter attack of Ganji in order to prevent Donkey Network from sharing traffic. In addition, Ganji Network quickly purchased the keyword "donkey". On March 15, Ye Maozhong, an advertising creative person, said on his microblog: "Because the 'Little Donkey' chapter of the Ganji Network advertisement was a great success, Xu Xin, the president of Ganji Network's investor Today Capital, sent me the latest 'Apple' to celebrate today." Industry insiders said that this practice had obvious crisis public relations marks. Yang Haoyong, CEO of Ganji.com, said: "The 'Donkey Network' accounts for less than one thousandth of the total search traffic. As an enterprise, we should pay more attention to the user experience of products and the long-term development strategy of the company, rather than some small skills. Small skills bring hundreds of users, but hurt the brand. To put it another way, even if you grab the domain name of Kaixin.com, what can you do? In a few years, who will remember this donkey network?" The reason for the resignation of executives is questionable. In the past two days, with the decline of the attention of Donkey Network, the attention of Ganji Network has stabilized. Just when the outside world thought that this matter would come to an end, Deng Man, the vice president in charge of marketing and public relations of Ganji.com, Lv Yingjian, the vice president in charge of SEO (SEO refers to the use of search engines' search rules to improve the ranking of websites in search engines), and Guo Yanjing, the director of SEO, left. Yang Haoyong confirmed the news to the reporter. Yang Haoyong did not disclose the reasons for the resignation of these executives. He denied that it was because of the "donkey incident" that these people were fired. He said: "The resignation was in January, before the advertisement was launched. The advertising effect is good, we will continue to increase the investment." However, Guo Yanjing's microblog shows that Guo resigned on the last day of February. In this regard, a netizen cried out: "Even if the donkey advertisement is clever, it is easy to turn it around. What's wrong? Self destruct the Great Wall, and take the enemy's lead!" Industry insiders pointed out that it was ridiculous that an advertisement could lead to the resignation of the company's executives. In terms of professionalism, the advertisement of Ganji.com has no fatal damage, and its effect of stereo bombing + classic nursery rhymes + celebrity endorsement is obvious. From the emergence of Donkey Network, to the counterattack of Ganji Network, and then to the resignation of Ganji executives, the attention of Ganji Network has also risen steadily, and the newly registered Donkey Network has also received considerable attention. Who won in this fight? Who was publicized? First, Donkey Network uses online public relations manuscripts to create public opinion, purchase keywords, and publicize "pirated" versions in a high-profile manner, which quickly causes the media and netizens to pay attention. Later, the advertisement of Ganji.com was questioned by public opinion, and Ganji.com, investors and advertisers all joined in the crisis public relations. When the incident was about to calm down, the executives of Ganji.com resigned, pushing public opinion to another small climax. "If the 'Donkey' of the Donkey Network does not cross its legs, the Baidu Attention Index of the Gathering Network will remain high until the beginning of March. Then, as the influence of the advertisement decreases, the attention index decreases." An industry insider analyzed that "The 'pirated' version of Donkey Network has let more people know about the Gathering Network, which has amplified its brand for the second time." In this event, neither the public relations sneak attack of Donkey Network nor the counterattack of Ganji Network showed a scene of a fight to the death. In terms of Donkey Network, "This is a good public relations炒作." Zhao Yong, a network public relations expert, commented that "After the advertisement of Ganji.com was launched, it immediately attracted the attention of the People's Network. The People's Network does not have enough funds to launch a positive competition, so it comes up with the strategy of catching donkeys and publishes soft articles online for public relations." According to the reporter, many netizens really know the donkey network only after they have seen the online public relations draft, not from the advertisement of the donkey network. (Sun Yu)

content: 下跌市股东增持逾3亿股94%获利《投资者报》分析员杨秀红股指节节败退，股东增持潮纷至沓来。自4月16日股指期货推出，A股市场就一直在震荡下跌中。上证综指4月及5月跌幅约分别达到8%和10%。市场大跌两市哀鸿遍野之际，上市公司股东逆市增持的消息却不断传来，很多忍不住减仓的投资者开始犹豫。据《投资者报》数据研究部的统计，4月以来，上市公司股东已增持逾3亿股，其中5月增持市值超越减持市值，一举实现净增值。2008年10月浮现以来，时隔19个月，这一现象再度重现。观察本轮增持潮背后的“推手”，上市公司的高管表现得热情很高，多家公司出现10余位高管集体增持的场面。不过各家高管的增持数量则是“雷声大雨点小”，大部分高管增持数量均在10万股以下。真正进行大规模增持的，则是“公司”类股东，其增持数量占到本轮增持总量的九成以上。在激进增持后，上市公司股东多有斩获，增持股票在4月及5月的大跌市中大面积逆市上扬、为其带来不菲的账面浮盈。5月增持量创19个月新高据《投资者报》数据研究部统计，今年以来，以月度为单位，在1月累计公告增持数量超过1亿股后，2、3月份迅速萎缩到不足873万股和212万股。伴随着4月以来市场的急速下挫，上市公司股东月度增持规模出现了大规模回升。其中，4月公告增持数量达到2199万股，环比增长逾9倍。此后，在股市继续下探寻底的5月，更是涌现出少有的增持潮，其月度增持数量一举攀升到3亿股左右，环比飙升逾12倍，这是继2009年9月之后，增持数量再度接近3亿股大关。历史上月增持数量超过3亿股的月份也仅有10余个。与此同时，上市公司股东公告增持市值也随之出现大幅波动：1月增持市值创出小新高，接近16亿元，而2月、3月增持市值则下滑到2.8亿元和0.3亿元。随着4月、5月增持潮的涌现，股东公告增持市值也分别回升至3.5亿元和32亿元。截至6月15日，4月以来上市公司股东已经合计增持约3.2亿股，增持市值超过35亿元。在5月汹涌的增持潮和减持规模退潮的背后，催生了罕见的净增持现象。据我部统计，5月股东累计公告增持市值接近32亿元，一举超越同期约19亿元的公告减持规模。Wind资讯统计显示，以月度为单位，A股市场上次出现股东净增持的时间为2008年10月份，当月上市公司股东合计公告增持市值为11亿元，公告减持市值为10亿元。这意味着，时隔19个月后，A股市场股东再现净增持现象。且今年5月股东净增持规模比2008年10月股市见底之时的势头更猛烈。据我们此前的统计，上市公司股东增持潮一般在市场筑底阶段出现，如2005年10月、2008年9月等。此次，大股东再次推动新一轮增持潮，无疑给处于“熊途”的投资者一线希望。长江电力再成增持主要目标观察本轮增持潮背后的主要“幕后推手”，无外乎三大主力，即公司、高管和个人。按增持股东类型(公司、高管、个人)划分，4月以来发布的78次增持公告中，有71次增持出自高管和公司之手，占总数的91%。其中，高管公告增持次数达到46次，居首位。有多家公司涌现了众多高管一齐增持的局面。如南通科技、长航油运、柳化股份等，其背后增持的高管多达10余位。其中，长航油运增持公告显示，5月13日、14日，包括该公司董事长刘锡汉、副董事长朱宁、总经理李万锦等在内的13位高管对自家股票进行了回购，其合计购入股票数量约57万股，成交价格在5.37元至5.5元之间。柳化股份增持公告也显示，5月13日、14日，公司董事长廖能成、副董事长、总经理覃永强、董事苏东升等10位高管共计购入约67万股。每位上市公司高管增持数量，大部分都在10万股以下，多数只购入两三万股；5月增持最多的高管——宗申动力的董事长左宗申增持100万股，增持市值仅为1015万元，且所有高管的增持数量仅390万股，占4月以来总增持量的1.2%，增持势头明显是“雷声大雨点小”。相对于高管的增持，一些“公司”类股东显得较为激进。4月以来累计以“公司”身份增持的股东有16家，合计增持数量达到3.1亿股，合计增持市值达到34.6亿元，占总数的98%。据Wind数据统计，4月公告增持的公司有两家，分别为冀东水泥和中兴商业，5月公告增持的公司则迅速攀升到22家，增持数量最多前两家为长江电力和国电电力。前者的大股东长江三峡集团合计公告增持超1亿股，增持市值逾14亿元；后者的大股东中国国电集团公司合计买入8153万股，公告增持市值达5.43亿元。作为增持主力军，长江电力并非第一次担当月度增持冠军的角色。在今年1月的增持中，长江电力控股股东长江三峡集团就在当月增持了1亿多股，成为当月增持的领军人物。历史上的增持潮中，该集团曾多次出手，大规模回购自家股票。如2009年8月的超千万股增持，2006年7月的近2亿股的增持等。本轮增持潮股东94%获利我部统计了始于今年4月的这场增持潮中股东们的“账单”，结果显示多数股东获得了不错的回报。在4月以来的78次增持公告中，我们剔除了实际发生在今年二季度以前的增持行为。其中，国电电力、海信电器和柳化股份等三家公司，因为在股东增持之后实施了分红送配方案，我们根据其送转方案另行计算了其账面盈亏情况。对于其余上市公司，我们均按照股东平均增持成本及最新股价(6月11日收盘价，下同)的差价测算。最终测算结果显示，94%的增持为其股东带来正收益。在今年5月进行增持且在5月发布增持公告的公司中，海信电器股东青岛海信电子公司的盈利幅度最大，达到26%。此外，宗申动力、上海金陵、南通科技等也为其增持股东带来了超10%的正收益。
person: 杨秀红,廖能成,刘锡汉,朱宁,覃永强,苏东升,李万锦,左宗申
en: The shares of shareholders in the falling market increased by more than 300 million shares, 94% of them made profits. Yang Xiuhong, an analyst of the Investor newspaper, reported that the stock index was retreating one after another, and the shareholders were increasing their shares. Since the launch of stock index futures on April 16, the A-share market has been in a state of volatility and decline. The declines of Shanghai Composite Index in April and May were about 8% and 10% respectively. At the time of the market's huge decline, the news of shareholders of listed companies increasing their shares in the market kept coming, and many investors who could not help reducing their positions began to hesitate. According to the statistics of the Data Research Department of the Investor newspaper, since April, shareholders of listed companies have increased more than 300 million shares, and the market value of the shares increased in May has exceeded the market value of the shares reduced, achieving a net increase in one fell swoop. Nineteen months later, this phenomenon reappeared in October 2008. The executives of listed companies behind the "pusher" of this round of increase tide showed great enthusiasm, and more than a dozen executives of many companies collectively increased their holdings. However, the number of shares increased by executives of each company is "thunderstorm and small raindrop", and most of the executives' shares increased by less than 100000 shares. The real large-scale increase is the "company" shareholders, and the number of shares they increase accounts for more than 90% of the total number of shares in this round of increase. After the aggressive increase, shareholders of listed companies have made a lot of achievements. The shares increased in April and May rose against the market in the face of the huge decline in the market, bringing considerable floating profits to them. According to the statistics of the Data Research Department of the Investor's Report, the amount of shares increased in May hit a new high in 19 months. Since this year, in January, the cumulative number of shares announced to increase in January exceeded 100 million shares, and then rapidly shrank to less than 8.73 million shares and 2.12 million shares in February and March. With the sharp decline of the market since April, the monthly increase of shareholders of listed companies has shown a large-scale recovery. In April, the number of shares announced to be increased reached 21.99 million shares, up more than nine times month on month. After that, in May, when the stock market continued to bottom out, there was a rare increase trend, and the number of shares increased in the month climbed to around 300 million, up more than 12 times month on month. This is the second time that the number of shares increased has approached the 300 million share mark since September 2009. There are also only more than a dozen months in history when the number of shares increases in a month exceeds 300 million. At the same time, the market value of shareholders' announcement of listed companies also showed a large fluctuation: the market value of the announcement of the increase in January hit a new low of nearly 1.6 billion yuan, while the market value of the announcement of the increase in February and March fell to 280 million yuan and 300 million yuan. With the emergence of the increase tide in April and May, the shareholders' announcement of the increase in market value also rose to 350 million yuan and 3.2 billion yuan respectively. As of June 15, shareholders of listed companies have increased a total of about 320 million shares since April, with an increase in market value exceeding 3.5 billion yuan. Behind the surge of the massive increase in May and the retreat of the reduction scale, there is a rare net increase. According to the statistics of our department, in May, shareholders cumulatively announced an increase in market value of nearly 3.2 billion yuan, far exceeding the announced reduction scale of about 1.9 billion yuan in the same period. Wind Information Statistics shows that the last time shareholders of A-share market made a net increase on a monthly basis was in October 2008. In that month, shareholders of listed companies announced an increase in market value of 1.1 billion yuan and an announced reduction in market value of 1 billion yuan. This means that 19 months later, shareholders of the A-share market have again shown a net increase. Moreover, the scale of shareholders' net increase in May this year is more fierce than that when the stock market hit the bottom in October 2008. According to our previous statistics, the increase tide of shareholders of listed companies generally occurs at the stage of market bottoming, such as October 2005 and September 2008. This time, the major shareholders once again promoted a new round of increase tide, which undoubtedly gave investors a ray of hope in the "bear journey". Changjiang Electric Power has again become the main target of the increase. The main "behind the scenes" behind this round of increase tide is nothing but three main forces, namely, companies, executives and individuals. According to the type of shareholders (companies, executives, individuals) who increase their shares, in the 78 increase announcements released since April, 71 increases came from executives and companies, accounting for 91% of the total. Among them, executives' announcement of share increase reached 46 times, the first place. Many companies have emerged with many executives increasing their shares together. Such as Nantong Technology, Changhang Oil Transport, Liu Huafeng, and so on. There are more than a dozen executives behind them. Among them, the announcement of Changhang Oil Transport's share increase shows that on May 13 and 14, Liu Xihan, the chairman of the company, Zhu Ning, the vice chairman, Li Wanjin, the general manager, and other 13 executives repurchased their own stocks, with a total purchase of about 570000 shares and the transaction price between 5.37 yuan and 5.5 yuan. Liu Huafeng's share increase announcement also shows that on May 13 and 14, Liu Engcheng, the chairman of the company, Tan Yongqiang, the vice chairman and general manager, Su Dongsheng, the director, and other 10 executives purchased about 670000 shares in total. The number of shares increased by each executive of a listed company is mostly less than 100000 shares, and most of them only purchase two or three thousand shares; The chairman of Zongshen Power, the executive with the largest increase in May, Zongshen Zongshen, increased 1 million shares, and the market value of the increase was only 10.15 million yuan. Moreover, all executives' shares increased by only 3.9 million shares, accounting for 1.2% of the total increase since April, and the trend of increasing shares was obviously "thunderstorm and drizzle". In contrast with the increase of executives, some "company" shareholders are relatively radical. Since April, 16 shareholders who have accumulated shares in the name of "company" have increased their shares by 310 million shares, with a total market value of 3.46 billion yuan, accounting for 98% of the total. According to Wind data statistics, the companies that announced to increase their shares in April were Jidong Cement and Zhongxing Commercial, and the companies that announced to increase their shares in May quickly rose to 22, with the largest number of shares being the two companies, Changjiang Electric Power and Guodian Electric Power. The largest shareholder of the former, China Three Gorges Group, announced an increase of more than 100 million shares, with an increase in market value of more than 1.4 billion yuan; The largest shareholder of the latter, China Guodian Group, purchased 81.53 million shares, with an announced increase in market value of 543 million yuan. As the main force of the share increase, Changjiang Electric Power is not the first time to play the role of the monthly share increase champion. In the share increase in January this year, the controlling shareholder of Changjiang Electric Power, China Three Gorges Group, increased more than 100 million shares in the same month, becoming the leading figure of the share increase in January. In the history of the share increase tide, the Group has made many moves to repurchase its own shares on a large scale. Such as the share increase of more than 10 million shares in August 2009 and the share increase of nearly 20 million shares in July 2006. 94% of the shareholders in this round of share increase made profits. Our department has counted the "bill" of the shareholders in this round of share increase since April this year, and the results show that most shareholders have received good returns. In the 78 share increase announcements since April, we have eliminated the share increase behavior that actually occurred before the second quarter of this year. Among them, Guodian Power, Hisense Electric and Liu Huafeng, because they implemented the dividend and matching distribution plan after shareholders' share increase, we calculated their account profit and loss according to their matching plan. For other listed companies, we calculated the difference between the average share increase cost of shareholders and the latest share price (the closing price on June 11, the same below). The final calculation results show that 94% of the shares are increased, bringing positive returns to their shareholders. Among the companies that increased their shares in May this year and issued a share increase announcement in May, Qingdao Hisense Electronics, the shareholder of Hisense Electric, made the biggest profit of 26%. In addition, Zhongshen Power, Shanghai Jinling, Nantong Technology and other companies also brought a positive return of more than 10% to their shareholders who increased their holdings.

content: 北京首证：趋势未改变短调必受限⊙北京首证两市昨日惯性低开后均呈遇阻深幅回落态势，大盘还放量击穿了短期均线，行情结束的声音随之也甚嚣尘上。但无论从量价看，还是由热点判断，惯性下探后都很可能会企稳回升，即反弹格局尚未发生逆转，昨日的重挫只是改变了运行速率而已，甚至可能成为缓解“旱情”的一场春雨。趋势未改变短调必受限虽说年线往往会得到格外的关注，沪市近日恰好遇阻于该线，但年线却远没有想象得那么重要，因为沪市已上穿12月线并站上了4季度均线，而深市则在3月便攻克了以日、周、月、季计的所有年线。近日之所以反复，关键就在于近期累计涨幅偏大(两市一个月内分别大涨近21%、27%)，可周阳线实体长度却逐渐缩短，上周五还形成阴吞阳的不良组合，指标也长时间处于高位钝化状态，这就意味着大盘实际已发生了微妙的变化，反复随时都可能会出现，特别是在近期通道上轨附近。但值得注意的，一是中期趋势(即一个多月来的低点连线)并未破坏，该线以日均约11.5点的速度上行，今日约位于2304点；二是此前上攻构成的形态出现上升楔形的诸多迹象，在难以向上拓宽空间时，市场经常就会选择向下回探趋势线的支撑，换言之，回调是修正通道(及指标过高)的需要，原始上升趋势线与3、4月之交反复时的低点以及21日均线等恰好汇聚在2300点上下，短线下探至此企稳回升可能自然就更大些。缩量是正道时势已不同前三周的量能虽持续放大，但无论周还是日成交量都没有改写年内的天量纪录，而周成交额的增幅则从四成多缩减至不足4%，且截至上周，两市自去年10月底以来的总量已高达14.5万亿，即约为2007年10月见顶后下调时总量的一半，短期反复可能自然也会有所加大。不过，这一量能标准实际上是不够的，因为市场的流通市值已经大大增加，绝对成交额以及换手率高低也就不能简单类比。与此相似，所谓前期成交密集区也不足以构成阻力，或者说这种市场压力实际已大大减轻。不仅市场容量已发生重大变化，而且由行情性质看，量能长时间居高不下也并非好事，因为巨量就是多空分歧很大的必然结果，缩量反弹才有利于行情延续得更长。所谓缩量，也绝不是说量能持续萎缩，而是说在某一合适的区间内随大盘涨跌而缩放。简单说，(周)日均成交超过2000亿很可能导致行情提早结束，若低于1500亿，上攻力度则会减弱，即1750亿左右极可能是最有利的。另外笔者认为，蓝筹整体走弱往往难以持续，短期变数因此加大，而这种变数至少是止跌企稳。
en: Beijing's first proof: the trend has not changed, and the short adjustment must be restricted ⊙ Beijing's first proof that both cities were惯ual low open yesterday, and then they all encountered deep setbacks. The market also broke through the short moving average, and the voice of the end of the market was very noisy. But whether from the perspective of quantity and price, or from the perspective of hot spots, it is very likely to stabilize and rise after being惯ual to probe, that is, the rebound pattern has not reversed, and yesterday's heavy blow only changed the running speed, or it may become a spring rain to alleviate the "drought". The short adjustment must be limited because the trend has not changed. Although the annual line often gets special attention, the Shanghai Stock Exchange has just encountered obstacles on this line in recent days, the annual line is far less important than imagined, because the Shanghai Stock Exchange has passed the December line and stood on the fourth quarter moving average, while the Shenzhen Stock Exchange has攻克d all annual lines in months, weeks, months and quarters since March. The reason for the recent repetition is that the cumulative increase in recent days is too large (the two cities soared nearly 21% and 27% respectively within one month), but the length of the positive line of the week is gradually shortened, and the negative line swallowed the positive line last Friday to form a bad combination, and the index has been in a high state for a long time, which means that the market has actually changed subtly, and the repetition may occur at any time, especially in the vicinity of the upper track of the recent channel. However, it is worth noting that the medium-term trend (that is, the connection of more than one month's low points) has not been damaged. The line is rising at a speed of about 11.5 points per day, and today is about 2304 points; Second, the pattern formed by the previous attack shows many signs of a rising wedge shape. When it is difficult to widen space upward, the market often chooses to retreat to the trend line for support. In other words, the correction is necessary to correct the channel (and the index is too high). The original upward trend line, the low point when it was repeated at the junction of March and April, and the 21-day moving average just converge at around 2300 points, so it is more natural for the short line to stabilize and rise here. The so-called previous trading intensive area is also insufficient to constitute resistance, or the market pressure has actually been greatly reduced. The market capacity has changed significantly, and from the nature of the market, the fact that the market has been high for a long time is not a good thing, because huge volume is the inevitable result of a great difference between multiple and empty, and the decline of volume is conducive to the continuation of the market. The so-called shrinking volume does not mean that the volume continues to shrink, but that it can be expanded and contracted with the rise and fall of the market in a suitable interval. In short, (week) daily average trading volume exceeding 200 billion yuan is likely to lead to an early end of the market, and if it is less than 150 billion yuan, the attack will weaken, that is, 17.5 billion yuan is the most favorable. In addition, I think that the overall weakness of blue chips is often unsustainable, and the short-term variable is therefore increased, and this variable is at least to stop the decline and stabilize it.

content: WDL第一周XiaoKai弃权wfz夺冠WDL全称为Warcraft3DreamLeague，译为魔兽梦联赛，它形象生动的描绘出所有War3er心中那个电竞梦，而参与其中的则是敢于挑战自己的逐梦者，WDL面向所有电竞爱好者报名，旨在为广大电竞粉丝提供一个交流展示的平台。本周WDL，两名国内业余顶尖亡灵选手，XiaoKai和wfz会师决赛，最终XiaoKai由于种种原因，弃权了决赛。wfz不战而胜，获得WDL第一周的冠军。赛事奖励：　　冠军15000VS金币　　亚军7500VS金币　　季军4000VS金币
en: In the first week of WDL, XiaoKai abandoned wfz to win the championship. WDL is the abbreviation of Warcraft3DreamLeague, which is translated as Warcraft Dream League. It vividly depicts the e-sports dream in the hearts of all War3ers, and those who participate in it are daredevils who challenge themselves. WDL is open to all e-sports lovers, aiming to provide a platform for exchange and display for e-sports fans. This week's WDL, two domestic amateur top undead players, XiaoKai and wfz, met in the finals. Finally, XiaoKai withdrew from the finals for various reasons. Wfz won without a fight and won the championship of the first week of WDL. Event rewards: Champion 15000VS coins, Runner up 7500VS coins, Third place 4000VS coins

content: AC米兰有柄直插心脏的匕首意媒完美领袖1个月后诞生新浪体育讯　AC米兰主场3比0大胜巴勒莫，在进球的卡卡和因扎吉背后，没有人会忽视前两个进球的助攻者——安布罗西尼。mediaset赛后给了安布罗西尼7分，除了称赞他创造一个点球、助攻因扎吉进球外，还特地加了一句：“这样的安布罗西尼已证明了今年6月1日之后他有能力成为一名完美的队长。”马尔蒂尼退役后，安布罗西尼自然而然将从现在的队副升格为第一队长。尴尬的是，安布罗西尼与AC米兰的合同在2010年6月到期，至今米兰俱乐部没有主动提出续约，如果安布罗西尼只剩下一年时间做队长，他自己难以定心，对俱乐部未来更衣室平稳过渡也没有好处。在这个微妙的阶段，安布罗西尼首先用场上表现向俱乐部表明：至少我的竞技状态是可以信任的。安布罗西尼虽已32岁，但在对巴勒莫的比赛中依然像个不知道疲劳为何物的小伙子。三球大胜巴勒莫赢得轻松，关键在于前20分钟的两个进球打垮了对手的士气。安布罗西尼从一开场就进入状态，第6分钟接到贝克汉姆的角球中路冲顶被对方阻挡。第10分钟贝克汉姆长传找因扎吉，巴勒莫后卫解围未出禁区，卡萨尼正等待球从空中落下再次解围，安布罗西尼已抢先一步跃在空中触到球，卡萨尼出脚把安布罗西尼从半空中踢倒，毫无疑问是个犯规动作。主裁判里佐利果断吹罚点球，卡卡为米兰首开纪录。十分钟后诞生了因扎吉的进球，这次配合尤为精彩。安布罗西尼中场左侧将球交给卡卡，随即向禁区内直线插入，卡卡没有停球，顺势搓出挑传，落点与安布罗西尼的跑位完全吻合，安布罗西尼左脚凌空传到后门柱，无人盯防的因扎吉原地将球顶入。这显然是米兰训练中演练过无数遍的成熟套路，三人之间的配合环环相扣，技术方面依赖卡卡的传球脚法，战术上最关键一环就是安布罗西尼坚决的纵向插入。第39分钟安布罗西尼又在左翼拉开空档，第一时间横传给中路的因扎吉，中途被博沃破坏。以安布罗西尼的身体条件从肋部强行直线冲进禁区，几乎没有人能正面阻挡，这种强硬的跑位方式同他的头球优势相似，在AC米兰整体技术化的战术中显得很生硬，但又是必要的元素。有了安布罗西尼的冲击力，AC米兰准确的传球就可以在某个环节撞开缺口，形成直接的打击，有时是通过头球摆渡，有时是通过冲击性的跑位冲开防线。上一轮5比1大胜都灵，安布罗西尼就是通过“蛮不讲理”的纵向冲击力打进一球，还创造一个点球。安布罗西尼的技术特点并不独特，世界上能冲能抢的后腰多的是，但要达到与卡卡等人之间的默契，非一朝一夕之功，就连正值当打之年的弗拉米尼打后腰时也很难起到相同的作用。两场比赛，安布罗西尼创造两个点球，另有一个进球和一次助攻，在续约谈判前充分证明了自身的价值。AC米兰需要清洗的人有很多，但安布罗西尼这样赤胆忠心又有能力的老将无论如何不应该被轻视。(定春)
person: 安布罗西尼,卡萨尼,马尔蒂尼,博沃,卡卡,里佐利,因扎吉,弗拉米尼,贝克汉姆,定春
en: AC Milan has a dagger straight into the heart of the Italian media's perfect leader, which was born in a month. Sina Sports News AC Milan beat Palermo 3-0 at home. Behind the goal scorers Kaka and Inzaghi, no one will ignore the assistant of the first two goals - Ambrosini. Mediaset gave Ambrosini 7 points after the game. In addition to praising him for creating a penalty and assisting Inzaghi to score, he added: "Such Ambrosini has proved that he has the ability to become a perfect captain after June 1, 2006." After Maldini retired, Ambrosini naturally rose from the current vice captain to the first captain. Embarrassedly, Ambrosini's contract with AC Milan expired in June 2010, and so far, Milan Club has not taken the initiative to renew the contract. If Ambrosini has only one year left to be the captain, he will find it hard to make up his mind, and it will not be good for the club's future dressing room to transition smoothly. At this subtle stage, Ambrosini first showed the club that his competitive status was trustworthy. Although Ambrosini is 32 years old, he is still like a young man who doesn't know what fatigue is in the game against Palermo. Palermo won easily with a big score of three goals. The key is that the two goals in the first 20 minutes broke the morale of the opponent. Ambrosini gets into the state from the beginning. In the 6th minute, Beckham's corner ball was blocked in the middle of the road. In the 10th minute, Beckham looked for Inzaghi with a long pass. Palermo's defender didn't leave the禁区. Casani was waiting for the ball to fall from the air to defuse the siege again. Ambrosini had jumped first in the air to touch the ball. Casani kicked Ambrosini down from the air. There is no doubt that it is a foul action. The referee Rizzoli decisively called a penalty, and Kaka scored the first goal for Milan. Ten minutes later, Inzaghi scored a goal. This cooperation was particularly exciting. Ambrosini handed the ball to Kaka on the left side of the midfield, and then inserted directly into the禁区. Kaka didn't stop the ball. Instead, he rubbed it out and passed it. The landing point was completely in line with Ambrosini's running position. Ambrosini's left foot passed the ball to the latter door post, and the unmarked Inzaghi topped the ball on the spot. This is obviously a mature routine that Milan has practiced countless times in training. The cooperation between the three people is interlinked. Technically, it depends on Kaka's passing skills. The most important link in terms of tactics is Ambrosini's firm vertical insertion. In the 39th minute, Ambrosini opened up space on the left wing again and passed to Inzaghi in the middle of the first time, which was destroyed on the way by Bo Wei. With Ambrosini's physical conditions, it is almost impossible for anyone to stop him from breaking into the prohibition area from the rib in a straight line. This kind of tough running position is similar to his heading advantage. It is very rigid in the overall technical tactics of AC Milan, but it is a necessary element. With the impact of Ambrosini, the accurate pass of AC Milan can open a gap at some links, forming a direct attack. Sometimes it is through a header, and sometimes it is through an impulsive run to open the defense. In the last round, Ambrosini scored a goal with an "unreasonable" vertical impact and created a penalty for the 5-1 victory over Turin. Ambrosini's technical characteristics are not unique. There are many tough and tough defensive players in the world, but it is not an overnight success to achieve the tacit understanding between Kaka and others. Even Flamini, who is in his prime, is hard to play the same role when he plays in the back waist. In the two games, Ambrosini created two penalties, another goal and an assist, fully proving his own value before the renewal negotiation. AC Milan needs a lot of people to be cleaned up, but the old and capable players such as Ambrosini should not be underestimated in any case. (Ding Chun)
