content: 日本落实超600亿美元经济刺激计划新华网快讯：日本政府26日批准2010财政年度补充预算案，以落实超过600亿美元的经济刺激计划。
en: The Japanese government approved a supplementary budget for the fiscal year 2010 on the 26th to implement an economic stimulus package of more than 60 billion dollars. Xinhua News Flash

content: 也门一艘油船被索马里海盗劫持新华网萨那1月3日电(记者李腾)据也门媒体3日报道，一艘也门油船当天在亚丁湾被索马里海盗劫持。报道援引也门安全部门一位未透露姓名的官员的话说，这艘载有2000吨柴油的船只是在从南部的亚丁港驶往东部穆卡拉港的途中被海盗劫持的。这位官员没有透露其他细节。也门濒临红海的曼德海峡和阿拉伯海的亚丁湾，是通过苏伊士运河的必经之道。去年以来，索马里海盗在亚丁湾活动猖獗。
en: A Yemeni oil tanker was hijacked by Somali pirates, Xinhua Sanaa, January 3 (Reporter Li Teng) According to Yemeni media on January 3, a Yemeni oil tanker was hijacked by Somali pirates in the Gulf of Aden on the same day. The report quoted an unnamed official of the Yemeni security department as saying that the ship, carrying 2000 tons of diesel oil, was hijacked by pirates on its way from the southern port of Aden to the eastern port of Mukalla. The official did not disclose other details. Yemen is close to the Mand海峡of the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden of the Arabian Sea, which is a must for the Suez Canal. Since last year, Somali pirates have been rampant in the Gulf of Aden.

content: 九月持续反弹基金悄然减仓券商研究报告显示，超七成基金仓位上周下降8月份A股市场大幅度的急跌，让不少机构投资者的信心跌至谷底，市场情绪转向悲观。不过，9月初以来市场止跌反弹，上证指数反弹幅度超过10%，部分个股甚至反弹幅度超过50%。不过，据记者不完全统计，公募基金正在减仓。有关券商研究报告显示，公募基金9月份以来仓位递减。根据东方证券最新出炉的研究报告显示，尽管近期市场继续反弹，但基金仓位却持续向下，并且创出了近段时间以来仓位降低幅度的新低。报告称，“无论从仓位的绝对数字来看，还是从基金减仓的数量来看，都是清一色的以减仓为主要操作，反映了基金对于市场的态度并不乐观。”报告测算显示，近期北京、深圳、上海三地股票型基金的平均仓位分布比较平均，均在83%左右，较上周仓位出现显著下降，减仓行为比较一致。分基金类型来讲，股票型基金仓位从86.21%降至上周的83.75%，下降2.46个百分点。考虑市场本身的上涨对基金仓位的影响，基金主动减仓比例为2.95%，是近期以来的最大单周仓位。从基金数量上来看，超过七成基金仓位在上周下降，仅有8.7%的基金加仓。事实上，此前不少机构投资者对8月大跌的原因归结为，对前期过快上涨和较高估值的修正，以及对实际经济复苏的质疑。在9月初，不少机构对下半年行情表示悲观，投资仓位果断降低，并注重布局防御性品种。对于市场未来趋势，不少基金认为，虽然最近一阶段市场有所回升，但估计不会持续很久，更多时间内上证指数将在一定区间内做波动，最终的走向还是要取决于10月份开始陆续公布的三季报数据。国泰金马稳健基金经理程洲认为，现在国泰金马的仓位控制在75%左右，比行业水平要略低些，持仓结构偏向防御，虽然这样的配置结构在7月面临了一定压力，但现在回过头来看，防御性的策略还是非常正确的。郑实
en: The continuous rebound fund in September quietly reduced its position. The securities company's research report showed that more than 70% of the funds' positions fell last week. The sharp decline of A-share market in August let many institutional investors' confidence fall to the bottom, and the market sentiment turned pessimistic. However, since the beginning of September, the market has stopped falling and rebounded, and the Shanghai Stock Index has rebounded by more than 10%, and some stocks have even rebounded by more than 50%. However, according to the journalist's incomplete statistics, public offering funds are reducing their positions. The relevant securities company's research report shows that the public offering fund has been reducing its position since September. According to the latest research report of Orient Securities, although the market continued to rebound recently, the fund position continued to decline, creating a new low of the position reduction in recent days. The report said, "Whether from the perspective of the absolute number of positions or the number of fund reductions, the main operation is to reduce positions, which reflects that the fund is not optimistic about the market." The report estimates that the average position of stock funds in Beijing, Shenzhen and Shanghai in recent days is relatively balanced, around 83%, with a significant decrease from last week's position, and the behavior of reducing positions is relatively consistent. In terms of fund types, the position of stock funds fell from 86.21% to 83.75% last week, down 2.46 percentage points. Considering the impact of the market's own rise on the fund position, the fund's active reduction ratio is 2.95%, which is the largest single week position in recent days. In terms of the number of funds, more than 70% of the funds' positions decreased last week, and only 8.7% of the funds added warehouse. In fact, many institutional investors attributed the reason for the sharp decline in August to the correction of the previous rapid growth and high valuation, and the doubt about the actual economic recovery. At the beginning of September, many institutions expressed pessimism about the market in the second half of the year, decisively reduced their investment positions, and focused on defensive varieties. With regard to the future trend of the market, many funds believe that although the market has rebounded in the recent stage, it is estimated that it will not last long. More time will be spent on the Shanghai Stock Index to fluctuate within a certain range, and the final trend will still depend on the three quarterly reports to be published in succession from October. Cheng Zhou, the manager of the stable fund of Guotai Jinniu, believes that the position of Guotai Jinniu is now controlled at about 75%, slightly lower than the industry level, and the position structure tends to be defensive. Although this configuration structure faced some pressure in July, looking back now, the defensive strategy is still very correct. Zheng Shi

content: 米雪新剧与关菊英再斗法否认男友病失明(图)新浪娱乐讯2月16日，无线剧集《宫心计》试造型，米雪与关菊英继《家好月圆》后又可再次斗法。此外，谈到早前有报道指尹志强病情转差双目失明。米雪予以否认。米雪在听到询问后，淡淡地说：“没有啊！尹志强好精神，现在在家中。我都不明白为什么有这个报道，可能是新年吧！”米雪透露，不时会跟尹志强开车兜风。问到拍剧会否少了时间陪尹志强？米雪说：“早前到内地拍剧，不过我要求每5日就要回港。”她坦言一离港就会思乡，尹志强不但是首位挂念的，更是好的精神食粮。记者笑指他们如此甜蜜，尹志强可有在情人节向她求婚？她甜丝丝地说：“叫他先不要讲，拍完这部剧再说吧！”图库供稿
en: Michel's new play fights again with Guan Ju, denying that his boyfriend is blind (picture) Sina Entertainment News On February 16, the wireless play "Gong Xinji" tried to shape. Michel and Guan Ju can fight again after "Home Good Moon Round". In addition, it is reported that Yin Zhiqiang's condition has deteriorated and he has lost his eyesight. Mi Xue denied it. Mi Xue said faintly when she heard the question: "No! Yin Zhiqiang is in good spirit. Now he is at home. I don't know why there is this report. It may be the New Year!" Mi Xue revealed that she would occasionally drive with Yin Zhiqiang. When asked whether there is less time to accompany Yin Zhiqiang when shooting a play? Mi Xue said: "Earlier, I went to the mainland to shoot dramas, but I asked to return to Hong Kong every 5 days." She frankly confessed that once she left Hong Kong, she would miss her hometown. Yin Zhiqiang is not only the first one to miss, but also a good spiritual food. The reporter smiled and asked whether Yin Zhiqiang proposed to her on Valentine's Day? She said sweetly: "Tell him not to talk about it first, but after shooting this play!" Picture library contribution

content: 五羊钢构与微软等厂商就软件侵权达成和解新浪科技讯3月9日下午消息，广州五羊钢结构有限公司(以下简称“五羊钢构”)日前与微软、奥多比等软件厂商就三起计算机软件著作权侵权纠纷达成一揽子和解协议。根据和解协议，五羊钢构将采购奥多比、欧特克及微软三家公司的Photoshop，AutoCAD，Windows以及Office等正版软件产品，并进行一定的经济补偿，共计人民币130万元。2010年5月，广州南沙区人民法院正式立案受理奥多比、欧特克和微软公司的诉讼请求，并依法对该公司电脑中所使用的软件进行了证据保全。同年8月，东南网架公司按照国家监管部门对上市公司信息披露的相关要求，在其半年度报告的“重要事项”中披露了子公司五羊钢构涉嫌侵犯软件知识产权的三项诉讼。之后，五羊钢构与商业软件联盟进行了积极和充分的沟通，承诺全面实施正版化，加强对软件资产的管理，并最终双方达成了和解。五羊钢构是上市公司浙江东南网架股份有限公司的控股子公司。(萧然)
en: Five Sheep Steel Structure and Microsoft and other manufacturers reached a settlement on software infringement Sina Technology News On the afternoon of March 9, Guangzhou Five Sheep Steel Structure Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Five Sheep Steel Structure") reached a package settlement agreement with software manufacturers such as Microsoft and Adobe on three disputes of computer software copyright infringement. According to the settlement agreement, Five Goats Steel Structure will purchase Photoshop, AutoCAD, Windows, Office and other genuine software products of Adobe, Autodesk and Microsoft, and give some economic compensation, with a total of 1.3 million yuan. In May 2010, the People's Court of Nansha District, Guangzhou officially filed a lawsuit filed by Adobe, Autodesk and Microsoft, and legally preserved the software used in the company's computer as evidence. In August of the same year, Southeast Steel Structure Company, in accordance with the requirements of the state regulatory authorities for listed company information disclosure, disclosed three lawsuits involving the infringement of software intellectual property rights of its subsidiary Wuyang Steel Structure in its "Important Matters" of the semi-annual report. Later, Five Sheep Steel Structure had positive and full communication with the Business Software Alliance, committed to fully implement the legalization, strengthen the management of software assets, and finally reached a settlement with both sides. Five Goats Steel Structure is a holding subsidiary of Zhejiang Southeast Webbing Co., Ltd., an listed company. (Xiao Ran)

content: 国诚投资：人气逐步回升热点转换是关键国诚投资曾海龙【大势研判】周三股指低开后盘中一度冲高，上证指数冲破30日均线引发了市场对大盘转势的期盼，但临近收盘股指缓慢回落。消息面近期汇丰PMI初值重回50荣枯线之上，CPI连续两个月回落，使得市场对于中国经济硬着陆及通胀回落的担忧减轻，特别是温总理提及的适度微调引发市场对货币政策放松的预期，让市场高喊反转呼声一片，茫然之余又有投资者开始头脑发热，市场风险往往就是这样产生的，股指借机冲高反映出市场的急燥心态，在房价和经济减速基本成型但尚未显现之时，股指仍无筑底基础，反弹不过是套牢筹码的换岗过程，连续大涨给重仓者带来良好减仓良机，换换岗撤下来休息休息，何乐而不为？盘面看市场做多意愿并未消失，预计短期市场还将延续震荡反弹行情。不过随着高度的不断攀升，上行力度也将会有所趋缓，那么追涨风险慢慢显现，盘面仍有一些个股走势仍旧保持活跃。但短期走出V型反转单边上行的难度也较大，后市难免还有反复，影响A股最为重要的上市公司业绩下降风险、国内外债务风险演变情况、股市扩容步伐依然加快等并末改观，相反有越演越烈的迹象，因此投资者在市场中应始终保持谨慎策略为佳！【宏观聚焦】1、欧盟27国峰会就银行资本重组达成一致伦敦时间10月26日(北京时间10月27日)消息，今日的欧盟峰会对银行资本重组计划达成一致意见，金援资本包可能增长至1万亿欧元的规模。【点评】欧盟27国峰会达成一致意见，缓解了当前紧张的欧债危机局面，对稳定全球股市有重要影响。但该会议能否彻底解决欧债危机隐患，仍有待观察。2、周小川：货币政策总基调不变中国人民银行26日消息，央行行长周小川日前表示，央行非常紧密地关注通胀水平，不会因为关注经济增长而忽略通胀。我国当前货币政策基调保持不变，同时保持充分的灵活性和针对性。【点评】从央行行长周小川表述可看出，在当前经济局面下，货币政策仍难转向。于A股而言，在技术和宏观方面底部隐现时，货币政策底仍未见到。3、工信部将制定措施引导中小企业发展近来中小企业生产经营遭遇困难的问题受到各方关注。对此，工业和信息化部中小企业司司长郑昕昨天在国新办举行的新闻发布会上表示，工信部正在制定政策措施帮助中小企业摆脱困局。【点评】工信部将制定措施引导中小企业发展，对中小企业形成利好影响，A股相关上市公司有望获益，现交易性机会。4、国务院明年起在上海试点增值税改革国务院总理温家宝26日主持召开国务院常务会议，决定开展深化增值税制度改革试点。会议决定，先在上海市交通运输业和部分现代服务业等开展试点。同时，在现行增值税17%标准税率和13%低税率基础上，新增11%和6%两档低税率【点评】这一改革将改变服务业因征收营业税带来税负过重和重复征收的问题，为企业减轻税负负担，也意味着以交通运输业为首的现代服务业有望进入全面减税时代。改革的实施，有利于大消费行业的崛起，为经济转型提供助力。A股相关服务行业有望长期受益。5、环渤海动力煤价格连涨8周10月26日，环渤海地区港口发热量5500大卡的动力煤平均价格报收853元/吨，连续8周上涨，累计涨幅达28元/吨。与此同时，华东重点电厂采购价也已经连续四旬上涨。【点评】，虽然港口煤价不断上涨，但目前行业处于有价无市局面，未来动力煤价格上涨动力将有所减弱。尽管如此，煤价的上涨，有助于煤炭股的短线反弹。【环球财经】道琼斯工业平均指数，收于11867.98点，涨幅1.38%；纳斯达克综合指数，收于2650.67点，涨幅0.46%；标准普尔500指数收于1242.00点，涨幅1.05%。纽约原油期货收盘下跌3.2%报每桶90.20美元，纽约黄金期货收盘上涨1.4%报1723.50美元。
person: 周小川,郑昕,温家宝,曾海龙
en: Guocheng Investment: The key to the gradual recovery of popularity is the transformation of hot spots. The once Haishulong of Guocheng Investment [macro trend judgment] On Wednesday, the stock index opened low and once broke through the 30 day moving average, triggering the market's expectation of a turnaround in the market. However, the stock index slowly fell back near the close. Recently, the initial value of HSBC PMI has returned to above 50, and the CPI has declined for two consecutive months, which has reduced the market's concerns about the hard landing of the Chinese economy and inflation. In particular, the moderate fine tuning mentioned by Premier Wen has triggered the market's expectation of monetary policy easing, which has let the market shout a chorus of reversals. In a state of confusion, some investors began to get feverish again. Market risks often arise in this way. The stock index took the opportunity to reflect the market's impetuous mentality. When the housing price and the economic slowdown have basically taken shape but have not yet shown up, the stock index still has no foundation for bottoming out. The rebound is just a process of changing the position of the trapped chips. The continuous sharp rise has brought good opportunities for the overweight to reduce their positions. It is better to change their positions, withdraw and have a rest? On the whole, the willingness of the market to do more has not disappeared, and it is expected that the market will continue to extend the volatile rebound in the short term. However, with the continuous climb of height, the upward strength will also slow down, and then the risk of rising will gradually appear. There are still some individual stocks on the market that remain active. However, it is also difficult to make a single sided upward V shaped reversal in the short term, and there are bound to be repeated events in the future. The most important risk of declining performance of listed companies, the evolution of domestic and foreign debt risks, and the stock market's expansion pace still remain unchanged, and there are signs of escalation, so investors should always keep prudent strategies in the market! 【Macro Focus】 1. The summit of 27 EU member states reached an agreement on bank capital restructuring. On October 26, London (October 27, Beijing time), today's EU summit reached an agreement on the bank capital restructuring plan, and the financial aid capital package may grow to a scale of 1 trillion euros. 【Comment】 The summit of 27 EU member states reached an agreement, easing the current tense situation of the European debt crisis, which has an important impact on stabilizing the global stock market. However, it remains to be seen whether the meeting can completely solve the hidden dangers of the European debt crisis. 2. Zhou Xiaochuan: The monetary policy always remains unchanged. On October 26, the People's Bank of China (central bank) reported that Zhou Xiaochuan, the central bank's governor, recently said that the central bank is very closely following the inflation level, and will not ignore inflation in order to focus on economic growth. At present, the keynote of monetary policy in China remains unchanged, while maintaining sufficient flexibility and targeting. 【Comment】 From the statement of Zhou Xiaochuan, the governor of the central bank, it can be seen that the monetary policy is still difficult to change under the current economic situation. For A-shares, the bottom of technology and macro aspects is hidden, and the monetary policy bottom has not yet appeared. 3. The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology will formulate measures to guide the development of small and medium-sized enterprises. Recently, the problem of difficulties in the production and operation of small and medium-sized enterprises has received attention from all sides. In this regard, Zheng Xin, Director of the Department of Small and Medium Enterprises of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, said at a press conference held by the State Council Information Office yesterday that the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology is formulating policy measures to help small and medium-sized enterprises get rid of the dilemma. 【Comment】 The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology will formulate measures to guide the development of small and medium-sized enterprises, which will have a positive impact on small and medium-sized enterprises. A-share related listed companies are expected to benefit from the current trading opportunities. 4. The State Council will pilot value-added tax reform in Shanghai next year. Premier Wen Jiabao of the State Council presided over the executive meeting of the State Council on the 26th to decide on the pilot reform of deepening the value-added tax system. The meeting decided that the pilot project would first focus on transportation and some modern service industries in Shanghai. At the same time, two new low rates of 11% and 6% were added on the basis of the existing value-added tax standard rate of 17% and the low rate of 13% [Comment] This reform will change the problem of excessive tax burden and repeated collection caused by the collection of business tax in the service industry, reduce the tax burden of enterprises, and means that the modern service industry led by the transportation industry is expected to enter the era of comprehensive tax reduction. The implementation of the reform is conducive to the rise of the consumer goods industry, providing assistance for the transformation of the economy. The relevant service industry of A-shares is expected to benefit in the long term. 5. Bohai Rim thermal coal prices rose for eight consecutive weeks. On October 26, the average price of 5500 kilocalorie thermal coal in the port of Bohai Rim was reported to close at 853 yuan/ton, rising for eight consecutive weeks, with a cumulative increase of 28 yuan/ton. At the same time, the purchase price of key power plants in East China has also risen for four consecutive weeks. 【Comment】 Although the port coal price continues to rise, the future thermal coal price will weaken as the industry is in a situation of having a price but no market. Nevertheless, the rise of coal prices is helpful to the short-term rebound of coal stocks. 【Global Finance】 The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed at 11867.98 points, up 1.38%; The Nasdaq Composite Index closed at 2650.67 points, up 0.46%; The S & P 500 Index closed at 1242.00 points, up 1.05%. New York crude oil futures closed down 3.2% at 90.20 dollars per barrel, and New York gold futures closed up 1.4% at 1723.50 dollars.

content: 青年被提分手发动500余网友帮其短信致歉女友本报2月11日讯(记者伟伟)自己给女朋友发道歉短信，这不稀奇，发动网友给女朋友发道歉短信就不多见了。10日，在一家威客网上，临沂网友“我爱鑫鑫”在网上发帖：借情人节来临之际，给已经分手的女友发道歉短信，以此挽回三年的感情。该帖发布后，引来近千名网友“围观”，大家纷纷伸出友谊之手，给他女朋友发送道歉短信。记者发现，截至目前，已有583名网友帮“我爱鑫鑫”发送了道歉短信。“鑫鑫，‘我爱鑫鑫’知道错了，请你再给他一次机会，我们都希望你们能重归于好。”网友“我爱鑫鑫”在网上发帖后，类似的致歉短信不断发送到“鑫鑫”的手机上。网友们与“鑫鑫”素不相识，他们都是被她男朋友“我爱鑫鑫”的痴情所感动，帮“我爱鑫鑫”发短信道歉的。记者通过猪八戒网工作人员，联系上了就职于临沂某网络公司的“我爱鑫鑫”。原来，“我爱鑫鑫”和“鑫鑫”是大学同学，两人已经交往三年了。年前两人因给双方父母送节礼的琐事发生口角，“鑫鑫”一气之下提出分手，而“我爱鑫鑫”觉得两人多年的感情不能说分就分，便想在情人节到来之际，发动网友帮其向女朋友道歉，于是就在“猪八戒网”上发布了这个帖子。记者在该帖子中看到，“鑫鑫”的手机号为159XXXXX142，“我爱鑫鑫”要求网友们发布的内容是：“亲爱的鑫鑫你好，情人节快到了，我代表姜振东祝你情人节快乐，希望你开心快乐每一天！”发布时间要求为2011年2月14日13点14分。该帖发布后引起了近千名网友的“围观”。不少网友留言感叹：早知今日，何必当初呢。很多网友支持说，知错能改，就是好样的。“看他这么痛苦，我昨天下午帮他发了短信，内容是我自己拟的，希望鑫鑫再给‘我爱鑫鑫’一次机会。”网友“随心宝贝”说，“我爱鑫鑫”刚开始求助时，他认为“我爱鑫鑫”太盲目，委托陌生人给女孩发短信，可能会打扰到她的生活，反而引来反感。记者发现，帮“我爱鑫鑫”支招的网友很多。有网友建议“我爱鑫鑫”直接去女友家会显得有诚意，还有网友支招说，情人节那天带上一大束玫瑰去她单位等她下班。
person: 伟伟,鑫鑫,我爱鑫鑫,姜振东
en: The youth was launched by his girlfriend to help more than 500 netizens send a text message to apologize to his girlfriend, February 11 (Reporter Wei Wei) It's not surprising that he sent an apology text message to his girlfriend, but it's not uncommon to launch netizens to send an apology text message to his girlfriend. On the 10th, on a v客website, Lin Yi's netizen "I love Xinxin" posted a message online: On the occasion of Valentine's Day, send an apology text message to his ex girlfriend in order to save three years' feelings. After the post was published, nearly 1000 netizens "surrounded" and everyone reached out their hands of friendship to send an apology text message to his girlfriend. The reporter found that up to now, 583 netizens had helped "I love Xinxin" send an apology message. "Xinxin, 'I love Xinxin' knows that he was wrong. Please give him another chance. We all hope that you can make up." After the netizen "I love Xinxin" posted a message online, similar apology messages were constantly sent to Xinxin's mobile phone. The netizens were not familiar with "Xinxin". They were all moved by her boyfriend's "I love Xinxin" and helped "I love Xinxin" send a message to apologize. Through the staff of Zhu Bajie's website, the reporter contacted "I Love Xinxin", who works in a network company in Linyi. Originally, "I love Xinxin" and "Xinxin" were college students, and they have been dating for three years. At the beginning of the year, the two quarreled about the trivial matters of giving gifts to their parents. Xinxin proposed to break up in a fit of anger. I love Xinxin" thought that the feelings between the two for many years could not be divided, so he wanted to launch netizens to help him apologize to his girlfriend on the occasion of Valentine's Day, so he posted this post on "Pig Eight戒网". The reporter saw in the post that Xinxin's mobile phone number was 159XXXXX142. "I love Xinxin" requires netizens to publish the following content: "Dear Xinxin, Valentine's Day is coming. I wish you a happy Valentine's Day on behalf of Jiang Zhendong, and I hope you can be happy every day!" The publication time is required to be 13:14 on February 14, 2011. After the post was published, it caused nearly 1000 netizens to "surround". Many netizens left messages and sighed: If we had known today, why bother. Many netizens support that it is good to be able to correct mistakes. Seeing that he was so painful, I helped him send a message yesterday afternoon. The content was written by myself. I hope Xinxin will give "I love Xinxin" another chance." Said the netizen "Baby as you like". "I love Xinxin" thought that "I love Xinxin" was too blind at the beginning of his help. He entrusted a stranger to send a message to the girl, which may disturb her life and cause disgust instead. The reporter found that there were many netizens who helped "I Love Xinxin". Some netizens suggested that "I love Xinxin" should go directly to his girlfriend's home, which would seem sincere. Some netizens suggested that he should bring a large bunch of roses to her workplace to wait for her to get off work on Valentine's Day.

content: 电视收视率发现造假行为缺乏第三方监督所致风险低、方式隐秘、惩戒机制缺失惟收视率与恶性竞争是主要诱因缺乏第三方监督让造假有机可乘本报北京6月30日电(记者曹玲娟、刘阳)收视率造假正在成为个别地方卫视争夺市场的“捷径”。本报记者近日在采访中获悉，与制作节目相比，“制作”收视率以其低廉的代价、隐秘且难以查证的造假方式，以及惩戒机制缺失的行业背景，正在成为个别地方卫视在激烈的市场竞争中力争上游的“幕后法宝”。据介绍，目前我国电视收视率最为可靠的统计方法是，在样本客户家庭电视机上加装类似机顶盒的收视测量仪。样本户家庭成员在收看电视时，只要在某个频道停留一定时间长度，机顶盒就会记录，生成统计数据。自2008年底全球知名调查机构尼尔森结束在中国市场的收视率调查业务以来，目前全国各电视台各大城市的所有收视率，基本由央视—索福瑞媒介研究有限公司一家出具。业内人士介绍，“收视率”作为当前全世界电视行业中的“通用货币”，由市场普遍认可的一家调查机构提供调查数据，有利于行业标准的统一和管理的规范化。然而，在这种“一家独大”的前提下，与其他国家相比，我国收视率调查过程中缺乏来自第三方的监督与相应管理惩戒机制，则为收视率造假减少了风险成本，人为操控索福瑞的样本户、“改写”收视率数据的现象已经发生。以索福瑞在某一线城市为例。据了解，该城市常住人口过千万，目前约有不到500户安装收视测量仪为索福瑞提供测量数据。由于外地卫视在该地区的收视率并不高，当地研究机构认为，一家卫视全天的收视率常态，约在0.2至0.3之间。但一些专业人士日前在分析收视数据时发现了一些不正常的收视现象。以全国部分收视测量仪城市数据为例，今年全国两会闭幕后的总理记者见面会，全国所有卫视同时直播，但某沿海地区的省级卫视收视率比其他卫视高1倍以上；玉树地震哀悼日晚上，由央视新闻频道制作的节目要求省级卫视转播，该卫视的收视率也高于央视新闻频道本身。相关人员根据测算，有些城市，只要有一户样本户，能成功提交全家全天看某特定卫视的数据，该卫视的数据就能一下子上升到0.3至0.5左右，几乎翻一倍。异动现象引起了部分电视研究机构的注意。而在之后的收视数据分析中，他们更发现确有个别电视台涉嫌行贿样本。某直辖市一位周姓出租车司机家中，在去年春季时装了一台索福瑞的测量仪。刚装完测量仪一个月左右，就有人来敲门，声称如果他们看某一卫视台节目，就会每个月得到200元的费用，且每周还会有小礼品，逢年过节还会有人登门来送大礼包。此后，收视调查机构进行现场查实确有贿赂。目前该样本户已被撤销。去年一家城市电视台向收视调查机构一次提交关于9户样本户收视率异动的怀疑，经查实，这9户样本户有6户大部分莫名长期锁定一家卫视。撤销后，该卫视在该城市的收视率即刻下降。样本污染的情况并非只存在于特定一线城市。在西安市中级人民法院向媒体公布的“2009年西安十大知识产权案”中，第十例案件便与此有关：一名索福瑞的技术维护人员王某，涉嫌与西安电视台李某、电视短剧制作人张某等人收买相关样本户，被西安市检察院起诉一审，其中王某被判有期徒刑一年零三个月，并处罚金2万元。全国多地也曾出现过收视数据异常。有数据显示，某卫视在其省会城市，黄金时段收视率远远超过其他卫视，甚至达到2.6倍有余；不止一家在全国排名靠前的卫视，在去年10月这段时间内，在该省会城市，出现无规律、多时段、零收视情况。据了解，某些卫视一年以数千万元请民营品牌推广公司进行所谓的品牌推广，而这些经费其实相当部分被用于对收视样本户的干扰造假。根据相关“污染样本”提供的信息，样本被干扰的方式比较隐蔽，多是采用定期给样本用户送大米、食用油之类的小恩小惠，让对方长期锁定该频道。
person: 张某,李某,刘阳,曹玲娟,王某,周某
en: The discovery of television ratings fraud caused by the lack of third party supervision caused low risk, secret methods, and the lack of punishment mechanism. The only ratings and恶性competition are the main causes. The lack of third party supervision makes it possible to fake. The Beijing, June 30 (Reporter Cao Lingjuan, Liu Yang) ratings fraud is becoming a "shortcut" for some local satellite TV stations to compete for the market. The reporter recently learned in an interview that, compared with the production of programs, "producing" ratings is becoming a "behind the scenes magic weapon" for some local satellite TV stations to strive for the top in the fierce market competition with its low cost, secret and hard to verify fraud methods, and the industry background of the lack of punishment mechanism. It is reported that the most reliable statistical method of TV ratings in China is to install a set top box like TV meter on the TV set of the sample customer's family. When the family members of the sample household watch TV, if they stay for a certain length of time on a channel, the set top box will record and generate statistical data. Since the end of 2008, when Nielsen, a world famous survey institution, ended its rating survey business in the Chinese market, all ratings of major cities in TV stations across the country have basically been issued by CTV-Sofre Media Research Co., Ltd. Industry insiders introduced that "ratings" is the "common currency" in the current global television industry. The investigation data provided by a survey organization recognized by the market is conducive to the unification of industry standards and the standardization of management. However, under the premise of "mono dominant", the lack of supervision and corresponding management punishment mechanism from the third party in the process of TV rating survey in China, compared with other countries, reduces the risk cost of TV rating fraud and the phenomenon of human manipulation of Sofre's sample households and "rewriting" TV rating data has occurred. Take Sofre in a first tier city as an example. It is understood that the permanent population of the city exceeds 10 million, and there are nearly 500 households that have installed TV measurement instruments to provide measurement data for Sofre. Since the ratings of foreign satellite TV stations in this region are not high, local research institutions believe that the ratings of a satellite TV station throughout the day are normal, between 0.2 and 0.3. But some professionals recently found some abnormal viewing phenomena when analyzing viewing data. Taking the data of some urban measurement instruments in China as an example, after the closing of this year's two sessions of the National People's Congress, the prime minister's press conference was simulcast by all satellite TV stations across the country, but the ratings of a provincial satellite TV station in a coastal area were more than twice as high as those of other satellite TV stations; On the evening of the Jade Tree Earthquake Mourning Day, the program produced by CCTV News Channel required provincial satellite TV stations to relay it, and the ratings of the satellite TV station were also higher than those of CCTV News Channel itself. According to the calculation of relevant personnel, in some cities, as long as a sample household can successfully submit the data of the whole family to watch a specific satellite TV station all day long, the data of the satellite TV station can jump up to 0.3 to 0.5, almost doubling. The abnormal phenomenon has attracted the attention of some television research institutions. In the subsequent ratings data analysis, they found that there were indeed some television stations suspected of bribing samples. A taxi driver surnamed Zhou in a municipality directly under the central government had a Sofre measurement instrument installed in his home last spring. Just about a month after the measurement instrument was installed, someone came to knock on the door, saying that if they watched a certain satellite television program, they would get 200 yuan per month, and there would be small gifts every week. Someone would come to give gifts during the festival. Later, the ratings survey organization found out that there was indeed bribery. At present, the sample household has been revoked. Last year, a city television station submitted to the television rating survey organization once a suspicion about the abnormal change of the ratings of 9 sample households. After investigation, six of the nine sample households mostly locked one satellite television station for a long time and inexplicably. After revocation, the ratings of the satellite TV station in the city immediately dropped. The situation of sample pollution is not confined to specific first tier cities. In the "top ten intellectual property cases in Xi'an in 2009" published by the Xi'an Intermediate People's Court to the media, the tenth case was related to this: Wang, a technical maintenance worker of Sofre, was suspected of buying relevant samples from Li, a technical maintenance worker of Xi'an TV station, Zhang, a producer of TV short dramas, and others, and was sued by the Xi'an procuratorate. Wang was sentenced to one year and three months' imprisonment and fined 20000 yuan. Abnormal ratings data has also occurred in many parts of the country. Data shows that in the provincial capital city of a satellite TV station, the prime time ratings far exceeded other satellite TV stations, even more than 2.6 times; More than one satellite TV station ranked first in China has shown irregular, multi time and zero ratings in the provincial capital city during this period in October last year. It is understood that some satellite TV stations invite private brand promotion companies to carry out so-called brand promotion for tens of millions of yuan a year, and in fact, a considerable part of these funds is used to interfere with the falsification of TV audience samples. According to the information provided by the relevant "polluted samples", the way of interfering with the samples is quite隐蔽, mostly by giving small favors such as rice and cooking oil to the sample users on a regular basis, so that the other party can lock the channel for a long time.

content: 12星座爱情事业一周忠告(组图)作者/萧笑笑本文根据“每周行星预报”撰写而成，更多知识请进入星象学研究室认识我们的内在白羊：危机是奇迹的表达方式之一显然，白羊正在成为最受瞩目的区域。太阳、水星、木星和天王按照约定聚首于此，下周六火星也将加入。按照地球居民的平均寿命，人类一辈子当中只有一次机会见识如斯奇迹。我犹豫了几分钟后，还是决定使用“奇迹”这个词汇。自从日本大地震后，核辐射以及核辐射话题像细菌一样扩散到世俗生活的层面，各种复杂的情绪和反应从不见日光的暗处奔流而出。人们或者恐慌自身安全受到威胁，或者巴不得一起毁灭，或者相对平静地伺候想像中的生死。和谐富裕的科技年代里出生并成长的灵魂从未如此近距离直面物种灭亡危机，尤其该物种涉及人。这不是科幻电影，亲爱的，这是奇迹。我没有丝毫嘲讽或仇视的意思，而是深切感觉人心的麻木、冷酷和僵硬已经到达饱和的临界点，除了物极必反以外似无任何可能性。诚然，不是每一个人都能跳脱肉眼所局限的意象而直接通达无限循环。无限循环跟所谓的完结是两码事。白羊象征纯真的新生，也象征脑细胞革命。它经常被我们比喻为战士，但是，战士并不能覆盖它庞大而丰富的内蕴。换句话说，某种肤浅的程度上白羊可以充当战士，其本质却绝非战士。因为战士是有限的。它是奇迹本身。相对而言，双鱼意指穷途末路。“穷则变，变则通，通则久”的“变”是白羊。也许我们很难理解这句话。或者尝试一下打比方吧，譬如母亲第一次感受胎儿的动态，譬如男人和女人之间的理解，譬如美丽风景给我们留下深刻印象，譬如小动物对我们无偿的报答。甚至路边的树枝吐露新芽亦相当令人震撼。这些都是生命的真实意图。生命的真实意图就是奇迹。灾难不过是其中一种现象，类似函数值。而灾难之所以为灾难，因为我们将之定义为灾难。财运：带着负面能量求财，财就算到手也不如意，正面能量才是求财得财的保障白羊座一周金句：接受全部事实，惟有接受，才能流露真心。财运方面，现在是四星齐聚命宫了，且颗颗强悍，银两更是哗啦啦地往外流，部分人要留神合作事宜的财务环节，慎防对方小人心肠私吞；投资运方面，周五之前盈利形势看好，可以把握则把握，不可以把握则笑看风云。事业方面，凌乱的行星冲击暂时结束了，木星却终于拱破土壤冒头，或许这是今年第一缕关于改变现状的硝烟。之所以说是硝烟，因为不少人将在未来三周好似病急乱投医地想跳到一份新工作上，脑袋发热全然没有发觉。不过毕竟到了白羊月，机遇比之前增多，有待细心挑拣。感情方面，单身族对自己有一定了解，但也未必像自己认知的那样了解得很多，许多时候还得通过他人照见自己；已有伴儿的正跟现实或自己拔河，不过赢输都在一个念头里。贵人星座：射手座小心的星座：巨蟹座巨蟹座一周金句：永远不要幻想自己的梦想能跟他人一起完成。财运方面，上半周天王让你花钱花得畅快，下半周冥王让你花钱花得扭捏甚至不花钱了；投资运方面，周五以前亏的比赚的多，将期望值适当调低会更好。事业方面，土星对冲便是最直接的压力，压力源却是大环境下人人都想做得更好或革旧变新方便竞争。你十分忙碌，是表象；你是竞争体系里面的一棵螺丝钉，是本质。你若觉得累，绝对不是因为活计多，而是竞争必然让人疲倦。感情方面，单身族自恋得彻底些会没那么烦恼，烦恼都是自己搞不清楚自己的情感和情绪因何而生；小两口不要妄想自己能改变对方，哪怕改变一点儿都是不切实际的。贵人星座：摩羯座小心的星座：射手座处女座一周金句：心理依赖不是合作。把两个个体揉成一个个体不是合作。内心独立才是合作的基础。因为每个个体都只能为自己负责。财运方面，木星咆哮着冲向财帛宫了，大概未来三周都是非常容易破财的，但是不要紧，你的收入是有保证的；投资运方面，众多行星沸腾在此处，大起大落的幅度很大，所谓天威难测也。事业方面，人总是时不时遇见干扰题，上周题型刚答完，这周又出现新题型，题目们本意不是难倒你，而是要求你进一步回答——如何整合既得资源以便为自己的目标服务。也许这么说有点儿抽象，不过该效应持续三周，慢慢地会明白过来。感情方面，单身族的某些活结可能瞬间解开，也许得益于地球本身的转变，你想通的也正是别人想通的，尽管某些死结依然凝固；两口子看向未来总比回望过去好。贵人星座：狮子座小心的星座：天秤座射手座一周金句：缺乏名气的人，一般会期盼名气；有了点儿名气的人，一般会期盼更多名气。对名气的渴求，表面上被我们当作“可以赚钱”的借口。但是，真实的出发点却是——害怕无法生存。财运方面，木星对财帛宫一点儿都不客气，开始掠夺无数财宝了，因而你会破财，生存不仅仅是赚钱和省钱，还包括了很大程度的出钱；投资运方面，上半周比下半周更能招徕财气。事业方面，虽然行星们没有自动排列到最显著的方位上，可是土星已经对你的精神产生影响，它既是现实残酷的折射又是理智周全的培育，所以你不会像之前那样浮躁或焦虑，就好像尘埃落定或一切都定型后的行动，显得沉稳而不遗余力。感情方面，单身族已经积累足够的资粮培植桃花了，不用刻意放电也能遇见对自己有意的人；恋情男女上周为小事意见不合的情况过去了，本周想的是大事而非鸡毛蒜皮。贵人星座：金牛座小心的星座：处女座
en: The author/Xiao Laughter This article was written based on the "weekly planet forecast". More knowledge can be found in the astrology research room to get to know our inner Aries: Crisis is one of the expressions of miracle, obviously, Aries is becoming the most prominent area. The sun, Mercury, Jupiter and Uranus have gathered here as agreed, and Mars will also join next Saturday. According to the average life span of earth's residents, humans have only one chance in their lifetime to witness such a miracle. After hesitating for a few minutes, I still decided to use the word "miracle". Since the Japanese earthquake, nuclear radiation and the topic of nuclear radiation have spread to the level of secular life like bacteria, and various complex emotions and reactions gush out from the dark place where they have never seen the sun. People either panic that their safety is threatened, or they would rather die together, or they serve the imagined life and death relatively peacefully. The soul born and growing in the era of harmonious wealth and technology has never faced the crisis of species extinction so closely, especially when it involves people. This is not a science fiction movie, dear, it's a miracle. I have no intention of mocking or hating, but I deeply feel that the numbness, cruelty and stiffness of people's hearts have reached the critical point of saturation, and there seems to be no possibility except that things must go to extremes. Indeed, not everyone can directly reach the infinite cycle beyond the image limited by the naked eye. Infinity cycle is quite different from the so-called ending. Aries symbolizes the pure new life, as well as the revolution of brain cells. It is often described by us as a warrior, but the warrior does not cover its huge and rich connotation. In other words, to a certain superficial degree, Aries can act as a warrior, but its essence is by no means a warrior. Because warriors are limited. It is a miracle in itself. By contrast, Pisces means a dead end. "Poor then change, change then pass, pass then pass" is Aries. Perhaps we find it hard to understand this sentence. Or try to give an analogy, such as a mother's first feeling of the fetus's dynamics, such as the understanding between men and women, such as the beautiful scenery that leaves a deep impression on us, and such as the free reward of small animals to us. Even the branches on the roadside can also spit out new buds, which is quite shocking. These are the true intentions of life. The true intention of life is a miracle. Disasters are just one of the phenomena, similar to function values. And the reason why disasters are disasters is that we define them as disasters. Financial fortune: When you seek wealth with negative energy, even if you get it, it will not be as good as you wish. Positive energy is the guarantee of wealth. Aries' golden sentence for a week: Accept all the facts. Only by accepting them can you show your true heart. In terms of wealth, it is now a gathering of four stars in the life palace, and each of them is so strong that silver is flowing out and some people should pay attention to the financial aspects of cooperation, and be careful that the other party may swallow with a small heart; In terms of investment, the profit situation is promising before Friday, so you can grasp it or laugh at the clouds if you can't. In terms of career, the chaos of the planet impact has temporarily ended, but Jupiter has finally broken through the soil, which may be the first smoke of this year about changing the status quo. It is called "smoke" because many people will want to jump to a new job in the next three weeks, as if they were in a hurry to get sick. However, after all, it is April, with more opportunities and waiting for careful selection. In terms of feelings, the single race has a certain understanding of themselves, but they may not necessarily know much about themselves. Many times, they have to see themselves through others; The partner who already has a partner is wrestling with reality or himself, but the win or loss is in one thought. Lucky constellation: Sagittarius Constellation: Cancer Constellation Cancer's golden sentence for a week: Never imagine that you can complete your dreams with others. In terms of wealth, Uranus makes you spend money happily in the first half of the week, and Pluto makes you spend money reluctantly or not at all in the second half of the week; In terms of investment, the loss is more than the profit before Friday, and it is better to adjust the expectation value appropriately. In terms of career, the most direct pressure is the opposition of Saturn, and the pressure source is that everyone wants to do better or innovate in the context of the macro environment to facilitate competition. You are very busy, which is an appearance; You are a screw in the competitive system, which is essential. If you feel tired, it is not because you have a lot of jobs, but because competition must make people tired. In terms of feelings, single people will be less troubled if they are completely narcissistic. Troubles all come from their own confusion about their emotions and emotions; Don't imagine that you can change the other party, even if it's a bit unrealistic. Lucky constellation: Capricorn Constellation: Sagittarius Constellation Virgo's golden sentence for a week: Psychological dependence is not cooperation. It's not cooperation to knead two individuals into one. Inner independence is the basis of cooperation. Because each individual can only be responsible for himself. In terms of wealth, Jupiter roared to the palace of wealth, and it was very easy to break the fortune in the coming three weeks, but it doesn't matter, your income is guaranteed; In terms of investment, many planets are boiling here, with a large fluctuation, which is called "hard to measure". In terms of career, people always meet interference problems from time to time. Last week's problem type has just been answered, and this week a new problem type has appeared. The purpose of the problem is not to make you difficult, but to ask you to further answer - how to integrate the existing resources in order to serve your own goals. Maybe it's a bit abstract to say so, but the effect will last for three weeks, and slowly, you will understand. In terms of feelings, some of the live knots of single people may be instantly untied, which may benefit from the transformation of the earth itself. What you understand is what others understand, although some dead knots are still solidified; It's better for couples to look to the future than to look back. Lucky constellation: Leo Constellation: Libra Constellation Sagittarius' golden sentence for a week: People who lack fame usually look forward to fame; Those who have some fame usually look forward to more fame. The thirst for fame is, on the surface, used by us as an excuse to "make money". However, the real starting point is - fear of being unable to survive. In terms of wealth, Jupiter is not rude to the palace of wealth. It has begun to plunder countless treasures, so you will lose money. Survival is not only to make money and save money, but also to pay money to a large extent; In terms of investment, the first half of the week is more likely to attract wealth than the second half of the week. In terms of career, although the planets have not automatically arranged to the most significant position, Saturn has affected your spirit, which is both a reflection of the cruel reality and a cultivation of reason, so you will not be as impetuous or anxious as before. It's like an action after the dust has settled or everything has taken shape, which seems stable and sparing no effort. In terms of feelings, single people have accumulated enough food to cultivate peach blossom, so they don't have to give off electricity intentionally to meet people who are interested in themselves; The situation that the couple disagreed on small things last week has passed. This week, they think about major events rather than trivial matters. Lucky constellation: Taurus Constellation: Virgo

content: 黑狗4年间接送小主人走山路上学一条普通的黑狗，4年间，每天早上护送小主人走山路去上学，晚上又按时等候在学校门口，护送小主人回家。一条狗与一个小学生相伴而行成为了偏僻大山中一道动人的风景。8月19日，崇义县文英乡古选村村民廖谨平告诉记者，他女儿廖春从上小学二年级开始，就由家里的黑狗每天护送上学放学，一直到廖春上六年级大黑狗病死为止。现在那条黑狗的孩子——小黑狗，又开始“接班”，继续做起了廖春的保镖。廖谨平家单独住在村里的一座山上，女儿每天上学需要走2个小时。由于去学校的山路很偏僻，两边都是高山密林，7岁的女儿上一年级时，一直由廖谨平接送，有时家里养的黑狗也会跟着去。廖春上二年级时，有一天放学后发现自己家的大黑早已等在了学校门口。廖谨平也发现每天吃完中饭后大黑就不知去向，原来它是去学校接小主人去了。就这样，大黑承担起接送廖春上学的任务，一晃就是4年，从未间断。去年的一天，廖春上学途中突然遇到一条蛇，大黑“嗖”地扑上去就和蛇斗了起来，最终蛇被咬死，大黑的腿也被蛇咬伤。大黑受伤后还是安全地把廖春送到了学校。回忆起与大黑在一起的日子，廖春记忆犹新地说，大黑很强壮，有它陪伴，走山路不仅不害怕了，还很有趣。有时候，走在路上她会把书包挂在大黑身上，大黑俨然成了一个顽皮的小书僮。去年12月，不幸的事发生了。大黑突然失去了往日的风采，躺在地上无精打采，病了。虽然经过主人精心的护理和医治，它还是告别了主人一家和自己的岗位。廖谨平妻子说，那条狗真有灵性，是一条好狗，这4年它为我们奉献了很多很多。它死的时候，我们都很伤心，廖春哭了整整一天。为了让它离我们近点，我们把它埋在了房子边上。如今，大黑的“儿子”——小黑，每天也按时接送廖春上学和回家。本报记者杜金存实习生秦宏
person: 秦宏,杜金存,廖春,廖谨平
en: A common black dog, for four years, accompanied the little master to go to school on the mountain road every morning and waited on time at the school gate in the evening to accompany the little master home. A dog and a primary school student walking together became a moving scenery in the remote mountains. On August 19, Liao Jinping, a villager of Guxuan Village, Wenying Town, Chongyi County, told the reporter that his daughter Liao Chun was accompanied by the family's black dog to go to school and get off work from the second grade of primary school until the big black dog died when Liao Chun was in the sixth grade. Now the child of the black dog - the little black dog - has begun to "take over" and continue to serve as Liao Chun's bodyguard. Liao Jinping's family lives alone on a mountain in the village, and his daughter needs to walk for 2 hours every day to go to school. Because the mountain road to the school is very remote, with high mountains and dense forests on both sides, Liu Jinping has been picking up and dropping off his 7-year-old daughter when she was in the first grade. When Liao Chun was in the second grade, one day after school, she found that her big black dog had been waiting at the school gate. Liao Jinping also found that Dabai disappeared after lunch every day. It turned out that he was going to school to pick up the little master. In this way, the big black took on the task of picking up Liao Chun to go to school. It was four years in a flash, and it never stopped. One day last year, Liao Chun suddenly met a snake on his way to school. Dabai suddenly pounced on it and fought with the snake. In the end, the snake was bitten to death and Dabai's leg was also bitten by the snake. Dabai still safely sent Liao Chun to school after he was injured. When recalling the days with Dabai, Liao Chun still remembered that Dabai was very strong. With him, it was not only scary but also interesting to walk on the mountain road. Sometimes, she would hang her schoolbag on Dabai when she was walking on the road, and Dabai became a naughty little book boy. In December last year, an unfortunate thing happened. Dabai suddenly lost his former风采and lay on the ground listless and sick. Although the owner carefully nursed and treated him, he still bid farewell to the owner and his post. Liao Jinping's wife said that the dog was really spiritual. It was a good dog. In the past four years, it has made a lot of contributions to us. When it died, we were all sad. Liao Chun cried for a whole day. In order to get closer to us, we buried it beside the house. Nowadays, the "son" of Dabai - Xiao Hei - also picks up and drops off Liao Chun on time every day. Dujin, an intern of this newspaper, Qin Hong

content: 房地产板块领涨沪深大盘进入多空相持山东神光昨日道琼斯指数上涨0.05%。沪深大盘已由多头逼空转为多空相持阶段，今日大盘震荡，百元股、房地产、海南开发、旅游酒店、钢铁、医药、电子信息板块领涨，银行板块涨幅较大，美元触底反弹概率较大，黄金、稀缺资源、有色金属、煤炭石油板块跌幅居前。消息面，10月30日，首批28家公司原始股东也将迎来限售股解禁后的收获期，解禁市值超300亿元，占创业板流通市值超50%，创业板解禁减持动力较强，将对创业板形成压力。工信部副部长奚国华日前在第七届海峡两岸信息产业技术标准论坛上做出以上表态，将支持整机和新型平板显示器件企业享受高新技术企业的税收优惠政策，并将发挥国家重大科技专项的牵引和带动作用，加强政策保障，充分利用有限资源，将之转化为现实生产力。鼓励和支持优势企业并购重组，整合资源，做大做强，福日电子借势涨停。在"十二五"期间，集成电路产业上具有自主研发能力的企业将成为关注点。目前研发实力较强的公司包括欧比特、华微电子、士兰微、国民技术，投资者可长期关注。盘中最亮的热点是医药板块，国内发现超级病菌病例，联环药业、白云山、广州药业等带动医药板块整体高开，医药板块放量冲高回落，午后还有上冲机会，建议继续持有。更多资讯和数据点击进入股票频道
en: The real estate sector led the Shanghai and Shenzhen stock markets into a long short confrontation. Shandong Shenlight's Dow Jones Index rose 0.05% yesterday. The Shanghai and Shenzhen stock markets have shifted from a long forced short position to a long short position. Today, the stock market is volatile. The hundred yuan stock, real estate, Hainan development, tourism, hotels, steel, medicine, electronic information sectors are leading the market. The banking sector has risen significantly, the US dollar is likely to rebound from the bottom, and the gold, scarce resources, nonferrous metals, coal and oil sectors have fallen the most. On the news front, on October 30, the first batch of 28 original shareholders will also迎来the harvest period after the prohibition of tradable shares. The market value of tradable shares exceeds 30 billion yuan, accounting for more than 50% of the tradable market value of the Growth Enterprise Market, and the Growth Enterprise Market has a strong motivation to lift the ban and reduce holdings, which will put pressure on the Growth Enterprise Market. Vice Minister of Industry and Information Technology Xi Guohua made the above statement at the seventh Cross Strait Information Industry Technology Standards Forum, supporting the whole machine and new flat panel display enterprises to enjoy the tax preference policy of high-tech enterprises, and giving full play to the leading and leading role of national major science and technology projects, strengthening policy guarantee, making full use of limited resources, and converting them into realistic productivity. Encourage and support advantageous enterprises to merge and reorganize, integrate resources, and get stronger. Furi Electronics takes the opportunity to close. During the "Twelfth Five Year Plan" period, enterprises with independent research and development capabilities in the integrated circuit industry will become the focus of attention. At present, the main companies with strong research and development capabilities include Oubit, Huwei Electronics, Shilan Micro, and National Technology, and investors can pay long-term attention. The brightest spot in the market is the medicine sector. The discovery of super bacterial cases in China led to a high overall opening of the pharmaceutical sector, such as Lianhuan Pharmaceutical, Baiyun Mountain, Guangzhou Pharmaceutical, and the pharmaceutical sector is going to retreat. There is still a chance to rush up in the afternoon. It is suggested to continue to hold. Click to enter the stock channel for more information and data

content: 陈金夺冠奖金预计达30万球队沾光有望获不菲赞助前晚，江苏羽毛球选手陈金历史性地拿到了世锦赛男单的金牌，江苏再次掀起一股羽毛球热。前不久，江苏羽毛球俱乐部曾一度为赞助问题而发愁，因为缺钱，俱乐部甚至产生过把陈金卖掉的念头。陈金在世锦赛上夺冠后，不少商家又重新关注起羽毛球项目。昨日，有一个企业家主动来到快报，明确表示想赞助江苏羽毛球队，希望快报牵头促成此事。当记者把这一消息转达给江苏羽毛球队总教练孙志安后，孙教练兴奋地表态，“如果真有赞助，那么我们肯定要把陈金留住。”国家省里都要奖赞助商明确奖10万随着陈金在世锦赛上夺冠，这些天，在南京，谈论羽毛球的多了，下关体校羽毛球房里更是热火朝天，所有业余球员见到陈金老爸金超，都会对他竖起大拇指，老金笑在脸上，喜在心里。大伙甚至争着要老金请吃饭，老金都会笑着答应。为了不影响儿子休息，老金没有过多打扰儿子，倒是老金的一帮朋友，争着发消息给陈金，向他道喜，懂事的陈金都会一一回复，丝毫没有明星的架子，“等陈金回来，我们一定要好好为他庆功。”老金的朋友杨总激动地告诉记者。时隔11年，南京才诞生这么一个含金量相当高的男单金牌，大家自然非常激动。市里区里的贺信不断。这一次，世锦赛夺冠，国家方面肯定要对陈金进行奖励，具体奖励多少，目前还没有明确的数字，不过，江苏队的教练说，按照以往的惯例，可能会奖励10万元，同时省里也会对陈金进行奖励，与国家标准一样。除此以外，中国羽毛球队的赞助商也明确表示，要给陈金奖10万。陈金表现好有赞助商找上门了前段时间，江苏羽毛球队总教练孙志安一直在为江苏羽毛球俱乐部的赞助问题发愁，他曾经设想，一旦赞助经费不足，希望把陈金卖掉，一来可以多一点运营经费，二来也给其他年轻队员一些机会。不过，随着陈金、蔡?在世锦赛上收获冠军，江苏众将在世锦赛上的精彩表现，让羽毛球的热度再一次在江苏升温，目前已经有企业主动找上门了，他们希望能与江苏羽毛球队进行深度合作。尽管只是意向，还没有最后签约，但这已经让江苏羽毛球队看到了一丝希望，一旦赞助经费到位，那么江苏队也就不用再为卖不卖陈金的问题发愁了，“如果有足够的赞助费，那么我们肯定会把陈金留在队中，谁也不想这么做的，很多时候也是一种无奈。”孙志安告诉记者。去年由于经费不足，江苏羽毛球俱乐部在羽毛球超级联赛中表现一般，未能闯进决赛，事实上，按照江苏队的实力，如果俱乐部有充足的运作资金，那么进决赛甚至夺冠都不是什么难事。下月回江苏期待新老冠军聚会刚刚打完世锦赛，陈金却闲不下来，他将从巴黎直接回北京，继续参加训练。因为接下来，他还需要备战全国锦标赛，以及下月中旬在江苏常州举行的羽毛球大师赛。“大师赛10号开始，在常州，到时候我肯定要去看看儿子，因为在这之前他肯定没时间回南京。”陈金老爸金超告诉记者。事实上，对于后辈陈金，南京羽毛球队的一些老前辈也非常关心，老一辈羽毛球世界冠军杨阳因为前晚看不到比赛直播，而专门打电话询问陈金老爸，怎么样才能看到，陈金拿到冠军，杨阳也为他感到高兴。事实上，老金有个想法，就是希望陈金回来，能和南京这些冠军前辈聚一聚，“杨阳、孙俊请他们来聚聚没什么问题，就怕陈金没时间回南京。”老金告诉记者。的确，除了比赛，陈金常年都在国家队集训，不知道这次回常州，距离南京这么近，陈金能否抽出一点时间，回家乡南京看看。快报记者吕远
person: 杨阳,杨总,孙俊,蔡,陈金,金超,吕远,孙志安
en: Chen Jin's championship bonus is expected to reach 3000000. The team benefits from the hope of getting a considerable sponsorship. The night before last, Chen Jin, a badminton player from Jiangsu, won the gold medal of the men's singles championship in the world championship, and Jiangsu once again set off a badminton craze. Not long ago, Jiangsu Badminton Club was once worried about sponsorship because of lack of money, and the club even had the idea of selling Chen Jin. After Chen Jin won the championship in the World Championships, many businessmen have reintegrated the badminton project. Yesterday, an entrepreneur came to the Express News on his own initiative and clearly expressed his willingness to sponsor the Jiangsu Badminton Team, hoping that the Express News would take the lead in promoting this event. When the reporter passed the news to Sun Zhi'an, the head coach of Jiangsu Badminton Team, Sun Coach excitedly said, "If there is really a sponsor, we will definitely keep Chen Jin." The national province also rewards the sponsors with a clear award of 100000. With Chen Jin's championship in the World Championships, these days, there are more people in Nanjing talking about badminton. The badminton room of the Badminton School in Xiamen is even more popular. All the amateur players will give his father Jin Chao a thumbs up when they see Chen Jin's father Jin Chao, and the old man smiles on his face and rejoices in his heart. Everyone even competed to invite the old gold to dinner, and the old gold would agree with a smile. In order not to affect his son's rest, the old man did not disturb his son too much. Instead, a group of friends of the old man competed to send messages to Chen Jin to congratulate him. Chen Jin, who is sensible, will reply one by one, and he has no celebrity style. "When Chen Jin comes back, we must give him a credit." President Yang, a friend of the old man, told the reporter excitedly. It was 11 years later that Nanjing was born with a men's singles gold medal of considerable gold content, so everyone was naturally very excited. The congratulatory letters from the city and the district are endless. This time, the World Championships won the championship. The state must reward Chen Jin. The specific amount of reward is not yet clear. However, the coach of Jiangsu team said that according to the past practice, the reward may be 100000 yuan, and the province will also reward Chen Jin, which is the same as the national standard. In addition, the sponsor of the Chinese badminton team has also made it clear that it will give Chen Jin a 100000 prize. Chen Jin has a sponsor who is looking for him. Some time ago, Sun Zhi'an, the head coach of Jiangsu Badminton Team, was worried about the sponsorship of Jiangsu Badminton Club. He once thought that once the sponsorship funds were insufficient, he hoped to sell Chen Jin, which would not only give more operational funds, but also give some opportunities to other young players. However, with Chen Jin and Cai? With the victory of the World Championships, the exciting performance of the Jiangsu team in the World Championships has once again warmed up badminton in Jiangsu. At present, enterprises have come to the door on their own initiative, hoping to have in-depth cooperation with the Jiangsu Badminton Team. Although it is just an intention and has not yet been signed, it has already made the Jiangsu Badminton Team see a glimmer of hope. Once the sponsorship funds are in place, the Jiangsu Team will no longer have to worry about whether to sell Chen Jin or not. "If there is enough sponsorship, we will definitely keep Chen Jin in the team. No one wants to do this, and it is often helpless." Sun Zhi'an told the reporter. Last year, due to insufficient funds, Jiangsu Badminton Club performed generally in the Badminton Super League and failed to advance to the finals. In fact, according to the strength of Jiangsu Team, if the club has sufficient operating funds, it will not be difficult to advance to the finals or even win the championship. Next month, I hope to have a new and old champion gathering in Jiangsu. I have just played the World Championships, but Chen Jin can't have a rest. He will go back to Beijing directly from Paris to continue training. Because next, he still needs to prepare for the National Championships and the Badminton Masters held in Changzhou, Jiangsu in the second half of next month. "The Master's Tournament will start on the 10th in Changzhou. At that time, I must go to see my son because he must have no time to return to Nanjing." Chen Jin's father, Jin Chao, told the reporter. In fact, some of the veterans of the Nanjing Badminton Team are also very concerned about Chen Jin's younger generation. The old world champion of badminton, Yang Yang, specifically called Chen Jin's father to ask him how to see the live broadcast of the game last night. Chen Jin won the championship, and Yang Yang was also happy for him. In fact, the old gold has an idea, which is to hope that Chen Jin can get together with these champion veterans in Nanjing when he comes back, "There is no problem with Yang Yang, Sun Jun, and Chen Jin to ask them to get together. I am afraid that Chen Jin has no time to go back to Nanjing." The old man told the reporter. Indeed, in addition to the competition, Chen Jin has been training with the national team for many years. I wonder if Chen Jin can take some time to go home to Nanjing this time when he returns to Changzhou, so close to Nanjing. Lv Yuan, a reporter from Express News

content: 当乐手机网游同乐会南京站完美落幕当乐网主办2009手机网游同乐会，首站在南京完美举办。10月24日至10月25日，2009当乐手机网游同乐会携当今市面上流行的五款优秀网游封神、九州、诛神、乱世、手机大航海，向十朝古都南京的热心玩家献上厚礼。开场热舞10月24日，当乐手机网游同乐会在南京市珠江路的华海3C电脑广场，上演了一场激情四射的路演。整个路演活动分为上午时段和下午时段。上午10点开始，我们热情的玩家早早就来到活动的现场，等待活动开始。南京现场的玩家观众们热情高昂，积极参与现场互动游戏，特别是大学生玩家对网游接受很快，在现场在工作人员的指导下，轻松掌握下载游戏客户端并注册游戏。活动预计下午五点结束的，但现场玩家的热情丝毫没与减退，活动结束的时间一再被延迟。玩家咨询试玩游戏10月25日周日下午15：00，同乐会在南京的南京市全民健身中心蓝湾咖啡，举办了玩家的讨论会。大家交流了在玩网游中的心得和体会，提出一些自己对网游的一些期望，我们听到了大家的一些心声和需求，这为游戏厂商开发更受玩家欢迎的游戏提供了很好的建议，也为当乐网更好的服务用户提供支持。当乐手机网游同乐会同时还在当乐网上进行了全程的图文直播。在我们线上的直播室里一样可以感受到南京现场的热情，在我们的直播室不仅即时的报道了南京现场的活动，同时还与线上玩家互动娱乐，真正做到了线上、线下同欢乐。下面我们一起来回味下这场盛会的精彩时刻。http://news.d.cn/detail_32784.html看到以上的精彩图片，你是不是跃跃欲试了呢？2009当乐手机网游同乐会，将会在全国多个大型城市进行巡回举办，下一站11月1日，精彩将在美丽的天府之国成都上演，不要犹豫快来报名吧。报名地址http://zt.d.cn/web/a090929_netgame_party/index.html当乐网游同乐会每站都准备了丰厚礼品，等着大家前来赢。时尚手机、玩偶公仔、同乐会专属T恤、短靓乐号、当乐经验金币魅力无限拿，令人眼花缭乱绝对心动的奖品。这就是——“手机网游同乐会！站站惊喜有好礼”！只要你有手机就可以参与到我们的活动中来，不一样的精彩就在2009当乐网游同乐会！
en: The perfect closing of the Nanjing Station of Dongle Mobile Online Game Music Association was sponsored by Dongle. com. The first stop of the 2009 Mobile Online Game Music Association was successfully held in Nanjing. From October 24 to October 25, 2009, the mobile online game music conference of Dongle carried five popular online games on the market, namely Fengshen, Jiuzhou, Zhu Shen,乱世, and mobile phone navigation, to offer a thick gift to the enthusiastic players of Nanjing, the ancient capital of ten dynasties. On October 24, the Dongle Mobile Online Game Music Association staged a passionate road show at Huahai 3C Computer Square, Zhujiang Road, Nanjing. The whole road show is divided into morning and afternoon. At 10:00 a.m., our enthusiastic players came to the scene early to wait for the event to start. The players in Nanjing were very enthusiastic and actively participated in the on-site interactive games. In particular, the college student players quickly accepted the online games. At the scene, under the guidance of the staff, they easily mastered how to download the game client and register the game. The event was scheduled to end at 5:00 p.m. in the afternoon, but the enthusiasm of the players on the spot did not decrease at all, and the end time of the event was repeatedly delayed. At 15:00 on Sunday, October 25, the co music conference held a discussion for players at the Nanjing National Fitness Center of Blue Bay Coffee in Nanjing. Everyone exchanged their experience and experience in playing online games, and put forward some of their expectations for online games. We have heard some voices and needs of everyone, which provides good suggestions for game manufacturers to develop more popular games, and also provides support for Dongle. com to better serve users. At the same time, the mobile online game music conference of Dongle also carried out a full picture and text live broadcast on the website of Dongle. In our online live broadcast room, we can also feel the enthusiasm of Nanjing. In our live broadcast room, we not only report the activities in Nanjing in time, but also interact with online players for entertainment, which really makes us happy online and offline. Next, let's recall the highlights of this grand event. http://news.d.cn/detail_32784.html Seeing the above pictures, are you eager to have a try? The 2009 Dongle Mobile Online Game Music Conference will be held in a number of major cities across the country. On November 1, the next stop will be Chengdu, the beautiful land of abundance. Don't hesitate to sign up. Register at http://zt.d.cn/web/a090929_netgame_party/index.html. The Dongle Online Game Music Conference has prepared rich gifts for each station, waiting for everyone to come and win. Fashion mobile phones, dolls, Tongle exclusive T-shirts, short beautiful music numbers, Dongle experience coins, and unlimited charm are really fascinating prizes. This is - "Mobile Online Game Music Association! There are gifts at every station!"! As long as you have a mobile phone, you can participate in our activities. The difference is that the wonderful thing is the 2009 Dongle Online Game Music Conference!

content: 比亚迪回归A股待批称新能源车有优势□本报记者张晓琳2009年在国家政策的推动下，车市一片大好。购置税优惠、汽车下乡、大力发展新能源、车企兼并重组等成为2009年汽车政策的关键词。昨日，《证券日报》记者独家采访了比亚迪销售公司副总经理兼新闻发言人王建钧，来解释新能源汽车的发展。国家政策推动新能源车发展《证券日报》：国家政策推动了2009年车市的火爆。具体到新能源车，国家给予了比亚迪何种优惠？王建钧：2009年初出台的《节能与新能源汽车示范推广财政补助资金管理暂行办法》中，国家对购买新能源车按照节油率和技术分级别补贴，不仅仅推动了新能源车产业的发展，还有利于引导自主品牌加快新能源车的研发与创新，促进新能源车技术的升级。这对比亚迪来说是一个很好的发展机遇，更加坚定了发展新能源汽车的决心和信心。比亚迪后续会推出多了款DM车型，包括F6DM、F0DM等，之后还会推出纯电动车型。目前，比亚迪F3DM已入选国家第一批《节能与新能源汽车示范应用工程推荐车型目录》，是轿车类唯一入选品牌。按照财政部于今年初发布的新能源车补贴办法，每一辆比亚迪F3DM将有机会争取到最高5万元的财政补贴。《证券日报》：您认为现在新能源汽车的竞争情况是怎样的？除比亚迪外，国内是否还有比较成熟的制造新能源汽车的企业？王建钧：目前，各国的汽车企业都在进行新能源车型的研发，因为新能源汽车是未来汽车发展的必然趋势，这一块的竞争也会日趋激烈。比亚迪一直坚持技术为王、创新为本的发展理念，比亚迪希望通过自己努力将这个社会变得更好、更健康，相信在新能源车领域比亚迪能够凭借自身的研发和技术取得竞争绝对优势地位，为社会创造更好的环境，打造一个绿色健康的明天。比通用、丰田有三大优势《证券日报》：作为新能源汽车领导者，比亚迪有哪些独特的竞争优势？王建钧：即使对比新能源车技术先进的通用、丰田而言，比亚迪仍有三大优势，第一，比亚迪F3DM双模电动车达到100公里行驶里程；第二，比亚迪F3DM有很强的动力性。百公里加速性能，比亚迪F3DM是10秒；第三，F3DM车实现了可插入式充电，家用220V的电源就可以进行充电。而且F3DM比丰田、通用提前实现了商品化，08年底已在国内上市。另外，比亚迪依托其产业背景，强大的垂直整合也是一大优势，比亚迪能够把电池、电控、电机技术有效结合在一起，实现了电动汽车的商业化运作。同时，比亚迪DM双模电动车还突破了反复充电、家用插座充电两大技术难关并且确保安全耐用。.《证券日报》：刚才您说比亚迪F3DM双模电动车已经入选国家第一批《节能与新能源汽车示范应用工程推荐车型目录》，但是很多消费者对这款双模电动车还不够了解，能否介绍一下这款车，双模电动车比一般车型有何优势？王建钧：与传统的燃油汽车相比，比亚迪F3DM双模电动车有以下两个特殊的优势：优越动力性能：F3DM搭载了BYD371QA全铝发动机，双模电动车驱动系统大幅度的提高了电机的功率和扭矩，比亚迪F3DM双模电动车最大输出功率达到了125KW，相当于拥有3.0L发动机的优越动力性能，将给驾驶者带来一种全新的驾驶快感。此外，在起步阶段，比亚迪F3DM双模电动车超强的瞬间加速性能，远超过3.0L级别的发动机所能达到的水平。使用成本低廉：在燃油经济性方面，F3DM双模电动车纯电动状态下百公里耗电仅为16度，电费按0.6元/kwh计算，其行驶100公里的花费约为9.6元人民币。DM双模动力系统采用的比亚迪最新发动机，使得系统中的发动机在任意工况下的最低燃油消耗率不足250g/kwh。而且相关调查显示，超过90%的人每天用车不超过100公里，这意味使用比亚迪DM双模电动车，绝大部分人将远离油价高企的困扰。因为用电的成本仅为使用燃油的1/4，对消费者来说，这无疑是一种绝对经济的选择。《证券日报》：新能源汽车科技攻关点有三方面：电池能力、发动机系统和电控系统，比亚迪在那个方面最为成功，在这三个方面比亚迪有何科研成果？王建钧：电池能力：比亚迪在新能源汽车领域采用了最先进的铁电池技术，引领了汽车动力的技术革新。汽车动力电池难在“高安全”、“低成本”、“长寿命”、“绿色环保”、“复杂工艺”等五个要求上。而比亚迪的“铁电池”在上述五个指标上都取得了突破。发动机系统：在上一问题中已经进行了阐述。电控系统：F3DM双模电动车搭载的是全球首创的DM双动力混合系统。DM为DUALMODE的缩写。DM双模电动车采用电动车系统(EV)和混合动力系统(HEV)。是一种将控制电机和电动机两种混合力量相结合的先进技术，不仅降低了油耗及排放，更极大的提高了动力和操控性能，实现了既可充电，又可加油的多种能源补充方式，实现了真正意义的双动力混合系统。已申报回归A股《证券日报》：比亚迪是否有回归A股的打算？王建钧：比亚迪在2009年7月发布公告明确比亚迪正在依据中证监相关法规按照流程进行申报，待有关部门批准后，拟赴深圳上市，发行不多于1亿股的A股，所得资金将用于拨付锂离子电池生产、汽车研发、扩展汽车产品及汽车零部件以及太阳能电池项目。比亚迪相信发行A股将为公司建立新融资平台，并可令公司扩展至不同证券市场，从而确保公司加强业务发展及进一步提高竞争力。《证券日报》：2009年比亚迪的销售情况如何？由于汽车批量生产能够大大降低成本，在2010年及未来的销售目标是怎样的？王建钧：2009年比亚迪汽车全年实现销售突破45万辆，超出预期的40万辆目标，同比增幅达162%，同时实现销量连续六年100%的增长。从2009年市场表现看来，功勋车F3连续月销突破3万辆，成为中国车市唯一“3万辆俱乐部”成员；F6新财富版，月销量超过6000辆；高端精品小车F0月销万辆以上，成为新一代微车王；新上市的中级精品家轿G3，也随着产能的提升，市场潜力进一步释放，冲击月销万辆。以上车型也有望在2010年持续放量增长，为比亚迪达成市场目标贡献力量。比亚迪计划在2010年推出L3、I6、G6、S6、M6等5款全新重磅车型，并通过致力于产品品质的完美提升，力争实现2010年80万辆的产销计划，力争再次实现100%的跨越增长。其中，L3、I6、G6、S6、M6等5款新车将担负17万辆的销售目标，进一步为经销商提供强有力新车支持。M6作为比亚迪首款高端全尺寸MPV，在伴随经济启稳迎来最佳上市时机，将在全网销售；L3已经登上最新一批国家新车目录，将是比亚迪又一款高端中级车；全新的G6、S6、I6等高端产品也将在2010年揭开神秘面纱。
en: BYD returns to A-share pending approval, saying new energy vehicles have advantages □ Zhang Xiaolin, reporter of this newspaper In 2009, under the promotion of national policies, the car market was very good. Purchase tax preference, cars going to the countryside, development of new energy, merger and restructuring of automobile enterprises, etc. became the key words of automobile policies in 2009. Yesterday, the reporter of Securities Daily exclusively interviewed Wang Jianjun, vice president and spokesman of BYD Sales Corporation, to explain the development of new energy vehicles. National policies promote the development of new energy vehicles. Securities Daily: National policies have promoted the booming of the car market in 2009. As for new energy vehicles, what kind of preferential treatment has the state given to BYD? Wang Jianjun: At the beginning of 2009, the Interim Measures for the Management of Financial Subsidies for the Demonstration and Promotion of Energy Saving and New Energy Vehicles, the state subsidizes the purchase of new energy vehicles according to the oil saving rate and technology level, which not only promotes the development of the new energy vehicle industry, but also helps to guide自主品牌to accelerate the research and development and innovation of new energy vehicles, and promote the upgrading of new energy vehicle technology. This is a good development opportunity for BYD, which has further strengthened its determination and confidence to develop new energy vehicles. BYD will later launch several DM models, including F6DM, F0DM, and then launch pure electric vehicles. At present, BYD F3DM has been selected as the only brand in the first batch of the National Catalogue of Recommended Models for Energy Saving and New Energy Vehicle Demonstration and Application Projects. According to the new energy vehicle subsidy method issued by the Ministry of Finance at the beginning of this year, each BYD F3DM will have the opportunity to win a maximum of 50000 yuan of financial subsidies. Securities Daily: What do you think of the current competition in the new energy vehicle industry? In addition to BYD, are there any other domestic enterprises that are mature in manufacturing new energy vehicles? Wang Jianjun: At present, automobile enterprises in various countries are developing new energy vehicle models, because new energy vehicles are the inevitable trend of future automobile development, and the competition in this area will also become increasingly fierce. BYD has always adhered to the development concept of technology as the king and innovation as the basis. BYD hopes to make the society better and healthier through its own efforts. It is believed that BYD can achieve a competitive advantage in the field of new energy vehicles by virtue of its own R&D and technology, create a better environment for the society, and create a green and healthy tomorrow. F3DM of BYD has three advantages over General Motors and Toyota · Securities Daily: As a leader of new energy vehicles, what are the unique competitive advantages of BYD? Wang Jianjun: Even in comparison with General Motors and Toyota, which have advanced new energy vehicle technologies, BYD still has three advantages: first, BYD F3DM dual-mode electric vehicle has reached a driving range of 100 kilometers; Second, BYD F3DM has strong power. The acceleration performance of 100 km is 10 seconds for BYD F3DM; Third, the F3DM vehicle has achieved plug-in charging, and the 220V household power supply can be charged. Moreover, F3DM realized commercialization earlier than Toyota and General Motors, and was launched in China at the end of 08. In addition, BYD relies on its industrial background, and the powerful vertical integration is also a major advantage. BYD can effectively combine battery, electric control and motor technologies, which has realized the commercial operation of electric vehicles. At the same time, BYD DM dual-mode electric vehicles have also broken through two major technical difficulties of repeated charging and home socket charging, and ensured safety and durability. · Securities Daily: The BYD F3DM dual-mode electric vehicle has been selected as the first batch of energy-saving and new energy vehicle demonstration and application projects in China, but many consumers are not familiar enough with this dual-mode electric vehicle. Can you introduce this vehicle? What are the advantages of the dual-mode electric vehicle compared with the general model? Wang Jianjun: Compared with the traditional fuel vehicles, BYD F3DM dual-mode electric vehicles have the following two special advantages: superior power performance: F3DM is equipped with BYD371QA all aluminum engine, and the dual-mode electric vehicle drive system greatly improves the power and torque of the motor. The maximum output power of BYD F3DM dual-mode electric vehicle reaches 125KW, which is equivalent to the excellent power performance of 3.0L engine, which will bring a new driving pleasure to the driver. In addition, at the starting stage, the ultra strong instantaneous acceleration performance of BYD F3DM dual-mode electric vehicle far exceeds the level that can be reached by the 3.0L engine. Low use cost: In terms of fuel economy, the power consumption of F3DM dual-mode electric vehicle is only 16 degrees per 100 kilometers in pure electric state. According to the calculation of 0.6 yuan/kwh for electricity, the cost of its driving 100 kilometers is about 9.6 yuan. The latest engine adopted by DM dual-mode power system of BYD makes the minimum fuel consumption rate of the engine in the system less than 250g/kwh under any working conditions. Moreover, according to the survey, more than 90% of people use cars less than 100 kilometers a day, which means that most people will be free from the trouble of high oil prices when using BYD DM dual-mode electric vehicles. Because the cost of electricity is only 1/4 of that of fuel, it is undoubtedly an absolutely economic choice for consumers. · Securities Daily: There are three aspects of scientific and technological research and attack on new energy vehicles: battery capacity, engine system and electric control system. What is the most successful aspect of BYD in this regard, and what are the scientific research achievements of BYD in these three aspects? Wang Jianjun: Battery capacity: BYD adopts the most advanced iron battery technology in the field of new energy vehicles, leading the technological innovation of automobile power. The automobile power battery is difficult in five requirements: "high safety", "low cost", "long life", "green and environmental protection" and "complex process". BYD's "iron battery" has achieved a breakthrough in the above five indicators. Engine system: has been explained in the previous question. Electric control system: F3DM dual-mode electric vehicle is equipped with the world's first DM dual power hybrid system. DM is the abbreviation of DUAL MODE. DM dual-mode electric vehicles adopt electric vehicle system (EV) and hybrid power system (HEV). It is an advanced technology that combines the two hybrid forces of motor control and motor. It not only reduces fuel consumption and emissions, but also greatly improves power and control performance. It realizes a variety of energy replenishment methods that can be charged and refueled, and realizes the dual power hybrid system in the true sense. It has been declared to return to A-share · Securities Daily: Does BYD intend to return to A-share? Wang Jianjun: BYD announced in July 2009 that BYD is applying in accordance with the process according to the relevant regulations of CSRC. After the approval of the relevant departments, it is intended to go to Shenzhen for listing and issue no more than 100 million A-shares. The funds obtained will be used for the production of lithium-ion batteries, automobile research and development, expansion of automobile products and auto parts, and solar cell projects. BYD believes that the issuance of A-shares will establish a new financing platform for the company, and can make the company expand to different securities markets, so as to ensure that the company strengthens business development and further enhance its competitiveness. · Securities Daily: How was the sales of BYD in 2009? Since mass production of automobiles can greatly reduce costs, what are the sales targets in 2010 and the future? Wang Jianjun: BYD's automobile sales broke through 450000 vehicles in 2009, exceeding the target of 400000 vehicles, with a year-on-year increase of 162%, and the sales volume has grown by 100% for six consecutive years. From the market performance in 2009, the F3 merit car has sold more than 30000 vehicles for consecutive months, becoming the only member of the "30000 vehicle club" in China's car market; F6 New Wealth Edition, with a monthly sales of more than 6000 vehicles; F0, a high-end boutique small car, sells more than 10000 vehicles per month, becoming a new microcar king; G3, a new mid-class boutique sedan just launched, has also released its market potential with the increase of production capacity, and is expected to sell 10000 vehicles per month. The above models are also expected to continue to grow in volume in 2010, contributing to BYD's achievement of market goals. BYD plans to launch five new heavyweight models of L3, I6, G6, S6, M6 and other five new heavyweight models in 2010, and strive to achieve the production and sales plan of 800000 vehicles in 2010 by focusing on the perfect improvement of product quality, and strive to achieve a cross growth of 100% again. Among them, the five new cars of L3, I6, G6, S6, M6, etc. will bear the sales target of 170000 vehicles, further providing powerful new car support to dealers. M6, as BYD's first high-end full-size MPV, will usher in the best listing opportunity with the stabilization of the economy, and will be sold in the whole network; L3 has climbed to the latest batch of national new vehicle catalogues, and will be another high-end mid-level vehicle of BYD; The new G6, S6, I6 and other high-end products will also unveil the mysterious veil in 2010.

content: 阿联连续3季得分500+篮板300+他正提速追赶姚明!新浪体育讯　北京时间3月30日，新泽西篮网坐镇主场IZOD中心，迎战圣安东尼奥马刺。最终，篮网以90-84击败马刺，易建联上阵31分钟，拿下8分、7个篮板。这场比赛是篮网本赛季的第10场胜利，他们凭借这场胜利彻底摆脱了NBA史上最差战绩纪录，而对阿联个人来说，这场比赛也颇具深意。本场比赛之前，阿联本赛季的总得分已经达到510分，篮板296个，只需要再抢4个篮板，他就可以连续第三个赛季完成单季得分500+和篮板300+的数据。要知道，此前在NBA能够达到以上数据的中国球员，只有休斯顿火箭的姚明一个。在自己的新秀赛季，阿联代表密尔沃基雄鹿出战66场比赛，最终拿到了566分、344个篮板；第二个赛季，刚刚转投篮网的阿联，出战61场比赛，最终拿到525分、326个篮板；本赛季，阿联频繁遭遇伤病，到目前为止仅出战44场比赛，如果剩余的8场比赛他全部参加，那么加起来也仅为52场比赛，必定创造个人NBA职业生涯的出勤率新低。但是，通过以上的数据对比我们不难看出，前两个赛季需要出战60场以上，阿联才能拿到得分500+和篮板300+，而如今出战40场以上，阿联就已经拿到了。因此，如果说阿联的第三季没有进步，显然是错误的，阿联已经提高了效率，变得更为高产。当然，和姚明连续7个赛季完成单季得分1000+和篮板400+的壮举相比，阿联还有很长的一段路要走，但是他至少已经证明，中国球员中并不是只有姚明一个能够真正立足NBA，他绝对不会是个NBA的匆匆过客。Yahoo体育近期曾表示，如何完成本赛季最后9场比赛(现为8场)，将是阿联这个因为伤病变得支离破碎的赛季最为关键的考评，倘若阿联能够强势收尾，必定可以给篮网足够的信心，选择在新赛季继续把他留在阵中。　今天，阿联忍着右肩的疼痛，在第四节投中了反超比分的一球，帮助篮网赢得了胜利，相信在后面8场比赛里，他也会继续证明自己的价值。(一分钱)
en: The UAE has scored 500+ rebounds for 300+ consecutive seasons, and he is speeding up to catch up with Yao Ming! Sina Sports News On March 30, Beijing time, the New Jersey Nets played against the San Antonio Spurs at the home of IZOD Center. In the end, the Nets beat the Spurs 90-84, and Yi Jianlian played for 31 minutes to score 8 points and 7 rebounds. This game was the 10th victory of the Nets this season, and they completely摆脱ed the worst record in NBA history with this victory, and this game was also meaningful to Liuhe personally. Before this game, Liuhe's total score this season had reached 510 points and 296 rebounds. He only needs to grab another four rebounds, and he can complete the single season score of 500+ and 300+ rebounds for the third consecutive season. It is worth noting that the only Chinese player in the NBA who can achieve the above data is Yao Ming of the Houston Rockets. In his rookie season, Liuhe played 66 games on behalf of the Milwaukee Bucks and finally got 566 points and 344 rebounds; In the second season, Liuhe, who had just transferred to the Nets, played 61 games and finally got 525 points and 326 rebounds; This season, Liuhe frequently suffered from injuries, and he only played 44 games up to now. If he participated in all of the remaining 8 games, it would only be 52 games in total, which must create a new low attendance rate for his personal NBA career. However, through the above data comparison, it is not difficult to see that Liuhe needs to play more than 60 games in the first two seasons to get 500+ points and 300+ rebounds. Nowadays, Liuhe has got more than 40 games. Therefore, it is obviously wrong to say that Liuhe's third season has not progressed. Liuhe has become more productive by improving his efficiency. Of course, compared with Yao Ming's achievement of completing 1000+ points and 400+ rebounds in a single season for seven consecutive seasons, Liuhe still has a long way to go, but he has at least proved that there is not only one Yao Ming in Chinese players who can truly stand in the NBA, and he will never be a hasty passer-by in the NBA. Yahoo Sports recently said that how to complete the last 9 games of this season (now 8 games) will be the most critical evaluation of Liuhe's season, which has been fragmented due to injuries. If Liuhe can end the season strongly, he must give the Nets enough confidence to choose to keep him in the new season. Today, Liuhe endured the pain of his right shoulder and scored a goal in the fourth quarter to help the Nets win. I believe that in the next eight games, he will continue to prove his value. (One penny)

content: 热点聚焦：“猪流感”会影响加美移民吗近日有网友提问：猪流感会影响移民吗？虽然移民行业是以政策为导向，目前还没有看到主流的移民国家因猪流感而专门提出修改或调整移民政策的通告，但因为猪流感而引起的与日常生活相关的系列问题正在发酵。截至北京时间28日晚，墨西哥确诊和疑似死于猪流感的人数已上升至152人，疑似感染者已近2000名。针对当前猪流感的蔓延趋势，世界卫生组织已经将流感大流行警告级别从之前的3级提高到4级，“第4级”意味着一种新病毒在人际间传播，可以引起“群体性”暴发。据报道，为防患于未然，世界多个国家已经启动应急措施，并对从美国本土、加拿大和墨西哥抵达本国的直飞航班，实施机舱内的红外体温检测，防范猪流感入境引发可能的大流行。美国、加拿大作为老牌移民国家同时成为本次猪流感的重灾区，从现阶段来看，在一定程度上难免造成近期登陆的客人心理上的恐慌，从长远来看，一次临时的病毒性传染症应该不会对移民行业造成影响。更有网友戏谑的说：现阶段如果是猪要办理移民的话才会被禁止登陆。目前，世卫组织也依然没有建议采取限制旅行和关闭边界的应对措施，因此，笔者建议大家不要担忧，如果有移民的意愿，抓紧在这金融危机移民政策相对宽松的时期及时办理移民申请。
en: Focus on hot spots: will "swine flu" affect immigration in Canada and the United States? Recently, netizens asked: will swine flu affect immigrants? Although the immigration industry is policy oriented, there is no notice from the mainstream immigration countries to modify or adjust the immigration policy due to swine flu at present, but a series of problems related to daily life caused by swine flu are fermenting. As of 28 o'clock that night, Beijing time, the number of people in Mexico who were confirmed and suspected to have died of swine flu had risen to 152, and nearly 2000 people were suspected to have been infected. In view of the current spread trend of swine flu, the World Health Organization has raised the influenza pandemic warning level from 3 to 4, and the "fourth level" means that a new virus spreads between people, which can cause "group" outbreaks. It is reported that in order to prevent problems before they occur, many countries in the world have started emergency measures, and infrared thermometers in the cabin have been implemented for direct flights arriving from the United States, Canada and Mexico to prevent the possible epidemic caused by the entry of swine flu. As old immigration countries, the United States and Canada are also the hardest hit areas in this swine flu. At this stage, they will inevitably cause panic in the minds of the guests who have landed recently. In the long run, a temporary viral infectious disease should not have an impact on the immigration industry. Some netizens joked that at this stage, pigs would be prohibited from landing if they were going to apply for immigration. At present, the World Health Organization still does not suggest taking measures to restrict travel and close borders, so I suggest you not to worry. If you want to immigrate, apply for immigration at this time when the financial crisis immigration policy is relatively relaxed.

content: 火箭vs马刺首发：姚明再次战邓肯世锦赛大神压阵新浪体育讯　北京时间10月8日，NBA季前赛继续进行，火箭第二场碰上马刺。双方首发阵容如下：火箭：阿隆-布鲁克斯、凯文-马丁、肖恩-巴蒂尔、路易斯-斯科拉、姚明马刺：托尼-帕克、马努-吉诺比利、理查德-杰弗森、德胡安-布莱尔、蒂姆-邓肯(新体)
person: 理查德-杰弗森,凯文-马丁,德胡安-布莱尔,托尼-帕克,马努-吉诺比利,姚明,肖恩-巴蒂尔,路易斯-斯科拉,阿隆-布鲁克斯,邓肯,新体
