This is a typical mountain golf course, and this is a golf course that is really built with dangerous and strange nature. The fairway is built according to the V shape of the natural valley, which is almost coarse and extensive, with ups and downs, endless bunkers and lakes, shrub obstacles and the characteristic red prominent rocks of Danxia landform. Every one of them shows that it is a wild horse. But which golf lover doesn't like "horse taming"? When you get to the fifth hole, Fuzi, who has been serious, suddenly laughs, "I lost money in the fifth hole last year. I saw the strategy online before, and I thought I had a chance. But when I really get on the tee, the terrain is high and the wind is strong. I swing my rod down, and the force is too strong, so I directly serve out of bounds. Standing here again, there is some psychological barrier." The fifth fairway is really special. The caddie said that the terrain of the tee of this fairway is very high, the drop of the fairway is nearly 50 meters, and there are three bunkers distributed around the green. Looking far away, "the small beads fall on the jade plate". The fifth hole is famous for its special scenery. On the tee, we saw the King Peak, like a sleeping beauty lying on its side. This time, Fuzi learned from the lesson. When swinging, he was quite skillful. Sure enough, the ball stopped steadily in the fairway after drawing an arc, and the distance from the green was just right. He took the opportunity to hit the green with one stroke, and then pushed the ball gently into the hole. The ball went in, and the耻was successfully wiped out with a par-bird. In the 18 holes of the whole stadium, there is scenery and danger everywhere. In this perverse mountain golf course, there is almost no so-called坦途. We lamented that the level of this stadium was not low while playing. The style of the back nine holes is completely different from that of the top nine holes. The back nine are

content: 小雨缓解美国旱情我国西南可能秋旱美国初霜冻影响有限，中西部地区迎小雨上周，受热带风暴Lee的影响，美国三角洲地区、东南棉区和东北部地区先后出现大到暴雨，有利于缓解当地旱情。但对于三角洲地区的大豆来说，这场降雨来得过晚，反而不利收割。美国中南、东南棉区的棉花采摘工作亦中断。美国中西部地区依然降水稀少，伊利诺伊州、印第安纳州累积降水量不足25毫米，只有偏东部的俄亥俄州、肯塔基州雨水较多。气温方面，上周美国中部平原和中西部地区降温明显，上述地区平均气温较常年偏低约4—6℃，不过中西部地区的气温多维持在白天24℃、夜间10℃左右，并未出现初霜冻。美国9月5—12日累积降水量实况图本周，美国中西部地区天气基本良好，虽然局部可能出现霜冻，但是预计影响不大。受冷空气影响，美国由中北至东南出现一轮降温过程，预计14—15日夜间北达科他州、明尼苏达州、威斯康辛州甚至爱荷华州局部可能出现初霜冻。由于玉米已基本成熟，故潜在霜冻威胁的主要是美国大豆产量。不过16日后，美国中西部地区将升温，升温有望持续至下周一，且中期预报认为9月18—22日美国北方大部气温较常年偏高。在降温的同时，美国中西部地区本周的降水概率亦将增大，土壤表墒改善利于大豆灌浆成熟。尽管天气以小雨为主，累积降水量不足以缓解旱情，但可遏制中西部地区旱情的发展。截至9月6日，全美的干旱面积在缩小，中西部地区的干旱面积继续小幅增加，但干旱程度基本维持中旱不变。预计在本周四USDA和NOAA联合发布的监测报告中，中西部地区的干旱形势可能依然不变。今年美国中西部地区前期土壤底墒良好，8月份才开始出现干旱，而且干旱面积和程度的发展速度不快，故这场干旱并不会对新作大豆造成严重影响。中国我国迎来”三秋大忙“，西南局部伏秋连旱进入9月，我国大部农业区迎来秋收、秋耕、秋播的”三秋大忙“。目前全国大部秋收作物发育期正常，预计能够正常腾茬，华北南部、黄淮部分地区可能略偏晚。冬麦和油菜产区大部气象条件利于秋播及冬小麦、油菜的生长，但部分地区的干旱可能影响农业生产。我国气象干旱监测首先，东北地区秋收天气基本良好，未来局部地区的霜冻对大豆、玉米、一季稻的产量影响轻微。9月上旬东北地区以晴为主，光照充足，虽然局部降水偏少以致出现气象干旱，但是大部农区土壤墒情适宜，利于作物灌浆和成熟；气温接近常年略偏低，旬末黑龙江北部林区和牧区出现初霜冻，但对粮食作物基本无影响。预计14日起，一股较强冷空气将自西北到东南先后影响我国大部分地区，其中华北北部、东北地区北部的部分地区降温幅度可超过10℃，15—18日黑龙江北部和西部的局部还将再次出现霜冻。降温将影响华北玉米、东北大豆、一季稻等秋收作物的灌浆和成熟速度，但由于主要农区并无霜冻，因此对产量的威胁有限。其次，北方冬麦区今年雨水充沛，土壤底墒良好，麦播形势较乐观。9月上旬北方冬麦区持续阴雨寡照，土壤偏湿，不利于前茬玉米、大豆的灌浆成熟和棉花的裂铃吐絮，腾茬期可能偏晚。不过土壤偏湿总比干旱令人欣慰，毕竟北方冬麦区入秋后雨水往往不多。预计18日以后我国华北、黄淮地区将恢复晴朗，配合排湿降渍，土壤过湿的问题可以缓解，冬小麦有望于9月下旬适时播种。最后，南方油菜产区形势分化，西南地区旱情持续。长江流域油菜产区大部土壤墒情适宜，利于油菜播种出苗，预计油菜将于9月中旬开始播种。而西南地区东南部自5月以来降水持续偏少，加之阶段性极端高温天气，截至9月12日四川东南部、重庆西部、云南东北部、贵州东部和西南部、湖南西部和广西东部部分地区存在轻至中度农业干旱。预计贵州东南部、重庆等地秋季降水依然偏少，未来可能出现伏秋连旱，不利于油菜适时播种。（作者单位：永安期货）
en: The light rain alleviates the drought in the United States. The southwest of China may have an autumn drought. The initial frost in the United States has a limited impact. Last week, the Midwest welcomed a light rain. Affected by Tropical Storm Lee, the Delta region, Southeast Cotton Area and Northeast China successively experienced heavy to heavy rain, which was conducive to alleviating the local drought. However, for soybeans in the Delta region, the rain came too late, but it was不利to harvest. Cotton picking in the cotton area of central South and Southeast of the United States was also interrupted. The Midwest of the United States still has little precipitation. The cumulative precipitation in Illinois and Indiana is less than 25mm, and only Ohio and Kentucky in the eastern part have more rain. In terms of temperature, last week, the central plain and Midwest of the United States experienced significant cooling. The average temperature in the above areas was about 4-6℃ lower than the year as a whole. However, the temperature in the Midwest mostly remained around 24℃ in the daytime and 10℃ at night, and there was no initial frost. The cumulative precipitation in the United States from September 5 to 12. This week, the weather in the central and western United States was basically good. Although local frost may occur, it is expected that the impact will not be great. Affected by the cold air, the United States has experienced a round of cooling from North China to Southeast China. It is expected that the local area of North Dakota, Minnesota, Wisconsin and even Iowa may experience initial frost on the night of 14-15. Since corn has basically matured, the potential frost threat is mainly the soybean production of the United States. However, after the 16th, the Midwest of the United States will warm up. The temperature is expected to continue to rise until next Monday, and the medium-range forecast shows that the temperature in most of the northern United States from September 18 to 22 is higher than the year as a whole. While cooling, the probability of precipitation in the central and western United States will also increase this week, and the improvement of soil surface moisture is conducive to the filling and maturation of soybeans. Although the weather is mainly light rain, the cumulative precipitation is not enough to alleviate the drought, but it can curb the development of the drought in the Midwest. As of September 6, the drought area in the United States was decreasing, and the drought area in the Midwest continued to increase slightly, but the drought level basically remained unchanged in the medium drought. It is expected that the drought situation in the Midwest may remain unchanged in the monitoring report jointly released by the USDA and NOAA on Thursday of this week. The soil moisture in the central and western United States was good in the early stage this year, and drought began to occur in August, and the development speed of drought area and degree was not fast, so the drought will not have a serious impact on the new soybeans. China welcomes "three autumns and great busy", and the drought in some areas in the southwest continues in September. In September, the majority of agricultural areas in China welcomed the "three autumn harvests" of autumn harvest, autumn farming and autumn sowing. At present, the development period of the main autumn crops in the country is normal, and it is expected that they can be normally reclaimed. The southern part of North China and the Huaihai region may be slightly late. The weather conditions in most of the winter wheat and rapeseed production areas are favorable for autumn sowing and the growth of winter wheat and rapeseed, but drought in some areas may affect agricultural production. China's meteorological drought monitoring shows that first, the autumn harvest weather in Northeast China is basically good, and the frost in the future local areas has a slight impact on the yield of soybeans, corn and single-season rice. In the first ten days of September, Northeast China was mainly sunny, with sufficient light. Although local precipitation was less, resulting in meteorological drought, the soil moisture in most agricultural areas was suitable, which was conducive to the filling and maturation of crops; The temperature is slightly lower than the year as a whole. At the end of the month, the forestry and pastoral areas in northern Heilongjiang experienced initial frost, but it had little effect on food crops. It is expected that a strong cold air will affect most areas of China from northwest to southeast from the 14th, and some areas in North China and Northeast China will experience a temperature drop of more than 10℃. From the 15th to the 18th, there will be another frost in some local areas in North and West Heilongjiang. The cooling will affect the filling and maturation speed of autumn crops such as corn in North China, soybeans in Northeast China and single-season rice, but the threat to yield is limited because there is no frost in the main agricultural areas. Secondly, the winter wheat area in North China has abundant rain this year, and the soil moisture is good, so the wheat sowing situation is optimistic. In the first ten days of September, the winter wheat area in North China continued to have rainy and寡lit light, and the soil was too wet, which was not conducive to the filling and maturation of the corn and soybeans in the previous crop and the cracking and spitting of cotton. The crop rotation period may be late. However, it is always more reassuring that the soil is wetter than drought, after all, the rainfall in the North Winter Wheat Area is often not much after autumn. It is expected that the Huabei and Huaihai areas of China will recover from the 18th, and the wet soil problem can be alleviated with the drainage and wetting, and the winter wheat is expected to be sown at the right time in the late September. Finally, the situation in the southern rapeseed production area is divided, and the drought in the Southwest continues. The soil moisture in most of the rapeseed production areas in the Yangtze River Basin is suitable, which is conducive to rapeseed sowing and emergence. It is expected that rapeseed will begin sowing in mid September. However, since May, the Southeast Department of Southwest China has had continuous less precipitation, coupled with phased extreme high temperature weather, as of September 12, some areas in Southeast Sichuan, West Chongqing, Northeast Yunnan, East and Southwest Guizhou, West Hunan and East Guangxi have light to moderate agricultural drought. It is expected that the autumn rainfall in Southeast Guizhou, Chongqing and other places is still scarce, and the future伏autumn drought may occur, which is not conducive to timely sowing of rape. (Author's unit: Yong'an Futures)

content: 百余美军政人员作证宣称看过外星人中新网9月27日电据台湾“中广新闻网”27日报道，一百多名美国退役军人、公务员作证宣称自己看过外星人。还说这些外星人对人类的核武器特别有兴趣。根据这些所谓的“外星人目击者”宣称：过去五十多年来外星人经常造访地球。依据他们的证词，美国、英国、墨西哥和伊朗都出现过UFO。有人还自称看过UFO的残骸以及活着或是死掉的外星人。一名目击者表示，1967年他在蒙大拿州一个空军基地服役时就看到UFO飞到基地上空，停在空中。当时基地的十枚义勇兵核弹头全部失效。一个月以后，UFO又去了，导弹又失效了一次。他们的结论是，外星人对地球没有恶意。不过他们很关心地球的核武以及星战计划。
en: More than 100 American military and political personnel testified that they had seen aliens. China News Network, September 27- According to the 27th report of Taiwan's "China Radio News Network", more than 100 American veterans and civil servants testified that they had seen aliens. They also said that these aliens are particularly interested in human nuclear weapons. According to these so-called "alien witnesses", aliens have often visited the earth for more than fifty years. According to their testimony, UFOs have appeared in the United States, the United Kingdom, Mexico and Iran. Some people even claimed to have seen the wreckage of UFOs and living or dead aliens. A witness said that in 1967, when he was serving at an air force base in Montana, he saw a UFO fly to the base and stop in the air. At that time, all ten volunteer nuclear warheads of the base were ineffective. One month later, the UFO went again and the missile failed again. Their conclusion is that aliens are not malicious to the earth. However, they are concerned about the Earth's nuclear weapons and the Star Wars program.

content: 30天令CBA升级名额巨变凤铝连投诉的机会都没有新赛季CBA出现第3支广东球队的可能性已变为0，广东凤铝铝材队在这场角逐中输给天津荣钢队，彻底无缘CBA.CBA联席会议曾在今年5月确定了2008-2009赛季CBA联赛的升级要件，主要是以今年NBL联赛成绩作为升级硬件指标，但昨日召开的联席会议上，却临时以投票形式进行公决，结果今年获NBL冠军的广东凤铝反被名次落在自己后面的天津和青岛压倒———16位CBA俱乐部总经理外加篮管中心联赛办公室经投票，天津以10票高居榜首，青岛获得6票，先前最热门的凤铝仅得到1票，得票最高的天津荣钢俱乐部就此荣升CBA.赴京出席了此次联席会议的凤铝俱乐部常务副总经理肖青龙称，俱乐部对这个结果已有所预见。据肖青龙透露，前日其赴京准备列席此次联席会议时，就有个别CBA俱乐部老总半开玩笑式地跟他讲：“你们凤铝(冲A)没戏了！”肖青龙称，这一情形当时即令其感觉不妙，随即也与大本营做过沟通，只是不想先前的传言竟在次日的联席会上一语成谶。记者电话采访凤铝队主教练王绪林时也得到这一印证，“我自己还有全体队员昨天都听说了我们队可能会升级无望的事。”电话中王绪林的失望之情清晰可感：“(今年)8月4日篮协来我们俱乐部进行CBA准入评估时，对我们各项软硬件都说满意，当时我还问过带队的(篮管中心党委书记)刘晓农和(CBA联赛办公室主任)张雄，他们都说我们升级没问题，谁知道还是闹了个现在这种结果。”虽然自8月1日起凤铝队就开始了集训，但队伍升级失利很可能会让这些来自五湖四海的队员们各奔东西。昨晚，身在俱乐部三水大本营的董事长吴小源听完前方的汇报后已经明确表态，接下来不排除凤铝撤资退出中国篮坛的可能性。
person: 张雄,肖青龙,王绪林,吴小源,刘晓农
en: The 30-day order of CBA to upgrade the huge change of Feng Aluminum has no chance to complain. The possibility of the new season of CBA to have the third team in Guangdong has become 0. Guangdong Feng Aluminum lost to Tianjin Ronggang in the competition, completely missing the CBA. The CBA Coordinating Conference once determined in May this year that the upgrading requirement of the 2008-2009 CBA League was mainly based on the results of this year's NBL League as the hardware indicator for upgrading. However, at the Coordinating Conference held yesterday, a public referendum was temporarily held by voting. As a result, the Guangdong Feng Aluminum, which won the NBL championship this year, was overwhelmed by Tianjin and Qingdao, which fell behind itself - 16 general managers of CBA clubs plus the league office of the basketball management center voted. Tianjin topped the list with 10 votes, Qingdao got 6 votes, and Feng Aluminum, the most popular, only got 1 vote. The highest vote of Tianjin Ronggang Club was promoted to CBA. Xiao Qinglong, the vice general manager of the Feng Aluminum Club who attended the Coordinating Conference in Beijing, said that the Club had foreseen the result. According to Xiao Qinglong, when he went to Beijing yesterday to prepare for the Coordinating Conference, some CBA club presidents jokingly said to him: "You have no play in Feng Aluminum (Chong A)!" Xiao Qinglong said that this situation made him feel bad at that time, and he also communicated with the headquarters, but he didn't expect that the rumors would come true at the Coordinating Conference the next day. When the reporter interviewed Wang Xuliu, the head coach of Feng Aluminum Team, by telephone, he also got this confirmation. "Yesterday, I and all the team members heard that our team might not be able to upgrade." Wang Xuliu's disappointment was clearly felt in the telephone: "(On August 4 this year), when the Basketball Association came to our club for CBA access evaluation, they said that we were satisfied with all the software and hardware. At that time, I also asked Liu Xiaonong (the party secretary of the Basketball Management Center) and Zhang Xiong (the director of the CBA League Office), who said that there was no problem with our upgrading. I didn't know that it was still a cause for the present result." Although the Feng Aluminum Team has started training since August 1, the failure of the team to upgrade may let these players from all over the world go their separate ways. Last night, after listening to the report from the headquarters, the chairman of the board of directors, Wu Xiaoyuan, who was in the sanwaters headquarters of the club, has made it clear that the possibility of Feng Aluminum withdrawing from the Chinese basketball world is not excluded in the future.

content: 暗黑血统2风格大变战神版暗黑出炉不同于更偏向ACT的《暗黑血统1》，近日《暗黑血统2》的游戏指导MarvinDonald在接受外媒采访时表示，《暗黑血统2》在游戏性上类似于《塞尔达》，而在全新的战利品系统上，则更像是《暗黑破坏神》。“是的，没错。在游戏中，玩家可以在各种各样的地下城里面杀怪，拿走怪物尸体上的战利品，可能你会想把那些垃圾卖掉没什么钱可以赚，但如果你找到了某些稀有物品，你就可以发财了。你永远都不知道你接下来会找到什么东西，所以这很让人兴奋。”
en: Dark Bloodline 2, a new version of God of War Dark, is different from Dark Bloodline 1, which is more inclined to ACT. Recently, Marvin Donald, the game instructor of Dark Bloodline 2, said in an interview with foreign media that Dark Bloodline 2 is similar to Zelda in terms of gameplay, and more like Diablo in terms of the new loot system. "Yes, that's right. In the game, players can kill monsters in all kinds of dungeons and take away the loot on the monster's body. You may want to sell those garbage for little money, but if you find some rare items, you can make a fortune. You never know what you will find next, so it's very exciting."

content: 梦八抵达上海安保更严格浦东机场获联盟高管盛赞记者沈知渝上海报道从彻夜不眠，灯火通宵的赌城澳门，“梦八”在两个小时以后，飞到了姚明的城市。这不再是弹丸之地，这里的人口，是澳门的30倍，黄浦江缓缓地流过城市的心脏，就像上海的血脉，给这座城市灌输着蕴秀灵气，东方明珠和城隍庙，浦东和浦西，贯通着千年文明。美国队的大个子们，还没机会去深入历史。最先映入眼帘的，是壮阔雄伟的浦东机场，而这也让他们惊叹，第一次来到中国的NBA公关主管布莱恩·麦克金农瞪着眼睛说：“机场真是太漂亮了，这个机场是新建的吗？”工作人员扮演球迷因为没有专机，只能搭乘商业客机，从澳门来上海。中午1点多，美国队登上上海航空FM818航班，直奔上海浦东。3点30分，飞机稳稳地降落在浦东国际机场。走出机舱，一眼看去，是浓浓的奥运气氛，五个福娃笑盈盈地看着这群大个子，北京奥运的标志，在过道上随处可见，霍华德大笑着说：“我真是非常兴奋。”比他们更兴奋的是机场的工作人员。在浦东机场，他们没有遇见球迷，没有看见标语，于是工作人员临时扮演了这个角色。当科比，詹姆斯，安东尼，韦德从他们面前鱼贯而过时，这些早有准备的工作人员放下了平日的矜持和严肃，跑着上去，和这些NBA的巨星们要求合影，要求签名。于是走了一大圈，满足了这些临时球迷的要求，美国队才跳上大巴，直扑下榻的波特曼酒店。一路上，大巴开过浦东宽阔平整的大道，收入眼帘的，尽是纽约芝加哥市中心一般的万丈高楼，他们啧啧地充满了惊叹。那些来过中国的，心里早有了数，上海是座怎样的城市，那些没来过中国的，置身于这样的繁华中，惊奇不已。45分钟，大巴抵达波特曼酒店。卸行李，领房卡，进房间，时针就慢慢走向了6点。可训练课还是没法省略，7点多，他们走下房间，上了大巴，开往静安体育馆。静安体育馆，其实就在波特曼酒店隔壁，可怎么也不能让美国队的大腕们走着过去，于是开车绕一圈，开进体育馆。这里头没有专业球迷，可也有临时的。穿着制服的警察，兴致勃勃地举着小相机，站在场边，对着使劲练投篮的美国队，摁下一回又一回，高兴地笑着。
person: 布莱恩·麦克金农,科比,詹姆斯,霍华德,韦德,安东尼,沈知渝
en: The Dream Eight arrived in Shanghai with more stringent security. The Pu Dong Airport won praise from the league executives. Shen Zhiyu, a reporter in Shanghai, flew to Yao Ming's city from Macao, the gambling city that never sleeps all night. This is no longer a small place. The population here is 30 times that of Macao. The Huangpu River slowly flows through the heart of the city, like the blood pulse of Shanghai, injecting this city with the spirit of Gengxiu. The Oriental Pearl and the City God Temple, Pudong and Puxi, connect the millennium civilization. The big guys of the American team haven't had the chance to go deep into history. The first thing that came into view was the magnificent Pudong Airport, which also made them amazed. Brian McGranahan, the NBA public relations director who came to China for the first time, said with his eyes open: "The airport is really beautiful. Is this airport newly built?" Because there was no special plane, I had to take a commercial passenger plane from Macao to Shanghai. At more than 1:00 pm, the American team boarded the Shanghai Airlines FM818 flight straight to Shanghai Pudong. At 3:30, the plane landed steadily at the international airport in Pudong. When you get out of the cabin, you can see the strong Olympic atmosphere. Five lucky babies look at these big guys with a smile. The logo of the Beijing Olympic Games is everywhere in the corridor. Howard said with a big smile: "I am really very excited." The staff at the airport were more excited than they were. At the Pudong Airport, they didn't meet fans or see slogans, so the staff played this role temporarily. When Kobe, James, Anthony and Wade passed in front of them, these well-prepared staff put down their usual restraint and seriousness, ran up to them, and asked these NBA superstars for photos and autographs. So take a big circle to meet the requirements of these temporary fans, and then jump on the bus to the Portman Hotel where you are staying. All the way, the bus passes through the broad and flat avenue in Pudong, and what comes into your eyes is the tens of thousands of high-rise buildings in the center of New York and Chicago, which is amazing. Those who have been to China have had a lot in their minds, and Shanghai is a city. Those who have not been to China are amazing in such prosperity. 45 minutes later, the bus arrived at the Portman Hotel. Check in your luggage, get your room card, get into your room, and the hour hand slowly goes to 6 o'clock. But the training class can't be omitted. At 7:00, they get down from their room, get on the bus and go to the Jing'an Gymnasium. In fact, Jing'an Gymnasium is just next to Portman Hotel, but it is impossible to let the big names of the American team walk around, so they drive around and enter the gymnasium. There are no professional fans here, but there are temporary ones. The police in uniform held a small camera with great interest, stood at the court and pressed it again and again to the American team who were practicing shooting hard, and smiled happily.

content: 惠普Mini311上网本可配80GBSSD和Win7中关村在线消息：惠普Mini311上网本在上个月便已经正式发布，惠普官方网站上近日登出了Mini311技术维护服务指导，里面的信息泄漏了Mini311升级动向。据透露，Mini311上网本可搭配Windows7Starter、Basic、Premium和Professional版本系统，并可以配置80GBSSD硬盘，或搭配5400转320GB/250GB硬盘，支持3GB内存。Mini311上网本采用的是NVIDIAION平台，采用11.6英寸显示屏，搭配英特尔AtomN270处理器，搭配1GB内存和160GB硬盘，具备5合1读卡器、USB、HDMI、VGA、RJ45等接口。带有摄像头和麦克风，采用了802.11b/g无线网卡，配置了6芯锂离子电池。外形大小为11.4x8.03x0.78-1.20英寸，重量为1.46千克。
en: HP Mini311 netbook can be equipped with 80GB SSD and Win7 Zhongguancun online news: HP Mini311 netbook has been officially released last month, and the HP official website recently published the Mini311 technical maintenance service guide, which leaked the upgrading trend of Mini311. It is revealed that the Mini311 netbook can be equipped with Windows 7 Starter, Basic, Premium and Professional versions of the system, and can be configured with 80GB SSD hard disk, or with 5400 320GB/250GB hard disk, and supports 3GB memory. The Mini311 netbook adopts the NVIDIA ION platform, with an 11.6 inch display screen, Intel Atom N270 processor, 1GB memory and 160GB hard disk, with a five-in-one card reader, USB, HDMI, VGA, RJ45 and other interfaces. With camera and microphone, it adopts 802.11b/g wireless network card and configures 6-cell lithium-ion battery. The size of the shape is 11.4x8.03x0.78-1.20 inches, and the weight is 1.46 kilograms.

content: 一波三折土豆网再冲刺IPO？业内称中国企业赴美上市的窗口期已经关闭近日又有两企业申请上市由于市况不佳，担心赴美IPO并不能取得理想的估值，迅雷和盛大文学双双延缓了赴美IPO之路，而接下来谁会迈出投石问路的第一步，也备受市场关注。本报讯(记者索冬冬)昨日，有消息称土豆网将于未来两天登陆纳斯达克市场，计划融资1.2亿美元。而这也是土豆自去年11月提交上市文件后的最新消息。昨日土豆网公关部表示，不便就此事发表评论。前期中概股的暴跌令业内惊呼赴美上市的窗口已关闭，多位业内人士表示不看好土豆此时的IPO。另一方面，拓见科技、凯赛生物两家公司却逆市提交IPO申请，但由于市场影响较小，也难以承担开启新上市窗口的重任。土豆网扫清上市障碍i美股李妍对记者表示，截至目前土豆仍未公布发行价区间，近日上市的可能性较小。此前曾有消息称土豆将推迟至11月进行IPO。但分析认为，土豆网CEO财产纠纷刚刚解决，基本扫清了上市障碍，而受视频网站的竞争格局影响、风险投资的驱赶等可能令其将上市摆在首要位置。中国视频网站已有优酷和酷6在美上市，排队的有土豆、迅雷旗下的迅雷看看、PPS等，正版长视频领域还有奇艺和搜狐视频。可想而知，后来上市的企业将花费更多的精力讲述其与前行者的差异和优势，获得认可也更困难。此外，随着各家赴美上市，版权问题也逐渐被重视起来，各家争相花费巨额资金购买内容。土豆网CEO王微表示，土豆网并不会减少版权购买以及对内容提供方的投入，并在原创视频UGC和自制内容方面建立行业壁垒。数据显示，截至2011年3月31日，土豆网现金及现金等价物为3191万美元，而优酷这一数字为2.53亿美元。与一线的竞争对手相比，优酷凭借“首家赴美IPO的中国视频网站”赚足眼球，并依靠IPO和增发储备了大量资金，搜狐、奇艺等背后都拥有母公司的资金和流量长期的支持。重磅公司或打破窗口期对于延缓IPO，盛大文学和迅雷方面都表示目前美国市场状况不佳，公司的价值无法得到体现。外界的普遍观点也认为目前中国企业赴美上市的窗口期已经关闭，短期内难以恢复。但有风投人士则认为，优酷、当当上市时受热捧也大大提升了人们对中概股的整体期望，目前上市难以重现前期的高估值溢价，但也并不要因此“风声鹤唳”。近日，拓见科技、凯赛生物分别向SEC提交了上市申请。资料显示，凯赛生物是一家工业生物企业，拓见科技则是发展电子优惠券业务，由于关注度较低并未引起市场的关注。但在市况不佳的情况下，两家公司将发行价定到12美元以上，融资规模达到7500万美元和8970万美元，令不少投资者大跌眼镜。业内称中国企业赴美上市的窗口期已经关闭近日又有两企业申请上市由于市况不佳，担心赴美IPO并不能取得理想的估值，迅雷和盛大文学双双延缓了赴美IPO之路，而接下来谁会迈出投石问路的第一步，也备受市场关注。本报讯(记者索冬冬)昨日，有消息称土豆网将于未来两天登陆纳斯达克市场，计划融资1.2亿美元。而这也是土豆自去年11月提交上市文件后的最新消息。昨日土豆网公关部表示，不便就此事发表评论。前期中概股的暴跌令业内惊呼赴美上市的窗口已关闭，多位业内人士表示不看好土豆此时的IPO。另一方面，拓见科技、凯赛生物两家公司却逆市提交IPO申请，但由于市场影响较小，也难以承担开启新上市窗口的重任。土豆网扫清上市障碍i美股李妍对记者表示，截至目前土豆仍未公布发行价区间，近日上市的可能性较小。此前曾有消息称土豆将推迟至11月进行IPO。但分析认为，土豆网CEO财产纠纷刚刚解决，基本扫清了上市障碍，而受视频网站的竞争格局影响、风险投资的驱赶等可能令其将上市摆在首要位置。中国视频网站已有优酷和酷6在美上市，排队的有土豆、迅雷旗下的迅雷看看、PPS等，正版长视频领域还有奇艺和搜狐视频。可想而知，后来上市的企业将花费更多的精力讲述其与前行者的差异和优势，获得认可也更困难。此外，随着各家赴美上市，版权问题也逐渐被重视起来，各家争相花费巨额资金购买内容。土豆网CEO王微表示，土豆网并不会减少版权购买以及对内容提供方的投入，并在原创视频UGC和自制内容方面建立行业壁垒。数据显示，截至2011年3月31日，土豆网现金及现金等价物为3191万美元，而优酷这一数字为2.53亿美元。与一线的竞争对手相比，优酷凭借“首家赴美IPO的中国视频网站”赚足眼球，并依靠IPO和增发储备了大量资金，搜狐、奇艺等背后都拥有母公司的资金和流量长期的支持。重磅公司或打破窗口期对于延缓IPO，盛大文学和迅雷方面都表示目前美国市场状况不佳，公司的价值无法得到体现。外界的普遍观点也认为目前中国企业赴美上市的窗口期已经关闭，短期内难以恢复。但有风投人士则认为，优酷、当当上市时受热捧也大大提升了人们对中概股的整体期望，目前上市难以重现前期的高估值溢价，但也并不要因此“风声鹤唳”。近日，拓见科技、凯赛生物分别向SEC提交了上市申请。资料显示，凯赛生物是一家工业生物企业，拓见科技则是发展电子优惠券业务，由于关注度较低并未引起市场的关注。但在市况不佳的情况下，两家公司将发行价定到12美元以上，融资规模达到7500万美元和8970万美元，令不少投资者大跌眼镜。
en: Tudou net, which has many twists and turns, is going for another IPO? The industry said that the window period for Chinese enterprises to go public in the United States has closed. Recently, two enterprises have applied for listing. Due to the poor market conditions, they are worried that going to the United States for IPO will not achieve the ideal valuation. Xunlei and Shengda Literature have both delayed their journey to the United States for IPO, and the first step of who will take the first step is also a matter of great concern to the market. (Reporter Suo Dongdong) Yesterday, it was reported that Tudou would land on the Nasdaq market in the next two days, with a planned financing of US $120 million. This is also the latest news since Tudou submitted its listing documents last November. The public relations department of Tudou said yesterday that it was inconvenient to comment on this matter. The slump of Chinese concept stocks in the earlier period made the industry exclaim that the window for going public in the United States has closed. Several industry insiders said they did not like the IPO of Tudou at this time. On the other hand, Tuojian Technology and Kaisai Biology have submitted IPO applications against the market, but because the market impact is small, it is also difficult to bear the heavy responsibility of opening a new listing window. Li Yan, CEO of Tudou com, told reporters that up to now, Tudou has not announced the issuance price range, and it is less likely to be listed in the near future. Previously, there was news that Tudou would postpone its IPO until November. But the analysis believes that the property dispute of Tudou CEO has just been solved, basically clearing the barriers for listing, and the competition pattern of video websites, the pursuit of venture capital and other factors may make it take listing as the first priority. Chinese video websites have Youku and Cool6 listed in the United States, and there are potatoes, Xunlei's Xunlei, PPS, etc. waiting in line. There are also iQiyi and Sogou Video in the field of genuine long videos. It is conceivable that the later listed enterprises will spend more energy telling their differences and advantages from the pioneers, and it is also more difficult to get recognition. In addition, as companies go public in the United States, the copyright issue has also been gradually taken seriously, and everyone is competing to spend huge funds to purchase content. Wang Wei, CEO of Tudou. com, said that Tudou. com will not reduce its investment in purchasing copyrights and providing content, and will establish industrial barriers in the field of original video UGC and self-made content. According to the data, as of March 31, 2011, Tudou. com had cash and cash equivalents of US $31.91 million, while Youku had US $253 million. Compared with the first line competitors, Youku has earned enough attention as the first Chinese video website to go public in the United States, and has relied on the IPO and additional issuance to reserve a large amount of funds. Sogou, Qiyi and other companies behind them have long-term support from their parent companies' funds and traffic. Heavyweight companies or breaking the window period of SDA Literature and Xunlei have delayed their IPO, saying that the current market conditions in the United States are poor and the value of the company can not be reflected. The general view outside is that the window period for Chinese enterprises to go public in the United States has closed and it is difficult to recover in the short term. However, venture capitalists believe that the listing of Youku and dangdang when they were very popular has also greatly increased people's overall expectations of Chinese concept stocks. At present, it is difficult to reproduce the high valuation premium of the earlier period, but it is not necessary to "frighten the wind and crane" for this reason. Recently, Tuojian Technology and Kaisai Biology have submitted listing applications to the SEC respectively. According to the data, Kaisai Biology is an industrial biological enterprise, and Tuojian Technology is developing electronic coupon business. Because of the low attention, it has not caused the market's attention. However, in the case of poor market conditions, the two companies set the issue price at more than US $12, with the financing scale reaching US $75 million and US $89.7 million, which made many investors lose their glasses.

content: 罗志祥《潮男正传》改版发行创作粉丝之歌(图)新浪娱乐讯2008年底最受人注目的舞王传说专辑——罗志祥《潮男正传》抢手推出成绩惊人，旋即成为各大排行榜的冠军，包括各大唱片销售、网络及新媒体点播排行榜等冠军。适逢年底人气偶像相继出碟竞争激烈，罗志祥一路走来无畏风雨，更努力宣传为新片造势，为答谢各界替他撑腰打气，金牌大风决定在2009年的新春伊始顺势推出改版专辑，不仅超具诚意的推出双CD回馈大家的支持热情，还激送多项好礼，潮男巨型海报、【潮男明信片】等，超大尺寸豪华精装再一好礼，绝无仅有，叫人一定不能错过！！罗志祥第一次填词之作感人至深《为你写首歌》曾遭盗版外流除了专辑原有的玩转潮流10首新歌外，此次改版，罗志祥特别加赠一年一首创作之歌，邀请音乐才子好友曹格量身谱曲，加上他第一次个人亲笔创作歌词，表达内心最真实的情感，指定给一路支持着他、让他最疼爱的粉丝群们，因为无论何时何地他都能感受到被他们关爱呵护的温暖情意，希望能透过这首歌曲传达他的爱意，不需要言语只要哼起旋律，就能和罗志祥交流彼此最真挚的心灵。由于此前不法盗版商曾将这首歌曲放到网络上，公开进行免费的试听及下载，为了严惩这种不道德的行为，在《潮男正传》发行前夕，罗志祥忍痛割爱将此曲排除在专辑之外，堪称他2008年演艺事业最难过的遗珠了。此次《为你写首歌》收入改版专辑，罗志祥的愿望很简单，“以前我的歌迷一直说，我从来没有为他们写过歌，没想到专门写了一次，却碰上了盗版外流的情况，可是不管怎样，我想与歌迷心跟心在一起的感觉没变，而这种感情也是我很想唱出来的！”一次收藏潮男全套精彩造型罗志祥黑白琴键上演“金鸡独立”在上市期间创下了亮眼好成绩，销售热潮也因此延续到农历新年，疼爱粉丝的他特别向唱片公司恳求，在改版的产品能加入回馈大家的贴心赠品，因此本次改版特别加赠5张1套的实用【潮男明信片】及潮男巨型海报，将罗志祥此张专辑的精彩造型一次收藏，也因此让小猪在各大节目中更加卖力宣传，格外高调的告知全天下，这张专辑是他参与最多、投资创意最多的全新作品。颇具难度的改版专辑封面上，罗志祥脚尖踩在古董钢琴上，酷帅至极，封面刚一曝光，他便高呼“此照片决非数码合成”！原来这套全新造型来自于罗天王的灵感突现，唱片公司觉得非常不错便悉心采纳，没有想到真正拍摄起来却难度极大！罗志祥脚下的古董钢琴已经有一百多年的历史，需要特别呵护，而且要达到脚尖弹奏钢琴的创意效果，罗志祥必须要把全身的重心移至胸部以上，为了防止从钢琴掉下来造成的摔伤，唱片公司还特意做了不少的安全措施，来保证他的安全，从成品设计上已不难看出这套造型的难度，而讲求完美的罗天王在钢琴上反反复复摔了十几遍，才觉得满意，“其实每一遍拍摄都很辛苦，都非常累，虽然这个创意是我提出来的，可是真正要拍的时候，我还挺拒绝的，这个真的能拍出来吗？真正最后完成的时候，我还是挺感动的，看来世界上的事情只要勇于尝试，没有什么做不到的！”
en: The most popular dance king legend album at the end of 2008 - Luo Zhixiang's "Tide Man's Biography" - was launched with amazing results and immediately became the champion of various charts, including the champions of various record sales, online and new media on demand charts. Coinciding with the end of the year, popular idols launched one after another, and the competition was fierce. Luo Zhixiang was fearless on his way. He also publicized to create momentum for the new film. In order to thank everyone for supporting him, Goldwind decided to launch a revised album at the beginning of the New Year in 2009. It not only launched a dual CD with super sincerity to回馈 everyone's support enthusiasm, but also sent many gifts, such as huge posters of Chaonan, [Chaonan's postcard], ultra large luxury hardcover gift, unique, must not be missed!! Luo Zhixiang's first song to fill in the words was so moving that "Write a Song for You" was lost in addition to the 10 new songs of the original album that played around with the trend. This time, Luo Zhixiang gave a gift of one song a year, inviting his good friend Cao Ge, a music talent, to compose music for him, and he wrote lyrics for the first time to express his most true feelings, which were designated for the fans who have been supporting him and let him love them most. Because no matter when and where, he can feel their warmth and love, he hopes to convey his love through this song. There is no need to speak. Just hum the melody to communicate with Luo Zhixiang the most sincere soul. Because this song was once put on the Internet by an illegal pirate for free trial listening and download, in order to severely punish this immoral behavior, Luo Zhixiang had to give up this song when the "Tide Man's Biography" was released, which was the most regretful pearl of his 2008 acting career. This time, "Write a Song for You" was included in the revised album, and Luo Zhixiang's wish was very simple. "In the past, my fans always said that I never wrote a song for them. I never thought that when I wrote a song for them, I met the situation of piracy. But anyway, I want to be together with the fans. The feeling of being with the fans has not changed, and this feeling is also what I really want to sing!" Luo Zhixiang's black and white keyboard plays "Jinji Independent" in a set of wonderful styles of Chaonan, which has created a bright good result during the listing period, and the sales boom has also continued to the Spring Festival. He specially pleaded with the record company to include a set of 5 practical gifts of Chaonan's postcards and the huge poster of Chaonan in the revised product to give everyone a set of 5 practical gifts of Chaonan's postcards and the huge poster of Chaonan, which will collect the wonderful style of Luo Zhixiang's album at one time, so that the little pig can publicize more efforts in major programs, and he is particularly high-profile to tell the whole world that this album is his most new work in which he participates the most and invests the most creativity. On the difficult cover of the revised album, Luo Zhixiang's toe stepped on the antique piano, extremely cool. Just as soon as the cover was exposed, he shouted "This photo is definitely not digital synthesis"! It turns out that the set of new shapes comes from the sudden inspiration of King Luo. The record company thought it was very good and carefully adopted it. However, it was extremely difficult to shoot! The antique piano under Luo Zhixiang's feet has a history of more than 100 years and needs special care. In order to achieve the creative effect of playing the piano with his toes, Luo Zhixiang must move the center of gravity of his body to above his chest. In order to prevent the injury caused by falling from the piano, the record company also took a lot of safety measures to ensure his safety. It is not difficult to see the difficulty of this set of shapes from the product design. The perfect King Luo fell on the piano again and again, and felt satisfied. "In fact, every shooting is very hard and very tired. Although this idea was proposed by me, I was quite reluctant to shoot when it really came to shooting. Can this really be shot? When it was really completed in the end, I was still quite moved. It seems that as long as we are brave enough to try things in the world, there is nothing we can't do!"

content: 嘉丽士漆立体式渠道3+3粘性营销模式效果突出随着渠道与消费趋势的变化，涂料市场已发生深刻的变化，嘉丽士把握涂料市场脉搏，积极调整营销策略，在渠道上开疆拓土，大力发展工程、家具渠道取得了可观的成就。据悉，8月17日，嘉丽士漆西区销售部酒泉嘉丽士已成功在工程渠道打开了突破口，取得了酒泉职业技术学院五栋教学楼全部内外墙漆的大单以及中标鸿源小区全部外墙漆。此外，嘉峪关市图书馆内墙漆也全部采用嘉丽士漆；嘉丽士氟碳漆走进云南省昭通市唯一一家五星级酒店——江山大酒店。同时，西区销售部还积极介入当地家具厂。目前，山西太原嘉丽士正在筹备太原嘉丽士专业家具漆旗舰店，抢占当地家具漆市场……种种迹象表明，嘉丽士正在开拓工程、家具渠道，发展势头看好。今年的涂料市场比较冷淡，市场需求也在大幅度萎缩，这是大多数涂料人的感受。然而，实质上并非如此。萎缩的可能是在某个或者某些渠道，而萎缩掉的这部分份额正转向了工程、家具等渠道。整体而言，市场仍旧在那里，只是渠道与消费趋势变化很大。有着较强市场洞察力与敏感性的企业凭借自身的实力，迅速转型肯定会大有“钱途”。嘉丽士漆捕捉到市场形势的变化。在嘉丽士2011年第二季度年中培训会议上，嘉丽士张文辉总经理提出紫光大道3+3粘性营销之赢利倍增模式，明确指出嘉丽士以后的重点将逐步向立体化渠道发展倾斜，将把工程渠道与家具渠道的发展作为嘉丽士拓展渠道的途径，大战拳脚。此前嘉丽士就展现了它拓展渠道的能力。8月2日，嘉丽士漆成功中标山西省中医附属医院内墙装修工程。7月30日，嘉丽士成功中标山西壶关县城乡改造工程，壶关县改造街道建筑将全部采用嘉丽士外墙漆。7月29日，山东济宁市“鸟巢”体育馆决定采用嘉丽士内墙乳胶漆……日前，嘉丽士漆工程漆渠道正续写辉煌，创造立体渠道增长点。在此期间，嘉丽士家具漆也毫不逊色，凭借着与诸多世界化工巨头如罗门哈斯、拜耳、巴斯夫、杜邦等建立了良好的原料和技术合作关系，进口环保树脂等原辅助材料、技术研发力强、全自动生产工艺等七大产品技术优势以及七大支持政策：产品政策支持、人员支持、服务标准、特价体制、贴补利息、硬件支持、培训支持，与云鹤木门、联发家具、安居衍凯家具装饰、宝想家具、伯利恒家具有限公司、昌福实木、昌盛家具、长虹家具、长虹家具厂、大力华家具有限公司、大张庄家具、德克家具公司达成了战略合作伙伴。
en: Carry out the three-dimensional channel of Carrie's paint 3+3 viscous marketing mode has achieved remarkable results. With the change of channels and consumption trends, the paint market has undergone profound changes. Carrie's grasps the pulse of the paint market and actively adjusts the marketing strategy. It has made considerable achievements in developing the project and furniture channels. It is reported that on August 17, Carrie's West Sales Department, Jiuquan Carrie's, has successfully opened a breakthrough in the engineering channel, winning the large order of all interior and exterior wall paints of five teaching buildings of Jiuquan Vocational and Technical College and the bid for all exterior wall paints of Hongyuan Community. In addition, all the interior wall paints of Jia Yu Guan City Library also adopted Carrie's paint; Carrie's fluorocarbon paint has entered the only five-star hotel in Zhaotong City, Yunnan Province - Jiangshan Grand Hotel. At the same time, the West Sales Department also actively intervenes in the local furniture factory. At present, Carrie's, Taiyuan, Shanxi, is preparing for the professional furniture paint flagship store of Carrie's, Taiyuan, to seize the local furniture paint market... All signs show that Carrie's is developing the engineering and furniture channels, and the development prospects are good. The paint market is relatively cold this year, and the market demand is also shrinking significantly, which is the feeling of most coating people. However, it is not really the case. It is possible that the shrinking is in a certain channel or some channels, and the shrinking part of the share is shifting to the engineering, furniture and other channels. As a whole, the market is still there, but the channels and consumption trends have changed a lot. Enterprises with strong market insight and sensitivity, relying on their own strength, will definitely have a promising future if they transform quickly. Carrie's paints have caught the change of market situation. At the Carrie's mid-year training conference in the second quarter of 2011, Zhang Wenhui, the general manager of Carrie's, proposed the profit doubling model of the three plus three viscous marketing of the Violet Avenue, and made it clear that the future focus of Carrie's will gradually shift to the development of the three dimensional channel, and the development of the engineering channel and the furniture channel will be regarded as the way for Carrie's to expand the channel, and a big battle will be fought. Previously, Carrie's has demonstrated its ability to expand channels. On August 2, Carrie's paint successfully won the bid for the interior wall decoration project of the Affiliated Hospital of Shanxi University of Traditional Chinese. On July 30, Carrie's successfully won the bid for the urban and rural reconstruction project of Huguan County, and the street buildings of Huguan County will all adopt Carrie's exterior wall paint. On July 29, the "Bird's Nest" Gymnasium in Jining City, Shandong Province decided to adopt Carrie's interior latex paint... At present, the engineering paint channel of Carrie's paint is rewriting the legend and creating a three-dimensional channel growth point. During this period, Carrie's furniture paint was also inferior. Relying on the cooperation with many world chemical giants, such as Rohm and Haas, Bayer, BASF and DuPont, to establish a good raw material and technical cooperation relationship, import environmental protection resin and other raw auxiliary materials, strong technical research and development capabilities, seven product technology advantages such as fully automatic production process, and seven support policies: product policy support, personnel support, service standards, special price system, interest subsidy, hardware support, training support, it has reached a strategic partnership with Yunge wooden door, Lianfa furniture, Anju Yan Kai furniture decoration, Baoxiang furniture, Bethlehem Furniture Co., Ltd., Changfu实木, Changsheng Furniture, Changhong Furniture, Changhong Furniture Factory, Dali Hua Furniture Co., Ltd., Dazhangzhuang Furniture, Dekang Furniture

content: CPI重磅出炉农产品多数回落15日早盘国内商品走势较为分化，其中，农产品多数回落，唯棉花及白糖翻红，基金属及能源化工整体维持震荡偏多走势。CPI数据低于市场预期，紧缩政策预期下降，预计短期市场将延续震荡整理走势。国家统计局15日公布，1月份CPI同比上涨4.9%。环比上涨1.0%。1月份PPI同比上涨6.6%；环比上涨0.9%。对此，海通期货研究所所长郭洪钧表示，CPI数据出乎市场预料，低于市场预期，紧缩政策预期下降，利好股市。对于大宗商品走势的影响短期呈中性，长期来看属利好。不过，国家信息中心15日在一份报告中表示，作为抗击通货膨胀及遏制资产泡沫政策组合的一部分，中国央行年内很可能继续加息和上调存款准备金率。国家信息中心表示，为把好流动性总闸门，调整存款准备金率是中国央行的首选工具，并称，未来存款准备金率最高可能上调至23%左右。目前国内存款准备金率为19%。国家信息中心还称，未来央行继续加息势在必行，因为加息可以有效抑制资产价格泡沫。国家信息中心还表示，预计2011年人民币将继续逐步升值。2月15日在安徽粮食批发交易市场及其联网市场举行国家临时存储食用油竞价交易会，本次计划销售菜籽油99626吨，实际成交92759吨，成交率93.11%，成交均价9688元/吨。本次拍卖，成交率再次放大，成交均价也有较大升幅，上次1月18日菜油拍卖成交率89%，均价为9365元/吨。随着前期油脂市场期现价格的走高，菜油拍卖底价对市场具有吸引力较大。自2010年10月份至今，国家累计投放7批临储菜籽油，共计划销售89.4万吨，实际成交77.2万吨，成交量86.4%，有效增加市场油脂供应量。今日菜油拍卖成交良好，对期货盘面菜油价格形成支撑，走势强于豆油、棕榈油。大连玉米期货早盘维持高位整理，主力1109合约以2464元/吨开盘，收盘价2,459元/吨，下跌5元/吨。受隔夜国际玉米价格回落拖累，连玉米早盘维持整理。不过国内旱情忧虑及需求旺盛持续支撑价格，但高位抛压将加重，预计连玉米震荡料将加剧。豆油期货早盘震荡小跌，主力1109合约开盘10,792元/吨，收盘10,818元/吨，下跌22元/吨。隔夜美豆类期货出现高位调整行情，外盘对国内油脂市场提振作用削弱。不过，国内价格也低于进口成本价格抑制了国内油脂下跌空间。虽然市场上涨趋势仍未发生变化，但短期回调风险仍存。棕榈油期货早盘呈高位震荡。1109主力合约以10,088元/吨开盘，收盘10,118元/吨，下跌28元/吨。马来西亚棕榈油及美豆类期货均出现高位调整行情，外盘提振作用削弱。但在港口货源集中、进口成本与盘面价格倒挂严重影响下，期价较为抗跌。走势来看，目前上升形态保持完好，但由于缺乏新的推涨动力，多空资金在当前价位抗衡，存在一定的回调风险，但预计幅度不大。作者：科创信息王云汉
en: CPI released heavily, most agricultural products fell back. On the morning of the 15th, domestic commodity trends were relatively divergent. Among them, most agricultural products fell back, only cotton and white sugar turned red, and funds and energy chemicals maintained a trend of overall volatility. CPI data was lower than market expectations, and the expectation of tightening policy declined, it is expected that the short-term market will continue to consolidate volatility. The National Bureau of Statistics announced on the 15th that the CPI in January rose by 4.9% year on year. Ring ratio rose 1.0%. In January, PPI rose 6.6% year on year; Ring ratio rose 0.9%. Guo Hongjun, director of the Institute of Hedong Futures, said that the CPI data was unexpected and lower than expected, and the expectation of tightening policies declined, which was good for the stock market. The impact on the trend of bulk commodities is neutral in the short term and beneficial in the long term. However, the National Information Center said in a report on the 15th that the central bank of China is likely to continue to raise interest rates and the deposit reserve ratio this year as part of the policy package to combat inflation and curb asset bubbles. The National Information Center said that in order to control the total gate of liquidity well, adjusting the deposit reserve ratio is the first choice of the People's Bank of China, and it is called the future deposit reserve ratio, which can rise to about 23%. The current deposit reserve ratio in China is 19%. The National Information Center also said that the central bank must continue to raise interest rates in the future, because interest rate hikes can effectively curb asset price bubbles. The National Information Center also said that it is expected that the renminbi will continue to gradually appreciate in 2011. On February 15, the national temporary storage edible oil bidding and trading conference was held in Anhui Grain Wholesale Trading Market and its interconnected market. This planned sale of 99626 tons of rapeseed oil was 92759 tons, with a success rate of 93.11%, and the average price was 9688 yuan/ton. This auction again expanded the success rate, and the average transaction price also rose significantly. The success rate of the rapeseed oil auction on January 18 was 89%, with an average price of 9365 yuan/ton. With the rise of the forward oil market price, the rapeseed oil auction bottom price is attractive to the market. Since October 2010, the state has released a total of 7 batches of vegetable oil for temporary storage, with a total planned sales volume of 894000 tons, an actual sales volume of 772000 tons, and a trading volume of 86.4%, effectively increasing the market oil supply. Today's edible oil auction traded well, forming a support for the edible oil price of the futures market, and the trend is stronger than that of soybean oil and palm oil. Dalian corn futures maintained a high level of consolidation in the morning trading. The main contract of 1109 opened at 2464 yuan/ton and closed at 2459 yuan/ton, down 5 yuan/ton. Affected by the retreat of international corn prices overnight, the morning trading of corn for many days maintained consolidation. However, the domestic drought worries and strong demand continue to support the price, but the high throw pressure will increase, and it is expected that the volatility of even corn will intensify. Soybean oil futures fell slightly in the morning, opening at 10792 yuan/ton for the main contract of 1109 and closing at 10818 yuan/ton, down 22 yuan/ton. The overnight soybean futures in the United States showed a trend of high adjustment, and the external market weakened its role in boosting the domestic oil market. However, the domestic price is also lower than the import cost price, which curbs the decline of domestic oils. Although the rising trend of the market has not changed, there is still a risk of short-term adjustment. Palm oil futures opened high in the morning. The main contract of 1109 opened at 10088 yuan/ton and closed at 10118 yuan/ton, down 28 yuan/ton. Malaysian palm oil and US soybean futures have also shown a trend of high adjustment, and the role of the external market has weakened. However, under the serious impact of the port source concentration, import cost and the price of the market, the futures price is more anti falling. From the trend, the current upward trend is well maintained, but due to the lack of new promotional momentum, the long short funds are in confrontation at the current price, and there is a certain risk of adjustment, but it is expected that the magnitude will not be large. Author: Wang Yunhan, Director of Science and Technology Innovation Information

content: 2011杭博会三星重磅出击众新品齐亮相2011年10月28日，第十四届中国国际照相器材与数码影像博览会（又称“杭博会”），于浙江省杭州市世贸国际展览中心拉开帷幕。此次展会上，被媒体誉为“日系厂商外的另一极影像势力”的三星，打出“双”先锋阵容：　　在三星NX200、MV800的领军下，倍受专业用户追捧的三星NX系列NX11、NX100；旅行爱好者专属的WB长焦系列WB750、WB700、WB210；都市时尚一族最爱的分享型SH100和双屏自拍型ST700、PL170、PL120；以及家用便携摄像机Q10、F70、H300等等，多款各具特色的数码新品一一华彩登场，以“专业”、“智能”、“创新”的独有特色给观展人群留下了极为深刻的印象。
en: On October 28, 2011, the 14th China International Photographic Equipment and Digital Imaging Expo (also known as "Hangbohui") opened at the World Trade International Exhibition Center in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province. At this exhibition, Samsung, which is called "another pole of image power outside Japanese manufacturers" by the media, played a "double" pioneer lineup: Samsung's NX series NX11, NX100, which is widely welcomed by professional users, under the leadership of Samsung NX200 and MV800; WB telephoto series WB750, WB700, WB210, which is exclusive to travel enthusiasts; SH100, a sharing type loved by urban fashion people, and ST700, PL170, PL120, a dual screen self-portrait type; As well as a variety of digital new products with their own characteristics, such as Q10, F70, H300 and other portable home video cameras, they have all made a lot of appearances, leaving a very deep impression on the crowd with their unique characteristics of "professional", "intelligent" and "innovative".

content: 青岛考研现场确认开始1900多考生确认完毕以往山东青岛城阳的考研生去市招办确认信息，得花上一整天的时间。而现在在自家门口就可确认了，既省时又省力。4日，青岛市招办首次在青岛农业大学设立考研信息确认点，报考非驻青高校的考生也可以在此确认信息。据统计，仅4日一天就有1900多名学生确认信息完毕。4日上午10点左右，记者来到青岛农业大学文经楼一楼大厅，篮球场大的厅里有序地排着三四百名学生，不少学生还一边排队一边看书。据了解，这是市招办首次在农大设考研信息确认点，也是青岛2011年考研确认现场的首次开张。“以往经验不足，不敢设那么多分点。经过多方的准备，今天的现场确认工作开展得挺顺利。”青岛市招办信息处张树江处长表示，在农大设点，覆盖整个城阳区。“农大、青岛理工大学琴岛学院学生，驻地考生，只要觉得这个地方方便，都可以过来。”据市招办统计，仅4日一天就有1900多名考研学生较早地完成了信息确认。记者了解到，5日上午考研同学仍可在农大确认信息，7-8日将在青岛理工大学黄岛校区进行现场确认。(李珍梅)
en: More than 1900 candidates in Qingdao have confirmed that the on-site confirmation for the postgraduate examination in Qingdao has begun, and the postgraduate students in Chengyang, Qingdao, Shandong have spent a whole day going to the municipal recruitment office to confirm their information. Now, you can confirm at your own door, which is time-saving and labor-saving. On the 4th day, the Qingdao Municipal Recruitment Office set up a postgraduate examination information confirmation point in Qingdao Agricultural University for the first time, and the examinees who applied for non Qingdao universities can also confirm their information here. According to statistics, more than 1900 students confirmed their information on the 4th day. At about 10:00 a.m. on the 4th, the reporter came to the lobby of Wenzheng Building of Qingdao Agricultural University. The basketball court had several hundred students in order, and many students were reading while queueing. It is understood that this is the first time that the municipal recruitment office has set up a postgraduate information confirmation point in Agricultural University, and it is also the first opening of the Qingdao 2011 postgraduate examination confirmation site. "In the past, due to lack of experience, I dare not set up so many points. After preparation from all sides, today's on-site confirmation is going well." Zhang Shujiang, director of the Information Department of Qingdao Municipal Recruitment Office, said that the Agricultural University was set up as a whole Chengyang District." Students of Cangdao College of Qingdao University of Science and Technology, and candidates stationed in the local area, can come here if they feel convenient." According to the statistics of the municipal recruitment office, more than 1900 postgraduate students completed the information confirmation earlier on the 4th day. The reporter learned that postgraduate students can still confirm their information at Cangdao University on the morning of the 5th, and the on-site confirmation will be conducted at Huangdao Campus of Qingdao University of Science and Technology on the 7-8th. (Li Zhenmei)

content: 52寸惊爆7999康佳LC52DT08DC大中狂促康佳LC52DT08DC液晶电视采用最新的“无痕注塑”工艺，实现了彩电产品外壳向高光泽、耐刮痕、免喷涂的跨越。整机外壳采用添加了等离子防静电颗粒的航天高硬度材质，以“镶嵌式前置安装工艺”实现当前1.5英寸的业界最窄边框。康佳LC52DT08DC液晶电视采用了物理分辨率为1920×1080的S-IPS硬屏，应用了运动屏稳MEMC技术，可以依据前后帧图像的相关性以及画面场景内容，选取关联点进行动态点对点像素预估，进而合成一幅亮度、对比度和连续性更为精确的智能画面并进行插帧还原，有效解决运动画面拖尾、抖动等问题。另外，康佳LC52DT08DC还支持RM/RMVB解码功能，支持占有网络电影90%的RM/RMVB、MPEG1/2/4、AVI等视频格式，非常实用。康佳LC52DT08DC液晶电视接口数量多达15路，囊括当前应用最为广泛的文件格式。而且为了应对接口软件的快速升级，08系列还首次植入升级通道，消费者可以随时对接口进行升级。编辑点评：LC52DT08DC隶属于康佳i-sports08珍藏版系列，是康佳顶级奥运珍藏版产品，并且承诺全系列采用S-IPS液晶面板，此面板在动态画面显示以及可视角度、抗划伤等方面优于传统液晶屏幕。另外，康佳LC52DT08DC在外观设计、功能搭配上也非常不错，感兴趣的朋友可以去卖场亲身体验一下这款产品。康佳LC52DT08DC　　[参考价格]7999元[推荐商家]北京大中电器中塔店
en: The 52 inch LC52DT08DC of Konka went crazy. The LC52DT08DC LCD TV of Konka adopts the latest "scratch free injection molding" process, which realizes the transition of color TV product shell to high gloss, scratch resistance and paint free. The whole machine shell is made of aerospace high hardness material with plasma anti-static particles, and the current narrowest bezel in the industry is realized by the "inlaid front mounting process" of 1.5 inches. The LC52DT08DC LCD TV of Konka adopts the S-IPS hard screen with a physical resolution of 1920x1080, and applies the motion screen stabilization MEMC technology, which can select the correlation points for dynamic point-to-point pixel prediction according to the correlation of the image between the front and rear frames and the image scene content, and then synthesize a smart image with more accurate brightness, contrast and continuity for frame insertion and restoration, effectively solving the problems of tailing and shaking of moving images. In addition, Konka LC52DT08DC also supports RM/RMVB decoding function, supports RM/RMVB, MPEG1/2/4, AVI and other video formats which occupy 90% of the Internet movies, which is very practical. The LC52DT08DC LCD TV of Konka has up to 15 interfaces, including the most widely used file formats at present. In addition, in order to cope with the rapid upgrading of interface software, the 08 series has also introduced the upgrade channel for the first time, and consumers can upgrade the interface at any time. Editor's comment: LC52DT08DC belongs to the i-sports08 collection series of Konka, which is the top Olympic collection product of Konka. It is promised that the whole series will adopt S-IPS LCD panels. This panel is superior to the traditional LCD screen in terms of dynamic image display, visual angle and scratch resistance. In addition, Konka LC52DT08DC is also very good in appearance design and function matching. Those who are interested can go to the store to experience this product

content: 江苏吴江2010上半年自考毕业办理须知一、符合毕业条件的考生：所报考专业的全部课程(包括实践考核与毕业论文)均已取得合格成绩的考生)。于5月25日——31日登陆省教育考试院自考报名网站(网址：zxks.jseea.cn)，或从苏州自考网站(www.szzxks.net)首页上点击“网上报名系统”进入，在首页上输入考生的准考证号(有多个准考证的考生，请输入需毕业专业的准考证号)、身份证号、校验码登陆系统(如登陆不上，请及时与市考办联系，电话：63411294)，在毕业申报管理模块里进行毕业登记申请(网上无照片的考生，无法进行毕业申请提交，请于5月25日—28日到考办拍照后再申请提交，拍照不收费)，考生必须如实填写有关信息(如果网上姓名或身份证号与实际有误，务必在现场审核时与审核人员说明情况并提交公安部门相关户籍证明)。二、网上提交申请后于5月25日——31日到吴江市考办(滨中路32号)送审毕业材料，个别考生错过这个时间，请于6月1日到考办补办毕业手续，逾期将延至下一次毕业(需准备材料如下)：1、身份证原件与复印件一份，如身份证与准考证上号码不一致或姓名不一致，应到户口所在地派出所出具证明说明原因，证明原件交给市考办。2、准考证，凡是考本专业课程使用过的准考证(如有本省外市的，在其它专业考过本专业课程的)均应全部交齐。3、两张2寸蓝底彩照(标准证件照)，一张交给考办用于扫描到毕业证书上，另一张考生自己贴在打印好的毕业生登记表上。4、有外省转入的成绩：2008年11月以前从外省转入的考生应提交转考材料，仅凭外省通过的单科合格证书及准考证、介绍信不能办理毕业。2008年11月后从外省转入的考生，上网(zxks.jseea.cn)在“外省转入成绩查询”里，输入身份证号查询是否已转至江苏省，并凭网上查询到的成绩(打印一份)申请办理毕业。5、有实践考核要求专业的考生要持有实践考核成绩单(包括毕业论文、毕业设计等)。6、办理过免考手续的考生应提交课程免考审批表或审批过的全国计算机等级考试、全国英语等级考试等证书复印件。7、本科资格审批表(仅指办理本科毕业的考生)。8、教育实习鉴定表(仅指师范类专业毕业的考生)。三、经过现场初审符合毕业的考生交审核费50元(含10元毕业生纪念册费用)。拿到毕业生登记表后考生要认真核对表上的各项内容，确认无误后在右下角签名(信息有误应立即让工作人员进行更正)。经签字确认后的登记表不能更改，因错造成的后果由考生个人负责。毕业生登记表上，自我鉴定一栏由考生个人填写，思想品德鉴定一栏，在职人员由所在单位负责，非在职人员由街道办事处或乡(镇)人民政府负责填写，并加盖单位公章，然后于5月31日5点前交回本考务办(延迟交表影响毕业后果自负)。四、领取毕业证书时间：2010年7月上旬上吴江招考信息网查询领证时间。★从2009年5月起，省教育考试院将取消单科合格证书，故考生办理毕业不再强调需要单科合格证书。
en: Notice on the self-examination graduation in the first half of 2010 in Wujiang, Jiangsu Province1. Candidates who meet the graduation requirements: all courses (including practical examination and graduation thesis) of the applied major have obtained qualified results. From May 25 to 31, log in to the self-examination registration website of the Provincial Institute of Education Examination (website: zxks. jseea. cn) or click "Online Registration System" on the home page of Suzhou Self Examination Website (www. szzxks. net), enter the candidate's admission card number (for candidates with multiple admission cards, enter the admission card number of the major to be graduated), ID card number, verification code to log in to the system (if you can not log in, please contact the municipal examination office in time, Tel: 63411294), and apply for graduation registration in the graduation declaration management module (candidates without photos online can not submit graduation applications. Please apply and submit photos to the examination office from May 25 to 28. Photographing is free of charge), and candidates must truthfully fill in the relevant information (If the online name or ID number is incorrect, you must explain the situation to the examiner and submit the relevant household registration certificate of the public security department for on-site review). 2. Those who missed this time due to individual candidates should go to the examination office on June 1 to make up for graduation procedures. They will be delayed until the next graduation (the following materials need to be prepared): 1. The original and a copy of the ID card. If the number or name on the ID card is inconsistent with the admission ticket, the public security office at the place of residence shall issue a certificate to explain the reason, and the original certificate shall be handed over to the municipal examination office. 2. The admission ticket shall be fully paid, which is the admission ticket used for the examination of this major (if there is a city outside the province, the examination of this major in other majors). 3. Two two-inch blue background color photos (standard document photos), one for the examination office to scan onto the graduation certificate, and the other for the examinee to stick on the printed graduation registration form. 4. For those who have transferred scores from other provinces: candidates who transferred from other provinces before November 2008 should submit transfer examination materials. Those who only have the single subject qualified certificate and admission ticket passed in other provinces, and the letter of introduction cannot apply for graduation. For candidates who have transferred from other provinces after November 2008, go online (zxks. jseea. cn) to enter your ID card number in "Foreign Province Transfer Score Query" to check whether it has been transferred to Jiangsu Province, and apply for graduation with the scores found online (print one copy). 5. Candidates who have the requirements of practical examination should have the practical examination score sheet (including graduation thesis, graduation design, etc.). 6. Candidates who have gone through the exemption examination procedure shall submit the course exemption examination approval form or the certificate of the national computer rank examination, the national English rank examination and other certificates that have been approved. 7. Bachelor's qualification approval form (only for candidates who apply for bachelor's graduation). 8. Education practice appraisal form (only for candidates who graduate from normal majors). 3. The examinees who have passed the preliminary on-site examination and are qualified for graduation shall pay the examination fee of 50 yuan (including 10 yuan for graduates' souvenir book). After obtaining the graduate registration form, the examinee shall carefully check all the contents on the form. If there is no mistake, sign at the lower right corner (the staff shall immediately correct the information if there is any mistake). The registration form can not be changed after being signed and confirmed, and the consequences caused by mistakes are the responsibility of the examinee. On the graduate registration form, the self-assessment column is filled in by the candidate. The ideological and moral appraisal column is filled in by the street office or the town people's government (for non-job seekers), and stamped with the unit seal, and then returned to the examination office before 5:00 p.m. on May 31 (late submission of the form will affect graduation at your own risk). 4. Time to receive graduation certificate: In the first half of July 2010, go to Wujing Recruitment and Examination Information Network to check the time to receive the certificate. ★ Since May 2009, the Provincial Institute of Education Examination has cancelled the single subject qualification certificate, so candidates are no longer required to emphasize the need for a single subject qualification certificate when applying for graduation.

content: 图文：米菲兔告赢凯茜兔侵犯其版权日本卡通人物凯蒂猫(HelloKitty)的好友凯茜兔(Cathy)被控侵犯荷兰卡通米菲兔(Miffy)的版权。荷兰阿姆斯特丹法院日前以凯茜兔和米菲兔外形太类似，裁定米菲兔版权所有者Mercis传媒公司胜诉。法庭勒令凯蒂猫版权所有者日本三丽鸥公司(SanrioCo)停止在荷兰、比利时和卢森堡生产与销售凯茜兔产品，否则将每日处以2.5万欧元罚金。三丽鸥对判决表示不满，称将考虑上诉，以证明其没有侵犯原告的权利。米菲兔出自荷兰插画大师迪克-布鲁内(DickBruna)手笔，并1955年面世。凯蒂猫则于1974年面世，而凯茜兔于1976年以凯蒂猫的朋友身份出现。
en: Picture text: Miffy, a rabbit, won a lawsuit against Cathy, a rabbit, for infringing its copyright. Cathy, a good friend of HelloKitty, a Japanese cartoon character, was accused of infringing the copyright of Miffy, a Dutch cartoon character. The court in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, recently ruled that Mercis Media, the copyright owner of Miffy Rabbit, had won the case because Cathy Rabbit and Miffy Rabbit were too similar. The court ordered SanrioCo, the copyright owner of HelloKitty, to stop producing and selling Cathy Rabbit products in the Netherlands, Belgium and Luxembourg, otherwise it would be fined 25000 euros per day. Sanrio was dissatisfied with the verdict, saying that it would consider appealing to prove that it did not infringe the plaintiff's rights. Miffy Rabbit was written by Dick Bruna, a Dutch illustration master, and was published in 1955. HelloKitty came out in 1974, and Cathy Rabbit appeared as a friend of HelloKitty in 1976.

content: 玲珑卡片相机佳能IXUS115唐山1400元【河北省唐山数码相机行情】佳能IXUS115数码相机外形小巧仅有93.1×55.9×19.9mm，非常轻薄，可以塞进裤兜中，携带很方便。性能方面该机全新采用了CMOS图像传感器和DIGIC4图像处理器，让这款小卡片机的画质更加出色。并且全面提升的高清视频拍摄能力，也是这款小DC的一大亮点。目前该相机在商家，唐山思远电子的报价为1400元（水货），近期有购置相机的朋友不妨去看看,或电话联系商家。在整体外观设计上，佳能IXUS115HS与上代产品IXUS105没有太大的区别，机身材质依然是全金属，表面经过磨砂处理，质感很不错。该机外形尺寸为93.1×55.9×19.9mm，非常轻薄，可以塞进牛仔裤的屁兜中，携带很方便。另外，佳能IXUS115HS还拥有5种不同的机身色彩。与上代机型佳能IXUS105相比，佳能IXUS115HS最大的进步在于搭载了新的HSSYSTEM（高感光度传感器+DIGIC处理器），在高感控噪方面比同类机型有更大的优势。该机采用了一枚1/2.3英寸高感光度CMOS传感器，有效像素约1210万，达到了目前DC的主流水平。在镜头方面，佳能IXUS115HS沿用IXUS105的那枚4倍光变镜头，参数没有任何变化。该镜头最大光圈为F2.8，等效焦段为28-112mm，覆盖广角至中长焦段，虽然没有太大的亮点，但依然能满足大多数拍摄需求。另外，这枚镜头还配备了佳能IS光学防抖功能，在快门速度较低时能够有效提高出片率。
en: The Linglong card camera Canon IXUS115 Tangshan 1400 yuan 【 Hebei Province Tangshan Digital Camera Market 】 Canon IXUS115 digital camera is small, only 93.1x55.9x19.9mm, very thin, and can be stuffed into the pocket of trousers, very portable. In terms of performance, the machine has adopted a new CMOS image sensor and DIGIC4 image processor, making the image quality of this small card machine better. And the fully upgraded HD video shooting ability is also a highlight of this small DC. At present, the price of the camera in Tangshan Siyuan Electronics is 1400 yuan (water goods), and those who have purchased cameras recently can have a look, or contact the seller by telephone. In terms of overall appearance design, Canon IXUS115HS is not much different from the previous generation product IXUS105. The fuselage material is still all metal, and the surface has been treated with sandblasting, which is very good. The size of the fuselage is 93.1×55.9×19.9mm, very light and thin, which can be stuffed into the pocket of jeans, very portable. In addition, Canon IXUS115HS also has five different body colors. Compared with the previous model Canon IXUS105, the greatest progress of Canon IXUS115HS is that it has equipped with a new HSSYSTEM (high sensitivity sensor + DIGIC processor), which has greater advantages than the similar models in terms of high sensitivity noise control. The camera is equipped with a 1/2.3 inch high sensitivity CMOS sensor with an effective pixel of about 12.1 million, which has reached the mainstream level of DC at present. In terms of lens, Canon IXUS115HS continues to use the 4x light changing lens of IXUS105, with no change in parameters. The maximum aperture of the lens is F2.8, and the equivalent focal length is 28-112mm, covering the wide angle to medium and long focal length. Although there is no highlight, it can still meet most shooting needs. In addition, the lens is also equipped with Canon IS optical anti shake function, which can effectively improve the output rate when the shutter speed is low.

content: 艾诺2010年度大促销V8000HDR热卖199泡泡网MP3频道12月30日岁末将至，热闹非凡，也是购置数码产品的最佳时机。高清第一品牌艾诺（AinoL）在高清领域持续领先周年之际，为答谢广大新老用户朋友的支持与厚爱，特举行“高清第一艾诺周年答谢——降价惊喜三重奏千万豪礼再给力”大型优惠活动。据悉，在优惠活动期间，年度力作V8000HDR普及版腾空出场，为了让消费者能够更轻松地体验高清、感受高清，V8000HDR普及版除了具备4.3英寸屏、768P高清、色差分享、10MB/S高速传输、PMU智能管理、艾诺高品质工艺之外，还以199/4GB促销价推出，瞬间引爆市场，广受消费者欢迎。目前，作为艾诺年度回馈，该款新品V8000HDR已在全国各地上市。秉承经典简约外观秉承V8000HD系列经典外观，V8000HDR采用时尚大气的简约外形，圆滑机身外观设计贴近现代前沿美学标准，表明磨砂质感触感超凡，还搭载4.3英寸屏幕，魅力非凡。珍珠白、幻影黑、风尚粉三色选择，时刻满足潮流男女的个性需求。顶部采用由阿尔卑斯生产的按键，配搭贴近手指的曲线贴合，让操作手感倍感舒适。卓越性能768P解码依托768P高清解决方案——索智F15为内核，V8000HDR以768P为起点，并向下兼容，能流畅播放320×240、352×240、480×272、720×480、1024×768、1280×720（720P）等分辨率的视频格式，实现对主流视频格式的通杀。V8000HDR全面支持高清视频编码：H.264(BP/MP/HP）、MPEG-2(MP)、MPEG-4(SP/ASP)/XviD(SP/AP)、VC-1(SP/MP/AP)、WMV9(SP/MP/AP)，以及普通视频编码：MPEG-1、H.263、DivX(3.11/4/5/6)、M-JPEG(B)。V8000HDR还以更卓越的能力，完美兼容TS、AVI、MP4、MPG、MKV、DAT、VOB、WMV、ASF、PMP、MOV、M2V、QT、M2A等各种主流封装格式。色差分量家庭影院出于贴心考虑，V8000HDR兼容模拟输出技术中最高级别的色差分量输出，保持了色度信道的最大带宽，只需要经过反矩阵译码电路就可以还原为RGB三原色信号而成像，最大限度地缩短了视频源到显示器成像之间的视频信号信道，避免了因繁琐的传输过程所带来的影像失真，从而能够轻松实现720线以上高解析度、高清效果，可实现480×272、720×480、1024×768、1280×720（720P）等高清分辨率输出。10MB/S超高速传输高清视频拥有高清的画质，也伴随着超大的容量，少则1、2GB，多则4、5GB甚至更大。V8000HDR新品将拥有10MB/S以上的写入速度，15MB/S以上读出速度，2至3倍于对手，让用户无论传输音乐文件还是大容量高清视频文件都能轻松自如。PMU智能管理环保低碳高清视频解码的复杂程度以及数控屏幕的加入，直接导致MP4续航时间缩短和发热量大的问题，V8000HDR采用先进的电源管理能力，根据不同功能、不同运算要求，自适应调节主频与功耗，全系统功耗监控，同比市场上FULLHD旧品降低25%以上的电量功耗，让V8000HDR拥有出色性能的同时也能保持超长续航。完美音乐聆听天籁V8000HDR全面兼容MP3、WMA、WAV、AAC、OGG以及FLAC、APE无损音频格式，支持歌曲目录分类、媒体库分类、LRC歌词显示、复读功能、IDTAG信息显示、8种EQ音效模式、动态频谱显示等功能。除此之外还搭配最强的耳机推力，信噪比95dB以上，输出功率达到32毫瓦，保证了音乐杰出的还原基础，配搭优质耳机聆听效果更佳。全新普及版V8000HDR，除搭载4.3英寸屏幕以外，还支持768P高清解码、色差输出、10MB/S超高速传输、PMU电源管理性能，如此强大的高清性能加上艾诺品质也只需199。欲想了解更多相关信息，请咨询当地经销商或登陆艾诺官方淘宝。2010，更高清！更艾诺！■
en: Einol's 2010 annual promotion V8000HDR is a hot sale of 199 Bubbles Network MP3 channel. On December 30, the end of the year is coming, which is very lively and the best time to purchase digital products. Ainuo (Ainuo), the first brand of high definition, has been leading in the field of high definition for a year. In order to thank the support and love of new and old users, it is special to hold a large discount activity of "Einol, the first anniversary of high definition - three million gifts of surprise price reduction". It is reported that during the discount period, the popular version of V8000HDR, the annual force, made an empty debut. In order to make consumers experience HD and feel HD more easily, in addition to the 4.3 inch screen, 768P HD, color difference sharing, 10MB/S high-speed transmission, PMU intelligent management, and Ainuo's high-quality process, the popular version of V8000HDR also launched a 199/4GB promotional price, which instantly triggered the market and was warmly welcomed by consumers. At present, as Einuo's annual feedback, the new product V8000HDR has been launched all over the country. Adhering to the classic and simple appearance of the V8000HD series, the V8000HDR adopts a simple and fashionable appearance design. The round and smooth body design is close to the modern cutting-edge aesthetic standards, indicating that the sandblasting texture touch is extraordinary. It also carries a 4.3-inch screen, which is very charming. Pearl white, phantom black and fashion pink are available in three colors to meet the personality needs of trendy men and women at all times. The top adopts the key produced by Alps, which is matched with the curve close to the finger, making the operation feel more comfortable. Excellent performance 768P decoding relies on 768P HD solution - Softe F15 as the core, V8000HDR starts with 768P and is向下compatible, can play video formats such as 320× 240, 352× 240, 480× 272, 720× 480, 1024× 768, 1280× 720 (720P) and so on, and realizes a thorough killing of mainstream video formats. V8000HDR fully supports HD video encoding: H.264 (BP/MP/HP), MPEG-2 (MP), MPEG-4 (SP/ASP)/XviD (SP/AP), VC-1 (SP/MP/AP), WMV9 (SP/MP/AP), and common video encoding: MPEG-1, H.263, DivX (3.11/4/5/6), M-JPEG (B). V8000HDR also has a more excellent ability to perfectly support various mainstream packaging formats such as TS, AVI, MP4, MPG, MKV, DAT, VOB, WMV, ASF, PMP, MOV, M2V, QT and M2A. Chrominance component home theater Considering thoughtfully, V8000HDR is compatible with the highest level of chrominance component output in the analog output technology, maintaining the maximum bandwidth of the chrominance channel. It can be restored to the image of the RGB primary color signal by only passing through the anti matrix decoding circuit, which shortens the video signal channel between the video source and the display imaging to the maximum extent, avoiding the image distortion caused by the complicated transmission process, so as to easily achieve more than 720 lines of high definition and high definition effects, and achieve 480× 272, 720× 480, 1024× 768, 1280× 720 (720P) and other HD resolution outputs. 10MB/S ultra-high speed transmission HD video has high definition image quality, which also comes with huge capacity, as little as 1/2GB and as much as 4/5GB or even more. The new product V8000HDR will have a writing speed of more than 10MB/S and a reading speed of more than 15MB/S, 2 to 3 times that of the opponent, so that users can easily transmit both music files and large-capacity HD video files. PMU intelligent management and environment-friendly low-carbon HD video decoding complexity and the addition of CNC screen directly lead to the problem of short MP4 endurance time and large heat dissipation. V8000HDR adopts advanced power management capabilities. According to different functions and different computing requirements, it can self-adaptively adjust the main frequency and power consumption, monitor the power consumption of the whole system, and reduce more than 25% of the power consumption of the FULLHD old products on the market. V8000HDR can maintain ultra-long endurance while having excellent performance. Perfect music listening to nature V8000HDR is fully compatible with MP3, WMA, WAV, AAC, OGG and lossless audio formats such as FLAC and APE, and supports song catalog classification, media library classification, LRC lyric display, repeating function, IDTAG information display, 8 EQ sound effect modes, dynamic spectrum display and other functions. In addition, it is equipped with the strongest earphone push, with a signal noise ratio of more than 95dB and an output power of 32 milliwatts, which ensures the excellent restoration basis of music and the listening effect is better with high-quality earphones. The new popular version of V8000HDR supports 768P HD decoding, chroma difference output, 10MB/S ultra-high speed transmission, PMU power management and other functions in addition to the 4.3 inch screen. With the powerful HD performance and Einuo quality, it only needs 199. If you want to know more relevant information, please consult the local dealer or log in to the official Taobao of Einuo. 2010, higher definition! More Ainuo! ■

content: 苍穹在线曝光《魔神传》仅设三职业【新浪游戏专稿，转载请注明出处】导读：成都苍穹在线正式宣布，近期将推出2.5D战争网游《魔神传》，该游戏预计将于今年暑期封测。新浪游戏独家点评：创新理念在网游开发时一直在强调，却未看到有实质进展。《魔神传》此次提出“微创新”口号，在职业设定、技能释放以及客户端大小等方面做出不同于主流游戏的细微调整。这些设置是否符合玩家一贯的操作习惯和体验，能否满足玩家的游戏需求，还有待观察。新浪游戏讯6月1日消息，四川数字出版传媒旗下网游公司苍穹在线6月1日宣布，近期将推出2.5D战争网游《魔神传》。游戏以微创新为理念，推出无冷却无读条和限定三个强战职业的玩法，游戏预计将于暑期封测。据透露，苍穹在线此次推出的《魔神传》，以3D引擎打造2.5D游戏画面，称在保证画面质量的同时更易于玩家上手操作。游戏强调PK战斗玩法，所有技能瞬间释放，无冷却无读条，药品瞬间回复无延时。游戏届时将推出阵营对抗、PK大赛、帮会战场以及国战的玩法，突出战斗体验。据官方介绍，《魔神传》注重“微创新”的制作理念，除了技能瞬间释放等设置，游戏在职业设置时也不同于传统的多职业设定方式。《魔神传》摒弃了废材职业，只采用三个强战职业——战、法、弓，以突出每个职业的地位和特色，不设置鸡肋角色。据悉，《魔神传》将推出百兆大小客户端，提升玩家体验。游戏预计将于今年暑期开启首次技术封测。成都苍穹在线为四川出版集团出资创建，旗下另款网游《铁血丹心》刚于近期开启公测。(秦小乐)更多游戏资讯欢迎查看：新浪游戏媒体之声>>/新浪游戏产业资讯>>更多精彩游戏专题欢迎查看：新浪游戏专题汇总>>
en: The Sky Online exposes that The Magic God's Legend only sets three careers [Sina Game special manuscript, reprint shall indicate the source] Introduction: Chengdu Sky Online officially announced that a 2.5D war online game, The Magic God's Legend, will be launched in the near future. Sina Games Exclusive Review: The concept of innovation has been emphasized in the development of online games, but there has been no substantial progress. The Magic God's Legend has put forward the slogan of "micro innovation", and made subtle adjustments different from the mainstream games in terms of career setting, skill release and client size. It remains to be seen whether these settings meet the player's consistent operation habits and experience, and whether they can meet the player's game needs. Sina Game News On June 1, the online game company of Sichuan Digital Publishing Media announced that a 2.5D war online game, The Magic God's Legend, will be launched in the near future. The game is based on the concept of micro innovation, launching a play of non cooling, non reading and three limited strong war careers. The game is expected to be closed for testing in summer. It is revealed that the Magic God's Legend launched by Sky Online this time creates a 2.5D game picture with a 3D engine, and it is said that it is easier for players to get started while ensuring the quality of the picture. The game emphasizes PK combat. All skills are released instantly, without cooling or reading. Drugs return instantly without delay. When the game is launched, it will feature faction confrontation, PK competitions, guild battlefields and national wars to highlight the combat experience. According to the official introduction, The Magic God's Legend focuses on the production concept of "micro innovation". In addition to the setting of instant skill release, the game also differs from the traditional multi career setting when setting up careers. The Magic God's Legend abandoned the useless career and only adopted three strong war careers - war, law and archery - in order to highlight the status and characteristics of each career, and did not set up chicken ribs roles. It is reported that The Magic God's Legend will launch a hundred megabyte client to enhance the experience of players. The game is expected to start the first technical beta test this summer. Chengdu Sky Online was funded and created by Sichuan Publishing Group. Another online game, "Iron Blood and Dan Xin", has just opened a public test recently. (Qin Xiaole) For more game news, please check: Sina Game Media Voice>>/Sina Game Industry News>>Welcome to view more exciting game specials: Sina Game Special Summary>>

content: 操盘必读：9月5日香港市场重要消息新浪财经讯9月5日消息，周五美国股市大幅收跌。美国8月非农就业增幅为零，令投资者担心美国经济将受到更多国会党派争斗的拖累；上市银行上缴准备金约7000亿；以下是详细内容：综述：道指下滑2.2%纳指收跌2.58%周五美国股市大幅收跌。美国8月非农就业增幅为零，令投资者担心美国经济将受到更多国会党派争斗的拖累；多家大型银行面临政府起诉，也使得美股承压。美东时间9月2日16:00(北京时间9月3日04:00)，道琼斯工业平均指数下跌253.31点，收于11,240.26点，跌幅2.20%。纽约原油期货收盘下跌2.8%报每桶86.45美元纽约原油期货价格周五收盘下跌，原因是美国非农就业报告令人失望，导致投资者对原油需求感到担心。当日，纽约商业交易所(NYMEX)10月份交割的轻质原油期货价格下跌2.48美元，报收于每桶86.45美元，跌幅为2.8%，创下自8月18日以来的最高单日跌幅，盘中曾最低触及每桶85.42美元。纽约黄金期货收盘上涨2.6%报1876.90美元纽约黄金期货价格周五收盘上涨，原因是美国劳工部公布的非农就业报告令人失望，促使投资者转向买入安全资产。当日，纽约商业交易所(NYMEX)下属商品交易所(COMEX)12月份交割的黄金期货价格上涨47.80美元，报收于每盎司1876.90美元，涨幅为2.6%。上市银行上缴准备金约7000亿对于银行存款保证金缴存范围扩大的影响，根据部分上市银行已披露的半年报测算，14家上市银行未来6个月将缴存6958亿元准备金，占所有银行缴存额近8成。8月通胀料将回落市场冀望紧缩政策微调刚刚公布的8月份PMI较上个月略有增长，结束了此前连续数月下降的趋势，显示出国内需求和工业生产仍然强劲。本周五市场又将迎来另一个重要数据：8月份的CPI通胀率。研究机构的一致预期是，8月的CPI将同比上升6.1%左右，低于7月份的峰值6.5%。事故油田将全面停产中海油净产日损6.2万桶康菲石油中国有限公司(下称“康菲公司”)9月4日称，遵守国家海洋局于9月2日决定，停止蓬莱19－3油田的钻井，回注和生产作业。康菲公司在其官网上发布的声明进一步指出，该公司已于9月2日晚开始实施停产步骤。根据计划，蓬莱19-3油田将于9月5日正式全面关停。港交所推出新公告板发布上市公司信息香港交易所决定，5日起新增上市公司公告板，用于发布上市公司信息；在“披露易”网站、现有上市公司公告板及新增上市公司公告板的服务受干扰情况下，上市公司如果能在自身网站发布业绩公告，则该公司股票无须停牌。三一重工H股发行接受上市聆讯三一重工今日披露了公司H股发行上市工作的最新进展。据公司介绍，香港联交所上市委员会9月1日举行上市聆讯，审议了公司发行不超过15.41亿股境外上市外资股(含超额配售2.01亿股)并在香港联交所主板上市的申请。史玉柱扫货民生银行H股半月8次买入3816万股昨日，港交所披露的资料显示，民生银行非执行董事史玉柱申报，于8月26日及29日两度增持民行750万股及950万股H股，共增持1700万股。同时根据记者统计发现，自8月18日以来，史玉柱连续8次大手买入民生银行H股。
en: Disk must read: Hong Kong market important news on September 5, Sina Finance News On September 5, the U.S. stock market closed sharply lower on Friday. The U.S. non-agricultural employment growth in August was zero, which made investors worry that the U.S. economy would be dragged down by more congressional party struggles; listed banks pay about 700 billion yuan of reserves; the following is the detailed content: Overview: Dow Jones Index slumped 2.2% Nasdaq closed down 2.58% On Friday, the U.S. stock market closed sharply lower. The non-agricultural employment growth in the United States in August was zero, which made investors worry that the U.S. economy would be dragged down by more congressional party struggles; several large banks faced a lawsuit from the government, which also put pressure on U.S. stocks. At 16:00 on September 2, Eastern Time (04:00 on September 3, Beijing Time), the Dow Jones Industrial Average Index fell 253.31 points to close at 11240.26 points, down 2.20%. New York crude oil futures closed down 2.8% at $86.45 a barrel New York crude oil futures prices fell on Friday, due to the disappointing non-agricultural employment report in the United States, which led investors to worry about crude oil demand. On that day, the price of light crude oil futures for delivery in October of the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) fell $2.48 to close at $86.45 per barrel, down 2.8%, the largest single day decline since August 18, and hit a minimum of $85.42 per barrel during the trading day. New York gold futures closed up 2.6% at $1876.90 New York gold futures prices closed up on Friday, as the disappointing non-agricultural employment report released by the US Department of Labor prompted investors to turn to safe assets. On that day, the price of gold futures for delivery in December of the Commodity Exchange (COMEX) under the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) rose 47.80 dollars to close at 1876.90 dollars per ounce, up 2.6%. The listed bank pays about 70 billion yuan of reserves. In view of the impact of the expansion of the scope of bank deposit reserve payments, according to the semi-annual reports disclosed by some listed banks, 14 listed banks will pay 695.8 billion yuan of reserves in the next six months, nearly 80% of the total reserve payments of all banks. Inflation is expected to decline in August, and the market hopes that the monetary policy will be fine tuned. The PMI in August, which has just been published, has slightly increased compared with last month, ending the trend of continuous decline for several months, showing that domestic demand and industrial production are still strong. On Friday, the market will usher in another important data: the CPI inflation rate in August. The consistent expectation of research institutions is that the CPI in August will rise by about 6.1% year on year, lower than the peak of 6.5% in July. The accident oil field will suspend production completely. CNOOC's net production will lose 62000 barrels a day. ConocoPhillips China Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "ConocoPhillips") said on September 4 that in accordance with the decision of the State Oceanic Administration on September 2, the drilling, reinjection and production operations of the Penglai 19-3 oil field would be stopped. Conoco's statement, released on its official website, further pointed out that the company has begun to implement the shutdown steps on the evening of September 2. According to the plan, the Penglai 19-3 oil field will be officially shut down on September 5. The Hong Kong Stock Exchange launched a new announcement board to release information of listed companies. The Hong Kong Stock Exchange decided that on the 5th, a new announcement board of listed companies would be added for the release of listed company information; If listed companies can release earnings announcements on their own websites in case of disruption of services of the "Disclosure Easy" website, the existing announcement board of listed companies and the new announcement board of listed companies, there is no need to suspend trading of their stocks. Sany Heavy Industry's H-share offering accepts listing hearing. Sany Heavy Industry today disclosed the latest progress of the company's H-share offering and listing. According to the company, the Hong Kong Stock Exchange Listing Committee held a listing hearing on September 1 to review the company's application for listing of no more than 1.541 billion overseas listed foreign shares (including 201 million over-allotment) on the main board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. Shi Yuzhu swept the Hong Kong shares of Minsheng Bank and bought 38.16 million shares for half a month. Yesterday, the data disclosed by the Hong Kong Stock Exchange showed that Shi Yuzhu, a non-executive director of Minsheng Bank, applied to purchase 7.5 million and 9.5 million H-shares of Minsheng Bank on August 26 and 29, with a total purchase of 17 million shares. At the same time, according to the statistics of journalists, since August 18, Shi Yuzhu has made eight major purchases of H shares of Minsheng Bank.

content: 超大液晶卖出震撼价创维55寸仅9999元创维55L09RF(参数图片论坛)液晶电视外观有别于其他产品的黑色设计，而是采用了银灰色边框，而且拥有全高清液晶面板和10Bit驱动技术，五一促销这款超大屏幕液晶电视售价仅为9999元，相当超值。编辑点评：创维55L09RF液晶电视采用了1080PIPS液晶面板，加入了10bit面板驱动技术，同时还能够支持网络视频播放，功能相当强大。而且55?液晶电视售价在万元以下也是十分少见，想要购买大屏幕电视的朋友应该考虑一下这款产品。
en: The super large LCD was sold at a shocking price. Skyworth's 55 inch model was only 9999 yuan. The Skyworth 55L09RF (parameter picture forum) LCD TV is different from the black design of other products, but it adopts a silver gray frame, and it has a full HD LCD panel and 10Bit drive technology. The price of this ultra-large LCD TV is only 9999 yuan on May 1, which is quite super valuable. Editor's comment: Skyworth 55L09RF LCD TV adopts 1080PIPS LCD panel, adds 10bit panel drive technology, and can also support network video playback, which is quite powerful. Moreover, it is also very rare that the price of 55? LCD TV is less than ten thousand yuan. Friends who want to buy a large screen TV should consider this product.
