content: 传加护亚依签约拍AV作品昔日早安少女麻烦不断新浪娱乐讯9月30日消息，据日本八卦周刊爆料，原早安少女成员加护亚依将以5部作品一亿日元(约合835万元人民币)的价格出演AV作品。加护亚依九月中旬传出自杀未遂，有消息指自杀是因其圈外男友被捕。加护近期可谓是衰事连连。爆料该消息的《朝日艺能》周刊称，加护亚依与某家大的AV事务所签了拍摄合约，有消息指一亿日元是拍摄的预付款，也有传言称作品已经拍摄完毕，但从目前来看，如果连一部作品都还没开拍，事务所是不大可能提前支付预付款的，因此极有可能由加护亚依主演的AV作品已经拍摄完毕了。但该AV事务所在回应此事时称：“的确有这样的企划(指与加护亚依签约)，但还没有到签约的地步。”早前加护亚依同居男友因追债而犯下恐吓未遂罪被捕，几天后，传出她割腕并服用大量安眠药，所幸并未造成生命危险。关于加护亚依拍摄AV作品的消息一直都未曾断绝，去年曾传出她将和同为原早安少女成员的后藤真希拍摄AV的消息，但一直并无她的AV作品问世。加护七月份曾在推特上回应该消息时称：“怎么可能啊，笨蛋！”坚决否认了这种可能性。早安少女是日本当红组合，每一期的成员都曾有过当红时期，但近期关于原早安少女的种种负面消息却屡次见诸报端，除了加护亚依，后藤真希也是星路不顺，弟弟被捕、母亲自杀；吉泽瞳弟弟因车祸死亡；市井纱耶香离婚……麻烦不断的她们仿佛受到诅咒。（柳星张）
person: 柳星张,加护亚依,市井纱耶香,吉泽瞳,后藤真希
en: It is reported that Jia Hu Ya Yi, a former member of Morning Girl, has signed a contract to shoot AV works, which has caused a lot of trouble. Sina Entertainment News On September 30, according to a Japanese gossip weekly, Jia Hu Ya Yi, a former member of Morning Girl, will star in AV works at a price of 100 million yen (about 8.35 million yuan) for five works. Jia Hu Ya Yi tried to commit suicide in mid September, and it was reported that the reason for his suicide was that his boyfriend outside the circle was arrested. Huo Huo can be described as a series of failures in recent days. The Asahi Art Weekly, which exposed the news, said that Jia Hu Ya Yi had signed a shooting contract with a major AV agency. It is reported that 100 million yen is a prepayment for shooting, and there is also a rumor that the shooting has been completed. But from the current situation, if even a work has not been started, it is unlikely that the agency will pay a prepayment in advance, so it is very likely that the AV works starring Jia Hu Ya Yi have been completed. But the AV agency responded to this by saying: "There is indeed such a project (referring to the contract with Jia Hu Ya Yi), but it has not reached the stage of signing a contract." Earlier, Jia Hu Ya Yi's cohabiting boyfriend was arrested for debt collection and attempted blackmail. A few days later, it was reported that she had cut her wrist and taken a large number of sleeping pills, fortunately, there was no danger to her life. The news that Jia Hu Ya Yi shot AV works has never stopped. Last year, it was reported that she would shoot AV with Goto Tomo, who was also a member of the former Morning Girl, but there has been no AV works of her. Jia Hu Ya Yi once responded on Twitter in July that: "How can it be, fool!" Firmly denied the possibility. Morning Girl is a popular combination in Japan. Every member has had a popular period, but recently, all kinds of negative news about the former Morning Girl has repeatedly appeared in the media. In addition to Jia Hu Ya Yi, Goto Tomo is also unlucky. His brother was arrested and his mother committed suicide; Jize Tong's brother died in a car accident; Shi Jing Sa Ya Xiang divorced... They are cursed with endless troubles. (Liu Xingzhang)

content: 上海经销商昨“拒卖诺基亚”东方早报记者周玲诺基亚回应：与“窜货商”无合同关系昨天，在上海火车站附近的地平线通信大楼内，被诺基亚公司称为“窜货商”(没有跟诺基亚签合同的三级经销商)的上海部分经销商，拉起“拒卖诺基亚”的横幅。记者获悉，此次抗议活动没有得到一家诺基亚正规经销商出面支持，显得有点势单力薄，声势不是很大。事实上，昨日的抗议横幅挂出不久后便被物业保安取下，早报记者现场也被禁止拍照，气氛紧张。一位经销商昨天对记者表示，挂出来已经是一种姿态，现在还没有完全停止销售诺基亚产品，但下一步会逐渐减少诺基亚产品销售。但一位参与抗议的经销商老板昨天对记者抱怨，济南等地的经销商抗议都得到了诺基亚正规经销商的支持，但是上海由于诺基亚施压，这些正规经销商没有一家出面力挺抗议。所谓正规经销商是指与诺基亚签订合同的代理商。按照诺基亚的渠道管理模式，一级为区域总代(简称FD)，FD下面是二级发展代理商(简称WKA)，WKA自己则会发展没有合同关系的小经销商，也被诺基亚称为“窜货商”。针对因诺基亚重罚“窜货”而引起的各地小经销商近期频繁抗议活动，诺基亚日前发布官方声明，称这些“窜货商”和诺基亚没有任何合同关系，也没有买卖关系，所以诺基亚对其罚款更无从说起。据记者了解，诺基亚窜货的罚款流程确实是直接从给当地FD的返点中扣除罚款，但FD会把罚款再转嫁给WKA，而WKA卖货给“窜货商”之前已讲清楚，如果被诺基亚抓住，罚款损失完全由窜货商承担，真正被罚的还是小经销商。一位经销商昨天对记者表示，现在每台手机赚几元钱利润，有的甚至就赚2元，再遭受巨额罚款风险太大，已经有多家经销商转卖企业品牌。相关人士昨天对记者表示，接下来各地还会有各种各样针对诺基亚的抗议活动。
en: The Shanghai dealer yesterday "refused to sell Nokia" Dongzao reporter Zhou Ling Nokia responded: There is no contractual relationship with the "rogue dealer" Yesterday, in the Horizon Communications Building near Shanghai Railway Station, some Shanghai dealers who were called "rogue dealers" (third-level dealers who did not sign contracts with Nokia) put up the banner of "Refuse to sell Nokia". The reporter learned that the protest activity did not get the support of a Nokia regular dealer, which seemed a little weak and not very powerful. In fact, yesterday's protest banner was soon taken down by the property security guard, and the early reporters were also forbidden to take photos on the spot, which was very tense. A dealer said to the reporter yesterday that it was already a gesture to hang out. Now, the sales of Nokia products have not been completely stopped, but the sales of Nokia products will gradually decrease in the next step. However, a dealer boss who participated in the protest complained to reporters yesterday that the protests of dealers in Jinan and other places have won the support of Nokia's regular dealers, but Shanghai has not received any support from these regular dealers due to Nokia's pressure. The so-called regular dealer refers to the agent who signed a contract with Nokia. According to Nokia's channel management model, the primary channel is the regional general representative (FD for short), the secondary channel is the development agent (WKA for short) under FD, and WKA itself will develop small dealers without contractual relationship, which is also called "rogue dealer" by Nokia. In view of the recent frequent protests of small dealers in various places due to Nokia's severe punishment of "rogue goods", Nokia recently issued an official statement, saying that these "rogue dealers" have no contractual relationship with Nokia, nor do they have any trade relationship, so Nokia has nothing to do with fining them. According to the reporter, the process of Nokia's smuggling penalty is indeed to directly deduct the fine from the return points given to the local FD, but the FD will pass the fine on to the WKA, and the WKA has made it clear before selling goods to the "rogue dealer" that if it is caught by Nokia, the fine loss will be completely borne by the rogue dealer, and the small dealer is still the one who is really punished. A dealer said to the reporter yesterday that now each mobile phone earns a profit of several yuan, and some even earn 2 yuan. It is too risky to suffer huge fines. Many dealers have transferred their enterprise brands. Relevant people said to the reporter yesterday that there will still be various protests against Nokia in the next step.

content: 北新建材隆重推出龙牌双防石膏板新年伊始，针对华南地区潮湿环境特点，北新建材隆重推出防开裂、防下陷的龙牌双防石膏板。该石膏板采用专门研发配方，具有完美改善板材抗变形和抗下垂的性能。华南地区位于我国最南部，地处亚洲大陆东南沿海，以高温多雨为气候特点。特别是随着梅雨季节的到来，空气湿度经常高于85%。长期在潮湿环境中，一般普通石膏制品吸湿受潮后，强度降低，易产生翘曲变形。北新建材新推出的龙牌双防石膏板则弥补了以往石膏板的缺陷，以品质彰显了多重优势。首先，龙牌双防石膏板最大的一个特点是有效防开裂。一般纤维水泥类产品的干湿变形率为3%左右，而北新建材新推出的新品龙牌双防石膏板伸缩率小于0.01%，同等条件下稳定性更好；该新品同时配套龙牌专用嵌缝膏、龙牌专用嵌缝纸带共同组成龙牌防开裂系统，从板材到系统提共了全方位保障。在规范化施工应用下，可以确保不开裂。龙牌双防石膏板第二大优势就是防下陷。它是公司专门针对华南地区潮湿环境特点，并采用专门研发配方，将石膏板内部的结晶状态由原来的长针状晶体变成块状晶体，赋予板材良好的机械强度，整体强度显著提高，有效改善了板材抗变形和抗下垂的性能。成为专业打造、区域专享的最佳产品。第三，该新品防火性能更好。龙牌石膏板板材含有20%的结晶水和一定的游离水，遇火时首先是游离水蒸发，表现为释放水蒸气，吸收大量热量，抑制板材表面温度升高。当火焰温度继续升高时，分子间结晶水脱水，延缓温度上升，同时增强纤维起到加强筋作用，保持结构完好性。经专业机构检测，龙牌石膏板燃烧性能达到A2级；北新建材具有完整的防火应用体系，可满足0.5—4小时防火墙体结构。此外，该产品为绿色环保产品。北新建材通过了ISO14001环境管理体系认证及国家环境标志产品认证。龙牌双防石膏板绝不含石棉等有害物质，该新品石膏板一经推出，备受广大客户青睐。技术创新是企业持续发展的源动力，北新建材作为中国石膏板行业的开拓者，中国新型建材行业的引领者，30年来始终以技术上的创新推动着企业不断向前并实现跨越式发展。每年，公司都会斥巨资奖励在技术创新方面做出突出贡献的员工。截止2009年底，北新建材共申请专利701件，获得授权560件，自主知识产权专利技术和专利保有量多年位居全国建材行业前列。未来，公司将一如继往地“以客户为中心，创造客户价值”，为消费者提供更多的新产品和满意服务。(石新)
en: At the beginning of the New Year, in view of the characteristics of the damp environment in South China, Beixin Building Materials launched the Long Brand dual defense gypsum board to prevent cracking and sagging. The gypsum board adopts a special research and development formula, which can perfectly improve the anti deformation and anti sagging performance of the plate. South China is located in the southernmost part of our country, in the southeast coastal area of the Asian continent, with the characteristics of hot and rainy climate. In particular, with the arrival of the plum rain season, the air humidity is often more than 85%. For a long time in a humid environment, the strength of ordinary gypsum products will decrease and deformation is easy to occur after they absorb moisture and moisture. The new Long Brand dual defense gypsum board launched by Beixin Building Materials makes up for the defects of the previous gypsum boards, highlighting multiple advantages with quality. First of all, the most important feature of Long Brand Double Defense Gypsum Board is effective anti cracking. The dry wet deformation rate of fiber cement products is about 3%, while the expansion and contraction rate of the new Long Brand Double Defense Gypsum Board launched by Beixin Building Materials is less than 0.01%, which is more stable under the same conditions; The new product is equipped with Long Brand special joint filler and Long Brand special joint paper belt to form the Long Brand anti cracking system, providing all-round protection from board to system. Under the standardized construction application, it can ensure that there is no crack. The second biggest advantage of Long Brand Dual Defense Gypsum Board is to prevent depression. It is a special product for the southern region, targeting the characteristics of the humid environment in South China, and adopts a special research and development formula to change the crystalline state of gypsum board from needle crystals to block crystals, giving the plate good mechanical strength, significantly improving the overall strength, and effectively improving the anti deformation and anti sagging performance of the plate. Become the best product of professional creation and regional exclusivity. Thirdly, the fire resistance of the new product is better. Long Brand Gypsum Board contains 20% crystalline water and some free water. When it meets fire, the first thing is that the free water evaporates, which releases steam and absorbs a lot of heat, inhibiting the increase of the board surface temperature. When the flame temperature continues to rise, the crystalline water between molecules dehydrates, delaying the rise of temperature, and the fiber enhances the role of reinforcing bar at the same time, keeping the structure intact. According to the detection of professional institutions, the combustion performance of Long Brand Gypsum Board reaches level A2; Beixin Building Materials has a complete fire application system, which can meet the fire wall structure of 0.5-4 hours. In addition, the product is green and environmentally friendly. Beixin Building Materials has passed the ISO14001 environmental management system certification and the national environmental label product certification. Long Brand Dual Defense Gypsum Board does not contain asbestos and other harmful substances. Once the new gypsum board was launched, it was widely favored by customers. Technological innovation is the driving force for the continuous development of enterprises. Beixin Building Materials, as the pioneer of China's gypsum board industry and the leader of China's new building materials industry, has always promoted the continuous progress and leapfrog development of enterprises through technological innovation for 30 years. Every year, the company will spend huge funds to reward employees who have made outstanding contributions in technological innovation. By the end of 2009, Beixin Building Materials had applied for 701 patents and obtained 560 authorizations. For many years, the patent technology and patent reserves of independent intellectual property rights have ranked first in the national building materials industry. In the future, the company will continue to "focus on customers and create customer value", providing consumers with more new products and satisfactory services. (Shi Xin)

content: 华夏大盘精选隐形重仓股曝光提前介入贵糖股份，新兴铸管表现最为抢眼证券时报记者朱景锋随着上市公司半年报的陆续公布，知名基金经理王亚伟管理的华夏大盘精选及华夏策略精选在二季度增持或买入的隐形重仓股也随之曝光。王亚伟继续其独特的选股思路，华夏大盘和华夏策略经常“出双入对”携手现身多家上市公司前十大流通股东。据天相投资统计，截至8月5日，王亚伟管理的华夏大盘或华夏策略共出现在9家上市公司前十大流通股东中，除了中恒集团和中航地产之外，其余7只均是在二季度新进入的个股。其中大举进入新兴铸管是王亚伟的得意之作，新兴铸管半年报显示，华夏大盘精选持有该股近800万股，位居第八大流通股东，而一季末华夏精选并未进入该股前十大流通股东，华夏精选今年初去年底也未持有该股，显然，王亚伟在二季度大举介入新兴铸管。而新兴铸管在7月份以来暴涨61.93%，华夏精选在短时间内获利丰厚。国际糖价近期表现抢眼，不断创出反弹新高。王亚伟先知先觉，在二季度提前介入糖业上市公司贵糖股份。贵糖股份半年报显示，在二季末前十大流通股东中，有四个为公募基金，且全部是华夏系基金，其中华夏精选和华夏策略分别以300万和150万股的持股量位居第四大流通股东，华夏行业和华夏红利则分别持股850万和近200万股，位列第二大和第五大流通股东。而一季报贵糖股份前十大流通股东中仅有工银精选一个基金股东，显示二季度华夏系四基金集体介入了贵糖股份。受糖价大幅上涨利好刺激，二季度表现不佳的贵糖股份7月份以来大涨32.8%。基金二季报显示，华夏精选在二季度大举增持中国石化和S上石化这两只石化股，另一只冷门石化股大庆华科也受到华夏精选光顾。大庆华科中报显示，二季末王亚伟管理的华夏精选和华夏策略两只基金分别持有大庆华科193万和120万股，首次进入其前十大流通股东，同时也是其前十大流通股东中仅有的基金股东。除了大庆华科之外，华夏精选和华夏策略两只兄弟基金还双双出现在丽江旅游前十大流通股东中，其中华夏大盘持股近200万股，位居第二大流通股东，华夏策略持股60万股，位列第五大流通股东。5月12日成立的百亿基金长盛同庆买入119万股位列第三大流通股东。而一季末进入丽江旅游前十大流通股东的华宝兴业行业精选在二季度减持该股，从前十大股东中消失。华夏系基金在二季度大举买入或增持渝开发，二季度末包括华夏大盘精选和华夏策略在内的7只华夏系基金进入渝开发前十大流通股东，其中华夏大盘精选和华夏策略分别持有402万股和199万股，分别为第三大和第八大流通股东。虽然渝开发二季度大涨53.01%表现抢眼，但7月份以来仅上涨6.41%，表现欠佳。而华夏精选二季度介入的杭州解百7月份以来仅上涨14.74%，落后于大盘。
en: China's large-scale selected hidden heavy position stocks were exposed in advance to intervene in the expensive sugar shares. The emerging cast pipe was the most eye-catching security时报journalist Zhu Jingfeng. As the semi-annual reports of listed companies were published one after another, the hidden heavy position stocks purchased or purchased by Wang Yawei, a well-known fund manager, in the second quarter were also exposed. Wang Yawei continues his unique stock picking idea. China's large-scale and China's Strategy often "come in pairs" and appear together in the top ten tradable shareholders of many listed companies. According to the statistics of Tianxiang Investment, as of August 5, the China Large盘or China Strategy managed by Wang Yawei has appeared in the top ten tradable shareholders of 9 listed companies. In addition to Zhongheng Group and Avic Real Estate, the other seven are new stocks that entered in the second quarter. Among them, the massive entry into the emerging cast pipe is Wang Yawei's masterpiece. The semi annual report of the emerging cast pipe shows that the China Large盘Selected shares nearly 8 million shares of the stock, ranking the eighth largest tradable shareholder, and the China Large盘Selected shares did not enter the top ten tradable shareholders of the stock at the end of the first quarter. The China Large盘Selected shares also did not hold the stock at the end of last year. Obviously, Wang Yawei made a massive intervention in the emerging cast pipe in the second quarter. Since July, Xinxing Cast Pipe has soared by 61.93%, and China Huaxuan has made a lot of profits in a short time. International sugar prices have recently performed well, hitting new highs in rebound after rebound. Wang Yawei was clairvoyant, and he got involved in the sugar industry listed company Gui Tang Shares in the second quarter in advance. According to the semi annual report of Guizhou Sugar Co., Ltd., four of the top ten tradable shareholders at the end of the second quarter were public funds, and they were all China Huaxuan funds, among which China Huaxuan Selection and China Huaxuan Strategy ranked the fourth largest tradable shareholders with 3 million and 1.5 million shares respectively, and China Huaxuan Industry and China Huaxuan Bonus ranked the second largest and the fifth largest tradable shareholders with 8.5 million and nearly 2 million shares respectively. At the end of the first quarter, there was only one fund shareholder, ICBC Selection, in the top ten tradable shareholders of Guizhou Sugar Industry, which shows that the four Huaxuan series funds collectively intervened in Guizhou Sugar Industry in the second quarter. Stimulated by the sharp rise of sugar prices, Guizhou Sugar, which performed poorly in the second quarter, has soared by 32.8% since July. The second quarter report of the fund shows that China Huaxuan made a huge increase in the two petrochemical stocks, Sinopec and Sinopec, in the second quarter, and another unpopular petrochemical stock, Daqing Huake, was also visited by China Huaxuan. Daqing Huake's semi annual report shows that at the end of the second quarter, Wang Yawei's China Selection and China Strategy managed two funds with 1.93 million shares and 1.2 million shares respectively, which was the first time that they entered its top ten tradable shareholders, and they were also the only fund shareholders in its top ten tradable shareholders. In addition to Daqing Huake, the two brother funds of China Selection and China Strategy also appeared in the top ten tradable shareholders of Lijiang Tourism, where China Large盘had nearly 2 million shares, ranking the second largest tradable shareholder, and China Strategy had 600000 shares, ranking the fifth largest tradable shareholder. The hundred billion fund Changsheng Tongqing, which was established on May 12, purchased 1.19 million shares, ranking the third largest floating shareholder. Huabao Xingye Industry Selection, which entered the top ten tradable shareholders of Lijiang Tourism at the end of the first quarter, reduced its shares in the second quarter and disappeared from the top ten shareholders. Huaxuan Fund made a big purchase or increase of Yu Development in the second quarter. At the end of the second quarter, including China Large盘Selection and Huaxuan Strategy, seven Huaxuan Fund entered the top ten tradable shareholders of Yu Development, including 4.02 million shares and 1.99 million shares of China Large盘Selection and Huaxuan Strategy, ranking the third and eighth largest tradable shareholders respectively. Although Yu Kai developed by 53.01% in the second quarter, it only rose by 6.41% since July, which was poor. The Hangzhou Jiebai, which was involved in the second quarter by Huaxuan Selection, has only risen by 14.74% since July, which is behind the market.

content: 对话奥沙利文：百米成绩9秒6斯诺克完美境界是什么本报记者李婷体坛：说到你的孩子，每次在外比赛会特别想他们吧？奥沙利文：那当然，他们就是我的心肝呀，我只要一离开家就会特别想念他们，不过他们现在还太小，女儿三岁，儿子只有一岁半，可能还不太能理解我的心情。体坛：那为什么不把孩子一起带来？奥沙利文：其实我向组委会方面申请过，但组委会没有同意。我后来想想，自己是来比赛的，所以安心一点也好。体坛：16岁时父亲入狱，让你失去了很多父爱，会不会让你希望给孩子更多父爱？奥沙利文：孩子的成长需要父母给予很多关怀和帮助，所以只要我有时间都会在家陪他们，不要以为我会很忙，其实我每天只练两三个小时的球，然后腾出更多时间给家人。不过他们现在还太小，不能一起玩，我最多和儿子踢足球。体坛：：听说你父亲前一段曾短暂出狱，能谈谈他吗？奥沙利文：他是个很积极的人，不管面对什么情况，都不会消沉，我想这是他影响我最大的一点。他一直很关注也很支持我，即便我们不能见面，他也会了解我的比赛情况，我们彼此并不会因为距离而疏远。过去我们只能通过电话或几个月才能见一次，我相信不久的将来我们又能重新在一起。体坛：听说你酷爱跑步也是受了父亲的影响？奥沙利文：小时候父亲每天都会跑步，我也跟着，后来我自己每天都跑10公里，现在我基本上每周跑六天，可以放松身心，也可以保持不错的精神状态，再有就是保持体型。我现在年纪大了，不跑肚子上会长肉的，(大笑)要不要给你秀一下我的腹肌？体坛：每周六天，那你不怕风吹日晒雨淋？奥沙利文：风雨还是挺怕，但太阳是我的最爱呀，你看我皮肤，怎么样？很光滑吧？告诉你，我用的就是“阳光牌”润肤霜，推荐给你。还是要多晒晒太阳啦，我们平时打斯诺克不见天日，跑步总算能让我沐浴阳光，当然得享受。体坛：百米成绩怎么样？最远一次又是跑了多远？奥沙利文：我百米成绩是9秒6哦，很快吧，(笑)我开玩笑啦，我百米差不多14秒，有点不好意思啊。最远我跑过一次25公里，应该是半程马拉松的距离了，用了一个半小时，平常10公里我最快纪录是34分钟。体坛：看你挺重视身材和形象，我知道你是个追求完美的人。奥沙利文：是的，完美状态，是我最希望达到的，我总会以这种要求来提醒自己，我知道这很难，所以我会下很大决心来面对。体坛：怎么理解完美？斯诺克中的完美是？奥沙利文：完美就是你从来不可能达到完美的境界，但你可以做到保持连续性的高水平。这适应于所有方面。不论你在哪方面持续达到高水平，你都是那方面具有支配地位的人。斯诺克中的完美一定是147分。当然，你不可能每次比赛都能获得147分，就像我刚才说的，完美本身是不存在的，而是一个不断追求的过程。我也不是完美的人，但我会以这个标准来要求自己。体坛：所以你经常开局打得不好，就容易放弃之后的比赛？奥沙利文：我的确想把每场球都打得完美，如果开局不顺，我就会觉得即使后面打得再好，赢下来，过程也不是我想要的，这会让我失去对比赛的兴趣，不过也不是经常吧，只是偶尔为之。体坛：我记得你这“偶尔”的一次发生在2006年英锦赛你与亨得利的比赛中。奥沙利文：哦，你还记得真清楚，我当时1比4落后，觉得没什么希望，与其打下去还不如早点结束，反正结果也能预见，我打完那局就放弃离开了。我也因此付出了代价，罚钱又扣分，也算是个经验教训，现在我应该是不会了。体坛：你知道，为了斯诺克的发展，国际台联做了很多改革，但效果都不太好。奥沙利文：我知道斯诺克的商业发展不顺利，但具体的，我不懂。这些和我也没太大关系，我不是沃克爵士，我只管打好自己的球。如果我是沃克爵士？哦，不，不可能的，我只是奥沙利文，只做奥沙利文该做的。体坛：那你能给斯诺克运动的发展一些建议吗？奥沙利文：那你付我咨询费吗？(笑)不过看在你送我礼物的份上，我可以免收你的咨询费，其实我的收费挺高的。不过说真的，这项运动的发展不是我能控制的。体坛：沃克爵士曾说会考虑将世锦赛搬到中国，你愿意在英国之外参加如此重大的比赛吗？奥沙利文：其实在哪都一样，只是看心情上能否适应。即便真是那样，我肯定会让自己适应的，别忘了，奥沙利文是追求完美的，就像你说的那样。体坛：你认为你为斯诺克带来了什么？奥沙利文：速度？激情？147？我喜欢人们在看斯诺克，谈论到球手时会说，“哦，那是奥沙利文，我最喜欢的球手，他能打147分。”我在这项运动中是顶尖的，这能引起关注，吸引大家关注斯诺克。体坛：年轻人想达到奥沙利文的成就，应该怎么做？奥沙利文：他们应该要学习很多高手。我建议他们多看亨得利、戴维斯这些选手的技术录像，多练习，要专注。我也是在学习其他高手的过程中成为今天的奥沙利文，我以前经常会把亨得利的比赛录下来反复看，反复学。体坛：中国现在有很多学斯诺克的小孩，他们都是退学来专门投身这项运动。奥沙利文：这样？我认为教育是很重要的。当然，如果一个孩子确实对任何事都没兴趣，只喜欢斯诺克，那只要他愿意，也可以一直练习。但此外，还是必须接触其他知识，这是平衡，必须要处理好。体坛：说说现在的经济危机吧，你在英国有什么感受？奥沙利文：是的，全球现在都在经历危机，英国应该比中国更严重，其实我觉得没必要太担心，想着经济危机会怎样，这也是世界发展的自然规律吧，就像人也会生病。关键是，经济危机就算带走我们的一些金钱，但带不走我们的精神，只要有信念，一切都会过去。体坛：你在伦敦也有些生意，经济危机有影响吗？奥沙利文：我做一些地产还有店铺，这方面我倒没有特别留意，影响肯定有，但还不算大。我唯一的“生意”还是斯诺克，没比赛的时候，我才会关心一下其他产业。体坛：你觉得在哪更受欢迎，中国还是英国？奥沙利文：英国，毕竟斯诺克在英国有很悠久的历史，很多人喜欢斯诺克，也懂斯诺克，而在中国，虽然也有很多球迷问我要签名合影，但我不知道他们怎么看待斯诺克，因为我没法和他们交流。体坛：你到过北京、上海，还去了别的中国城市，最喜欢哪里？奥沙利文：中国每个城市给人的感觉都不一样。上海很时髦，现在是国际大都市，我喜欢那里的建筑，很多元化。南京环境很不错。而北京是个迷人的地方，有太多惊奇，我想夏天时带孩子来看看。体坛：每次到北京，有特别想去的地方吗？奥沙利文：餐馆，那是我一定要去的。喜欢中国菜？哦不，我不是喜欢，我是热爱，我太热爱了！我每次来北京都会去酒店附近一些粤菜馆吃海鲜，我在家也会做海鲜给孩子们吃。不过要说最喜欢的，还是广州的早茶，每次去广州，我都会吃很多样的茶点，太精致了。说到这，到了午餐时间，奥沙利文喝完咖啡说：“昨晚我去附近一家粤菜餐厅，那里的清蒸鱼很好吃，我等会儿还要再来一条。”奥沙利文笑着准备回房间，刚走了两步，又扭头回来：“哦，我的好运小牛忘拿了，不知道它会不会助我拿到比赛的冠军？”
person: 戴维斯,沃克爵士,李婷,奥沙利文,亨得利
en: Dialogue with O'Sullivan: 100 meter score 9.6 snooker perfect realm? Li Ting, a reporter of this newspaper, said: Speaking of your children, you must miss them especially when you are competing outside? O'Sullivan: Of course, they are my liver and gallbladder. I will miss them very much as long as I leave home. However, they are too young now. Their daughter is three years old and their son is only one and a half years old, so they may not understand my feelings. Sports: Then why not bring the children together? O'Sullivan: In fact, I applied to the organizing committee, but the organizing committee did not agree. Later, I thought that I came to compete, so it would be better to be safe. Sports: When my father went to prison at the age of 16, it made you lose a lot of father's love. Would you like to give your child more father's love? O'Sullivan: Children's growth requires parents to give a lot of care and help, so I will always stay with them at home when I have time. Don't think I will be very busy. In fact, I only practice two or three hours a day, and then give more time to my family. However, they are too young to play together. I can play football with my son at most. Sports: I heard that your father had been briefly released from prison for the time being. Can you talk about him? O'Sullivan: He is a very positive person. No matter what situation he faces, he will not be depressed. I think this is the most important point that has influenced me. He has always been very concerned about and supportive of me. Even if we can not meet, he will know about my game. We will not alienate each other because of distance. In the past, we could only talk on the phone or meet once in several months, I believe we can be together again in the near future. Sports: I heard that your father also influenced you in running? O'Sullivan: When I was a child, my father ran every day, so did I. Later, I ran 10 kilometers every day. Now, I basically run six days a week, which can relax my body and mind, and keep a good mental state. The other thing is to keep fit. Now that I am old, I will grow meat on my stomach if I don't run. (Laugh) Do you want to show off my abdominal muscles? Sports: Six days a week, are you afraid of wind, sun, rain and rain? O'Sullivan: I'm still afraid of wind and rain, but the sun is my favorite. Look at my skin. How about it? Very smooth? Let me tell you, I use "Sun" brand moisturizing cream, which I recommend to you. Still, we have to get more sun. We can't see the sun when we play snooker. Running can let me bask in the sun, so I must enjoy it. Sports: What about the 100 meter score? How far did you run the farthest time? O'Sullivan: My 100 meter score is 9.6 seconds. It's very fast, isn't it? (Laugh) I'm just kidding. My 100 meter run is almost 14 seconds, so I'm a bit embarrassed. The farthest I've run is 25 kilometers, which should be the distance of a half marathon. It took an hour and a half. Normally, my fastest record for 10 kilometers is 34 minutes. Sports: You pay great attention to your figure and image. I know you are a perfectionist. O'Sullivan: Yes, the perfect state is what I hope to achieve most. I will always remind myself of this requirement. I know it is very difficult, so I will make up my mind to face it. Sports: How to understand perfection? What is perfection in snooker? O'Sullivan: Perfection is a state that you will never achieve, but you can achieve continuous high levels. This is applicable to all aspects. No matter where you continue to achieve a high level, you are the dominant person in that aspect. The perfection of snooker must be 147 points. Of course, you can't get 147 points in every game, as I just said. Perfection itself does not exist, but it is a continuous process of pursuit. I am not perfect either, but I will require myself according to this standard. Sports: So you often play badly at the beginning of the game, and it is easy to give up the game later? O'Sullivan: I really want to make every game perfect. If the beginning is not smooth, I will feel that even if I win later, the process is not what I want, which will make me lose interest in the game. However, it is not always the case, just occasionally. Sports: I remember that your "occasional" event took place in your match with Hendley at the 2006 British Championships. O'Sullivan: Oh, you really remember clearly. I was 1-4 behind and thought there was no hope. Instead of going on, it was better to end early. Anyway, the result could be foreseen. When I finished that game, I gave up and left. I also paid a price for that, with both fines and scores deducted, which can also be regarded as an experience lesson. I don't think I will now. Sports: You know, in order to develop snooker, the International Table Tennis Federation has made many reforms, but they are not very effective. O'Sullivan: I know that the commercial development of snooker is not smooth, but I don't understand the specifics. These have little to do with me. I am not Sir Walker. I just want to play my own ball well. If I were Sir Walker? Oh no, it's impossible. I'm just O'Sullivan, just doing what O'Sullivan should do. Sports: Can you give some suggestions for the development of snooker? O'Sullivan: Will you pay me a consulting fee? (Laugh) But in view of the fact that you have sent me gifts, I can exempt you from the consulting fee. In fact, my charge is quite high. But to be serious, the development of this sport is beyond my control. Sports: Sir Walker once said that he would consider moving the World Championships to China. Are you willing to participate in such a major event outside the United Kingdom? O'Sullivan: It's the same anywhere, just to see if you can adapt. Even if it is really like that, I will definitely make myself adapt. Don't forget, O'Sullivan is perfect, just as you said. Sports: What do you think you have brought to snooker? O'Sullivan: Speed? Passion? 147? I like people to say when they watch snooker and talk about players," Oh, that's O'Sullivan, my favorite player. He can play 147." I am the best in this sport, which can attract attention and make everyone pay attention to snooker. Sports: What should young people do if they want to achieve O'Sullivan's success? O'Sullivan: They should learn from many experts. I suggest them to watch the technical videos of Hendley, Davis and other players, practice more, and focus. I also became today's O'Sullivan in the process of learning from other experts. I used to record Hendley's games and learn again and again. Sports: There are many children in China who are learning snooker. They all drop out of school to devote themselves to this sport. O'Sullivan: Like this? I think education is very important. Of course, if a child is really not interested in anything but snooker, he can also practice as long as he is willing. But in addition, we must have access to other knowledge. This is a balance and must be handled well. Sports: Talk about the current economic crisis. What do you feel in the UK? O'Sullivan: Yes, the world is now experiencing a crisis. The United Kingdom should be more serious than China. In fact, I don't think there is any need to worry too much. I think it is also the natural law of world development, just like people will get sick. The key is that even if the economic crisis takes away some of our money, it can't take away our spirit. As long as we have faith, everything will pass. Sports: You also have some businesses in London. Has the economic crisis had an impact? O'Sullivan: I do some real estate and shops. I didn't pay special attention to this aspect. There is definitely an impact, but it is not big. My only "business" is still snooker. When there is no game, I will care about other industries. Sports: Where do you think you are more popular, China or the United Kingdom? O'Sullivan: The United Kingdom. After all, snooker has a long history in the UK. Many people like snooker and know snooker. In China, although many fans also asked me for my signature and photo, I don't know how they view snooker because I can't communicate with them. Sports: You have been to Beijing, Shanghai and other Chinese cities. Which one do you like best? O'Sullivan: Every city in China feels different. Shanghai is very fashionable. Now it is an international metropolis. I like the architecture there. It is very diversified. The environment in Nanjing is very nice. And Beijing is a fascinating place. There are too many surprises. I want to bring my children to have a look in summer. Sports: When you come to Beijing every time, do you want to go somewhere in particular? O'Sullivan: Restaurant, that's where I must go. Like Chinese food? Oh no, I don't like it. I love it. I love it too much! Every time I come to Beijing, I go to some Guangdong restaurants near the hotel to eat seafood, and I also cook seafood for my children at home. But to say the favorite, it is still the morning tea in Guangzhou. Every time I go to Guangzhou, I eat many kinds of dim sum.
