content: 广东大翻盘让阿联高呼骄傲杜比超强能力令他感叹新浪体育讯　北京时间4月18日消息，在结束了NBA的常规赛之后，易建联立刻马不停蹄的赶回了国内，并且向国家队的主教练邓华德报道，并且和邓华德进行了一次神秘会谈。不过易建联并不会马上和国家队会合一起训练，接下来他将休息半个月，而在这半个月当中，为自己曾经效力的广东队助威总决赛也成为了他日程中最为重要的事情。昨晚，广东队在新疆客场一度落后18分的情况下在第四节上演了惊心动魄的大翻盘，已经抵达北京的易建联也在电视机旁关注了这场比赛。“我看了第二场。”易建联说，“对广东来说，他们打得非常不错，我为他们感到骄傲。昨天的比赛他们第二节一度落后16分，第三节的时候甚至落后了18分，但大家在困难时刻都没有放弃，最后还是赢回来了。我希望他们后面的比赛能够打出更好的表现。”谈到广东队总决赛上的对手新疆队，易建联表示：“新疆队这个赛季确实实力提高了很多，包括内援方面、外援方面，还有替补的实力。应该说总决赛对双方来说都会是一个很大的挑战。”在关注了总决赛前两场之后，阿联也为昆西-杜比超强的得分能力而感叹。他说：“杜比在新疆队确实扮演了一个非常重要的角色，第一场让他拿了53分，确实是对他这一点控制得不太好。第二场让他拿到36分，这就是他常规赛一直保持的一个正常水平，所以对他的控制应该说还是有所提高吧。后面的比赛，防守杜比仍然会是球队的重点任务。”当记者提出让易建联预测一下总决赛的比分时，阿联笑了表说：“预测我还没有想过，因为我会有偏爱，广东是我以前效力的球队，我肯定会更加支持广东。”虽然不愿意对比分做出具体的预测，但阿联还是对后面的比赛进行了展望，他说：“从实力上看，谁能拿最后的总冠军还要看双方的发挥和临场的表现。现在两支球队都各输了一个主场，后面的每一场比赛对双方来说都非常重要。”最后，阿联也对广东队本赛季的表现做出了总结。易建联说：“这个赛季广东队经历了很多的困难，包括朱芳雨和王仕鹏几个老将身上一直有伤，而且大外援(哈里森)也在赛季刚刚开始就受伤了，应该说他们常规赛打得非常不容易，但这这种困难的情况下他们还是打出了非常不错的表现。”接下来，易建联将会前往东莞，观看本赛季的CBA总决赛第四场，并为自己的母队——广东队加油。(贾磊)
person: 朱芳雨,贾磊,哈里森,昆西-杜比,邓华德,易建联,王仕鹏,杜比
en: The great turnaround of Guangdong made Alian call him proud. Duby's super ability made him sigh. Sina Sports News On April 18, Beijing time, after the end of the NBA's regular season, Yi Jianlian immediately returned to China without stopping, reported to the head coach of the national team, Deng Huade, and had a mysterious talk with Deng Huade. However, Yi Jianlian will not immediately join the national team for training. In the next half month, he will have a rest. During this half month, cheering for the Guangdong team, where he once played, in the finals has also become the most important thing on his schedule. Last night, the Guangdong team once fell behind by 18 points in the away game in Xinjiang, and staged a thrilling comeback in the fourth quarter. Yi Jianlian, who had arrived in Beijing, also followed this game on TV. "I watched the second game." Yi Jianlian said, "For Guangdong, they played very well, and I am proud of them. Yesterday's game, they fell behind by 16 points in the second quarter, and even fell behind by 18 points in the third quarter, but everyone did not give up at the moment of difficulty, and finally won back. I hope they can play better in the future." Speaking of Xinjiang team, the opponent of Guangdong team in the finals, Yi Jianlian said: "Xinjiang team has indeed improved a lot this season, including internal and external aids, and the strength of substitutes. I think the finals will be a big challenge for both sides." After paying attention to the first two games of the finals, A Lian also感叹Quincy - DuBy's super scoring ability. He said: "Duobi did play a very important role in Xinjiang. In the first game, he scored 53 points. It was really not good to control him. In the second game, he scored 36 points, which was his normal level in the whole season, so his control should have been improved. In the future, defending Duobi will still be the focus of the team." When the reporter asked Yi Jianlian to predict the score of the finals, A Lian smiled and said: "I haven't thought about prediction, because I will have a preference. Guangdong is the team I used to play for, so I will definitely support Guangdong more." Although he was unwilling to make a specific forecast of the score, A Lian also looked forward to the future game, and he said: "In terms of strength, who can win the championship will depend on the performance of both sides and their performance on the spot. Now both teams have lost a home court, so the next game is very important for both sides." Finally, A Lian also summed up the performance of Guangdong Team this season. Yi Jianlian said: "This season, the Guangdong team has experienced a lot of difficulties, including the fact that several veterans, such as Zhu Fangyu and Wang Shipeng, have been injured all the time, and the major foreign aid (Harrison) was also injured at the beginning of the season. They played very hard in the regular season, but they still played very well under this kind of difficulty." Next, Yi Jianlian will go to Dongguan to watch the fourth game of the CBA finals this season and cheer for his mother team - Guangdong Team. (Jialei)

content: topview：股市将如何发展指南针姜都锋昨日中国股市经历了从跌3%到涨3%的逆转，全球股市也在各国救市的利好前提下出现了好转，香港恒生指数大涨10%，新加坡海峡时报指数大涨5%，英国融时报指数大涨8.26%，德国DAX30种股价指数大涨11.%。而美国道琼斯指数更是创下历史最高单日上涨点数，上涨了936点，涨幅11%。在全球股市普涨的局面下，我国又会向何处出发展呢？通过指南针赢富数据显示，上周周五基金大举建仓，当日建仓资金净流入24.81亿。资产管理机构也将一味的做空变成了少量的调仓。应该说这一动作说明阳光机构对后市是比较乐观的。从指南针动态TOP显示，本周一主力资金仍在大举的建仓中国股市，加之大盘连续下跌，昨日大盘发生惊天大逆转也就是正常了。指南针TOP板大盘风向标显示资金的进场数量和持续性都达到了近期的巨量。可以看到，大盘风向标中显示资金已经达到了1天、3天、5天、10天全部做多的状态。那么当全球股市全部大涨，中国股市资金大举介入的时候，未来大盘的方向将怎么走呢？应该说盲目的乐观是不应该的。我们应该看到当前行情的主要趋势是震荡行情，行情趋势的改变首先是要有资金的改变。通过指南针动态TOP软件的显示，今日(周二)大盘风向标出现了主力资金却在大涨之后出逃的迹象，看来主力对未来的行情并不是十分看好。才出现了今天主力逢高派发的动作。
en: Topview: The stock market will develop. The指南compass Jiang Dufeng experienced a reversal from a 3% decline to a 3% increase yesterday. The Chinese stock market also improved under the good conditions of saving the market in various countries. The Hong Kong Hang Seng Index surged 10%, the Singapore Strait Times Index surged 5%, and the British Rong Financial Times Index surged 8.26%. The German DAX30 stock price index soared 11%. The Dow Jones Index in the United States even hit a record high of 936 points, up 11%. In the face of the general rise of the global stock market, where will our country go for development? According to the data from the Compass Yingfu, the fund made a huge position on Friday last week, with a net inflow of 2.481 billion yuan on the day. Asset management institutions have also turned shorting into a small amount of adjustment. It can be said that this move shows that the Sunshine Organization is optimistic about the future market. From the dynamic TOP display of the compass, the main force is still building a position in the Chinese stock market on Monday, coupled with the continuous decline of the market, it is normal that the market made a huge reversal yesterday. The top board of the compass's top board shows that the amount and continuity of funds entering the market have reached a huge recent volume. It can be seen that the money in the market has reached the state of being long for 1 day, 3 days, 5 days and 10 days. Then, when the global stock market is all up and the Chinese stock market funds are making a big intervention, how will the future direction of the market go? It should not be blindly optimistic. We should see that the main trend of the current market is the volatile market, and the change of the market trend should first be changed by funds. Through the display of the dynamic TOP software of the Compass, the market trend indicator (Tuesday) showed that the main force was fleeing after a sharp rise, which seems that the main force is not very optimistic about the future market. It was only today that the main force took the action of distributing at a high level.

content: 猛龙新秀挤走功勋老臣马刺领衔5球队追求欧洲之王新浪体育讯　北京时间6月28日，据《环球邮报》消息，猛龙在选秀大会上挑走了德马尔-德罗赞后，队中元老安东尼-帕克已经没有了位置，他离队的可能性很大。目前已经有多支球队追逐帕克。帕克在7月1日即将成为自由球员，他已经34岁，是一位经验丰富的得分后卫。帕克上一份3年1200万的合同今年到期，他希望在职业生涯的晚期，得到一份尽可能大的合同。一位内部人士透露，至少有5支球队向猛龙就帕克进行了询价，包括马刺，凯尔特人，太阳，骑士和雷霆。就现在的情况看，帕克找到新东家不是难事。猛龙已经向新秀德罗赞许诺了出场时间，他们还向德尔菲诺开出报价合同。另外帕克回到欧洲联赛的可能性也很大。帕克在最初几个NBA不成功的赛季，前往欧洲淘金，却在以色列联赛取得生工，入选欧洲联赛50大巨星，并连续两赛季拿到MVP，被称为欧洲之王。(迪哥)
person: 安东尼-帕克,德尔菲诺,德马尔-德罗赞,迪哥,帕克
en: Raptors' rookie squeezed out the meritorious old minister Spurs led 5 teams to pursue the King of Europe Sina Sports News On June 28, Beijing time, according to the Globe Post, after the Raptors picked DeMar DeRozan in the draft, the team's veteran Anthony Parker had no place, and it was very likely that he would leave the team. At present, many teams have been chasing Parker. Parker will become a free agent on July 1, he is 34 years old and an experienced shooting guard. Parker's last contract of $12 million for 3 years expired this year, and he hoped to get a contract as large as possible in the late stage of his career. An insider revealed that at least five teams, including the Spurs, the Celtics, the Suns, the Cavaliers and the Thunder, had asked the Raptors about Parker. Judging from the current situation, it is not difficult for Parker to find a new job. The Raptors have promised the rookie DeRozan playing time, and they have also offered a quote contract to Delfino. Besides, Parker is likely to return to the European League. Parker went to Europe to make a fortune in the first few unsuccessful NBA seasons, but he achieved success in the Israeli League, was selected as one of the 50 top superstars in the European League, and won the MVP for two consecutive seasons, known as the King of Europe. (Diego)

content: 新疆警方：高考招生5大陷阱需设防6月27日，乌鲁木齐市公安局发出预警提醒高考考生和家长：警惕五大陷阱、谨防上当受骗。一、招生陷阱针对家长都希望自己的孩子能进名校就读的心理，骗子往往设置4类陷阱：“名校”变“民办”。骗子通常许诺可以让高三毕业生到名校学习，但在接受“关系费”、“赞助费”后，却将学生安排到交钱就能上的民办高校；“艺校”变“艺班”。骗子吹嘘可以帮助考生进入艺校，从而骗取高额“好处费”，最后却将学生送进私人开办的艺术辅导班。“军校”特招。骗子以部队首长亲属、朋友的身份自居，或者干脆自称高级军官，谎称手中握有某某军校的特招生名额，在收受钱财后溜之大吉。“点招”吸引。骗子利用考生和家长对试点高校“点招”政策不了解的弱点，极力渲染其中的“黑幕”，以帮助毕业生取得“点招”名额为名，实施诈骗。二、招工陷阱一些考生在高考之后即外出打工，针对这类学生，骗子常常以职业介绍所、职业中介人名义设置3类陷阱。收费不介绍：骗子收取毕业生高额打工介绍费后逃之夭夭；预留试用期：承诺给予高薪，以试用的名义廉价利用毕业生的劳动力；乱收费：编造各种名义收取费用，如风险抵押金、培训费、置装费、建档费等。三、网络陷阱学生参加高考后，上网的时间多了，但对是非的辨别、对不良信息的抵制能力相对较弱，易沉迷于网络色情。四、“哥们儿”陷阱现在的高三毕业生多为“90后”，具有强烈的好奇心，易冲动，高考后，管理上也处于“放羊”状态。此时，一些高三毕业生误交不良社会青年，并为了“哥们儿”义气，做出寻衅滋事、聚众斗殴等违法行为。五、传销陷阱骗子往往以高三毕业生的亲朋好友或老乡面目出现，鼓动毕业生利用等待录取通知书的时间赚大钱，以高额回报、快速致富为诱饵，进行诱骗。针对这五种情况，公安机关在加强打击违法犯罪分子的同时，提醒广大家长、考生：首先，要通过正常渠道报考高校，不给不法分子以可乘之机；其次，要认真甄别各类中介的真伪，不要“病急乱投医”；最后，家长要加强对考生的监管，防止其上当受骗及违法犯罪。
en: Xinjiang police: five traps in the college entrance examination recruitment need to be guarded against. On June 27, the Public Security Bureau of Urumqi City issued a warning to remind college entrance examination candidates and parents: beware of five traps and be careful not to be cheated. 1. The招生trap targets the psychology of parents who hope their children can study in famous schools. Scammers often set four traps: "famous schools" change to "private". Scammers usually promise to let高三graduates study in famous schools, but after receiving "relationship fees" and "sponsorship fees", they arrange students to go to private universities where they can pay; "Art School" changes to "Art Class". Scammers boast that they can help candidates enter art schools in order to get huge "benefits", but finally send students to privately run art tutoring classes. "Military Academy" special recruitment. Scammers often claim to be relatives, friends or simply senior officers of military leaders, lying that they have special student quotas in their hands of a certain military academy, and then run away with money. "Point recruitment" attraction. Scammers take advantage of the weakness of candidates and parents that they do not know the "point recruitment" policy of pilot universities, and尽力render the "black curtain" in it in order to help graduates get the "point recruitment" quota, and then commit fraud. 2. Job recruitment trap Some candidates go out to work after the college entrance examination. For these students, scammers often set three traps in the name of vocational introduction offices and vocational intermediaries. No introduction for charging: The scammer runs away after charging graduates a high job introduction fee; Reserve probation: Promise to give high salary and use graduates' labor at a low price in the name of probation;乱Charge: Fabricate various names to collect fees, such as risk mortgage, training fees, dressing fees, file building fees, etc. 3. Network trap After students take the college entrance examination, they have more time to surf the Internet, but they have relatively weak ability to distinguish right from wrong and resist bad information, and they are easy to be addicted to online sex. 4. "Buddy" trap The current graduates of Grade 3 are mostly "post 90s", with strong curiosity and impulsiveness. After the college entrance examination, the management is also in a state of "sheep releasing". At this time, some高三graduates make friends with bad young people in society, and in order to "buddy" righteousness, they commit illegal acts such as provoking troubles and fighting. 5. Pyramid selling trap Scammers often appear as relatives, friends or fellow townspeople of the高三graduates, inciting graduates to make money while waiting for the admission notice, using high returns and rapid wealth as bait to lure. In view of these five situations, while the public security organ is strengthening the fight against criminals, it also reminds parents and candidates: first, they should apply for universities through normal channels, so as not to give criminals any chance; second, they should carefully identify the authenticity of various intermediaries, and do not "give doctors in a hurry when they are seriously ill"; Finally, parents should strengthen their supervision of the examinees to prevent them from being deceived and committing crimes.

content: 京城高中“出国班”开设中国文化课北京考试报讯在京城部分示范高中国际班上，学生除了学习国际课程，中国文化课也是很重要的一部分。据悉，在京城的高中“出国班”几乎都开设了中国文化课。北大附中国际部国际课程与中国文化课并重，除国际课程外，中国语言及文学、中国历史及政治等课程，学生也要学。十一学校国际部的学生同样要学历史、地理等课程。首师大附中中美实验班的学生可在艺术、语言与文学、人文与社会等五大学习领域选修申请美国大学所需课程。“出国学生要了解世界文化艺术的基本常识，但不能忘记中国历史、地理的基本知识。”在四中、八中等示范高中的“出国班”里，为了让学生更有针对性地准备出国考试，学校特意为学生量身定做了相关课程。学校除安排数学、语文等基础课、会考课程外，还额外开设中西艺术鉴赏、中国历史和地理等课程。十一学校国际部副主任周斌说，中国文化是学生的根。国际部要招收“志在出国”的优秀学生，把他们培养成国际型人才。同时，学生只有学习中国文化，将来走出国门后，才能更好传播祖国优秀文化。连自己国家、民族的历史、文化都不了解，出国何以立足。业内人士认为，高中开展中外合作教育，适应了时代发展的需要。再过几年，一流人才应是具有“国际化背景、世界眼光、中国灵魂”的人物。据了解，示范高中里的“出国班”有两种，一种是根据学生和家长需求，在高三时为留学生单独设置，班上的高三生基本只参加会考申请国外高校；另一种是国际班。高中与国外中学合作或引进国外中学课程。学生从高一便学习国外课程，高三毕业直接申请国外高校。部分高中两种班兼有。(记者：马海丽)
en: The "going abroad class" of Beijing High School opened a course on Chinese culture Beijing Examination News In some model senior high schools in Beijing, in addition to learning international courses, students also pay attention to learning Chinese culture. It is reported that the "going abroad class" of high schools in Beijing has almost opened Chinese culture courses. The international department of the International Department of Peking University attaches equal importance to the international curriculum and Chinese culture. In addition to the international curriculum, students also need to learn Chinese language and literature, Chinese history and politics. Students in the International Department of No. 11 School also need to learn history, geography and other courses. The students of the China-US experimental class of the High School Attached to Capital Normal University can choose the courses required by American universities in five major fields of study, such as art, language and literature, and humanities and society. "Students going abroad should know the basic common sense of world culture and art, but they should not forget the basic knowledge of Chinese history and geography." In the "going abroad class" of model high schools such as No. 4 Middle School and No. 8 Middle School, in order to make students better prepared for the examinations abroad, the school has tailored relevant courses for students. In addition to arranging basic courses such as mathematics and Chinese, and examination courses, the school also provides additional courses such as Chinese and Western art appreciation, Chinese history and geography. Zhou Bin, deputy director of the International Department of No. 11 School, said that Chinese culture is the root of students. The international department should recruit excellent students who are "aiming at going abroad" and train them into international talents. At the same time, only by learning Chinese culture, students can better spread the excellent culture of the motherland after going abroad in the future. If you don't know the history and culture of your own country and nation, how can you stand out in going abroad. Industry insiders believe that the development of international cooperation education in high schools is in line with the needs of the times. In a few years, first-class talents should be people with "international background, global perspective and Chinese soul". It is understood that there are two kinds of "going abroad classes" in model high schools, one is set up separately for students in the third year of high school according to the needs of students and parents. The students in the class basically only participate in the examination to apply for foreign universities; The other is the international class. High schools cooperate with or introduce foreign secondary school courses. Students start learning foreign courses from senior high school and apply directly to foreign universities when they graduate from senior high school. Some high schools have both classes. (Reporter: Ma Haili)

content: 直击-科比挺身而出演空中接力甜瓜不示弱耍老鱼新浪体育讯　北京时间5月28日，NBA季后赛西部决赛第五战，湖人主场迎战丹佛掘金，此前双方的总比分为2比2，本场比赛对两支球队来说都非常的关键。半场开始之后，科比记接到费舍尔的一个妙传，直接表演了一个空中接力灌篮。随后，又是科比一个教科书般的投篮命中，帮助湖人连得5分，双方的分差缩小到1分。但马丁和琼斯的投篮又把分差扩大，湖人今晚内线的优势并不明显。安东尼也不甘示弱，面对费舍尔，他一个跨步晃过对手，投篮命中并造成老鱼犯规，2+1！(新体)
person: 老鱼,科比,费舍尔,马丁,新体,安东尼,琼斯
en: Direct hit - Kobe Bryant stands out to play the air relay. Melon is not weak. Sina Sports News On May 28, Beijing time, the fifth game of the NBA Western Conference Finals, the Lakers played against the Denver Nuggets at home. The total score of the two sides was 2-2, and this game was very important to both teams. After the beginning of the half court, Kobe remembered a wonderful pass from Fisher and directly performed an air relay dunk. Then, Kobe made another textbook shot, helping the Lakers score 5 points in a row, and the gap between the two sides narrowed to 1 point. But Martin and Jones' shots widened the gap again, and the Lakers' advantage in the interior tonight was not obvious. Anthony was not to be outdone. Facing Fisher, he took a step to get past his opponent, made a shot and caused the old fish to foul, 2+1! (New body)

content: 趣味测试：你是玫瑰还是小王子(图)独家撰稿：trickster　心理测试征稿启事地上有多少个人，天上就有多少颗星星。每一颗星星上都住着一个王子，每一个王子都守护着一朵玫瑰。人生宛如一场漫长的跋涉，翻越多少无边的沙丘，只为了寻找一口清澈的井水。你是被温柔豢养在温室里的玫瑰，还是孤独守望群星的狐狸？你是无意坠落在沙漠上的飞行员，还是游刃于生死之间的蛇？茫茫沙漠，其实是一个人心的迷宫，寻找不到我们的所爱，我们就要因为干渴而失去力量。请让魔镜带你穿越到那片遗失在人世之外的沙漠，在悲伤的童话中，找寻你的投影。(本测试不超过18道题，5个答案，系统自动跳转。仅供娱乐，非专业心理指导。)
en: Fun test: are you a rose or a little prince (picture) Exclusive manuscript: trickster's Psychological Test Invitation On the ground, there are as many stars in the sky as there are people. There is a prince living on each star, and each prince guards a rose. Life is like a long journey. Crossing countless boundless sand dunes, just to find a clear well water. Are you a rose or a fox that is gently kept in a greenhouse and guards the stars alone? Are you a pilot who accidentally fell on the desert, or a snake that is at ease between life and death? The vast desert is actually a maze of one's heart. If we can't find what we love, we will lose our strength because of thirst. Please let the magic mirror take you to the desert lost outside the world, and find your projection in the sad fairy tale. (The test consists of no more than 18 questions and 5 answers, and the system automatically jumps. For entertainment only, not professional psychological guidance.)

content: 南钢四大主力仍拒绝续约高层辟谣：从没想拖合同作为南钢五虎将之一，4日晚上，杨力与俱乐部草签了新赛季合同。于是，网上传言，南钢剩余主力队员行将就范，本周内俱乐部将一一搞定所有合同。昨天，经过本报记者多方采访，得出的结果却与网上传言大相径庭，俱乐部与剩余四将的博弈仍在继续，双方都无让步迹象。这样下去，唐正东、胡雪峰、易立和孟达四大主力缺席新赛季首场与东莞的比赛不无可能。博弈继续球员没有妥协的意思昨天某网站报道，江苏几大主力球员已经准备向南钢俱乐部妥协，并引用了一名球员的话：“就这样一份合同放在你面前，你签不签？都到这时候了，你说我们还能怎么办？”文章说，俱乐部此前采取的“各个击破”和“消耗战”都在联赛开始前一周起到了效果，“都到这份上了，能不签吗？”在这样一种情况下，球员的无奈可想而知。文中还引用了南钢俱乐部总经理王敏的话：“目前就剩下三位主力的合同还没有签订，但我们谈得不错，应该说这两天全部球员就能够签约了。”文章称，无论球员有多么不情愿，他们黑笔写下的大名最终还是要落在那份在他们看来的“不平等条约”上。实际情况真的如网文说的那样吗？昨晚，记者分别拨通了几位当事球员的电话，得到的回答同样的斩钉截铁：“我们没有妥协的意思，如果不能与俱乐部就一些细节达成一致，新赛季的第一场比赛我们很可能不打了。”主力队员孟达的话代表了几位主力的态度：“我们也等着俱乐部来跟我们沟通，现在整个工资盘子已经定了，薪水我们也就不争论了。但比如伤病等不可抗拒因素的细节问题还要等待俱乐部的明确，成绩指标上我们也有分歧，如果大唐真得不打了，第三名的成绩指标我们肯定不能接受。”记者了解到，由于几位主力球员的态度比较坚决，南钢俱乐部相关领导昨天放弃了去南钢宾馆与球员谈判。而一些媒体报道的易立和胡雪峰基本接受俱乐部合同一说，并不确切。胡雪峰、易立和孟达三人与俱乐部关于合同的博弈仍在继续，如果劳资双方各不让步，几大主力缺席新赛季首场比赛不无可能，当然，这是我们极不情愿看到的一幕。高层喊冤王敏：“从没想过拖合同”昨天，网上的一篇文章激怒了南钢俱乐部总经理王敏，这篇网文说，俱乐部总经理王敏是一种胜利者的姿态，“我们争取这两三天与他们签约，我想一定会有一个不错的结果的。”该文还称，俱乐部方面多次找球员谈实际上就是个幌子，俱乐部的说法是，“你们签不签无所谓，最后大家还是可以做朋友的。”实际上就是给球员某种“高处不胜寒”的感觉。对于这种不负责任的说法，王敏予以了强烈谴责：“首先我要申明，俱乐部与球员包括教练组关于合同谈判的态度是诚恳的，合同拖到现在没有解决，俱乐部非常着急，根本不像一些媒体说的，俱乐部无所谓，等比赛开打了，球员自然签合同。“其次，我昨天下午还与易立、胡雪峰进行了沟通，尽管一些细节双方还有分歧，但俱乐部的态度很积极。球员的一些顾虑我们也理解，俱乐部内部也在协商，争取早日解决合同问题，毕竟联赛马上开打，再拖下去，势必影响南钢新赛季的成绩。最后，俱乐部接下来几天肯定要重点解决合同的问题，决不会任凭事情发展到影响首场比赛的程度。”明天，南钢俱乐部将举行新赛季新闻发布会，王总的期望是：“争取在发布会之前解决合同问题，让所有队员全身心地投入到新赛季中去。”本报记者刁勇
person: 唐正东,刁勇,易立,胡雪峰,杨力,王敏,孟达
en: The four main players of Nansteel still refused to renew their contracts. The top management discredited the rumors. As one of the five tigers of Nansteel, Yang Li signed the new season contract with the club on the evening of the 4th. As a result, the Internet rumor has it that the remaining main players of Nansteel will be disciplined, and the club will get all the contracts done within this week. Yesterday, after the reporter of this newspaper interviewed many people, the result was quite different from the rumors on the Internet. The game between the club and the remaining four players was still going on, and neither side gave in. If this goes on, it is possible that the four main players, Tang Zhengdong, Hu Xuefeng, Yi Li and Mengda, will be absent from the first game of the new season with Dongguan. The game continued and the players did not mean to compromise. Yesterday, a website reported that several major players in Jiangsu were ready to compromise with the Nansteel Club, and quoted a player as saying: "Put a contract in front of you, will you sign it or not? At this point, what can we do?" The article said that the "divide and conquer" and "war of attrition" adopted by the club had an effect in the week before the start of the league. "At this point, can we not sign it?" Under such circumstances, the helplessness of the players can be imagined. The article also quoted Wang Min, the general manager of Nansteel Club as saying: "At present, the contracts of three main players have not been signed, but we have a good talk, and I think all the players will be able to sign the contracts in the past two days." The article said that no matter how unwilling the players were, their names written in black would eventually fall on the "unequal treaty" in their view. Is the actual situation really like what the online text says? Last night, the reporter dialed the telephone of several players concerned, and got the same answer: "We have no intention of giving in. If we can not reach an agreement with the club on some details, we may not play in the first game of the new season." The words of Mengda, the main player, represent the attitude of several main players: "We are also waiting for the club to communicate with us. Now the whole salary plate has been set, so we will not argue about the salary. However, the detailed problems such as irresistible factors such as injuries still need to wait for the club's clarification. We also have differences on performance indicators. If Datang really doesn't play, we will never accept the performance indicators of the third place." The reporter learned that the leaders of Nansteel Club gave up going to Nansteel Hotel to negotiate with the players yesterday because several main players were very firm in their attitude. However, the media reports that Yili and Hu Xuefeng have basically accepted the club's contract, which is not accurate. Hu Xuefeng, Yi Li and Mengda's game with the club about the contract is still going on. If the capital and labor do not give in to each other, it is possible that the main players will be absent from the first game of the new season, which is certainly a scene we do not want to see. The top leadership shouted injustice to Wang Min: "I never thought of dragging the contract" Yesterday, an online article infuriated Wang Min, the general manager of Nansteel. This article said that the general manager of the club, Wang Min, was a winner. "We will try to sign contracts with them in these two or three days, and I think there will be a good result." The article also said that the club's repeated attempts to find players to talk about was actually a bluff. The club said, "It doesn't matter whether you sign or not. We can still be friends in the end." In fact, it gives players a sense of "high places are not cold". Wang Min strongly condemned the irresponsible remarks: "First of all, I would like to state that the club, including the coaching group, is sincere about the contract negotiation with the players. The contract has not been solved up to now, and the club is very anxious. It is totally different from what some media say. The club doesn't care. When the game starts, the players will naturally sign a contract." Secondly, I also communicated with Yi Li and Hu Xuefeng this afternoon, and although there were some differences between the two sides on some details, the attitude of the club was very positive. We also understand some concerns of the players, and the club is also negotiating internally to solve the contract problem as soon as possible. After all, the league will start soon. If we delay further, it will inevitably affect the performance of Nansteel in the new season. Finally, the club must focus on solving the contract problem in the next few days, and will never let things develop to the point of affecting the first game." Tomorrow, Nansteel Club will hold a press conference for the new season, and President Wang hopes: "To solve the contract problem before the press conference and let all the players fully devote themselves to the new season." Ding Yong, reporter of this newspaper in Jiangsu Province

content: 网帖曝高校女生留宿男友宿舍近1年本报讯(记者罗义实习生刘菲黄金)近日，一名为“武汉某高校惊现厚脸女！与其男友在宿舍共住近一年，已逼走两位室友！”的帖子在国内各大网站论坛疯狂转载。该帖中提到，武昌某重点高校男生宿舍内，一男生的女友不仅擅自留宿长达一年，甚至在男生宿舍内开起了“夫妻网店”。由于两人“交往甚密”，“逼走”了另外两名本应在该寝室住宿的男生，在校内造成了很坏的影响。天涯网曝光帖4天点击58万次帖子中描述，该女子与其男友“晚睡晚起，相拥而眠”，每天的“主业”是在淘宝网开网店和为某网络游戏开私服。据该帖内容反映，留宿女子的男友基本不去上课，不出门活动，考试作弊，而留宿女子更是被发帖人列举了包括“直接在男生寝室上厕所”在内的十多条罪状。此外，该帖还附有两人在寝室睡觉时的照片，但照片十分模糊，从角度看，均是在门外偷拍的。发帖人称，其辅导员和书记都曾找当事人谈话，但没有效果。网上发帖是因为实在没有办法，想公之于众以解决问题。该贴经国内众多网站论坛转载，其中仅天涯论坛该帖4天来的点击率就超过58万次。在网友回复中记者看到，绝大多数网友对留宿女子和其男友的行为表示鄙视，甚至要求“人肉”该女子，有近三分之一的网友对该校宿舍管理水平表示质疑。也有部分网友认为，人们应该理性些，不要苛责学校，更不要辱骂当事的学生，“给他们改过自新的机会吧”。自称当事人校内BBS发帖澄清昨日下午，记者浏览该学校BBS发现，署名为“xiangjuzi”的网友在18日凌晨发帖称，“作为当事人之一，有几个问题我必须澄清。”该帖子对这对学生情侣身份进行了证实，以当事人的身份，对“武汉某高校惊现厚脸女！与其男友在宿舍共住近一年，已逼走两位室友！”帖子中部分有出入的观点进行了反驳后表示，“其余与事实相符”。“事件男主角已经承诺向我们道歉，可能就在近期将出去租房，女生已于近日回山东老家。”“xiangjuzi”表示，“我们三个当事男生未能及时表明立场，致使事件恶化，对此我们也负有一定的责任。”他希望，此事不要影响到学校声誉，并强调，“毕竟有点挑战道德底线的感觉，但是绝对没有部分网友臆测的那些不堪行为，请各位自重。”“女孩20多天前已搬走”昨日下午1时许，在该校4号男宿舍楼栋管理员处记者了解到，帖中所提及的男宿舍不在4号楼，而是7号楼306室。随后记者来到7号楼宿舍，楼栋管理员告诉记者，“那个女孩20多天前就已经搬走了。”该管理员承认帖子中提到的女生曾住在306男生宿舍的事实，但她称，“那个女生时来时不来，并非帖中所述的那么长时间。”管理员称，该事发生后，学校相关领导已对这对学生情侣做过工作，该宿舍原本住有4名男生，面积相对十分宽敞。搬出去住的两名学生是自愿外出租房，并非被这对学生情侣“逼”走。链接网帖细数“厚脸女”罪状原文1.直接在男生寝室上厕所；2.半年来没见过女的洗衣服、做饭、做清洁；3.没见过该女有任何underwear(内衣)晾晒在寝室附近；4.夏天在男生寝室楼解决洗澡问题；5.不参加所有期末考试；6.半年里离开男生宿舍的总时间估计不到200小时；7.几乎从不跟除她男友以外的人说话；8.两人从来都是在一张床上睡，也不拉个帘子；9.霸占他人电脑，主人回来盯着电脑也毫无感觉，继续霸占；10.辅导员找其男友谈话时仍然能够如入无人之境地上网；11.跟辅导员表示以后再也不来之后的第三天继续恢复原来的一切；12.两个室友不堪滋扰搬走后丝毫没有任何表示；13.还有很多……
en: A recent post entitled "Amazing thick skinned woman appears in a university in Wuhan! She has lived with her boyfriend in the dormitory for nearly a year, and has forced two roommates away!" has been疯狂ly reprinting on major websites and forums in China. The post mentioned that in the dormitory of male students of a key university in Wuchang, a male's girlfriend not only stayed for a whole year without permission, but also opened a "couple's online shop" in the male dormitory. Because the two "interact very closely", "forced away" two other boys who should have lived in the dormitory, causing bad influence in the school. Tianya Net Exposure Post 4 has been clicked 580000 times. The post describes that the woman and her boyfriend "sleep late and get up late, hugging each other to sleep", and their "main business" every day is to open an online shop on Taobao and open a private server for a certain online game. According to the post, the boyfriend of the woman who stays overnight basically does not go to class, does not go out to activities, and cheats in exams, while the woman who stays overnight is listed by the poster, including "going to the toilet directly in the boys' dormitory". In addition, the post also attaches a photo of the two sleeping in the dormitory, but the photo is very blurred, and it is secretly shot at the door from the perspective. The poster said that his tutor and secretary had talked with the parties concerned, but it was ineffective. The reason for posting online is that there is really no way to make it public to solve the problem. The post was reprinted by many domestic websites and forums, and the click rate of the post on Tianya Forum alone has exceeded 580000 in the past four days. In the reply of netizens, the reporter saw that the vast majority of netizens expressed contempt for the woman who stayed overnight and her boyfriend, and even asked for "human flesh" of the woman. Nearly one third of netizens questioned the management level of the school's dormitories. Some netizens also believe that people should be more rational, not to blame the school, or to insult the students involved, "give them a chance to repent". The self proclaimed party posted on the school BBS yesterday afternoon to clarify. At about 1 o'clock yesterday afternoon, the reporter learned from the administrator of the male dormitory building No. 4 of the school that the male dormitory mentioned in the post was not building No. 4, but Room 306, building No. 7. Later, the reporter came to the No.7 building dormitory, and the building administrator told the reporter, "The girl moved away more than 20 days ago." The administrator admitted that the girl mentioned in the post had lived in the male dormitory of 306, but she said, "The girl did not come when she did, not as long as the post said." The administrator said that after the incident, the school leaders had done a lot of work with the student couple, and the dormitory originally had four male students, which was very spacious. The two students who moved out to live were willing to rent a house outside, not "forced" by the student couple. Link: The original text of the online post lists the crimes of "Thick Face Girl" 1. Go to the toilet directly in the boys' dormitory; 2. I haven't seen a woman wash clothes, cook or clean for half a year; 3. I have never seen any underwear (underwear) of the woman air dried near the dormitory; 4. Solve the problem of bathing in the summer in the male dormitory building; 5. Do not participate in all final examinations; 6. The total time away from the boys' dormitory in half a year is estimated to be less than 200 hours; 7. Almost never talk to anyone but her boyfriend; 8. Two people always sleep on a bed without pulling a curtain; 9. Occupy others' computers, and the owner has no feeling when he comes back to stare at the computer, and continue to occupy them; 10. You can still surf the Internet in an unmanned way when your tutor talks to your boyfriend; 11. Continue to restore everything as before three days after indicating to the tutor that you will never come again; 12. There is no indication at all after two roommates move away due to disturbance; 13. And many other...

content: 夏雨春节在家陪袁泉待产想为BB计划家庭旅行虎年春节脚步日益临近，娱乐圈的明星们会怎样度过这个喜气洋洋的节日呢？日前，即将升级成爸爸的夏雨在接受采访时表示，春节会呆在家中陪老婆袁泉待产。他透露有计划换一辆宽敞一点的车来迎接宝宝的诞生，“全家一起出去旅游，宽敞的车会舒服一点。”。目前正在拍摄高群书新片《西风烈》的夏雨，表示春节会回北京陪老婆待产，一家“三口”开心度过。“春节可以停下来好好陪陪老婆，也会看看有关方面的书籍。毕竟是第一次当爸爸，什么都不懂。”至于袁泉目前的情况，夏雨说：“现在已经进入稳定期了，只是还不知道是男孩还是女孩。不过知不知道都无所谓，就算用机器知道也不是百分之百准确，一切都要到生下来才知道，倒不如期待那个惊喜。”
en: Xia Yu spent the Spring Festival at home with Yuan Quan to prepare for the birth of BB. He planned a family trip on the Tiger Year's Spring Festival, which is approaching. How will the stars in the entertainment industry spend this festive festival? Recently, Xia Yu, who is going to be promoted to a father, said in an interview that he would stay at home with his wife Yuan Quan during the Spring Festival. He revealed that he planned to change a spacious car to welcome the baby's birth, "It will be more comfortable for the whole family to travel in a spacious car.". Xia Yu, who is currently shooting Gao Qunshu's new film "West Wind", said that he would return to Beijing to accompany his wife in her pregnancy during the Spring Festival, and the family of "three" would spend a happy time together. "During the Spring Festival, I can stop to have a good time with my wife, and I will also read some relevant books. After all, it's the first time to be a father, so I don't know anything." As for Yuan Quan's current situation, Xia Yu said: "Now we have entered the stable period, but we don't know whether it's a boy or a girl. But it doesn't matter whether you know it or not. Even if you know it with a machine, it is not 100% accurate. Everything has to wait until it is born to know, so we might as well look forward to that surprise."

content: 每天万分之二上金所一级交易商独享延期费红利此外，这个制度还为大型机构操纵市场提供了可能。根据规则，抢到中立仓申报的机构，在交付了黄金或资金后，可以获得相应的多头和空头部位，还免收手续费。这就是说，每日15：30之后，中立仓的大资金可以不通过和对手盘交易，获得开多仓和空仓的机会。而且在上海黄金交易的规则中，限仓制度条款没有明确中立仓是否有持仓上限，拥有大型资金的实力机构通过日积月累之后完全可以做到“控盘”。业内人士认为，如果能让所有参与中立仓申报的投资者利益均沾，如果对大型机构因为申报中立仓获得的多头和空头部位进行明确的限制，相信市场将更加公平和有效率。
en: The exclusive deferred fee bonus of 0.2% per day for the top tier traders of the Gold and Gold Exchange, in addition, this system also provides possibilities for large institutions to manipulate the market. According to the rules, the institution that seizes the neutral warehouse application, after delivering gold or funds, can obtain the corresponding long and short positions, and the handling fee is exempt. This means that after 15:30 every day, the large funds of the neutral warehouse can obtain the opportunity to open long and short positions without trading with the counterparty. Moreover, in the rules of Shanghai Gold Trading, the position limit system clause does not specify whether there is a position limit for the neutral warehouse. The powerful institutions with large funds can completely "control the market" after accumulating day by day. Industry insiders believe that if all investors participating in the neutral warehouse declaration can share the benefits, and if large institutions are given clear restrictions on the long and short positions they obtain due to the declaration of the neutral warehouse, it is believed that the market will be more fair and efficient.

content: 中国国际期货：钢材期货带来1亿保证金证券时报记者秦利本报讯日前，中国国际期货公司在广东东莞举办了“第五届天然橡胶高峰论坛”。来自天然橡胶行业上下游的企业近200人参加了此次会议。中国国际期货总经理陈冬华介绍，随着新品种上市，期货市场保证金增长迅速，目前，该公司期货保证金已经由去年底的17亿元增加到目前的26亿元，仅新上市的钢材期货就带来了1亿元多的保证金。上海期货交易所市场部高级总监陈建平在会上表示，今年期货市场喜事连连，钢材和稻谷期货相继上市，加上即将上市的PVC，期货品种上市密度不断增加。在这种背景下，期货公司需要创新来促进发展，不能只为了交易量而做交易量。陈冬华指出，去年底监管层召开的多次会议已经明确了期货市场的功能，那就是为促进产业发展服务。“哪家期货公司能为产业服务到位就有发展前途，只为投机客户服务就没有发展前途。”
en: China International Futures: Steel futures brings 100 million margin security Times reporter Qin Li reported recently that China International Futures Corporation held the "Fifth Natural Rubber High-end Forum" in Dongguan, Guangdong. Nearly 200 people from enterprises in the upstream and downstream of the natural rubber industry attended the meeting. Chen Donghua, general manager of China International Futures, introduced that with the listing of new varieties, the futures market margin grew rapidly. At present, the company's futures margin has increased from 1.7 billion yuan at the end of last year to 2.6 billion yuan at present, and the newly listed steel futures has brought in more than 100 million yuan of margin. Chen Jianping, senior director of the Market Department of Shanghai Futures Exchange, said at the meeting that this year's futures market has been full of good news. Steel and rice futures have been listed one after another, and PVC, which is about to be listed, has been increasing the density of listed futures. In this context, futures companies need to innovate to promote development, and should not just do trading volume for the sake of trading volume. Chen Donghua pointed out that the multiple meetings held by the regulatory authorities at the end of last year have made it clear that the function of the futures market is to serve the development of the industrial industry. "Which futures company can serve the industrial industry has a promising future, and only serving speculative customers has no future."

content: 被传与马伊�“婚变”文章：我的婚姻没有问题本报记者孙小文文/图凭借《与青春有关的日子》、《奋斗》等剧成名的文章，俨然已经成了“80后”代言人。走下荧屏，他却是一个为买房困扰、为妻女撑起一片天的顾家男人。昨天，文章随电视剧《蜗居》剧组出现在上海，谈到《蜗居》中很多人都面对婚姻问题，他郑重其事地说：“我的婚姻没有问题。”他之所以当众这么说，皆因最近出现了有关文章与妻子马伊俐“婚变”的传闻。对此，文章嗤之以鼻：“我不去理睬这些莫名的假新闻。”文章说，他的婚姻生活非常幸福。在家里，他主外，马伊俐则是既主外又主内。曾经有段时间他太忙，女儿见了他都不要他，为此他特意反省了自己，安排更多时间陪老婆孩子。当记者问他觉得自己是不是好爸爸时，他自信地回答：“希望你有机会问我女儿这个问题时，她会说我是好爸爸。”文章说，他对“80后”男人的理解，就是要敢于挑战自己，敢于承担责任。他承认，他的角色中都有自己的影子，还有他对爱情的看法。《蜗居》里，他爱得死去活来的女朋友面对现实中的利益诱惑，最终弃他而去，文章对“她”表示理解：“每个人，不一定经过一次爱情就可以结婚生子，白头到老。只要自己心中有所坚持，相信经历过这样的挫折，反而会遇到更合适的人。”最近，文章刚拍完与李连杰合作的电影《海洋天堂》。那是李连杰“弃武从文”的首部电影，由杜可风掌镜，文章、桂纶镁等人主演。但说起这部影片，文章却有小小的遗憾：“每个年轻男演员都会梦想与李连杰痛痛快快打一场，可惜这是一部文艺片，没有打戏。”孙小文
person: 李连杰,孙小文,桂纶镁,文章,马伊�,杜可风
en: The article, which is rumored to be "marriage change" with Ma Yili: My marriage is not a problem. Sun Xiaowen, a reporter of this newspaper/figure who became famous for his play such as "Days with Youth" and "Struggle", has become the spokesman of "post-80s". However, off the screen, he is a family man who is troubled by buying a house and supports his wife and daughter. Yesterday, the article appeared in Shanghai with the crew of the TV play "Snail House". Speaking of the fact that many people in "Snail House" face marriage problems, he said seriously: "My marriage is not a problem." The reason why he said so in public is that there are rumors recently that the article and his wife Ma Yili have "marriage change". In this regard, the article sneered: "I don't care about these inexplicable fake news." The article said that his married life was very happy. At home, he is in charge of the outside world, and Ma Yili is both in charge of the outside world and the inside world. Once upon a time, he was too busy. His daughter didn't want him to see him, so he specifically reflected on himself and arranged more time to accompany his wife and children. When a reporter asked him if he thought he was a good father, he confidently answered: "I hope you have a chance to ask my daughter this question, and she will say I am a good father." The article said that his understanding of "post-80s" men is that they dare to challenge themselves and take responsibility. He admitted that his roles have their own shadow and his view on love. In "Snail House", his girlfriend who loved him to death faces the temptation of interests in reality and eventually abandons him. The article shows understanding of "her": "Everyone may not get married and have children after going through a love affair. They can grow old and white as long as they persist in their hearts. I believe that after experiencing such a setback, they will meet more suitable people." Recently, the article has just finished shooting the film "Ocean Paradise" with Li Lianjie. That was Li Lianjie's first film of "abandoning Wu from Wen", which was filmed by Du Kefeng and starred by Wen, Gwei Lunmei and others. However, speaking of this film, the article has a little regret: "Every young actor will dream of having a nice fight with Li Lianjie, but unfortunately, this is a literary film without fighting." Sun Xiaowen

content: 北京高考设123处考点比09年减少15处本报讯昨天，本市今年高考123个考点校分配完毕，由于考生数量大幅下降，今年考点校也比去年减少了15个。目前，各区县已开始对考点校的视频监控设备进行调试，高考时，“电子眼”将巡视所有考场。今年高考，是本市六年来考生最少的一次，考生只有80241人，比去年减少两万余人，降幅达到20%。考生的减少使部分区县调整了考点校的设置。据透露，东城今年共有10个考点校，比去年减少1个，西城区考点校达到14个，也有所调整。海淀区今年考生的降幅低于全市平均降幅，全市近五分之一的考生来自海淀。该区考点今年“减三增一”，根据考生的分布，三所去年考点校不再担任组考任务，在考生相对集中的地区新增一所考点校。本周，各区县将对考点校的视频监控设备、空调、广播等设备进行检查、调试，高考前全市还将两次对所有考点的“电子眼”进行联调，确保设备运转正常，高考时，教育考试远程电子巡查系统将覆盖所有考场。伴随着高考数学实现网上阅卷，今年高考本市首次实现全科网上阅卷。考生答题时，需将答案写到指定的答题卡上。网上阅卷将采取背靠背，一题两阅，如果两位老师给出的分数误差超过限度将会进行“三阅”，网上阅卷将最大限度的减少人为因素，减少核分错误率，提高效率，确保考试的公正公平。由于今年是高中新课程首次高考，试卷结构、分数分布、题型设计、阅卷方式、录取形式等都有所调整。为更好地命制高考试题，确保高考顺利，也为了测试考生对新高考的适应能力，目前本市已完成对部分区县5000多名考生应试以及网上阅卷的“模拟测试”，测试数据将为确保考试顺利提供参考。高考前，各高中校也将提醒考生注意事项，从容应考。(记者：刘昊)
en: Beijing's 123 examination centers for the college entrance examination were 15 less than 09. Yesterday, the 123 examination centers for this year's college entrance examination in the city were allocated. Because the number of examinees dropped sharply, the number of examination centers this year was 15 less than last year. At present, districts and counties have begun to adjust the video monitoring equipment of the examination center. During the college entrance examination, the "electronic eye" will patrol all examination rooms. This year's college entrance examination is the least number of examinees in six years in the city. There are only 80241 examinees, a decrease of more than 20000 from last year, a decrease of 20%. The reduction of examinees has led some districts and counties to adjust the setting of the examination center. It is revealed that Dongcheng has 10 examination centers this year, one less than last year, and Xicheng District has 14 examination centers, which has also been adjusted. The decline of examinees in this area this year is lower than the average decline in the city, and nearly one fifth of the examinees in the city come from Haidian. The examination center in this area "reduces three and increases one" this year. According to the distribution of examinees, three examination centers last year will not take the examination again, and a new examination center will be added in the area where examinees are relatively concentrated. This week, districts and counties will check and debug the video monitoring equipment, air conditioners, loudspeakers and other equipment of the examination center. Before the college entrance examination, the city will also conduct two joint adjustments of all "electronic eyes" of the examination center to ensure the normal operation of the equipment. During the college entrance examination, the remote electronic inspection system for educational examinations will cover all examination rooms. With the realization of online marking for the college entrance examination mathematics, this year's college entrance examination in the city has achieved online marking for the first time. When answering questions, candidates should write their answers on the designated answer cards. The online marking will take a back-to-back approach, with two questions read for one question. If the score given by two teachers exceeds the limit, there will be a "three reading". The online marking will minimize human factors, reduce the error rate of scoring, improve efficiency, and ensure the fairness and fairness of the examination. As this year is the first college entrance examination of the new high school curriculum, the examination paper structure, score distribution, question type design, marking method and admission form have been adjusted. In order to better prepare the college entrance examination questions and ensure the success of the college entrance examination, and to test the examinees' adaptability to the new college entrance examination, the city has completed the "simulation test" of the examination and online marking of more than 5000 examinees in some districts and counties. The test data will provide reference for ensuring the examination. Before the college entrance examination, senior high schools will also remind candidates of the matters to be paid attention to and take the examination with composure. (Reporter: Liu Hao)

content: 骗子花700元办假证骗走朋友80万现金骗人者已被警方刑拘本报吉林讯（记者姜彦艳通讯员高明众刘义平）用700元办的假证，从朋友手里骗来80万现金。磐石市公安局日前破获了一起特大合同诈骗案。受骗人老张是磐石市一家餐饮服务公司的法人代表。2008年12月，老张的好友找到老张，并介绍给他一位自己的朋友。好友说，这个开公司的朋友叫王显奎，是经营农用物资的，公司名叫吉林省磐石市伯洋农业科技有限公司，因资金周转问题想向老张借点钱，并提出支付利息。老张碍于情面应了下来，并提出用对方位于磐石市富太镇的房产做抵押。王显奎开始表示为难，后来也应允了下来。老张拿到王显奎公司的房屋产权证和土地使用证后，分别于2008年12月和2009年1月两次共借给了王显奎现金80万元。今年8月中旬，还款日期到了，老张准备向王显奎要钱。可他不但没要到钱，反而得到了伯洋农业科技有限公司的房产已被王显奎卖掉的消息。老张纳闷，“房产证、土地证都在我手里，房子怎么被卖掉？”再打电话联系王显奎，却发现对方已经关机了。老张这才觉得，自己受骗了。他先拿出王显奎抵押给自己的房产证、土地证来到了磐石市房产交易中心，经核实自己手里的房产证编号都对，可证件是假的，而此房产也真的被转让给沈阳市一家公司的磐石分公司了。证实受骗后，老张向磐石市公安局报了警。磐石警方在接到老张的报警后，迅速组织警力展开侦破工作，当天便将犯罪嫌疑人王显奎抓捕。经讯问，王显奎交代，近年来由于经营不善欠下大量外债，基本靠着拆东墙补西墙维持脆弱的资金链，在通过朋友向老张借钱时得知老张需要自己公司的房产作为抵押后，便到长春市通过做假证件的以350元一个的价格花了700元分别制作了假的房屋产权证和土地使用证，以此假证在老张处骗来80万现金。目前，王显奎已被磐石警方刑事拘留，案件在进一步审理当中。
person: 姜彦艳,高明众,王显奎,刘义平,老张
en: The liar spent 700 yuan on a fake certificate to defraud a friend of 800000 yuan. The liar has been detained by the police. Jilin News (Reporter Jiang Yan Yan, Correspondent Gao Mingzhong Liu Yiping) used a 700 yuan fake certificate to defraud 800000 yuan in cash from his friend. The Public Security Bureau of Panstone recently cracked a huge contract fraud case. Zhang, the victim, is the legal representative of a catering service company in Baoji City. In December 2008, Mr. Zhang's friend found Mr. Zhang and introduced him to one of his friends. The friend said that the friend who opened the company was called Wang Xuanqiu. He was engaged in agricultural materials. The company was called Jilin Panstone Boyang Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd. Because of the problem of capital circulation, he wanted to borrow some money from Mr. Zhang and proposed to pay interest. Zhang was caught in a dilemma and agreed, and proposed to use the property of Futaizhen, Panstone City as a mortgage. Wang Xuanqiu first said it was difficult, and later agreed. After Mr. Zhang got the house property certificate and land use certificate of Mr. Wang Xuanqiu's company, he lent Mr. Wang Xuanqiu 800000 yuan in cash twice in December 2008 and January 2009 respectively. In mid August of this year, the repayment date was due, and Mr. Zhang was ready to ask Wang Xuanqiu for money. But he didn't get the money, but he got the news that the property of Boyang Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd. had been sold by Wang Xuanqiu. Zhang was puzzled. "How can the house be sold when I have the property certificate and land certificate in my hands?" When he called Wang Xuanqiu again, he found that the other party had turned off his mobile phone. At this moment, Mr. Zhang realized that he had been cheated. He first took the property certificate and land certificate mortgaged by Wang Xuanqiu to the Panstone City Real Estate Trading Center. After verification, the property certificate number in his hand was correct, but the certificate was fake, and the property was really transferred to the Panstone Branch of a company in Shenyang. After confirming that he had been cheated, Mr. Zhang reported it to the Public Security Bureau of Baoji City. After receiving the alarm from Mr. Zhang, the Baoji police quickly organized police forces to launch an investigation. On the same day, they arrested the criminal suspect Wang Xuanqiu. After interrogation, Wang Xuanqiu confessed that in recent years, due to poor management, he owed a large amount of foreign debts, and basically relied on dismantling the east wall to make up for the fragile capital chain. When he learned from his friend that Mr. Zhang needed the property of his company as a mortgage while borrowing money from Mr. Zhang, he went to Changchun to make fake documents and spent 700 yuan at 350 yuan each to make fake house property certificates and land use certificates respectively, and used this fake certificate to defraud 800000 yuan in cash from Mr. Zhang. At present, Wang Xuanqiu has been criminally detained by the police in Panstone City, and the case is under further trial.

content: 北京晚报：网瘾者免责是天大误解11月8日，我国首部《网络成瘾诊断标准》通过专家论证，将由解放军总后勤部卫生部报批国家卫生部后，在全国各大医院，特别是三甲级医院的精神科推广使用。该标准将网络成瘾分为网络游戏成瘾、网络色情成瘾、网络关系成瘾、网络信息成瘾、网络交易成瘾五类，网络成瘾被纳入精神疾病范畴。根据《诊断标准》的描述，网瘾最直观的一项量化标准是平均每日连续使用网络时间达到或超过6个小时，且符合症状标准已达到或超过3个月。其他标准还有对网络有强烈渴求或冲动；减少或停止上网时会出现周身不适、烦躁、易激怒、注意力不集中、睡眠障碍等戒断反应；因使用网络而减少或放弃了其他的兴趣、娱乐或社交活动等。负责该课题的北京军区总医院医学成瘾科主任陶然表示，这个标准是他们4年来对3000多人进行研究之后得出的结论。如果该标准获得最终确认，我国就将是全世界第一个将网瘾列为精神疾病的国家。“中国戒除网瘾第一人”陶宏开教授公开反对《诊断标准》。根据自己对5000多个案例的研究，陶宏开表示：“网瘾不是病，更不是犯罪。我坚决反对把网瘾青少年当做精神病人治疗，给患网瘾的孩子扣上‘精神病’的帽子。”在网友中，支持者认为：“网瘾被定性为一种疾病，只代表我们以后会更专业更正式更全面地去考虑上网所引起的行为障碍，对于网络所带来的消极后果有更科学的方法去预防以及控制。”而反对者认为，“精神病的帽子能随便这么乱扣吗？那网吧岂不成了疯人院？”有网友自嘲地说：“我现在才知道，原来我是精神病啊。”“网瘾是精神病的话，那他们抢劫杀人不是都没有罪了？”网友“无知”的留言代表了不少人的观点。这个医学上的争论突然和司法问题联系在一起。在人们的印象中，精神病人犯罪可以不负法律责任，那么网络成瘾被纳入了精神病范畴，是不是意味着网络成瘾患者也不用对自己的行为承担法律责任呢？社会的质疑在现实中马上得到印证。11月10日下午，一份精神鉴定申请寄往四川省高级法院，《网络成瘾诊断标准》的第一次适用居然是以司法审判的方式出现的。21岁的四川射洪县青年胡安戈沉迷网络游戏。去年3月，他自称要做水产生意，让父母出资赞助。父亲给了他5万元钱，可胡安戈却将这些钱全用来买游戏装备。无颜面对父母的胡安戈突然有了一个荒唐的想法：“我辜负了父母的期望，不如结束他们的生命，让他们彻底解脱。”去年7月14日，他买了20包毒鼠强，放在家中的剩菜里。为了制造不在场的证据，他开车离开了家。父亲吃了掺有毒药的饭菜后中毒，所幸抢救及时，脱离了危险。
en: Beijing Evening News: On November 8, the first "Diagnosis Standard for Internet Addiction" in China was passed by experts. It will be promoted and used in the spirit departments of major hospitals across the country, especially in the top three hospitals, after being approved by the Ministry of Health of the General Logistics Department of the PLA to the Ministry of Health of the state. The standard divides Internet addiction into five categories: online game addiction, online sex addiction, online relational addiction, online information addiction and online trading addiction. Internet addiction is included in the category of mental diseases. According to the description of the "Diagnostic Criteria", the most intuitive quantification criterion for Internet addiction is that the average daily continuous network use time reaches or exceeds 6 hours, and the symptom criteria have reached or exceeded 3 months. Other criteria include strong desire or impulse for the Internet; When reducing or stopping the Internet, there will be withdrawal reactions such as malaise, irritability, irritability, inattention, sleep disorders, etc; Such as reducing or giving up other interests, entertainment or social activities due to the use of the Internet. Tao Ran, director of the Department of Medical Addiction of the General Hospital of Beijing Military Region, who is responsible for this subject, said that this standard was the conclusion of their four years' study of more than 3000 people. If the standard is finally confirmed, our country will be the first country in the world to list Internet addiction as a mental disease. Professor Tao Hongkai, the first person in China to quit Internet addiction, publicly opposed the Diagnostic Criteria. Based on his study of more than 5000 cases, Tao Hongkai said: "Internet addiction is not a disease, let alone a crime. I firmly oppose treating Internet addicted teenagers as mental patients and labeling children with Internet addiction as "mental illness". " Among netizens, supporters believe that "Internet addiction is defined as a disease, which only means that we will consider the behavioral disorders caused by the Internet in a more professional, formal and comprehensive way in the future, and have more scientific methods to prevent and control the negative consequences caused by the Internet." However, opponents believe that "Can the hat of mental illness be so chaotic? Isn't the Internet cafe a lunatic asylum?" Some netizens mock themselves: "Now I know, I'm crazy." "If Internet addiction is a mental illness, then they are not guilty of robbery and murder?" The留言of netizen "Ignorance" represents the views of many people. The medical controversy suddenly became connected with judicial problems. In people's impression, the mentally ill can escape legal responsibility for their crimes. Now that Internet addiction has been included in the category of mental diseases, does it mean that people with Internet addiction do not have to bear legal responsibility for their behavior? The social doubt was immediately confirmed in reality. On the afternoon of November 10, an application for mental identification was sent to the Sichuan Provincial High Court, and the first application of the "Internet Addiction Diagnosis Standard" was actually in the form of a judicial trial. Hu Ange, a 21 year old young man from Shehong County, Sichuan Province, is addicted to online games. Last March, he claimed that he wanted to do aquatic products business and asked his parents to sponsor him. His father gave him 50000 yuan, but Hu Ange used the money to buy game equipment. Hu Ange, who had no face to face with his parents, suddenly had an absurd idea: "I have failed my parents' expectations. It is better to end their lives and let them completely解脱." On July 14 last year, he bought 20 packets of rat poison and put them in the leftover food at home. In order to create evidence of absence, he drove away from home. Father Hu was poisoned after eating the food with poison. Fortunately, he was rescued in time and escaped from danger.

content: 趣味智力考察：照样难倒你的经典老题(图)曾几何时，也有不知多少网友对这些智力测试题乐此不疲。现在看来，它们的确可以被称作老题了。但可谓是“老汤越熬越香”，不见得就难不倒你哦！快来试试吧！最受欢迎智力的测试>>
