content: 巴克莱上调戴姆勒评级至增持新浪财经讯北京时间9月13日晚间消息，巴克莱银行将德国汽车制造商戴姆勒公司(DAI)的股票评级从“持股观望”(equal-weight)上调至“增持”(overweight)。该券商在给客户的一份研究报告中表示，自从发布第二季业绩以来，戴姆勒的股价一直低于竞争对手宝马公司，“不过，在我们看来，这低估了中国市场盈利能力的重要性，以及豪华车动态及组合的普遍改善，而梅赛德斯在这两方面的受益几乎与宝马不相上下。”(愚见)欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: Barclays upgrades Daimler to overweight Sina Finance News Beijing time. On the evening of September 13, Barclays upgraded the stock rating of Daimler (DAI), a German car manufacturer, from "wait and see" (equal weight) to "overweight". In a research report to customers, the securities company said that Daimler's stock price has been lower than that of its competitor BMW since the second quarter results were released. "However, in our view, this underestimates the importance of China's market profitability and the general improvement of the dynamics and combination of luxury cars, and Mercedes benefits almost as much as BMW in both aspects." (Foolish view) Welcome to comment

content: 梁文博成丁俊晖后中国男二号他好比未经雕琢的钻石新浪体育讯　2009年威尔士公开赛资格赛最后一轮，梁文博将与本土选手戴尔争夺一个正赛席位。在开赛之前，我们对梁文博进行一番全方面的实力评估。中国选手梁文博出生于1987年，年仅21岁的他去年年终世界排名第40位，临时排名第21位。他大胆进攻的打球风格使他赢得了勇敢无畏的这样的评价，而在世锦赛中因为搞错主持人意思提前出场的他也被媒体冠了一个外号“是去是留”。梁文博在职业赛最好的成绩是08年世锦赛的八强，这也是中国内地选手在世锦赛的最好成绩。2006年多哈亚运会，代表中国参赛的他获得了个人项目的亚军以及团体冠军，同时他也是2005年IBSF21岁锦标赛的冠军。总体评价：梁文博确立中国男二号地位默默无闻的梁文博在08年世锦赛一路过关斩将闯入八强令世人惊叹，而他强势的进攻风格也赢得谢菲尔德球迷的青睐。他首轮击败了前世界冠军达赫迪，随后决胜局险胜经验丰富的老将斯威尔，在与最终的冠军奥沙利文的对决中，梁文博也给对手造成了不小的麻烦。在赛季首个排名赛北爱尔兰的比赛中，梁文博5-0横扫前世界冠军艾伯顿闯入16强。在本赛季巴林锦标赛资格赛5-1战胜古尔德的比赛中，梁文博轰出了职业生涯的第一个147分，并且打出139分以及115分两个高分杆将对手淘汰出局。如今，梁文博已经成为中国军团排在丁俊晖之后的第二号人物。实力分析：有能力闯入前16成为明星级球员梁文博有着令人惊叹的远台进攻能力，他击球的速度以及毁灭性也令人称道。他在比赛中所表现出来淡定的态度也证明他可以处理好自己身上的压力，而他的幽默感也使得观众对这个来自东方的少年颇为喜爱。用英国媒体的话来说，如果梁文博能够闯入前16名，他完全可以成为一个明星级的球员。弱点分析：打法激进恐成其软肋在某种程度上，他激进的打法同样是他的软肋所在。梁文博无畏的进攻打法很有可能给他带来难以收拾的局面，希金斯就曾经指出，如果梁文博的球风总是这么开放，那么他在面对顶尖球手的时候是很难获得胜利的。因此，在进攻时机的选择上多加斟酌对梁文博有益无害，其次，安全球质量的提高对于他来讲也是当务之急。前景分析：天赋毋庸置疑仍需脚踏实地梁文博好比一颗未曾雕琢的钻石，毫无疑问他是一名很有天赋的选手，但是他一定要踏踏实实的做一名比赛型的选手而不是昙花一现的球员。巴林锦标赛就是一个很好的例子，在打出满分杆横扫古尔德之后，梁文博随后2-5输给了乔治。老一辈球员总告诫年轻球员要戒骄戒躁，对于梁文博来讲也是一样。经过大赛的磨炼以及自身的努力，梁文博今后会有闪光的一天。作为一名刚刚跨入职业赛的年轻选手来说，梁文博的前途一片大好，但是如何在群雄并起的年代闯出属于自己的一片天地，梁文博要学习的还有很多。临近赛季末，威尔士公开赛对于他来讲是个抢分绝佳的时机。(Matt)
person: 丁俊晖,达赫迪,艾伯顿,奥沙利文,古尔德,戴尔,希金斯,斯威尔,梁文博
en: Liang Wenbo became the second number one in China after Ding Junhui. He was like an unpolished diamond Sina Sports News In the last round of the 2009 Welsh Open qualification round, Liang Wenbo will compete with the local player Dell for a place in the main competition. Before the game, we made a comprehensive strength evaluation of Liang Wenbo. Liang Wenbo, a Chinese player born in 1987, was only 21 years old. At the end of last year, he ranked 40 in the world and 21 in the world temporarily. His bold attacking style won him the评价of being brave and fearless, and he was also nicknamed "whether to go or stay" by the media because he misunderstood the host's meaning and made an early appearance in the World Championships. Liang Wenbo's best performance in the professional competition was the top eight in the 2008 World Championships, which was also the best performance of Chinese mainland players in the World Championships. At the 2006 Doha Asian Games, he won the runner up of the individual event and the team championship on behalf of China. He was also the champion of the IBSF21 Year Championship in 2005. General evaluation: Liang Wenbo, who had been unknown, established the status of the second number one in China. Liang Wenbo, who had been unknown, amazed the world by going all the way to the top eight in the 2008 World Championships, and his strong attacking style also won the favor of Sheffield fans. In the first round, he defeated the former world champion Dahdi, and then he narrowly beat the experienced veteran Swell in the decisive game. In the battle with the eventual champion O'Sullivan, Liang Wenbo also caused some trouble to the opponent. In the first ranking match of the season in Northern Ireland, Liang Wenbo swept 5-0 world champions Eborten into the top 16. In the 5-1 victory over Gould in the Bahrain Championship qualification match of this season, Liang Wenbo scored the first 147 points of his career, and he scored 139 points and 115 points to eliminate his opponent. Now, Liang Wenbo has become the second most important figure of the Chinese army after Ding Junhui. Strength analysis:有能力to break into the top 16 and become a star player, Liang Wenbo has amazing long-term offensive ability, and his speed and destructiveness are also praiseworthy. His calm attitude in the game also proves that he can handle the pressure on himself, and his sense of humor also makes the audience love this teenager from the East very much. In the words of the British media, if Liang Wenbo can break into the top 16, he can completely become a star player. Weakness analysis: Radical play may be his weakness. To some extent, his radical play is also his weakness. Liang Wenbo's fearless attacking style is likely to bring him an uncontrollable situation. Higgins once pointed out that if Liang Wenbo's playing style is always so open, it will be difficult for him to win when facing top players. Therefore, it is beneficial for Liang Wenbo to choose the opportunity to attack carefully. Secondly, the improvement of the quality of safety balls is also an urgent task for him. Prospect analysis: There is no doubt that talent still needs to be down-to-earth. Liang Wenbo is like an unpolished diamond. There is no doubt that he is a very talented player, but he must be a game player instead of a fleeting player. The Bahrain Championship is a good example. After scoring a full score and sweeping Gould, Liang Wenbo lost 2-5 to George. The old players always warn the young players to guard against pride and impetuousness, which is the same for Liang Wenbo. After being tempered by the competition and his own efforts, Liang Wenbo will have a promising future. As a young player who has just entered the professional game, Liang Wenbo has a bright future. However, how to make his own way in the era of rising warlords, Liang Wenbo still has a lot to learn. At the end of the season, the Welsh Open is a great opportunity for him to grab points. (Matt)

content: 张柏芝否认怀孕照顾儿子婉拒做范玮琪个唱嘉宾新浪娱乐讯北京时间7月8日消息，据香港媒体报道，日前有消息说张柏芝怀孕三个月，因此婉拒担任好友范玮琪的香港个唱嘉宾，昨天(7月7日)柏芝、霆锋均通过经纪人及助手否认怀孕，柏芝经纪人说：“柏芝没有身孕，不做嘉宾是因为要照顾儿子。”而柏芝的婆婆狄波拉也表示没听说过儿媳有喜：“柏芝从台湾回来之后我们都还没见过面，因为柏芝皮肤敏感！”“她有了？”“我做婆婆的都还不知道，如果有当然好啦！柏芝很喜欢小朋友。”(鱼鱼/文)
person: 张柏芝,范玮琪,霆锋,鱼鱼,狄波拉
en: Zhang Ziyi denied that he was pregnant and took care of his son to refuse to be a guest at Faye Wong's concert. Sina Entertainment News reported on July 8, Beijing time. According to the Hong Kong media, Zhang Ziyi was three months pregnant, so he refused to serve as a guest at Faye Wong's concert in Hong Kong. Yesterday (July 7), both Bach and Tingfeng denied that he was pregnant through his agent and assistant. Bach's agent said: "Bach is not pregnant, and he does not want to be a guest because he wants to take care of his son." Bach's mother-in-law, Deborah, also said that she had never heard that her daughter-in-law was happy: "We haven't seen each other since Bach came back from Taiwan, because Bach is sensitive to skin!" "She's got it?" "I don't know yet. I'm her mother-in-law. If I have it, of course it's good! Zhang Ziyi likes children very much." (Fish/Text)

content: 瑞银大幅调降金银现货31个月目标价瑞银宣布，将黄金现货3个月平均目标价下调7.1%，至1950美元/盎司，将1个月平均目标价下调9%，至1775美元。与此同时，将白银现货3个月平均目标价下调30%，至35美元/盎司，将1个月平均目标价下调30.4%，至32美元。瑞银在研究报告中指出：“我们看好黄金的基本立场没有改变，投机仓位较轻对金价是一个重大有利因素。但是，鉴于近来贵金属市场动势萎缩，我们早先设定的未来1个月和3个月目标价显得过于激进。”瑞银还称，未来几个月中，鉴于自己预计黄金的表现将更好，金/银价比率将进一步走升。(严郑/编译)本文系译者授权新浪财经独家使用，任何媒体未经授权均不得转载。若需授权必须经新浪财经与译者本人取得联系并获得书面认可。如果私自转载本文，译者保留一切追诉的权力，直至追究私自转载者的法律责任。
en: UBS sharply cut the 31-month target price of gold and silver spot. UBS announced that it would cut the 3-month average target price of gold spot by 7.1% to $1950/oz and the 1-month average target price by 9% to $1775. At the same time, the 3-month average target price of silver spot was reduced by 30% to 35 dollars/ounce, and the 1-month average target price was reduced by 30.4% to 32 dollars. UBS pointed out in the research report: "Our basic position of being optimistic about gold has not changed, and the speculative position is a significant positive factor for the gold price. However, in view of the recent decline in the momentum of the precious metal market, the target prices set by us for the next 1 month and 3 months are too radical." UBS also said that in the coming months, given that it is expected that gold will perform better, the gold/silver price ratio will rise further. (Yan Zheng/Translation) This article is exclusively authorized by the translator for Sina Finance. No media shall reprint it without authorization. If authorization is required, Sina Finance and the translator must contact and obtain written approval. If this article is reproduced without permission, the translator reserves all rights of prosecution until the legal responsibility of the private reprinter is pursued.

content: 河南女工被冒名顶替上班10年行政机关帮助造假本报通讯员曾庆朝梅安生江维本报记者　邓红阳公民的姓名权是宪法和法律赋予每个公民的特定的人身权利，非依法定程序，任何人不得冒名顶替、篡改和使用。然而，在河南省南阳市，一名女工的姓名不仅被人冒名顶替，而且在此过程中，县教委有关人员帮助冒名顶替者伪造假档案、公安局户籍警帮助篡改姓名，使一个假身份女工，冒名顶替上班10年，变成了一名人民教师。由此，引发了一场全国罕见的侵害姓名权案。近日，此案在南阳市中级人民法院审结。冒名顶替者王爱珍、串通换档案的方城县教育体育局、篡改户籍的南阳市某区公安分局被判败诉，并向女青年尚玉冉赔礼道谦，赔偿精神抚慰金4万元。有法律专家告诉《法制日报》记者，此案中，赔偿是次要的，更重要的是相关造假者已构成徇私舞弊罪、伪造公文罪。身份信息被冒名顶替十年尚玉冉于1975年8月5日出生于南阳市方城县古庄店乡，1993年9月7日由古庄店乡迁到南阳市新华街。2007年12月17日申领居民身份证。女青年王爱珍，1971年2月30日出生于方城县杨楼乡房山村。1993年夏天，经史福长的介绍，王爱珍通过尚玉冉之父尚国富的身份关系，以尚玉冉之名报考南阳师专实用人才培训班，1995年毕业，毕业证及档案上的名字仍为“尚玉冉”，在曾用名一栏中注明为王爱珍。1997年方城县政府决定招1995年南阳师专实用人才毕业生进入教育系统工作，其中就有“尚玉冉”。1998年4月7日，方城县人劳局调“尚玉冉”等13人到教育系统上班。1998年9月4日，方城县教委分配“尚玉冉”等5人到小史店乡教办室工作，“尚玉冉”被分配到小史店第二初级中学任教，2007年9月“尚玉冉”调入小史店镇第一初级中学任教。而真正的尚玉冉则于1994年被南阳某印刷厂招为全民合同制工人，该厂自1997年开始，生产陷入停产状态，2008年6月27日申请破产，2009年8月10日被宣告破产。据法官介绍，在已称为“尚玉冉”的王爱珍被调入教育系统工作的过程中，王爱珍借用了尚玉冉的招工档案。1998年3月26日，方城县人劳局向方城县经贸委发出通知，调“尚玉冉”到教委工作。1998年3月28日，方城县印刷厂将“尚玉冉”的介绍信通知给县经贸委，1998年4月，方城县人劳局通知方城县教委为“尚玉然”办理劳动手续。2006年9月16日，王爱珍办理了姓名及身份证信息为“尚玉冉”，头像为王爱珍的二代身份证。2007年11月25日，王爱珍又办理了姓名为“尚玉然”，人口基本信息及头像为王爱珍的二代身份证。2007年11月份，真正的尚玉冉持户口本到辖区派出所办理二代身份证，但经户籍民警查证，尚玉冉身份证已办出。尚玉冉发现自己的身份证信息被王爱珍冒用后，即向有关部门举报。随后，方城县有关部门责令方城县人劳局、方城县印刷厂、方城县经贸委、方城县教体局及某公安分局对此事写出书面答复。2008年4月25日，方城县人劳局取消王爱珍的职工身份，尚玉冉仍属印刷厂。2008年8月26日，公安机关作出决定，撤销了“尚玉然”的户口。2008年9月5日，王爱珍取得临时身份证，姓名仍为王爱珍(同目前王爱珍的身份证号)。2008年10月9日，方城县教体局决定取消王爱珍顶替他人所取得的有关证书和证件。受害者起诉讨要姓名权2009年5月21日，尚玉冉以侵害姓名权为由将王爱珍诉至方城县人民法院，要求判令王爱珍、区公安分局、方城县教育体育局、方城县小史店镇第一初级中学立即停止侵权，向原告赔礼道歉，并连带赔偿原告工资损失79338元，交通费662元，精神损害7万元，共计15万元。据查，尚玉冉为高中毕业，未参加南阳师范专科学校的学习，无教师资格证；目前，尚玉冉名单在印刷厂破产后的工人名单中。2010年7月1日，方城县人民法院经审理后认为：王爱珍冒名尚玉冉的事实存在，其行为违反了法律的强行性规定，构成了对尚玉冉姓名权的侵权，在王爱珍招工录用的过程中，王爱珍使用尚玉冉的招工档案，亦构成了对尚玉冉的侵权。但因印刷厂自1997年起生产处于停滞状态，从事实上说，王爱珍的侵权并未对尚玉冉造成实质损害后果。王爱珍在办理二代证的过程中，有意涂改“然”为“冉”，主观上存在故意，也构成对尚玉冉姓名权的侵害，虽造成了尚玉冉2007年11月份不能办证的后果，但得到公安机关的及时纠正，并未给尚玉冉造成实质上的损害。因此，王爱珍侵害尚玉冉姓名权事实成立，但尚玉冉未参加教育系统工作，且自2005年起已以印刷厂下岗职工的身份享受了社会低保，因此，尚玉冉要求王爱珍赔偿其工资79338元的请求，法院不予支持，王爱珍侵犯尚玉冉的姓名权，对尚玉冉的精神造成了一定的伤害，酌定赔偿精神损害抚慰金10000元，并向尚玉冉赔礼道歉。方城县教体局在办理招生及招工的过程中审查不严，存在严重过错，在客观上同王爱珍共同实施了侵害尚玉冉姓名权的行为，依法应承担民事责任，酌定方城县教体局向尚玉冉赔偿精神损害抚慰金20000元，并赔礼道歉。南阳某公安分局在办证的过程中出现错误，但事后立即收缴并进行了更正，未造成事实上的损害，因此公安局不应承担责任。王爱珍分配到小史店二初中工作并非现在的一初中，因此小史店一初中不应承担责任。此外，尚玉冉要求王爱珍赔偿其信访路费662元，法院不予支持。尚玉冉诉求令王爱珍立即停止侵权，因公安分局已注销了“尚玉然”及头像为王爱珍、人口基本信息为尚玉冉的身份证，且方城县人劳局已注销了王爱珍冒名尚玉冉在方城县教体局的职工身份，方城县教体局也注销了王爱珍冒名尚玉冉的相关资格证书，且尚玉冉的工作关系也已被恢复到印刷厂，因此，其诉求已经得到了实际解决。二审获赔4万元精神损失费一审判决下发后，尚玉冉认为王爱珍不但侵犯了她的姓名权，也侵犯了劳动就业权，造成她十几年没有工作，无法获得报酬。在王爱珍侵权的过程中，某公安分局、教体局、一初中帮助出谋划策，共同完成侵权行为，构成共同侵权，公安分局、小史店镇一初中亦应承担民事连带赔偿其各项损失共计15万元。为此，尚玉冉提出上诉。“我使用尚玉冉姓名参加师专的实用人才培训班，是尚玉冉父亲默许并亲自操作的，没有盗用及恶意冒名的故意，不应承担赔偿精神抚慰金责任，尚玉冉在印刷厂工作在先，我进入教育系统工作在后，两人的劳动就业权利未受影响，而且由于尚玉冉起诉我，使我失去了工作，现无赔偿能力。”由此，王爱珍同时也提起上诉。方城县教体局则以“主观上没有过错，不应承担赔偿和连带责任”为由，也提起上诉。12月3日，南阳市中级人民法院二审公开审理后认为：王爱珍以尚玉冉之名报考南阳师专实用人才培训班，此后又利用尚玉冉的招工档案，获取了全民合同制教师资格，从事教育活动。王爱珍虽声称给尚玉冉之父尚国富说过并知晓，但不能认定尚玉冉本人同意使用尚玉冉姓名，侵犯了尚玉冉享有的姓名使用权，对此应承担主要过错责任；南阳某公安分局为王爱珍办理了“尚玉然”的身份证存在审查不严过错，客观上给王爱珍创造了条件，也构成了对尚玉冉的姓名侵权，应承担相应民事责任。方城县教委在招录人员时未严格按照条件审查相应的证件手续，导致王爱珍冒用尚玉冉姓名获取招生资格，日后又为其办理了调动手续，亦存在明显的过错行为，应对此承担相应责任。小史店一初中作为接收单位，主观上不存在过错，亦没有审查王爱珍冒用尚玉冉姓名的法定职责，没有侵犯尚玉冉姓名的故意和过失，对此不承担民事责任。基于以上责任认定，法院判决王爱珍向尚玉冉口头赔礼道歉并赔偿精神损害抚慰金20000元。南阳市某公安分局向尚玉冉口头赔礼道歉并赔偿精神损害抚慰金10000元。方城县教体局向尚玉冉口头赔礼道歉并赔偿精神损害抚慰金10000元。案外人语依法行政是我国依法治国战略对每个行政机关的根本要求。依照相关条例和2009年7月12日中央发布实施的《关于实行党政领导干部问责的暂行规定》的相关规定，当地纪检监察部门、组织部门，按照干部管理权限应对相关人作出免职、引咎辞职、责令辞职的行政问责，作出组织处理，以警示后人，杜绝类似事件发生。同时，单位承担民事责任外，案中相关人员已构成刑法中规定的徇私舞弊罪，也应依法追究刑事责任。
person: 史福长,尚国富,王爱珍,尚玉冉,邓红阳,曾庆朝梅安生江维
en: A female worker in Henan Province was substituted for 10 years. The administrative department helped to create fake news. Our newspaper communication correspondent Zeng Qing Chaomai Ansheng Jiang Wei Our newspaper reporter Deng Hongyang The name right of citizens is a specific personal right given to each citizen by the constitution and the law. Without the legal procedure, no one shall be allowed to take the name of another person, alter or use it. However, in Nanyang City, Henan Province, a female worker's name was not only taken in her name, but also in the process, the relevant personnel of the County Education Commission helped the fake archive to be taken in her name, and the public security bureau's household registration police helped to change her name, so that a female worker with a false identity took her name to work for 10 years, and became a people's teacher. As a result, a rare national case of infringing the right of name emerged. Recently, this case was heard and concluded by the Intermediate People's Court of Nanyang City. Wang Aizhen, who took the name of others, and the Fangcheng Education and Sports Bureau, which connived with the change of archives, and the Public Security Branch of a certain district in Nanyang, which tampered with the household registration, were sentenced to lose the case, and they apologized to the young woman Shang Yuran and compensated her with 40000 yuan for mental comfort. A legal expert told the reporter of the Legal Daily that in this case, the compensation was secondary, and more importantly, the relevant falsifiers had committed the crimes of malfeasance and falsifying public documents. Shang Yuran, whose identity information was taken in her name for ten years, was born in Guy Zhuangdian Township, Fangcheng County, Nanyang City on August 5, 1975, and moved to Xinhua Street, Nanyang City from Guy Zhuangdian Township on September 7, 1993. On December 17, 2007, he applied for a resident identity card. The young woman Wang Aizhen was born in Fangshan Village, Yanglou Township, Fangcheng County on February 30, 1971. In the summer of 1993, through the introduction of Shi Fuchang, Wang Aizhen, through the identity relationship of Shang Yuran's father Shang Guofu, applied for the training course of practical talents of Nanyang Normal College in the name of Shang Yuran, graduated in 1995, and the name on his graduation certificate and file was still "Shang Yuran", which was marked as Wang Aizhen in the column of his former name. In 1997, the Fangcheng County Government decided to recruit graduates of Nanyang Normal College of Practical Talents in 1995 to work in the education system, including "Shang Yuran". On April 7, 1998, the People's Labor Bureau of Fangcheng County transferred 13 people, including "Shang Yuru", to the education system to work. On September 4, 1998, the Education Commission of Fangcheng County assigned five people, including "Shang Yurun", to the teaching office of Xiaoshid store town. "Shang Yurun" was assigned to teach in the second junior middle school of Xiaoshid store. In September 2007, "Shang Yurun" was transferred to teach in the first junior middle school of Xiaoshid store town. However, the real Shang Yuran was recruited by a printing factory in Nanyang in 1994 as a worker under the contract of all people. Since 1997, the factory has been in a state of production suspension. On June 27, 2008, it applied for bankruptcy and was declared bankrupt on August 10, 2009. According to the judge, in the process of transferring Wang Aizhen, who has been called "Shang Yuran", to work in the education system, Wang Aizhen borrowed Shang Yuran's recruitment file. On March 26, 1998, the People's Labor Bureau of Fangcheng County issued a notice to the County Trade and Economic Commission to transfer "Shang Yuran" to the Education Commission for work. On March 28, 1998, the Fangcheng County Printing Factory notified the County Trade and Economic Commission of "Shang Yuran"Introduction letter. In April 1998, the People's Labor Bureau of Fangcheng County notified the Education Commission of Fangcheng County to arrange labor procedures for "Shang Yuran". On September 16, 2006, Wang Aizhen applied for the second generation ID card with the name and ID card information of "Shang Yuran" and the portrait of Wang Aizhen. On November 25, 2007, Wang Aizhen applied for the second generation ID card with the name of "Shang Yuran", the basic population information and the portrait of Wang Aizhen. In November 2007, the real Shang Yuran took his household registration book to the police station in the jurisdiction to apply for the second generation ID card. However, after verification by the household registration officer, Shang Yuran has got his ID card. After Shang Yuran found that his ID card information was misused by Wang Aizhen, he immediately reported it to the relevant departments. Later, the relevant departments of Fangcheng County ordered the People's Labor Bureau of Fangcheng County, the Printing Factory of Fangcheng County, the Trade and Economic Commission of Fangcheng County, the Education and Sports Bureau of Fangcheng County and a public security branch to write a written reply on this matter. On April 25, 2008, the People's Labor Bureau of Fangcheng County cancelled Wang Aizhen's employee status, and Shang Yuran still belonged to the printing factory. On August 26, 2008, the public security organ made a decision to cancel the household registration of "Shang Yuran". On September 5, 2008, Wang Aizhen obtained a temporary identity card, which was still Wang Aizhen (the same as Wang Aizhen's ID number at present). On October 9, 2008, the Fangcheng County Education and Sports Bureau decided to cancel the certificates and documents obtained by Wang Aizhen in place of others. The victim sued for his right of name. On May 21, 2009, Shang Yuran sued Wang Aizhen in the Fangcheng County People's Court for infringing his right of name, and asked the court to order Wang Aizhen, the district public security bureau, the Fangcheng County Education and Sports Bureau, and the No. 1 Junior Middle School of Xiaoshid Store Town, Fangcheng County, to immediately stop infringing his rights, apologize to the plaintiff, and pay 79338 yuan, 662 yuan, 70000 yuan for wage loss, traffic expenses, and 70000 yuan for mental damage, totaling 150000 yuan. According to the investigation, Shang Yuran graduated from high school, did not attend the study of Nanyang Normal College, and had no teacher qualification certificate; At present, Sh

content: 午后：股指创盘中低点GM下调销量预测新浪财经讯主要股指跌至盘中低点，非必需消费品板块跌幅较大。通用汽车(GM)下跌了13美分，至5.66美元。该公司十月份调整后汽车销量下降了45%，其中卡车销量下降了51%，轿车销量下降了34%。福特汽车报告十月份北美汽车销量下降了30.2%，这一结果要好于市场的下降36%的预期。美国十月份制造业指数出现下降，角逐白宫的大选已进入最后冲刺阶段。供应管理协会报告十月份制造业指数从九月份的43.5%下降至38.9%，经济学家此前的预期为降至41.5%。商务部报告，九月份建筑开支下降了0.3%，这一结果低于许多经济学家的下降0.8%的预期。截至美东时间下午2：30(北京时间凌晨3：30)，道琼斯工业平均指数下跌了30.83点，至9294.18点，跌幅为0.33%。道指30种成份股中共有18只股票上涨。AT&TInc.上涨了4.3%，VerizonCommunications上涨了3.1%。迪士尼下跌了5.9%。标准普尔500指数下跌了5.54点，至962.21点，跌幅为0.61%；纳斯达克综合指数上涨了2.82点，至1723.81点，涨幅为0.18%。标准普尔10大行业板块中电讯服务板块涨幅居前，SprintNextel上涨了29.1%。零售板块涨跌互见，零售商将于本周发布上月的销售额业绩。能源板块跌幅较大，哈里伯顿下跌了8.6%。三月期银行同业拆借的利率连续第16天下降，目前已低于3%。HinsdaleAssociate投资者部经理保罗-诺尔特(PaulNolte)表示，“信贷市场已经出现缓解迹象，但未来三至六个月甚至更长时间内的经济数据不会很好，上市公司的盈利形势也不容乐观。”美国总统大选的结果也将是市场焦点。《华尔街日报》与NBC新闻的一项调查显示，参议员奥巴马以51%对43%优势领先于麦凯恩。大选日为周二。月度汽车销量报告即将公布，市场预计通用汽车(GM)销量最多下降50%，通用汽车上涨了1.7%。MorganKeggan&Co.固定收益部门主管凯文-吉迪斯(KevinGiddis)表示，“由于汽车贷款审查变得更为严格以及经济形势变得更为严峻，我认为十月份汽车销量将很难超越九月份的190万辆。”有两家道指成份股评级被调整。JP摩根将沃尔玛(WMT)评级上调至“超配”、高盛将波音(BA)评级调降至“确信卖出”。沃尔玛上涨了1.9%，波音下跌了0.9%。固特异(GT)上涨了9.8%，这一轮胎制造商第三财季利润大幅下降，但仍好于预期。航天技术公司RockwellCollinsInc.(COL)表示，第四财季利润增长了17%，但该公司还下调了2009年业绩预报。该股上涨了0.9%。VeraSunEnergy(VSE)上周五宣布将申请破产保护，该股当前股价已不足1美元。原油期货在上周上涨了近6%后，当前有所下跌。纽约商业交易所主力合约下跌了2.61美元，至每桶65.20美元。黄金期货三个交易来首次上扬，黄金期货上月创25年来最大跌幅。纽约商业交易所十二月份交割的黄金期货上涨了10.40美元，至每盎司728.60美元。国债市场有所攀升，主力品种收益率下滑。伦敦富时100指数上涨了0.4%，香港恒生指数上涨了2.7%，日本股市周一休市。
person: 凯文-吉迪斯,保罗-诺尔特
en: In the afternoon: the stock index hit an intra-day low, GM cut its sales forecast. Sina Finance reported that the main stock index fell to an intra-day low, and the non-essential consumer goods sector fell significantly. General Motors (GM) fell 13 cents to $5.66. In October, the company's adjusted auto sales fell 45%, with truck sales down 51% and car sales down 34%. Ford Motor reported that North American auto sales in October fell 30.2%, better than the market's decline of 36%. The manufacturing index in the United States fell in October, and the presidential election has entered the final sprint stage. The Institute for Supply Management reported that the manufacturing index in October fell from 43.5% in September to 38.9%, lower than the previous expectation of 41.5%. The Ministry of Commerce reported that construction spending in September fell 0.3%, below the 0.8% decline expected by many economists. At 2:30 p.m. Eastern Time (3:30 a.m. Beijing Time), the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 30.83 points to 9294.18, a decrease of 0.33%. There were 18 stocks of 30 components of the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose. AT&TInc. rose 4.3% and Verizon Communications rose 3.1%. Disney fell 5.9%. The S & P 500 Index fell 5.54 points to 962.21, down 0.61%; The Nasdaq Composite Index rose 2.82 points, or 0.18%, to 1723.81. The telecommunications service sector of the S & P 10 major industrial sectors rose the most, with Sprint Nextel up 29.1%. Retail sector rose and fell, and retailers will release last month's sales performance this week. The energy sector fell significantly, with Halliburton down 8.6%. The interest rate of the three-month interbank loan of the bank has fallen for 16 consecutive days, and it is now less than 3%. Paul Nolte, manager of the Hinsdale Associate Investment Department, said, "There are signs of easing in the credit market, but the economic data in the next three to six months or even longer will not be good, and the profit situation of listed companies is not optimistic." The result of the US presidential election will also be the focus of the market. A survey by the Wall Street Journal and NBC News showed that Senator Obama had a 51% to 43% lead over McCain. Election Day is Tuesday. The monthly auto sales report is about to be released, and the market expects GM's sales to fall by up to 50%, and GM rose 1.7%. Kevin Giddis (Kevin Giddis), head of the fixed income department of Morgan Kegan & Co., said, "I think auto sales in October will be hard to exceed 1.9 million in September because auto loan review has become more stringent and the economic situation has become more severe." Two Dow component ratings were adjusted. JPMorgan Chase upgraded Wal Mart (WMT) to "overweight" and Goldman Sachs downgraded Boeing (BA) to "confident sell". Wal Mart rose 1.9% and Boeing fell 0.9%. Goodyear (GT) rose 9.8%, and the tire manufacturer's profit in the third quarter fell sharply, but it was still better than expected. Rockwell Collins Inc. (COL), an aerospace technology company, said that the profit in the fourth fiscal quarter increased by 17%, but the company also downgraded its 2009 earnings forecast. The stock rose 0.9%. VeraSun Energy (VSE) announced last Friday that it would apply for bankruptcy protection, and the current stock price is less than 1 dollar. Crude oil futures fell at present after rising nearly 6% last week. The main contract of the New York Mercantile Exchange fell 2.61 dollars to 65.20 dollars per barrel. Gold futures rose for the first time in three trading days, and gold futures hit the biggest decline in 25 years last month. The gold futures contract for delivery in December in the New York Mercantile Exchange rose 10.40 US dollars to 728.60 US dollars per ounce. The bond market rose, and the yield of the main variety fell. The London FTSE 100 Index rose 0.4%, the Hong Kong Hang Seng Index rose 2.7%, and the Japanese stock market is closed on Monday.

content: 渤海证券：政策刺激带来结构性机会证券通周边市场的大幅反弹为国内市场的继续上涨提供了良好的外部环境，截止上周五，上证综指收于2374.44点，上涨93.35点，涨幅达4.09%；而深证成指则收于8994.15点，上涨346.64点，涨幅达4.01%。指数上涨的同时两市成交量继续放大，全周共成交11106.4亿元，较前一周放大近三成。就本周市场走势来看，由于权重板块银行股的启动，确实为市场向上的突破增加了动力与信心，再加上目前市场热点轮动较为顺畅，预计本周股指突破前高2402点的可能性较大。但特别需要注意的是，此波股指的反弹虽然量能随着上涨出现放大，但创新高时量能也应创出新高，特别是在银行、地产等权重板块发力的情况下，量能更应明显放大，否则不排除为诱多行情的可能。市场热点方面，随着消息面的变化，银行、新上海、太阳能、钢铁等板块明显受到场外资金的关注，而有色金属板块上周更是放量大幅震荡。我们坚持对金融危机下世界需求严重萎缩与前期涨幅巨大的有色金属保持高度警惕的观点，而短线看好兼具世博会、国际金融中心、国际航运中心等多种利好预期的新上海板块。
en: Bohai Securities: policy stimulation brings structural opportunities. The sharp rebound of the surrounding market provides a good external environment for the continued rise of the domestic market. As of last Friday, the Shanghai Composite Index closed at 2374.44, up 93.35, or 4.09%; The Shenzhen Composite Index closed at 8994.15, up 346.64, or 4.01%. While the index rose, the trading volume of the two cities continued to expand, with a total trading volume of 1110.64 billion yuan for the whole week, nearly 30% higher than the previous week. In terms of the market trend this week, due to the launch of the weighted banking sector, it really adds momentum and confidence to the market's upward breakthrough. In addition, the current market hot spot rotation is relatively smooth, so it is expected that the stock index will have a greater possibility of breaking the previous high of 2402 this week. But it is worth noting that although the rebound of this wave of stock indexes has increased with the increase, the energy should also reach a new high when it hits a new high, especially in the case of the weighted sectors such as banking, real estate, etc., the energy should be significantly increased, otherwise, it is not ruled out that there may be an induced multi market. In terms of market hot spots, with the change of the news, the banking, new Shanghai, solar energy, steel and other sectors have obviously received the attention of off-site funds, while the nonferrous metal sector last week released a large volume of shocks. We insisted on being highly vigilant about the serious shrinkage of world demand under the financial crisis and the huge increase in nonferrous metals in the earlier period, and we were optimistic about the new Shanghai sector, which has a variety of favorable expectations such as the World Expo, the international financial center and the international shipping center, in the short term.

content: 安徽省考试院：一本征集志愿7月19日填报2010全国高考报道媒体联盟：《安徽商报》联合新浪教育同步报道记者昨日从省考试院了解到，文理科一本批次平行志愿已于昨晚完成录取。预计今天上午，省考试院将公布部分一本院校征集计划。该批次的征集志愿也将于今天10：00~16：00填报。省考试院提醒考生，对于普通文理科一本线上未被录取的考生和线下20分之内的考生来说，要在一本征集志愿的院校和二本院校之间作出选择。如果宁愿走二本院校而不愿被征集志愿的一本院校录取，考生就不要填报征集志愿或降分征集志愿。因为如果被一本院校录取，就不能再参加后面二本批次的录取了。预计今日上午，省考试院将公布部分一本院校征集计划。考生可登录安徽教育网(http://www.ahedu.gov.cn)和安徽招生考试网(http://www.ahzsks.cn)查询。一本批次录取将于7月21日结束。(徐蒙蒙、武静)
en: Anhui Provincial Examination Institute: A book to collect volunteers on July 19, 2010 National College Entrance Examination Media Alliance: Anhui Business News and Sina Education reported synchronously. Yesterday, I learned from the Provincial Examination Institute that the parallel volunteers of the liberal arts and science batch had been completed last night. It is expected that this morning, the Provincial Examination Institute will announce the collection plan of some universities. The batch of volunteer applications will also be filled in from 10:00 to 16:00 today. The Provincial Examination Institute reminds candidates that for candidates who have not been accepted by the general liberal arts and science books and candidates within 20 points below the line, they should make a choice between the universities of the Book One collection volunteers and the universities of the Book Two. If you would rather go to the second batch of colleges and universities than be accepted by the first batch of colleges and universities that collect volunteers, you should not fill in the volunteer collection or demerit collection. Because if you are accepted by a university, you will not be able to participate in the second batch of two schools for acceptance. It is expected that this morning, the Provincial Examination Institute will announce the collection plan of some key universities. Candidates can log in to Anhui Education Network (http://www.ahedu.gov.cn) and Anhui招生考试网 (http://www.ahzsks.cn) for inquiry. The first batch of admissions will end on July 21. (Xu Mengmeng, Wu Jing)

content: 乔治克鲁尼受够被逼婚扬言不再出席记者会新浪娱乐讯北京时间2010年1月1日消息，据台湾媒体报道，好莱坞男星乔治-克鲁尼受够了每次受访都得回答一些记者提出“何时要结婚？”之类的蠢问题，决定新年开始不再参加记者会，只接受少数经过滤后的访问。爱搞笑的乔治-克鲁尼虽然常以幽默耍宝的方式面对媒体提问，但经常被问些他不愿回答的无聊事，他受不了。日前他在接受权威的《娱乐周刊》访问时表示：当你在事业上已具有一席之地，别人也知道你是谁，这就够了，“我不想变得更有名。更何况电影卖座往往是靠影片本身，与我没什么关系。”他坚持不再出席电影记者会，就连最近推出的新片《直上云霄》都把宣传受访的工作交给其他演员。不过乔治-克鲁尼并未因此自绝于观众，他笑着说，“我还是会参加红地毯活动，但记者会就谢谢啦。我只把重点放在少数聪明的访问，让每个能够访问到我的人都觉得很难得。”或许因为推掉不少宣传记者会，乔治-克鲁尼在最近和女友伊莉莎贝塔-卡娜丽斯(ElisabettaCanalis)及朋友们在墨西哥度年假，享受轻松的热带假期。(俐俐/文)
person: 伊莉莎贝塔-卡娜丽斯,乔治克鲁尼,俐俐,ElisabettaCanalis,乔治
en: George Clooney is fed up with being forced to get married and threatens not to attend press conferences. Sina Entertainment News reported on January 1, 2010 (Beijing time). According to Taiwan media reports, Hollywood actor George Clooney is tired of having to answer some silly questions such as "When to get married?" asked by journalists every time he is interviewed. He decided not to attend press conferences at the beginning of the new year, but only to accept a few filtered interviews. George Clooney, who loves to joke, often faces media questions in a humorous way, but he can't stand being asked some boring questions that he is unwilling to answer. Recently, when he was interviewed by the authoritative "Entertainment Weekly", he said: When you have a place in your career and others know who you are, it is enough. "I don't want to be more famous. Moreover, the success of a film often depends on the film itself, which has nothing to do with me." He insisted on not attending the film press conference, and even handed over the publicity and interview work to other actors for the new film "Straight to the Sky" recently launched. However, George Clooney did not cut himself off from the audience. He said with a smile, "I will still attend the red carpet activities, but thank you for the press conference. I only focus on a few smart visits, so that everyone who can visit me feels very rare." Perhaps because he has rejected a lot of publicity press conferences, George Clooney recently spent his New Year's holiday with his girlfriend Elisabetta Canalis and his friends in Mexico to enjoy a relaxing tropical holiday. (Li Li/Text)

content: 辰亦儒与粉丝庆生汪东城越洋贺寿(组图)新浪娱乐讯北京时间11月9日香港消息，11月10日乃飞轮海成员辰亦儒(Calvin)30岁的生日，他7日特意抽空从台湾来香港，首度在港举行生日会，与220名来自中、港、韩、日等地的歌迷预祝生日。生日会上好兄弟汪东城(大东)致电恭贺，与在场歌迷合唱生日歌，并送上围巾做礼物，令辰亦儒感动不已！辰亦儒11月7日首度在港举行生日会，虽然世界各地的歌迷都想和偶像庆生，但奈何场地问题，最终只能招待220名来自中、港、韩、日等地的歌迷。有份入场的歌迷除预备生日蛋糕外，更准备了人形抱枕、小熊玩偶、红鸡蛋及鲜花等摆满一整张长桌的礼物送给偶像，令辰亦儒喜出望外！而辰亦儒也很有心思预备了亲笔签名毛巾、T恤及感谢卡回赠歌迷，有幸抽中礼物的歌迷更可与偶像合照留念，歌迷都争取机会搂着辰亦儒不放！此外，生日会上好兄弟大东致电恭贺，更通过电话带领在场220位歌迷一起唱生日歌，之后工作人员就送上大东一早托他们带来香港的古姿(Gucci)围巾给辰亦儒做生日礼物，令他感动不已！曾在飞机上睡觉被偷拍的辰亦儒收到围巾后满意地笑说?“我可以用来盖着(头)，以后在飞机上可以光明正大地睡觉了！”30而立诚征女友问到今年的生日愿望，辰亦儒说?“今年生日感触很大，男人要30而立！从前我想过要30岁成家立室，现在希望能在35岁前吧！(家人可有催促？)刚出道时没有，现在出道5年，爸爸开始有了！(有对象了吗？)就是没有啊！(要求太高？)其实我只想找一个人生观和价值观相同、能沟通的女生，最重要是孝顺，外形国籍都不重要！好像从前我曾和一位韩籍女友拍拖，虽然大家只用英语沟通，但相处得很好。”另外，生日会后辰亦儒随即飞返台湾，因为要赶回去出席公益慈善活动，而10日就会一如以往跟家人吃饭庆祝。由于吴尊仍在上海工作，故稍后才会和飞轮海另外三子吃饭补祝。
person: 大东,辰亦儒,汪东城,吴尊
en: Chen Yuhua celebrates his birthday with fans. Wang Dongcheng congratulates him on his birthday. Sina Entertainment News reported on November 9, Hong Kong time. November 10 was the 30th birthday of Chen Yuhua (Calvin), a member of the Flying Wheel Sea. On the 7th, he特意took time out from Taiwan to come to Hong Kong for the first time to hold a birthday party in Hong Kong, and celebrated his birthday with 220 fans from China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Japan and other places. Chen Yuhua was so moved that Chen Yuhua held his first birthday party in Hong Kong on November 7. Although fans from all over the world wanted to celebrate with their idols, unfortunately, due to the venue problem, we could only invite 220 fans from China, Hong Kong, South Korea, Japan and other places. Fans who have tickets to enter the venue prepare birthday cakes, human shaped pillows, bear dolls, red eggs, flowers and other gifts for idols, which is filled with a long table to make Chen Yuhua happy! Chen Yuhua also thoughtfully prepared autographed towels, T-shirts and thank-you cards to give back to fans. Fans who are lucky enough to win gifts can take photos with their idols. Fans are struggling to hold Chen Yuhua! In addition, the good brothers Dawei called to congratulate each other at the birthday party, and led the 220 fans present to sing birthday songs together through the phone. Later, the staff gave Chen Yuhua a Gucci scarf from Hong Kong as a birthday present, which made him very moved! Chen Yuhua, who was photographed while sleeping on the plane, smiled happily after receiving the scarf? "I can use it to cover (head), and I can sleep openly on the plane in the future!" At the age of 30, he sincerely asked for a girlfriend. When asked about this year's birthday wish, Chen Yuhua said? "This year's birthday is very touching. A man must be 30 years old! In the past, I wanted to get married at the age of 30, and now I hope I can do it before 35! (Can the family urge?) No, when I just started my career, now I have been in the industry for 5 years, my father has started! (Have you got an object yet?) No! (Too much to ask?) In fact, I just want to find a girl with the same outlook on life and values, who can communicate, and the most important thing is filial piety. Appearance and nationality are not important! It seems that I once dated with a Korean girlfriend. Although we only communicate in English, we get along very well

content: 时尚网络团购受追捧门窗企业响应消费革命E时代，高速发展的互联网的正逐步融入传统生活的方方面面，其中就包括消费方式的变革。网购消费已快速流行开来，网络商店、网上银行之类人们都耳熟能详，许多时尚的年轻消费者更是对这种新型消费方式推崇至极。而眼下，网络购物中逐渐掀起“团购潮”，而且越来越多的消费者希望加入网络团购，享受到“批发价”的实惠。尽管团购还没有成为主流的消费模式，但它所具有的爆炸力已逐渐显露出来。作为一个与时俱进的企业，这个信息是绝对不能忽视的。随着网络进一步普及，网络团购将更加普遍，市场也将继续扩大，前景不可限量。想要扩大市场占有率，网络团购这个渠道却不可轻视！在今顶，网络团购成功案例已为数不少，并仍风风火火的继续着，可以说发展势头良好。仔细分析团购，现在商家较多运用的网购模式主要是通过互联网平台，由专业团购机构将具有相同购买意向的零散消费者集合起来，向厂商进行大批量购买。它的核心优势体现在更为优惠的商品价格。价格更优惠了，利润自然下降，这也是很多厂家、商家不愿意参加网络团购的最大原因！对于这个问题，有门窗企业给出了很好的答案！团购的成功与否，和商家前期准备是否充分密不可分，价格策略便是其中至关重要的部分！团购价格必须优惠，但是怎么优惠，如何在保住利润的基础上又能吸引消费者购买，这是商家该深入考虑的问题，毕竟在价格面前，首先商家是掌握主动权的一方！部分代理商还分享了他们的团购成功经验，如何制定巧妙、有效地价格策略，如何营造团购现场氛围等等。同时代理商们认为，团购是大势所趋，随着人们对网络越来越依赖，当他们想要买一样东西的时候，第一时间想起来的便是上网！另一方面，商家做团购，也是一种招揽人气，提高品牌知名度和影响力的有效手段！网络团购这种消费方式已经成为一种不可逆转的潮流，厂商应做的就是顺应、并推动这种潮流的发展，抓住这个商机，寻求新的突破！
en: The fashion web group buying is welcomed by the window and door enterprises in response to the consumer revolution in the era of E. The rapidly developing Internet is gradually integrating into all aspects of traditional life, including the transformation of consumption mode. Online shopping has rapidly become popular, and online stores and online banks are all well known to people. Many fashionable young consumers are extremely enthusiastic about this new consumption mode. At present, a "group buying tide" is gradually rising in online shopping, and more and more consumers hope to join the online group buying and enjoy the benefits of "wholesale price". Although group buying has not become the mainstream consumption model, its explosive power has gradually become apparent. As a progressive enterprise, this information cannot be ignored. With the further popularity of the network, network group buying will be more common, the market will continue to expand, and the prospects are limitless. If you want to expand the market share, you can't take the channel of online group buying lightly! Today, there are many successful cases of online group buying, which is still going on in a big way. It can be said that the development momentum is good. Carefully analyzing group buying, the online shopping model mainly used by merchants now is mainly to gather scattered consumers with the same purchase intention through the Internet platform, and then purchase in large quantities from the manufacturer. Its core advantage lies in the more preferential commodity price. The price is more favorable, and the profit naturally decreases, which is the main reason why many manufacturers and merchants are unwilling to participate in online group buying! For this problem, the window and door enterprises have given a good answer! The success or failure of group buying is inextricably linked with the preparation of merchants in the early stage, and the price strategy is the most important part of it! Group buying prices must be discounted, but how to discount them and how to attract consumers to purchase on the basis of keeping profits is a problem that businessmen should consider deeply. After all, businessmen are the first ones who have the initiative in the face of prices! Some agents also shared their successful experience in group buying, such as how to formulate clever and effective price strategies, how to create a group buying atmosphere, and so on. At the same time, the agents believe that group buying is the general trend. With people's growing dependence on the Internet, the first thing they think of is to surf the Internet when they want to buy something! On the other hand, group buying by merchants is also an effective way to attract people's attention, improve brand popularity and influence! The consumption mode of online group buying has become an irreversible trend. Manufacturers should follow and promote the development of this trend, seize the business opportunity and seek new breakthroughs!

content: 美就业刺激计划推涨大宗商品煤飞色舞机会再现记者彭浩编者按：百转千回，被喻为变相的第三次量化宽松(QE3)——美国4470亿美元的就业刺激方案最终出台。回顾前两轮宽松的货币政策不难发现，全球流动性过剩和投资需求增强是大宗商品价格上涨的主力。而与大宗商品走势密切联动的煤炭和有色板块，在刺激政策的提振下，A股市场“煤”飞“色”舞则是老戏码。美国刺激计划被喻为变相QE3百转千回，被喻为变相的第三次量化宽松(QE3)——美国大规模的就业刺激方案最终出台。美国总统奥巴马在本周四(北京时间)迫不及待地向外界透露了即将推出的4470亿美元刺激计划，远超出市场预期的3000亿美元。本周五(北京时间)，奥巴马会公布刺激计划的详细内容。但对于资本市场而言，投资人关心的并不是详细内容，而是关心这笔钱究竟从哪里来？这是一个变相的QE3吗？在美国时间周四，即北京时间周五晚上，不仅仅奥巴马会详细阐述这个刺激计划，美联储主席伯南克也会在当天发表讲话。听听伯南克怎么说，就知道这4470亿究竟是不是变相的QE3了。早在8月10日，美联储便指出，美国经济的增长率明显低于预期，预计未来经济的复苏将更为缓慢，就业增长将颇为疲软，目前美联储正在讨论其他的政策工具。外加奥巴马连番“预告”的经济刺激计划，这使人不得不推测，变相的QE3已经开始启动。国务院发展研究中心企业研究所副所长张文魁最近表示，美国和欧洲是通过凯恩斯主义的方法来拉动经济，以前是靠金融体系、靠央行、靠美联储来刺激，这样会导致美国的QE3或者是变相的QE3一定会推出的。资金重返大宗商品市场对于奥巴马出炉的就业刺激计划，市场的反应比较乐观。投资者纷纷重返股市和大宗商品市场，其中一些投资者选择卖出黄金等避险资产、买入高风险资产。美国时间9月7日，美国三大股指上涨，交投最活跃的12月黄金期货结算价跌幅3%。纽约石油近来已经有一个反弹，也是对于量化宽松的憧憬。所谓量化宽松，是指央行通过购买国债等中长期债券，增加基础货币供给。例如前两次量化宽松，都是美联储自己印钞票，然后买美国政府发行的国债，美国政府拿到钱后去刺激经济。其关键点在于，这个世界平白无故地多了很多的美元，美元泛滥将导致通胀。回顾前两轮宽松的货币政策，投资者可以发现，全球流动性过剩和投资需求增强是大宗商品价格上涨的主导力量。美国于2010年11月宣布实行规模为6000亿美元的第二轮量化宽松货币政策(QE2)。美联储在执行QE2过程中投放的大量流动性并没有完全进入实体经济，而是有很大一部分进入了国际大宗商品市场，特别是涌入资源性产品市场和部分农产品市场，从而推动价格上涨。而与大宗商品走势密切相关的煤炭和有色板块，在刺激政策的提振下，A股市场“煤”飞“色”舞则是老戏码。旺季来临煤炭“起飞”煤炭股去年9至10月曾?升，当时受到季节性、通胀预期、QE2、节能减排年底结束等因素所刺激。此时，煤炭股再次受到同样的季节性及美国就业刺激计划等因素的提振。中金公司9月6日发布煤炭行业研究报告，表示煤炭股季节性行情有望逐步启动，期待显著的相对收益。动力煤价格有望企稳反弹，原因是下游行业补库存需求和9、10月份通常是电厂冬季备煤时段。焦煤价格则随钢铁业步入旺季而有望小幅反弹。“由于欧债危机恶化、国内经济放缓和紧缩政策持续等原因，短期煤炭板块仍面临一定压力，但良好的盈利确定性和即将到来的季节性行情将使煤炭板块有望跑赢大盘。”中金公司指出，如果欧债问题取得进展或美国推出经济刺激计划，煤炭板块有望出现可观行情。在具体投资标的方面，中金公司推荐中国神华(601088)、兖州煤业(600188)、中煤能源(601898)、潞安环能(601699)和兰花科创(600123)。其实，目前煤炭板块估值已处于较低水平。统计数据显示，截至目前，申万煤炭开采板块的平均市盈率为15.42倍，自2000年以来的平均值为28.92倍；市净率为3.43倍，自2000年以来的平均值为4.78倍；预测市盈率方面，煤炭板块2011年、2012预测市盈率分别为13.87倍、11.72倍。有色随大宗商品“舞动”回顾去年，在美联储推出第二轮数量宽松政策后，资本市场更是开始了新一轮的大涨，尤其是大宗商品市场。放眼当下，投行摩根士丹利称，在周五和周六的G7财长和央行行长会议上，主要经济体可能联手采取一系列的救市行动。大摩预计，美、欧、日和英国央行可能在周末的会议上宣布联手放松货币政策，比如降息或是加大量化宽松。大摩的分析师表示，当前经济增长疲软以及资产价格持续大跌间形成的恶性循环，使得各国更有可能采取联合的货币政策干预行动。此前，有外媒引述知情人士的话报道称，各国可能在这次G7会议上维持刺激性的货币政策，并在允许的情况下，放慢一些国家的财政收紧步伐。对于股市而言，预期先行，也就是流动性可能在达到极致后迎来的放松边际，对持续受压制的有色板块当然是大利好。另外，美国即将推出的4470亿美元刺激计划为大宗商品市场走强注入强心针。此前，受累于美国评级下调，欧债危机爆发，有色商品价格下跌，导致国内的有色板块出现连续暴跌，不少品种短期跌幅超20%，在相关利好预期刺激下，从历史经验来看，跌幅较大的板块短期面临较大的反弹空间。近期磷矿资源类个股表现出色，有望重新激发市场对同属稀缺资源的有色板块的热情。重点公司云海金属(002182)云海金属董事长梅小明在9月7日的网上说明会上表示，公司年初至今接订单较去年同期有增长，明年公司计划铝镁合金销售规模进一步提高，并以效益为中心，通过多种方式量化成本控制。同时，云海金属董秘吴剑飞表示，目前公司暂无股权激励计划。公司将集中精力做好现有业务，暂无战略性并购重组的想法。对于未来经营情况，公司预计，2011年1-9月归属于上市公司股东的净利润比上年同期下降幅度小于50%。对于业绩变动的原因，公司称铝合金销售量增长不如预期，以及财务费用比较高。资金流向：E投资金融终端显示，昨日主力资金净流入2724万元，而最近5个交易日录得资金净流入2920万元，最近10个交易日录得资金净流入2551万元。株冶集团(600961)“企业用电受到限制，但总产量却不降反增，这是创新发展方式的结果。”株冶集团负责人近期谈到，仅电力成本一项，今年前7个月，株冶集团就增加成本5000万元。在铅锌主产品盈利空间低的情况下，我们利用现有的优势，从冶炼废弃物中提高金、银等有价金属的回收率。今年1-8月份，株冶完成销售收入80多亿元，比去年同期增长8.5%，铅锌总产量39.5万吨，预计全年产量60万吨，全年销售收入达110亿元。记者发现，株冶集团增产却不增收，今年上半年还处于亏损状态。尽管业绩不尽人意，但前期连续调整的株冶集团表现有所回暖，该股本周涨幅已经接近10%。资金流向：E投资金融终端显示，昨日主力资金净流出302万元，而最近5个交易日录得资金净流入1096万元，最近10个交易日录得资金净流出1069万元。兰花科创(600123)对于兰花科创亚美大宁矿可能在9月份启动复产的传闻，兰花科创证券部工作人员回应称，现在还处于换证阶段，具体进度还不好说，但年内复产肯定是没问题的。兰花科创方面表示，目前双方正在积极办理亚美大宁公司采矿权许可证、安全生产许可证和其他证照的换发，延期、年检、更新等工作，推动亚美大宁公司尽快复产。根据多家机构的预测，以兰花科创原有36%的持股比例计算，若山西亚美大宁近期恢复产能至200万吨，可为兰花科创贡献每股收益近0.4元；该矿目前可具备500至600万吨产能；若2012年产量达到500万吨，则全年可为公司贡献每股收益近1元。资金流向：E投资金融终端显示，昨日主力资金净流入263万元，而最近5个交易日录得资金净流出1754万元，最近10个交易日录得资金净流出4338万元。昊华能源(601101)根据公告，京东方计划投资220亿元到内蒙古鄂尔多斯投资5.5代AM-OLED有机发光显示器件生产线，当地政府将配置呼吉尔特矿区巴彦淖井田总量不低于10亿吨储量的煤矿，京东方将向昊华能源转让能源项目的控股股权，与昊华能源共同开发该煤炭资源。昊华能源目前拥有储量约25亿吨(其中位于鄂尔多斯的高家梁和红庆梁煤矿储量合计21.8亿吨)，权益储量19亿吨。长江证券分析，该项投资完成后公司的权益储量新增至少27%。预计该煤矿的设计储量达到800万吨左右，2015年有望建成投产。该机构预计，2011年、2012年和2013年昊华能源的每股收益将分别为1.449元、1.727元和1.807元。资金流向：E投资金融终端显示，昨日主力资金净流出175万元，而最近5个交易日录得资金净流出1929万元，最近10个交易日录得资金净流出3496万元。《投资快报》发自广州
en: The US employment stimulus package pushes up the opportunity of coal flying and color dancing again. Peng Hao, the editor in charge of the reporter, wrote: After a thousand turns, the US employment stimulus package, which is referred to as the disguised third quantitative easing (QE3) - the US employment stimulus package of 447 billion dollars finally came out. Looking back on the two rounds of loose monetary policy, it is not difficult to find that the main force behind the rise of commodity prices is the excess of global liquidity and the increase of investment demand. And the coal and nonferrous metal sectors, which are closely linked with the trend of commodities, are the old play in the A-share market under the boost of the stimulus policy. The US stimulus package is referred to as the disguised QE3, which has been referred to as the disguised third quantitative easing (QE3) - the massive employment stimulus package of the United States has finally come out. US President Obama could not wait to reveal the $447 billion stimulus package to be launched on Thursday (Beijing time), far exceeding the market expectation of $300 billion. On Friday (Beijing time), Obama will announce the details of the stimulus package. But for the capital market, what investors are concerned about is not the details, but where the money comes from? Is this a disguised QE3? On Thursday in the United States, that is, Friday night in Beijing, Obama will not only elaborate on the stimulus package, but also Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke will give a speech on the same day. Listening to what Bernanke said, I know that this 447 billion is not a disguised QE3. As early as August 10, the Federal Reserve pointed out that the growth rate of the U.S. economy was significantly lower than expected, and it is expected that the future economic recovery will be slower and employment growth will be weak. At present, the Federal Reserve is discussing other policy tools. In addition, Obama's repeated "preview" of the economic stimulus plan, it is inevitable to speculate that the disguised QE3 has started. Zhang Wenge, deputy director of the Institute of Enterprise Development of the Development Research Center of the State Council, recently said that the United States and Europe are pulling the economy through Keynesian methods. In the past, the financial system, the central bank and the Federal Reserve were used to stimulate the economy, which will lead to the fact that the QE3 or the disguised QE3 of the United States must be launched. The return of funds to the commodity market In response to Obama's employment stimulus plan, the market responded optimistically. Investors have returned to the stock market and commodity markets, and some of them have chosen to sell safe haven assets such as gold and buy risky assets. On September 7, the three major stock indexes in the United States rose, and the most active December gold futures settlement price fell by 3%. New York oil has also rebounded recently, which is in anticipation of quantitative easing. Quantitative easing refers to the central bank's purchase of medium and long-term bonds such as treasury bonds to increase the supply of base money. For example, the previous two rounds of quantitative easing were that the Federal Reserve printed its own money and then bought the treasury bonds issued by the U.S. government. The U.S. government took the money to stimulate the economy. The key point is that there are a lot of dollars in the world for no reason, and the flooding of the dollar will lead to inflation. Looking back on the two rounds of loose monetary policy, investors can find that the main force behind the rise of commodity prices is the excess of global liquidity and the increase of investment demand. The United States announced in November 2010 that it would implement a second round of quantitative easing monetary policy (QE2) with a scale of 600 billion US dollars. A large amount of liquidity released by the Federal Reserve in the process of implementing QE2 did not fully enter the real economy, but a large part of it entered the international commodity market, especially the resource product market and some agricultural product markets, which pushed up prices. The coal and nonferrous metal sectors, which are closely related to the trend of commodities, have been a recurring play in the A-share market under the boost of the stimulus policy. The peak season is coming. Coal "takes off". Coal shares rose in September and October last year, stimulated by seasonal factors, inflation expectations, QE2, the end of energy saving and emission reduction at the end of the year and other factors. At this time, coal stocks were once again boosted by the same seasonality and other factors such as the US employment stimulus plan. China International Capital Corporation released a coal industry research report on September 6, saying that the seasonal trend of coal stocks is expected to gradually start, and we look forward to significant relative returns. Thermal coal prices are expected to stabilize and rebound, because the downstream industry needs to replenish inventories, and September and October are usually the time for power plants to prepare coal for winter. Coking coal prices are expected to rebound slightly as the steel industry enters the peak season. "Due to the reasons such as the deterioration of the European debt crisis, the slowdown of the domestic economy and the continuation of the tightening policy, the coal sector still faces some pressure in the short term, but the good profit certainty and the coming seasonal trend will make the coal sector outperform the market." CSIC pointed out that if progress is made in the European debt issue or the United States launches an economic stimulus plan, the coal sector is expected to have a considerable market trend. In terms of specific investment targets, CICC recommends China Shenhua (601088), Yanzhou Coal Industry (600188), China Coal Energy (601898), Lu'an Huaneng (601699) and Lanhuakexin (600123). In fact, the valuation of the coal sector has been at a low level at present. Statistics show that up to now, the average PE ratio of Shenwan Coal Mining Sector is 15.42 times, and the average value since 2000 is 28.92 times; The average PB ratio is 3.43 times, and the average value since 2000 is 4.78 times; In terms of expected P/E ratio, the expected P/E ratio of the coal sector in 2011 and 2012 was 13.87 times and 11.72 times respectively. Nonferrous metals "dance" with commodities Looking back on last year, after the Federal Reserve launched the second round of quantitative easing policy, the capital market started a new round of substantial growth, especially the commodity market. Focusing on the present, Morgan Stanley, an investment bank, said that at the G7 finance ministers and central bank governors meeting on Friday and Saturday, major economies may join hands to take a series of rescue actions. Morgan Stanley expects that the central banks of the United States, Europe, Japan and the United Kingdom may announce joint easing of monetary policy at the weekend, such as interest rate cuts or quantitative easing. Morgan Stanley's analysts said that the vicious cycle formed between the current weak economic growth and the sustained sharp decline in asset prices makes it more likely for countries to take joint monetary policy intervention actions. Earlier, foreign media quoted insiders as saying that at this G7 meeting, countries may maintain stimulative monetary policies and, if allowed, slow down the fiscal tightening of some countries. For the stock market, expectations come first, that is, the marginal relaxation of liquidity that may reach the extreme is of great benefit to the有色sector that has been continuously suppressed. In addition, the $44.7 billion stimulus package to be launched by the United States in the near future injects a strong shot into the commodity market. Earlier, due to the downgrade of the United States, the outbreak of the European debt crisis and the decline of nonferrous commodity prices, the domestic nonferrous sector experienced a continuous slump, and many varieties fell more than 20% in the short term. Stimulated by relevant favorable expectations, from the perspective of historical experience, the sectors with large declines are facing a large rebound space in the short term.

content: 金鹰中小盘精选混合基金分红金鹰基金公司今日发布公告称，旗下金鹰中小盘精选混合基金将于近日实施2010年收益的第二次分红，收益分配基准日为2010年12月31日，每10份基金份额分红0.4元。据悉，权益登记日为2011年2月11日，除息日为2011年2月11日，现金红利发放日为2011年2月15日。(方丽)欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: The Golden Eagle Small and Medium Stock Select Mixed Fund of Golden Eagle Fund Management announced today that the second dividend of 2010 earnings of the Golden Eagle Small and Medium Stock Select Mixed Fund will be implemented in the near future. The earnings distribution base date is December 31, 2010, and 0.4 yuan will be distributed for every 10 shares of the fund. It is reported that the rights registration date is February 11, 2011, the ex-dividend date is February 11, 2011, and the cash dividend payment date is February 15, 2011. (Fang Li) Welcome to comment I want to comment

content: iPhone收家中遭窃影像华裔工程师高科技擒贼据美国《星岛日报》报道，高科技工具的设计是帮助和方便使用者，圣荷西一名华裔居民就懂得利用手上的iPhone，在办公室遥控发现家中正被两名窃匪爆窃，报警将两窃匪拘捕。31岁圣荷西华裔居民PeterChen是一间高科公司的工程师，对高科技事物相当熟识，感恩节前在女朋友的汽车被人偷窃车内物品后，他以280元购买了一个Logitech700e监视摄影机，在自己圣荷西长青区的家中安装，以防家中亦被爆窃。他并将监视摄影机系统连接到他的iPhone中，而该系统正好在上周发挥作用。11月29日下午2时，当陈彼德在办公室工作时，他发现有电邮传到他的iPhone中，电邮是由他在家中安装的防盗监视摄影系统传来的，因为该系统开启后拍摄到家中有物体移动，即将拍摄到的照片电邮到他的iPhone,而发出警报。他在安装后亦曾收到该系统传来的照片，但发现移动的物体是家中的猫后，便将照片删除，但今次他发现照片是家中出现一名男子和一名青少年，他怀疑家中正被人爆窃，立即用iPhone打911报警。两名圣荷西交通警员SteevePayne警长和JeffreyFielder警员刚在陈家附近巡逻，接报后立即赶抵陈彼德的家，发现两名相信是窃匪的男子在屋内爆窃，将屋内的现金和电子游戏机放入袋中，即将两人拘捕。当陈彼德从办公室赶回家察看时，两警正将两窃匪送入警车。被捕两窃匪分别是26岁的GabrielHernandez和一名17岁的男孩，两人已被警方落案控以入屋爆窃罪名。圣荷西警方发言人RonnieLopez警长表示，该案正好显示警民合作的最好例子。事主利用高科技帮助警方拘捕爆窃匪徒。事主陈彼德则表示，“我当时亦十分紧张，因为过程有如电影情节，看见匪徒正在我的家中，但我又不能亲手拘捕他们，只有报警。”他说，“我花近3百元购买该防盗系统，现发现很值得。今后我会更小心查核iPhone收到该系统传来的照片，但考虑在家中安装更多的监视摄影机。”(张耀鋈)
en: The iPhone at home was stolen from the image of a Chinese engineer. The high-tech criminal catcher reported by the US "Sing Tao Daily" was designed to help and facilitate users. A Chinese resident in San Jose knew how to use his iPhone to remotely find that his house was being burgled by two thieves in his office and called the police to arrest them. Peter Chen, a 31 year old Chinese resident in San Jose, is an engineer of a high-tech company. He is quite familiar with high-tech things. After his girlfriend's car was stolen on Thanksgiving Day, he bought a Logitech 700e surveillance camera for 280 yuan and installed it in his home in the Evergreen District of San Jose to prevent his home from being burgled. He also connected the surveillance camera system to his iPhone, and the system happened to work last week. At 2 o'clock on November 29, when Chen Peter was working in the office, he found that an email was sent to his iPhone. The email was sent from the anti-theft surveillance camera system he installed at home, because the system took pictures of moving objects in the house after it was turned on, and then emailed the pictures to his iPhone to give an alarm. After installation, he also received photos from the system, but he deleted the photos when he found that the moving object was a cat at home. This time, however, he found that the photo was a man and a teenager who appeared at home, so he suspected that his home was being burgled and immediately called 911 with his iPhone. Steeve Payne, a police officer of San Jose Traffic Police, and Jeffrey Fielder, a police officer, were just patrolling near Chen's home. After receiving the report, they immediately arrived at Chen Peter's home and found that two men believed to be thieves were breaking into the house and putting cash and electronic games in the house into bags, and then arresting them. When Chen Peter hurried home from his office to have a look, the two police officers were just sending the two thieves to the police car. The two arrested thieves were Gabriel Hernandez, 26, and a 17 year old boy. Both of them have been prosecuted by the police for burglary. Ronnie Lopez, a spokesman for the San Jose Police Department, said that the case just showed the best example of police civilian cooperation. The victim used high technology to help the police arrest the burglars. Chen Peter, the victim, said, "I was also very nervous at that time, because the process was like a movie plot. I saw the gangster in my home, but I could not arrest them by myself. I could only call the police." He said, "I spent nearly 300 yuan on the anti-theft system, and now I found it was worth it. In the future, I will be more careful to check the photos sent by the iPhone from the system, but I will consider installing more surveillance cameras at home." (Zhang Yaoyi)

content: 约翰尼-德普新片探班“头破血流”幸无事(图)新浪娱乐讯北京时间2009年4月14日讯，波多黎各当地时间4月13日，约翰尼·德普(JohnnyDepp)在新片《莱姆酒日记》(TheRumDiary)拍摄现场。约翰尼·德普从一辆经典款菲亚特中钻出头来，他脸上有几处淤青，耳朵后面和头上有几处还留下血迹，庆幸的是只是剧中角色受了伤，德普本人没有事。据悉德普在片场粉丝巨多，热情的影迷总会走上来和他打招呼，人缘好他也十分亲切地回应，有时候是一路打招呼下来的，不过这也多少影响了拍摄进度。约翰尼·德普在《莱姆酒日记》中饰演上世纪50年代波多黎各一名终日酗酒的报纸记者保罗·坎普。图库供稿
en: Johnny Depp's new film, "Head Broken Blood", was lucky (picture) Sina Entertainment News On April 14, 2009, Beijing time, on April 13, Puerto Rican local time, Johnny Depp (JohnnyDepp) was at the shooting scene of the new film "The Rum Diary". Johnny Depp stuck his head out of a classic Fiat. He had several bruises on his face, some blood stains behind his ears and on his head. Fortunately, it was just the role in the play that was injured, and Depp himself was not hurt. It is reported that Depp has a huge number of fans on the film set. Enthusiastic fans always come up to greet him. He is also very friendly to respond. Sometimes, he greets all the way, but this also affects the shooting schedule. Johnny Depp plays Paul Kemp, a newspaper reporter who drinks alcohol all day in Puerto Rico in the 1950s in The Rum Diary. Picture library contribution

content: 机构跑步出场午后延续调整姚茂敦昨夜，美股小幅收高。这让近期的死多头高兴不已，以为今天又是个大好日子。的确，A股早盘双双高开，但随后的几波跳水杀跌，表明忍耐多日的空方开始发威。其实，针对昨天的放量滞涨。笔者已经在收评《空方猛烈反击，强势调整将持续几日！》中有过分析，并认为：昨天的盘中调整其实并不充分，因此，这种调整可能还将持续几日。从早盘情况看，笔者的判断完全正确。从消息面看，今日好消息居多。其中，最重要的当然是：船舶工业振兴规划昨天如期出台，五大措施支持造船业；石化业规划昨天没上会，最快下周审议；证监会严把新股上市质量关，IPO近期难重启。但一条2月大小非日均减持4，33亿元，规模创一年来新高的利空消息，还是让市场感受了丝丝凉意。从机构资金流向看，本周连续3天跑步出场后，今日早盘机构继续出逃。根据统计，早盘沪市，机构资金净流出竟高达31亿左右。此举表明，经过一轮大幅反弹之后，机构对后市发展开始变得谨慎，并纷纷拉高出货，从而将风险留给拼命入场的中小投资者。从技术上看，目前，大盘多种技术指标已处于短期超买状态。特别是KDJ指标高位刚刚死叉向下，MACD红柱开始缩短，说明大盘的调整可能需要一定时间。不过，由于中短期均线勾头向上，底部不断抬高，已经对后市构成强大技术支撑。也就是说，经过必要的回调之后，大盘还有上攻动能。综上所述，尽管昨天沪指测试了2300点，并继续站在2245点之上，但从机构加速减仓来看，也表明大盘短期回调风险较大。再加上外围市场反复无常，也使得大盘必须要经过充分调整，消化掉部分获利盘和套牢盘之后，才有足够动能继续上攻。早盘，沪指跌破5日均线，量能萎缩，表明大盘将进入短期休整阶段。展望午后，继续震荡可能性比较大。
en: The institutional running out in the afternoon continued to adjust Yao Maodun last night. The U.S. stock market closed slightly higher. This has made the recent bears very happy, thinking that today is another good day. Indeed, A-shares opened high in the morning, but the subsequent diving and killing waves showed that the empty side that had been tolerated for many days began to exert its power. In fact, in response to yesterday's volume expansion and stagnation. The author has analyzed in the review《The strong adjustment of the empty side will last for several days! 》, and I think: yesterday's in-trading adjustment is actually insufficient, so this adjustment may continue for several days. Judging from the morning trading situation, the author's judgment is completely correct. From the perspective of news, today's good news is the most important. Of course, the most important thing is: the revitalization plan of the shipbuilding industry was issued as scheduled yesterday, and five measures were taken to support the shipbuilding industry; the petrochemical industry plan did not go to the conference yesterday, and it will be reviewed as soon as next week; the CSRC strictly controls the quality of new shares listing, and it is difficult to restart IPO in the near future. However, the bad news that the average daily reduction of non-tradable shares in February was 4.33 billion yuan, a record high in a year, still made the market feel a little cool. From the perspective of institutional fund flow, after three consecutive days of running out this week, institutions continued to escape this morning. According to statistics, the net outflow of institutional funds in the morning market in Shanghai was as high as 3.1 billion yuan. This move shows that after a huge rebound, institutions have become cautious about the future development and have begun to pull out and deliver goods at a high level, leaving risks to small and medium-sized investors who are desperately entering the market. Technically, at present, a variety of technical indicators of the market have been in a short-term overbought state. In particular, the KDJ index has just died and forked downward at a high level, and the MACD red column has begun to shorten, indicating that the market adjustment may need some time. However, since the medium short moving average hooks up and the bottom rises continuously, it has formed a strong technical support for the future. That is to say, after the necessary adjustment, the market still has the momentum to attack. In summary, although the Shanghai Stock Index tested 2300 points yesterday and continued to stand above 2245 points, the fact that institutions are accelerating their reduction of positions also shows that the market has a high risk of short-term adjustment. In addition, the repeated changes in the surrounding market also make it necessary for the market to undergo full adjustment and digest some profitable chips and trapped chips before it has enough kinetic energy to continue to attack. In the morning trading, the Shanghai Stock Index broke through the 5-day moving average, and the trading volume shrank, indicating that the market will enter a short-term consolidation stage. Looking forward to the afternoon, there is a great possibility of continued volatility.

content: 床头柜上晶莹剔透的玻璃樽(图)床头柜上晶莹剔透的玻璃樽，既漂亮又实用，使整个空间蕴涵着沉静的气息。定格时间的钟表以及傲人绽放的花朵彼此相依，诉说着居者对于纯粹的愿望。
en: The crystal clear glass bottle on the bedside table (picture) is both beautiful and practical, making the whole space full of quiet atmosphere. The clock that stops time and the proud flowers that bloom on each other tell the residents' wish for purity.

content: 调查称19%年轻人曾将手机掉进马桶里新浪科技讯北京时间11月9日晚间消息，据国外媒体报道，微软周一公布的一项调查结果显示，近20%的年轻人曾经将手机掉进马桶里。该调查结果显示，40%的成年人表示，曾经在浴室里面使用过手机。在18至24岁年龄段人群中，64%表示曾经将手机遗落在“不平常”的地方，如冰箱里，或沙发垫下面。24%表示，自己的手机铃声曾干扰过重要会议。出乎意料的是，在18至24岁年龄段人群中，19%表示曾将手机掉进马桶里。(李明)
en: The survey said that 19% of young people had dropped their mobile phones into the toilet. Sina Technology News reported on the evening of Beijing time, November 9. According to foreign media reports, a survey released by Microsoft on Monday showed that nearly 20% of young people had dropped their mobile phones into the toilet. The survey results show that 40% of adults said they have used mobile phones in the bathroom. Among people aged 18 to 24, 64% said they had left their mobile phones in "unusual" places, such as refrigerators or under sofa cushions. 24% said that their mobile phone ring had interfered with important meetings. Unexpectedly, 19% of people aged 18 to 24 said they had dropped their mobile phones into the toilet. (Li Ming)

content: 工银国际：中海集运第3季业绩失望工银国际马云鹏中海集运公布的第3季业绩欠佳，净亏损9.51亿人民币，对比去年同期净利润为22亿人民币。1-9月未经审核净亏损约为16亿人民币，超出我们估计的12亿人民币全年亏损。我们分别调低2011年美国和欧洲航线运费20%和13%，修订盈测后预计2011和2012年净亏损分别为27亿人民币和29亿人民币。中海集运现估值0.6倍2011和2012年预计市净率远低于过往平均1.0倍水平。鉴于估值偏低，我们维持“持有”评级，目标价1.95港元，相当于0.7倍11年预计市净率。第3季业绩失望。中海集运公布的第3季业绩欠佳，净亏损9.51亿人民币，对比去年同期净利润为22亿人民币。我们之前预期第3季旺季期间贸易量和运费会受全球贸易环境疲软影响按年下跌，但中海集运的第3季业绩较我们预期更差。1-9月未经审核净亏损约为16亿人民币，超出我们估计的12亿人民币全年亏损。第3季贸易总量同比下降0.1%，其中美国和欧洲航线贸易量分别同比下降25%和0.3%，而收益则分别减少47%和45%。前景仍不明朗。第3季平均上海出口集装箱运费率指数(SCFI)较上半年下降2%，其中美国和欧洲航线分别下降23%和7%。我们认为欧洲首脑会议达成债务危机解决方案短期内或可刺激运费上升。不过由于全球经济前景不明朗，尤其是欧洲贸易量和运费，我们认为第4季业绩好转的机会不大，明年展望亦会比较差。中海集运订造更多新船。公司订造12艘1,000个标准箱运载量的新船，总投资11亿美元。由于公司现时只有8艘同类型货轮，我们认为新船将加强公司欧美航线业务的竞争力。同时我们认为欧洲航线的竞争激烈逼使公司订购大型船舶，因在现时疲软市况下只有1,000个标准箱运载量的船舶能赚钱。鉴于现时订造新船价格仍低，加上中海集运现时负债比率约为40%，我们认为中海集运短期内不会有流动资金的问题。估值和评级。由于上半年航运市场疲软，我们分别下调美国和欧洲航线运量和平均运费预测，并相应调低2011年盈测至净亏损27亿人民币(之前为12亿人民币)。中海集运现估值0.6倍2011年预计市净率，估值远低于过往平均1.0倍水平。我们维持“持有”评级，目标价由2.1港元调低至1.95港元，相当于0.7倍11年预计市净率，较过往平均水平低1个标准差，因我们认为航运市场处于下降周期。
en: ICBC International: CSCL's disappointing third quarter results. Ma Yunpeng of ICBC International announced that CSCL's third quarter results were poor, with a net loss of 951 million yuan, compared with a net profit of 2.2 billion yuan in the same period last year. The unaudited net loss from January to September was about 1.6 billion yuan, exceeding our estimated annual loss of 1.2 billion yuan. We have respectively reduced the freight rates of American and European routes in 2011 by 20% and 13%, and after revising the profit forecast, we expect the net losses in 2011 and 2012 to be 2.7 billion yuan and 2.9 billion yuan respectively. CSCL's current valuation of 0.6 times the expected price earnings ratio in 2011 and 2012 is far lower than the past average level of 1.0 times. In view of the low valuation, we maintain the "hold" rating, with a target price of HK $1.95, equivalent to 0.7 times the expected price earnings ratio for 11 years. Disappointing performance in the third quarter. CSCL announced that its performance in the third quarter was poor, with a net loss of 951 million yuan, compared with a net profit of 2.2 billion yuan in the same period last year. We previously expected that the trade volume and freight rates in the third quarter peak season would fall year on year due to the weakness of the global trade environment, but CSCL's performance in the third quarter was worse than expected. The unaudited net loss from January to September was about 1.6 billion yuan, exceeding our estimated annual loss of 1.2 billion yuan. The total trade volume in the third quarter decreased by 0.1% year on year, of which the trade volume of American and European routes decreased by 25% and 0.3% respectively, and the income decreased by 47% and 45% respectively. The prospects are still uncertain. The average Shanghai Export Container Freight Rate Index (SCFI) in the third quarter fell by 2% in the first half of the year, of which the American and European routes fell by 23% and 7% respectively. We believe that the debt crisis solution reached at the European summit may stimulate the rise of freight rates in the short term. However, we believe that there is little chance of improvement in the fourth quarter performance and the outlook for next year will be worse due to the uncertainty of the global economic prospects, especially the trade volume and freight rates in Europe. CSCL ordered more new ships. The company ordered 12 new ships with a total container capacity of 1000 TEU, with a total investment of US $1.1 billion. Since the company has only 8 ships of the same type at present, we believe that the new ship will enhance the company's competitiveness in European and American routes. At the same time, we believe that the fierce competition in the European route has forced the company to order large ships, because only ships with a standard box capacity of 1000 can make money in the present weak market. Given that the price of new ships is still low at present, and the debt ratio of CSCL is about 40%, we believe that CSCL will not have liquidity problems in the short term. Valuation and rating. Due to the weakness of the shipping market in the first half of the year, we have respectively reduced the volume and average freight rate forecasts of American and European routes, and correspondingly reduced the 2011 profit forecast to a net loss of 2.7 billion yuan (previously 1.2 billion yuan). CSCL's current valuation is 0.6 times the expected price earnings ratio in 2011, far lower than the past average level of 1.0 times. We maintain the "hold" rating, with the target price adjusted from HK $2.1 to HK $1.95, equivalent to 0.7 times the expected price earnings ratio for 11 years, one standard deviation lower than the average level in the past, because we believe that the shipping market is in a declining cycle.

content: 防水防尘时尚便携奥林巴斯μ1030售2350作者：疯言疯语【山东行情】作为μ-SW系列全新产品的μ1030SW除可防护2米跌落冲击以外，还具有可抗压100公斤的特殊性能，进一步体现了机身的坚固结构。而且其防水性能也提升到水下10米。奥林巴斯μ1030SW(资料评价图片样张)具备抗压防震的机身结构以及防水、防尘性能。奥林巴斯U1030SW在结合抗压防震结构、防水功能和防尘功能的同时，还体现了便携、时尚的外型设计风格。而且即使是在－10℃的环境下也可进行拍摄，令相机可在迄今为止难以到达的艰苦环境进行拍摄，极大的扩展了影像的拍摄空间，对于如此强悍的三防机型，目前港行价格仅2K出头，确实不错。[参考价格]：奥林巴斯μ1030SW2350元港行　　[联系电话]：13853101115参考价：3220发布时间：2008-01-22外形尺寸：93.2×61.4×21.3mm(凸出部分除外)总像素数：1010万像素最高分辨率：3648x2736已有_COUNT_位用户评论点击查看评论推荐想买观望
en: The Olympus μ1030, a waterproof, dustproof and portable fashion camera, is sold for 2350 yuan by Crazy Talking 【 Shandong Market 】 As a new product of μ-SW series, the μ1030SW can prevent 2 meter drop impact, and has the special performance of withstanding 100 kg pressure, further demonstrating the robust structure of the fuselage. Moreover, its waterproof performance has been improved to 10 meters underwater. Olympus μ1030SW (data evaluation picture sample) has the body structure of pressure resistance and shock proof, as well as waterproof and dustproof functions. Olympus U1030SW combines the functions of pressure resistance, shock resistance, waterproof and dustproof, and also shows the portable and fashionable design style. Moreover, even in the environment of -10℃, shooting can be carried out, so that the camera can shoot in the hard environment that has been difficult to reach so far, which greatly expands the shooting space of images. For such a tough three-proof model, the current Hong Kong price is only over 2K, which is really good.
