content: 阿Sa陈伟霆甜蜜玩天光风尘仆仆只为共度佳节新浪娱乐讯北京时间11月2日讯，据香港媒体报道，10月31日万圣节，陈伟霆(William)和女友蔡卓妍(阿Sa)百忙中偷时间一起参加派对，更将照片放上微博(http://t.sina.com.cn)。11月1日陈伟霆出席“叱咤颁奖礼”记招时，透露跟阿Sa玩至早上6时，双方分开后仍有点依依不舍。阿Sa更立刻赶返内地工作，故未能一起出席11月1日的记招。问到阿Sa是否专程飞返香港跟他共度万圣节？他说：“某程度上可以这样说。”当记者说她吻了他，他就开心地笑了笑。问到现在是否不见面也要每天通电话？他说：“是，双方互诉大家的状况吧！知道她在内地拍《白蛇传》要上天下海和遁地。(心痛吗？)一点点啦，但她是专业演员。(会否不许她与男主角拍接吻镜头？)我批准的，也会看她的亲嘴戏，我拍戏也会有敏感场面，绝对不会不批准的。”11月21日和22日分别是陈伟霆和阿Sa的生日，但他指届时阿Sa仍要在内地工作，故未能一起过生日。
en: On November 2, Beijing time, Sina Entertainment News reported that on Halloween, October 31, William Chen and his girlfriend Charlene Choi (Sa Sa) stole time to attend the party together, and even put the photo on microblog (http://t.sina.com.cn). When Chen Weiwei attended the "Fierce Award Ceremony" on November 1, he revealed that he played with Sa Sa until 6:00 a.m., and they were still reluctant to separate after they separated. Sa Sa immediately returned to work in China, so she could not attend the press conference on November 1. When asked whether Sa Sa flew back to Hong Kong to spend Halloween with him? He said: "To a certain extent, you can say that." When the reporter said that she kissed him, he smiled happily. Ask if you have to make a phone call every day if you don't see each other now? He said: "Yes, tell each other about your situation! I know she is filming The Legend of the White Snake in China, and she needs to go to heaven, sea and earth. (Painful? ) A little bit, but she is a professional actor. (Will you not allow her to shoot kissing scenes with the leading actor? I approved, and I will also watch her kissing scenes. I will also have sensitive scenes when shooting, and I will never disapprove. " Chen Weiwei and Sa Sa's birthdays are on November 21 and 22 respectively, but he said that Sa Sa still has to work in China at that time, so she can't have birthday with him.

content: 国泰君安：匹克业绩符合预期维持收集国泰君安国际彭港祥得益于销售同比增速达到24.7%，净利润增长22.1%至人民币4.23亿元（占市场和我们全年预测的42.5%和41.9%）。销售增速和2011年一二季度的25%和24%的订货会增速吻合。由于鞋类和服装类产品平均零售单价上涨，整体毛利率同比上涨了2.2个百分点到39.9%。销售和行政管理费用占销售比例从2010年上半年的15.1%增加到17.6%,主要是由于宣传推广费用、行政人员费用、研发费用的上升以及新增的城建税。公司上半年净增加395个零售网点，令公司的零售店铺数量达到为7,619家。公司2012年第一季度的订货会订单增长20.5%，仍然较快。2012开始的批发折扣调整有助于进一步改善公司的毛利率水平。我们维持公司2011-13年每股盈利预测分别为人民币0.482/0.573/0.679元。匹克目前的估值是6.9倍2011年预测市盈率。鉴于市场担忧体育用品行业的过度竞争和不明朗因素持续，我们维持收集评级但是下调目标价至4.70港元，对应2011年8倍预测市盈率。催化剂：订单增长强劲。风险：存货上升。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: Guotai Junan: Peak's performance meets expectations to maintain Guotai Junan International Peng Hongxiang, benefiting from the sales growth rate of 24.7% year on year, and the net profit increased by 22.1% to 423 million yuan (42.5% and 41.9% of the market and our annual forecast). The sales growth rate and the order growth rate of 25% and 24% in the first and second quarters of 2011 coincide. Due to the increase of the average retail unit price of footwear and clothing products, the overall gross profit margin rose 2.2 percentage points year on year to 39.9%. Sales and administration expenses increased from 15.1% in the first half of 2010 to 17.6%, mainly due to the increase of publicity and promotion expenses, administrative personnel expenses, research and development expenses and the new urban construction tax. The company's retail stores increased by 395 in the first half of the year, reaching 7619. The company's order growth for the first quarter of 2012 was 20.5%, still fast. The wholesale discount adjustment starting from 2012 will help further improve the company's gross margin level. We maintain the company's earnings forecast for 2011-13 at RMB 0.482/0.573/0.679 per share respectively. Peak's current valuation is 6.9 times the 2011 forecast earnings per share. In view of the fact that the excessive competition and uncertainty in the sports industry continue to worry the market, we maintain the rating of collection but cut the target price to HK $4.70, which corresponds to 8 times the forecast earnings per share in 2011. Catalyst: Strong order growth. Risk: Inventory rises. Welcome to comment I want to comment

content: 反弹受阻3000点附近或再次蓄势德邦证券上周市场的走势基本验证我们上周的周策略报告，即市场短期反弹空间已经有限，难言系统性机会。从上周的走势看前三个交易日市场震荡小幅度上扬，不断趋近市场的关键技术阻力位，在周四达到重要的技术点位即3100点(沪指)时市场即出现明显压力，当天市场出现较大幅度回调，同时受到短期获利盘的抛压，导致当天市场放量大跌，成交量创了近期的天量，沪市成交量达1467亿元，深市也达到1157亿元。市场在关键技术点位受阻导致市场的反弹暂时夭折，从市场表现看，我们偏向于认为市场再次蓄势概率增加，同时市场的向好在等待政策的进一步明朗。从上周总体情况看，基本面偏于平静，政策面偶有因为两会的召开而刺激个别板块和行业的情况，而市场难有大的起落：上周沪深两市成交量分别6499亿元和4922亿元，较前一周均出现了超过20%的放量，但是受到关键点位的压制，同时短期获利了结的涌出市场出现下幅度回调，沪指下跌20.88点，幅度为-0.68%，而同期深圳指数下跌0.76%，市场再次蓄势的态势明显。从行业的表现看，上周仅有两个行业指数出现逆势上涨，其他所有行业指数均出现一致性的回调。两个上涨的版块分别为水电指数和建筑业指数，两者分别上涨了1.16%和0.09%；而下调的行业指数整体跌幅大多温和，下跌超过2%的行业为采掘指数，下跌为2.53%。而两外的指数多数下跌幅度在-0.5%到-1.5%之间，因此整体上市场处于温和调整状态。另外市场概念性的热点主要由政策利引导和推动，包括产业转移、区域振兴、新能源、节能环保、等均属于政策性的概念性交易机会。而本周将公布经济数据，而宏观调控政策明朗之前市场缺乏足够的做多动能。本周我们认为蓄势的概率较大，未来再次上行很可能将以明朗的政策信号为契机。同时坚持认为3月份仍然为调整的月份，二季度的行情仍然值得期待。因此短期看，我们认为市场再次上涨之前需要再次蓄势，而市场的很可能围绕着3000点附近进行，投资者立足于长远可以适当关注年报存在高分配预期的优质公司，同时重点关注具有明显的区域政策受益的中西部概念板块的交易性机会。但总体上依然注意仓位控制。就市场政策面看，虽然整体政策依然强积极的财政政策和适度宽松的货币政策，但从地产政策的调控来看结构微调可能会超出市场的预期，而地产调控政策的细化可能依然导致地产类股票的反弹的进度，从而整体上延后市场的系统上扬。正值两会的召开的当下，许多提案直指房产的高价，而各商业银行对地产的房贷政策的收紧很可能导致成交量难以出现实质性好转。而房地产业波及的行业板块较广，因此政策尚不明朗依然市场难有持续上扬的机会的重要因素。此外市场的流动性在二季度之前恐怕难有好转，一方面政策打击突击放贷，另一方面资本市场，特别是IPO市场持续分流资金这将对二级市场形成一定抑制。另外从基本面看，市场已经预期到了09年行业公司业绩大幅度回升的事实，但是对于10年依然存在诸多不确定因素，特别是国家宏观政策尚未明朗之前，各行业的业绩前景依然不过清晰，这是制约市场持续反弹的又一基本面的因素。因此我们认为短期市场恐难有系统性的机会，加之海外主权债务危机以及英镑的贬值等因素可能导致外围市场更加动荡，特别是近期美国贸易保护主义的愈演愈烈之势可能严重影响到中国外贸形势，因此国际上的不确定性是市场担忧的另一重要因素。所以总体来看，虽然年报出来的公司的业绩依然不断利好，但是市场各方面的担忧依然制约市场持续反弹，而且目前的A股估值水平出现了一定的结构性泡沫，特别是中小盘股的估值泡沫已经透支了其具有的增长能力，而政策对资产价格泡沫表现出严重关注，同时对通货膨胀都保持警惕。综合政策、资金和基本面的分析市场目前尚不具备持续上涨的动力，短期依然持保守态度。从技术角度来看，上周大盘反弹在关键技术位3100点(沪市)受阻，由此引发大盘可能再次回到3000点附近形成蓄势态势，同时也将形成市场二次筑底的形态。首先从形态看，市场经过持续反弹后已经反弹到前期三重头部的颈线位置即沪市的3100点，而上周四刚过3100点市场即引发了一次较为剧烈的下跌，因此市场再次回调蓄势甚至可能形成二次筑底的走势，而上周上涨受阻的位置同时是半年线位置，也是120周线位置，因此技术上属于关键的点位，该点位的技术压力明显，担起难以有效突破前期的技术颈线。其次从量能看，经过连续两周放量反弹后本周在关键位置出现放量回调，因此，这种量价的背离一定程度表前期的阶段性底部依然不扎实，市场有再次蓄势的必要，而超短期周五的走势看，量能再次显著萎缩，沪市从1400多亿元的成交快速萎缩到1000余亿元的成交表明当前杀跌力量也快速减弱。因此量能上分析市场当属于回调蓄势走势，本周在3000点附近蓄势的概率显著增加。最后，从技术指标看，虽然MACD指标依然处在0轴线之下的弱势阶段，但是，中短线显示持续上扬之势，两者均在持续向0的位置靠拢。而RSI、ADR和KDJ指标已经进入强势区间，飒三者的走势更趋于强势后的回调确认。因此，综合而言，我们认为市场回调蓄势的概率更高，一旦市场政策等因素明朗，大盘仍将震荡上扬。
en: The rebound was blocked near 3000 or again Debon Securities Last week's market trend basically verified our weekly strategy report last week, that is, the short-term rebound space of the market was limited and it was hard to say systematic opportunities. From the trend last week, the market fluctuated slightly in the first three trading days, constantly approaching the key technical resistance level of the market. When it reached the important technical point of 3100 (Shanghai Stock Index) on Thursday, the market showed obvious pressure. The market showed a substantial callback on the same day, and it was hit by the short-term profit making, resulting in a substantial decline in the market on that day, and the trading volume reached a recent sky high, with the trading volume of Shanghai Stock Exchange reaching 146.7 billion yuan, and Shenzhen Stock Exchange also reached 115.7 billion yuan. The market's rebound was temporarily aborted due to the blocking of the key technical point, and from the market performance, we tend to think that the probability of the market's resuming its strength is increasing, and the market's goodwill is waiting for the further clarification of policies. From the overall situation last week, the fundamentals were quiet, and the policy side occasionally stimulated individual sectors and industries because of the NPC and CPPCC, but the market was hard to have big ups and downs: last week, the trading volume of Shanghai and Shenzhen markets was 649.9 billion yuan and 492.2 billion yuan respectively, both of which were more than 20% higher than the previous week. However, due to the suppression of key points, the market showed a downward adjustment when short-term profits were settled, and the Shanghai Stock Index fell 20.88 points, with a magnitude of -0.68%, while the Shenzhen Index fell 0.76% in the same period, and the market showed a clear tendency to resume its strength again. From the perspective of industry performance, only two industry indexes rose against the trend last week, and all other industry indexes showed consistent adjustments. The two rising sectors were hydropower index and construction industry index, which rose 1.16% and 0.09% respectively; While the industry index of adjusting the industry as a whole mostly fell moderately, the industry of mining and restructuring index fell more than 2%, down 2.53%. While the other indexes mostly fell between -0.5% and -1.5%, the market as a whole was in a mild adjustment state. In addition, the conceptual hot spots of the market are mainly guided and promoted by policy benefits, including industrial transfer, regional revitalization, new energy, energy saving and environmental protection, which are all policy conceptual trading opportunities. However, the market lacks sufficient motivation to do more before the macro control policy is clarified. This week, we believe that there is a high probability of resuming, and the future upward movement is likely to take the opportunity of a clear policy signal. At the same time, we believe that March is still the month of adjustment, and the market in the second quarter is still worth looking forward to. Therefore, in the short term, we believe that the market needs to resume again before it rises again, and the market is likely to focus around 3000 points. Investors can pay proper attention to high quality companies with high distribution expectations in the annual report, and focus on the trading opportunities of the central and western concept sectors which benefit from regional policies. But still pay attention to position control in general. In terms of market policy, although the overall policy is still strong positive fiscal policy and moderate loose monetary policy, from the perspective of real estate policy regulation, structural fine tuning may exceed market expectations, and the detailed real estate regulation policy may still lead to the rebound of real estate stocks, thus delaying the overall rise of the market. At the moment of the convening of the NPC and the CPPCC, many proposals pointed to the high price of real estate, and the tightening of mortgage policies on real estate by commercial banks is likely to lead to a substantial improvement in the trade volume. The industry sector involved in the real estate industry is wide, so the policy is still an important factor that the market is hard to have a continuous rise. In addition, the market's liquidity is unlikely to improve before the second quarter. On the one hand, the policy strikes a sudden lending, and on the other hand, the capital market, especially the IPO market, continues to divert funds, which will have a certain inhibitory effect on the secondary market. In addition, from the basic point of view, the market has expected the fact that the performance of industry companies will rebound substantially in 2009, but there are still many uncertainties in 2010, especially before the national macro policy is clarified, the performance prospects of various industries are still unclear, which is another basic factor that restricts the market from continuing to rebound. Therefore, we believe that the market is unlikely to have systematic opportunities in the short term. In addition, factors such as the overseas sovereign debt crisis and the depreciation of the pound may lead to more volatility in the peripheral market, especially the recent escalation of trade protectionism in the United States may have a serious impact on China's foreign trade situation. Therefore, international uncertainty is another important factor worrying the market. Therefore, in general, although the performance of companies that have released annual reports is still good, the market is still constrained by various worries, and the current valuation level of A-shares has shown a structural bubble. In particular, the valuation bubble of small and medium-sized stocks has overdrawn its growth potential, and the policy is seriously concerned about the asset price bubble, and it is also alert to inflation. In view of the comprehensive analysis of policies, funds and fundamentals, the market is not yet fully prepared for continuous growth, and it is still conservative in the short term. From a technical perspective, the rebound of the main market was blocked at the key technical level of 3100 (Shanghai Stock Exchange) last week, which triggered the possibility that the main market would return to the vicinity of 3000 to form a potential trend, and it will also form a pattern of secondary bottom building in the market. First of all, from the perspective of shape, the market has rebounded to the neckline position of the previous triple head, that is, the 3100 o'clock of the Shanghai Stock Exchange, after a sustained rebound. The market triggered a sharp decline on Thursday just after 3100 o'clock, so the market is likely to show a trend of resuming its potential or even forming a secondary bottom. The location where the market rose last week was blocked, and it was also the position of the line for half a year, and it was also the position of 120 weeks, so technically, it was a key point. The technical pressure of this point was obvious, and it was difficult to effectively break through the technical neckline of the previous period. Secondly, in terms of energy consumption, after two weeks of continuous trading rebound, there was a trading back adjustment at the key position this week. Therefore, the divergence of this kind of price indicates that the phased bottom in the early stage is still not solid, and it is necessary for the market to resume its potential again. The sharp decline of the current killing force on Friday also shows that the current killing force has also declined rapidly. Therefore, the market should belong to the trend of adjusting the potential in terms of energy consumption, and the probability of accumulating potential near 3000 this week is significantly increased. Finally, from the perspective of technical indicators, although the MACD indicator is still in the weak stage below the 0-axis line, the short-term and medium-term indicators show a sustained rising trend, both of which are moving towards the position of 0. The RSI, ADR and KDJ indicators have entered the strong range, and the trend of the three is more positive after the adjustment is confirmed. Therefore, in general, we believe that the market has a higher probability of resuming its potential. Once the market and other factors are clear, the market will still rise and fluctuate.

content: 分析：WiMAX“屈尊”加入3G混战本报记者黄沙10月19日，国际电信联盟ITU在日内瓦举行无线通信RadioAssembly全体会议，与会国家通过投票正式通过，无线宽带技术WiMAX正式成为3G标准。WiMAX论坛在白皮书中称，将移动WiMAX加入到3G家族，为运营商升级网络提供了一条新的途径。“移动WiMAX正式成为3G技术之后，服务提供商在部署网络和推出服务时可以获得更多选择和更大灵活度。例如，它们可以在人口稀少的地区提供接入服务，或者在人口密集的地区提供增强接入服务。此外，全球开放标准有助于提升不同设备之间的互用性，降低设备成本，从而服务提供商将从中获益。”WiMAX的尴尬作为一项被认为是高于现有3G标准的“准4G”标准，WiMAX从诞生之日起就一直夺人眼目。WiMAX，即IEEE802.16x，全称叫做“微波存取全球互通技术(WorldwideInteroperabilityforMicrowaveAccess)”。和传统的TD-SCDMA、WCDMA和CDMA2000几个3G标准相比，WiMAX的最大传输半径达到了50公里上下，接近前者的两倍。而在传输速度上，WiMAX也让其他3G标准望尘莫及。在10公里范围内，WiMAX网络的带宽可以达到70Mbps，甚至超过了ADSL等有线网络的技术，而主流的无线GPRS最高传输速度是115Kbps，3G标准中的TD-SCDMA和WCDMA则均为2Mbps.随着技术的升级，WiMAX从2005年开始更分化出了802.16D和802.16E两个版本。802.16D为固定无线网络，能够作为wifi的升级直接与现有固定有线网络结合，受到了世界各地的欢迎。而移动无线网络802.16E却和移动运营商的现有网络发生了直接的对抗。然而就是这样一个含着金钥匙出生的标准，在提升移动性的同时却发现面临着没有频谱资源的严重问题。要在移动通讯领域争夺市场，最重要的一点就是要有一个全球统一的频段。但由于早在2001年4月，ITU就将最合适的频段都已经分配给全球三大3G标准WCDMA、CDMA2000和中国提出的TD-SCDMA.更要命的是，由于提交3G方案的截止日期早在1998年就已到期，按照ITU的惯例，3G标准已经冻结，不得其门而入的WiMAX面临着没有频段的尴尬。而没有频段，这项无线宽带技术完全无法实现区间漫游，而这对移动通讯网络来说是致命的。抵制在全球的4G标准迟迟没有确立，而3G网络建设如火如荼的情况下，WiMAX阵营坐不住了。从今年起，美国政府和WiMAX阵营的各家厂商展开了强大的公关游说工作，希望将WiMAX“降格”加入3G标准，在现有的市场上分一杯羹。据相关专家透露，从今年初起国际电联开始研究“OFDMATDDWMAN(802.16e，WiMAX的移动模式)”空中接口技术成为IMT-2000标准的可能性。但对于WiMAX申请加入3G标准，代表了此前3G三大阵营WCDMA和CDMA2000和TD-SCDMA的爱立信、高通和TD三方进行了强力抵制，而德国和中国等国家也表示了反对。展讯通信有限公司副总裁曹强博士认为，相比TD-SCDMA和其他3G标准，尽管WiMAX在造价、建网速度以及业务接入能力等方面存在着不可比拟的优势，但是WiMAX也存在着先天不足的尴尬局面。WiMAX支持移动性方面系统信令开销过大，小区边缘能力低；MobileWiMAX和FixedWiMAX在物理层面不兼容；标准化不全面，仅集中在L1和L2，缺少射频规范；标准化机制不健全，频繁的投票机制难以保证其完整性考虑；过多的选项导致系统开销增加和不稳定性，此外还存在着产品互通性差等问题。妥协与博弈但在各大利益集团的相互游说和妥协下，WiMAX阵营与政府、运营商、设备供应商和其他技术寻求合作，形成了一套“远交近攻”的频谱战略。目前3G无线网络的频段分为FDD(频分双工FrequencyDivisionDuplex)和TDD(时分双工TimeDivisionDuplex)两类，WCDMA、CDMA2000分享了FDD的频段，而TD-SCDMA则独占了TDD频段，而WiMAX在上述两种频段都能够使用。为了获得WCDMA、CDMA2000阵营的支持，WiMAX方面最终放弃了FDD频段。而对于支持TD-SCDMA的中国，WiMAX阵营也进行了紧锣密鼓的宣传攻关，连续2年将高规格的“WiMAX全球峰会”放在北京召开。在强大的公关下，WiMAX势如破竹地获得了多数阵营的支持。今年1月底，国际电信联盟8F工作组在喀麦隆举行会谈，着重讨论WiMAX成为3G中的一员；6月初ITU日本京都会议上，WiMAX技术顺利地通过了工作组级别的讨论；到了10月19日，ITU正式宣布，已经批准WiMAX成为ITU移动无线标准，即与WCDMA、CDMA2000和TD-SCDMA并列成为全球3G标准。在最终的方案中，ITU将WiMAX列为时分双工TDD(TimeDivisionDuplex)技术，和TD-SCDMA分享这一频段，TD-SCDMA阵营则成了最大的输家。“WiMAX成为3G标准堵死了TD国际化道路。”资深通信专家项立刚认为，WiMAX对于其他几个3G标准而言是竞争者，会瓜分掉部分市场，但对我国提出的TD标准而言，是一次重大打击。不过，WiMAX虽已被接纳为3G标准，但还在等待ITU为其指派频谱资源，博弈还在继续。
en: Analysis: WiMAX "degrades" to join the 3G melee. Huangsha, a reporter of this newspaper, On October 19, the International Telecommunication Union ITU held a plenary meeting of the RadioAssembly of the Geneva International Telecommunication Union. The participating countries voted formally to approve that the wireless broadband technology WiMAX officially became the 3G standard. The WiMAX Forum said in the white paper that adding mobile WiMAX to the 3G family provides operators with a new way to upgrade the network. "After Mobile WiMAX officially became a 3G technology, service providers can get more choices and greater flexibility when deploying networks and launching services. For example, they can provide access services in sparsely populated areas, or provide enhanced access services in densely populated areas. In addition, global open standards help to improve interoperability between different devices and reduce device costs, so that service providers will benefit from it." As a standard regarded as a "quasi 4G" standard higher than the existing 3G standard, WiMAX has been eye catching since its birth. WiMAX, also known as IEEE802.16x, is called "Worldwide Interoperability for Microwave Access". Compared with the three 3G standards of TD-SCDMA, WCDMA and CDMA2000, the maximum transmission radius of WiMAX is up to 50 kilometers, almost twice that of the former. In terms of transmission speed, WiMAX also makes other 3G standards inaccessible. Within 10 kilometers, the bandwidth of WiMAX network can reach 70Mbps, even exceeding the technology of wired networks such as ADSL, while the mainstream wireless GPRS has the highest transmission speed of 115Kbps, and TD-SCDMA and WCDMA in 3G standards are 2Mbps. With the upgrading of technology, WiMAX has been more divided into 802.16D and 802.16E since 2005. 802.16D is a fixed wireless network, which can be combined with the existing fixed wired network as a direct upgrade of wifi, and has won popularity around the world. However, the 802.16E mobile wireless network has a direct confrontation with the existing network of mobile operators. However, this is a standard born with a gold key. While improving mobility, it finds that it is facing the serious problem of having no spectrum resources. To compete for the market in the field of mobile communications, the most important thing is to have a global unified frequency band. But as early as April 2001, the ITU had allocated the most suitable band to the world's three major 3G standards, WCDMA, CDMA2000 and TD-SCDMA proposed by China. More deadly is that the deadline for submitting 3G proposals has expired as early as 1998. According to the tradition of ITU, the 3G standard has been frozen, and WiMAX faces the embarrassment of having no band. Without bands, this wireless broadband technology can never realize interval roaming, which is fatal to mobile communication networks. In the case of 4G standards not being established globally and 3G network construction is in full swing, the WiMAX camp can't sit still. Since this year, the US government and various manufacturers of the WiMAX camp have carried out a strong public relations and lobbying campaign, hoping to "downgrade" WiMAX to join the 3G standard and get a share of the existing market. According to relevant experts, since the beginning of this year, the International Telegraph and Telephone Union has started to study the possibility of "OFDMATDDWMAN (802.16e, mobile mode of WiMAX)" air interface technology to become the IMT-2000 standard. However, Ericsson, Qualcomm and TD, which represent the three major camps of WCDMA and CDMA2000 and TD-SCDMA, have strongly resisted WiMAX's application to join the 3G standard, and Germany, China and other countries have also expressed opposition. Dr. Cao Qiang, vice president of Spreadtrum Communications Co., Ltd., believes that compared with TD-SCDMA and other 3G standards, although WiMAX has incomparable advantages in terms of cost, network construction speed and service access capabilities, WiMAX also has the embarrassment of being congenitally insufficient. WiMAX has too large system signaling overhead in supporting mobility and low cell edge capability; Mobile WiMAX and Fixed WiMAX are not compatible at the physical level; Standardization is not comprehensive, focusing only on L1 and L2, and lacks RF specifications; The standardization mechanism is not sound, and the frequent voting mechanism is difficult to guarantee its integrity; Too many options lead to increased system overhead and instability, and there are problems such as poor product interoperability. However, under the mutual lobbying and compromise of major interest groups, the WiMAX camp has sought cooperation with the government, operators, equipment suppliers and other technologies to form a spectrum strategy of "far diplomacy and near attack". At present, the frequency band of 3G wireless network is divided into FDD (Frequency Division Duplex) and TDD (Time Division Duplex). WCDMA and CDMA2000 share the FDD band, while TD-SCDMA is exclusive to the TDD band, and WiMAX can use the above two bands. In order to win the support of WCDMA and CDMA2000 camps, WiMAX has finally abandoned the FDD band. For China, which supports TD-SCDMA, the WiMAX camp also launched a tight publicity campaign, and held the high-specification "WiMAX Global Summit" in Beijing for two consecutive years. Under the powerful public relations, WiMAX has won the support of most camps like a broken bamboo. At the end of January this year, the ITU 8F working group held talks in Cameroon, focusing on WiMAX becoming a member of 3G; At the ITU meeting in Kyoto, Japan in early June, WiMAX technology successfully passed the discussion at the working group level; On October 19, the ITU officially announced that it had approved WiMAX as the ITU mobile wireless standard, that is, it became the global 3G standard parallel to WCDMA, CDMA2000 and TD-SCDMA. In the final proposal, ITU lists WiMAX as a time division duplex TDD (Time Division Duplex) technology, sharing this band with TD-SCDMA, and the TD-SCDMA camp has become the biggest loser. "WiMAX becomes a 3G standard to block the international road of TD." Xiang Ligang, a senior communication expert, believes that WiMAX is a competitor to other 3G standards, which will take away some of the market, but it is a huge blow to the TD standard proposed by China. However, although WiMAX has been accepted as the 3G standard, it is still waiting for ITU to assign spectrum resources to it, and the game is still going on.

content: 科比坐板凳把手感坐凉一打五暴扣仍难敌群狼发威新浪体育讯　北京时间11月6日，洛杉矶湖人队坐镇主场，迎战同城对手快船。这不过是湖人本赛季的四场比赛，但已经是第二次洛城德比了。湖人之前战胜掘金迎来三连胜，而在休整了几天之后，紫金军团又要上路了。一周前的第一场洛城德比，快船遭遇惨败，而今天拜伦-戴维斯希望复仇，也渴望拿下他来快船后的第一场胜利。而跟第一战不同的是，昔日联盟最佳防守球员坎比今天也首发出场，双塔对拼也是一大看点。快船对湖人，当第一节结束而分差在5分之内的时候，第二节会发生什么？毫无疑问，湖人会马上取得领先，因为他们有一帮活力四射的替补杀手。第二节的替补时刻是湖人的常规节目，拉马尔-奥多姆带着一帮替补，外加拜纳姆镇守内线，法玛尔和武贾西奇两个白人小个提供外围火力，这样的阵容果然奏效，第二节开始不过5分钟就把比分反超了5分。当然这跟两队上一场相遇时的情况有些不同，那次湖人他替补们的表现更加恐怖，不过反超比分总算是他们完成了任务。第二节还剩6分钟湖人重新派上科比加索尔，但小飞侠在板凳上坐了半天手感受到了影响，几次尝试自己进攻都没能命中。双方陷入苦战，得分都变得异常艰难。而在湖人用罚球连续得到4分之后，快船卷土重来了。戴维斯漂亮的抢断加索尔发动快攻轻松拿分，接着又是外线射手发炮，比分瞬间被反超。而科比则陷入低迷，他想要站出来接管比赛，但一次投篮在干扰之下弹筐而出，一次更是被逼到篮板后面投出三不沾。
person: 戴维斯,科比,坎比,法玛尔,拜纳姆,加索尔,奥多姆,武贾西奇
en: Kobe's bench cooled his hands and five dunks were still hard to beat the raging wolves. Sina Sports News On November 6, Beijing time, the Los Angeles Lakers played at home against their local rivals, the Clippers. This is only four games of the Lakers this season, but it is the second time that the Lakers have played against the Lakers. The Lakers had just won three consecutive games after defeating the Nuggets, and after taking a few days off, the Purple and Gold Army had to go on the road again. In the first Los Angeles derby a week ago, the Clippers suffered a惨defeat, and today Byron Davis hoped to take revenge and win his first victory since he came to the Clippers. However, unlike the first battle, the best defensive player in the league, Camby, also made his first appearance today, and the double tower fight was also a highlight. When the Clippers played against the Lakers, what would happen in the second quarter when the first quarter ended and the score difference was within 5 points? There is no doubt that the Lakers will take the lead immediately because they have a group of energetic substitute killers. The second quarter's substitution moment is the Lakers' regular program. Lamar Odom brings a group of substitutes, plus Bynum to guard the interior line. Farmar and Wujacic, two white little figures, provide peripheral firepower. This lineup really works. It took only five minutes at the beginning of the second quarter to overtake the score by 5 points. Of course, this is somewhat different from the situation when the two teams met last time. At that time, their substitutes performed more terrorly, but they have completed their task by over scoring. With 6 minutes left in the second quarter, the Lakers sent Kobe Gasol back, but the little flying saucer had been sitting on the bench for a long time, and his hand was affected. Several attempts to attack on his own failed to hit. Both sides were trapped in a hard fight, and scoring became abnormally difficult. After the Lakers scored four consecutive free throws, the Clippers came back again. Davis made a nice steal, Gasol launched a fast attack to score easily, and then the outside shooter launched a shot, and the score was instantly exceeded. Kobe fell into a slump. He wanted to stand up and take over the game, but one shot bounced out under the interference of the rim, and the other was forced to make three shots behind the backboard.

content: 考研专业课最后十天冲刺：把握书本分析真题我们都知道这样一个规律：一般来说，公共课的复习效果不及专业课的复习效果快，投入相同的时间，成绩的增长量却并不相同。公共课像政治和英语，即使你花费再多的精力，在考试中也有可能很难获得很高的分数。因此，万学•海文建议众学子们：考研复习后期，在保证一定量政治、英语的复习时间上，在保证通过学校最低分数线的基础上，应多投入时间到专业课复习上。专业课的高分意味着你通过初试的几率增大。因此，提高专业课成绩，是提高考研总分的唯一途径。在距离考试的这最后十天的时间里，关于专业课的复习，希望大家注意以下两点：把握书本有些考生使用的是其他版本的专业课参考书，如果是这样，我建议您在考试前看一遍指定参考书。指定参考书是考试出题的依据，里面的一些内容是其他版本的参考书上没有的，或者比其他版本的参考书阐述的更全面，考生要熟悉这些新内容。考生可以看着指定参考书的目录，回想自己对某一章节的掌握程度，当发现某些知识遗忘了或者模糊时，打开书熟悉巩固一下。考试是有重点的，什么是重点，什么是非重点，可以根据历年考题，课后习题，课堂笔记，辅导班讲义等判断。考生应该花较多的时间在经常考的重点内容上。当然也不能忽视一些小字内容，一些不常考的知识,应该投入小部分时间在这些内容上,确保知识的完整性。分析真题理科考生的专业课考试中往往涉及很多计算。如果以前已经做过很多题目，现在可以不必埋头做很多新题目，可以花一些时间看以前做过的题目，想题目的解题思路、解题技巧、注意事项等。如果在以前的复习中，大部分时间都花在看书上，题目做的很少，现在就需要做一些题目。因为读懂了书，并不意味着能快速做题，能做对题目。通过现在的做题，检测一下自己对某些知识的掌握程度。做题过程中，发现自己的不足后，应及时寻找解决办法。比如做题粗心，就应该试着细心；忘记公式，就应重背公式。做的题目不应很难，花半天时间做对一道题目是的不值得的，抓基础和重点才是关键。考生如有历年试卷，应仔细研读试卷中的题目，试卷是一面镜子，在一定程度上能反映今年的考题。甚至在专业课考试中，不同的年份，会有相同的考题出现。做往年试题时，要试着把握出题重点，掌握出题规律，熟悉做题方法。对于考本专业的同学，一定要充分重视自己的专业学习，不能以为自己学了四年就一定比别人强，不然很可能阴沟里翻船。专业课最容易得分也最容易失分，如果你答错或答偏了一个大题，可能一下就和别人拉开了近10分的距离。除了看考试用书外，要注意多阅览与本专业相关的论文，最重要的是，本专业的学生在复习时要学会用一种专家的眼光看待业内的一些问题，甚至包括自己的复习用书，要敢于审问、质疑。这样在答题时才会有新思路，不人云亦云，这是专业课得高分的关键。当然大家要注意掌握分寸，不要发挥得太离谱。对于跨专业的同学来说，应该早点去听所考专业的课程，这有两个好处：一是早点积累专业知识，培养专业感觉；二是通过听专业老师的授课，尽早自己要考哪个老师的研究生，可以直接向老师表明心迹，让老师熟悉你、了解你，这样一方面自己的专业学习能够有人指导，另一方面会让自己的复试时心里有底，顺利很多。不过，最后的这几天可能说这个已经为时已晚，希望能给2010年考研的同学一个参考吧。最后，希望大家利用这最后的十天时间把握住考研的重中之重，拿下专业课的高分，那么，进入复试的几率就会大大增加。加油，学子们！祝你们好运！更多信息请访问：新浪考研频道考研论坛考研博客圈特别说明：由于各方面情况的不断调整与变化，新浪网所提供的所有考试信息仅供参考，敬请考生以权威部门公布的正式信息为准。
en: The last ten days of the postgraduate examination for professional courses: grasp the textbook to analyze the true questions. We all know that there is a rule: generally speaking, the review effect of public courses is not as fast as that of professional courses. If the same time is invested, the growth of scores is different. Public courses such as politics and English may not get high scores in the examination even if you spend more energy. Therefore, Wanxue•Haiwen suggests that students should spend more time on the review of professional courses on the basis of ensuring a certain amount of time for political and English review and passing the school's minimum pass line in the later period of postgraduate examination review. High scores in professional courses mean that you have a greater chance of passing the preliminary examination. Therefore, improving the professional course score is the only way to improve the total score of the postgraduate examination. In the last ten days before the exam, with regard to the review of professional courses, I hope everyone can pay attention to the following two points: grasp the textbook. Some examinees use other versions of professional course reference books. If so, I suggest you read the designated reference book before the exam. The designated reference book is the basis for the examination. Some of its contents are not available in other versions of the reference book, or it is more comprehensive than other versions of the reference book. Candidates should be familiar with these new contents. Candidates can look at the catalog of the designated reference book to recall their mastery of a certain chapter. When they find that some knowledge is forgotten or vague, open the book to get familiar with it. The examination focuses on what is the focus and what is not the focus. According to the examination questions, class exercises, class notes, tutoring class syllabus and so on. Candidates should spend more time on the key content that is often examined. Of course, we should not ignore some small characters and some knowledge that is not often tested. We should spend a small amount of time on these contents to ensure the integrity of knowledge. Analysis of the true questions of science candidates often involves a lot of calculation in the professional course examination. If you have done a lot of problems before, now you can do not do a lot of new problems, but you can spend some time looking at the problems you have done before, thinking about the problem solving ideas, problem solving skills, matters needing attention, etc. If most of the time in the previous review was spent on reading, and few questions were asked, we need to do some questions now. Because reading a book does not mean that you can quickly answer questions or answer them correctly. By doing the questions now, you can test your mastery of some knowledge. In the process of doing questions, after finding their shortcomings, they should find solutions in time. For example, if you are careless in doing questions, you should try to be careful; If you forget the formula, you should reback the formula. The questions you ask should not be too difficult. It is not worth spending half a day doing a question. The key is to grasp the foundation and focus. If the examinee has the examination papers of the past years, he should carefully study the questions in the examination papers. The examination paper is a mirror, which can reflect the examination questions of this year to a certain extent. Even in the professional course examination, there will be the same examination questions in different years. When doing the examination questions of the past years, try to grasp the key points of the examination questions, master the rules of the examination questions, and get familiar with the methods of doing the questions. For students who are taking the examination of their major, they must pay full attention to their professional study. They must not think that they are necessarily better than others because they have studied for four years. Otherwise, they are likely to capsize in the gutter. Professional courses are the easiest to score and the easiest to lose points. If you answer or deviate from a major question, you may immediately open a gap of nearly 10 points with others. In addition to reading the examination books, we should pay attention to reading more papers related to our major. The most important thing is that students of this major should learn to use an expert's perspective to look at some problems in the industry when reviewing, and even include their review books. They should be brave enough to question and question. Only in this way, when answering questions, will there be new ideas, instead of following the crowd. This is the key to getting high scores in professional courses. Of course, everyone should pay attention to moderation and not overdo it. For students in different majors, they should go to listen to the courses of the major to be examined as early as possible. This has two advantages: one is to accumulate professional knowledge and cultivate professional sense as early as possible; The second is that by listening to the teaching of professional teachers, we can get to know which teacher's graduate student we are going to take the examination as early as possible, and we can directly show our heart to the teacher, so that the teacher can get familiar with you and understand you. In this way, on the one hand, our professional study can be guided by someone, and on the other hand, we will have a lot of confidence in our second round examination. However, it may be too late to say this for the last few days, I hope it can be a reference for students who are taking the 2010 postgraduate examination. Finally, I hope everyone can take the most important thing of the postgraduate examination in the last ten days, get high scores in the professional course, and then the chance of entering the second round will be greatly increased. Come on, students! I wish you good luck! For more information, please visit: Sina Postgraduate Examination Channel Postgraduate Examination Forum Postgraduate Blog Circle Special Note: Due to the continuous adjustment and change of circumstances, all the examination information provided by Sina is for reference only. Please take the formal information published by the authoritative department as the standard.

content: iF设计大奖的作品：数码胶卷概念设计大家应该都知道了，前几天出现的RE-35数码胶卷只是一个愚人节的玩笑。不过数码胶片这个概念可是应该算不得新鲜了，大约十年前，就有一家叫做SilicomFilm的公司提出过，并且还在PMA2001上展出过样品。这里出现的，则是另一个来自韩国弘益(HongikUniversity)的数码胶片概念设计，该设计是用来参加iF设计大奖的作品。
en: iF design award works: everyone should know that the digital film concept design has been a joke on April Fool's Day a few days ago. However, the concept of digital film should not be considered new. About ten years ago, a company called SilicomFilm proposed it and showed a sample at PMA2001. Here is another digital film concept design from Hongik University in South Korea, which is a work for the iF Design Award.

content: 宝峰澄清郭镇清就销售额的陈述仅为个人意见新浪财经讯1月19日消息，宝峰国际(01121)发布公告称，有关财务总监郭镇清于记者会指出，截至2009年12月31日止3年度集团自有品牌产品的全年销售额增加最少约50%至60%，并表示认为集团的目标是维持自有品牌产品全年销售额增长率在约50%至60%的陈述，乃郭镇清的个人意见，不应视为公司的意见或经全体董事会或公司批准的集团正式销售目标。董事会谨此进一步澄清，郭镇清并无表示集团的全年销售总额将会有50%至65%的增幅。董事会认为，有关全球发售及集团的所有重大资料已于招股章程披露。欢迎发表评论我要评论
en: Baofeng clarified that Guo Zhenqing's statement on sales was only a personal opinion. Sina Finance News reported on January 19 that Baofeng International (01121) announced that Guo Zhenqing, the chief financial officer, pointed out at the press conference that the annual sales of the group's self-owned brand products for three years ended December 31, 2009 increased by at least 50% to 60%, and he said that it was his personal opinion that the group's goal was to maintain the annual sales growth rate of self-owned brand products at about 50% to 60%, which should not be regarded as the company's opinion or the group's official sales target approved by the whole board of directors or the company. The Board of Directors hereby further clarifies that Guo Zhenqing did not indicate that the total annual sales of the Group would increase by 50% to 65%. The Board of Directors believes that all material information concerning the global offering and the Group has been disclosed in the prospectus. Welcome to comment I want to comment

content: 何冲6年一冠超越熊倪彭勃成中国男板大满贯第1人新浪体育讯　谁是中国男子3米跳板第一位大满贯得主？答案是何冲，今晚他在罗马世锦赛决战中有惊无险地夺得该项目金牌，继08世界杯、奥运会后又一次走上3米板单人跳冠军领奖台，罗马世锦赛的成功，使他填补中国跳水的一项空白——男子3米跳板大满贯。奥运会跳水赛四个传统项目，跳水国手填补的最后一项空白就是男子跳板，1996年亚特兰大奥运会熊倪与队友余卓成分获3米跳板冠亚军，攻克中国跳水在当时奥运赛场上的最后一个障碍。四年后的悉尼奥运会，熊倪蝉联3米跳板单人跳冠军，他还与队友肖海亮成为历史上第一对男板双人跳冠军，为自己的运动生涯划上一个完美句号。不过，熊倪却未能实现男板大满贯荣誉，因为他在世锦赛、世界杯赛场未获得过一枚单人跳板金牌。第二位奥运会跳板冠军是彭勃，他是在雅典奥运会获得这一荣誉的。与熊倪一样，彭勃在另两项大赛也没有摘取单人跳金牌。其实，何冲本有希望在北京奥运会就可实现“男板第一人”梦想的。何冲有着高人一筹的身体素质，2005年十运会年仅18岁的他力压彭勃、王天凌、罗玉通等国内众多高手，出人意料地夺得男子1米板冠军和3米板亚军。更早些时候举行的05世锦赛，初涉世界三大赛的何冲与王峰联袂夺得3米跳板双人跳冠军，单人跳紧随德斯帕蒂、杜迈斯之后名列第三。凭借一系列国际比赛的杰出战绩，06常熟世界杯前夕何冲已成为国内男板第一人，角逐三米跳板单人、双人和一米跳板三个赛项。当时何冲的全套动作难度系数在世界属于顶尖水平，还掌握着高达成3.8的5156B，被誉为“难度王”。常熟战役，何冲夺得后两项冠军，但在含金量更足的三米板单人跳决赛中，赛前夺冠呼声最高的他却在107B动作发生重大失误，此跳被裁判亮了零分，最终仅获第5名。一年后的墨尔本世锦赛，何冲又一次因为失误与金牌失之交臂。前两轮领先的他在第三、四轮连续出现失误，名次一下子落到第十，最终仅获第6名。连续两次失利也使何冲在三米板的影响力被秦凯反超。去年2月在北京举行的世界杯跳水赛，是北京奥运会前最重要的一次热身赛，那次何冲没有让机遇溜走，最终以15分的优势击败秦凯，夺得自己第一枚金牌。这枚金牌的获得，也为何冲后来冲击08奥运会金牌增添信心，并为今天实现男板大满贯殊荣奠定了基础。(王全立)
person: 彭勃,熊倪,肖海亮,罗玉通,德斯帕蒂,王天凌,何冲,杜迈斯,王全立,秦凯,王峰,余卓成
en: Who is China's first men's 3m platform Grand Slam champion? He Chong is the answer. Tonight, he won the gold medal of this event in the World Championships in Rome without any risk. After the 08 World Cup and the Olympic Games, he once again won the championship of the 3m board single jump. The success of the World Championships in Rome made him fill in a blank of Chinese diving - the men's 3m platform Grand Slam. The four traditional events of the Olympic diving competition are the last event of the diving national team to fill in the blank of the men's diving board. Xiong Ni and his teammate Yu Zhuocheng won the 3m diving board championship and the runner-up in the 1996 Atlanta Olympic Games,攻克the last obstacle of Chinese diving in the Olympic arena at that time. Four years later, at the Sydney Olympic Games, Xiong Ni won the championship of the 3m diving board again. He also became the first male double diving champion in history with his teammate Xiao Hai, drawing a perfect full stop for his sports career. However, Xiong Ni did not achieve the honor of men's board Grand Slam, because he did not win a single gold medal in the World Championships and the World Cup. The second Olympic diving champion is Peng Bo, who won the honor in the Athens Olympic Games. Like Xiong Ni, Peng Bo did not win the gold medal of the individual jump in the other two major events. In fact, He Chong had hoped to realize the dream of "the first person in the male board" in the Beijing Olympic Games. He Chong has a superior physical quality. At the age of 18 in 2005, he defeated many domestic experts such as Peng Bo, Wang Tianling and Luo Yutong, and unexpectedly won the men's 1m board championship and the 3m board runner-up. The 05 World Championships, which was held earlier, was the first world top three events for He Chong, who won the 3m diving board double championship with Wang Feng, and the single diving board ranked third behind Despati and Du Meis. With a series of outstanding achievements in international competitions, He Chong had become the first male player in China at the beginning of the 06 Changshu World Cup, competing in three events: single, double and one meter diving. At that time, He Chong's complete set of action difficulty coefficients were at the top level in the world, and he also had a 5156B as high as 3.8, which was called "King of Difficulty". Changshu campaign, He Chong won the latter two championships, but in the more gold containing 3m board single jump final, the most popular champion before the game made a major mistake in the 107B action. This jump was scored zero by the referee, and finally he only won the fifth place. At the Melbourne World Championships a year later, He Chong lost his chance of winning the gold medal again because of his mistakes. He made consecutive mistakes in the third and fourth rounds when he was leading in the first two rounds, and his ranking dropped to tenth place at once, and finally he only won the sixth place. The two consecutive defeats also led He Chong to be surpassed by Qin Kai in his influence on the three meter board. The World Cup diving competition held in Beijing last February was the most important warm-up competition before the Beijing Olympic Games. At that time, He Chong did not let the opportunity slip away. Finally, he defeated Qin Kai with a 15-point advantage and won his first gold medal. The acquisition of this gold medal also increased He Chong's confidence in his later attack on the 08 Olympic gold medal, and laid the foundation for today's achievement of the honor of the Grand Slam of male boards. (Wang Quanli)

content: 收盘：道指跌21点纳指跌9点新浪财经讯因政府报告显示九月份丧失工作人数高于预期，美股周五低收。劳工部表示，九月份共丧失26.3万个工作岗位，高于八月份20.1万个，也远高于经济学家的18万的预期，失业率上升至9.8%，创26年新高。就业报告通常被视为是一个月中最重要的经济报告，失业人数的减少是经济可持续复苏的关键。芝加哥IGMarkets资深市场分析师丹-库克(DanCook)指出，“过去两个月里投资者都以为就业市场已好转，显然，这不是事实。”截至收盘，道琼斯工业平均指数下跌了21.61点，报收9487.67点，跌幅为0.23%；纳斯达克综合指数下跌了9.37点，报收2048.11点，跌幅为0.46%；标准普尔500指数下跌了4.64点，报收1025.11点，跌幅为0.35%。八月份工厂订单下降0.8%，而市场预期为增长。这份经济报告也打击了投资者对经济复苏的信心。由于近期公布的经济数据欠佳，投资者开始质疑美股过去6个月里上涨50%的势头能否延续。美股在过去8个交易日里有7个交易日下跌。道指已从9月23日的高点下降了4.3%。纽约WynstonHillCapital合伙人BruceShalett指出，“就业报告提醒我们虽然形势较一年前有所好转，但问题依然多多。”HaverfordInvestments首席投资官HankSmith则表示，“市场的下跌将继续被看作是买进良机。”道指盘中最低下跌79点，收盘时下跌21点。纽约证交所总成交量从周四的60亿股下降至56亿股，股票涨跌比为1比2。道指本周共下跌1.8%，标准普尔500指数下跌1.8%，纳指下跌2%。道指与标准普尔500指数在三季度均上涨15%。三季度是道指自1998年以来表现最好的一个季度。国债市场有所下跌，10年期国债收益率从周四的3.18%上升至3.22%。美元对其它主要货币汇率涨跌互见，纽约商业交易所交投最活跃的黄金期12月合约上涨3.60美元，收于1004.30美元/盎司，涨幅为0.4%。11月轻质低硫原油期货合约下跌87美分，收于69.95美元，跌幅为1.2%。罗素2000种小盘股指数下跌了3.55点，收报580.20点，跌幅为0.6%。该指数本周总计下跌3.1%。法国CAC-40指数下跌1.90%，收于3,649.90点。德国DAX30指数下跌1.56%，收于5,467.90点。英国富时100指数下跌1.17%，跌破4,988.70点关口，收于4,988.70点。日本日经指数下跌了2.5%。
en: Closing: Dow Jones fell 21 points and Nasdaq fell 9 points. Sina Finance reported that the US stock market closed low on Friday because the government's report showed that the number of jobs lost in September was higher than expected. The Ministry of Labor said that a total of 263000 jobs were lost in September, higher than 201000 in August, and far higher than the expectation of 180000 economists, the unemployment rate rose to 9.8%, the highest level in 26 years. The employment report is usually regarded as the most important economic report in a month, and the reduction of the number of unemployed people is the key to the sustainable economic recovery. Dan Cook, a senior market analyst at Chicago IGMarkets, pointed out that "investors thought the job market had improved in the past two months, obviously, that's not the case." At the close, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 21.61 points to close at 9487.67, down 0.23%; The Nasdaq Composite Index fell 9.37 points to close at 2048.11 points, down 0.46%; The S & P 500 Index fell 4.64 points to close at 1025.11 points, down 0.35%. Factory orders fell 0.8% in August, contrary to market expectations. The economic report also hit investors' confidence in the economic recovery. Because the recently released economic data is poor, investors began to question whether the 50% increase in the US stock market in the past six months can continue. The US stock market has fallen for 7 trading days in the past 8 trading days. The Dow Jones Index has fallen 4.3% from its high on September 23. Bruce Shalett, a partner of Wynston Hill Capital in New York, pointed out that "the employment report reminds us that although the situation has improved from a year ago, there are still many problems." Hank Smith, chief investment officer of Haverford Investments, said that "the decline of the market will continue to be regarded as a good opportunity to buy." The Dow Jones Index fell 79 points in the lowest trading day and closed down 21 points. The total trading volume of the New York Stock Exchange fell from 6 billion shares on Thursday to 5.6 billion shares, with a ratio of 1 to 2 for stock rises and falls. The Dow Jones Index fell 1.8% this week, the S & P 500 Index fell 1.8%, and the Nasdaq Index fell 2%. Both the Dow Jones Industrial Average and the S & P 500 Index rose 15% in the third quarter. The third quarter was the best quarter for the Dow Jones Index since 1998. The Treasury market fell, and the yield on 10-year Treasury bonds rose from 3.18% on Thursday to 3.22%. The dollar rose and fell against other major currencies. The most active gold futures contract for December in the New York Mercantile Exchange rose $3.60 to close at $1004.30 per ounce, up 0.4%. The November light low sulfur crude oil futures contract fell 87 cents to close at $69.95, down 1.2%. The Russell 2000 Small Stock Index fell 3.55 points to close at 580.20, down 0.6%. The index fell a total of 3.1% this week. The French CAC-40 Index fell 1.90% to close at 3,649.90. The German DAX30 Index fell 1.56% to close at 5,467.90. The British FTSE 100 Index fell 1.17%, breaking through the 4988.70 point pass and closing at 4988.70. The Japanese Nikkei Index fell 2.5%.

content: 考研辅导：复习进入瓶颈状态该如何突破？案例：小李汉语言文学报考华中科技大学语言学及应用学前段时间的复习比较顺利，感觉成绩提高也非常快。可是这两周以来，复习似乎进入了瓶颈状态。英语阅读没有太大突破，专业课进度也非常缓慢。辛苦一天下来，没有了成就感，人却变得越来越急躁。每天如坐针毡地呆在自习室里，复习资料翻了一遍又一遍，却一个字也看不进去，复习效率越来越低。要是一直这样下去，知识点根本看不完。我开始有些灰心了！当复习进入瓶颈状态时，人往往容易变得急躁、沮丧、灰心。此时重要的不在于突破知识点，而在于调整心态。试着深呼吸一下、在心里告诉自己不要着急、抑或在床头写上诸如“心平气和”一类的字样，相信你的急躁会慢慢远离你，自信会悄悄回到你身边。某教育机构张老师给大家支几招，希望能帮助大家突破瓶颈。1.真诚地接受坏心情的存在虽然我们每个人都希望自己永远拥有好心情，但事实上生活中总会碰到这样那样不顺心的事情，坏心情自然也不可避免。尤其是在复习考研的过程中，背单词、阅读短文、上辅导班、收集专业课资料等等事情多如牛毛，不可能事事顺利。所以，当坏心情存在时，首先要做的就是真诚地接受它的存在。如果我们不能真诚地接受它，因由坏心情的出现而焦躁不安，反而会使我们的心情变得更加糟糕。这样就会进入“心情不好——讨厌心情不好——烦躁——心情更不好”的恶性循环。当我们真诚地接受坏心情的存在时，我们的各种消极情绪反而会悄悄地溜走。这样就会进入“心情不好——接受心情不好——心平气和——心情变得好一些”的良性循环。2.改变看法，改变心情理性情绪疗法的核心观点认为：我们的情绪不是来源于事件本身，而是来源于我们对事件的看法。也许大家都知道一个经典的故事：两个人走在茫茫的沙漠上，他们都有半瓶水。其中一个人很焦急地说“糟糕，只有半瓶水了”，而另一个人却高兴地说“太好了，还有半瓶水”。同样拥有半瓶水，两个人的心情为什么截然不同呢？原来他们看待半瓶水的角度不同，一个人看到了消极的一面，而另一个人看到的是积极的一面。遇到不顺心的事时，换个角度看看这件事情，心情会有所不同的，正所谓“塞翁失马，焉知非福”！今天自我测试虽然成绩不佳，但从测试中找到了自己的问题所在；早上没能够早起背单词，但多睡了一会，精神饱满，更能够提高学习效率。3.积极的自我暗示关注了第29届北京奥运会的同学肯定知道，撑杆跳冠军伊辛巴耶娃在跳前都要蒙在被子里，准备起跑时嘴里还在嘟噜着什么。她为什么要蒙在被子里呢？她在嘟噜什么呢？事实上，伊辛巴耶娃蒙在被子里除了不让照相机干扰自己外，最重要的是在被子里调节自己的情绪，告诉自己“我是最好的”。从心理学的角度来看，这是她在进行积极的自我暗示。也是在北京奥运会上，李佳薇和张怡宁比赛时，我们通过镜头可以看到李佳薇手心里写着一个“稳”字。还有上文提到的郭芙蓉对自己说“世界如此美妙……”，这些其实都是在进行一种积极的自我暗示。在复习考研的过程中，我们也可以通过积极的自我暗示来调节自己的心情。早上洗脸时，对着镜子朝自己微笑；对自己说或在显眼的地方写上一些激励性的话语，如“我很棒”、“保持好心情，提高复习效率”等。这里特别要注意的是，千万不要给自己消极的自我暗示。不要总对自己说“我很糟糕”、“今天真的很倒霉”等话语。如果你总是对自己进行消极的自我暗示，你会发现你真的就会变得很糟糕、很倒霉。就如小品《卖拐》中，赵本山的几句“拐了拐了”就真的让范伟拐了一样。此外，同学们不妨试着调整复习思路，毕竟适合自己的复习方法才是最好的。很多同学们不了解自己的看书习惯或者阅读习惯，所以参考别人的复习方案，或者单纯图块，就为自己制定了一个名副其实的考研计划。其效果如何，可想而知。
person: 赵本山,郭芙蓉,李佳薇,小李,张老师,伊辛巴耶娃,范伟,张怡宁
en: Postgraduate counseling: how to break through when review enters the bottleneck state? Case: Xiao Li, who applied for Chinese linguistics at Huazhong University of Science and Technology, has been well prepared for a period of time, and he feels very fast improvement. However, in the past two weeks, the review seemed to have entered a bottleneck. There is not much breakthrough in English reading, and the progress of professional courses is very slow. After a hard day's work, there is no sense of achievement, but people become more and more irritable. I sit in the study room like a needle every day, turn over the review materials again and again, but I can't read a word, and the review efficiency is getting lower and lower. If it goes on like this, there is no way to finish the knowledge points. I began to lose heart! When the review enters the bottleneck state, people tend to become impetuous, frustrated and discouraged. At this time, the important thing is not to break through the knowledge point, but to adjust the mentality. Try to take a deep breath, tell yourself not to worry in your heart, or write words such as "peace of mind" on the pillow. Believe that your impatience will slowly leave you and confidence will quietly return to you. Zhang, a teacher of an educational institution, gave everyone some suggestions, hoping to help everyone break through the bottleneck. 1. Sincerely accept the existence of bad mood Although we all hope that we will always have a good mood, in fact, there will always be such and such unhappy things in life, and bad mood is inevitable. Especially in the process of reviewing for postgraduate exams, there are many things such as memorizing words, reading short articles, attending tutoring classes, and collecting professional course materials, so it is impossible to do everything well. So, when bad mood exists, the first thing to do is to sincerely accept its existence. If we can't sincerely accept it, we will become more worried because of the appearance of bad mood, which will make our mood worse. This will create a vicious cycle of "bad mood - hate bad mood - irritability - bad mood". When we sincerely accept the existence of bad feelings, all kinds of negative emotions will quietly slip away from us. This will create a virtuous cycle of "bad mood - accept bad mood - calm down - get better mood". 2. Change your perspective and change your mood The core view of rational emotion therapy is that our emotions do not come from the event itself, but from our view of the event. Perhaps everyone knows a classic story: two people are walking in the vast desert, and they both have half a bottle of water. One person said anxiously, "Bad, there is only half a bottle of water", while the other said happily, "Good, there is still half a bottle of water". Why are the moods of the two people so different when they have the same half bottle of water? Originally, they looked at the half bottle of water from different angles. One person saw the negative side, while the other saw the positive side. When encountering unhappy things, take a different perspective to look at them, and your mood will be different, as the saying goes, "The loss of a horse in Sai翁is a blessing in disguise!" Although the self test today was not good, the problems were found from the test; In the morning, I was not able to get up early to learn words, but I slept for a while, full of energy, and was able to improve my learning efficiency. 3. Positive self暗示When paying attention to the 29th Beijing Olympic Games, students must know that Yelena Isinbayeva, the champion of pole vault, has to be covered in a quilt before jumping, and he is still mumbling when he is ready to start. Why does she have to cover herself in a quilt? What is she mumbling about? In fact, in addition to preventing the camera from interfering with herself, Yelena Isinbayeva's most important thing is to adjust her emotions in her quilt and tell herself "I am the best". From the perspective of psychology, this is her positive self暗示. Li Jiawei and Zhang Yining also wrote a "steady" word in their hands when they competed in the Beijing Olympic Games. Guo Fulong said to himself, "The world is so wonderful..." These are all positive self-suggestions. In the process of reviewing for postgraduate exams, we can also adjust our mood through positive self-suggestion. In the morning, when washing your face, smile at yourself in the mirror; Say or write some encouraging words to yourself in prominent places, such as "I'm great", "Keep a good mood and improve the efficiency of review". Here, we should pay special attention to that we must not give ourselves negative self-suggestions. Don't always say "I'm terrible" and "Today is really bad luck" to yourself. If you always give yourself negative self-suggestions, you will find that you will really become very bad and very bad. Just like Zhao Benshan in the sketch "Selling Cane", a few words of "cane" really made Fan Wei turn. In addition, students can try to adjust their review思路. After all, the review method that suits them is the best. Many students do not know their reading habits or reading habits, so they refer to others' review schemes, or simply make a plan worthy of its name for postgraduate examination. The effect can be imagined.

content: 千支网络广告将在ADworld夏集体亮相经过近半年的征集，“ADworld2009中国互动营销效果大赛暨大奖”组委会共收到来自各领域广告主、4A公司、网络广告代理公司、互联网企业等全国各地百余家企业的千余件作品，其中将评选出的优秀作品，将获得Adworld2009中国互动营销效果大奖，最终评选结果将在7月9日在北京东君悦大酒店举行的“Adworld2009互动营销世界-夏”中现场揭晓。届时，所有提交案例将会在现场以视频形式循环播放，其中获得“Case100”奖项的优秀案例还将邀请广告主、创意、制作、媒介各方代表一起现场互动讨论，对该支广告案例进行点评。今年4月DCCI在中国正式推出DCCIAdmeasure广告效果第三方测评服务，中国国内的广告效果监测吹响了集结号。本次大赛，实现了真正让广告主看到广告效果、广告所到达的受众、广告所产生的真实的市场作用。从真正意义上实现360度多维测量的广告营销效果。本着“效果创新”的原则，第六届大赛突破了业内同类型比赛的旧有模式，改变之一：大赛规则因"营销创新"而改写中国互动营销业界的顶级大赛为互联网改变了标准，为什么？"i-game互动营销运动会"，它在2009年伊始已经初见端倪。从"网络广告"扩大到"互动营销"，再到"跨媒体整合营销"，互联网反映了市场的竞争规则：创新者，需要拥有足够生猛的生命力，并展示真实的价值，比如广告、营销，就可能改写规则。事实上，2009年，这个规则的改写更加显著。跨媒体整合营销奖项走出了互动网络广告的评选，进入了媒介营销创新评选的范畴。经历多年的创新，互联网新媒体改写了中国的"媒体"的定义，重构了媒介竞争与合作的格局，未来的市场将属于"跨媒介整合策划与营销"。改变之二："营销创新"源自媒介与技术创新，我们一直在讲。它的力量来自哪里？来自媒介的不断创新，包括新媒体的诞生，都离不开技术的进步。专注媒介。专注创意。据悉，Adworld互动营销世界是中国互动营销、网络广告领域一年一度的标志性年度盛典，迄今为止已经连续成功地举办了6届，是中国国内在该领域最权威、最核心的交流合作平台，作为年度市场风向标，得到广告主、代理商、媒体等上中下游各方的高度重视、广泛深入参与。Adworld互动营销世界由中国互联网协会、中国广告主协会等指导，DCCI互联网数据中心主办。DCCI为中国市场监测与网络测评权威第三方机构。
en: Thousand network advertising will debut in the summer collective of ADworld After nearly six months of solicitation, the "ADworld2009 China Interactive Marketing Effect Contest and Award" organizing committee received thousands of works from more than 100 enterprises in various fields, 4A companies, online advertising agencies, Internet enterprises and other enterprises from all over the country. The excellent works that will be selected will win the Adworld2009 China Interactive Marketing Effect Award. The final evaluation results will be announced on July 9 at the "Adworld2009 Interactive Marketing World - Summer" held at Dong Junyue Grand Hotel in Beijing. At that time, all submitted cases will be played in a loop in the form of video on the spot. The excellent cases that have won the "Case100" award will also be invited to invite advertisers, creativity, production, media and other representatives to interact on the spot to comment on the advertising case. In April this year, DCCI officially launched the third party advertising effect measurement service of DCCIAdmeasure in China, and the advertising effect monitoring in China blew the assembly horn. This competition has achieved the goal of letting advertisers see the effect of advertising, the audience reached by advertising, and the real market effect generated by advertising. To truly achieve 360 degree multi-dimensional measurement of advertising marketing effect. On the principle of "effect innovation", the sixth competition broke the old pattern of similar competitions in the industry, and one of the changes was: the rules of the competition were rewritten by "marketing innovation", the top competition of China's interactive marketing industry, because it changed the standard for the Internet. Why? "i-game interactive marketing sports meeting", which has begun to show signs at the beginning of 2009. From "online advertising" to "interactive marketing", and then to "cross media integrated marketing", the Internet reflects the market competition rules: innovators need to have enough vitality and demonstrate real value, such as advertising and marketing, which may rewrite the rules. In fact, in 2009, the rewriting of this rule was more significant. Cross media integrated marketing award went out of the selection of interactive network advertising and entered the scope of media marketing innovation selection. After years of innovation, Internet new media has rewritten the definition of "media" in China, and reconstruction of the pattern of media competition and cooperation, the future market will belong to "cross media integration planning and marketing". Change 2: "Marketing Innovation" comes from media and technology innovation, which we have been talking about. Where does its power come from? It comes from the continuous innovation of media, including the birth of new media, which is inseparable from the progress of technology. Focus on media. Focus on creativity. It is reported that Adworld Interactive Marketing World is an annual landmark annual event in the field of China's interactive marketing and online advertising. It has been successfully held for six consecutive years, and it is the most authoritative and core communication and cooperation platform in this field in China. As an annual market weather vane, it has received high attention, extensive and in-depth participation from advertisers, agents, media and other upstream and downstream parties. Adworld Interactive Marketing World is guided by the China Internet Association, China Advertising Association and other organizations, and hosted by DCCI Internet Data Center. DCCI is an authoritative third-party institution in China for market monitoring and network evaluation.

content: 手游《遗迹OL》自由注册跟内测号说NOMMORPG手游巨作《遗迹OL》将于9月15日12点整开启第二次内测！在前不久的首次内测中，凭借西方玄幻的背景特色、超Q的人物画风、超靓的换装系统、超炫的技能特效等等赢得了玩家们的一致好评！二测时我们不但修改了以前的BUG，更开放了更多的功能和活动，让大家进一步的感受游戏中的魅力！喜讯来了！《遗迹OL》二测双喜临门，不容错过！1.《遗迹OL》二测时无需内测号，不用再去辛苦抢号！直接注册便可直接登陆，账号终身有效，即使公测也可继续使用(内测删档)。2.《遗迹OL》二测时开放两大活动，并且超诱惑奖励在等着您。活动1：我比小强更坚强活动日期：9月15日至9月22日活动规则：比小强更坚强的是什么？跑完这十环，就是你了！任务每一步都奖励飞升箱，一次1个，一天最多10个。飞升箱升级速度大大超越动车，且有保证！你懂得！活动奖励：每完成一次任务将会得到1个飞升箱子，根据玩家等级开出海量的经验！让升级变得更加轻而易举。活动2：除了极品还是极品活动日期：2011年9月17日至9月22日活动规则：每天完成每完成1次指定的副本/活动。活动奖励：每次完成将获得10颗宝石，10个遗物，20颗成长石。在活动时间内，玩家等级达到40级时将获得顶级橙色装备一套！让PK、副本，变得易如反掌。如果您之前错过了一测，那么请珍惜二测的机会。明天，《遗迹OL》12点整准时开启！一起体验西方玄幻的魅力！！

content: 青海省一级学科博士授权点实现零的突破5月9日，记者从省教育厅高教处获悉，近日，国务院学位委员会下发了《关于下达2010年审核增列的博士和硕士学位授权一级学科名单的通知》，正式公布了在2010年启动的新一轮学位授权审核工作中各学位授予单位获准通过的一级学科授权名单。我省在此次增列博士和硕士学位授权一级学科工作中获较大突破，青海大学作物学一级学科获得了博士点授权，实现了我省一级学科博士授权点零的突破。新获得硕士学位授权一级学科24个。青海大学机械工程、水利工程、化学工程与技术、地质资源与地质工程、林学、基础医学、工商管理、作物学；青海师范大学历史学、生物学、计算机科学与技术、中国语言文学、数学、教育学、化学、地理学；青海民族大学法学、政治学、中国语言文学、数学、化学、药学、工商管理、公共管理。(作者：赵静)
en: On May 9, the provincial education department's Department of Higher Education learned that recently, the State Council's Academic Degree Committee issued the "Notice on Issuing the List of Doctoral and Master's Degree Authorization in the First Level Discipline of China", officially announcing the list of first level disciplines authorized by the degree granting units which were approved in the new round of degree authorization review launched in 2010. Our province has made a major breakthrough in the work of increasing the first-level disciplines of doctoral and master's degree authorization. Qinghai University's crop science first-level discipline has obtained the doctoral point authorization, realizing the breakthrough of zero in the first-level discipline doctoral authorization in our province. Twenty four new master's degree programs have been granted first-level authority. Qinghai University: mechanical engineering, water conservancy engineering, chemical engineering and technology, geological resources and geological engineering, forestry, basic medicine, business administration, crop science; Qinghai Normal University: history, biology, computer science and technology, Chinese language and literature, mathematics, pedagogy, chemistry, geography; Qinghai Nationalities University: law, politics, Chinese language and literature, mathematics, chemistry, pharmacology, business administration, public administration. (Author: Zhao Jing)

content: i83205230争霸1500元内智能手机推荐文/康元智能机的出现并不迟，但是并没有引起很大的反响，因为其高昂的价格阻止了很多人购买的欲望，不过现在各大系统的手机都有比较低的型号，为的是进一步普及智能机，甚至有些机型的价格还在1000元以下，对于学生和一些要求不高的朋友有着蛮强的吸引力，下面笔者就给大家推荐8款1500元内的机型，都是市面上卖的比较不错的哦。500W电容触控：三星i8320(参数论坛)参考报价：1480元（水改机）近期改版机市场最热门的手机要数这款叫做i8320的机型，虽然价格很便宜，但是却有500万像素720P高清、3.5寸WVGA电容触控和600MHz处理器的高端配置，采用最新的Li-Mo系统，配置十分不错。编辑点评：三星i8320作为Li-Mo系统的首款机型，整体的配置相当的高端，就是作为非智能机来用也是非常不错的，Li-Mo系统未来也可能普及，所以购买的人很多。
en: i83205230争霸1500 yuan within the smart phone recommendation document/Yuan Intelligent machine's appearance is not late, but it did not cause a great response, because its high price stopped many people from buying. However, now the mobile phones of all major systems have relatively low models in order to further popularize intelligent machines. Some models are even less than 1000 yuan, which is very attractive to students and some friends with low requirements. The following paper recommends eight models within 1500 yuan, all of which are well sold in the market. 500W capacitor touch: Samsung i8320 (parameter forum) reference quotation: 1480 yuan (water reform machine) The most popular mobile phone in the recent reform market is called i8320. Although it is very cheap, it has a high-end configuration of 5 million pixels, 720P HD, 3.5 inch WVGA capacitor touch and 600MHz processor, and adopts the latest Li Mo system, which is very good. Editor's comment: Samsung i8320 is the first model of Li Mo system, and the overall configuration is quite high-end. It is also very good to use it as a non smart machine. Li Mo system may also be popular in the future, so there are many people who buy it.

content: 男子在火车上强占他人座位收取让座费新快报讯（记者李国辉通讯员李文源）因在广州找工作碰壁，两名河北籍男子郭某、邵某为发财，竟在列车上强占他人座位收取让位费，结果被乘警逮个正着，分别受到了行政拘留、罚款的处罚。16日清早6时许，L308次列车自广州火车站开车后不久，一名旅客匆匆赶到乘警值班室举报称，有人霸占了他的座位还要强行收取让座费。乘警立即赶到事发车厢抓获了两名嫌疑男子，当场收缴非法所得款130元。据查，嫌疑人郭某和邵某均30岁左右，本月初他们从河北老家来广州打工，但因为没有技术又不愿吃苦，所以找了近半个月工作都没着落。想到国庆节临近，南来北往的旅客开始增多，他们便想了个霸占火车座位卖座位赚钱的法子。16日，两人买了短途火车票上车，抢在其他旅客前霸占了他人的座位，然后以30元至40元不等的价格向旅客收取“让座费”。两人在短短10分钟内即向旅客收取“让座费”130元，但随后就被乘警抓住。因其行为严重扰乱了公共场所秩序，侵害了旅客权益，韶关车站派出所对两人分别做出行政拘留10日和罚款500元的处罚。
person: 李文源,邵某,郭某,李国辉
en: A man occupies someone else's seat on a train to collect a seat fee. The new express reporter (reporter Li Guohui, correspondent Li Wenyuan) learned that because of the wall in Guangzhou to find a job, two Hebei men, Guo and Shao, in order to make a fortune, actually occupied someone else's seat on the train to collect a seat fee, and were caught by the police. They were punished with administrative detention and fines respectively. At about 6:00 a.m. on the 16th, shortly after the L308 train started from Guangzhou railway station, a passenger hurried to the police on duty room to report that someone had occupied his seat and wanted to charge him for giving up his seat. The police immediately arrived at the incident coach to catch the two suspected men and seized 130 yuan of illegal proceeds on the spot. According to the investigation, the suspects Guo and Shao are about 30 years old. At the beginning of this month, they came to work in Guangzhou from their hometown in Hebei, but they did not have any technology and were unwilling to suffer, so they had no job for nearly half a month. Thinking that the National Day is coming, the number of passengers coming from the south and going to the north is beginning to increase, so they came up with a way to occupy the train seat and make money by selling seats. On the 16th, the two men bought short-distance train tickets and took the train. They occupied other passengers' seats ahead of other passengers, and then charged the passengers "seat giving fee" at different prices of 30 yuan to 40 yuan. The two men collected "seat giving fee" of 130 yuan from passengers in just 10 minutes, but then they were caught by the police. Because their behavior seriously disrupted the public order and infringed on the rights and interests of passengers, Shaoguan Railway Station Public Security Office made a penalty of 10 days' administrative detention and a fine of 500 yuan for the two people respectively.
